engChrName: For general mob character checks. There is a possibility that events will not function correctly if used, so please be careful. *Please delete if not needed.
engSearchText:
For general mob character checks. There is a
possibility that events will not function correctly if
used, so please be careful. *Please delete if
not needed.
jpnChrName: 一般・モブ確認用です。こちらを使用した場合、イベントが 正常に進行しなくなる場合がありますのでご注意ください。 ※不要になりましたら削除をお願いいたします。
jpnSearchText:
一般・モブ確認用です。こちらを使用した場合、イベントが
正常に進行しなくなる場合がありますのでご注意ください。
※不要になりましたら削除をお願いいたします。

engChrName: ★DEBUG: Select one character to patrol the city together. (Note: This can be changed at any time via the Travel menu, etc.)
engSearchText: ★DEBUG: Select one character to patrol the city together. (Note: This can be changed at any time via the Travel menu, etc.)
jpnChrName: ★DEBUG：市内を巡回するメンバーを一人選んで下さい。 （※移動メニュー等でいつでも変更できます）
jpnSearchText:
★DEBUG：市内を巡回するメンバーを一人選んで下さい。
（※移動メニュー等でいつでも変更できます）

engChrName: ★DEBUG: Agnès, Feri, and Aaron have entered the party. Select two additional members.
engSearchText: ★DEBUG: Agnès, Feri, and Aaron have entered the party. Select two additional members.
jpnChrName: ★DEBUG：アニエス、フェリ、アーロンがパーティに入りました。 追加のメンバーを２名選んでください。
jpnSearchText:
★DEBUG：アニエス、フェリ、アーロンがパーティに入りました。
追加のメンバーを２名選んでください。

engChrName: ◆(Temp) Select an accompanying character (first).
engSearchText: ◆(Temp) Select an accompanying character (first).
jpnChrName: ◆（仮）同行メンバーを選んでください。（１人目）
jpnSearchText: ◆（仮）同行メンバーを選んでください。（１人目）

engChrName: ◆(Temp) Select an accompanying character (second).
engSearchText: ◆(Temp) Select an accompanying character (second).
jpnChrName: ◆（仮）同行メンバーを選んでください。（２人目）
jpnSearchText: ◆（仮）同行メンバーを選んでください。（２人目）

engChrName: ★DEBUG: (Temp) Select an accompanying character (first).
engSearchText: ★DEBUG: (Temp) Select an accompanying character (first).
jpnChrName: ★DEBUG：（仮）同行メンバーを選んでください。（１人目）
jpnSearchText: ★DEBUG：（仮）同行メンバーを選んでください。（１人目）

engChrName: ★DEBUG: (Temp) Select an accompanying character (second).
engSearchText: ★DEBUG: (Temp) Select an accompanying character (second).
jpnChrName: ★DEBUG：（仮）同行メンバーを選んでください。（２人目）
jpnSearchText: ★DEBUG：（仮）同行メンバーを選んでください。（２人目）

engChrName: ★DEBUG: Select a character to accompany you in addition to Van/Agnès/Risette.
engSearchText: ★DEBUG: Select a character to accompany you in addition to Van/Agnès/Risette.
jpnChrName: ★DEBUG：ヴァン・アニエス・リゼットに加えて 連れて行くメンバーを選んでください。
jpnSearchText:
★DEBUG：ヴァン・アニエス・リゼットに加えて
連れて行くメンバーを選んでください。

engChrName: ★DEBUG: Select 1 accompanying character. (This can be changed later.)
engSearchText: ★DEBUG: Select 1 accompanying character. (This can be changed later.)
jpnChrName: ★DEBUG：同行メンバーを一人選んでください。 （後で変更も可能です。）
jpnSearchText:
★DEBUG：同行メンバーを一人選んでください。
（後で変更も可能です。）

engChrName: ★DEBUG: Set the location liberation status. The order of locations liberated changes the party lineup.
engSearchText:
★DEBUG: Set the location liberation status.
The order of locations liberated changes the party lineup.
jpnChrName: ★DEBUG：解放している順番によってパーティー構成が変化します。 解放状況を選択してください。
jpnSearchText:
★DEBUG：解放している順番によってパーティー構成が変化します。
解放状況を選択してください。

engChrName: The air at the meeting is quite amicable, as far as I can tell.
engSearchText:
The air at the meeting is quite amicable, as far as I
can tell.
jpnChrName: 様子を見るに、あの会合では 和やかな交流が行われているようですね。
jpnSearchText:
様子を見るに、あの会合では
和やかな交流が行われているようですね。

engChrName: The attendants, however, are rather adept at putting on appearances, so I suppose I shouldn't jump to any conclusions.
engSearchText:
The attendants, however, are rather adept
at putting on appearances, so I suppose I
shouldn't jump to any conclusions.
jpnChrName: ですが、あの方々ならば どうとでも見せかける事が出来るでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
ですが、あの方々ならば
どうとでも見せかける事が出来るでしょう。

engChrName: I will be keeping tabs on the situation until you require my assistance.
engSearchText:
I will be keeping tabs on the situation until you
require my assistance.
jpnChrName: 交替するまでの間、 もう少し様子を探らせて頂きます。
jpnSearchText:
交替するまでの間、
もう少し様子を探らせて頂きます。

engChrName: Hmm... I'm not sure what to pick.
engSearchText: Hmm... I'm not sure what to pick.
jpnChrName: ふむ、どうしましょうか……
jpnSearchText: ふむ、どうしましょうか……

engChrName: A practical gift might be the way to go. Something she'll get good use out of, rather than something that won't last.
engSearchText:
A practical gift might be the way to go.
Something she'll get good use out of, rather than
something that won't last.
jpnChrName: “彼女”の事ですし消え物よりは ずっと使えるものが良さそうですけど。
jpnSearchText:
“彼女”の事ですし消え物よりは
ずっと使えるものが良さそうですけど。

engChrName: Heya, Risette. You're out, too, huh.
engSearchText: Heya, Risette. You're out, too, huh.
jpnChrName: ああ、お前さんも出かけてたんだな？
jpnSearchText: ああ、お前さんも出かけてたんだな？

engChrName: Oh, Mr. Arkride. Hello there. Surprised to see you here.
engSearchText:
Oh, Mr. Arkride. Hello there. Surprised to see
you here.
jpnChrName: あら、ヴァン様。 どうしてこちらに──
jpnSearchText:
あら、ヴァン様。
どうしてこちらに──

engChrName: Are you on patrol tonight?
engSearchText: Are you on patrol tonight?
jpnChrName: ……ってああ、 いつもの“そぞろ歩き”ですね？
jpnSearchText:
……ってああ、
いつもの“そぞろ歩き”ですね？

engChrName: Yeah. Night's still young, after all.
engSearchText: Yeah. Night's still young, after all.
jpnChrName: ま、そういうことだ。 まだ宵の口みたいなモンだしな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、そういうことだ。
まだ宵の口みたいなモンだしな。

engChrName: You shoppin' around for a gift?
engSearchText: You shoppin' around for a gift?
jpnChrName: そっちはどうやら プレゼントを捜してるみたいだが？
jpnSearchText:
そっちはどうやら
プレゼントを捜してるみたいだが？

engChrName: Heehee, I am.
engSearchText: Heehee, I am.
jpnChrName: ふふ……はい。
jpnSearchText: ふふ……はい。

engChrName: It's for one of my Marduk colleagues in Ored.
engSearchText: It's for one of my Marduk colleagues in Ored.
jpnChrName: オレドのマルドゥック本社に勤務する、 同僚への贈り物ですね。
jpnSearchText:
オレドのマルドゥック本社に勤務する、
同僚への贈り物ですね。

engChrName: Her birthday is next month.
engSearchText: Her birthday is next month.
jpnChrName: ちょうど来月に誕生日を迎えるので。
jpnSearchText: ちょうど来月に誕生日を迎えるので。

engChrName: A coworker from Marduk? She also a concierge?
engSearchText: A coworker from Marduk? She also a concierge?
jpnChrName: へえ、マルドゥック社のか。 ってことはＳＣ（サービスコンシェルジュ）の？
jpnSearchText:
へえ、マルドゥック社のか。
ってことはＳＣ（サービスコンシェルジュ）の？

engChrName: She is indeed. One of our very best, too. She's primarily in charge of operations in the free cities.
engSearchText:
She is indeed. One of our very best, too.
She's primarily in charge of operations in the
free cities.
jpnChrName: ええ、主に自由都市圏のオペレーションを 担当しているやり手ですね。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、主に自由都市圏のオペレーションを
担当しているやり手ですね。

engChrName: In fact, I believe you met her when you were sent to Ored for tactics lessons.
engSearchText:
In fact, I believe you met her when you were sent to
Ored for tactics lessons.
jpnChrName: ヴァン様も戦術指南でオレドに赴かれた時、 お会いになられていると思いますが。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン様も戦術指南でオレドに赴かれた時、
お会いになられていると思いますが。

engChrName: Oh, yeah! That's that perky woman that was helpin' me.
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah! That's that perky woman that was
helpin' me.
jpnChrName: ああ、あの威勢のいい姉ちゃんか！
jpnSearchText: ああ、あの威勢のいい姉ちゃんか！

engChrName: You must be that spriggan dude I keep hearin' about.
engSearchText:
You must be that spriggan dude I keep
hearin' about.
jpnChrName: ヘェ……兄さんが噂の裏解決屋さんか。
jpnSearchText: <C1>ヘェ……兄さんが噂の裏解決屋さんか。

engChrName: If you're looking for Risette, you're fresh outta luck...but don't fret, 'cause I'm taking her place! For a few weeks, anyway.
engSearchText:
If you're looking for Risette, you're fresh outta
luck...but don't fret, 'cause I'm taking her place!
For a few weeks, anyway.
jpnChrName: あいにくリゼットは不在でなぁ。 ３週間、ウチが世話させてもらうで。
jpnSearchText:
あいにくリゼットは不在でなぁ。
３週間、ウチが世話させてもらうで。

engChrName: Security Chief Kasim's training's gonna take you to hell and back, but I'm sure you'll live. And if not, then I'll be there to pick up your remains!
engSearchText:
Security Chief Kasim's training's gonna take you to
hell and back, but I'm sure you'll live. And if not,
then I'll be there to pick up your remains!
jpnChrName: カシム主任のシゴキはえげつないやろうけど 骨は拾ったるさかいあんじょうきばりや！
jpnSearchText:
カシム主任のシゴキはえげつないやろうけど
骨は拾ったるさかいあんじょうきばりや！

engChrName: Those warnings did not do Kasim's training justice. Shit was real rough, but she was a great help.
engSearchText:
Those warnings did not do Kasim's training justice.
Shit was real rough, but she was a great help.
jpnChrName: ……《灼飆（カムシン）》のシゴキは警告以上だったが、 確かにソツなくサポートしてくれたぜ。
jpnSearchText:
……《灼飆（カムシン）》のシゴキは警告以上だったが、
確かにソツなくサポートしてくれたぜ。

engChrName: Has quite an eye for details.
engSearchText: Has quite an eye for details.
jpnChrName: 大雑把なようで気配りの娘だったな。
jpnSearchText: 大雑把なようで気配りの娘だったな。

engChrName: Heehee, that's her, all right.
engSearchText: Heehee, that's her, all right.
jpnChrName: ふふ、そうなんです。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、そうなんです。

engChrName: She's aware of my circumstances. Despite the state I'm in, she's always incredibly patient and has stuck with me throughout my practical tests.
engSearchText:
She's aware of my circumstances. Despite the state
I'm in, she's always incredibly patient and has stuck
with me throughout my practical tests.
jpnChrName: 私の事情も知っていて、この状態になってからも 根気よく実践テストにも付き合ってくれて……
jpnSearchText:
私の事情も知っていて、この状態になってからも
根気よく実践テストにも付き合ってくれて……

engChrName: More than just a colleague, she's a dear friend.
engSearchText: More than just a colleague, she's a dear friend.
jpnChrName: 同僚である以上に、大切な友人ですね。
jpnSearchText: 同僚である以上に、大切な友人ですね。

engChrName: She sounds like she's pretty great.
engSearchText: She sounds like she's pretty great.
jpnChrName: ハハ……なるほどな。
jpnSearchText: ハハ……なるほどな。

engChrName: Sad to say, I'm probably the wrong person to ask if you want help picking a gift for a woman.
engSearchText:
Sad to say, I'm probably the wrong person to ask if
you want help picking a gift for a woman.
jpnChrName: ま、女性相手となると俺じゃあ プレゼント選びの役には立てなさそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、女性相手となると俺じゃあ
プレゼント選びの役には立てなさそうだ。

engChrName: We're only doing half a day tomorrow, so take all the time you need pickin' out a gift.
engSearchText:
We're only doing half a day tomorrow, so take all the
time you need pickin' out a gift.
jpnChrName: ただ、明日は半休にするつもりだし、 ゆっくり選んで、マッタリしていくといい。
jpnSearchText:
ただ、明日は半休にするつもりだし、
ゆっくり選んで、マッタリしていくといい。

engChrName: Thank you. Make sure you get some rest, too.
engSearchText: Thank you. Make sure you get some rest, too.
jpnChrName: フフ、承知しました──ヴァン様も どうかごゆっくり過ごされてください。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、承知しました──ヴァン様も
どうかごゆっくり過ごされてください。

engChrName: I don't think I'll quite pick anything tonight. Her birthday is still a ways off.
engSearchText:
I don't think I'll quite pick anything tonight.
Her birthday is still a ways off.
jpnChrName: まだ日にちはありますので 今日、決めるつもりはありませんが……
jpnSearchText:
まだ日にちはありますので
今日、決めるつもりはありませんが……

engChrName: But I think I'll take another look around before I head home. I hope you have a lovely evening, Mr. Arkride.
engSearchText:
But I think I'll take another look around before I
head home. I hope you have a lovely evening,
Mr. Arkride.
jpnChrName: もう少し色々見てから帰ります。 ヴァン様もどうか、穏やかな良い夜を。
jpnSearchText:
もう少し色々見てから帰ります。
ヴァン様もどうか、穏やかな良い夜を。

engChrName: Hey! What do you think you're doin' over there?
engSearchText: Hey! What do you think you're doin' over there?
jpnChrName: コラ君ー！　ここで何をやっているか！！
jpnSearchText: コラ君ー！　ここで何をやっているか！！

engChrName: Hey, buddy! You got a permit for that? No advertising allowed here without one! I advise you to stop right this instant!
engSearchText:
Hey, buddy! You got a permit for that?
No advertising allowed here without one! I advise you
to stop right this instant!
jpnChrName: 許可を得ていない客引き、宣伝行為は 禁止されている！　すぐに止めなさい！！
jpnSearchText:
許可を得ていない客引き、宣伝行為は
禁止されている！　すぐに止めなさい！！

engChrName: As citizens of the Calvard Republic, it's our job to drive out immigrants!
engSearchText:
As citizens of the Calvard Republic, it's our
job to drive out immigrants!
jpnChrName: ……そして諸君ッ！　移民を追い出す 事こそがカルバードの真の姿を──！！
jpnSearchText:
……そして諸君ッ！　移民を追い出す
事こそがカルバードの真の姿を──！！

engChrName: Are you even listening?! I'm gonna drag you to the police station myself if you don't stop!
engSearchText:
Are you even listening?! I'm gonna drag you
to the police station myself if you don't stop!
jpnChrName: 話を聞かんか──っ！！ このまましょっぴくぞ！！
jpnSearchText:
話を聞かんか──っ！！
このまましょっぴくぞ！！

engChrName: (A fight might break out soon. But considering what he's talking about...)
engSearchText:
(A fight might break out soon. But considering what
he's talking about...)
jpnChrName: （揉めてますね……   ……それにこれって……）
jpnSearchText:
（揉めてますね……
……それにこれって……）

engChrName: (If he's talking about what I think he is, then I understand why everyone looks so upset...)
engSearchText:
(If he's talking about what I think he is, then I
understand why everyone looks so upset...)
jpnChrName: （なんだか揉めてますけど……   ……それにこの人の言ってる事って……）
jpnSearchText:
（なんだか揉めてますけど……
……それにこの人の言ってる事って……）

engChrName: (Well, a nice beating might teach that guy not to be such a jackass.)
engSearchText:
(Well, a nice beating might teach that guy not to be
such a jackass.)
jpnChrName: （ハッ、揉めてやがんな……   しかもあの妄言野郎は……）
jpnSearchText:
（ハッ、揉めてやがんな……
しかもあの妄言野郎は……）

engChrName: (He's one of those anti-immigration protesters. I've seen a few of them here and there.)
engSearchText:
(He's one of those anti-immigration protesters.
I've seen a few of them here and there.)
jpnChrName: （ああ、移民排斥主義者ってヤツだな。   たまにここいらでも見かけるが……）
jpnSearchText:
（ああ、移民排斥主義者ってヤツだな。
たまにここいらでも見かけるが……）

engChrName: (Well, ain't none of my business.)
engSearchText: (Well, ain't none of my business.)
jpnChrName: （まあ絡まれても面倒だ。   ガン無視していくぞ。）
jpnSearchText:
（まあ絡まれても面倒だ。
ガン無視していくぞ。）

engChrName: Oh, there you all are! Thank you for the update.
engSearchText: Oh, there you all are! Thank you for the update.
jpnChrName: あっ、皆さん……！ 連絡ありがとうございました。
jpnSearchText:
あっ、皆さん……！
連絡ありがとうございました。

engChrName: I'm glad to hear my dad's okay, but are you sure you still need to keep investigating?
engSearchText:
I'm glad to hear my dad's okay, but are you sure you
still need to keep investigating?
jpnChrName: 父の無事が分かって安心しました。 でも、まだ調査を続ける必要があるとか……？
jpnSearchText:
父の無事が分かって安心しました。
でも、まだ調査を続ける必要があるとか……？

engChrName: Yeah. Shit's more complicated than I first thought.
engSearchText: Yeah. Shit's more complicated than I first thought.
jpnChrName: ああ、ちょいと状況が込み入っててな。
jpnSearchText: ああ、ちょいと状況が込み入っててな。

engChrName: I'll let you know once we're done. Just bear with me, all right?
engSearchText:
I'll let you know once we're done. Just bear with me,
all right?
jpnChrName: 調査が終わり次第、改めて連絡する。 それまで適当に待っててくれ。
jpnSearchText:
調査が終わり次第、改めて連絡する。
それまで適当に待っててくれ。

engChrName: I understand. Thank you!
engSearchText: I understand. Thank you!
jpnChrName: 分かりました……！
jpnSearchText: 分かりました……！

engChrName: (Walton has headed underneath the city with the guru.)
engSearchText:
(Walton has headed underneath the city with
the guru.)
jpnChrName: （ウォルトンさんは教祖たちと一緒に 　地下遺跡へ行ってしまいましたけど……）
jpnSearchText:
（ウォルトンさんは教祖たちと一緒に
　地下遺跡へ行ってしまいましたけど……）

engChrName: (We should probably lay low for now.)
engSearchText: (We should probably lay low for now.)
jpnChrName: （今はまだ伏せておいた方がよさそうですね。）
jpnSearchText: （今はまだ伏せておいた方がよさそうですね。）

engChrName: Carson's over at Riverside. He's usually around the stalls.
engSearchText:
Carson's over at Riverside. He's usually around
the stalls.
jpnChrName: カーソンさんはリバーサイドの 屋台のある通りで待っているはずですよ。
jpnSearchText:
カーソンさんはリバーサイドの
屋台のある通りで待っているはずですよ。

engChrName: If anyone knows what's going on with Dad, it'll be him.
engSearchText:
If anyone knows what's going on with Dad, it'll
be him.
jpnChrName: その人なら、父が今どうしているか 知っていると思います。
jpnSearchText:
その人なら、父が今どうしているか
知っていると思います。

engChrName: And I'm so sorry for getting you involved in this mess. I can't thank you enough for helping!
engSearchText:
And I'm so sorry for getting you involved in
this mess. I can't thank you enough for helping!
jpnChrName: 怪しい話に巻き込んで申し訳ありませんが どうかよろしくお願いします……！
jpnSearchText:
怪しい話に巻き込んで申し訳ありませんが
どうかよろしくお願いします……！

engChrName: Excuse me. Are you...?
engSearchText: Excuse me. Are you...?
jpnChrName: ……貴方はもしかして……？
jpnSearchText: ……貴方はもしかして……？

engChrName: You need somethin'?
engSearchText: You need somethin'?
jpnChrName: ん？　俺に何か用か？
jpnSearchText: ん？　俺に何か用か？

engChrName: Uh, no, no. Thought you were someone else.
engSearchText: Uh, no, no. Thought you were someone else.
jpnChrName: あっ、いえ……ごめんなさい。 人違いだったみたいです……
jpnSearchText:
あっ、いえ……ごめんなさい。
人違いだったみたいです……

engChrName: (Was that who I think it was?)
engSearchText: (Was that who I think it was?)
jpnChrName: （この方、もしかして……）
jpnSearchText: （この方、もしかして……）

engChrName: (Maybe we should check the bulletin board, just to be sure.)
engSearchText:
(Maybe we should check the bulletin board, just to
be sure.)
jpnChrName: （念の為、掲示板を確認した方が 　いいかもしれませんね。）
jpnSearchText:
（念の為、掲示板を確認した方が
　いいかもしれませんね。）

engChrName: I-I-I don't know if you're from Marduk or what, but you're no match for the Republic's law enforcement!
engSearchText:
I-I-I don't know if you're from Marduk or what, but
you're no match for the Republic's law enforcement!
jpnChrName: ママ、マルドゥックだか何だか知らんが 国家警察が負けてなるものかッ……！！
jpnSearchText:
ママ、マルドゥックだか何だか知らんが
国家警察が負けてなるものかッ……！！

engChrName: I'm perfectly capable of protecting the Republic's citizens all by myself!
engSearchText:
I'm perfectly capable of protecting the Republic's
citizens all by myself!
jpnChrName: 連中などに頼らずとも、 市民は私が守ってみせるっ！！
jpnSearchText:
連中などに頼らずとも、
市民は私が守ってみせるっ！！

engChrName: I'll show you not to mess with Calvard's police force!
engSearchText: I'll show you not to mess with Calvard's police force!
jpnChrName: 見ておれ、カルバードの警察魂を 見せてくれるわぁぁぁっ！！
jpnSearchText:
見ておれ、カルバードの警察魂を
見せてくれるわぁぁぁっ！！

engChrName: Argh! I have to protect everyone, no matter what!
engSearchText: Argh! I have to protect everyone, no matter what!
jpnChrName: くうっ！！　何があろうとも 市民たちの安全はこの私が──！！
jpnSearchText:
くうっ！！　何があろうとも
市民たちの安全はこの私が──！！

engChrName: I-I just hope my handgun will work on those monsters...
engSearchText:
I-I just hope my handgun will work on
those monsters...
jpnChrName: だだだがしかしあのバケモノどもは…… 拳銃も効かないしどうすればぁぁっ！？
jpnSearchText:
だだだがしかしあのバケモノどもは……
拳銃も効かないしどうすればぁぁっ！？

engChrName: The president's speech was fantastic!
engSearchText: The president's speech was fantastic!
jpnChrName: 大統領の演説、実に見事だったな。
jpnSearchText: 大統領の演説、実に見事だったな。

engChrName: His mourning of Creil Village was moving, all while reminding us to be proud of our nation now being the leading power in the continent.
engSearchText:
His mourning of Creil Village was moving, all while
reminding us to be proud of our nation now being the
leading power in the continent.
jpnChrName: クレイユ村住民の追悼、そして大陸を主導する 大国としての矜持をしかと示された。
jpnSearchText:
クレイユ村住民の追悼、そして大陸を主導する
大国としての矜持をしかと示された。

engChrName: The future of our nation is uncertain...
engSearchText: The future of our nation is uncertain...
jpnChrName: カルバード（この国）がこれからどこへ 行くのかは分からないが……
jpnSearchText:
カルバード（この国）がこれからどこへ
行くのかは分からないが……

engChrName: But as for today, we should be proud of our nation's history, and of the people that brought us here, like Sheena Dirke.
engSearchText:
But as for today, we should be proud of our nation's
history, and of the people that brought us here, like
Sheena Dirke.
jpnChrName: 革命記念日、この日にこそ、国家と シーナ・ディルクに想いを馳せたいものだな。
jpnSearchText:
革命記念日、この日にこそ、国家と
シーナ・ディルクに想いを馳せたいものだな。

engChrName: It's really packed out here. This might be the busiest Revolution Festival we've had yet.
engSearchText:
It's really packed out here. This might be the
busiest Revolution Festival we've had yet.
jpnChrName: ふむ、夜になっても中々の人通りだ。 今年の記念祭は例年以上に賑わいそうだが──
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、夜になっても中々の人通りだ。
今年の記念祭は例年以上に賑わいそうだが──

engChrName: We need to be on our highest alert. Some crook might want to try infiltrating the capital while we're all distracted.
engSearchText:
We need to be on our highest alert. Some crook
might want to try infiltrating the capital while
we're all distracted.
jpnChrName: こんな時こそ、胡乱な連中が 首都に入り込まないとも限らないからな。
jpnSearchText:
こんな時こそ、胡乱な連中が
首都に入り込まないとも限らないからな。

engChrName: I don't expect that to happen, but we must remain vigilant regardless.
engSearchText:
I don't expect that to happen, but we must remain
vigilant regardless.
jpnChrName: まあ滅多な事はないだろうが 私もしっかり目を光らせておかねばな。
jpnSearchText:
まあ滅多な事はないだろうが
私もしっかり目を光らせておかねばな。

engChrName: It's much more lively around now that the Revolution Festival is comin' up.
engSearchText:
It's much more lively around now that the
Revolution Festival is comin' up.
jpnChrName: フフ、革命記念祭も近づいてきて 街も賑わってきたな。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、革命記念祭も近づいてきて
街も賑わってきたな。

engChrName: That whole mafia deal got settled last month.
engSearchText: That whole mafia deal got settled last month.
jpnChrName: 先月のうちに例のマフィアの一件が 片付いて本当に良かったぞ。
jpnSearchText:
先月のうちに例のマフィアの一件が
片付いて本当に良かったぞ。

engChrName: I heard they pulled out the big guns for it. Got special forces and even jaegers on the case.
engSearchText:
I heard they pulled out the big guns for it. Got special
forces and even jaegers on the case.
jpnChrName: なんでも特殊部隊や猟兵、 特殊な集団まで投入したらしいが……
jpnSearchText:
なんでも特殊部隊や猟兵、
特殊な集団まで投入したらしいが……

engChrName: I even heard that some shady civvies got involved in the whole deal...
engSearchText:
I even heard that some shady civvies got involved in
the whole deal...
jpnChrName: 最後は訳アリの民間人集団が 活躍したという噂も聞いたが……
jpnSearchText:
最後は訳アリの民間人集団が
活躍したという噂も聞いたが……

engChrName: Well, whatever. If they helped out, then that's all I should be happy about. Must've been real strong in the first place to help out.
engSearchText:
Well, whatever. If they helped out, then that's all I
should be happy about. Must've been real strong in
the first place to help out.
jpnChrName: なんにせよ大した連中だったのだろうな。 ふむ、一応感謝しておくとしよう。
jpnSearchText:
なんにせよ大した連中だったのだろうな。
ふむ、一応感謝しておくとしよう。

engChrName: By the way, we recently got an application for some sort of street gig or somethin'.
engSearchText:
By the way, we recently got an application for some
sort of street gig or somethin'.
jpnChrName: ちなみにあちらの路上ライブは 事前に申請も出されている物だぞ。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみにあちらの路上ライブは
事前に申請も出されている物だぞ。

engChrName: It had to do with idols or whatever. It might just end up causing even more trouble...
engSearchText:
It had to do with idols or whatever. It might just end
up causing even more trouble...
jpnChrName: “アイドル”……とか言ったかな。 ふむ、ああいうのも意外と……
jpnSearchText:
“アイドル”……とか言ったかな。
ふむ、ああいうのも意外と……

engChrName: *cough* Anyway, it's not my place to judge. The permit was granted, so I hope their show is a success.
engSearchText:
*cough* Anyway, it's not my place to judge.
The permit was granted, so I hope their show is
a success.
jpnChrName: コホン、ともかく許可は出している。 精一杯やるといいだろう。
jpnSearchText:
コホン、ともかく許可は出している。
精一杯やるといいだろう。

engChrName: Team three, patrol the station area!
engSearchText: Team three, patrol the station area!
jpnChrName: 第三班はこれより駅周辺を巡回！
jpnSearchText: <S5>第三班はこれより駅周辺を巡回！

engChrName: Cooperate with teams one and two! Let nothing escape your watch!
engSearchText:
Cooperate with teams one and two! Let
nothing escape your watch!
jpnChrName: 一班・二班と連携して警戒に当たれ！
jpnSearchText: <S5>一班・二班と連携して警戒に当たれ！

engChrName: Understood!
engSearchText: Understood!
jpnChrName: はっ！！

engChrName: Those vile mafiosos! Just you wait! I won't let anything else happen on my watch!
engSearchText:
Those vile mafiosos! Just you wait! I won't let
anything else happen on my watch!
jpnChrName: 極悪非道なマフィアめ……！！ これ以上の事件など絶対に起こさせんぞ！！
jpnSearchText:
極悪非道なマフィアめ……！！
これ以上の事件など絶対に起こさせんぞ！！

engChrName: *sigh* But at least things look like they're going back to normal...
engSearchText:
*sigh* But at least things look like they're going back
to normal...
jpnChrName: まあ何にせよ、通常業務に戻って何よりだ。
jpnSearchText: まあ何にせよ、通常業務に戻って何よりだ。

engChrName: The terrorism investigations are winding down in Anchorville, too. Ahh, can't beat peace.
engSearchText:
The terrorism investigations are winding down in
Anchorville, too. Ahh, can't beat peace.
jpnChrName: アンカーヴィルのテロ捜査も 一段落したそうだし、やはり平和が一番だな。
jpnSearchText:
アンカーヴィルのテロ捜査も
一段落したそうだし、やはり平和が一番だな。

engChrName: The Bracer Guild can come in useful when it comes to maintaining public order, at least.
engSearchText:
The Bracer Guild can come in useful when it comes
to maintaining public order, at least.
jpnChrName: 遊撃士協会（ギルド）の連中は 治安維持上、役立ってはいるが……
jpnSearchText:
遊撃士協会（ギルド）の連中は
治安維持上、役立ってはいるが……

engChrName: Not denying that they're good at their job, but all the glitz and pomp rubs me the wrong way... Feels like a popularity contest half the time.
engSearchText:
Not denying that they're good at their job, but all the
glitz and pomp rubs me the wrong way... Feels like a
popularity contest half the time.
jpnChrName: コホン、ついでに中々優秀な事も認めるが、 所詮は人気商売だからな。
jpnSearchText:
コホン、ついでに中々優秀な事も認めるが、
所詮は人気商売だからな。

engChrName: Though keeping citizens safe is the police's job in the first place. We shouldn't be relying on the bracers to do our job for us.
engSearchText:
Though keeping citizens safe is the police's job in the
first place. We shouldn't be relying on the bracers to
do our job for us.
jpnChrName: やはり市民の平和を守るのは 第一に我々警察の責務に違いない。
jpnSearchText:
やはり市民の平和を守るのは
第一に我々警察の責務に違いない。

engChrName: I'll give my best performance today! We'll prove to everyone that we don't need those pretentious bracers' help!
engSearchText:
I'll give my best performance today! We'll prove to
everyone that we don't need those pretentious
bracers' help!
jpnChrName: 今夜もしっかりと目を光らせ、連中などに 頼らずとも十分な事を証明しなくてはな！
jpnSearchText:
今夜もしっかりと目を光らせ、連中などに
頼らずとも十分な事を証明しなくてはな！

engChrName: The mafia's spread all throughout the republic.
engSearchText: The mafia's spread all throughout the republic.
jpnChrName: どうやら共和国全土で マフィアの活動が活発になっているようでね。
jpnSearchText:
どうやら共和国全土で
マフィアの活動が活発になっているようでね。

engChrName: Even the higher ups are telling us to keep a close watch on everything.
engSearchText:
Even the higher ups are telling us to keep a close
watch on everything.
jpnChrName: 我々も警戒を強めるよう 上から指示が来ているんだ。
jpnSearchText:
我々も警戒を強めるよう
上から指示が来ているんだ。

engChrName: I knew things were getting worse as of late... We're gonna need the traffic department's help to clamp down on things.
engSearchText:
I knew things were getting worse as of late...
We're gonna need the traffic department's help to
clamp down on things.
jpnChrName: 最近事件が多いとは思っていたが…… 交通課とも連携して、引き締めていかないとな。
jpnSearchText:
最近事件が多いとは思っていたが……
交通課とも連携して、引き締めていかないとな。

engChrName: That protester we had was making such a ruckus here earlier today. *sigh* I just keep getting busier and busier.
engSearchText:
That protester we had was making such a ruckus
here earlier today. *sigh* I just keep getting
busier and busier.
jpnChrName: 今日は勝手に街宣を始める 活動家が現れてな……中々大変だったぞ。
jpnSearchText:
今日は勝手に街宣を始める
活動家が現れてな……中々大変だったぞ。

engChrName: He was one of those anti-immigration extremists. Nothing but rude white supremacists, the bunch of 'em.
engSearchText:
He was one of those anti-immigration extremists.
Nothing but rude white supremacists, the bunch
of 'em.
jpnChrName: 反移民・白人至上主義を唱える 過激派のようだったが、妙に強気な態度でな。
jpnSearchText:
反移民・白人至上主義を唱える
過激派のようだったが、妙に強気な態度でな。

engChrName: They get all haughty about 'purging immigrants' and how they're 'ruining the Republic' and that the 'true Calvard' can't exist with 'em here.
engSearchText:
They get all haughty about 'purging immigrants' and
how they're 'ruining the Republic' and that the 'true
Calvard' can't exist with 'em here.
jpnChrName: “真のカルバード”のために東方系や 中東系の人間を排除すべきだとのたまうんだ。
jpnSearchText:
“真のカルバード”のために東方系や
中東系の人間を排除すべきだとのたまうんだ。

engChrName: I deal with 'em all the time, yeah. Doesn't mean I like 'em or that I'm used to them.
engSearchText:
I deal with 'em all the time, yeah. Doesn't mean I like
'em or that I'm used to them.
jpnChrName: ……ああいう手合いは時々現れるが、 まったく気分が悪いよ。
jpnSearchText:
……ああいう手合いは時々現れるが、
まったく気分が悪いよ。

engChrName: It's pretty sickening. Under the eyes of the law, every race in the republic is equal. Their nonsense propaganda's against the law on that alone.
engSearchText:
It's pretty sickening. Under the eyes of the law, every
race in the republic is equal. Their nonsense
propaganda's against the law on that alone.
jpnChrName: 共和国憲章は人種によらない平等を謳っているし 街宣行為にしても違法なんだが……
jpnSearchText:
共和国憲章は人種によらない平等を謳っているし
街宣行為にしても違法なんだが……

engChrName: *sigh* It's just horrible. I don't even know how you get to start thinking less of people that way...
engSearchText:
*sigh* It's just horrible. I don't even know how you
get to start thinking less of people that way...
jpnChrName: ふう、一体どこから現れるのか 知らないが、気分が悪いよ。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、一体どこから現れるのか
知らないが、気分が悪いよ。

engChrName: Calvard's police force is broadly split into the capital police force here in Edith and the regional police forces.
engSearchText:
Calvard's police force is broadly split into the capital
police force here in Edith and the regional
police forces.
jpnChrName: カルバードの警察は大きく 首都警察と各地方警察に分かれていてね。
jpnSearchText:
カルバードの警察は大きく
首都警察と各地方警察に分かれていてね。

engChrName: We cooperate all throughout Republic territory to help maintain peace.
engSearchText:
We cooperate all throughout Republic territory to
help maintain peace.
jpnChrName: 協力・連携しつつ、共和国全土の 事件や犯罪に対処しているんだ。
jpnSearchText:
協力・連携しつつ、共和国全土の
事件や犯罪に対処しているんだ。

engChrName: You can find the capital's police headquarters in Seiden, Edith's 2nd District.
engSearchText:
You can find the capital's police headquarters in
Seiden, Edith's 2nd District.
jpnChrName: ちなみに首都警察の本署は ２区サイデン地区にあるね。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに首都警察の本署は
２区サイデン地区にあるね。

engChrName: It's also home to the citizen advice line, so I imagine a lot of people are aware of it already.
engSearchText:
It's also home to the citizen advice line, so I imagine a
lot of people are aware of it already.
jpnChrName: 市民向けの相談窓口もあるから なじみがある人も多いんじゃないかな？
jpnSearchText:
市民向けの相談窓口もあるから
なじみがある人も多いんじゃないかな？

engChrName: Nothing to report! Looks like just another peaceful day in the city!
engSearchText:
Nothing to report! Looks like just another peaceful
day in the city!
jpnChrName: ……異常なし！ うん、今日も平和に一日が終わりそうだな。
jpnSearchText:
……異常なし！
うん、今日も平和に一日が終わりそうだな。

engChrName: No shady dealings going on, and no criminals in sight!
engSearchText:
No shady dealings going on, and no criminals
in sight!
jpnChrName: 不審者もいないし、怪しげな取引なども 行われていないはずだ。
jpnSearchText:
不審者もいないし、怪しげな取引なども
行われていないはずだ。

engChrName: It's our lives' mission to protect the livelihoods of our citizens! All in a day's work!
engSearchText:
It's our lives' mission to protect the livelihoods of
our citizens! All in a day's work!
jpnChrName: 市民の生活を守るのが我々の使命── ふう、いい仕事をしたな！
jpnSearchText:
市民の生活を守るのが我々の使命──
ふう、いい仕事をしたな！

engChrName: (Ahaha... Can't help but feel like the criminal he's talking about.)
engSearchText:
(Ahaha... Can't help but feel like the criminal he's
talking about.)
jpnChrName: （あはは……なぜだか少しだけ   後ろめたい気がしますけど……）
jpnSearchText:
（あはは……なぜだか少しだけ
後ろめたい気がしますけど……）

engChrName: (Nah, nothin' to worry about. I'm more worried about gettin' some dessert!)
engSearchText:
(Nah, nothin' to worry about. I'm more worried about
gettin' some dessert!)
jpnChrName: （気のせいだ、気のせい。   とっとと甘いモンを調達しちまうぞ！）
jpnSearchText:
（気のせいだ、気のせい。
とっとと甘いモンを調達しちまうぞ！）

engChrName: Central Station's north exit is the main entrance to the capital.
engSearchText:
Central Station's north exit is the main entrance to
the capital.
jpnChrName: この中央駅北口は、首都イーディスでも 特に交通量が多いんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
この中央駅北口は、首都イーディスでも
特に交通量が多いんだよ。

engChrName: I have to keep a close eye on it and make sure no incidents occur.
engSearchText:
I have to keep a close eye on it and make sure no
incidents occur.
jpnChrName: 事件や事故、犯罪なんかが起きないよう 今日もしっかり見張らねばね。
jpnSearchText:
事件や事故、犯罪なんかが起きないよう
今日もしっかり見張らねばね。

engChrName: Let me know if you see anything suspicious, all right?
engSearchText: Let me know if you see anything suspicious, all right?
jpnChrName: 君たちも不審なものを見かけたら ぜひ知らせてくれたまえ。
jpnSearchText:
君たちも不審なものを見かけたら
ぜひ知らせてくれたまえ。

engChrName: (Well, that's the police force for ya. Always keepin' an eye out.)
engSearchText:
(Well, that's the police force for ya. Always keepin' an
eye out.)
jpnChrName: （クク、流石は首都警察……   頼もしい限りだねぇ。）
jpnSearchText:
（クク、流石は首都警察……
頼もしい限りだねぇ。）

engChrName: (He says that, but you look at him and he feels more like the criminal in this situation...)
engSearchText:
(He says that, but you look at him and he feels more
like the criminal in this situation...)
jpnChrName: （心なしかヴァンさんが   悪い人の顔になってるような……）
jpnSearchText:
（心なしかヴァンさんが
悪い人の顔になってるような……）

engChrName: If I can get in contact with work, I should be able to claim worker's compensation...
engSearchText:
If I can get in contact with work, I should be able to
claim worker's compensation...
jpnChrName: どうにか会社に連絡が取れれば 労災が──
jpnSearchText:
どうにか会社に連絡が取れれば
労災が──

engChrName: Argh! Why am I still thinking of work at a time like this?!
engSearchText:
Argh! Why am I still thinking of work at a time
like this?!
jpnChrName: ってそうじゃなくて！！ なんで私ってばこんな時まで仕事脳なのよっ！！
jpnSearchText:
ってそうじゃなくて！！
なんで私ってばこんな時まで仕事脳なのよっ！！

engChrName: Focus, damn it! Just need to figure out how to get through this...
engSearchText:
Focus, damn it! Just need to figure out how to get
through this...
jpnChrName: 今はどう切り抜ければいいか考えないと…… は～も～頭の中がぐちゃぐちゃよっ！！
jpnSearchText:
今はどう切り抜ければいいか考えないと……
は～も～頭の中がぐちゃぐちゃよっ！！

engChrName: Wh-What's going on?! I-Is this another terrorist attack? A natural disaster?!
engSearchText:
Wh-What's going on?! I-Is this another
terrorist attack? A natural disaster?!
jpnChrName: テ、テロなの！？　それとも天変地異！？
jpnSearchText: テ、テロなの！？　それとも天変地異！？

engChrName: Where did they even come from?! People got attacked by those monsters...
engSearchText:
Where did they even come from?! People got
attacked by those monsters...
jpnChrName: あの化け物たちが急に現れて…… ……襲われた人もいるし……
jpnSearchText:
あの化け物たちが急に現れて……
……襲われた人もいるし……

engChrName: *sniffle* M-Maybe I'm just burnt out. I worked so hard I-I'm just hallucinating monsters now...
engSearchText:
*sniffle* M-Maybe I'm just burnt out. I worked so
hard I-I'm just hallucinating monsters now...
jpnChrName: グスッ、私ってば仕事のし過ぎで おかしなものが見えちゃってるの──！？
jpnSearchText:
グスッ、私ってば仕事のし過ぎで
おかしなものが見えちゃってるの──！？

engChrName: Would people make fun of me if I show up to the Revolution Festival wearing a suit?
engSearchText:
Would people make fun of me if I show up to the
Revolution Festival wearing a suit?
jpnChrName: ふふ……記念祭なのにスーツな私を見て 仕事人間だと笑うかしら？
jpnSearchText:
ふふ……記念祭なのにスーツな私を見て
仕事人間だと笑うかしら？

engChrName: Well, too bad for them! I'll be out here both enjoying the festival AND making the big bucks!
engSearchText:
Well, too bad for them! I'll be out here both enjoying
the festival AND making the big bucks!
jpnChrName: くくく、営業のプロを舐めちゃいけないわね～！ 記念祭も楽しみつつ営業を仕掛けてるんだから！
jpnSearchText:
くくく、営業のプロを舐めちゃいけないわね～！
記念祭も楽しみつつ営業を仕掛けてるんだから！

engChrName: I can even promote our food equipment to all the food stalls around today!
engSearchText:
I can even promote our food equipment to all the
food stalls around today!
jpnChrName: ウチは業務用調理器なんかも扱ってるから 屋台にも売り込めるのよ！！
jpnSearchText:
ウチは業務用調理器なんかも扱ってるから
屋台にも売り込めるのよ！！

engChrName: AND I get to write off all the food I have as a business expense! Oooh, this is gonna be good!
engSearchText:
AND I get to write off all the food I have as a
business expense! Oooh, this is gonna be good!
jpnChrName: ついでに買い食いするのも必要経費…… そう、全ては計算通りねっ！！
jpnSearchText:
ついでに買い食いするのも必要経費……
そう、全ては計算通りねっ！！

engChrName: *glug* *glug* *glug* Ahh!
engSearchText: *glug* *glug* *glug* Ahh!
jpnChrName: ぐびぐびぐび……ぷは～っ！！
jpnSearchText: ぐびぐびぐび……ぷは～っ！！

engChrName: *hic* Good job, me! You totally smashed today's quota!
engSearchText:
*hic* Good job, me! You totally smashed
today's quota!
jpnChrName: ヒック！　やり切ってやったわよ、 今日のノルマも！！
jpnSearchText:
ヒック！　やり切ってやったわよ、
今日のノルマも！！

engChrName: My boss has been real happy at how awesome my sales figures have been lately!
engSearchText:
My boss has been real happy at how awesome my
sales figures have been lately!
jpnChrName: 営業成績もジュンチョーに伸びてるし 上司にも珍しく褒められるし──
jpnSearchText:
営業成績もジュンチョーに伸びてるし
上司にも珍しく褒められるし──

engChrName: At this rate, I'm gonna get that end-of-year vacation, guaranteed!
engSearchText:
At this rate, I'm gonna get that end-of-year
vacation, guaranteed!
jpnChrName: サイッコーでしょ！！ 年末の旅行も絶対実現させるわよっ！！
jpnSearchText:
サイッコーでしょ！！
年末の旅行も絶対実現させるわよっ！！

engChrName: I have two appointments today! Agh, I need to get going!
engSearchText:
I have two appointments today! Agh, I need to
get going!
jpnChrName: ……シャア！　今日中にアポ５件！！ 回るわよォォ！！
jpnSearchText:
……シャア！　今日中にアポ５件！！
回るわよォォ！！

engChrName: I still haven't reached my sales quotas for the year and the festival is soon. Just a li'l more, and then it's bonuses and paid vacations for me!
engSearchText:
I still haven't reached my sales quotas for the year and
the festival is soon. Just a li'l more, and then it's
bonuses and paid vacations for me!
jpnChrName: 記念祭までに……年内の営業目標達成…… そしてボーナスフィーバーと有給休暇……！
jpnSearchText:
記念祭までに……年内の営業目標達成……
そしてボーナスフィーバーと有給休暇……！

engChrName: All right, let's make this happen! All the blood, sweat, and tears will be worth it just to spend the end of the year on a well-deserved vacation!
engSearchText:
All right, let's make this happen! All the blood, sweat,
and tears will be worth it just to spend the end of the
year on a well-deserved vacation!
jpnChrName: フヒヒ……やってやろうじゃない！ 年末を旅先でのんびり過ごすために！！
jpnSearchText:
フヒヒ……やってやろうじゃない！
年末を旅先でのんびり過ごすために！！

engChrName: Aww, I'm not gonna get to take a vacation at this rate.
engSearchText:
Aww, I'm not gonna get to take a vacation at
this rate.

jpnSearchText:
ちょ、どういう事なの！？
これじゃどこにも旅行できないじゃない！！

engChrName: I've got so many pending questions from all my clients. Been getting bombarded with 'em lately...
engSearchText:
I've got so many pending questions from all
my clients. Been getting bombarded with 'em lately...
jpnChrName: 取引先からは問い合わせが殺到して 遊ぶ暇もないし……
jpnSearchText:
取引先からは問い合わせが殺到して
遊ぶ暇もないし……

engChrName: Ugh, this isn't good!
engSearchText: Ugh, this isn't good!
jpnChrName: くうっ、やってらんないわよっ！！
jpnSearchText: くうっ、やってらんないわよっ！！

engChrName: I got all mixed up in that incident in Basel during my last trip.
engSearchText:
I got all mixed up in that incident in Basel during my
last trip.
jpnChrName: この前のバーゼル出張は事件に 巻き込まれるハプニングもあったけど……
jpnSearchText:
この前のバーゼル出張は事件に
巻き込まれるハプニングもあったけど……

engChrName: The innkeepers were really nice to me, thankfully. Despite everything, I learned a lot from the experience.
engSearchText:
The innkeepers were really nice to me, thankfully.
Despite everything, I learned a lot from
the experience.
jpnChrName: 宿の人にも良くしてもらったし、 中々刺激的な旅だったとも言えるわ。
jpnSearchText:
宿の人にも良くしてもらったし、
中々刺激的な旅だったとも言えるわ。

engChrName: Oh, I love traveling so much! Maybe I should go on a bus trip next.
engSearchText:
Oh, I love traveling so much! Maybe I should go on a
bus trip next.
jpnChrName: ふふ～、やっぱり旅行はいいわねぇ♪ 今度はバス旅とかもいいかもしれないわ～！
jpnSearchText:
ふふ～、やっぱり旅行はいいわねぇ♪
今度はバス旅とかもいいかもしれないわ～！

engChrName: ...If I can get the time off, that is!
engSearchText: ...If I can get the time off, that is!
jpnChrName: ……休みが取れればね！！
jpnSearchText: ……休みが取れればね！！

engChrName: I don't think I'm gonna get another business trip like that one anytime soon, so I gotta plan one out for my next vacation.
engSearchText:
I don't think I'm gonna get another business trip like
that one anytime soon, so I gotta plan one out for my
next vacation.
jpnChrName: そう都合よく次の出張もなさそうだし ……そう、次はのんびりバス旅とか……
jpnSearchText:
そう都合よく次の出張もなさそうだし
……そう、次はのんびりバス旅とか……

engChrName: ...If I can get the time off, that is!
engSearchText: ...If I can get the time off, that is!
jpnChrName: ……休みが取れればね！！
jpnSearchText: ……休みが取れればね！！

engChrName: I'm getting everything I need for my next work trip.
engSearchText: I'm getting everything I need for my next work trip.
jpnChrName: 今度の出張のために グッズを買い込んでいるの♪
jpnSearchText:
今度の出張のために
グッズを買い込んでいるの♪

engChrName: I need to make sure I got everything so I'm not stressing out when I'm there! Let's see... A cushion, some travel size toiletries...
engSearchText:
I need to make sure I got everything so I'm not
stressing out when I'm there! Let's see... A cushion,
some travel size toiletries...
jpnChrName: 移動中も快適に過ごしたいわよね～！ クッションに携帯タイプの化粧品に……
jpnSearchText:
移動中も快適に過ごしたいわよね～！
クッションに携帯タイプの化粧品に……

engChrName: How about a book? Oooh, I could take something I don't usually read! It'll just add to the whole new experience!
engSearchText:
How about a book? Oooh, I could take something I
don't usually read! It'll just add to the whole
new experience!
jpnChrName: 本を持っていくのもいいかもね～。 普段読まないジャンルで探してみようかしら♪
jpnSearchText:
本を持っていくのもいいかもね～。
普段読まないジャンルで探してみようかしら♪

engChrName: Yes! They're letting me come along to the next business trip!
engSearchText:
Yes! They're letting me come along to the next
business trip!
jpnChrName: や、やったわ！！　次の出張、 なんと行かせてもらえる事になったの！！
jpnSearchText:
や、やったわ！！　次の出張、
なんと行かせてもらえる事になったの！！

engChrName: Not a lot of people wanted to go 'cause it has to do with our orbal products, and people think those are a real hassle.
engSearchText:
Not a lot of people wanted to go 'cause it has to do
with our orbal products, and people think those are a
real hassle.
jpnChrName: ウチで扱ってる導力製品の製造関係…… 面倒だからみんな避けてるみたいで。
jpnSearchText:
ウチで扱ってる導力製品の製造関係……
面倒だからみんな避けてるみたいで。

engChrName: But who cares! I'll get to go on a trip, all expenses paid for by my company!
engSearchText:
But who cares! I'll get to go on a trip, all expenses
paid for by my company!
jpnChrName: でも正直、社費で旅行できるなんて オイシイじゃない！？
jpnSearchText:
でも正直、社費で旅行できるなんて
オイシイじゃない！？

engChrName: Who's bothered by a little hassle just to go on a paid trip like that? Not me!
engSearchText:
Who's bothered by a little hassle just to go on a paid
trip like that? Not me!
jpnChrName: 私は行くわよっ！！ 多少の面倒なんて蹴散らしてやるんだから！！
jpnSearchText:
私は行くわよっ！！
多少の面倒なんて蹴散らしてやるんだから！！

engChrName: Now that that's settled, it's time to start meeting some quotas!
engSearchText:
Now that that's settled, it's time to start meeting
some quotas!

jpnSearchText:
さーて、そうと決まったら
営業ノルマをとっとと片付けますか！

engChrName: I gotta leave work early today to start preparing for my work trip.
engSearchText:
I gotta leave work early today to start preparing for
my work trip.
jpnChrName: 今日は早上がりして 念入りに出張の準備をしたいし！
jpnSearchText:
今日は早上がりして
念入りに出張の準備をしたいし！

engChrName: If I want to take paid leave, I'm probably gonna have to finish up everything before I leave. Hmm... I might need to do some overtime.
engSearchText:
If I want to take paid leave, I'm probably gonna have
to finish up everything before I leave. Hmm... I might
need to do some overtime.
jpnChrName: 有休を取るには仕事を片付けないと…… 今日はもう少し残業して……
jpnSearchText:
有休を取るには仕事を片付けないと……
今日はもう少し残業して……

engChrName: Wait, wouldn't it be redundant if I just overwork myself so I can relax?
engSearchText:
Wait, wouldn't it be redundant if I just overwork
myself so I can relax?
jpnChrName: ……って私、リフレッシュするために 頑張りまくってるような……？
jpnSearchText:
……って私、リフレッシュするために
頑張りまくってるような……？

engChrName: Hmm... Maybe I'm just overthinking it.
engSearchText: Hmm... Maybe I'm just overthinking it.
jpnChrName: う～ん、気のせいかしら……？
jpnSearchText: う～ん、気のせいかしら……？

engChrName: Today's been another day of door to door sales...
engSearchText: Today's been another day of door to door sales...
jpnChrName: ……今日も今日とて営業に行くんだけど……
jpnSearchText: ……今日も今日とて営業に行くんだけど……

engChrName: But ugh... I can't stop thinking about that work trip to Langport. It was so much fun!
engSearchText:
But ugh... I can't stop thinking about that work trip
to Langport. It was so much fun!
jpnChrName: くっ……この前のラングポート出張、 やっぱり良かったわ……
jpnSearchText:
くっ……この前のラングポート出張、
やっぱり良かったわ……

engChrName: Traveling is so much fun. Aaah, I want to go on another trip now!
engSearchText:
Traveling is so much fun. Aaah, I want to go on
another trip now!
jpnChrName: 旅行っていいわよね…… ……うーん、また行きたくなってきたわ……
jpnSearchText:
旅行っていいわよね……
……うーん、また行きたくなってきたわ……

engChrName: Maybe I should start planning one soon. I guess I'm gonna need to take some of my paid vacations for it... Hmm...
engSearchText:
Maybe I should start planning one soon. I guess I'm
gonna need to take some of my paid vacations
for it... Hmm...
jpnChrName: 何かいい方法は……その前に有休取らないと…… …………ぶつぶつ…………
jpnSearchText:
何かいい方法は……その前に有休取らないと……
…………ぶつぶつ…………

engChrName: Goddess damn it. I mean, yeah, I'm happy that the company's gonna get a new client and everything.
engSearchText:
Goddess damn it. I mean, yeah, I'm happy that the
company's gonna get a new client and everything.
jpnChrName: ぬおおおっ！！　また大口から 契約取れそうなのはいいけど……
jpnSearchText:
ぬおおおっ！！　また大口から
契約取れそうなのはいいけど……

engChrName: But why am I being forced to go with the president on this business trip?!
engSearchText:
But why am I being forced to go with the president
on this business trip?!
jpnChrName: そこの社長の出張に何故か 私まで付き合うことになったのよ……！！
jpnSearchText:
そこの社長の出張に何故か
私まで付き合うことになったのよ……！！

engChrName: Unbelievable! Why me, of all people?! This is so lame...
engSearchText:
Unbelievable! Why me, of all people?! This is
so lame...
jpnChrName: あ、ありえないでしょ……！ どーしてこんな事になったのよ、もう！！
jpnSearchText:
あ、ありえないでしょ……！
どーしてこんな事になったのよ、もう！！

engChrName: For Goddess' sake, I'm in the sales department! SALES! What do they need me to go on an inspection for?!
engSearchText:
For Goddess' sake, I'm in the sales department!
SALES! What do they need me to go on an
inspection for?!
jpnChrName: 私は営業よ！？　営業！！ なんで現地視察に付き合わなきゃいけないのよっ！
jpnSearchText:
私は営業よ！？　営業！！
なんで現地視察に付き合わなきゃいけないのよっ！

engChrName: Well, they are one of our factories so it's not like there's NOTHING to do with sales, but I don't see the point of ME going.
engSearchText:
Well, they are one of our factories so it's not like
there's NOTHING to do with sales, but I don't see
the point of ME going.
jpnChrName: まあ納品先の工場があるらしいし 無関係でもないけど……面倒すぎでしょ！！
jpnSearchText:
まあ納品先の工場があるらしいし
無関係でもないけど……面倒すぎでしょ！！

engChrName: Ugh... Work trips are such a pain. I'm drinking myself silly tonight.
engSearchText:
Ugh... Work trips are such a pain. I'm drinking
myself silly tonight.
jpnChrName: はぁ～～出張とかツライ…… もう今夜は飲みに行くしかないわね……
jpnSearchText:
はぁ～～出張とかツライ……
もう今夜は飲みに行くしかないわね……

engChrName: Heh, today was really productive!
engSearchText: Heh, today was really productive!
jpnChrName: はっはっは、今日は いい取引ができて良かったよ。
jpnSearchText:
はっはっは、今日は
いい取引ができて良かったよ。

engChrName: What do you say we go out for drinks? Actually, don't even bother answering. We HAVE to celebrate closing out this contract!
engSearchText:
What do you say we go out for drinks? Actually, don't
even bother answering. We HAVE to celebrate
closing out this contract!
jpnChrName: そうそう、この後飲みに行く？ っていうか行くよね、僕らの成約祝いだし！
jpnSearchText:
そうそう、この後飲みに行く？
っていうか行くよね、僕らの成約祝いだし！

engChrName: Umm, sure... (I'd rather not go out for drinks with a creepy old man! Maybe I can leave early?)
engSearchText:
Umm, sure...
(I'd rather not go out for drinks with a creepy
old man! Maybe I can leave early?)
jpnChrName: え、ええモチロン…… （って何言いだすのよセクハラオヤジッ！）
jpnSearchText:
え、ええモチロン……
（って何言いだすのよセクハラオヤジッ！）

engChrName: B-But we should take it easy, yeah? I heard from your wife that you get really rowdy after a few drinks.
engSearchText:
B-But we should take it easy, yeah? I heard from your
wife that you get really rowdy after a few drinks.
jpnChrName: ですが今日はどうかほどほどで── ホラ、部長も奥様がうるさいと仰っていましたし。
jpnSearchText:
ですが今日はどうかほどほどで──
ホラ、部長も奥様がうるさいと仰っていましたし。

engChrName: Right, right. Guess bar hopping will have to be limited to only two bars tonight!
engSearchText:
Right, right. Guess bar hopping will have to be
limited to only two bars tonight!
jpnChrName: おっとそうだった、仕方ないな…… 今日は二軒目までくらいで我慢するか～。
jpnSearchText:
おっとそうだった、仕方ないな……
今日は二軒目までくらいで我慢するか～。

engChrName: (No! That does NOT make this better! Why do I even have to go out for drinks with you?! That was NOT in my contract!)
engSearchText:
(No! That does NOT make this better! Why do I
even have to go out for drinks with you?! That was
NOT in my contract!)
jpnChrName: （ぐぬぬ……仕事柄とはいえなんで   アフターまで付き合わなきゃいけないのよっ！）
jpnSearchText:
（ぐぬぬ……仕事柄とはいえなんで
アフターまで付き合わなきゃいけないのよっ！）

engChrName: (We haven't even left and I'm already tired of this! Working in sales is the WORST!)
engSearchText:
(We haven't even left and I'm already tired of this!
Working in sales is the WORST!)
jpnChrName: （はぁ～～マジ疲れる～～……   営業職ツラすぎるぅ～～～！！）
jpnSearchText:
（はぁ～～マジ疲れる～～……
営業職ツラすぎるぅ～～～！！）

engChrName: Hmm... My client's boss is late... He better not have stood me up.
engSearchText:
Hmm... My client's boss is late... He better not have
stood me up.
jpnChrName: う～ん、取引先の部長、遅いわね…… まさかすっぽかされたんじゃ……
jpnSearchText:
う～ん、取引先の部長、遅いわね……
まさかすっぽかされたんじゃ……

engChrName: Ugh. I swear, if he's being this negligent just because I'm a woman, he's in for a rude awakening!
engSearchText:
Ugh. I swear, if he's being this negligent just because
I'm a woman, he's in for a rude awakening!
jpnChrName: くっ、オンナだからって舐めんじゃないわよっ！ ようやく契約にこぎつけられそうなんだから！！
jpnSearchText:
くっ、オンナだからって舐めんじゃないわよっ！
ようやく契約にこぎつけられそうなんだから！！

engChrName: You did NOT make me put up with all that just to run away from me last minute, you stupid perv!
engSearchText:
You did NOT make me put up with all that just to
run away from me last minute, you stupid perv!
jpnChrName: 逃がすまじ大口顧客！！ あとセクハラ退散～っ！！
jpnSearchText:
逃がすまじ大口顧客！！
あとセクハラ退散～っ！！

engChrName: I sell orbal devices for commercial use. I might be closing out a big deal today.
engSearchText:
I sell orbal devices for commercial use. I might be
closing out a big deal today.
jpnChrName: 私は業務用の導力機器を販売しててね。 今日はようやく契約にこぎつけられそうなの。
jpnSearchText:
私は業務用の導力機器を販売しててね。
今日はようやく契約にこぎつけられそうなの。

engChrName: This is one of my biggest clients. I am NOT passing up this opportunity!
engSearchText:
This is one of my biggest clients. I am NOT passing
up this opportunity!
jpnChrName: 私の営業先の中でも大口だし…… 絶対に逃がさないわよ～っ！！
jpnSearchText:
私の営業先の中でも大口だし……
絶対に逃がさないわよ～っ！！

engChrName: Ahh, I'm so tired... Work's been ruthless lately...
engSearchText: Ahh, I'm so tired... Work's been ruthless lately...
jpnChrName: は～～……疲れた～～……… 今日も今日とて、仕事でクタクタよ……
jpnSearchText:
は～～……疲れた～～………
今日も今日とて、仕事でクタクタよ……

engChrName: Think I'm just gonna pick up a prepared meal from the department store and get today over with.
engSearchText:
Think I'm just gonna pick up a prepared meal from
the department store and get today over with.
jpnChrName: 夜は百貨店で総菜でも買って 手早く済ませようかしらね……
jpnSearchText:
夜は百貨店で総菜でも買って
手早く済ませようかしらね……

engChrName: Myna has helped calm my nerves.
engSearchText: Myna has helped calm my nerves.
jpnChrName: マイナのお陰で、少し落ち着けたわ。
jpnSearchText: マイナのお陰で、少し落ち着けたわ。

engChrName: I have to be brave! For us both!
engSearchText: I have to be brave! For us both!
jpnChrName: そうよね、私も気をしっかり持たないと── この子を守るためにも！
jpnSearchText:
そうよね、私も気をしっかり持たないと──
この子を守るためにも！

engChrName: Wh-What's going on?!
engSearchText: Wh-What's going on?!
jpnChrName: い、一体なにが起きているの……！？
jpnSearchText: い、一体なにが起きているの……！？

engChrName: Not even the bracers know what's happening...
engSearchText: Not even the bracers know what's happening...
jpnChrName: 遊撃士の人も、今は何も分からないって……
jpnSearchText: 遊撃士の人も、今は何も分からないって……

engChrName: Oh, Goddess! Please keep Myna safe!
engSearchText: Oh, Goddess! Please keep Myna safe!
jpnChrName: ああ女神様、どうか マイナだけでもお守りください──！
jpnSearchText:
ああ女神様、どうか
マイナだけでもお守りください──！

engChrName: Oh, Myna. You're gonna make Mommy cry...
engSearchText: Oh, Myna. You're gonna make Mommy cry...
jpnChrName: マイナったら…… お母さん、思わずぐっと来ちゃったわ♪
jpnSearchText:
マイナったら……
お母さん、思わずぐっと来ちゃったわ♪

engChrName: I'm happy as long as we get to spend some time together.
engSearchText:
I'm happy as long as we get to spend some
time together.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、一緒に楽しめるだけで 私も十分だし……
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、一緒に楽しめるだけで
私も十分だし……

engChrName: Why don't we take a nice, long walk? Grab my hand, let's go. No rush.
engSearchText:
Why don't we take a nice, long walk? Grab my hand,
let's go. No rush.
jpnChrName: お手手つないで、二人で のんびりお散歩しながら回りましょうか♪
jpnSearchText:
お手手つないで、二人で
のんびりお散歩しながら回りましょうか♪

engChrName: *sigh* Errands took so long today it's already late.
engSearchText: *sigh* Errands took so long today it's already late.
jpnChrName: ふう、用事を片付けてたら こんな時間になっちゃったけど……
jpnSearchText:
ふう、用事を片付けてたら
こんな時間になっちゃったけど……

engChrName: But Myna's much stronger now, and she hasn't been complaining as much!
engSearchText:
But Myna's much stronger now, and she hasn't been
complaining as much!
jpnChrName: マイナもいつの間にか体力がついて、 ぐずらなくなってきたわねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
マイナもいつの間にか体力がついて、
ぐずらなくなってきたわねぇ。

engChrName: Haha, dunno where she gets all that energy from. Even I'M tired! She's growing up so nicely. ♪
engSearchText:
Haha, dunno where she gets all that energy from.
Even I'M tired! She's growing up so nicely. ♪
jpnChrName: 私でもちょっと疲れちゃったのに…… ふふっ、この子も成長してるのね♪
jpnSearchText:
私でもちょっと疲れちゃったのに……
ふふっ、この子も成長してるのね♪

engChrName: Myna's been a lot more cooperative, ever since I started talking to her more attentively.
engSearchText:
Myna's been a lot more cooperative, ever since I
started talking to her more attentively.
jpnChrName: マイナとちゃんとお話しするようにしたら 癇癪も減って、随分楽になったの。
jpnSearchText:
マイナとちゃんとお話しするようにしたら
癇癪も減って、随分楽になったの。

engChrName: Shopping's probably going to take us a bit, but that's fine. I'd rather we take our time.
engSearchText:
Shopping's probably going to take us a bit, but
that's fine. I'd rather we take our time.
jpnChrName: 今日のお買い物は遅れそうだけど…… まあ焦らずゆっくり行きましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
今日のお買い物は遅れそうだけど……
まあ焦らずゆっくり行きましょうか。

engChrName: A leisure walk doesn't sound too bad right now. I'm grateful to just have the chance to do so.
engSearchText:
A leisure walk doesn't sound too bad right now.
I'm grateful to just have the chance to do so.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、楽しい道草になりそうだし むしろ感謝したいわね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、楽しい道草になりそうだし
むしろ感謝したいわね。

engChrName: Of course I'm worried about the emergency state, but I still need to go to the store.
engSearchText:
Of course I'm worried about the emergency state, but
I still need to go to the store.
jpnChrName: 非常事態宣言だなんて、不安は不安だけど…… 全くお買い物しないわけにもいかないし。
jpnSearchText:
非常事態宣言だなんて、不安は不安だけど……
全くお買い物しないわけにもいかないし。

engChrName: There are bracers outside the station, so I hope it'll be safe...
engSearchText:
There are bracers outside the station, so I hope it'll
be safe...
jpnChrName: 駅前は警察も遊撃士の人もいるから まだ安全だと思いたいわよね……
jpnSearchText:
駅前は警察も遊撃士の人もいるから
まだ安全だと思いたいわよね……

engChrName: Myna recently started paying attention to me, as long as I hear her out first.
engSearchText:
Myna recently started paying attention to me, as long
as I hear her out first.
jpnChrName: ……マイナも最近、ちゃんとお話きいてあげたら 私の言う事も聞いてくれるようになったの。
jpnSearchText:
……マイナも最近、ちゃんとお話きいてあげたら
私の言う事も聞いてくれるようになったの。

engChrName: She still throws a tantrum every now and then, but I feel like we can start going out without issue.
engSearchText:
She still throws a tantrum every now and then, but I
feel like we can start going out without issue.
jpnChrName: たまに癇癪を起こす事もあるけど…… これくらいなら一緒にお出かけできる気がするわ。
jpnSearchText:
たまに癇癪を起こす事もあるけど……
これくらいなら一緒にお出かけできる気がするわ。

engChrName: (I should try talking to her more now that she's behaving.)
engSearchText:
(I should try talking to her more now that
she's behaving.)
jpnChrName: （もう少し素直なマイナと   お話してみようかしら……）
jpnSearchText:
（もう少し素直なマイナと
お話してみようかしら……）

engChrName: (Maybe I should forget about groceries for today. Our pantry isn't totally empty.)
engSearchText:
(Maybe I should forget about groceries for today.
Our pantry isn't totally empty.)
jpnChrName: （お買い物は……今日はいいかもしれないわね。   食材だって全く無いわけじゃないんだし。）
jpnSearchText:
（お買い物は……今日はいいかもしれないわね。
食材だって全く無いわけじゃないんだし。）

engChrName: Ugh, I'm so tired. The store's packed and Myna's not listening to me.
engSearchText:
Ugh, I'm so tired. The store's packed and Myna's not
listening to me.
jpnChrName: ううっ、疲れた……お店は混んでるし マイナも全然言うことを聞いてくれないし……
jpnSearchText:
ううっ、疲れた……お店は混んでるし
マイナも全然言うことを聞いてくれないし……

engChrName: It's like I've been going in circles all day today. No one mentioned being a stay-at-home mom would be this hard...
engSearchText:
It's like I've been going in circles all day today.
No one mentioned being a stay-at-home mom would
be this hard...
jpnChrName: 朝から晩までこんなのの繰り返し…… どうして主婦ってこんなに辛いのかしら……
jpnSearchText:
朝から晩までこんなのの繰り返し……
どうして主婦ってこんなに辛いのかしら……

engChrName: I've asked all my mom friends for tips with handling Myna's attitude.
engSearchText:
I've asked all my mom friends for tips with handling
Myna's attitude.
jpnChrName: マイナの我儘が激しすぎて ママ友たちにも相談してるのだけど……
jpnSearchText:
マイナの我儘が激しすぎて
ママ友たちにも相談してるのだけど……

engChrName: Absolutely none of them worked. *sigh*
engSearchText: Absolutely none of them worked. *sigh*
jpnChrName: 教えてもらった方法を試しても 全然うまく行かないのよね、はぁ……
jpnSearchText:
教えてもらった方法を試しても
全然うまく行かないのよね、はぁ……

engChrName: Why won't Myna listen to me?
engSearchText: Why won't Myna listen to me?
jpnChrName: どうしてウチのマイナは こんなに言う事聞いてくれないのかしら……
jpnSearchText:
どうしてウチのマイナは
こんなに言う事聞いてくれないのかしら……

engChrName: Oh, it's late already.
engSearchText: Oh, it's late already.
jpnChrName: もうこんな時間……今日も なんだかんだ遅くなっちゃったわねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
もうこんな時間……今日も
なんだかんだ遅くなっちゃったわねぇ。

engChrName: Myna, stop wandering around! Wait for the bus like a big girl!
engSearchText:
Myna, stop wandering around! Wait for the bus like a
big girl!
jpnChrName: ……マイナ、ウロウロしないの！ 大人しくバスを待って！
jpnSearchText:
……マイナ、ウロウロしないの！
大人しくバスを待って！

engChrName: NO!
engSearchText: NO!
jpnChrName: ヤダーッ！！
jpnSearchText: <S5>ヤダーッ！！

engChrName: I don't wanna!
engSearchText: I don't wanna!
jpnChrName: ヤダヤダヤダヤダヤダーッ！！
jpnSearchText: <S5>ヤダヤダヤダヤダヤダーッ！！

engChrName: M-Myna! Don't yell, please! (Maybe I should just call a taxi...)
engSearchText:
M-Myna! Don't yell, please!
(Maybe I should just call a taxi...)
jpnChrName: マ、マイナッ！　大声出すのはやめなさい！ （……もうタクシーを呼ぼうかしら……）
jpnSearchText:
マ、マイナッ！　大声出すのはやめなさい！
（……もうタクシーを呼ぼうかしら……）

engChrName: Those kinds of people are a little scary.
engSearchText: Those kinds of people are a little scary.
jpnChrName: うーん、ああいう人はやっぱり ちょっと怖いわね……
jpnSearchText:
うーん、ああいう人はやっぱり
ちょっと怖いわね……

engChrName: I don't like thinking about my daughter growing up with terrorists and anti-immigration extremists around.
engSearchText:
I don't like thinking about my daughter growing up
with terrorists and anti-immigration
extremists around.
jpnChrName: 反移民活動といえば前にテロもあったし…… 子供がいる身としては不安だわ……
jpnSearchText:
反移民活動といえば前にテロもあったし……
子供がいる身としては不安だわ……

engChrName: Have to stop by the bank today as well.
engSearchText: Have to stop by the bank today as well.
jpnChrName: 今日は銀行にも寄らないといけないのよね……
jpnSearchText: 今日は銀行にも寄らないといけないのよね……

engChrName: Come on, Myna. Time to go shopping with Mommy! We've got other things to do, so let's be quick!
engSearchText:
Come on, Myna. Time to go shopping with Mommy!
We've got other things to do, so let's be quick!
jpnChrName: ほらマイナ、早くお買い物に行くわよ！ 時間が無いんだから急いで！
jpnSearchText:
ほらマイナ、早くお買い物に行くわよ！
時間が無いんだから急いで！

engChrName: No! I don't wanna go!
engSearchText: No! I don't wanna go!
jpnChrName: ヤダッ！
jpnSearchText: ヤダッ！

engChrName: (*sigh* What am I supposed to do? She never listens to me...)
engSearchText:
(*sigh* What am I supposed to do? She never listens
to me...)
jpnChrName: （ふぅ、困ったわね……   いつもこうなんだから……）
jpnSearchText:
（ふぅ、困ったわね……
いつもこうなんだから……）

engChrName: Shopping was all we could get done today, since Myna's been throwing so many tantrums.
engSearchText:
Shopping was all we could get done today, since
Myna's been throwing so many tantrums.
jpnChrName: マイナが駄々こねるから 買い物だけで日が暮れちゃったじゃない……
jpnSearchText:
マイナが駄々こねるから
買い物だけで日が暮れちゃったじゃない……

engChrName: Sweetie! If we hurry, we can get home and start dinner before Daddy gets ho—
engSearchText:
Sweetie! If we hurry, we can get home and start
dinner before Daddy gets ho—
jpnChrName: ほら急いでお家に帰るわよ！ パパが帰ってくる前にお料理を──
jpnSearchText:
ほら急いでお家に帰るわよ！
パパが帰ってくる前にお料理を──

engChrName: NO! I'm not going!
engSearchText: NO! I'm not going!
jpnChrName: ヤダッ！
jpnSearchText: ヤダッ！

engChrName: Don't start this again! I told you, Myna, that's enough!
engSearchText:
Don't start this again! I told you, Myna,
that's enough!
jpnChrName: また……！？　もうマイナったら いい加減にしてったら～！
jpnSearchText:
また……！？　もうマイナったら
いい加減にしてったら～！

engChrName: Hey, Mommy?
engSearchText: Hey, Mommy?
jpnChrName: ねえママ～、マイナね……
jpnSearchText: ねえママ～、マイナね……

engChrName: One of Daddy's friends will be over tonight, so I need to tidy up the house and cook dinner for them.
engSearchText:
One of Daddy's friends will be over tonight, so I need
to tidy up the house and cook dinner for them.
jpnChrName: 今日はパパのお友達が遊びに来るから お料理に片付けに……
jpnSearchText:
今日はパパのお友達が遊びに来るから
お料理に片付けに……

engChrName: Promise you'll behave today? If you're a good girl, I'll get you some pudding!
engSearchText:
Promise you'll behave today? If you're a good girl, I'll
get you some pudding!
jpnChrName: マイナ、今日は駄々こねないでね。 あとでプリン買ってあげるから！
jpnSearchText:
マイナ、今日は駄々こねないでね。
あとでプリン買ってあげるから！

engChrName: I don't wanna go shopping! I wanna play and draw instead!
engSearchText:
I don't wanna go shopping! I wanna play and
draw instead!
jpnChrName: ヤダーッ！　おかいものいかない！！ マイナおえかきしてあそぶのーっ！！
jpnSearchText:
ヤダーッ！　おかいものいかない！！
マイナおえかきしてあそぶのーっ！！

engChrName: (Ugh. She's throwing another tantrum.)
engSearchText: (Ugh. She's throwing another tantrum.)
jpnChrName: （うぅ……またマイナの癇癪が始まったわ……）
jpnSearchText: （うぅ……またマイナの癇癪が始まったわ……）

engChrName: I just... I can't right now. I admit defeat. Do whatever you want, Myna.
engSearchText:
I just... I can't right now. I admit defeat. Do whatever
you want, Myna.
jpnChrName: ……わかったわかった、ママの負け…… 好きにしていいわよ、マイナ……
jpnSearchText:
……わかったわかった、ママの負け……
好きにしていいわよ、マイナ……

engChrName: Make sure you show Mommy what you drew, okay? *sigh*
engSearchText:
Make sure you show Mommy what you drew, okay?
*sigh*
jpnChrName: あとでママにも見せてね、はあ……
jpnSearchText: あとでママにも見せてね、はあ……

engChrName: Okay!
engSearchText: Okay!
jpnChrName: ……うん、いいよ～！
jpnSearchText: ……うん、いいよ～！

engChrName: *sigh* My world always has to revolve around you— wait, really?
engSearchText:
*sigh* My world always has to revolve around you—
wait, really?
jpnChrName: はぁ、どうしていつも我儘ばかり…… ───って、いいの？
jpnSearchText:
はぁ、どうしていつも我儘ばかり……
───って、いいの？

engChrName: Yeah, I'll show Mommy my drawing! I'm gonna draw a bear!
engSearchText:
Yeah, I'll show Mommy my drawing! I'm gonna draw
a bear!
jpnChrName: うん、しょーがないからママにも見せてあげる！ あのね～マイナ、クマさんかくんだよ～？
jpnSearchText:
うん、しょーがないからママにも見せてあげる！
あのね～マイナ、クマさんかくんだよ～？

engChrName: And then a tiger and then a squirrel!
engSearchText: And then a tiger and then a squirrel!
jpnChrName: それからトリさんとね、リスさんかくの～！
jpnSearchText: それからトリさんとね、リスさんかくの～！

engChrName: (Is she actually behaving or have I just gone crazy?)
engSearchText: (Is she actually behaving or have I just gone crazy?)
jpnChrName: （あらら？　今日はなんだか素直なような……   ……気のせいかしら……？）
jpnSearchText:
（あらら？　今日はなんだか素直なような……
……気のせいかしら……？）

engChrName: There's something going on over there! Hey, Mommy, I wanna see!
engSearchText:
There's something going on over there!
Hey, Mommy, I wanna see!
jpnChrName: 何かやってる～っ！ ねえママ、見にいきた～い！！
jpnSearchText:
何かやってる～っ！
ねえママ、見にいきた～い！！

engChrName: Haha, it does look like fun. Hands up if you love singing!
engSearchText:
Haha, it does look like fun. Hands up if you
love singing!
jpnChrName: ふふっ、楽しそうねぇ。 ……お歌が大好きなひと～！！
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、楽しそうねぇ。
……お歌が大好きなひと～！！

engChrName: Meeee!
engSearchText: Meeee!
jpnChrName: はあ～い！！
jpnSearchText: はあ～い！！

engChrName: You're not gonna bother them, right?
engSearchText: You're not gonna bother them, right?
jpnChrName: それじゃあおねーさんたちの 邪魔にならないようにね？
jpnSearchText:
それじゃあおねーさんたちの
邪魔にならないようにね？

engChrName: I wooon't!
engSearchText: I wooon't!
jpnChrName: うん、わかった～っ！！
jpnSearchText: うん、わかった～っ！！

engChrName: The weather's just lovely today! Perfect day for the festival!
engSearchText:
The weather's just lovely today! Perfect day for
the festival!
jpnChrName: う～ん、いいお天気！ 絶好のお祭り日和ねぇ！
jpnSearchText:
う～ん、いいお天気！
絶好のお祭り日和ねぇ！

engChrName: Where do you want to go today, Myna?
engSearchText: Where do you want to go today, Myna?
jpnChrName: それじゃあマイナ、今日はどこに行きたい？
jpnSearchText: それじゃあマイナ、今日はどこに行きたい？

engChrName: Myna LOVES bunny rabbits! And turtles!
engSearchText: Myna LOVES bunny rabbits! And turtles!
jpnChrName: マイナね～、ウサギさん大好き～！！ あとカメさんもすきだよ～っ？
jpnSearchText:
マイナね～、ウサギさん大好き～！！
あとカメさんもすきだよ～っ？

engChrName: Huh? What are you talking about? I thought you were excited about the festival, Myna.
engSearchText:
Huh? What are you talking about? I thought you
were excited about the festival, Myna.
jpnChrName: あ、あれ～……？ マイナったら、お祭り楽しみじゃなかったの？
jpnSearchText:
あ、あれ～……？
マイナったら、お祭り楽しみじゃなかったの？

engChrName: I am! I just...
engSearchText: I am! I just...
jpnChrName: オマツリたのしみだよ～ぉ？ でも……
jpnSearchText:
オマツリたのしみだよ～ぉ？
でも……

engChrName: It doesn't matter where we go! I'll be fine as long as I get to be with Mommy!
engSearchText:
It doesn't matter where we go! I'll be fine as long as I
get to be with Mommy!
jpnChrName: ママといっしょなら、どこでもいいも～ん！！
jpnSearchText: ママといっしょなら、どこでもいいも～ん！！

engChrName: O-Oh, Myna. You're so sweet. Come on, grab my hand and let's go for a walk.
engSearchText:
O-Oh, Myna. You're so sweet. Come on, grab my
hand and let's go for a walk.
jpnChrName: まあ！　マイナったら…… ふふっ、じゃあお手手つないでお散歩しましょうか♪
jpnSearchText:
まあ！　マイナったら……
ふふっ、じゃあお手手つないでお散歩しましょうか♪

engChrName: Okay!
engSearchText: Okay!
jpnChrName: はあ～いっ！！
jpnSearchText: はあ～いっ！！

engChrName: Hopefully things have calmed down by now. I still need to contact my husband.
engSearchText:
Hopefully things have calmed down by now. I still
need to contact my husband.
jpnChrName: 外は落ち着いたのかしら…… ああ、主人にも連絡をとらないと……！
jpnSearchText:
外は落ち着いたのかしら……
ああ、主人にも連絡をとらないと……！

engChrName: Mommy! Mommy!
engSearchText: Mommy! Mommy!
jpnChrName: ママっ！　ママぁ！
jpnSearchText: ママっ！　ママぁ！

engChrName: Sorry, Myna. Mommy's a little busy right now.
engSearchText: Sorry, Myna. Mommy's a little busy right now.
jpnChrName: ごめんねマイナ、 今は構ってあげられなくて……
jpnSearchText:
ごめんねマイナ、
今は構ってあげられなくて……

engChrName: Don't worry! We'll be fine!
engSearchText: Don't worry! We'll be fine!
jpnChrName: おちついて！　だいじょ～ぶだよっ！！
jpnSearchText: おちついて！　だいじょ～ぶだよっ！！

engChrName: I'll protect you, Mommy!
engSearchText: I'll protect you, Mommy!
jpnChrName: だって、ママはマイナが守るんだもん！！
jpnSearchText: だって、ママはマイナが守るんだもん！！

engChrName: Oh, M-Myna... Haha, you're so cute.
engSearchText: Oh, M-Myna... Haha, you're so cute.
jpnChrName: マ、マイナ…… ふふっ、あなたって子はもう……
jpnSearchText:
マ、マイナ……
ふふっ、あなたって子はもう……

engChrName: ...Thank you, Myna. That helped calm me down. Mommy's gotta be brave, too!
engSearchText:
...Thank you, Myna. That helped calm me down.
Mommy's gotta be brave, too!
jpnChrName: ……ありがとう、お陰で落ち着いたわ。 ママもしっかりしないとね！
jpnSearchText:

ママもしっかりしないとね！

jpnSearchText: うん～っ！！

engSearchText: I'm glad you're feeling better, Mommy!

engSearchText: I'll keep you safe! No one's gonna get past me!

jpnSearchText:

だからゼッタイだいじょ～ぶだよっ！！

engSearchText: That was spooky...

jpnSearchText:

engSearchText: But I can't be scared! I need to protect Mommy!

jpnSearchText:

engSearchText:

jpnSearchText:

マイナ、たのしみにしてたんだよーっ！

engSearchText: Mommy gets tired quickly when she's shopping.

jpnSearchText:

engSearchText: That's why I said we should take a break! Teehee!

jpnSearchText:

engSearchText: And they're dancing and everything! That's so cool!

jpnSearchText:
おねーさんたちダンスもしてて

jpnSearchText:

engSearchText: Yup, it is! And guess what? I've got a house there!

jpnSearchText:

engSearchText:

No tantrums while with Mommy, right, Myna?

jpnSearchText:

jpnSearchText: ねえママー！　ママってばー……！

engSearchText: Ugh! Forget it! I don't need a Mommy anyway!

engSearchText:

place for you two lovebirds to profess your love!
Tall hill, great view. You'll hear the angels sing!

フフ、今日はとびきり

jpnSearchText: そうだな……

engSearchText: Gonna pass on this one. Maybe some other time.

Come on, let's have some fun!

jpnSearchText:
ＨＡＨＡＨＡ、じらしてくれるねぇ～！

jpnSearchText:
今夜はディンゴのために

engSearchText: Lotta brothers in need of a ride today, eh?

jpnSearchText:

engSearchText:
Heh. It's tough being popular. You know the feelin',

jpnSearchText:
フフ、人気者は辛いぜ。
ブラザーもそう思わねえか？

engSearchText:
Oh, baby. Not gonna lie, I'm feelin' down in

jpnSearchText:

engSearchText: They did WHAT?
jpnChrName: 一体全体、彼らが何をしたって言うんだ……？
jpnSearchText: 一体全体、彼らが何をしたって言うんだ……？

engChrName: And after I... Oh, goodness...
engSearchText: And after I... Oh, goodness...

jpnSearchText:
それにあの時俺は………
Ｈｕ、オーマイゴッドネス………

engChrName: I'll toast one up in their honor. Not much more I can do, with things as nuts as they are now.
engSearchText:
I'll toast one up in their honor. Not much more I can
do, with things as nuts as they are now.
jpnChrName: そして魂たちに盃を捧げるしかできねえとは ……クレイジーでデスペレートとはこの事だぜ……
jpnSearchText:
そして魂たちに盃を捧げるしかできねえとは

engChrName: By the by, there's checkpoints all over the city. 'S takin' me forever to get anywhere.
engSearchText:
By the by, there's checkpoints all over the city.
'S takin' me forever to get anywhere.
jpnChrName: ちなみに、あちこちで検問が敷かれていてな。 どこへ向かうにも時間がかかるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに、あちこちで検問が敷かれていてな。
どこへ向かうにも時間がかかるぜ。

engChrName: No one's allowed in or outta the capital. 'S a deadlock, through and through.
engSearchText:
No one's allowed in or outta the capital. 'S a
deadlock, through and through.

jpnSearchText:
首都への出入りも原則禁止──
問答無用のデッドロックだ。

engChrName: This whole thing's gotten real messy. Take care of yourself. Will ya, brother?
engSearchText:
This whole thing's gotten real messy. Take care
of yourself. Will ya, brother?
jpnChrName: 何かとゴタついてるが…… そっちも気を付けてくれよ、ブラザー？
jpnSearchText:
何かとゴタついてるが……
そっちも気を付けてくれよ、ブラザー？

engSearchText:
Ain't no one can blame a brother for shedding tears
in the name of another soul.

jpnSearchText:
誰かを想い、涙を流す──
このブラザーのソウルを誰が責められる？

engChrName: Heh, don't stress so much, brother! Sure, ya didn't get there on time, but ya haven't missed yer chance yet!
engSearchText:
Heh, don't stress so much, brother! Sure, ya didn't get
there on time, but ya haven't missed yer chance yet!
jpnChrName: フフ、いいじゃねえか。 間に合わなかったからこそできる届け方もある。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、いいじゃねえか。
間に合わなかったからこそできる届け方もある。

engChrName: Giordano knows these streets like the back of 'is hand! I'll make sure to take you there!
engSearchText:
Giordano knows these streets like the back of
'is hand! I'll make sure to take you there!

jpnSearchText:
このジョルダーノが最高にエクセレントな
フォームで送り届けてやるぜ！

engChrName: Oooh, baby. There's this nice place to grab a bite in front of the station. Blew some good ass cash in there.
engSearchText:
Oooh, baby. There's this nice place to grab a bite in
front of the station. Blew some good ass cash in there.

jpnSearchText:
ベイビー、駅前にマーベラスな店が出ていてな。
つい買い食いをしてしまったぜ。

engSearchText:
'Cause of my job, I know a bunch of the good eateries
in Edith.

jpnSearchText:
オレは職業柄、首都のウマい店も
知り尽くしているんだが……

engChrName: But Shino's Bar? Ain't ever heard of it. I'll keep it in mind.
engSearchText:
But Shino's Bar? Ain't ever heard of it. I'll keep it
in mind.

jpnSearchText:
フフ、シノズ・バーだったか。
覚えておこうじゃねえか、ベイビー。

engChrName: Heh, that's a good reason if I've ever heard one! No need to stress, Giordano's gonna make it happen in record time!
engSearchText:
Heh, that's a good reason if I've ever heard one!
No need to stress, Giordano's gonna make it happen
in record time!

jpnSearchText:
フフ、イイ理由じゃねえか。
このジョルダーノが最速で叶えてやるぜ……！

engChrName: Edith Central Station, North Exit... Man, I wonder just how many people I've picked up in 'ere.
engSearchText:
Edith Central Station, North Exit... Man, I wonder
just how many people I've picked up in 'ere.

jpnSearchText:
イーディス中央駅北口……
ここから何人もの客を乗せたもんだぜ。

engSearchText:

this shady ass politician, some guy off to propose to
his girl...

jpnSearchText:
遅刻しそうなＯＬ、観光にきた一家、
訳アリの政治家に、プロポーズに向かう男……

engSearchText:

people and feelings to their destinations.

jpnSearchText:
──オール・マイ・デスティニー！
そう、オレが運ぶのは人の想いなのさ。
