engSearchText:
Now then... What kinda folks am I gonna take for a
ride today?
jpnChrName: さて……今日はどんな客が乗ってくるかねェ？
jpnSearchText: さて……今日はどんな客が乗ってくるかねェ？

engChrName: Hey, brother. Nice night, don't ya think? Feels like the breeze will just blow my worries away.
engSearchText:
Hey, brother. Nice night, don't ya think? Feels like
the breeze will just blow my worries away.
jpnChrName: ようブラザー、イイ夜だな。 都会の喧騒を夜風が静かに運び去ってやがる。
jpnSearchText:
ようブラザー、イイ夜だな。
都会の喧騒を夜風が静かに運び去ってやがる。

engChrName: It's only natural to wanna go out on a night like this. I can take ya for a ride, if you please.
engSearchText:
It's only natural to wanna go out on a night like this.
I can take ya for a ride, if you please.
jpnChrName: こんな夜は出かけたくなるのも道理── 良けりゃオレのアクティス（愛車）に乗っていくか？
jpnSearchText:
こんな夜は出かけたくなるのも道理──
良けりゃオレのアクティス（愛車）に乗っていくか？

engChrName: Umm... (This is kind of a...unique taxi.)
engSearchText:
Umm...
(This is kind of a...unique taxi.)
jpnChrName: え、えっと…… （なんだか変わったタクシーですけど……）
jpnSearchText:
え、えっと……
（なんだか変わったタクシーですけど……）

engChrName: (Heh, that's one hell of a ride. Kinda wanna check it out, to be honest.)
engSearchText:
(Heh, that's one hell of a ride. Kinda wanna check it
out, to be honest.)
jpnChrName: （オイオイ、いい車使ってやがんな。   ……気にはなるが………）
jpnSearchText:
（オイオイ、いい車使ってやがんな。
……気にはなるが………）

engChrName: Sorry, man. Gonna have to pass on this one. Where I'm going's just 'round the corner.
engSearchText:
Sorry, man. Gonna have to pass on this one.
Where I'm going's just 'round the corner.
jpnChrName: 悪い、すぐ近場なんでな。 今日の所は遠慮しておくぜ。
jpnSearchText:
悪い、すぐ近場なんでな。
今日の所は遠慮しておくぜ。

engChrName: Ah, forgetaboutit!
engSearchText: Ah, forgetaboutit!
jpnChrName: おっとそうかい、そいつァ失礼した。
jpnSearchText: おっとそうかい、そいつァ失礼した。

engChrName: The name's Giordano. Brother, if ya need anything, give me a holler.
engSearchText:
The name's Giordano. Brother, if ya need anything,
give me a holler.
jpnChrName: オレはジョルダーノだ。 また入用な時は声をかけてくれ、ブラザー。
jpnSearchText:
オレはジョルダーノだ。
また入用な時は声をかけてくれ、ブラザー。

engChrName: Name's Giordano. I'm kind of a big name around here, ya know.
engSearchText:
Name's Giordano. I'm kind of a big name around
here, ya know.
jpnChrName: オレはジョルダーノ。 ここいらじゃちょいと名が通っていてな。
jpnSearchText:
オレはジョルダーノ。
ここいらじゃちょいと名が通っていてな。

engChrName: If ya need to get anywhere in a hurry, then I'm your guy. I'll be there when you need me, brother.
engSearchText:
If ya need to get anywhere in a hurry, then I'm
your guy. I'll be there when you need me, brother.
jpnChrName: 最速で行きたい場所があるならオレを呼びな。 いつでも駆け付けてやるぜ、ブラザー。
jpnSearchText:
最速で行きたい場所があるならオレを呼びな。
いつでも駆け付けてやるぜ、ブラザー。

engChrName: Hey brother, I got ya covered. Wanna get back to your beloved family ASAP, yeah?
engSearchText:
Hey brother, I got ya covered. Wanna get back to
your beloved family ASAP, yeah?
jpnChrName: ようブラザー、ご用命承ったぜ。 愛する家族の元に、最速で──だったな？
jpnSearchText:
ようブラザー、ご用命承ったぜ。
愛する家族の元に、最速で──だったな？

engChrName: Ahaha, yes. You see, it's my daughter's birthday today.
engSearchText:
Ahaha, yes. You see, it's my daughter's
birthday today.
jpnChrName: あはは、今日は娘の誕生日なんです……
jpnSearchText: あはは、今日は娘の誕生日なんです……

engChrName: I'm usually not even in the country, since I work abroad. I wanna get back home as soon as humanly possible.
engSearchText:
I'm usually not even in the country, since I
work abroad. I wanna get back home as soon as
humanly possible.
jpnChrName: 普段は外国に単身赴任している分、 一刻も早く帰ってやりたくて。
jpnSearchText:
普段は外国に単身赴任している分、
一刻も早く帰ってやりたくて。

engChrName: Hah! That's a good reason if I ever heard one. You're a hero to your fam, brother.
engSearchText:
Hah! That's a good reason if I ever heard one.
You're a hero to your fam, brother.
jpnChrName: フフ、イイ理由だ── ユーアーグレイトヒーローだぜ、ブラザー。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、イイ理由だ──
ユーアーグレイトヒーローだぜ、ブラザー。

engChrName: Come on, get in! Giordano's gonna make your wish come true at record speed!
engSearchText:
Come on, get in! Giordano's gonna make your wish
come true at record speed!
jpnChrName: さあ乗りな！　このジョルダーノが その願い、最速で叶えてやるぜ……！
jpnSearchText:
さあ乗りな！　このジョルダーノが
その願い、最速で叶えてやるぜ……！

engChrName: Damn it! I was heading to my senior's wedding today, and then I just HAD to get on the wrong bus...
engSearchText:
Damn it! I was heading to my senior's wedding today,
and then I just HAD to get on the wrong bus...
jpnChrName: グスッ、先輩の結婚パーティに 行くつもりだったのに……バス間違えてて……
jpnSearchText:
グスッ、先輩の結婚パーティに
行くつもりだったのに……バス間違えてて……

engChrName: Argh, I'm not gonna make it! I even got him a present and everything!
engSearchText:
Argh, I'm not gonna make it! I even got him a
present and everything!
jpnChrName: もう間に合わなくて…… ううっ……プレゼントも用意したのに……
jpnSearchText:
もう間に合わなくて……
ううっ……プレゼントも用意したのに……

engChrName: No need for tears, brother. Ain't over till the fat lady sings, ye?
engSearchText:
No need for tears, brother. Ain't over till the fat lady
sings, ye?
jpnChrName: ブラザー、泣くんじゃねえ。 “まだ何も終わっちゃいねえ”──そうだろう？
jpnSearchText:
ブラザー、泣くんじゃねえ。
“まだ何も終わっちゃいねえ”──そうだろう？

engChrName: B-But it's getting late...
engSearchText: B-But it's getting late...
jpnChrName: で、でも、もう時間が……
jpnSearchText: で、でも、もう時間が……

engChrName: Heh. Listen close, brother. It's the thought that counts, and that's why I'm in the business of taking your thoughts from A to B.
engSearchText:
Heh. Listen close, brother. It's the thought that
counts, and that's why I'm in the business of taking
your thoughts from A to B.
jpnChrName: チッチッチ、よく聞けブラザー。 オレが届けるのはブラザーの心だ。
jpnSearchText:
チッチッチ、よく聞けブラザー。
オレが届けるのはブラザーの心だ。

engChrName: I'm sure you've prepared a wonderful gift for that senior o' yours.
engSearchText:
I'm sure you've prepared a wonderful gift for that
senior o' yours.
jpnChrName: 敬愛するオールドボーイのために ファンタスティックなギフトを用意したんだろう。
jpnSearchText:
敬愛するオールドボーイのために
ファンタスティックなギフトを用意したんだろう。

engChrName: No shame in that, is there? Only one thing to do, brother, and you already know what it is!
engSearchText:
No shame in that, is there? Only one thing to do,
brother, and you already know what it is!
jpnChrName: その気持ちになんら毀損があるかよ？ だったらやる事は１つじゃねえか、なあブラザー！
jpnSearchText:
その気持ちになんら毀損があるかよ？
だったらやる事は１つじゃねえか、なあブラザー！

engChrName: Y-You're right! Being late is already lame enough, but I can't flake out completely! I have to at least give him his gift!
engSearchText:
Y-You're right! Being late is already lame enough, but
I can't flake out completely! I have to at least give him
his gift!
jpnChrName: は、はい……そうですね、カッコ悪いけど たとえパーティに間に合わなくたって、渡せれば……
jpnSearchText:
は、はい……そうですね、カッコ悪いけど
たとえパーティに間に合わなくたって、渡せれば……

engChrName: P-Please, take me to the party!
engSearchText: P-Please, take me to the party!
jpnChrName: ……ど、どうかよろしくお願いします！！
jpnSearchText: ……ど、どうかよろしくお願いします！！

engChrName: There are too many things to do around town! How am I supposed to know where to even get started?
engSearchText:
There are too many things to do around town!
How am I supposed to know where to even
get started?
jpnChrName: いや～、あちこち催し物ばかりで どこへ行くか迷っちゃうね！
jpnSearchText:
いや～、あちこち催し物ばかりで
どこへ行くか迷っちゃうね！

engChrName: Well, maybe I'll just take a look around first. Wandering around can be its own sort of fun.
engSearchText:
Well, maybe I'll just take a look around first.
Wandering around can be its own sort of fun.
jpnChrName: ──でも今日くらいはイイよね、迷っても！ あちこちフラフラするのが楽しいんだし！！
jpnSearchText:
──でも今日くらいはイイよね、迷っても！
あちこちフラフラするのが楽しいんだし！！

engChrName: If only job hunting was this enjoyable! Haha...
engSearchText: If only job hunting was this enjoyable! Haha...
jpnChrName: 就職活動もこんな風に行けばいいのにな～！ アハハハッ！
jpnSearchText:
就職活動もこんな風に行けばいいのにな～！
アハハハッ！

engChrName: *groan* I've talked to loads of people from this company, but nothing's clicking.
engSearchText:
*groan* I've talked to loads of people from this
company, but nothing's clicking.
jpnChrName: う～ん、企業の人に色々話を聞いてみたけど どうしてもピンと来なくて……
jpnSearchText:
う～ん、企業の人に色々話を聞いてみたけど
どうしてもピンと来なくて……

engChrName: It's a prestigious place and all the higher ups seem nice. I don't want to say no definitively, but I dunno...
engSearchText:
It's a prestigious place and all the higher ups
seem nice. I don't want to say no definitively, but
I dunno...
jpnChrName: 一流企業だし、担当者の人も優しそうだったから アリと言えばアリなんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
一流企業だし、担当者の人も優しそうだったから
アリと言えばアリなんだけど……

engChrName: Aaand I'm lost.
engSearchText: Aaand I'm lost.
jpnChrName: ……帰り道も迷っちゃったしな……う～ん……
jpnSearchText: ……帰り道も迷っちゃったしな……う～ん……

engChrName: In the streets or in general? Man, I wish I knew.
engSearchText: In the streets or in general? Man, I wish I knew.
jpnChrName: というか最近、道に迷っているのか 人生に迷っているのか分からなくなってきたよ～。
jpnSearchText:
というか最近、道に迷っているのか
人生に迷っているのか分からなくなってきたよ～。

engChrName: I got this other company's info session coming up but I still have no clue where I should even apply for.
engSearchText:
I got this other company's info session coming up but
I still have no clue where I should even apply for.
jpnChrName: 今日も企業説明会に行ってくるんだけど…… はあ、結局どこに就職すればいいんだろう……
jpnSearchText:
今日も企業説明会に行ってくるんだけど……
はあ、結局どこに就職すればいいんだろう……

engChrName: Here's hoping I don't end up getting lost before the actual interview. That's the kinda thing I get nightmares about.
engSearchText:
Here's hoping I don't end up getting lost before the
actual interview. That's the kinda thing I get
nightmares about.
jpnChrName: それ以前に道に迷わずに行けるかな…… ちょっとだけ不安だよ……
jpnSearchText:
それ以前に道に迷わずに行けるかな……
ちょっとだけ不安だよ……

engChrName: Oh! How about I only apply to places that are easy to get to?
engSearchText:
Oh! How about I only apply to places that are easy to
get to?
jpnChrName: うん、そうだな！　やっぱり就職するなら 分かりやすい場所にある会社かな！
jpnSearchText:
うん、そうだな！　やっぱり就職するなら
分かりやすい場所にある会社かな！

engChrName: 'Notice: Several bus routes have been altered in accordance with the declared state of emergency.' WHAT?!
engSearchText:
'Notice: Several bus routes have been altered in
accordance with the declared state of emergency.'
WHAT?!
jpnChrName: ──『非常事態宣言発令に伴い、 一部のバスルート変更のお知らせ』！？
jpnSearchText:
──『非常事態宣言発令に伴い、
一部のバスルート変更のお知らせ』！？

engChrName: How am I supposed to know where to go now?!
engSearchText: How am I supposed to know where to go now?!
jpnChrName: ひええ……どのバスに乗れば いいのか分からないよ～！！
jpnSearchText:
ひええ……どのバスに乗れば
いいのか分からないよ～！！

engChrName: Why did this have to happen, too? Agh, today's just been one thing after the other!
engSearchText:
Why did this have to happen, too? Agh, today's just
been one thing after the other!
jpnChrName: 急にこんな事になっちゃうなんて…… 困る事ばかりだよ……
jpnSearchText:
急にこんな事になっちゃうなんて……
困る事ばかりだよ……

engChrName: I just picked up a new book. It's called Memory Training for Dummies.
engSearchText:
I just picked up a new book. It's called Memory
Training for Dummies.
jpnChrName: ……記憶力を鍛えるって本を読んでるんだよ。
jpnSearchText: ……記憶力を鍛えるって本を読んでるんだよ。

engChrName: I think all my problems might have something to do with my memory.
engSearchText:
I think all my problems might have something to do
with my memory.
jpnChrName: ホラ僕って、人よりちょっとだけ おっちょこちょいだろ？　道にもよく迷うし……
jpnSearchText:
ホラ僕って、人よりちょっとだけ
おっちょこちょいだろ？　道にもよく迷うし……

engChrName: I mean, I'm really clumsy and get lost all the time. I don't think it's a stretch, yeah?
engSearchText:
I mean, I'm really clumsy and get lost all the time.
I don't think it's a stretch, yeah?
jpnChrName: それってつまり記憶力が無いからだと思うんだよね。 だから鍛えようと思ってさ！
jpnSearchText:
それってつまり記憶力が無いからだと思うんだよね。
だから鍛えようと思ってさ！

engChrName: I daydream too much? Huh? What's that gotta do with anything? I'm talking about my memory here!
engSearchText:
I daydream too much? Huh? What's that gotta do
with anything? I'm talking about my memory here!
jpnChrName: ……えっ、思考が迷子？ そんな事ないと思うけどなぁ～。
jpnSearchText:
……えっ、思考が迷子？
そんな事ないと思うけどなぁ～。

engChrName: Hmm. I might get the hang of it if I practice every day...
engSearchText:
Hmm. I might get the hang of it if I practice
every day...
jpnChrName: ぶつぶつ……毎日復習することで……
jpnSearchText: ぶつぶつ……毎日復習することで……

engChrName: But I gotta be careful or I'm gonna miss my bus.
engSearchText: But I gotta be careful or I'm gonna miss my bus.
jpnChrName: ……う～ん、気を付けないと またバスに乗り損ねそうだなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
……う～ん、気を付けないと
またバスに乗り損ねそうだなぁ……

engChrName: Aidios, I'm pathetic. But it'd be even worse if I just gave up here...
engSearchText:
Aidios, I'm pathetic. But it'd be even worse if I just
gave up here...
jpnChrName: 正直自分が情けなさすぎるけど…… 確かにここで諦める方が、カッコ悪いよな……！
jpnSearchText:
正直自分が情けなさすぎるけど……
確かにここで諦める方が、カッコ悪いよな……！

engChrName: Even if I don't make it in time for the party, I can still give him his wedding present!
engSearchText:
Even if I don't make it in time for the party, I can still
give him his wedding present!
jpnChrName: もうパーティには間に合わないけど、 このプレゼントを渡すだけ渡してくるよ！！
jpnSearchText:
もうパーティには間に合わないけど、
このプレゼントを渡すだけ渡してくるよ！！

engChrName: One of the seniors is getting married today, and I'm invited!
engSearchText:
One of the seniors is getting married today, and
I'm invited!
jpnChrName: 今日は先輩の 結婚パーティに呼ばれてるんだ♪
jpnSearchText:
今日は先輩の
結婚パーティに呼ばれてるんだ♪

engChrName: No more worrying about job hunting! Tonight, it's time to PAR-TY!
engSearchText:
No more worrying about job hunting! Tonight, it's
time to PAR-TY!
jpnChrName: 就職活動も行き詰まってるけど、 気分転換にパーッとお祝いするぞ～っ！
jpnSearchText:
就職活動も行き詰まってるけど、
気分転換にパーッとお祝いするぞ～っ！

engChrName: I even got him a present! I'll surprise him with it at the party.
engSearchText:
I even got him a present! I'll surprise him with it at
the party.
jpnChrName: プレゼントもばっちり用意したし、 サプライズで渡してあげないとね！
jpnSearchText:
プレゼントもばっちり用意したし、
サプライズで渡してあげないとね！

engChrName: I had a company information session today but ended up being late...
engSearchText:
I had a company information session today but ended
up being late...
jpnChrName: 今日は企業説明会があったんだけど、 なんだかんだ遅れちゃってさ。
jpnSearchText:
今日は企業説明会があったんだけど、
なんだかんだ遅れちゃってさ。

engChrName: Not very useful for picking where to work if I don't hear anything about the place.
engSearchText:
Not very useful for picking where to work if I don't
hear anything about the place.
jpnChrName: あまり話が聞けなかったから 結局よく分からなかったなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
あまり話が聞けなかったから
結局よく分からなかったなぁ……

engChrName: *sigh* I also ended up forgetting my umbrella. If I don't hurry home, I'll catch a cold.
engSearchText:
*sigh* I also ended up forgetting my umbrella. If I
don't hurry home, I'll catch a cold.
jpnChrName: 傘も会場に忘れちゃったし…… ふう、ともかく風邪を引く前に帰らないとなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
傘も会場に忘れちゃったし……
ふう、ともかく風邪を引く前に帰らないとなぁ。

engChrName: I'll be graduating school soon, and so the job hunt begins.
engSearchText:
I'll be graduating school soon, and so the job
hunt begins.
jpnChrName: 今通ってる学校もそろそろ卒業かぁ…… 就職活動しないとなぁ～……
jpnSearchText:
今通ってる学校もそろそろ卒業かぁ……
就職活動しないとなぁ～……

engChrName: I just...don't really know what I wanna do. I've never been good at anything...
engSearchText:
I just...don't really know what I wanna do. I've never
been good at anything...
jpnChrName: ……でもやりたい事も無いし…… そもそも僕なんかじゃ……ぶつぶつ……
jpnSearchText:
……でもやりたい事も無いし……
そもそも僕なんかじゃ……ぶつぶつ……

engChrName: Man, this isn't good. I'm gonna miss my bus!
engSearchText: Man, this isn't good. I'm gonna miss my bus!
jpnChrName: おっと、いけないいけない…… またバスを逃してしまいそうだよ……
jpnSearchText:
おっと、いけないいけない……
またバスを逃してしまいそうだよ……

engChrName: I ended up getting lost in thought...
engSearchText: I ended up getting lost in thought...
jpnChrName: 考え事をしていると、ついね！
jpnSearchText: 考え事をしていると、ついね！

engChrName: *sigh* Never mind the bus. It's life I need to make sure I don't get lost in.
engSearchText:
*sigh* Never mind the bus. It's life I need to make
sure I don't get lost in.
jpnChrName: ふう、バスはともかく 人生の路頭には迷わないようにしないとなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、バスはともかく
人生の路頭には迷わないようにしないとなぁ。

engChrName: Trion Tower's the ideal place if you want to party around Edith. It's in the 3rd District.
engSearchText:
Trion Tower's the ideal place if you want to party
around Edith. It's in the 3rd District.
jpnChrName: イーディスでパーッと遊ぶなら、 トリオンタワーのある３区もいいけど……
jpnSearchText:
イーディスでパーッと遊ぶなら、
トリオンタワーのある３区もいいけど……

engChrName: Tyrell's pretty close, though. That's the 4th District. The streets are really pretty and there's a lot of stores around.
engSearchText:
Tyrell's pretty close, though. That's the 4th District.
The streets are really pretty and there's a lot of
stores around.
jpnChrName: ４区タイレル地区もオススメだよ。 街並みも綺麗だし、いろんなお店も揃ってる。
jpnSearchText:
４区タイレル地区もオススメだよ。
街並みも綺麗だし、いろんなお店も揃ってる。

engChrName: I know there's a bus that goes through both of them, but...umm...I can't remember which one it was.
engSearchText:
I know there's a bus that goes through both of them,
but...umm...I can't remember which one it was.
jpnChrName: 両方回れるバスもあるんだけど…… あれ、何番乗り場だったかな……？
jpnSearchText:
両方回れるバスもあるんだけど……
あれ、何番乗り場だったかな……？

engChrName: I feel like I'm forgetting something... Something to do with the Tyrell District...
engSearchText:

jpnSearchText:

engSearchText:

jpnSearchText:

engSearchText:

jpnSearchText:

engSearchText:

jpnSearchText:

engSearchText: Did I get on the tour bus instead?

jpnSearchText: 巡回バスに乗ってしまったのかな……

engSearchText:

you live in the capital.

jpnSearchText:

首都暮らしならね！

engSearchText: You can get anywhere in Edith if you use the metro.

jpnSearchText:
地下鉄（メトロ）ってさ、全街区を繋いでるし

engSearchText: Edith's buses are pretty good, too.

jpnSearchText:
でも実はイーディスは
バス網もかなり充実してるんだよね。

engSearchText:
There's bus stops pretty much everywhere you'd
wanna go. We also got buses that go all 'round the
city, and options for long distance travel.

jpnSearchText:
主要な通りには必ずバス停があるし、
巡回バスや長距離バスも出てる。

engSearchText:
You can even take a bus out of the country! Though I
guess it's not as amusing if you've been living in the
city for a while.

jpnSearchText:

engSearchText: Where are y'all going?

jpnSearchText: 君たちもどこかに行くのかい？

engSearchText:

jpnSearchText:

jpnSearchText:

jpnSearchText:

jpnSearchText:
だだだだって！！
《ＥＧＣ（イーディスガールズコレクション）》の抽選全落ちしたんだもん！！

engChrName: I'm so pathetic! Not just depressed, but SINGLE, too!
engSearchText:
I'm so pathetic! Not just depressed, but
SINGLE, too!
jpnChrName: この上カレシなしとか、惨めすぎるよ～！！
jpnSearchText: この上カレシなしとか、惨めすぎるよ～！！

engChrName: (Uhh, so am I? Or does that not matter to you?)
engSearchText: (Uhh, so am I? Or does that not matter to you?)
jpnChrName: （え、アタシは？   ノーカンなわけ？？）
jpnSearchText:
（え、アタシは？
ノーカンなわけ？？）

engChrName: They're testing the festival's lighting tonight!
engSearchText: They're testing the festival's lighting tonight!
jpnChrName: 今日から記念祭用のライトアップ、 試験点灯始めるんだって！
jpnSearchText:
今日から記念祭用のライトアップ、
試験点灯始めるんだって！

engChrName: This is totally gonna be post-worthy! Can't wait for the likes to come rollin' in!
engSearchText:
This is totally gonna be post-worthy! Can't wait for
the likes to come rollin' in!
jpnChrName: これはアップして 『いいね』稼ぐしかないっしょ～！！
jpnSearchText:
これはアップして
『いいね』稼ぐしかないっしょ～！！

engChrName: I really don't understand what the heck you're on about sometimes.
engSearchText:
I really don't understand what the heck you're on
about sometimes.
jpnChrName: ウン、あんねコペイカ。 時々なに言ってんのか分かんないんだけど？
jpnSearchText:
ウン、あんねコペイカ。
時々なに言ってんのか分かんないんだけど？

engChrName: Oh. Actually, I forgot to mention that I did get one ticket to the EGC.
engSearchText:
Oh. Actually, I forgot to mention that I did get one
ticket to the EGC.
jpnChrName: あ……そういやさ。 《ＥＧＣ（イーディスガールズコレクション）》の抽選、１コ当たってたよ。
jpnSearchText:
あ……そういやさ。
《ＥＧＣ（イーディスガールズコレクション）》の抽選、１コ当たってたよ。

engChrName: WHAAAAAAT?!
engSearchText: WHAAAAAAT?!
jpnChrName: ええええええええええっっっ！！？
jpnSearchText: <S5>ええええええええええっっっ！！？

engChrName: Why didn't you say that earlier?! Come on, what were you biting your tongue for?! I can't BELIEVE you! That's, like, mind-blowing!
engSearchText:
Why didn't you say that earlier?! Come on,
what were you biting your tongue for?! I can't
BELIEVE you! That's, like, mind-blowing!
jpnChrName: あんたそれ早くっ──なんで黙ってたワケ！？ 信じらんない！！　てかナイス！！　燃えてきたあああ！！
jpnSearchText:
あんたそれ早くっ──なんで黙ってたワケ！？
信じらんない！！　てかナイス！！　燃えてきたあああ！！

engChrName: Wait, wait, wait. Pump the breaks there a li'l. It wasn't even a minute ago that you were getting all depresso on me.
engSearchText:
Wait, wait, wait. Pump the breaks there a li'l.
It wasn't even a minute ago that you were getting all
depresso on me.
jpnChrName: ……いや、一気にしゃべりすぎっしょ…… さっきまでの白けムード、どこに行ったのよ。
jpnSearchText:
……いや、一気にしゃべりすぎっしょ……
さっきまでの白けムード、どこに行ったのよ。

engChrName: This is the EGC we're talking about! The EG-freaking-C! Think about all those models and actresses you'll get to meet!
engSearchText:
This is the EGC we're talking about!
The EG-freaking-C! Think about all those models
and actresses you'll get to meet!
jpnChrName: ＥＧＣだよＥＧＣ！！ ナマモデルとか女優に会えちゃうんだよ！？
jpnSearchText:
ＥＧＣだよＥＧＣ！！
ナマモデルとか女優に会えちゃうんだよ！？

engChrName: Oooh, this is so exciting! And on the day of the festival, too, yeah? This. Is. So. HYPE!
engSearchText:
Oooh, this is so exciting! And on the day of the
festival, too, yeah? This. Is. So. HYPE!
jpnChrName: 今から待ち遠しすぎ！！ たしか記念祭当日だよね！？　燃えるわ～～っ！！
jpnSearchText:
今から待ち遠しすぎ！！
たしか記念祭当日だよね！？　燃えるわ～～っ！！

engChrName: (It's like her excitement saps away all of mine in an instant.)
engSearchText:
(It's like her excitement saps away all of mine in
an instant.)
jpnChrName: （なんかグレタが燃えると   アタシが冷めるんだよね……なんでだろ。）
jpnSearchText:
（なんかグレタが燃えると
アタシが冷めるんだよね……なんでだろ。）

engChrName: The EGC's in the evening, yeah? Wanna look around before it starts?
engSearchText:
The EGC's in the evening, yeah? Wanna look around
before it starts?
jpnChrName: ＥＧＣは夕方からだっけ。 まずは屋台巡りしてく～！？
jpnSearchText:
ＥＧＣは夕方からだっけ。
まずは屋台巡りしてく～！？

engChrName: Well, duh!
engSearchText: Well, duh!
jpnChrName: ま、定番じゃない？
jpnSearchText: ま、定番じゃない？

engChrName: I was planning on taking some photos, too. How 'bout we stop by the Revolution Memorial Plaza?
engSearchText:
I was planning on taking some photos, too.
How 'bout we stop by the Revolution
Memorial Plaza?
jpnChrName: あと写真撮りたいから 革命記念広場寄っときたいかも～。
jpnSearchText:
あと写真撮りたいから
革命記念広場寄っときたいかも～。

engChrName: Hella! Let's have some FUN!
engSearchText: Hella! Let's have some FUN!
jpnChrName: オッケー！！　今日は遊びまくるぞ～っ！！
jpnSearchText: オッケー！！　今日は遊びまくるぞ～っ！！

engChrName: Wh-Wh-What the HECK is going on?! This is getting freaky! W-We're totally gonna die!
engSearchText:
Wh-Wh-What the HECK is going on?! This is
getting freaky! W-We're totally gonna die!
jpnChrName: どどどどうなってんのよ～っ！！ マジ死んじゃう！！　外ヤバすぎ──っ！！
jpnSearchText:
どどどどうなってんのよ～っ！！
マジ死んじゃう！！　外ヤバすぎ──っ！！

engChrName: I-I dunno! But we gotta lay low for now.
engSearchText: I-I dunno! But we gotta lay low for now.
jpnChrName: わ、わっかんないけど 今は大人しくしてるしかないっしょ……
jpnSearchText:
わ、わっかんないけど
今は大人しくしてるしかないっしょ……

engChrName: But this is totally picture-worthy! And my camera's working, too.
engSearchText:
But this is totally picture-worthy! And my camera's
working, too.
jpnChrName: てか写真とっとかないと……！ カメラは動くみたいだし……
jpnSearchText:
てか写真とっとかないと……！
カメラは動くみたいだし……

engChrName: K-Kopeyka, you are WAY too chilled out right now! B-But it helps calm me down...
engSearchText:
K-Kopeyka, you are WAY too chilled out right now!
B-But it helps calm me down...
jpnChrName: コ、コペイカ冷静すぎだよぉ！！ お陰で安心できるけど……
jpnSearchText:
コ、コペイカ冷静すぎだよぉ！！
お陰で安心できるけど……

engChrName: N-Nah. I'm a total mess, really. I'm only this calm 'cause you're here.
engSearchText:
N-Nah. I'm a total mess, really. I'm only this calm
'cause you're here.
jpnChrName: いや、アタシも頭ん中ぐちゃぐちゃ…… グレタがいてくれてホント良かったって。
jpnSearchText:
いや、アタシも頭ん中ぐちゃぐちゃ……
グレタがいてくれてホント良かったって。

engChrName: H-H-How did it come out? Got those monsters in the frame?
engSearchText:
H-H-How did it come out? Got those monsters in
the frame?
jpnChrName: どどどどう……？　バケモノ撮れた……？
jpnSearchText: どどどどう……？　バケモノ撮れた……？

engChrName: Oh, dear. This is nuts...
engSearchText: Oh, dear. This is nuts...
jpnChrName: うわ……マジヤバ……
jpnSearchText: うわ……マジヤバ……

engChrName: They're not showing up! Th-That's SO freaky!
engSearchText: They're not showing up! Th-That's SO freaky!
jpnChrName: あいつら写真に映んない…… ぶ、不気味すぎっしょ……！！
jpnSearchText:
あいつら写真に映んない……
ぶ、不気味すぎっしょ……！！

engChrName: Eeeeeek! They're SO not from this world!
engSearchText: Eeeeeek! They're SO not from this world!
jpnChrName: ひぃぃぃっ──！？ やっぱこの世のモノじゃないって事じゃん！！
jpnSearchText:
ひぃぃぃっ──！？
やっぱこの世のモノじゃないって事じゃん！！

engChrName: (Huh. They're not showing up on photographs, but our Xipha's are recording them without major issue.)
engSearchText:
(Huh. They're not showing up on photographs, but
our Xipha's are recording them without major issue.)
jpnChrName: （写真に映らない、ですか。   ザイファでは記録できるようですが……）
jpnSearchText:
（写真に映らない、ですか。
ザイファでは記録できるようですが……）

engChrName: (It's gotta have to do with the shard functions installed, I guess.)
engSearchText:
(It's gotta have to do with the shard functions
installed, I guess.)
jpnChrName: （ああ、シャード機能が搭載されてる   からなのか、それとも……）
jpnSearchText:
（ああ、シャード機能が搭載されてる
からなのか、それとも……）

engChrName: (Or not. Dunno what the heck's goin' on, now that time's stopped.)
engSearchText:
(Or not. Dunno what the heck's goin' on, now that
time's stopped.)
jpnChrName: （この停止現象にせよ   分からねえことばかりだな……）
jpnSearchText:
（この停止現象にせよ
分からねえことばかりだな……）

engChrName: This is SO freaky! Kopeyka, what's gonna happen to us?!
engSearchText:
This is SO freaky! Kopeyka, what's gonna happen
to us?!
jpnChrName: ヤバいヤバいヤバいよコペイカ～っ！！ あたしたち、これからどうなっちゃうの～っ！？
jpnSearchText:
ヤバいヤバいヤバいよコペイカ～っ！！
あたしたち、これからどうなっちゃうの～っ！？

engChrName: Gretta, please give me some space... But, like, not too much!
engSearchText:
Gretta, please give me some space... But, like, not
too much!
jpnChrName: グレタ引っ付かないで…… あ、でもあんま離れないで～っ！
jpnSearchText:
グレタ引っ付かないで……
あ、でもあんま離れないで～っ！

engChrName: (Oh, right. I totally forgot to check that online application.)
engSearchText:
(Oh, right. I totally forgot to check that
online application.)
jpnChrName: （あー、そういやネット応募した分   まだチェックしてなかったっけ……）
jpnSearchText:
（あー、そういやネット応募した分
まだチェックしてなかったっけ……）

engChrName: (I applied thirty times for the hell of it. I have to have won SOMETHING, right?)
engSearchText:
(I applied thirty times for the hell of it. I have to have
won SOMETHING, right?)
jpnChrName: （ノリで３０通くらい応募したけど   カスッたりしてないかな～？）
jpnSearchText:
（ノリで３０通くらい応募したけど
カスッたりしてないかな～？）

engChrName: I saw my dad browsing this thing called 'social media' on his orbal computer the other day.
engSearchText:
I saw my dad browsing this thing called 'social media'
on his orbal computer the other day.
jpnChrName: パパの導力端末かりて “投稿サイト”っての初めてみたんだけど～。
jpnSearchText:
パパの導力端末かりて
“投稿サイト”っての初めてみたんだけど～。

engChrName: It's actually kinda cool. You can post all sorts of things there, and people can 'like' your posts and stuff! It feels real nice when you get 'em.
engSearchText:
It's actually kinda cool. You can post all sorts of
things there, and people can 'like' your posts
and stuff! It feels real nice when you get 'em.
jpnChrName: ケッコー面白いよ？　いろんなコがアップしてるし 『いいね』集めんのも楽しいし～！
jpnSearchText:
ケッコー面白いよ？　いろんなコがアップしてるし
『いいね』集めんのも楽しいし～！

engChrName: Not a lot of girls posting about their day-to-day yet, so it's the perfect niche for me to swoop in and fill!
engSearchText:
Not a lot of girls posting about their day-to-day yet, so
it's the perfect niche for me to swoop in and fill!
jpnChrName: 女子でこーゆー日常写真上げてる人少ないし 注目もされやすいんだよね～！
jpnSearchText:
女子でこーゆー日常写真上げてる人少ないし
注目もされやすいんだよね～！

engChrName: We could collaborate with the CID in a limited capacity.
engSearchText:
We could collaborate with the CID in a
limited capacity.
jpnChrName: ＣＩＤとの連携── あくまで限定的な形だがアリだろう。
jpnSearchText:
ＣＩＤとの連携──
あくまで限定的な形だがアリだろう。

engChrName: Our efforts are already underway, so their cooperation should help speeding up matters.
engSearchText:
Our efforts are already underway, so their cooperation
should help speeding up matters.
jpnChrName: こちらも独自に手を打ち始めている所でね。 協力が得られるなら効率も上がるはずだ。
jpnSearchText:
こちらも独自に手を打ち始めている所でね。
協力が得られるなら効率も上がるはずだ。

engChrName: I'd advise caution if you guys will keep this up. And I'd appreciate if you kept me up to date regarding your findings.
engSearchText:
I'd advise caution if you guys will keep this up.
And I'd appreciate if you kept me up to date
regarding your findings.
jpnChrName: 君たちも、先に進むのであれば十分に気を付けて。 何か判明したら連絡してくれると嬉しいよ。
jpnSearchText:
君たちも、先に進むのであれば十分に気を付けて。
何か判明したら連絡してくれると嬉しいよ。

engChrName: Weird as things might be, we still have to use the resources at our disposal to help handle things.
engSearchText:
Weird as things might be, we still have to use the
resources at our disposal to help handle things.
jpnChrName: 異様な状況ではあるが── 現有戦力で対処できていないわけではない。
jpnSearchText:
異様な状況ではあるが──
現有戦力で対処できていないわけではない。

engChrName: Our limited grasp of the situation, however, is our biggest handicap.
engSearchText:
Our limited grasp of the situation, however, is our
biggest handicap.
jpnChrName: だが最大の問題は 事態がいまだ見通せていない事だろう……
jpnSearchText:
だが最大の問題は
事態がいまだ見通せていない事だろう……

engChrName: It's hard to believe that this phenomenon was caused by humans in the first place...
engSearchText:
It's hard to believe that this phenomenon was caused
by humans in the first place...
jpnChrName: ……そもそもこの現象、人の手で 引き起こされたなど到底信じがたいが──
jpnSearchText:
……そもそもこの現象、人の手で
引き起こされたなど到底信じがたいが──

engChrName: Regardless of that, we have to find a way to get through this.
engSearchText:
Regardless of that, we have to find a way to get
through this.
jpnChrName: ううむ、ともかく打開策を見出さねば……
jpnSearchText: ううむ、ともかく打開策を見出さねば……

engChrName: Though orbal devices have technically stopped, it looks like there's something working within them still.
engSearchText:
Though orbal devices have technically stopped, it
looks like there's something working within
them still.
jpnChrName: あらゆる導力機器が“停まって”いるが、 中には動作する物もあるようだ。
jpnSearchText:
あらゆる導力機器が“停まって”いるが、
中には動作する物もあるようだ。

engChrName: I hope I can at least get in touch with Leman's head branch...
engSearchText:
I hope I can at least get in touch with Leman's
head branch...
jpnChrName: せめてレマン総本部に連絡がつけばいいのだが……
jpnSearchText: せめてレマン総本部に連絡がつけばいいのだが……

engChrName: Hmm... Anyway, we've got to start working on finding a solution.
engSearchText:
Hmm... Anyway, we've got to start working on
finding a solution.
jpnChrName: ううむ、ともかく手を付くし 打開策を見出さねば……
jpnSearchText:
ううむ、ともかく手を付くし
打開策を見出さねば……

engChrName: Hello there. Nice seeing you take time out of your busy schedule to come see us.
engSearchText:
Hello there. Nice seeing you take time out of your
busy schedule to come see us.
jpnChrName: やあ裏解決屋の、嬉しいねぇ。 この忙しい最中に顔を出してくれるとは。
jpnSearchText:
やあ裏解決屋の、嬉しいねぇ。
この忙しい最中に顔を出してくれるとは。

engChrName: Don't get the wrong idea. I haven't agreed to helpin' out.
engSearchText:
Don't get the wrong idea. I haven't agreed to
helpin' out.
jpnChrName: いや、誰も手を貸すとは 言ってねえからな？
jpnSearchText:
いや、誰も手を貸すとは
言ってねえからな？

engChrName: Ahaha... The guild has a lot on their plate, as usual.
engSearchText: Ahaha... The guild has a lot on their plate, as usual.
jpnChrName: あはは……ギルドは やっぱりお忙しそうですね？
jpnSearchText:
あはは……ギルドは
やっぱりお忙しそうですね？

engChrName: I guess the guild must be busy.
engSearchText: I guess the guild must be busy.
jpnChrName: う～ん、やっぱりギルドは忙しそうです。
jpnSearchText: う～ん、やっぱりギルドは忙しそうです。

engChrName: Heh. Got your hands full, eh?
engSearchText: Heh. Got your hands full, eh?
jpnChrName: ハン……やっぱギルドは多忙みてえだな？
jpnSearchText: ハン……やっぱギルドは多忙みてえだな？

engChrName: Haha... The guild really is busy.
engSearchText: Haha... The guild really is busy.
jpnChrName: ふふ……ギルドはそれだけ 多忙という事なのでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ……ギルドはそれだけ
多忙という事なのでしょう。

engChrName: It's not hard to see you've all got your hands full.
engSearchText: It's not hard to see you've all got your hands full.
jpnChrName: やれやれ……まあギルドが 多忙なのは見れば分かるけどね。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ……まあギルドが
多忙なのは見れば分かるけどね。

engChrName: I don't even work here, but the guild does look like they could use a hand.
engSearchText:
I don't even work here, but the guild does look like
they could use a hand.
jpnChrName: そもそもアタシは従業員じゃないし。 ……ま、ギルドが忙しいのも分かるけど。
jpnSearchText:
そもそもアタシは従業員じゃないし。
……ま、ギルドが忙しいのも分かるけど。

engChrName: Heh. No getting around it. They really have their hands full.
engSearchText:
Heh. No getting around it. They really have their
hands full.
jpnChrName: フフ……ギルドが 多忙なのは致し方あるまい。
jpnSearchText:
フフ……ギルドが
多忙なのは致し方あるまい。

engChrName: Oh, this year took us by surprise in particular.
engSearchText: Oh, this year took us by surprise in particular.
jpnChrName: ああ、今年はかなりの賑わいだからねぇ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、今年はかなりの賑わいだからねぇ。

engChrName: We got the whole team taking shifts, but I'm not sure that's far enough to cover all our bases.
engSearchText:
We got the whole team taking shifts, but I'm not sure
that's far enough to cover all our bases.
jpnChrName: 遊撃士たちもシフトを組んでいるが どこまで対処に回れるやら。
jpnSearchText:
遊撃士たちもシフトを組んでいるが
どこまで対処に回れるやら。

engChrName: Heh, I guess we'll have to start lookin' for extra help.
engSearchText: Heh, I guess we'll have to start lookin' for extra help.
jpnChrName: ふふ、やはり予備戦力は 確保しておかないとねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、やはり予備戦力は
確保しておかないとねぇ。

engChrName: Is it the 'don't get the wrong idea' or the 'haven't agreed to help' part that you ain't getting? (Damn it. Dude's getting on my nerves.)
engSearchText:
Is it the 'don't get the wrong idea' or the 'haven't
agreed to help' part that you ain't getting?
(Damn it. Dude's getting on my nerves.)
jpnChrName: だから引き受けてねえっつーのに…… （ったくこの爺さんも食えねえな。）
jpnSearchText:
だから引き受けてねえっつーのに……
（ったくこの爺さんも食えねえな。）

engChrName: (We need to keep our wits about us as we make our way around. We still have to worry about that case, too.)
engSearchText:
(We need to keep our wits about us as we make our
way around. We still have to worry about that
case, too.)
jpnChrName: （まあ例の件もありますし……   私たちも気を配りながら回りましょうか。）
jpnSearchText:
（まあ例の件もありますし……
私たちも気を配りながら回りましょうか。）

engChrName: (We still need to worry about THAT, too. We better keep our eyes peeled.)
engSearchText:
(We still need to worry about THAT, too. We better
keep our eyes peeled.)
jpnChrName: （でも例の件もありますし……   わたしたちも気を配りながら回りましょう！）
jpnSearchText:
（でも例の件もありますし……
わたしたちも気を配りながら回りましょう！）

engChrName: (Guess if that certain pain in the ass isn't gonna go away, we might as well try to keep an eye on it.)
engSearchText:
(Guess if that certain pain in the ass isn't gonna go
away, we might as well try to keep an eye on it.)
jpnChrName: （ま、例の件もあるしな。   こっちも気ィだけは配っとくかよ。）
jpnSearchText:
（ま、例の件もあるしな。
こっちも気ィだけは配っとくかよ。）

engChrName: (There is still the matter in question to consider... We, too, should be vigilant as we make our rounds.)
engSearchText:
(There is still the matter in question to consider...
We, too, should be vigilant as we make our rounds.)
jpnChrName: （ですが例の件もありますし……   私たちも気を配りながら回ると致しましょう。）
jpnSearchText:
（ですが例の件もありますし……
私たちも気を配りながら回ると致しましょう。）

engChrName: (Well, we do have that matter to worry about. Let's take try to take care of it while we're going around town.)
engSearchText:
(Well, we do have that matter to worry about.
Let's take try to take care of it while we're going
around town.)
jpnChrName: （まあ例の件もあるしね……   僕たちも気を配りながら回ろうか。）
jpnSearchText:
（まあ例の件もあるしね……
僕たちも気を配りながら回ろうか。）

engChrName: (We should probably watch out, all things considered.)
engSearchText:
(We should probably watch out, all
things considered.)
jpnChrName: （ま、例の件もあるし……   私たちも気だけは配っときますか。）
jpnSearchText:
（ま、例の件もあるし……
私たちも気だけは配っときますか。）

engChrName: (With that certain issue ongoing, we'd best keep our wits about us.)
engSearchText:
(With that certain issue ongoing, we'd best keep our
wits about us.)
jpnChrName: （まあ例の件もある。   我らも気を配っておくとしよう。）
jpnSearchText:
（まあ例の件もある。
我らも気を配っておくとしよう。）

engChrName: Now, while I know today's the festival, this is the Bracer Guild. We need to be prepared for everything.
engSearchText:
Now, while I know today's the festival, this is the
Bracer Guild. We need to be prepared for everything.
jpnChrName: さてさて、めでたい日ではあるが ギルドとしては備えておく必要もあるからね。
jpnSearchText:
さてさて、めでたい日ではあるが
ギルドとしては備えておく必要もあるからね。

engChrName: Festivities are being held everywhere today.
engSearchText: Festivities are being held everywhere today.
jpnChrName: ちなみに各地方でも 今日は祭りをやる所がほとんどでね。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに各地方でも
今日は祭りをやる所がほとんどでね。

engChrName: Regardless of the branch, our bracers have their hands full. They'll hopefully be able to take a break here and there while on patrol.
engSearchText:
Regardless of the branch, our bracers have their
hands full. They'll hopefully be able to take a break
here and there while on patrol.
jpnChrName: 各支部の遊撃士たちも忙しい。 上手く息抜きをしつつ回ってもらいたいね。
jpnSearchText:
各支部の遊撃士たちも忙しい。
上手く息抜きをしつつ回ってもらいたいね。

engChrName: A report's just come in from Luka, the receptionist for the Oración branch.
engSearchText:
A report's just come in from Luka, the receptionist
for the Oración branch.
jpnChrName: オラシオン支部の受付を務める ルカから報告書が届いていてね。
jpnSearchText:
オラシオン支部の受付を務める
ルカから報告書が届いていてね。

engChrName: Everything got real complicated, real fast, but negotiations were underway to help get things under control.
engSearchText:
Everything got real complicated, real fast, but
negotiations were underway to help get things
under control.
jpnChrName: ふふ、想像以上に大変な情勢だったようだが 各方面の折衝に状況のコントロール──
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、想像以上に大変な情勢だったようだが
各方面の折衝に状況のコントロール──

engChrName: She used all resources available to her to prevent the worst case scenario from unfolding. She really did a wonderful job there.
engSearchText:
She used all resources available to her to prevent the
worst case scenario from unfolding. She really did a
wonderful job there.
jpnChrName: 使える手は全て使いつつ、最悪の悲劇を回避できた。 本当に良くやってくれたよ。
jpnSearchText:
使える手は全て使いつつ、最悪の悲劇を回避できた。
本当に良くやってくれたよ。

engChrName: Luka, my granddaughter, has been heartbroken over not being able to prevent what happened in Creil Village.
engSearchText:
Luka, my granddaughter, has been heartbroken over
not being able to prevent what happened in
Creil Village.
jpnChrName: クレイユ村の一件を食い止められなかったのが ルカ──孫娘も心苦しく思っているようだが……
jpnSearchText:
クレイユ村の一件を食い止められなかったのが
ルカ──孫娘も心苦しく思っているようだが……

engChrName: But she did a good job, where she could. Creil's tragedy isn't something she should shoulder by herself.
engSearchText:
But she did a good job, where she could.
Creil's tragedy isn't something she should shoulder
by herself.
jpnChrName: それはあの子だけが背負うものではないだろう。 今はともかく、お疲れ様と言ってやりたいね。
jpnSearchText:
それはあの子だけが背負うものではないだろう。
今はともかく、お疲れ様と言ってやりたいね。

engChrName: Oh, it's you. Dealing with the aftermath has been a whole lot more complicated than at first thought.
engSearchText:
Oh, it's you. Dealing with the aftermath has been a
whole lot more complicated than at first thought.
jpnChrName: やあ、君たちか。 例の一件の後始末が思った以上に厄介でね。
jpnSearchText:
やあ、君たちか。
例の一件の後始末が思った以上に厄介でね。

engChrName: They've managed to evade pursuit by leaving trails of dummy info to throw us off.
engSearchText:
They've managed to evade pursuit by leaving trails of
dummy info to throw us off.
jpnChrName: ダミーの情報なども交えつつ しぶとく追跡を逃れているようだ。
jpnSearchText:
ダミーの情報なども交えつつ
しぶとく追跡を逃れているようだ。

engChrName: Elaine did a bang-up job in Oración, at least. That's definitely helped matters.
engSearchText:
Elaine did a bang-up job in Oración, at least.
That's definitely helped matters.
jpnChrName: まあ、オラシオン方面はエレインが ほぼ完璧に対処してくれたのが救いだね。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、オラシオン方面はエレインが
ほぼ完璧に対処してくれたのが救いだね。

engChrName: And it doesn't look like she's going anywhere, thankfully. Couldn't be happier about her staying with the guild.
engSearchText:
And it doesn't look like she's going
anywhere, thankfully. Couldn't be happier about her
staying with the guild.
jpnChrName: どうにか遊撃士協会に残ってくれたし…… ふふ、私としても嬉しい限りさ。
jpnSearchText:
どうにか遊撃士協会に残ってくれたし……
ふふ、私としても嬉しい限りさ。

engChrName: President Auclair has been cooperating with the interrogations.
engSearchText:
President Auclair has been cooperating with
the interrogations.
jpnChrName: オークレール社長は大人しく 聴取に従っているようでね。
jpnSearchText:
オークレール社長は大人しく
聴取に従っているようでね。

engChrName: Her father's condition is also a concern, but he's still been a great help piecing everything together.
engSearchText:
Her father's condition is also a concern, but he's still
been a great help piecing everything together.
jpnChrName: 彼女の父親の容態も心配ではあるが…… 背後関係の洗い出しは順調のようだ。
jpnSearchText:
彼女の父親の容態も心配ではあるが……
背後関係の洗い出しは順調のようだ。

engChrName: We have other things to worry about still. Like the situation with Gray.
engSearchText:
We have other things to worry about still. Like the
situation with Gray.
jpnChrName: 他に気になる事もないわけじゃないが…… ……グレイの件なんかもあるし……
jpnSearchText:
他に気になる事もないわけじゃないが……
……グレイの件なんかもあるし……

engChrName: At the very least, we can take a somewhat smaller break now. That's something worth celebrating.
engSearchText:
At the very least, we can take a somewhat smaller
break now. That's something worth celebrating.
jpnChrName: だがまあ、ひとまずは一段落しそうだ。 今はそれを喜ぶとしようか。
jpnSearchText:
だがまあ、ひとまずは一段落しそうだ。
今はそれを喜ぶとしようか。

engChrName: As you can see, things are incredibly hectic around here. It's never enough hands on deck, no matter how many of us there are.
engSearchText:
As you can see, things are incredibly hectic
around here. It's never enough hands on deck, no
matter how many of us there are.
jpnChrName: ……見ての通りのてんてこ舞いでな。 人手がいくらあっても足りんよ。
jpnSearchText:
……見ての通りのてんてこ舞いでな。
人手がいくらあっても足りんよ。

engChrName: If the announcement is anything to go by, the casualties number more than a thousand. The situation is unprecedented.
engSearchText:
If the announcement is anything to go by, the
casualties number more than a thousand.
The situation is unprecedented.
jpnChrName: 発表通りであれば死者は千名以上── 未曽有の事態だ。
jpnSearchText:
発表通りであれば死者は千名以上──
未曽有の事態だ。

engChrName: The Leman headquarters have ordered the guild to operate at full capacity in this situation.
engSearchText:
The Leman headquarters have ordered the guild to
operate at full capacity in this situation.
jpnChrName: ギルドも総力をもって当たる事になる。 ……これはレマン総本部を通した決定だ。
jpnSearchText:
ギルドも総力をもって当たる事になる。
……これはレマン総本部を通した決定だ。

engChrName: You never know what could happen, so do be careful.
engSearchText: You never know what could happen, so do be careful.
jpnChrName: 君たちも慎重に動きなさい。 この先は何が起きてもおかしくないだろうから。
jpnSearchText:
君たちも慎重に動きなさい。
この先は何が起きてもおかしくないだろうから。

engChrName: A kid from Creil was over visiting at the time. Mere coincidence, really, but it saved his life.
engSearchText:
A kid from Creil was over visiting at the time.
Mere coincidence, really, but it saved his life.
jpnChrName: ……ウチにもクレイユ村の子が訪ねてきていてね、 偶然にも命拾いしたのだよ。
jpnSearchText:
……ウチにもクレイユ村の子が訪ねてきていてね、
偶然にも命拾いしたのだよ。

engChrName: Unfortunately, his friends and family were not so lucky. I wish I could be there to lend my support...
engSearchText:
Unfortunately, his friends and family were not
so lucky. I wish I could be there to lend my support...
jpnChrName: だがご家族や友人は……… ……気にかけてやりたい所だが……
jpnSearchText:
だがご家族や友人は………
……気にかけてやりたい所だが……

engChrName: But alas, my hands are full. Someone else will have to take care of him.
engSearchText:
But alas, my hands are full. Someone else will have to
take care of him.
jpnChrName: この情勢だ、しばらくは 別の者に託すしかないかもしれないね。
jpnSearchText:
この情勢だ、しばらくは
別の者に託すしかないかもしれないね。

engChrName: We did receive a report, but there are a few things that still concern me.
engSearchText:
We did receive a report, but there are a few things
that still concern me.
jpnChrName: 報告は確かに受け取ったよ。 いくつか気になる点もあるが……
jpnSearchText:
報告は確かに受け取ったよ。
いくつか気になる点もあるが……

engChrName: Luka and I are planning to continue with our analysis in an attempt to get some answers.
engSearchText:
Luka and I are planning to continue with our analysis
in an attempt to get some answers.
jpnChrName: ええ、その辺りは引き続き ルカさんと分析しつつ追ってみるつもりです。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、その辺りは引き続き
ルカさんと分析しつつ追ってみるつもりです。

engChrName: Oh, yeah? Good to hear my good-for-nothing granddaughter is turning into a good-for-something.
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah? Good to hear my good-for-nothing
granddaughter is turning into a good-for-something.
jpnChrName: ふふ、そうか。 不肖の孫娘が役に立っているようで何よりだ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、そうか。
不肖の孫娘が役に立っているようで何よりだ。

engChrName: To be honest, she's...kind of terrifying. In spite of her young age, she's become the Oración branch's backbone.
engSearchText:
To be honest, she's...kind of terrifying. In spite of her
young age, she's become the Oración
branch's backbone.
jpnChrName: いやあ、彼女は……正直空恐ろしいですよ。 あの歳で今やオラシオン支部の要でしょう。
jpnSearchText:
いやあ、彼女は……正直空恐ろしいですよ。
あの歳で今やオラシオン支部の要でしょう。

engChrName: She may have only been with us for a year, but I don't know anyone that would argue with me on that statement.
engSearchText:
She may have only been with us for a year, but I don't
know anyone that would argue with me on
that statement.
jpnChrName: 着任して１年経ちませんが それは誰もが認める所です。
jpnSearchText:
着任して１年経ちませんが
それは誰もが認める所です。

engChrName: Oho, no need for flattery! I'm sure you're just exaggerating. It still does me good to hear that she's well.
engSearchText:
Oho, no need for flattery! I'm sure you're
just exaggerating. It still does me good to hear that
she's well.
jpnChrName: おやおや、それは過大評価な気もするが まあ元気にやっているようで良かったよ。
jpnSearchText:
おやおや、それは過大評価な気もするが
まあ元気にやっているようで良かったよ。

engChrName: Tell her to stop by again sometime, won't you?
engSearchText: Tell her to stop by again sometime, won't you?
jpnChrName: また今度顔を出すように伝えておいておくれ。
jpnSearchText: また今度顔を出すように伝えておいておくれ。

engChrName: I'm relieved to hear my granddaughter has been doing well at the Oración branch.
engSearchText:
I'm relieved to hear my granddaughter has been doing
well at the Oración branch.
jpnChrName: 孫娘もオラシオン支部で 元気にやっているようで安心したよ。
jpnSearchText:
孫娘もオラシオン支部で
元気にやっているようで安心したよ。

engChrName: A young man has been coming to help me with my office work as well.
engSearchText:
A young man has been coming to help me with my
office work as well.
jpnChrName: 最近はとある少年が事務仕事の 手伝いにも来てくれているし。
jpnSearchText:
最近はとある少年が事務仕事の
手伝いにも来てくれているし。

engChrName: It might help with efficiency if we took in some more staff for the back office.
engSearchText:
It might help with efficiency if we took in some more
staff for the back office.
jpnChrName: 我々裏方も人員を増やして 対応力を強化するのもありかもしれないね。
jpnSearchText:
我々裏方も人員を増やして
対応力を強化するのもありかもしれないね。

engChrName: I just saw three of our people off a little bit ago. They're off on a work trip.
engSearchText:
I just saw three of our people off a little bit ago.
They're off on a work trip.
jpnChrName: 今日はウチからも３人を出張に回してね。 先ほど見送った所さ。
jpnSearchText:
今日はウチからも３人を出張に回してね。
先ほど見送った所さ。

engChrName: Though they mentioned they'd have dinner out, so I might be able to join them somewhere.
engSearchText:
Though they mentioned they'd have dinner out, so I
might be able to join them somewhere.
jpnChrName: 夕食を済ませていくと言っていたから どこかで会えるかもしれないねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
夕食を済ませていくと言っていたから
どこかで会えるかもしれないねぇ。

engChrName: Hopefully, things will stay uneventful, but take care of yourselves.
engSearchText:
Hopefully, things will stay uneventful, but take care
of yourselves.
jpnChrName: 滅多な事は起きないと思うが── 油断はならない、君たちも気を付けてな。
jpnSearchText:
滅多な事は起きないと思うが──
油断はならない、君たちも気を付けてな。

engChrName: I won't deny that I'm still worried over some things, but I'll just have to power through and keep working with the other branches.
engSearchText:
I won't deny that I'm still worried over some things,
but I'll just have to power through and keep working
with the other branches.
jpnChrName: いくつか気になる事はあるが、やはり 各支部とも連携しつつ進めていくしかないね。
jpnSearchText:
いくつか気になる事はあるが、やはり
各支部とも連携しつつ進めていくしかないね。

engChrName: Hmm... Might be a good idea to look into that case again.
engSearchText:
Hmm... Might be a good idea to look into that
case again.
jpnChrName: ふむ、改めて例の件との関連性も 探ってみるべきか……
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、改めて例の件との関連性も
探ってみるべきか……

engChrName: But we might also be too understaffed to do that right now. *sigh* What a headache.
engSearchText:
But we might also be too understaffed to do that
right now. *sigh* What a headache.
jpnChrName: ……しかし回せる人手となると…… ふう、つくづく頭の痛い話だが……
jpnSearchText:
……しかし回せる人手となると……
ふう、つくづく頭の痛い話だが……

engChrName: (So the guild is proceeding with their own independent investigations.)
engSearchText:
(So the guild is proceeding with their own
independent investigations.)
jpnChrName: （ギルドも独自に調査を   進めているようですが……）
jpnSearchText:
（ギルドも独自に調査を
進めているようですが……）

engChrName: (Yeah, and it sounds like they're having a tough go of it, like the rumors said.)
engSearchText:
(Yeah, and it sounds like they're having a tough go
of it, like the rumors said.)
jpnChrName: （ああ、難航してるんだろ。   それなりに噂も聞くしな。）
jpnSearchText:
（ああ、難航してるんだろ。
それなりに噂も聞くしな。）

engChrName: (Hope that ain't gonna affect us.)
engSearchText: (Hope that ain't gonna affect us.)
jpnChrName: （やれやれ、こっちにまで火の粉が   飛ばなきゃいいんだが。）
jpnSearchText:
（やれやれ、こっちにまで火の粉が
飛ばなきゃいいんだが。）

engChrName: The Republic is massive. If you're talking just size, it's definitely the biggest in the continent.
engSearchText:
The Republic is massive. If you're talking just size, it's
definitely the biggest in the continent.
jpnChrName: 見ての通り、共和国は広い。 面積で言っても大陸最大の国家だからねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
見ての通り、共和国は広い。
面積で言っても大陸最大の国家だからねぇ。

engChrName: And it's not just wide in its territory. We're also a melting pot of cultures and ethnicities in here. A little bit from everywhere we border.
engSearchText:
And it's not just wide in its territory. We're also a
melting pot of cultures and ethnicities in here. A little
bit from everywhere we border.
jpnChrName: その上これほど多種多様な文化・人種が行き交い 多くの国と接している地は他にはない。
jpnSearchText:
その上これほど多種多様な文化・人種が行き交い
多くの国と接している地は他にはない。

engChrName: It's our job to keep the balance in the continent. That, of course, includes dealing with the East's desertification.
engSearchText:
It's our job to keep the balance in the continent.
That, of course, includes dealing with the
East's desertification.
jpnChrName: 我々も大陸のバランサーたる必要があるのだよ。 不毛の大地と化し始めた東方への対処も含めてね。
jpnSearchText:
我々も大陸のバランサーたる必要があるのだよ。
不毛の大地と化し始めた東方への対処も含めてね。

engChrName: Now then... This looks like a good schedule for next week. A little on the safe side, but it'll work.
engSearchText:
Now then... This looks like a good schedule for
next week. A little on the safe side, but it'll work.
jpnChrName: ふむ……やはり週明けからの体制はこれで行こうか。 念には念を入れておかねばね。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ……やはり週明けからの体制はこれで行こうか。
念には念を入れておかねばね。

engChrName: Zin's out right now. Had some urgent business to attend to. I'm sure he'll be back before we know it, though.
engSearchText:
Zin's out right now. Had some urgent business to
attend to. I'm sure he'll be back before we know
it, though.
jpnChrName: ジンなら出かけておるよ。 急な仕事でな──まあすぐ戻るだろうが。
jpnSearchText:
ジンなら出かけておるよ。
急な仕事でな──まあすぐ戻るだろうが。

engChrName: He's been awfully busy nowadays, what with being the face of the guild and all. I was the one that pushed him to do it.
engSearchText:
He's been awfully busy nowadays, what with being the
face of the guild and all. I was the one that pushed
him to do it.
jpnChrName: しかし、あれも忙しい男だねぇ。 共和国ギルドの顔に押し上げたのは私だが……
jpnSearchText:
しかし、あれも忙しい男だねぇ。
共和国ギルドの顔に押し上げたのは私だが……

engChrName: But I fear that may have put too much pressure on him in the process. Oh, well. He's built of sturdy stuff. I'm sure he'll manage.
engSearchText:
But I fear that may have put too much pressure on
him in the process. Oh, well. He's built of
sturdy stuff. I'm sure he'll manage.
jpnChrName: 色々背負わせてしまったかもしれないねぇ。 まあ彼ならばやり遂げてくれるだろうが。
jpnSearchText:
色々背負わせてしまったかもしれないねぇ。
まあ彼ならばやり遂げてくれるだろうが。

engChrName: Elaine's much the same. I understand why she would shy away from the limelight, but we need all our best talent doing their best effort.
engSearchText:
Elaine's much the same. I understand why she would
shy away from the limelight, but we need all our best
talent doing their best effort.
jpnChrName: エレインも然り……尻込みする気持ちもわかるが 優秀な才能を眠らせておく余裕はないのさ。
jpnSearchText:
エレインも然り……尻込みする気持ちもわかるが
優秀な才能を眠らせておく余裕はないのさ。

engChrName: We need to be cautious. I can't say much more than that.
engSearchText:
We need to be cautious. I can't say much more
than that.
jpnChrName: あまり詳しくは言えないが ギルドも慎重にならざるを得なくてねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
あまり詳しくは言えないが
ギルドも慎重にならざるを得なくてねぇ。

engChrName: Usually, any bracer below B-rank is strictly forbidden from working alone when it comes to matters regarding A.
engSearchText:
Usually, any bracer below B-rank is strictly forbidden
from working alone when it comes to matters
regarding A.
jpnChrName: 特に《Ａ》関連については、Ｂ級以下による 単独対処を原則禁止しているんだ。
jpnSearchText:
特に《Ａ》関連については、Ｂ級以下による
単独対処を原則禁止しているんだ。

engChrName: That doesn't mean we won't make an exception here and there, though. For example, that girl that arrived earlier today.
engSearchText:
That doesn't mean we won't make an exception here
and there, though. For example, that girl that arrived
earlier today.
jpnChrName: まあ一部例外もいるがね。 ──今日着任した彼女のように。
jpnSearchText:
まあ一部例外もいるがね。
──今日着任した彼女のように。

engChrName: Haha, it's challenging, for sure. I just want to make sure I'm setting all the youngsters up for success.
engSearchText:
Haha, it's challenging, for sure. I just want to make
sure I'm setting all the youngsters up for success.
jpnChrName: ふふ、難しい状況でもあるが 若手には育ってほしいものだねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、難しい状況でもあるが
若手には育ってほしいものだねぇ。

engChrName: Oh, you must be Arkride Solution's new recruit.
engSearchText: Oh, you must be Arkride Solution's new recruit.
jpnChrName: おや、君は確か…… 解決事務所の新入りの子だったかな？
jpnSearchText:
おや、君は確か……
解決事務所の新入りの子だったかな？

engChrName: I know you're still pretty much a rookie, but I'm rootin' for ya, kiddo.
engSearchText:
I know you're still pretty much a rookie, but I'm
rootin' for ya, kiddo.
jpnChrName: ふふ……仕事は今日からのようだが、 今後の活躍も期待しているよ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ……仕事は今日からのようだが、
今後の活躍も期待しているよ。

engChrName: Th-Thanks. (Everyone's been keeping an eye on me...)
engSearchText:
Th-Thanks.
(Everyone's been keeping an eye on me...)
jpnChrName: は、はい…… （何だか注目されているような……？）
jpnSearchText:
は、はい……
（何だか注目されているような……？）

engChrName: (Who wouldn't? Almost like you're not aware you're a jaeger.)
engSearchText:
(Who wouldn't? Almost like you're not aware you're
a jaeger.)
jpnChrName: （そりゃそうだろ。   ……こいつ自分が猟兵っつー自覚がねえな。）
jpnSearchText:
（そりゃそうだろ。
……こいつ自分が猟兵っつー自覚がねえな。）

engChrName: (Ahaha... The guild and the jaeger corps are basically like cats and dogs.)
engSearchText:
(Ahaha... The guild and the jaeger corps are basically
like cats and dogs.)
jpnChrName: （あはは……ギルドと猟兵団は   基本犬猿の仲なんですよね。）
jpnSearchText:
（あはは……ギルドと猟兵団は
基本犬猿の仲なんですよね。）

engChrName: (But I feel like Feri's better suited for our kind of work.)
engSearchText:
(But I feel like Feri's better suited for our kind
of work.)
jpnChrName: （でもこっちの方がフェリちゃんらしくて   私はいいと思いますよ。）
jpnSearchText:
（でもこっちの方がフェリちゃんらしくて
私はいいと思いますよ。）

engChrName: (At least she's in good company. She's a Kruga, too. Should be okay to leave it alone for now, at least.)
engSearchText:
(At least she's in good company. She's a Kruga, too.
Should be okay to leave it alone for now, at least.)
jpnChrName: （……いい仲間に恵まれているようだねぇ。   それに“クルガ”──ひとまず信用できそうだ。）
jpnSearchText:
（……いい仲間に恵まれているようだねぇ。
それに“クルガ”──ひとまず信用できそうだ。）

engChrName: Getting down to business, we've confirmed movement from both Almata's leaders and from Ouroboros' Enforcers.
engSearchText:
Getting down to business, we've confirmed
movement from both Almata's leaders and from
Ouroboros' Enforcers.
jpnChrName: 諸々の些事はさておき、アルマータの幹部に 結社《身喰らう蛇》の執行者も確認された。
jpnSearchText:
諸々の些事はさておき、アルマータの幹部に
結社《身喰らう蛇》の執行者も確認された。

engChrName: There's been movement from them both in the past few years.
engSearchText:
There's been movement from them both in the past
few years.
jpnChrName: これはここ数年来の動きがありそうだね。 ………ふむ…………
jpnSearchText:
これはここ数年来の動きがありそうだね。
………ふむ…………

engChrName: And we're all aware of Heiyue's movements, so all we need to figure out is how to go about handling the film festival.
engSearchText:
And we're all aware of Heiyue's movements, so all we
need to figure out is how to go about handling the
film festival.
jpnChrName: 黒月方面の動きも確認されているし 例の“新映画祭”の対応も決めなくてはいけない。
jpnSearchText:
黒月方面の動きも確認されているし
例の“新映画祭”の対応も決めなくてはいけない。

engChrName: We'll hold another meeting once Alvis and Regina are back.
engSearchText:
We'll hold another meeting once Alvis and Regina
are back.
jpnChrName: アルヴィスとレジーナが戻ったら 改めてミーティングを開くとしようか。
jpnSearchText:
アルヴィスとレジーナが戻ったら
改めてミーティングを開くとしようか。

engChrName: Well, well! What special occasion brings our famed spriggan and his crew 'round these parts?
engSearchText:
Well, well! What special occasion brings our famed
spriggan and his crew 'round these parts?
jpnChrName: おやおやおや……これは珍しい。 噂の《解決事務所》の子たちじゃないか。
jpnSearchText:
おやおやおや……これは珍しい。
噂の《解決事務所》の子たちじゃないか。

engChrName: Your reputation precedes you, you sly dog.
engSearchText: Your reputation precedes you, you sly dog.
jpnChrName: ふふ、各方面から噂は聞いているよ。 随分と立ち回るのが上手いそうだねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、各方面から噂は聞いているよ。
随分と立ち回るのが上手いそうだねぇ。

engChrName: Look at you, managing to get your way with both criminals AND the CID.
engSearchText:
Look at you, managing to get your way with both
criminals AND the CID.
jpnChrName: 裏の勢力からＣＩＤまで顔が利くのも面白い。
jpnSearchText: 裏の勢力からＣＩＤまで顔が利くのも面白い。

engChrName: Heard you'll be lendin' a hand here. You're no doubt a busy man, but I'd love it if you could handle some stuff here for me.
engSearchText:
Heard you'll be lendin' a hand here. You're no doubt
a busy man, but I'd love it if you could handle some
stuff here for me.
jpnChrName: 加えて今後はウチの仕事も請けてくれるとか── ふふ、色々あるだろうが、一つよろしく頼むよ？
jpnSearchText:
加えて今後はウチの仕事も請けてくれるとか──
ふふ、色々あるだろうが、一つよろしく頼むよ？

engChrName: *sigh* He just couldn't keep quiet, huh...
engSearchText: *sigh* He just couldn't keep quiet, huh...
jpnChrName: ったくあのクマ野郎、 早くも連絡を回してやがったか……
jpnSearchText:
ったくあのクマ野郎、
早くも連絡を回してやがったか……

engChrName: (And then there's this geezer. Keep the grin all you like, old man. Ain't a single bone in my body that trusts you.)
engSearchText:
(And then there's this geezer. Keep the grin all you
like, old man. Ain't a single bone in my body that
trusts you.)
jpnChrName: （しかもこの爺さん、ニコニコしつつ   地味に曲者感がありやがるし……）
jpnSearchText:
（しかもこの爺さん、ニコニコしつつ
地味に曲者感がありやがるし……）

engChrName: (Y-Yeah. He looks kind, but I can't help but feel that there's a shrewd side to him, too...)
engSearchText:
(Y-Yeah. He looks kind, but I can't help but feel
that there's a shrewd side to him, too...)
jpnChrName: （は、はい……穏やかなのに   どこか油断ならない人というか……）
jpnSearchText:
（は、はい……穏やかなのに
どこか油断ならない人というか……）

engChrName: (He's the guild receptionist in the Republic's capital. Can't imagine he's just your run of the mill vet.)
engSearchText:
(He's the guild receptionist in the Republic's capital.
Can't imagine he's just your run of the mill vet.)
jpnChrName: （共和国ギルドの“総支部”受付、か。   ただのベテランじゃなさそうだな……）
jpnSearchText:
（共和国ギルドの“総支部”受付、か。
ただのベテランじゃなさそうだな……）

engChrName: Come on, no need to be so wary. We've been short-staffed for a very long time now, and it's caused us our fair share of problems.
engSearchText:
Come on, no need to be so wary. We've been
short-staffed for a very long time now, and it's caused
us our fair share of problems.
jpnChrName: まあまあ、そう警戒せずとも。 ウチも万年人手不足でねぇ、困っていたんだ。
jpnSearchText:
まあまあ、そう警戒せずとも。
ウチも万年人手不足でねぇ、困っていたんだ。

engChrName: The Bracer Guild has been looking out for the common citizen for at least half a century, but nothing in that time compares to the past few years.
engSearchText:
The Bracer Guild has been looking out for the
common citizen for at least half a century, but
nothing in that time compares to the past few years.
jpnChrName: 《支える籠手》遊撃士協会（ブレイサーギルド）が発足して半世紀だが 近年ほど混沌とした状況は初めての事さ──
jpnSearchText:
《支える籠手》遊撃士協会（ブレイサーギルド）が発足して半世紀だが
近年ほど混沌とした状況は初めての事さ──

engChrName: I'd be grateful if you could join us in supporting the capital's citizenry, not to mention the residents of Calvard as a whole.
engSearchText:
I'd be grateful if you could join us in supporting the
capital's citizenry, not to mention the residents of
Calvard as a whole.
jpnChrName: 首都、そしてカルバードに暮らす人々のために 君たちの力も貸してくれるとありがたいね。
jpnSearchText:
首都、そしてカルバードに暮らす人々のために
君たちの力も貸してくれるとありがたいね。

engChrName: (Can't help but feel he's testin' me a little here... Well, whatever. Guess the extra cash won't hurt.)
engSearchText:
(Can't help but feel he's testin' me a little here...
Well, whatever. Guess the extra cash won't hurt.)
jpnChrName: （若干試されてる気もするが……   まあいい、こっちも適度に稼がせてもらうか。）
jpnSearchText:
（若干試されてる気もするが……
まあいい、こっちも適度に稼がせてもらうか。）

engChrName: Oh, hey. Here to take some work off our hands?
engSearchText: Oh, hey. Here to take some work off our hands?
jpnChrName: よう、お疲れさん。 ウチの仕事を請けにきてくれたのか？
jpnSearchText:
よう、お疲れさん。
ウチの仕事を請けにきてくれたのか？

engChrName: Nope! I just happened to stop by. Lookin' into somethin' else right now that's kinda related.
engSearchText:
Nope! I just happened to stop by. Lookin' into
somethin' else right now that's kinda related.
jpnChrName: 違うっつの……別件のついでに ちょいと顔を出しただけだ。
jpnSearchText:
違うっつの……別件のついでに
ちょいと顔を出しただけだ。

engChrName: Sorry to break it to ya, loverboy, but Elaine's not around right now.
engSearchText:
Sorry to break it to ya, loverboy, but Elaine's not
around right now.
jpnChrName: ふむ、生憎だがエレインは出かけていてねぇ。 期待に沿えず申し訳ないな。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、生憎だがエレインは出かけていてねぇ。
期待に沿えず申し訳ないな。

engChrName: That's not why I'm here either! (Man, I wouldn't wanna deal with you guys on the daily.)
engSearchText:
That's not why I'm here either!
(Man, I wouldn't wanna deal with you guys on
the daily.)
jpnChrName: だから違ーよ！！ （マジでやりづらいな、こいつら……）
jpnSearchText:
だから違ーよ！！
（マジでやりづらいな、こいつら……）

engChrName: Umm... May I ask what you were talking about?
engSearchText: Umm... May I ask what you were talking about?
jpnChrName: えっと、お二人はどんなお話を……？
jpnSearchText: えっと、お二人はどんなお話を……？

engChrName: What were you talking about?
engSearchText: What were you talking about?
jpnChrName: お二人はどんなお話を……？
jpnSearchText: お二人はどんなお話を……？

engChrName: Damn. Age getting to you, chief? Thought you'd be able to hold your own against these two at least.
engSearchText:
Damn. Age getting to you, chief? Thought you'd be
able to hold your own against these two at least.
jpnChrName: 首都のギルドには古狸が二匹ってか。 所長殿には荷が重そうじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
首都のギルドには古狸が二匹ってか。
所長殿には荷が重そうじゃねえか？

engChrName: Zip it, you. Anyway, spill it. What were you talking 'bout?
engSearchText:
Zip it, you. Anyway, spill it. What were you
talking 'bout?
jpnChrName: お前は黙ってろ。 ……で、そっちは何の話をしてたんだ？
jpnSearchText:
お前は黙ってろ。
……で、そっちは何の話をしてたんだ？

engChrName: I just got the final report on the Langport incident.
engSearchText: I just got the final report on the Langport incident.
jpnChrName: ああ、ちょうど煌都方面から 最終的な報告書が届いたんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、ちょうど煌都方面から
最終的な報告書が届いたんだよ。

engChrName: Oh. What's in it?
engSearchText: Oh. What's in it?
jpnChrName: ラングポートの件の……
jpnSearchText: ラングポートの件の……

engChrName: Oh. What's in it?
engSearchText: Oh. What's in it?
jpnChrName: ラングポートの件の……
jpnSearchText: ラングポートの件の……

engChrName: What's the verdict?
engSearchText: What's the verdict?
jpnChrName: 煌都の件の報告書、だと……？
jpnSearchText: 煌都の件の報告書、だと……？

engChrName: There were over twenty casualties.
engSearchText: There were over twenty casualties.
jpnChrName: 最終的な死傷者は２０名以上……
jpnSearchText: 最終的な死傷者は２０名以上……

engChrName: Langport's starting to quiet down, but the whole thing ain't over. The guild still needs to keep a close eye on the situation.
engSearchText:
Langport's starting to quiet down, but the whole
thing ain't over. The guild still needs to keep a close
eye on the situation.
jpnChrName: 煌都は落ち着いたものの、抗争は激化しつつある。 ギルドとしてもこれ以上野放しにはできんが。
jpnSearchText:
煌都は落ち着いたものの、抗争は激化しつつある。
ギルドとしてもこれ以上野放しにはできんが。

engChrName: Yes, but we need to be careful on our end, too.
engSearchText: Yes, but we need to be careful on our end, too.
jpnChrName: うむ、しかし慎重にならざるを得ない 事情もあってねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
うむ、しかし慎重にならざるを得ない
事情もあってねぇ……

engChrName: What're you gettin' at?
engSearchText: What're you gettin' at?
jpnChrName: そいつは、もしかして……
jpnSearchText: そいつは、もしかして……

engChrName: I wish I was exaggerating... The guild and the police have been looking into Almata.
engSearchText:
I wish I was exaggerating... The guild and the police
have been looking into Almata.
jpnChrName: ええ……そしてギルドや警察は ここ数年アルマータを探り続けている。
jpnSearchText:
ええ……そしてギルドや警察は
ここ数年アルマータを探り続けている。

engChrName: I suspect Heiyue, the CID, and other organizations are likely doing the same.
engSearchText:
I suspect Heiyue, the CID, and other organizations
are likely doing the same.
jpnChrName: 多分ＣＩＤも── 恐らく黒月に、他の裏の勢力なども。
jpnSearchText:
多分ＣＩＤも──
恐らく黒月に、他の裏の勢力なども。

engChrName: However, every attempt to probe Almata with undercover agents has ended in failure. Many bracers and police officers have lost their lives.
engSearchText:
However, every attempt to probe Almata with
undercover agents has ended in failure. Many bracers
and police officers have lost their lives.
jpnChrName: でも内偵は悉く失敗し……犠牲になった 遊撃士や捜査官も一人や二人じゃないわ。
jpnSearchText:
でも内偵は悉く失敗し……犠牲になった
遊撃士や捜査官も一人や二人じゃないわ。

engChrName: Some bracers lost their lives, too...
engSearchText: Some bracers lost their lives, too...
jpnChrName: 遊撃士にも犠牲になった方が いらっしゃるんでしたね……
jpnSearchText:
遊撃士にも犠牲になった方が
いらっしゃるんでしたね……

engChrName: There were bracers among the victims as well, right?
engSearchText:
There were bracers among the victims as
well, right?
jpnChrName: 遊撃士にも犠牲になった人が いるんでしたね……
jpnSearchText:
遊撃士にも犠牲になった人が
いるんでしたね……

engChrName: Geez. How long has this beef between the guild and Almata been going on for?
engSearchText:
Geez. How long has this beef between the guild and
Almata been going on for?
jpnChrName: ギルドとアルマータの暗闘…… 何年も前から始まってたって事かよ。
jpnSearchText:
ギルドとアルマータの暗闘……
何年も前から始まってたって事かよ。

engChrName: You probably heard it from Elaine already, but that's why we're short on staff.
engSearchText:
You probably heard it from Elaine already, but that's
why we're short on staff.
jpnChrName: エレインから聞いたか…… まあそういう訳で、人手が足りん。
jpnSearchText:
エレインから聞いたか……
まあそういう訳で、人手が足りん。

engChrName: Don't wanna put any undue pressure on you lot, but cooperatin' wouldn't be a half bad idea if we had the chance.
engSearchText:
Don't wanna put any undue pressure on you lot, but
cooperatin' wouldn't be a half bad idea if we had
the chance.
jpnChrName: お前さんたちに何かを負わせるつもりは無いが、 いざって時は協力し合えると嬉しいぜ。
jpnSearchText:
お前さんたちに何かを負わせるつもりは無いが、
いざって時は協力し合えると嬉しいぜ。

engChrName: Just like Langport, yeah? I might be down.
engSearchText: Just like Langport, yeah? I might be down.
jpnChrName: 煌都の時のように、か。 ……まあ考えておいてやるよ。
jpnSearchText:
煌都の時のように、か。
……まあ考えておいてやるよ。

engChrName: Haha, that's good enough for me. I appreciate it.
engSearchText: Haha, that's good enough for me. I appreciate it.
jpnChrName: ふふ、それでいいさ。 よろしく頼んだよ、諸君。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、それでいいさ。
よろしく頼んだよ、諸君。

engChrName: Hey, Arkride. I owe you one for your help today.
engSearchText: Hey, Arkride. I owe you one for your help today.
jpnChrName: よう、アークライド。 今日は助かったぜ。
jpnSearchText:
よう、アークライド。
今日は助かったぜ。

engChrName: Got a bunch of our eggs in a row now, so we won't be stepping 'round too many eggshells from here on.
engSearchText:
Got a bunch of our eggs in a row now, so we won't be
stepping 'round too many eggshells from here on.
jpnChrName: 色々と状況も整理できたし 今後の対策も立てやすくなるだろう。
jpnSearchText:
色々と状況も整理できたし
今後の対策も立てやすくなるだろう。

engChrName: Maybe it's wishful thinking, but if this was the push that could help us get Almata under control, that'd be great.
engSearchText:
Maybe it's wishful thinking, but if this was the push
that could help us get Almata under control, that'd
be great.
jpnChrName: うむ、これでアルマータも 少しは抑え込めればいいんだが。
jpnSearchText:
うむ、これでアルマータも
少しは抑え込めればいいんだが。

engChrName: You're layin' it on so thick I don't even wanna think of a witty comeback.
engSearchText:
You're layin' it on so thick I don't even wanna think
of a witty comeback.
jpnChrName: ……ツッコミを入れる気も起きねえが……
jpnSearchText: ……ツッコミを入れる気も起きねえが……

engChrName: We helped out with all these punks that have been movin' recently. Far as I'm concerned, the rest ain't my job.
engSearchText:
We helped out with all these punks that have been
movin' recently. Far as I'm concerned, the rest ain't
my job.
jpnChrName: 連動して面倒な連中が動き始めてるのは分かった。 これ以上の面倒事は勘弁だぜ。
jpnSearchText:
連動して面倒な連中が動き始めてるのは分かった。
これ以上の面倒事は勘弁だぜ。

engChrName: Ouch, that's cold. But that's all right, haha. Figures you're looking out for your folks instead.
engSearchText:
Ouch, that's cold. But that's all right, haha.
Figures you're looking out for your folks instead.
jpnChrName: ハハ、つれないねぇ。 ……いや、助手たちの身も案じての事か。
jpnSearchText:
ハハ、つれないねぇ。
……いや、助手たちの身も案じての事か。

engChrName: The CID's all over this mess. Thankfully, that in and of itself might be enough of a deterrent to keep things quiet around town.
engSearchText:
The CID's all over this mess. Thankfully, that in and
of itself might be enough of a deterrent to keep things
quiet around town.
jpnChrName: ＣＩＤの目もある、首都で大事件を 起こす可能性は低いが……
jpnSearchText:
ＣＩＤの目もある、首都で大事件を
起こす可能性は低いが……

engChrName: But there aren't as many eyes keeping careful watch in more rural areas. Take care on that work trip you got next week.
engSearchText:
But there aren't as many eyes keeping careful watch
in more rural areas. Take care on that work trip you
got next week.
jpnChrName: 地方はどうしても手数が減るからねぇ…… 来週の出張も気を付けるんだよ？
jpnSearchText:
地方はどうしても手数が減るからねぇ……
来週の出張も気を付けるんだよ？

engChrName: How the hell do you already know that?!
engSearchText: How the hell do you already know that?!
jpnChrName: ……ってお前らも情報が早すぎだろ！！
jpnSearchText: ……ってお前らも情報が早すぎだろ！！

engChrName: Headquarters back in Leman are also working on this case.
engSearchText:
Headquarters back in Leman are also working on
this case.
jpnChrName: この件に関しては レマン総本部も動いている状況だ。
jpnSearchText:
この件に関しては
レマン総本部も動いている状況だ。

engChrName: We're all working our hardest here. You do the same, Arkride.
engSearchText:
We're all working our hardest here. You do the
same, Arkride.
jpnChrName: 当然俺たちも全力を尽くす。 そっちもしっかりな、アークライド。
jpnSearchText:
当然俺たちも全力を尽くす。
そっちもしっかりな、アークライド。

engChrName: Elaine's working right now, by the way. I feel like she's been working too hard lately.
engSearchText:
Elaine's working right now, by the way. I feel like
she's been working too hard lately.
jpnChrName: そうそう、エレインなら仕事中だぜ。 最近ちょいと根を詰めてるようだな。
jpnSearchText:
そうそう、エレインなら仕事中だぜ。
最近ちょいと根を詰めてるようだな。

engChrName: She's a hard worker, sure, but I wish she'd learn to take it easy from time to time.
engSearchText:
She's a hard worker, sure, but I wish she'd learn to
take it easy from time to time.
jpnChrName: 実力は確かなんだが真面目というか── 少しは息抜きもしてほしいんだがなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
実力は確かなんだが真面目というか──
少しは息抜きもしてほしいんだがなぁ。

engChrName: She definitely needs the free time. You should invite her over for a movie or two!
engSearchText:
She definitely needs the free time. You should invite
her over for a movie or two!
jpnChrName: どうだ、アークライド。 たまには映画にでも誘ってやるのは……
jpnSearchText:
どうだ、アークライド。
たまには映画にでも誘ってやるのは……

engChrName: Haha, did I cross a line there? Sorry! Can tell by just lookin' at you, that's a touchy subject.
engSearchText:
Haha, did I cross a line there? Sorry! Can tell by just
lookin' at you, that's a touchy subject.
jpnChrName: ……っとなんだ、余計な気遣いだったか。 ハッハッハ、お前さんもやるじゃないか！
jpnSearchText:
……っとなんだ、余計な気遣いだったか。
ハッハッハ、お前さんもやるじゃないか！

engChrName: Y'all gotta cut it out! Elaine's probably tired of this shit, too.
engSearchText:
Y'all gotta cut it out! Elaine's probably tired of this
shit, too.
jpnChrName: うるせーっての！ お前絶対エレインにもウザがられてんだろ！
jpnSearchText:
うるせーっての！
お前絶対エレインにもウザがられてんだろ！

engChrName: Ain't none of your business.
engSearchText: Ain't none of your business.
jpnChrName: 余計なお世話だっつーの！
jpnSearchText: 余計なお世話だっつーの！

engChrName: Hazel and I have been talking about personnel distribution.
engSearchText:
Hazel and I have been talking about
personnel distribution.
jpnChrName: 人員の割り振りについては ヘイゼルさんと俺で相談して決めていてな。
jpnSearchText:
人員の割り振りについては
ヘイゼルさんと俺で相談して決めていてな。

engChrName: Elaine's been doing a great job keeping up with all her work, even on top of everything else popping up. Doing a bang-up job as a newbie A-rank.
engSearchText:
Elaine's been doing a great job keeping up with all
her work, even on top of everything else popping up.
Doing a bang-up job as a newbie A-rank.
jpnChrName: Ａ級に上がったエレインも上手く回しつつ どうにか対処してきたのも確かなんだが……
jpnSearchText:
Ａ級に上がったエレインも上手く回しつつ
どうにか対処してきたのも確かなんだが……

engChrName: But I don't think she should be handling all of this all alone. Ideally, multiple people would be tackling these things together.
engSearchText:
But I don't think she should be handling all of this
all alone. Ideally, multiple people would be tackling
these things together.
jpnChrName: 連中だけに人手を割くわけにもいかなくてな。 いざって時は協力し合えると嬉しいぜ。
jpnSearchText:
連中だけに人手を割くわけにもいかなくてな。
いざって時は協力し合えると嬉しいぜ。

engChrName: While we can't afford to ignore Ouroboros right now, Almata's our priority.
engSearchText:
While we can't afford to ignore Ouroboros right now,
Almata's our priority.
jpnChrName: 《結社》の方も捨てちゃおけんが…… 現時点ではアルマータの方が優先だろう。
jpnSearchText:
《結社》の方も捨てちゃおけんが……
現時点ではアルマータの方が優先だろう。

engChrName: There are other things I wish I could look into, but I'm really busy, too...
engSearchText:
There are other things I wish I could look into, but
I'm really busy, too...
jpnChrName: 他にも気になる動きはいくつかあるが…… ふう、とても俺一人じゃ探り切れんなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
他にも気になる動きはいくつかあるが……
ふう、とても俺一人じゃ探り切れんなぁ。

engChrName: I'm counting on you guys, too. Don't disappoint!
engSearchText: I'm counting on you guys, too. Don't disappoint!
jpnChrName: お前さんたちにも期待させてくれ。 よろしく頼むぜ！
jpnSearchText:
お前さんたちにも期待させてくれ。
よろしく頼むぜ！

engChrName: Almata's funds are coming from this organization they're contracting with. I need to look into it further...
engSearchText:
Almata's funds are coming from this organization
they're contracting with. I need to look into
it further...
jpnChrName: アルマータと“契約”している組織に 資金源……私の方でも探ってはみるけれど……
jpnSearchText:
アルマータと“契約”している組織に
資金源……私の方でも探ってはみるけれど……

engChrName: And you. You need to be more careful.
engSearchText: And you. You need to be more careful.
jpnChrName: ふう、貴方たちも十分に気を付けて。
jpnSearchText: ふう、貴方たちも十分に気を付けて。

engChrName: It won't take much snooping on your part for you to paint a target on your back.
engSearchText:
It won't take much snooping on your part for you to
paint a target on your back.
jpnChrName: こうも立て続けに関わったとなると 目をつけられる可能性もあるわ。
jpnSearchText:
こうも立て続けに関わったとなると
目をつけられる可能性もあるわ。

engChrName: By the time you realize it, it'll already be too late. Be sure to talk to the guild before you do anything reckless. Understood?
engSearchText:
By the time you realize it, it'll already be too late.
Be sure to talk to the guild before you do
anything reckless. Understood?
jpnChrName: 何かあってからでは遅いのよ。 そうなる前にギルドに相談して、いいわね？
jpnSearchText:
何かあってからでは遅いのよ。
そうなる前にギルドに相談して、いいわね？

engChrName: You need to be more on guard, you know.
engSearchText: You need to be more on guard, you know.
jpnChrName: ……ともかく、貴方は もう少ししゃきっとしなさい。
jpnSearchText:
……ともかく、貴方は
もう少ししゃきっとしなさい。

engChrName: Aidios, you are always so careless. Are all men like this, or just you? I don't care if this is just how you do things, but you need to be careful...
engSearchText:
Aidios, you are always so careless. Are all men like
this, or just you? I don't care if this is just how you do
things, but you need to be careful...
jpnChrName: 流儀だか何だか知らないけど…… 男っていつもそう……ぶつぶつ……
jpnSearchText:
流儀だか何だか知らないけど……
男っていつもそう……ぶつぶつ……

engChrName: (Better make myself scarce. Not in the mood for a lecture today.)
engSearchText:
(Better make myself scarce. Not in the mood for a
lecture today.)
jpnChrName: （ヤレヤレ……絡まれる前に退散すっか。）
jpnSearchText: （ヤレヤレ……絡まれる前に退散すっか。）

engChrName: I have a rough idea of what's going on, but it's still not fully adding up.
engSearchText:
I have a rough idea of what's going on, but it's still
not fully adding up.
jpnChrName: 大雑把にだけど状況は把握したわ。 腑に落ちない点もあるけれど……
jpnSearchText:
大雑把にだけど状況は把握したわ。
腑に落ちない点もあるけれど……

engChrName: *sigh* We need to be careful when dealing with Almata.
engSearchText:
*sigh* We need to be careful when dealing
with Almata.
jpnChrName: アルマータが関与している以上 私たちも慎重に動かざるを得ない。
jpnSearchText:
アルマータが関与している以上
私たちも慎重に動かざるを得ない。

engChrName: Still, can't afford to rest on my laurels. I'll take advantage of Alvis and Regina filling in for me on that trip to look into things further.
engSearchText:
Still, can't afford to rest on my laurels. I'll take
advantage of Alvis and Regina filling in for me on
that trip to look into things further.
jpnChrName: ……アルヴィス君とレジーナが出張を 代わってくれた分、少し探ってみるけれど……
jpnSearchText:
……アルヴィス君とレジーナが出張を
代わってくれた分、少し探ってみるけれど……

engChrName: I'd appreciate it if you guys kept your heads low in the meantime. And Van? Let us know if something comes up.
engSearchText:
I'd appreciate it if you guys kept your heads low in
the meantime. And Van? Let us know if something
comes up.
jpnChrName: ともかく、貴方たちも滅多な真似はしない事。 ヴァン、連絡はつくようにしておきなさい。
jpnSearchText:
ともかく、貴方たちも滅多な真似はしない事。
ヴァン、連絡はつくようにしておきなさい。

engChrName: Yeah, yeah.
engSearchText: Yeah, yeah.
jpnChrName: へいへい、分かってるっつの。
jpnSearchText: へいへい、分かってるっつの。

engChrName: The guild's policies are firm. We know what to do. We just have to wait for the right moment.
engSearchText:
The guild's policies are firm. We know what to do.
We just have to wait for the right moment.
jpnChrName: とにかくギルドの方針は決まってる。 状況が整い次第、動くつもり。
jpnSearchText:
とにかくギルドの方針は決まってる。
状況が整い次第、動くつもり。

engChrName: I imagine we're not the only ones on the move. Some of our associates might be on the move already, so we need to coordinate with them.
engSearchText:
I imagine we're not the only ones on the move.
Some of our associates might be on the move already,
so we need to coordinate with them.
jpnChrName: “ツテ”の方も動き出してるはず── 上手く連携していかないとね。
jpnSearchText:
“ツテ”の方も動き出してるはず──
上手く連携していかないとね。

engChrName: I'm worried about Elaine, but I'll trust you to take care of her.
engSearchText:
I'm worried about Elaine, but I'll trust you to take
care of her.
jpnChrName: エレインはちょっと心配だけど、 そっちはヴァンたちに任せようかな。
jpnSearchText:
エレインはちょっと心配だけど、
そっちはヴァンたちに任せようかな。

engChrName: I'm not her nanny, you know. But fine. I'll keep an eye out for her.
engSearchText:
I'm not her nanny, you know. But fine. I'll keep an
eye out for her.
jpnChrName: おい──ってツッコミたい所だが、 仕方ねえ、見かけたら声くらい掛けてやる。
jpnSearchText:
おい──ってツッコミたい所だが、
仕方ねえ、見かけたら声くらい掛けてやる。

engChrName: Huh. Guess Van's the shy type, too.
engSearchText: Huh. Guess Van's the shy type, too.
jpnChrName: ……そっか、ヴァンも ツンデレ属性だったとは。
jpnSearchText:
……そっか、ヴァンも
ツンデレ属性だったとは。

engChrName: I dunno what you're on about, but quit it.
engSearchText: I dunno what you're on about, but quit it.
jpnChrName: 誰がツンデレだ、誰が！！
jpnSearchText: 誰がツンデレだ、誰が！！

engChrName: Hey, Van. Don't see you around often.
engSearchText: Hey, Van. Don't see you around often.
jpnChrName: あれ、ヴァンだ。 ここで会うのは珍しいね。
jpnSearchText:
あれ、ヴァンだ。
ここで会うのは珍しいね。

engChrName: I only swing by every now and then to check up on things.
engSearchText:
I only swing by every now and then to check up
on things.
jpnChrName: ま、俺の方はたまに 様子を探りに来るくらいだからな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、俺の方はたまに
様子を探りに来るくらいだからな。

engChrName: I guess Elaine's not around? I see Zin's back...
engSearchText: I guess Elaine's not around? I see Zin's back...
jpnChrName: エレインはいねぇようだな？ ヴァセックは下に戻ってたようだが……
jpnSearchText:
エレインはいねぇようだな？
ヴァセックは下に戻ってたようだが……

engChrName: You don't need to be coy, you know.
engSearchText: You don't need to be coy, you know.
jpnChrName: そんなにコソコソしなくても いいと思うけど。
jpnSearchText:
そんなにコソコソしなくても
いいと思うけど。

engChrName: I know you and Elaine have something going on, but I didn't know you and Zin didn't get along.
engSearchText:
I know you and Elaine have something going on, but
I didn't know you and Zin didn't get along.
jpnChrName: エレインとは訳アリなのは分かるけど ジンのことも苦手なんだ？
jpnSearchText:
エレインとは訳アリなのは分かるけど
ジンのことも苦手なんだ？

engChrName: I always found him easy to be around.
engSearchText: I always found him easy to be around.
jpnChrName: かなり付き合いやすいタイプじゃない？
jpnSearchText: かなり付き合いやすいタイプじゃない？

engChrName: I mean, he is. But he's nosy. Even if I try to stay distant, it's like he sees right through me.
engSearchText:
I mean, he is. But he's nosy. Even if I try to stay
distant, it's like he sees right through me.
jpnChrName: 同感だが、飄々としてるクセに話してると 見透かされる気分になるっつーか……
jpnSearchText:
同感だが、飄々としてるクセに話してると
見透かされる気分になるっつーか……

engChrName: Well, I guess he also reminds me of someone I used to know...
engSearchText:
Well, I guess he also reminds me of someone I used
to know...
jpnChrName: ……昔の知り合いにちょいと 似てやがるのが理由かもしれねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
……昔の知り合いにちょいと
似てやがるのが理由かもしれねぇ。

engChrName: Huh. Zin really likes you, though.
engSearchText: Huh. Zin really likes you, though.
jpnChrName: ふーん？　ジンの方はヴァンのこと 随分と買ってるみたいだけど。
jpnSearchText:
ふーん？　ジンの方はヴァンのこと
随分と買ってるみたいだけど。

engChrName: You two went to the Blacklight District earlier today, yeah? He was talking about asking you for help again later.
engSearchText:
You two went to the Blacklight District earlier
today, yeah? He was talking about asking you for help
again later.
jpnChrName: 今日も一緒に黒芒街に行ったんだよね？ 『いずれまた頼むか』とか言ってたけど。
jpnSearchText:
今日も一緒に黒芒街に行ったんだよね？
『いずれまた頼むか』とか言ってたけど。

engChrName: The big-mouthed idiot...
engSearchText: The big-mouthed idiot...
jpnChrName: あ、あの熊野郎……
jpnSearchText: あ、あの熊野郎……

engChrName: At least Elaine and Sara are easier on the eyes than he is. The better looking A-rank bracers.
engSearchText:
At least Elaine and Sara are easier on the eyes than
he is. The better looking A-rank bracers.
jpnChrName: 同じＡ級でもエレインやサラの姐御の方が まだ可愛げがあるってもんだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
同じＡ級でもエレインやサラの姐御の方が
まだ可愛げがあるってもんだぜ。

engChrName: Now that you mention it, you know Sara and Toval, yeah?
engSearchText:
Now that you mention it, you know Sara and
Toval, yeah?
jpnChrName: ああ、そういえばサラや トヴァルとも知り合いなんだっけ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、そういえばサラや
トヴァルとも知り合いなんだっけ。

engChrName: When did you meet them? Operation Jormungandr? Or was it for the Northern War?
engSearchText:
When did you meet them? Operation Jormungandr?
Or was it for the Northern War?
jpnChrName: 《大地の竜》──ううん、 《北方戦役》の前後とは聞いてるけど。
jpnSearchText:
《大地の竜》──ううん、
《北方戦役》の前後とは聞いてるけど。

engChrName: Yeah. I helped sniff around for an infiltration route from here in Calvard.
engSearchText:
Yeah. I helped sniff around for an infiltration route
from here in Calvard.
jpnChrName: ま、共和国方面からの潜入ルートの 割り出しに協力したことがあってな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、共和国方面からの潜入ルートの
割り出しに協力したことがあってな。

engChrName: Toval's pretty easy to get along with. He's flawed, but he knows his business and makes sure to stick with it. Made negotiations real easy.
engSearchText:
Toval's pretty easy to get along with. He's flawed, but
he knows his business and makes sure to stick with it.
Made negotiations real easy.
jpnChrName: ランドナーなんかもそうらしいが、 お互い訳アリな分、話が早くて助かったぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ランドナーなんかもそうらしいが、
お互い訳アリな分、話が早くて助かったぜ。

engChrName: Haha, I got my own fair share of flaws, too.
engSearchText: Haha, I got my own fair share of flaws, too.
jpnChrName: ふふ、訳アリって言うなら わたしも負けず劣らずだとは思うけど。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、訳アリって言うなら
わたしも負けず劣らずだとは思うけど。
