engChrName: Are you interested in meeting the Divine Blade of Wind or the Lieutenant General of the Royal Army of Liberl?
engSearchText:
Are you interested in meeting the Divine Blade of
Wind or the Lieutenant General of the Royal Army
of Liberl?
jpnChrName: 折角だし《風の剣聖》とか リベール王国軍総司令も紹介しようか？
jpnSearchText:
折角だし《風の剣聖》とか
リベール王国軍総司令も紹介しようか？

engChrName: I'm sure they're both really impressive, but I'm gonna pass on that one.
engSearchText:
I'm sure they're both really impressive, but I'm gonna
pass on that one.
jpnChrName: 謹んでお断りさせてもらうぜ。 つーかどちらも化物クラスだろうが……
jpnSearchText:
謹んでお断りさせてもらうぜ。
つーかどちらも化物クラスだろうが……

engChrName: There's a lot going on in here. I'm busier than I was back in Erebonia.
engSearchText:
There's a lot going on in here. I'm busier than I was
back in Erebonia.
jpnChrName: それにしても確かに仕事は増えてるね。 忙しさは帝国にいた時以上かも。
jpnSearchText:
それにしても確かに仕事は増えてるね。
忙しさは帝国にいた時以上かも。

engChrName: Got three more reports to write for Hazel. Wanna help?
engSearchText:
Got three more reports to write for Hazel.
Wanna help?
jpnChrName: ヘイゼル爺さんへの報告書もあと３つ、 一つくらい手伝っていかない？
jpnSearchText:
ヘイゼル爺さんへの報告書もあと３つ、
一つくらい手伝っていかない？

engChrName: I'm not even from the guild! Man, you're lazy.
engSearchText: I'm not even from the guild! Man, you're lazy.
jpnChrName: 部外者を使うんじゃねえ。 さてはお前、結構なモノグサだな？
jpnSearchText:
部外者を使うんじゃねえ。
さてはお前、結構なモノグサだな？

engChrName: You got me.
engSearchText: You got me.
jpnChrName: バレたか。
jpnSearchText: バレたか。

engChrName: I've known Elaine for a while now, but you can always learn something new.
engSearchText:
I've known Elaine for a while now, but you can
always learn something new.
jpnChrName: ふふ、エレインとは前から面識あったけど ちょっと面白いものが見れたかな。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、エレインとは前から面識あったけど
ちょっと面白いものが見れたかな。

engChrName: It's fine. I'm not gonna tease you about it.
engSearchText: It's fine. I'm not gonna tease you about it.
jpnChrName: まあからかうのはこれくらいにしておくけど……
jpnSearchText: まあからかうのはこれくらいにしておくけど……

engChrName: I'll be staying in the Republic for a while now that I'm here. So, catch you around.
engSearchText:
I'll be staying in the Republic for a while now that
I'm here. So, catch you around.
jpnChrName: 着任した以上、しばらくは共和国（こっち）にいるつもり。 またかち合ったらよろしくね、裏解決屋さん。
jpnSearchText:
着任した以上、しばらくは共和国（こっち）にいるつもり。
またかち合ったらよろしくね、裏解決屋さん。

engChrName: I'll take the guild's car around the neighboring districts.
engSearchText:
I'll take the guild's car around the
neighboring districts.
jpnChrName: ギルドの車は動かせそうだからな。 これで近隣の街区を順に回るつもりだ。
jpnSearchText:
ギルドの車は動かせそうだからな。
これで近隣の街区を順に回るつもりだ。

engChrName: Zin and Elaine are doing their own stuff.
engSearchText: Zin and Elaine are doing their own stuff.
jpnChrName: ジンさんやエレインさんも 必ず独自に動いているはず──
jpnSearchText:
ジンさんやエレインさんも
必ず独自に動いているはず──

engChrName: And I take it you guys are on your way out, too. Hmph, do your best!
engSearchText:
And I take it you guys are on your way out, too.
Hmph, do your best!
jpnChrName: お前たちも動き始めるようだな？ フン、しっかりやれよ！
jpnSearchText:
お前たちも動き始めるようだな？
フン、しっかりやれよ！

engChrName: Right back at ya.
engSearchText: Right back at ya.
jpnChrName: ああ、そっちもな！
jpnSearchText: ああ、そっちもな！

engChrName: I wish you the best of luck in your endeavors. Let us meet again.
engSearchText:
I wish you the best of luck in your endeavors. Let us
meet again.
jpnChrName: どうかご武運を。 またお会いいたしましょう。
jpnSearchText:
どうかご武運を。
またお会いいたしましょう。

engChrName: Hmph. Not a fan of Marduk, but I guess we can count on them to fight with us this time.
engSearchText:
Hmph. Not a fan of Marduk, but I guess we can
count on them to fight with us this time.
jpnChrName: フン、ＭＫ社の連中は気に食わないが…… この際戦力としては当て込ませてもらう。
jpnSearchText:
フン、ＭＫ社の連中は気に食わないが……
この際戦力としては当て込ませてもらう。

engChrName: We'll get the grip of things, one way or the other.
engSearchText: We'll get the grip of things, one way or the other.
jpnChrName: どうにか立て直して 状況だけでも掴まないとな……
jpnSearchText:
どうにか立て直して
状況だけでも掴まないとな……

engChrName: The ball's in you guys' court now. You better pull through for us!
engSearchText:
The ball's in you guys' court now. You better pull
through for us!
jpnChrName: お前たちも調査の方は任せたぞ。 必ず突破口を掴んで来い！
jpnSearchText:
お前たちも調査の方は任せたぞ。
必ず突破口を掴んで来い！

engChrName: Heh, we will.
engSearchText: Heh, we will.
jpnChrName: ハッ、言わずもがなだぜ。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、言わずもがなだぜ。

engChrName: We're still dealing with the incident's aftermath, too.
engSearchText: We're still dealing with the incident's aftermath, too.
jpnChrName: 俺たちも例の事後処理に回っている所だ。
jpnSearchText: 俺たちも例の事後処理に回っている所だ。

engChrName: Things are calming down now, but Elaine's still not back...
engSearchText:
Things are calming down now, but Elaine's still
not back...
jpnChrName: さすがに落ち着いては来たが、 エレインさんはまだ戻っていないしな……
jpnSearchText:
さすがに落ち着いては来たが、
エレインさんはまだ戻っていないしな……

engChrName: Regina's still being optimistic about it, so I'll follow her example. We have to do all we can to help out.
engSearchText:
Regina's still being optimistic about it, so I'll follow
her example. We have to do all we can to help out.
jpnChrName: レジーナも気合が入ってるみたいだ。 俺たちが肩代わりできる所は力にならなくちゃな！
jpnSearchText:
レジーナも気合が入ってるみたいだ。
俺たちが肩代わりできる所は力にならなくちゃな！

engChrName: I was the one assigned to oversee Gray's training.
engSearchText: I was the one assigned to oversee Gray's training.
jpnChrName: 実は一番最初にグレイの 研修を担当したのは俺なんだ。
jpnSearchText:
実は一番最初にグレイの
研修を担当したのは俺なんだ。

engChrName: He's improved a lot since I last saw him. Makes me feel proud.
engSearchText:
He's improved a lot since I last saw him. Makes me
feel proud.
jpnChrName: ……しばらく見ない内に立派になったような…… コホン、なんというか感慨深いものがあるな……
jpnSearchText:
……しばらく見ない内に立派になったような……
コホン、なんというか感慨深いものがあるな……

engChrName: He's still got a ways to go, but he'll hopefully keep it up.
engSearchText:
He's still got a ways to go, but he'll hopefully keep
it up.
jpnChrName: 実力はまだまだだし、難しい情勢もあるが グレイなりにしっかり成長して欲しいよな。
jpnSearchText:
実力はまだまだだし、難しい情勢もあるが
グレイなりにしっかり成長して欲しいよな。

engChrName: Might be he needs some more training on top of his current workload. Or... Nah, I need to give him a bigger workload, too.
engSearchText:
Might be he needs some more training on top of his
current workload. Or... Nah, I need to give him a
bigger workload, too.
jpnChrName: 仕事の合間の鍛錬を増やして…… いや、仕事ももう少し増やしてみるか。
jpnSearchText:
仕事の合間の鍛錬を増やして……
いや、仕事ももう少し増やしてみるか。

engChrName: I can't let Ewan outdo me! Not when Elaine's approval is on the line.
engSearchText:
I can't let Ewan outdo me! Not when Elaine's
approval is on the line.
jpnChrName: ユアンに置いて行かれるわけにはいかないし、 早くエレインさんに認めてもらうためにも──
jpnSearchText:
ユアンに置いて行かれるわけにはいかないし、
早くエレインさんに認めてもらうためにも──

engChrName: (*sigh* I don't get why you're working so hard for her.)
engSearchText:
(*sigh* I don't get why you're working so hard
for her.)
jpnChrName: （ふう……一体誰のために頑張ってるんだか。）
jpnSearchText: （ふう……一体誰のために頑張ってるんだか。）

engChrName: We're heading out on a work trip.
engSearchText: We're heading out on a work trip.
jpnChrName: 俺たちはこれから出張に向かうが……
jpnSearchText: 俺たちはこれから出張に向かうが……

engChrName: So don't you dare cause any trouble while we're out! I'm enacting a strict no mischief policy from here on!
engSearchText:
So don't you dare cause any trouble while we're out!
I'm enacting a strict no mischief policy from here on!
jpnChrName: 留守の間に面倒事は起こすなよ！？ 胡乱な真似も今後一切認めないからな！！
jpnSearchText:
留守の間に面倒事は起こすなよ！？
胡乱な真似も今後一切認めないからな！！

engChrName: (Ah, the energy of youth.)
engSearchText: (Ah, the energy of youth.)
jpnChrName: （クク、若造ってのは元気だねェ～。）
jpnSearchText: （クク、若造ってのは元気だねェ～。）

engChrName: (I could've sworn they were around the same age...)
engSearchText: (I could've sworn they were around the same age...)
jpnChrName: （ヴァンさんも歳はそんなに変わらないような……）
jpnSearchText: （ヴァンさんも歳はそんなに変わらないような……）

engChrName: *sigh* Got another work trip coming up. I couldn't say no, but I really don't have the time to relax lately.
engSearchText:
*sigh* Got another work trip coming up. I couldn't
say no, but I really don't have the time to relax lately.
jpnChrName: ふう、また出張か……カッコつけて引き受けて しまったが、近頃休む間がないというか……
jpnSearchText:
ふう、また出張か……カッコつけて引き受けて
しまったが、近頃休む間がないというか……

engChrName: Hold up. I know you guys!
engSearchText: Hold up. I know you guys!
jpnChrName: ってお前……いや、君たちは！
jpnSearchText: ってお前……いや、君たちは！

engChrName: You're the bracer we met in Creil Village...
engSearchText: You're the bracer we met in Creil Village...
jpnChrName: クレイユ村でお会いした遊撃士の……
jpnSearchText: クレイユ村でお会いした遊撃士の……

engChrName: Alvis, yeah? Looks like the guild's real busy right now.
engSearchText:
Alvis, yeah? Looks like the guild's real busy
right now.
jpnChrName: アルヴィスだったか。 いや～、遊撃士サマはお忙しいねぇ？
jpnSearchText:
アルヴィスだったか。
いや～、遊撃士サマはお忙しいねぇ？

engChrName: Yeah, we are! And it's no thanks to you and that interview!
engSearchText:
Yeah, we are! And it's no thanks to you and
that interview!
jpnChrName: くっ、どの口が……！　大体あの後の 聴取も何かと誤魔化しやがって……！
jpnSearchText:
くっ、どの口が……！　大体あの後の
聴取も何かと誤魔化しやがって……！

engChrName: Ohh. You must be that shady guy Alvis keeps going on about.
engSearchText:
Ohh. You must be that shady guy Alvis keeps going
on about.
jpnChrName: ふーん、アルヴィスの言ってた “胡散臭い男”って、貴方の事だったのね。
jpnSearchText:
ふーん、アルヴィスの言ってた
“胡散臭い男”って、貴方の事だったのね。

engChrName: Regina...
engSearchText: Regina...
jpnChrName: レジーナ……
jpnSearchText: レジーナ……

engChrName: Calm down, Alvis. You always get worked up so easy.
engSearchText: Calm down, Alvis. You always get worked up so easy.
jpnChrName: すぐ熱くならないの。 悪い癖よ、アルヴィス。
jpnSearchText:
すぐ熱くならないの。
悪い癖よ、アルヴィス。

engChrName: I did get a brief rundown on the incident. You guys sure know how to keep a cool head under pressure.
engSearchText:
I did get a brief rundown on the incident. You guys
sure know how to keep a cool head under pressure.
jpnChrName: 一通りの経緯は聞いているけど、 危機管理能力は大したものみたいだし。
jpnSearchText:
一通りの経緯は聞いているけど、
危機管理能力は大したものみたいだし。

engChrName: If you're down for it, I'm sure we could make some space for you in the team! Zin would definitely be thrilled.
engSearchText:
If you're down for it, I'm sure we could make some
space for you in the team! Zin would definitely
be thrilled.
jpnChrName: 冷静に考えれば力を借りる余地はあるはず。 ……だからこそジンさんも認めているんでしょ？
jpnSearchText:
冷静に考えれば力を借りる余地はあるはず。
……だからこそジンさんも認めているんでしょ？

engChrName: I won't!
engSearchText: I won't!
jpnChrName: ぐっ、それはそうだが……
jpnSearchText: ぐっ、それはそうだが……

engChrName: If you're gonna continue to work with the guild, I won't tolerate any more monkey business! Got it?
engSearchText:
If you're gonna continue to work with the guild, I
won't tolerate any more monkey business! Got it?
jpnChrName: ──いいか、今後もギルドに関わる以上 胡乱な真似は一切認めないからな！！
jpnSearchText:
──いいか、今後もギルドに関わる以上
胡乱な真似は一切認めないからな！！

engChrName: (He's still pretty mad about things.)
engSearchText: (He's still pretty mad about things.)
jpnChrName: （う～ん、相変わらずみたいです……）
jpnSearchText: （う～ん、相変わらずみたいです……）

engChrName: (Sure is. Though he's no pushover.)
engSearchText: (Sure is. Though he's no pushover.)
jpnChrName: （惜しいねぇ、腕は悪くないんだが。）
jpnSearchText: （惜しいねぇ、腕は悪くないんだが。）

engChrName: *sigh* I swear... Anyway, I hope we'll get to keep working together, Arkride.
engSearchText:
*sigh* I swear... Anyway, I hope we'll get to keep
working together, Arkride.
jpnChrName: まったくもう……ともかく 今後ともよろしくね、裏解決屋さんたち。
jpnSearchText:
まったくもう……ともかく
今後ともよろしくね、裏解決屋さんたち。

engChrName: I can't believe it! Ewan's getting promoted to B-rank before me!
engSearchText:
I can't believe it! Ewan's getting promoted to B-rank
before me!
jpnChrName: くっ、まさか先にユアンが Ｂ級に昇格するなんてな……！
jpnSearchText:
くっ、まさか先にユアンが
Ｂ級に昇格するなんてな……！

engChrName: Damn it! Losing to your rival blows... No, no! I need to turn this around! It's my time to catch up! No—I'll surpass him!
engSearchText:
Damn it! Losing to your rival blows... No, no! I need
to turn this around! It's my time to catch up! No—I'll
surpass him!
jpnChrName: あいつとはずっとライバルだった分 負けた気がするというか……いや、俺だってすぐに！
jpnSearchText:
あいつとはずっとライバルだった分
負けた気がするというか……いや、俺だってすぐに！

engChrName: Come on, Alvis. Calm down. Promotion isn't a race.
engSearchText: Come on, Alvis. Calm down. Promotion isn't a race.
jpnChrName: はいはい、落ち着きなさい。 別に競うものでもないでしょ、昇格なんて。
jpnSearchText:
はいはい、落ち着きなさい。
別に競うものでもないでしょ、昇格なんて。

engChrName: The Oración branch has been dealing with a lot lately. His promotion is probably because of all the work he did there.
engSearchText:
The Oración branch has been dealing with a lot
lately. His promotion is probably because of all the
work he did there.
jpnChrName: オラシオン支部はトラブルも多いから 自然と成果を上げたって所も大きいでしょうし。
jpnSearchText:
オラシオン支部はトラブルも多いから
自然と成果を上げたって所も大きいでしょうし。

engChrName: Yeah, I know... Still...
engSearchText: Yeah, I know... Still...
jpnChrName: うーん、分かってはいるんだが……
jpnSearchText: うーん、分かってはいるんだが……

engChrName: Renton's pretty much the only one I got left on par with me, but he's been making good progress, too.
engSearchText:
Renton's pretty much the only one I got left on par
with me, but he's been making good progress, too.
jpnChrName: 俺たちの世代で言うと、あとはレントンか。 あいつも近頃腕を上げてるようだが──
jpnSearchText:
俺たちの世代で言うと、あとはレントンか。
あいつも近頃腕を上げてるようだが──

engChrName: There's also the new recruit, too.
engSearchText: There's also the new recruit, too.
jpnChrName: ……それと新しく赴任してきた “彼女”の実力、でしょ？
jpnSearchText:
……それと新しく赴任してきた
“彼女”の実力、でしょ？

engChrName: She might be younger than me, but she's already a B-rank. I could learn a lot from her.
engSearchText:
She might be younger than me, but she's already
a B-rank. I could learn a lot from her.
jpnChrName: 私たちより年下で、既にＢ級── 色々と学べることがありそうね。
jpnSearchText:
私たちより年下で、既にＢ級──
色々と学べることがありそうね。

engChrName: Yeah. I need to step up my game. Need to train harder!
engSearchText:
Yeah. I need to step up my game. Need to
train harder!
jpnChrName: ああ、俺ももっと腕を上げたい。 精進していかないとな……！
jpnSearchText:
ああ、俺ももっと腕を上げたい。
精進していかないとな……！

engChrName: Is that right? Anyway, I'm glad everything went off without a hitch.
engSearchText:
Is that right? Anyway, I'm glad everything went off
without a hitch.
jpnChrName: そうか──ともかく無事に 依頼が達成できたのは良かった。
jpnSearchText:
そうか──ともかく無事に
依頼が達成できたのは良かった。

engChrName: I wasn't expecting monsters to show up, though... Make sure to record everything in your notebook before reporting back to me.
engSearchText:
I wasn't expecting monsters to show up, though...
Make sure to record everything in your notebook
before reporting back to me.
jpnChrName: ただ魔獣が湧いたのは想定外だったな。 細かい事も手帳に記録して、報告するように。
jpnSearchText:
ただ魔獣が湧いたのは想定外だったな。
細かい事も手帳に記録して、報告するように。

engChrName: Understood. It also gives me the chance to let today just really sink in.
engSearchText:
Understood. It also gives me the chance to let today
just really sink in.
jpnChrName: 分かりました── 今日の事は自分でも振り返りたいですし。
jpnSearchText:
分かりました──
今日の事は自分でも振り返りたいですし。

engChrName: Life's never gonna go as expected, so things coming out of nowhere now will only help to prepare me for later!
engSearchText:
Life's never gonna go as expected, so things coming
out of nowhere now will only help to prepare me
for later!
jpnChrName: 沢山の想定外を経験して、 想定内にできるよう努力します！
jpnSearchText:
沢山の想定外を経験して、
想定内にできるよう努力します！

engChrName: Haha, that's the spirit!
engSearchText: Haha, that's the spirit!
jpnChrName: ははっ、その意気だ！
jpnSearchText: ははっ、その意気だ！

engChrName: Huh. Must be a special day if you two are comin' in together.
engSearchText:
Huh. Must be a special day if you two are comin'
in together.
jpnChrName: なんだなんだァ？　二人して出迎えとは お安くねえじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
なんだなんだァ？　二人して出迎えとは
お安くねえじゃねえか。

engChrName: Good work today, Lahad. But dang it! We do NOT have that sorta relationship!
engSearchText:
Good work today, Lahad. But dang it! We do NOT
have that sorta relationship!
jpnChrName: お疲れ様です、ラハドさん。 私タチ別ニソウイウ関係ジャアリマセンカラ。
jpnSearchText:
お疲れ様です、ラハドさん。
私タチ別ニソウイウ関係ジャアリマセンカラ。

engChrName: Haha, calm down there. Don't get all up in my case about it. Not what I was implying.
engSearchText:
Haha, calm down there. Don't get all up in my case
about it. Not what I was implying.
jpnChrName: クック、片言になってんぞ。 そういう意味でもなかったんだがな～。
jpnSearchText:
クック、片言になってんぞ。
そういう意味でもなかったんだがな～。

engChrName: I don't know what you two are on about, but I'd also like to thank you for your work in Messeldam today.
engSearchText:
I don't know what you two are on about, but I'd also
like to thank you for your work in Messeldam today.
jpnChrName: ？？　よく分かりませんが メッセルダム方面の事後処理、お疲れ様でした。
jpnSearchText:
？？　よく分かりませんが
メッセルダム方面の事後処理、お疲れ様でした。

engChrName: We're on our way to a work trip. We'll be back later tonight, so the capital's all yours for today.
engSearchText:
We're on our way to a work trip. We'll be back later
tonight, so the capital's all yours for today.
jpnChrName: 俺たちはこれから出張で── 夜には戻りますが、首都をお願いします！
jpnSearchText:
俺たちはこれから出張で──
夜には戻りますが、首都をお願いします！

engChrName: All right. I'll keep an eye on the capital's outskirts, just to be safe. Don't worry so much, and take things easy out there.
engSearchText:
All right. I'll keep an eye on the capital's outskirts,
just to be safe. Don't worry so much, and take
things easy out there.
jpnChrName: そうか、念のため近郊を洗うんだったな。 心配ないとは思うが、無理すんなよ！
jpnSearchText:
そうか、念のため近郊を洗うんだったな。
心配ないとは思うが、無理すんなよ！

engChrName: We will!
engSearchText: We will!
jpnChrName: ええ、お任せください……！
jpnSearchText: ええ、お任せください……！

engChrName: We'll keep up the rescue efforts, so take care of the guild here while we're out.
engSearchText:
We'll keep up the rescue efforts, so take care of the
guild here while we're out.
jpnChrName: 私たちは逃げ遅れた人たちの救助に向かう。 総支部を頼んだわよ、グレイ！
jpnSearchText:
私たちは逃げ遅れた人たちの救助に向かう。
総支部を頼んだわよ、グレイ！

engChrName: S-Sure...
engSearchText: S-Sure...
jpnChrName: は、はい……でも………
jpnSearchText: は、はい……でも………

engChrName: It... It's way too dangerous for you two to go on alone! What if you get cornered by monsters?!
engSearchText:
It... It's way too dangerous for you two to go
on alone! What if you get cornered by monsters?!
jpnChrName: 二人だけなんて、やはり危険です！！ もし化け物どもに囲まれでもしたら──！
jpnSearchText:
二人だけなんて、やはり危険です！！
もし化け物どもに囲まれでもしたら──！

engChrName: Don't worry, I'm no pushover, and neither is Regina.
engSearchText: Don't worry, I'm no pushover, and neither is Regina.
jpnChrName: 心配するな、そう簡単にやられはしないさ。 俺もレジーナもな。
jpnSearchText:
心配するな、そう簡単にやられはしないさ。
俺もレジーナもな。

engChrName: And if things got sticky, I'm sure we can count on Zin and Elaine to bail us out. Be sure to do your best for the team, Gray.
engSearchText:
And if things got sticky, I'm sure we can count on
Zin and Elaine to bail us out. Be sure to do your best
for the team, Gray.
jpnChrName: ジンさんやエレインさんも何とか見つけてくる。 だからグレイ──お前も最善を尽くしてくれ。
jpnSearchText:
ジンさんやエレインさんも何とか見つけてくる。
だからグレイ──お前も最善を尽くしてくれ。

engChrName: Don't you dare die on me. That's an order from your senior!
engSearchText:
Don't you dare die on me. That's an order from
your senior!
jpnChrName: ……ただし死ぬな。 こいつは先輩命令だ！
jpnSearchText:
……ただし死ぬな。
こいつは先輩命令だ！

engChrName: Superiors. Take care of yourself, Gray.
engSearchText: Superiors. Take care of yourself, Gray.
jpnChrName: そうね、先輩命令×２で。
jpnSearchText: そうね、先輩命令×２で。

engChrName: ...Fine. I promise I won't do anything rash.
engSearchText: ...Fine. I promise I won't do anything rash.
jpnChrName: ……分かりました、 無茶はしないと約束します。
jpnSearchText:
……分かりました、
無茶はしないと約束します。

engChrName: But you have to come back safe! Gotta take me out for drinks again.
engSearchText:
But you have to come back safe! Gotta take me out
for drinks again.
jpnChrName: だから……必ずまた奢ってください。 約束ですよ！？
jpnSearchText:
だから……必ずまた奢ってください。
約束ですよ！？

engChrName: We will!
engSearchText: We will!
engHtmlText: 遊撃士アルヴィス＆レジーナ
jpnChrName: ああ、了解だ！／ええ、了解よ！
jpnSearchText: ああ、了解だ！／ええ、了解よ！

engChrName: We're still not sure of what's going on at the moment. Honestly, I'm not even sure what time it is.
engSearchText:
We're still not sure of what's going on at the moment.
Honestly, I'm not even sure what time it is.
jpnChrName: 今が何時なのかすら分からないし 状況も見通せていないけど……
jpnSearchText:
今が何時なのかすら分からないし
状況も見通せていないけど……

engChrName: But it just means we have to be more careful. Every move counts. We can't be hesitating.
engSearchText:
But it just means we have to be more careful.
Every move counts. We can't be hesitating.
jpnChrName: だからこそ、一手一手が重要になるはず。 躊躇している暇はないわ。
jpnSearchText:
だからこそ、一手一手が重要になるはず。
躊躇している暇はないわ。

engChrName: This is going to put a lot of pressure on Gray, but I'm sure he'll manage. I believe in him.
engSearchText:
This is going to put a lot of pressure on Gray, but I'm
sure he'll manage. I believe in him.
jpnChrName: グレイにも負担を強いる事になるけど── この子なら大丈夫、私は信じてるから。
jpnSearchText:
グレイにも負担を強いる事になるけど──
この子なら大丈夫、私は信じてるから。

engChrName: There's probably still civilians around the city that haven't managed to escape. We'll split up for a search and rescue.
engSearchText:
There's probably still civilians around the city that
haven't managed to escape. We'll split up for a search
and rescue.
jpnChrName: 近隣の街区にはまだ逃げ遅れた人がいるはず。 手分けして救出に当たるつもりよ。
jpnSearchText:
近隣の街区にはまだ逃げ遅れた人がいるはず。
手分けして救出に当たるつもりよ。

engChrName: This miasma is slowing us down a lot.
engSearchText: This miasma is slowing us down a lot.
jpnChrName: この瘴気さえ無ければ もっと迅速に進められるのに……
jpnSearchText:
この瘴気さえ無ければ
もっと迅速に進められるのに……

engChrName: Take care of yourselves, please. And let us know if something comes up.
engSearchText:
Take care of yourselves, please. And let us know if
something comes up.
jpnChrName: ともかく、そちらも気を付けて。 何かあれば連絡して頂戴！
jpnSearchText:
ともかく、そちらも気を付けて。
何かあれば連絡して頂戴！

engChrName: We might be done by the evening if we're quick about it. Let's go, Alvis. We'll split up.
engSearchText:
We might be done by the evening if we're quick
about it. Let's go, Alvis. We'll split up.
jpnChrName: 効率よく回れば夕方には片付くかも…… 行くわよアルヴィス、ここは手分けして──！
jpnSearchText:
効率よく回れば夕方には片付くかも……
行くわよアルヴィス、ここは手分けして──！

engChrName: All right. You look like you're raring to go.
engSearchText: All right. You look like you're raring to go.
jpnChrName: ああ──ってこの前から やけに気合が入ってるな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ──ってこの前から
やけに気合が入ってるな。

engChrName: Got all that inspiration from that S-rank bracer that came over for a visit, huh?
engSearchText:
Got all that inspiration from that S-rank bracer that
came over for a visit, huh?
jpnChrName: レマン総本部からいらしたっていう 例の“Ｓ級”……そんなに凄い人だったのか？
jpnSearchText:
レマン総本部からいらしたっていう
例の“Ｓ級”……そんなに凄い人だったのか？

engChrName: Haha, yeah. Reminded me what being a bracer is all about.
engSearchText:
Haha, yeah. Reminded me what being a bracer is
all about.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、ええ。 遊撃士としての覚悟が改まるくらいにね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、ええ。
遊撃士としての覚悟が改まるくらいにね。

engChrName: What happened to Ewan was a tragedy, but we need to keep going. For him.
engSearchText:
What happened to Ewan was a tragedy, but we need
to keep going. For him.
jpnChrName: ……ユアンさんの事、本当に残念だったけれど…… 前へ進みましょう、あの人に恥じないためにも！
jpnSearchText:
……ユアンさんの事、本当に残念だったけれど……
前へ進みましょう、あの人に恥じないためにも！

engChrName: (Even after what happened to Ewan, meeting that person has given them quite a kick to keep moving forward. They're making some steady progress.)
engSearchText:
(Even after what happened to Ewan, meeting that
person has given them quite a kick to keep moving
forward. They're making some steady progress.)
jpnChrName: （ユアンの事に、あの人と出会った経験── クック、こいつらも着実に成長してやがんな。）
jpnSearchText:
（ユアンの事に、あの人と出会った経験──
クック、こいつらも着実に成長してやがんな。）

engChrName: We still haven't entirely recovered from what happened.
engSearchText:
We still haven't entirely recovered from
what happened.
jpnChrName: 大変な事件だったし、まだ完全に 乗り越えられたわけじゃないけど……
jpnSearchText:
大変な事件だったし、まだ完全に
乗り越えられたわけじゃないけど……

engChrName: But it can't be an excuse to stay still. We need to keep going, for Ewan's sake. We can't tarnish his memory.
engSearchText:
But it can't be an excuse to stay still. We need to keep
going, for Ewan's sake. We can't tarnish his memory.
jpnChrName: 最期まで立派だったユアンさんに恥じないように、 私たちも前へ進まないと。
jpnSearchText:
最期まで立派だったユアンさんに恥じないように、
私たちも前へ進まないと。

engChrName: Not when I have my seniors and that S-rank bracer to repay for teaching me so much!
engSearchText:
Not when I have my seniors and that S-rank bracer to
repay for teaching me so much!
jpnChrName: “Ｓ級”のあの人や他の先輩たちにも 沢山の事を学ばせてもらったしね！
jpnSearchText:
“Ｓ級”のあの人や他の先輩たちにも
沢山の事を学ばせてもらったしね！

engChrName: Ewan works in the Oración branch. He started the year before Alvis and I did.
engSearchText:
Ewan works in the Oración branch. He started the
year before Alvis and I did.
jpnChrName: ユアンさんはオラシオン支部の所属でね。 私やアルヴィスの１年先輩なの。
jpnSearchText:
ユアンさんはオラシオン支部の所属でね。
私やアルヴィスの１年先輩なの。

engChrName: He's a really promising up-and-coming bracer. He was promoted to B-rank before Alvis was, after all.
engSearchText:
He's a really promising up-and-coming bracer.
He was promoted to B-rank before Alvis was,
after all.
jpnChrName: 若手の中では一番の腕利きかな。 アルヴィスより先にＢ級に上がったし。
jpnSearchText:
若手の中では一番の腕利きかな。
アルヴィスより先にＢ級に上がったし。

engChrName: Though Alvis isn't that far behind. After everything that happened last month, he might also be on track for a promotion to B-rank.
engSearchText:
Though Alvis isn't that far behind. After everything
that happened last month, he might also be on track
for a promotion to B-rank.
jpnChrName: まあ、アルヴィスも先月の一件で Ｂ級に昇格間近みたいだけどね。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、アルヴィスも先月の一件で
Ｂ級に昇格間近みたいだけどね。

engChrName: One of our branches is understaffed, so Alvis and I gotta go on a long business trip soon.
engSearchText:
One of our branches is understaffed, so Alvis and I
gotta go on a long business trip soon.
jpnChrName: とある支部で人手が足りてなくてね。 今日から長期出張の予定なんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
とある支部で人手が足りてなくてね。
今日から長期出張の予定なんだけど……

engChrName: He sure is taking his time, though... I hope he won't leave me to do all the preparations by myself.
engSearchText:
He sure is taking his time, though... I hope he won't
leave me to do all the preparations by myself.
jpnChrName: アルヴィスったら遅いわね。 まさか私一人に準備させる気じゃ──
jpnSearchText:
アルヴィスったら遅いわね。
まさか私一人に準備させる気じゃ──

engChrName: He just doesn't change at all. Always rude and inconsiderate, and never even spares me a second thought.
engSearchText:
He just doesn't change at all. Always rude and
inconsiderate, and never even spares me a
second thought.
jpnChrName: まったくもう……昔からそうだけど、 ガサツで考えなしで私の事なんてちっとも……
jpnSearchText:
まったくもう……昔からそうだけど、
ガサツで考えなしで私の事なんてちっとも……

engChrName: *sigh* But I guess we ARE working on this together. We have to compromise somewhere.
engSearchText:
*sigh* But I guess we ARE working on this together.
We have to compromise somewhere.
jpnChrName: ……じゃなくて、一応一緒に行くんだから 打ち合わせくらい必要じゃない。
jpnSearchText:
……じゃなくて、一応一緒に行くんだから
打ち合わせくらい必要じゃない。

engChrName: Wish I knew what's taking him so long.
engSearchText: Wish I knew what's taking him so long.
jpnChrName: まったくどこで道草食ってるのかしら……
jpnSearchText: まったくどこで道草食ってるのかしら……

engChrName: *sigh* Alvis is ALWAYS like this...
engSearchText: *sigh* Alvis is ALWAYS like this...
jpnChrName: ふう、アルヴィスったら いつもこうなんだから……
jpnSearchText:
ふう、アルヴィスったら
いつもこうなんだから……

engChrName: Hold on a sec. Something's not right with these documents.
engSearchText:
Hold on a sec. Something's not right with
these documents.
jpnChrName: ってあら？　この棚……誰かが 資料の戻し方を間違えてるみたいね。
jpnSearchText:
ってあら？　この棚……誰かが
資料の戻し方を間違えてるみたいね。

engChrName: This file is out of order. Looks like it's a survey from about a year ago.
engSearchText:
This file is out of order. Looks like it's a survey from
about a year ago.
jpnChrName: 時系列がずれてるじゃない。 １年くらい前の調査ファイルみたいだけど……
jpnSearchText:
時系列がずれてるじゃない。
１年くらい前の調査ファイルみたいだけど……

engChrName: Guess it's on me to fix it.
engSearchText: Guess it's on me to fix it.
jpnChrName: ふう、こういうのも ちゃんと戻しておかないとね。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、こういうのも
ちゃんと戻しておかないとね。

engChrName: Crime rate has been on the rise for the past two years here in the capital.
engSearchText:
Crime rate has been on the rise for the past two years
here in the capital.
jpnChrName: この２年で首都でも 厄介な犯罪が増えているのよね。
jpnSearchText:
この２年で首都でも
厄介な犯罪が増えているのよね。

engChrName: There's the mafia, sure, but they're not the only ones we should worry about. We need to be on the lookout constantly to protect the citizenship.
engSearchText:
There's the mafia, sure, but they're not the only ones
we should worry about. We need to be on the lookout
constantly to protect the citizenship.
jpnChrName: 相手はマフィアだけじゃないし、 市民を守るために、常に体制を整えておかないと──
jpnSearchText:
相手はマフィアだけじゃないし、
市民を守るために、常に体制を整えておかないと──

engChrName: Being on standby for such an event is also a necessary part of the job, but I'm not sure Alvis sees it that way.
engSearchText:
Being on standby for such an event is also a necessary
part of the job, but I'm not sure Alvis sees it that way.
jpnChrName: ……待機任務もその一環なんだけど、 アルヴィスったら分かってるのかしら？
jpnSearchText:
……待機任務もその一環なんだけど、
アルヴィスったら分かってるのかしら？

engChrName: Alvis has his whole future ahead of him. I'm rooting for him.
engSearchText:
Alvis has his whole future ahead of him.
I'm rooting for him.
jpnChrName: アルヴィスはこれでも 若手の中では１、２を争うホープでね。
jpnSearchText:
アルヴィスはこれでも
若手の中では１、２を争うホープでね。

engChrName: He's actually pretty close to a B-rank promotion.
engSearchText: He's actually pretty close to a B-rank promotion.
jpnChrName: Ｂ級への昇格も近いって言われているわ。
jpnSearchText: Ｂ級への昇格も近いって言われているわ。

engChrName: Now, if he could work on that temper of his, we'd be peachy. That, and that obsession he has with Elaine...
engSearchText:
Now, if he could work on that temper of his, we'd
be peachy. That, and that obsession he has
with Elaine...
jpnChrName: もう少し冷静さを身に付けたら…… あとエレインさんに入れ込み過ぎなのも……
jpnSearchText:
もう少し冷静さを身に付けたら……
あとエレインさんに入れ込み過ぎなのも……

engChrName: *sigh* Guess I'll have to keep him on a short leash for the time being.
engSearchText:
*sigh* Guess I'll have to keep him on a short leash for
the time being.
jpnChrName: ふう、やっぱり私が付いてないとダメかもね。
jpnSearchText: ふう、やっぱり私が付いてないとダメかもね。

engChrName: Hey! I heard that!
engSearchText: Hey! I heard that!
jpnChrName: ──ってオイ、聞こえてるぞ！？
jpnSearchText: ──ってオイ、聞こえてるぞ！？

engChrName: (Heehee, those two are really funny.)
engSearchText: (Heehee, those two are really funny.)
jpnChrName: （クスクス……お二人は   いいコンビみたいですねっ！）
jpnSearchText:
（クスクス……お二人は
いいコンビみたいですねっ！）

engChrName: What a strange pair, those two. They don't look like they came here with a request.
engSearchText:
What a strange pair, those two. They don't look like
they came here with a request.
jpnChrName: ……？　変わった二人組ね。 依頼に来たわけじゃなさそうだけど……
jpnSearchText:
……？　変わった二人組ね。
依頼に来たわけじゃなさそうだけど……

engChrName: Oh, well. Never mind them. Welcome to the Republic's Bracer Guild branch.
engSearchText:
Oh, well. Never mind them. Welcome to the
Republic's Bracer Guild branch.
jpnChrName: まあいいわ、遊撃士ギルド 共和国総支部へようこそ。
jpnSearchText:
まあいいわ、遊撃士ギルド
共和国総支部へようこそ。

engChrName: Feel free to ask Hazel if you have any questions. He and Zin are the pillars of Calvard's guild branches.
engSearchText:
Feel free to ask Hazel if you have any questions.
He and Zin are the pillars of Calvard's
guild branches.
jpnChrName: 何か聞きたいならヘイゼルさんにどうぞ。 ジンさんと並んで共和国ギルドの重鎮なの。
jpnSearchText:
何か聞きたいならヘイゼルさんにどうぞ。
ジンさんと並んで共和国ギルドの重鎮なの。

engChrName: He'll be able to help in case you need anything.
engSearchText: He'll be able to help in case you need anything.
jpnChrName: 困った時はきっと 力になってくれると思うわ。
jpnSearchText:
困った時はきっと
力になってくれると思うわ。

engChrName: I'm mentoring our newest member now. We're doing requests together.
engSearchText:
I'm mentoring our newest member now. We're doing
requests together.
jpnChrName: 私はこれから新人の指導があってね。 一緒にいくつか依頼をこなすつもりよ。
jpnSearchText:
私はこれから新人の指導があってね。
一緒にいくつか依頼をこなすつもりよ。

engChrName: Gray's really good when it comes to combat, but there's stuff I'm really worried about.
engSearchText:
Gray's really good when it comes to combat, but
there's stuff I'm really worried about.
jpnChrName: グレイは器用だけど、 そこが少し心配でもあるのよね……
jpnSearchText:
グレイは器用だけど、
そこが少し心配でもあるのよね……

engChrName: A bracer can't be just a one-trick pony. He needs to learn to make rational decisions. Hopefully, the experience he'll gain today will be of use.
engSearchText:
A bracer can't be just a one-trick pony. He needs to
learn to make rational decisions. Hopefully, the
experience he'll gain today will be of use.
jpnChrName: ……遊撃士に必要なのは冷静な判断力。 今日はなるべく経験を積ませてあげましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
……遊撃士に必要なのは冷静な判断力。
今日はなるべく経験を積ませてあげましょうか。

engChrName: Ewan! When did you get to the main branch?
engSearchText: Ewan! When did you get to the main branch?
jpnChrName: ユアンさん──！ いつ総支部（こっち）にいらしてたんですか！？
jpnSearchText:
ユアンさん──！
いつ総支部（こっち）にいらしてたんですか！？

engChrName: Just now, actually! Thought I'd surprise you guys.
engSearchText: Just now, actually! Thought I'd surprise you guys.
jpnChrName: はは、さっきだよ、さっき！ お前らを驚かせてやろうかと思ってな。
jpnSearchText:
はは、さっきだよ、さっき！
お前らを驚かせてやろうかと思ってな。

engChrName: I wanted to come by earlier to update you guys, but work and life have kept me busy lately.
engSearchText:
I wanted to come by earlier to update you guys, but
work and life have kept me busy lately.
jpnChrName: 本当は例の報告がてら、もう少し早く 来るつもりだったんだが公私ともに忙しくてな……
jpnSearchText:
本当は例の報告がてら、もう少し早く
来るつもりだったんだが公私ともに忙しくてな……

engChrName: Heehee. Everything going well with your girlfriend, then?
engSearchText:
Heehee. Everything going well with your
girlfriend, then?
jpnChrName: クスクス……恋人さんとも 上手くいってそうですね？
jpnSearchText:
クスクス……恋人さんとも
上手くいってそうですね？

engChrName: Yup. It's a little embarrassing to talk about, to be honest. We still have our issues and everything, of course.
engSearchText:
Yup. It's a little embarrassing to talk about, to
be honest. We still have our issues and everything,
of course.
jpnChrName: ああ、恥ずかしながらな。 ……まあ色々ないわけでもないが……
jpnSearchText:
ああ、恥ずかしながらな。
……まあ色々ないわけでもないが……

engChrName: Crema works with the police department, right? She probably has her hands just as full, really.
engSearchText:
Crema works with the police department, right?
She probably has her hands just as full, really.
jpnChrName: クレマさん、警察務めでしたっけ…… ふふ、それは気苦労も多そうですね。
jpnSearchText:
クレマさん、警察務めでしたっけ……
ふふ、それは気苦労も多そうですね。

engChrName: I'm glad things are going well, despite that. Hopefully we'll get a chance to hang out soon.
engSearchText:
I'm glad things are going well, despite that.
Hopefully we'll get a chance to hang out soon.
jpnChrName: でも素敵だと思いますよ。 またそのうちお会いしたいものですけど。
jpnSearchText:
でも素敵だと思いますよ。
またそのうちお会いしたいものですけど。

engChrName: Haha, yeah. I know she'd love to as well. Make sure to stop by if you come by Oración anytime soon!
engSearchText:
Haha, yeah. I know she'd love to as well. Make sure
to stop by if you come by Oración anytime soon!
jpnChrName: はは、あいつも喜ぶ。 オラシオンに来た時は是非そうしてくれ！
jpnSearchText:
はは、あいつも喜ぶ。
オラシオンに来た時は是非そうしてくれ！

engChrName: We're gathering everyone who can still fight so that we can conduct a search and rescue.
engSearchText:
We're gathering everyone who can still fight so that
we can conduct a search and rescue.
jpnChrName: 見ての通り、動ける連中を集めて 逃げ遅れた連中の捜索に出るところだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
見ての通り、動ける連中を集めて
逃げ遅れた連中の捜索に出るところだぜ。

engChrName: I took a look earlier, and thanks to you breaking that demon sphere, things have calmed down enough for us to move out.
engSearchText:
I took a look earlier, and thanks to you breaking that
demon sphere, things have calmed down enough for
us to move out.
jpnChrName: さっき軽く回ったが、お前らが魔球とやらを 破壊してくれたお陰で動きやすくなったみてえだ。
jpnSearchText:
さっき軽く回ったが、お前らが魔球とやらを
破壊してくれたお陰で動きやすくなったみてえだ。

engChrName: Hah, thanks for the opportunity, spriggan! We'll make the most of it!
engSearchText:
Hah, thanks for the opportunity, spriggan!
We'll make the most of it!
jpnChrName: ハハッ、有効に活用させてもらうぜ。 ──そっちもしっかりやれよ、裏解決屋！
jpnSearchText:
ハハッ、有効に活用させてもらうぜ。
──そっちもしっかりやれよ、裏解決屋！

engChrName: Leave this place's defense to us! We won't let them break through, no matter what!
engSearchText:
Leave this place's defense to us! We won't let them
break through, no matter what!
jpnChrName: こっちの守りは任せとけや。 そう簡単に突破させるつもりはねえぜ！
jpnSearchText:
こっちの守りは任せとけや。
そう簡単に突破させるつもりはねえぜ！

engChrName: I have my qualms when it comes to Marduk, but we can't turn away the help right now when we need it most.
engSearchText:
I have my qualms when it comes to Marduk, but we
can't turn away the help right now when we need
it most.
jpnChrName: ＭＫの連中も引っかかるが…… 今優先すべきは状況把握と人命救助だ。
jpnSearchText:
ＭＫの連中も引っかかるが……
今優先すべきは状況把握と人命救助だ。

engChrName: As soon as things calm down over here, we'll search the neighboring districts for Zin and the others.
engSearchText:
As soon as things calm down over here, we'll search
the neighboring districts for Zin and the others.
jpnChrName: ここが落ち着き次第、 ジンさんたちを探しつつ近隣街区を回る──
jpnSearchText:
ここが落ち着き次第、
ジンさんたちを探しつつ近隣街区を回る──

engChrName: Don't let us down!
engSearchText: Don't let us down!
jpnChrName: 裏解決屋、そっちもくたばんじゃねーぞ！？
jpnSearchText: 裏解決屋、そっちもくたばんじゃねーぞ！？

engChrName: It's nice seeing you two around. Ahh, it brings me back. I remember when Zin and I used to take care of you.
engSearchText:
It's nice seeing you two around. Ahh, it brings
me back. I remember when Zin and I used to take
care of you.
jpnChrName: 二人して出迎えとは可愛いじゃねえか。 ジンさんと面倒見てた頃が懐かしいぜ。
jpnSearchText:
二人して出迎えとは可愛いじゃねえか。
ジンさんと面倒見てた頃が懐かしいぜ。

engChrName: It looks like you both have taken care of your own businesses.
engSearchText:
It looks like you both have taken care of your
own businesses.
jpnChrName: それに……二人とも 自分なりのきっかけが掴めたみてえだな。
jpnSearchText:
それに……二人とも
自分なりのきっかけが掴めたみてえだな。

engChrName: Sadly, it doesn't look like love's in the air today. Though maybe I can get my hopes up with the Revolution Festival right around the corner.
engSearchText:
Sadly, it doesn't look like love's in the air today.
Though maybe I can get my hopes up with the
Revolution Festival right around the corner.
jpnChrName: まァ色恋の方はサッパリなようだが。 クク、記念祭も近いし期待しておくかね？
jpnSearchText:
まァ色恋の方はサッパリなようだが。
クク、記念祭も近いし期待しておくかね？

engChrName: I'll be leaving the country on a business trip next week. I'd rather not, considering we're so busy, but I can't worm my way out of it.
engSearchText:
I'll be leaving the country on a business trip
next week. I'd rather not, considering we're so busy,
but I can't worm my way out of it.
jpnChrName: 来週から国外出張の予定が入っちまってな。 忙しい中やれやれだが、外せそうにねえんだ。
jpnSearchText:
来週から国外出張の予定が入っちまってな。
忙しい中やれやれだが、外せそうにねえんだ。

engChrName: Our relationship with the Empire has improved, but that doesn't mean it's peachy everywhere. There are still fires to be put out.
engSearchText:
Our relationship with the Empire has improved, but
that doesn't mean it's peachy everywhere. There are
still fires to be put out.
jpnChrName: 帝国との緊張が緩んだとはいえ 火種が燻（くすぶ）ってやがる地域も多いからなァ……
jpnSearchText:
帝国との緊張が緩んだとはいえ
火種が燻（くすぶ）ってやがる地域も多いからなァ……

engChrName: There's the newly independent North Ambria, issues in the East, and there's Arteria to worry about, too.
engSearchText:
There's the newly independent North Ambria, issues
in the East, and there's Arteria to worry about, too.
jpnChrName: 独立後のノーザンブリアや極東方面、 アルテリア方面にも気になる話が多いし──
jpnSearchText:
独立後のノーザンブリアや極東方面、
アルテリア方面にも気になる話が多いし──

engChrName: And here at home, we still have A to worry about. Dang, I gotta get going. The sooner I leave, the sooner I'll be back.
engSearchText:
And here at home, we still have A to worry about.
Dang, I gotta get going. The sooner I leave, the
sooner I'll be back.
jpnChrName: 国内（カルバード）で言やあ《Ａ》どもの動きも心配だ。 ったく、とっとと行って帰ってこねえとな。
jpnSearchText:
国内（カルバード）で言やあ《Ａ》どもの動きも心配だ。
ったく、とっとと行って帰ってこねえとな。

engChrName: Oh, right. Alvis asked me for a favor.
engSearchText: Oh, right. Alvis asked me for a favor.
jpnChrName: そういやアルヴィスからも 頼まれ事をされてたんだったな。
jpnSearchText:
そういやアルヴィスからも
頼まれ事をされてたんだったな。

engChrName: *sigh* I'll have to take care of that when I'm back in the country instead.
engSearchText:
*sigh* I'll have to take care of that when I'm back in
the country instead.
jpnChrName: やれやれ……悪ぃがそっちは 帰国してからになりそうだなァ。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ……悪ぃがそっちは
帰国してからになりそうだなァ。

engChrName: Oh, hey. You're that spriggan that Zin's told me so much about.
engSearchText:
Oh, hey. You're that spriggan that Zin's told me so
much about.
jpnChrName: よう、ジンさんから聞いてるぜ。 確か《裏解決屋》……だったか？
jpnSearchText:
よう、ジンさんから聞いてるぜ。
確か《裏解決屋》……だったか？

engChrName: Nice to meet you! My name's Lahad. I'm a bracer.
engSearchText: Nice to meet you! My name's Lahad. I'm a bracer.
jpnChrName: 俺は遊撃士のラハドだ。 まァボチボチ仲良くやろうや。
jpnSearchText:
俺は遊撃士のラハドだ。
まァボチボチ仲良くやろうや。

engChrName: You look like an easygoing guy, and you're not a troublemaker from what I've heard.
engSearchText:
You look like an easygoing guy, and you're not a
troublemaker from what I've heard.
jpnChrName: 聞く限りじゃ、無用な面倒事を 起こすタイプじゃなさそうだしな。
jpnSearchText:
聞く限りじゃ、無用な面倒事を
起こすタイプじゃなさそうだしな。

engChrName: I'm happy to work with anyone, as long as they're driven. Hope I can count on you!
engSearchText:
I'm happy to work with anyone, as long as
they're driven. Hope I can count on you!
jpnChrName: イキがいいのも個人的には歓迎だ。 クック、カチ合った時はよろしく頼むぜ？
jpnSearchText:
イキがいいのも個人的には歓迎だ。
クック、カチ合った時はよろしく頼むぜ？

engChrName: Well, it depends. (He looks like a reasonable guy.)
engSearchText:
Well, it depends.
(He looks like a reasonable guy.)
jpnChrName: やれやれ……そいつは状況によるがな。 （とはいえ、案外弁えてそうな男ではあるな。）
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ……そいつは状況によるがな。
（とはいえ、案外弁えてそうな男ではあるな。）

engChrName: (He's got a big mouth, but he looks like he can back it up. I guess that's Edith's bracers for ya.)
engSearchText:
(He's got a big mouth, but he looks like he can back
it up. I guess that's Edith's bracers for ya.)
jpnChrName: （口は悪いが腕は立つって所か──   流石は総支部、層が厚いじゃねーか。）
jpnSearchText:
（口は悪いが腕は立つって所か──
流石は総支部、層が厚いじゃねーか。）

engChrName: (He looked really nice to me, but I guess he'd have his reasons to be wary.)
engSearchText:
(He looked really nice to me, but I guess he'd have his
reasons to be wary.)
jpnChrName: （よく分かりませんけど……   男性同士、色々あるみたいですね。）
jpnSearchText:
（よく分かりませんけど……
男性同士、色々あるみたいですね。）

engChrName: It's probably not hard to tell, but I'm from the Central East. I go back on work trips all the time, too.
engSearchText:
It's probably not hard to tell, but I'm from the
Central East. I go back on work trips all the
time, too.
jpnChrName: 見ての通り、俺は中東の出身でな。 そっち系の国外出張も多いんだが……
jpnSearchText:
見ての通り、俺は中東の出身でな。
そっち系の国外出張も多いんだが……

engChrName: Zin, Elaine, and even Al are all out and about. So I'm the one who got stuck with standby duty.
engSearchText:
Zin, Elaine, and even Al are all out and about. So I'm
the one who got stuck with standby duty.
jpnChrName: 今日はジンさんにエレイン、アル坊まで 出張ってるからな、待機任務ってワケだ。
jpnSearchText:
今日はジンさんにエレイン、アル坊まで
出張ってるからな、待機任務ってワケだ。

engChrName: I can't force you to walk away from that shady business of yours, but just try not to poke your nose where it don't belong, all right?
engSearchText:
I can't force you to walk away from that shady
business of yours, but just try not to poke your
nose where it don't belong, all right?
jpnChrName: ……“裏”を名乗ってウロつくのも 止めはしねえが──首都の闇は深いぜ？
jpnSearchText:
……“裏”を名乗ってウロつくのも
止めはしねえが──首都の闇は深いぜ？

engChrName: Edith's got a real nasty dark side to it. But you guys already knew that.
engSearchText:
Edith's got a real nasty dark side to it. But you guys
already knew that.
jpnChrName: まァそっちの兄ちゃんは 重々承知してるみてえだがな。
jpnSearchText:
まァそっちの兄ちゃんは
重々承知してるみてえだがな。

engChrName: Thanks for the help, Ismail. Ain't easy to deal with everything now that we're three people down.
engSearchText:
Thanks for the help, Ismail. Ain't easy to deal with
everything now that we're three people down.
jpnChrName: 助かったぜ、イスマイルのオヤッサン。 流石に３人抜けはキツイのなんのって。
jpnSearchText:
助かったぜ、イスマイルのオヤッサン。
流石に３人抜けはキツイのなんのって。

engChrName: No need to thank me. Fie helped me out yesterday, so consider it me repaying the favor.
engSearchText:
No need to thank me. Fie helped me out yesterday, so
consider it me repaying the favor.
jpnChrName: なに、礼には及びませんよ。 先日はフィー君の力を借りた事ですし。
jpnSearchText:
なに、礼には及びませんよ。
先日はフィー君の力を借りた事ですし。

engChrName: I heard things finally settled down in Vegas Films. Enough for a new CEO to step up, anyway.
engSearchText:
I heard things finally settled down in Vegas Films.
Enough for a new CEO to step up, anyway.
jpnChrName: 丁度ベガスフィルムの新社長も決まりましてね。 一段落した所ではありましたから。
jpnSearchText:
丁度ベガスフィルムの新社長も決まりましてね。
一段落した所ではありましたから。

engChrName: What do you think about all of this, Lahad?
engSearchText: What do you think about all of this, Lahad?
jpnChrName: それより……ラハド。 貴方の目から見て、大丈夫なのでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
それより……ラハド。
貴方の目から見て、大丈夫なのでしょうか？

engChrName: I think I know what you're getting at, but if they're doing their job, then that's all we can really ask for.
engSearchText:
I think I know what you're getting at, but if they're
doing their job, then that's all we can really ask for.
jpnChrName: ……ま、言いたい事は分かるけどよ。 仕事はこなしてんだ、文句は言えねえだろ。
jpnSearchText:
……ま、言いたい事は分かるけどよ。
仕事はこなしてんだ、文句は言えねえだろ。

engChrName: Zin DID say they're getting a little nosy for their own good...
engSearchText:
Zin DID say they're getting a little nosy for their
own good...
jpnChrName: 入れ込みすぎんなっつー話は ジンさんからもしてるしなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
入れ込みすぎんなっつー話は
ジンさんからもしてるしなぁ……

engChrName: (The hell they talkin' about?)
engSearchText: (The hell they talkin' about?)
jpnChrName: （？　何の話だ……？）
jpnSearchText: （？　何の話だ……？）

engChrName: Don't worry so much. You're pretty skilled in and of yourself. And if you need some help, we got Lahad around, too.
engSearchText:
Don't worry so much. You're pretty skilled in and
of yourself. And if you need some help, we got Lahad
around, too.
jpnChrName: ラハドさんもいるし、気負わなくて大丈夫。 グレイも実力は十分なんだから、自分を信じて。
jpnSearchText:
ラハドさんもいるし、気負わなくて大丈夫。
グレイも実力は十分なんだから、自分を信じて。

engChrName: O-Okay. I'll do my best!
engSearchText: O-Okay. I'll do my best!
jpnChrName: ……分かりました、 僕もやれるだけの事はやります！
jpnSearchText:
……分かりました、
僕もやれるだけの事はやります！

engChrName: I promise I won't do anything reckless. So you better not, either! Come back safe!
engSearchText:
I promise I won't do anything reckless. So you better
not, either! Come back safe!
jpnChrName: 無茶もしないとお約束しますから、 先輩たちも無事に戻ってきてくださいよ！？
jpnSearchText:
無茶もしないとお約束しますから、
先輩たちも無事に戻ってきてくださいよ！？

engChrName: I'll protect this place with my life!
engSearchText: I'll protect this place with my life!
jpnChrName: ここの守りはお任せください！ 僕が何としても──！
jpnSearchText:
ここの守りはお任せください！
僕が何としても──！

engChrName: I-If Almata really is back, then...
engSearchText: I-If Almata really is back, then...
jpnChrName: ………でもアルマータが もし本当に復活したのだとしたら……
jpnSearchText:
………でもアルマータが
もし本当に復活したのだとしたら……

engChrName: Ugh! No, we've gotta do everything we can to stop them!
engSearchText:
Ugh! No, we've gotta do everything we can to
stop them!
jpnChrName: …………ッ…………… 絶対に食い止めないと……！！
jpnSearchText:
…………ッ……………
絶対に食い止めないと……！！

engChrName: Thank you, young man. I haven't been to Edith in so long, I got lost.
engSearchText:
Thank you, young man. I haven't been to Edith in so
long, I got lost.
jpnChrName: ありがとうね、遊撃士さん。 首都は久しぶりで、迷ってしまって……
jpnSearchText:
ありがとうね、遊撃士さん。
首都は久しぶりで、迷ってしまって……

engChrName: Happy to help!
engSearchText: Happy to help!
jpnChrName: お力になれてよかったです。
jpnSearchText: お力になれてよかったです。

engChrName: You're on your way to see your grandchild, yeah? Take care!
engSearchText:
You're on your way to see your grandchild, yeah?
Take care!
jpnChrName: お孫さんに会いに行かれるんですね。 ふふ、どうかお気をつけて！
jpnSearchText:
お孫さんに会いに行かれるんですね。
ふふ、どうかお気をつけて！

engChrName: Today's been really busy, but satisfactory. It feels nice to do something you're proud of.
engSearchText:
Today's been really busy, but satisfactory. It feels nice
to do something you're proud of.
jpnChrName: 今日は大忙しですけど、 久しぶりにやりがいがあるというか……
jpnSearchText:
今日は大忙しですけど、
久しぶりにやりがいがあるというか……

engChrName: Haha! I've been looking forward to today for so long. But as a bracer, I can't slack off!
engSearchText:
Haha! I've been looking forward to today for so long.
But as a bracer, I can't slack off!
jpnChrName: ふふ、こんな日が迎えられて良かったです。 僕も遊撃士として頑張らないとですね！
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、こんな日が迎えられて良かったです。
僕も遊撃士として頑張らないとですね！

engChrName: I made the big mistake of going to Oración without permission. I got in big trouble for it.
engSearchText:
I made the big mistake of going to Oración
without permission. I got in big trouble for it.
jpnChrName: 勝手にオラシオンに乗り込んでしまって── 結局大目玉を食らってしまったんですが。
jpnSearchText:
勝手にオラシオンに乗り込んでしまって──
結局大目玉を食らってしまったんですが。

engChrName: Thankfully, my suspension finally got lifted.
engSearchText: Thankfully, my suspension finally got lifted.
jpnChrName: 謹慎処分も明けて、ようやく 許してもらう事が出来ました。
jpnSearchText:
謹慎処分も明けて、ようやく
許してもらう事が出来ました。

engChrName: I may have gotten in big trouble for it, but I'm thankful I was there to see the mafia being eradicated with my own eyes.
engSearchText:
I may have gotten in big trouble for it, but I'm
thankful I was there to see the mafia being eradicated
with my own eyes.
jpnChrName: ふう……でもマフィアも壊滅したし 僕も見届けられてよかったかな……
jpnSearchText:
ふう……でもマフィアも壊滅したし
僕も見届けられてよかったかな……

engChrName: But according to Lahad, I gotta redo my training now...
engSearchText:
But according to Lahad, I gotta redo my
training now...
jpnChrName: ラハドさんには『修行のやり直し』って 言われちゃいましたけどね、アハハ。
jpnSearchText:
ラハドさんには『修行のやり直し』って
言われちゃいましたけどね、アハハ。

engChrName: Zin and Hazel had some words for me, too.
engSearchText: Zin and Hazel had some words for me, too.
jpnChrName: ジンさんやヘイゼルさんにも 改めて釘を刺されちゃいました。
jpnSearchText:
ジンさんやヘイゼルさんにも
改めて釘を刺されちゃいました。

engChrName: I caused a lot of trouble for a lot of people. I'm really sorry.
engSearchText:
I caused a lot of trouble for a lot of people. I'm
really sorry.
jpnChrName: ご心配をおかけしてしまって…… ホントに申し訳なかったです。
jpnSearchText:
ご心配をおかけしてしまって……
ホントに申し訳なかったです。

engChrName: I have to make it up to everyone! Time to turn over a new leaf.
engSearchText:
I have to make it up to everyone! Time to turn over a
new leaf.
jpnChrName: 僕も心機一転、頑張りますね！
jpnSearchText: 僕も心機一転、頑張りますね！

engChrName: Ugh... They're really putting me on standby at a time like this? And as Hazel's assistant, no less!
engSearchText:
Ugh... They're really putting me on standby at a time
like this? And as Hazel's assistant, no less!
jpnChrName: ……っ……こんな時に待機任務…… ヘイゼルさんの手伝いだなんて………！
jpnSearchText:
……っ……こんな時に待機任務……
ヘイゼルさんの手伝いだなんて………！

engChrName: Is it because I'm still a junior bracer? I've been working really hard for the past six months! Did it mean nothing?
engSearchText:
Is it because I'm still a junior bracer? I've been
working really hard for the past six months! Did it
mean nothing?
jpnChrName: 僕がまだ準遊撃士だからなのか…… ……足りないのか……？　半年程度の努力じゃ……
jpnSearchText:
僕がまだ準遊撃士だからなのか……
……足りないのか……？　半年程度の努力じゃ……

engChrName: ...No, that's no way to think about it. There's something I can do, and I have to focus on doing my part.
engSearchText:
...No, that's no way to think about it.
There's something I can do, and I have to focus on
doing my part.
jpnChrName: いや、違う……考えるんだ…… この手でできる事を…………
jpnSearchText:
いや、違う……考えるんだ……
この手でできる事を…………

engChrName: (He's having a hard time...)
engSearchText: (He's having a hard time...)
jpnChrName: （何だか思いつめてらっしゃる   みたいですけど……）
jpnSearchText:
（何だか思いつめてらっしゃる
みたいですけど……）

engChrName: I'll be dispatched to the provincial towns as part of my junior bracer training.
engSearchText:
I'll be dispatched to the provincial towns as part of my
junior bracer training.
jpnChrName: 今度、準遊撃士の研修で 地方都市に配属される事になりまして……
jpnSearchText:
今度、準遊撃士の研修で
地方都市に配属される事になりまして……

engChrName: I'm not sure I want to, but I know the experience will only help me grow. I can't skip out on it.
engSearchText:
I'm not sure I want to, but I know the experience will
only help me grow. I can't skip out on it.
jpnChrName: 不安もありますが、きっとまた一回り 強くなれるハズ……やりきらないと……
jpnSearchText:
不安もありますが、きっとまた一回り
強くなれるハズ……やりきらないと……

engChrName: Wait, now's not the time to get carried away! I need to get ready.
engSearchText:
Wait, now's not the time to get carried away! I need
to get ready.
jpnChrName: ……とと、浮かれてないで 準備は万端に整えないとですね！
jpnSearchText:
……とと、浮かれてないで
準備は万端に整えないとですね！

engChrName: Need to make sure my weapons are in tip-top shape, pack my first-aid kit. Hmm... Maybe I should pack some spares, too.
engSearchText:
Need to make sure my weapons are in tip-top shape,
pack my first-aid kit. Hmm... Maybe I should pack
some spares, too.
jpnChrName: 得物の手入れに応急キット…… 予備の武器なんかも用意した方がいいのかな？
jpnSearchText:
得物の手入れに応急キット……
予備の武器なんかも用意した方がいいのかな？

engChrName: Alvis and everyone else are leaving on a work trip today.
engSearchText:
Alvis and everyone else are leaving on a work
trip today.
jpnChrName: そういえば、今日はアルヴィス先輩たちも 出張に向かうみたいです。
jpnSearchText:
そういえば、今日はアルヴィス先輩たちも
出張に向かうみたいです。

engChrName: Haha, maybe I'll be able to at least see them off at the station.
engSearchText:
Haha, maybe I'll be able to at least see them off at
the station.
jpnChrName: ふふ、駅までご一緒するのもアリかもですね！
jpnSearchText: ふふ、駅までご一緒するのもアリかもですね！

engChrName: Alvis trains every day after work. He's very diligent.
engSearchText: Alvis trains every day after work. He's very diligent.
jpnChrName: アルヴィス先輩は凄く努力家で、 仕事が終わってからも毎日鍛錬してるんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
アルヴィス先輩は凄く努力家で、
仕事が終わってからも毎日鍛錬してるんですよ。

engChrName: And he's the one training me all the time, too.
engSearchText: And he's the one training me all the time, too.
jpnChrName: 僕にもずっと稽古をつけてくれましたし──
jpnSearchText: 僕にもずっと稽古をつけてくれましたし──

engChrName: I should follow his example. I need to keep training so I can get stronger!
engSearchText:
I should follow his example. I need to keep training
so I can get stronger!
jpnChrName: ……見習わないといけないですね。 僕も、もっともっと強くなるために……！
jpnSearchText:
……見習わないといけないですね。
僕も、もっともっと強くなるために……！

engChrName: My name is Gray. I'm a junior bracer. I just started last month.
engSearchText:
My name is Gray. I'm a junior bracer. I just started
last month.
jpnChrName: 僕はグレイと言います。 一ヶ月ほど前に準遊撃士になったばかりでして。
jpnSearchText:
僕はグレイと言います。
一ヶ月ほど前に準遊撃士になったばかりでして。

engChrName: Every day's a new challenge, but it's fulfilling. I'm so happy I finally got to become a bracer, like I'd always dreamed of!
engSearchText:
Every day's a new challenge, but it's fulfilling. I'm so
happy I finally got to become a bracer, like I'd always
dreamed of!
jpnChrName: ふふ、毎日大変ですけど充実してますよ。 憧れの遊撃士になれてよかったです！
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、毎日大変ですけど充実してますよ。
憧れの遊撃士になれてよかったです！

engChrName: Junior bracers aren't full-fledged bracers, though! I still have a lot of hard work ahead of me.
engSearchText:
Junior bracers aren't full-fledged bracers, though!
I still have a lot of hard work ahead of me.
jpnChrName: ……とはいえ、準遊撃士は見習いですから 早く一人前の正遊撃士になれるよう頑張らないと。
jpnSearchText:
……とはいえ、準遊撃士は見習いですから
早く一人前の正遊撃士になれるよう頑張らないと。

engChrName: There's so much I can and WILL learn from all my superiors. Every day's a new lesson!
engSearchText:
There's so much I can and WILL learn from all
my superiors. Every day's a new lesson!
jpnChrName: 今日も先輩遊撃士の皆さんに しっかり学ばせていただきます！
jpnSearchText:
今日も先輩遊撃士の皆さんに
しっかり学ばせていただきます！

engChrName: Actually, Regina's an orbal staff user. She's a real pro when it comes to orbal devices, too.
engSearchText:
Actually, Regina's an orbal staff user. She's a real
pro when it comes to orbal devices, too.
jpnChrName: ちなみにレジーナ先輩は導力杖の使い手で 導力機器の扱いも得意なんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみにレジーナ先輩は導力杖の使い手で
導力機器の扱いも得意なんですよ。

engChrName: Apparently, she was involved with the trial implementation of the generic Aeon system, or something like that.
engSearchText:
Apparently, she was involved with the trial
implementation of the generic Aeon system, or
something like that.
jpnChrName: 汎用型エイオンシステム……？　とかいうものの 試験導入なんかにも関わっていたらしくて。
jpnSearchText:
汎用型エイオンシステム……？　とかいうものの
試験導入なんかにも関わっていたらしくて。

engChrName: But she's our specialist when it comes to incidents involving the orbal net. I could stand to learn a lot from her.
engSearchText:
But she's our specialist when it comes to incidents
involving the orbal net. I could stand to learn a lot
from her.
jpnChrName: ともかく導力ネット絡みの事件も得意なんです。 僕もしっかり見習わないといけません。
jpnSearchText:
ともかく導力ネット絡みの事件も得意なんです。
僕もしっかり見習わないといけません。

engChrName: I came by to update the main branch on our research progress over in Oración. We've been looking into the mafia.
engSearchText:
I came by to update the main branch on our research
progress over in Oración. We've been looking into
the mafia.
jpnChrName: オラシオンの方でもマフィア関連の 調査を進めていてな、その報告に来たんだ。
jpnSearchText:
オラシオンの方でもマフィア関連の
調査を進めていてな、その報告に来たんだ。

engChrName: I haven't been by the capital in a while. I have so many people I want to at least say hi to. Hazel, of course, and Zin and Elaine are also a must!
engSearchText:
I haven't been by the capital in a while. I have so
many people I want to at least say hi to. Hazel, of
course, and Zin and Elaine are also a must!
jpnChrName: 首都まで来るのは久々だ、ヘイゼルさんは当然として ジンさんやエレインさんにも挨拶していかないとな！
jpnSearchText:
首都まで来るのは久々だ、ヘイゼルさんは当然として
ジンさんやエレインさんにも挨拶していかないとな！

engChrName: I'd love a chance to talk to Alvis, too, but looks like he's busy as ever.
engSearchText:
I'd love a chance to talk to Alvis, too, but looks like
he's busy as ever.
jpnChrName: あとはアルヴィスのやつの顔を見たいが…… はは、相変わらず忙しくしてるようだな。
jpnSearchText:
あとはアルヴィスのやつの顔を見たいが……
はは、相変わらず忙しくしてるようだな。

engChrName: Is it true that Station Street was successfully liberated?
engSearchText: Is it true that Station Street was successfully liberated?
jpnChrName: ……無事に駅前通りが解放されたという 理解で良いのでしょうか……？
jpnSearchText:
……無事に駅前通りが解放されたという
理解で良いのでしょうか……？

engChrName: Things are safe now, all thanks to Marduk.
engSearchText: Things are safe now, all thanks to Marduk.
jpnChrName: ＭＫ社のお陰で一旦の安全も 確保されているようです。
jpnSearchText:
ＭＫ社のお陰で一旦の安全も
確保されているようです。

engChrName: Ilhan's been having some new ideas, but I can guarantee you that our store will continue supporting you.
engSearchText:
Ilhan's been having some new ideas, but I can
guarantee you that our store will continue
supporting you.
jpnChrName: イルハンも何か考えがあるようですし── 当店も引き続き力にならせて頂きますよ。
jpnSearchText:
イルハンも何か考えがあるようですし──
当店も引き続き力にならせて頂きますよ。

engChrName: Please, don't hesitate to ask for help!
engSearchText: Please, don't hesitate to ask for help!
jpnChrName: どうか、遠慮なく頼ってください！
jpnSearchText: どうか、遠慮なく頼ってください！

engChrName: We're none the wiser about what's going on, either.
engSearchText: We're none the wiser about what's going on, either.
jpnChrName: い、一体何が起きているのか 俺たちも戸惑うばかりですが……
jpnSearchText:
い、一体何が起きているのか
俺たちも戸惑うばかりですが……

engChrName: We've gotta pull through. There's people working hard to get us through this, so we have to make it.
engSearchText:
We've gotta pull through. There's people working
hard to get us through this, so we have to make it.
jpnChrName: こうして対処すべく動いている方々がいる以上 俺たちも期待に応えなくてはなりませんね。
jpnSearchText:
こうして対処すべく動いている方々がいる以上
俺たちも期待に応えなくてはなりませんね。

engChrName: If there's anything you'd like to order, don't hesitate to let me know... And may the Goddess' blessings be upon you!
engSearchText:
If there's anything you'd like to order, don't hesitate
to let me know... And may the Goddess' blessings be
upon you!
jpnChrName: どうかご注文があれば何なりと── そして女神の加護をお祈りしております！
jpnSearchText:
どうかご注文があれば何なりと──
そして女神の加護をお祈りしております！

engChrName: Welcome to Orbal Café Iota! It's a pleasure seeing you again.
engSearchText:
Welcome to Orbal Café Iota! It's a pleasure seeing
you again.
jpnChrName: いつもご利用ありがとうございます。 オーバルカフェ《イオタ》へようこそ！
jpnSearchText:
いつもご利用ありがとうございます。
オーバルカフェ《イオタ》へようこそ！

engChrName: Ilhan's been invited to the Financial Association's banquet being held today.
engSearchText:
Ilhan's been invited to the Financial Association's
banquet being held today.
jpnChrName: 実は今日開かれる経済連の祝賀会に イルハンが招かれているんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
実は今日開かれる経済連の祝賀会に
イルハンが招かれているんですよ。

engChrName: People have been paying attention to him as an up and coming entrepreneur. I couldn't be happier.
engSearchText:
People have been paying attention to him as an up
and coming entrepreneur. I couldn't be happier.
jpnChrName: 若き起業家として注目されているようで── はは、俺としても嬉しい限りです。
jpnSearchText:
若き起業家として注目されているようで──
はは、俺としても嬉しい限りです。

engChrName: Hope he didn't forget that it's today, though. If we don't leave soon, we're gonna be late.
engSearchText:
Hope he didn't forget that it's today, though. If we
don't leave soon, we're gonna be late.
jpnChrName: でもあいつ、忘れてないだろうな…… そろそろ出発しないと間に合わないぞ……？
jpnSearchText:
でもあいつ、忘れてないだろうな……
そろそろ出発しないと間に合わないぞ……？

engChrName: Ilhan is pretty flighty. In life, and with his responsibilities in particular.
engSearchText:
Ilhan is pretty flighty. In life, and with his
responsibilities in particular.
jpnChrName: イルハンの奴は自由人なので…… たまにすっぽかす事もあって……
jpnSearchText:
イルハンの奴は自由人なので……
たまにすっぽかす事もあって……

engChrName: But we can't afford to let him miss this opportunity today. If he doesn't get it together, I'm gonna have to shake some sense into him myself.
engSearchText:
But we can't afford to let him miss this
opportunity today. If he doesn't get it together, I'm
gonna have to shake some sense into him myself.
jpnChrName: 今日は流石にそういう訳には。 はあ、もう少ししたらケツを叩きにいかないと。
jpnSearchText:
今日は流石にそういう訳には。
はあ、もう少ししたらケツを叩きにいかないと。

engChrName: Ilhan's been thinking of setting up another startup out of nowhere.
engSearchText:
Ilhan's been thinking of setting up another startup
out of nowhere.
jpnChrName: イルハンときたら……また思い付きで 新しい事業を始めたいだなんて……！
jpnSearchText:
イルハンときたら……また思い付きで
新しい事業を始めたいだなんて……！

engChrName: As if this place wasn't hard enough to manage... But I've been doing well enough, handling things by myself.
engSearchText:
As if this place wasn't hard enough to manage...
But I've been doing well enough, handling things
by myself.
jpnChrName: この店を経営していくだけでも大変なんですよ。 俺が手を尽くして回しているというのに……
jpnSearchText:
この店を経営していくだけでも大変なんですよ。
俺が手を尽くして回しているというのに……

engChrName: I just wish he had any idea how hard it really is.
engSearchText: I just wish he had any idea how hard it really is.
jpnChrName: あいつはそういう現場の苦労を 分かっていないんです。
jpnSearchText:
あいつはそういう現場の苦労を
分かっていないんです。

engChrName: He's too easygoing. Sure, he has his occasional breakthroughs, but that's the extent of his genius. ...Ugh, it annoys me just thinking about it.
engSearchText:
He's too easygoing. Sure, he has his occasional
breakthroughs, but that's the extent of his genius.
...Ugh, it annoys me just thinking about it.
jpnChrName: いつものほほんとして、閃きだけは天才的で── はぁ、つい腹が立ってしまいました。
jpnSearchText:
いつものほほんとして、閃きだけは天才的で──
はぁ、つい腹が立ってしまいました。

engChrName: We recently got into an argument about it...
engSearchText: We recently got into an argument about it...
jpnChrName: さっき軽くイルハンと 口論をしてしまいましてね……
jpnSearchText:
さっき軽くイルハンと
口論をしてしまいましてね……

engChrName: Yeah, he's really got a knack for this sort of deal, that I can't deny.
engSearchText:
Yeah, he's really got a knack for this sort of deal, that
I can't deny.
jpnChrName: あいつのアイデアが素晴らしいのは 間違いないんですが、何というか……
jpnSearchText:
あいつのアイデアが素晴らしいのは
間違いないんですが、何というか……

engChrName: But I always just end up feeling like trash after the fact...
engSearchText:
But I always just end up feeling like trash after
the fact...
jpnChrName: はぁ、ちょっと自己嫌悪してしまいますね……
jpnSearchText: はぁ、ちょっと自己嫌悪してしまいますね……

engChrName: I'm glad stuff around the city's finally started calming down. I'd be even more glad if customers started coming back, though.
engSearchText:
I'm glad stuff around the city's finally started
calming down. I'd be even more glad if customers
started coming back, though.
jpnChrName: 事件も収束し、我々としても一安心です。 客足も戻ればいいのですが……
jpnSearchText:
事件も収束し、我々としても一安心です。
客足も戻ればいいのですが……

engChrName: But the Revolution Festival is just around the corner. We'll be preparing for the festivities, of course.
engSearchText:
But the Revolution Festival is just around the corner.
We'll be preparing for the festivities, of course.
jpnChrName: ともあれ、記念祭も近いですし 当店としても施策を打たねばなりませんね。
jpnSearchText:
ともあれ、記念祭も近いですし
当店としても施策を打たねばなりませんね。

engChrName: Business has been booming over in the 3rd District lately. We need to pick it up with the ads if we want to get customers in here, too.
engSearchText:
Business has been booming over in the 3rd District
lately. We need to pick it up with the ads if we
want to get customers in here, too.
jpnChrName: 近頃は３区の商業施設も人気だとか。 まずは広告を打って集客性を上げなくては。
jpnSearchText:
近頃は３区の商業施設も人気だとか。
まずは広告を打って集客性を上げなくては。

engChrName: The whole village is just...gone.
engSearchText: The whole village is just...gone.
jpnChrName: まさか村が一つ消滅するなんて事が 現実に起こるだなんて……
jpnSearchText:
まさか村が一つ消滅するなんて事が
現実に起こるだなんて……

engChrName: I'd heard of something like that being possible back when I was at the institute, but I never thought it was anything more than a theory...
engSearchText:
I'd heard of something like that being possible back
when I was at the institute, but I never thought it was
anything more than a theory...
jpnChrName: そうした理論の存在だけは 大学時代に耳に挟んだことはありますが……
jpnSearchText:
そうした理論の存在だけは
大学時代に耳に挟んだことはありますが……

engChrName: For something like this to ACTUALLY happen before our very eyes is just—no. I can't even be certain that's what happened.
engSearchText:
For something like this to ACTUALLY happen
before our very eyes is just—no. I can't even be
certain that's what happened.
jpnChrName: まさかこんな形で目の当たりに…… いや、まだそうと決まったわけでは……
jpnSearchText:
まさかこんな形で目の当たりに……
いや、まだそうと決まったわけでは……

engChrName: A-Anyway, I can't let this shake me up. I'm the boss around here, and taking care of the shop should be the only thing on my mind.
engSearchText:
A-Anyway, I can't let this shake me up. I'm the boss
around here, and taking care of the shop should be
the only thing on my mind.
jpnChrName: と、ともあれ店長として、 今は店の経営を第一に考えねば……
jpnSearchText:
と、ともあれ店長として、
今は店の経営を第一に考えねば……

engChrName: It ain't easy to ignore these kinda things...but right now, I just have to do my job here.
engSearchText:
It ain't easy to ignore these kinda things...but right
now, I just have to do my job here.
jpnChrName: 流石に動揺してしまいますが…… 今は仕事をしなければ……
jpnSearchText:
流石に動揺してしまいますが……
今は仕事をしなければ……

engChrName: Are you all here for Xipha adjustments? If you need anything, just ask.
engSearchText:
Are you all here for Xipha adjustments? If you need
anything, just ask.
jpnChrName: 皆様はザイファの調整でしょうか？ どうかいつでもお申し付けくださいませ。
jpnSearchText:
皆様はザイファの調整でしょうか？
どうかいつでもお申し付けくださいませ。

engChrName: The department store's administrator, Wesley, came by today.
engSearchText:
The department store's administrator, Wesley,
came by today.
jpnChrName: 今日は百貨店のウェスリー支配人が いらっしゃっているようです。
jpnSearchText:
今日は百貨店のウェスリー支配人が
いらっしゃっているようです。

engChrName: He hit it off real well with Ilhan ever since they met, so he's been dropping by from time to time.
engSearchText:
He hit it off real well with Ilhan ever since they met,
so he's been dropping by from time to time.
jpnChrName: どうもイルハンとは気が合ったらしく。 あれから時々顔を出されるんです。
jpnSearchText:
どうもイルハンとは気が合ったらしく。
あれから時々顔を出されるんです。

engChrName: I think the two of them could become good friends, so I decided to keep my nose out of it...
engSearchText:
I think the two of them could become good friends,
so I decided to keep my nose out of it...
jpnChrName: まあ、友好的な関係が築けそうですし 俺も口出しはしない事にしましたが……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、友好的な関係が築けそうですし
俺も口出しはしない事にしましたが……

engChrName: But Ilhan's good natured. And it leads to him getting taken advantage of. I should probably poke around, just a little.
engSearchText:
But Ilhan's good natured. And it leads to him getting
taken advantage of. I should probably poke around,
just a little.
jpnChrName: イルハンはお人好しですからね。 ええ、引き続き気を付けておきますか。
jpnSearchText:
イルハンはお人好しですからね。
ええ、引き続き気を付けておきますか。

engChrName: You know, I got in touch with an old friend of mine from the Basel Institute of Science for the first time in a while.
engSearchText:
You know, I got in touch with an old friend of mine
from the Basel Institute of Science for the first time
in a while.
jpnChrName: 久々にバーゼル理科大学時代の友人と 連絡を取ったのですが……
jpnSearchText:
久々にバーゼル理科大学時代の友人と
連絡を取ったのですが……

engChrName: It sounds like things are a bit of a mess over there right now.
engSearchText:
It sounds like things are a bit of a mess over there
right now.
jpnChrName: 今あちらは少々ゴタついているようですね。
jpnSearchText: 今あちらは少々ゴタついているようですね。

engChrName: They haven't even decided when Xiphas will be available to the general public.
engSearchText:
They haven't even decided when Xiphas will be
available to the general public.
jpnChrName: ザイファの民生品が発売される時期も まだ決めきれていないとか。
jpnSearchText:
ザイファの民生品が発売される時期も
まだ決めきれていないとか。

engChrName: Our Verne partnership was crucial to this store's success, so I'd like to get a sales plan going ASAP.
engSearchText:
Our Verne partnership was crucial to this store's
success, so I'd like to get a sales plan going ASAP.
jpnChrName: この店の成功もヴェルヌ社との提携が肝でしたし 早めに販売計画を立てたいのですが……
jpnSearchText:
この店の成功もヴェルヌ社との提携が肝でしたし
早めに販売計画を立てたいのですが……

engChrName: Both Ilhan and I studied at the Basel Institute of Science, you see. We have a lot of connections from back then, and they've helped us a lot.
engSearchText:
Both Ilhan and I studied at the Basel Institute of
Science, you see. We have a lot of connections from
back then, and they've helped us a lot.
jpnChrName: 俺もイルハンもバーゼル理科大学の出身でして。 当時の人脈には実に助けられていますよ。
jpnSearchText:
俺もイルハンもバーゼル理科大学の出身でして。
当時の人脈には実に助けられていますよ。

engChrName: Our Verne partnership was crucial to this store's success, so I'd like to get a sales plan going ASAP for the new civilian-Xiphas.
engSearchText:
Our Verne partnership was crucial to this store's
success, so I'd like to get a sales plan going ASAP for
the new civilian-Xiphas.
jpnChrName: この店の成功もヴェルヌ社との提携が肝でしたし ザイファの民生品は早めに計画したいのですが……
jpnSearchText:
この店の成功もヴェルヌ社との提携が肝でしたし
ザイファの民生品は早めに計画したいのですが……

engChrName: Wesley basically had to spit it out before Ilhan realized that what he was really here to do was spy on us.
engSearchText:
Wesley basically had to spit it out before Ilhan realized
that what he was really here to do was spy on us.
jpnChrName: イルハンがあまりに気付かないので ウェスリー氏が偵察に来ていたと話したのです。
jpnSearchText:
イルハンがあまりに気付かないので
ウェスリー氏が偵察に来ていたと話したのです。

engChrName: Yeah, he's the department store's administrator. From across the street. Probably wanted to steal some trade secrets, figure out why we're so popular.
engSearchText:
Yeah, he's the department store's administrator.
From across the street. Probably wanted to steal some
trade secrets, figure out why we're so popular.
jpnChrName: そう、向かいの百貨店の支配人ですよ。 ウチの人気の秘密を盗もうと来たんでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
そう、向かいの百貨店の支配人ですよ。
ウチの人気の秘密を盗もうと来たんでしょう。

engChrName: Haha, what a sucker! He might be able to steal an idea or two, but our techniques will forever elude him!
engSearchText:
Haha, what a sucker! He might be able to steal an
idea or two, but our techniques will forever elude him!
jpnChrName: ふふ、ですが残念！　個別のアイデアは盗めても どうやって企画を纏めたかは盗めませんよ！
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、ですが残念！　個別のアイデアは盗めても
どうやって企画を纏めたかは盗めませんよ！

engChrName: And that's 'cause there's no real technique! Most of the time, we just rely on Ilhan getting a sudden eureka moment. None of us know how that works!
engSearchText:
And that's 'cause there's no real technique! Most of
the time, we just rely on Ilhan getting a sudden
eureka moment. None of us know how that works!
jpnChrName: なにせ大半はイルハンの思い付きですからね！ 俺たちにも分からないんです！
jpnSearchText:
なにせ大半はイルハンの思い付きですからね！
俺たちにも分からないんです！

engChrName: ...Wait, saying it out loud doesn't make me feel any better...
engSearchText:
...Wait, saying it out loud doesn't make me feel
any better...
jpnChrName: ……うん、なんだか言っていて 虚しくなってきましたね……
jpnSearchText:
……うん、なんだか言っていて
虚しくなってきましたね……

engChrName: We are always implementing new and innovative ideas...
engSearchText:
We are always implementing new and
innovative ideas...
jpnChrName: ウチは革新的なアイデアを 沢山実行しているのですが……
jpnSearchText:
ウチは革新的なアイデアを
沢山実行しているのですが……

engChrName: But they're mostly just whatever Ilhan's sudden new plans are. It's all so spur of the moment, I don't really get it.
engSearchText:
But they're mostly just whatever Ilhan's sudden new
plans are. It's all so spur of the moment, I don't really
get it.
jpnChrName: 大半はイルハンの思い付きですからね。 俺たちにも正直よく分からないんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
大半はイルハンの思い付きですからね。
俺たちにも正直よく分からないんですよ。

engChrName: He might be a genius, after all. Easygoing as he is.
engSearchText: He might be a genius, after all. Easygoing as he is.
jpnChrName: 単純にセンスがずば抜けていいんでしょうね…… いつものほほんとした奴ですが……
jpnSearchText:
単純にセンスがずば抜けていいんでしょうね……
いつものほほんとした奴ですが……

engChrName: We get fewer customers when it's raining, so I'll have to figure out a new strategy to increase traffic.
engSearchText:
We get fewer customers when it's raining, so I'll have
to figure out a new strategy to increase traffic.
jpnChrName: 雨の日は客足も落ちますし 適切な施策を打たねばなりません。
jpnSearchText:
雨の日は客足も落ちますし
適切な施策を打たねばなりません。

engChrName: Strategies hinge on data, and it's hard to put one in effect when it's all inconsistent. We need to improve.
engSearchText:
Strategies hinge on data, and it's hard to put one in
effect when it's all inconsistent. We need to improve.
jpnChrName: 売り上げが安定しなければ経営戦略も 立てづらいですし、しっかりやらねば……
jpnSearchText:
売り上げが安定しなければ経営戦略も
立てづらいですし、しっかりやらねば……

engChrName: Of course, it'd be way easier if Ilhan came up with REALISTIC policies, and not just pipe-dreams.
engSearchText:
Of course, it'd be way easier if Ilhan came up with
REALISTIC policies, and not just pipe-dreams.
jpnChrName: ……しかしイルハンは、こういった 現実的な施策は何も考えてくれないんですよね。
jpnSearchText:
……しかしイルハンは、こういった
現実的な施策は何も考えてくれないんですよね。

engChrName: Don't get me wrong, he's really smart and his business sense is fantastic, but there could be some improvement in this regard. Oh, a whole lot of it.
engSearchText:
Don't get me wrong, he's really smart and his business
sense is fantastic, but there could be some
improvement in this regard. Oh, a whole lot of it.
jpnChrName: 頭は切れるし事業のアイデアも凄いのに こういう所はダメらしく、やれやれです……
jpnSearchText:
頭は切れるし事業のアイデアも凄いのに
こういう所はダメらしく、やれやれです……

engChrName: Ilhan's an extremely smart guy, but he's totally clueless when it comes to managing a business up close.
engSearchText:
Ilhan's an extremely smart guy, but he's totally
clueless when it comes to managing a business
up close.
jpnChrName: イルハンは非常に頭が切れる奴ですが、 実務の方はサッパリで……
jpnSearchText:
イルハンは非常に頭が切れる奴ですが、
実務の方はサッパリで……

engChrName: *sigh* Guess I'll just have to cover up for his weaknesses.
engSearchText:
*sigh* Guess I'll just have to cover up for
his weaknesses.
jpnChrName: ふう、結局俺が支えてやらないと ダメなんですよね……
jpnSearchText:
ふう、結局俺が支えてやらないと
ダメなんですよね……

engChrName: He's here? Again?
engSearchText: He's here? Again?
jpnChrName: あの人、また来ているのか……
jpnSearchText: あの人、また来ているのか……

engChrName: Oh, don't mind me. We just have somewhat of an unusual customer up on the second floor.
engSearchText:
Oh, don't mind me. We just have somewhat of an
unusual customer up on the second floor.
jpnChrName: あ、いえ……少々珍しいお客様が ２階にいらしていましてね。
jpnSearchText:
あ、いえ……少々珍しいお客様が
２階にいらしていましてね。

engChrName: Is he trying to spy on us? I wonder what Ilhan will do about it.
engSearchText:
Is he trying to spy on us? I wonder what Ilhan will do
about it.
jpnChrName: 偵察、のつもりなのでしょうか…… イルハンがどんな反応をするやら……
jpnSearchText:
偵察、のつもりなのでしょうか……
イルハンがどんな反応をするやら……

engChrName: Hmm... He's been coming by all the time, but I can't just kick him out either.
engSearchText:
Hmm... He's been coming by all the time, but I can't
just kick him out either.
jpnChrName: う～ん、最近よく来ている みたいなんですが、追い返す訳にも……
jpnSearchText:
う～ん、最近よく来ている
みたいなんですが、追い返す訳にも……

engChrName: It could have a real effect on our business if he's out here, trying to get insider info.
engSearchText:
It could have a real effect on our business if he's out
here, trying to get insider info.
jpnChrName: でもウチのノウハウを奪われたんじゃ 経営にも影響しますしね……
jpnSearchText:
でもウチのノウハウを奪われたんじゃ
経営にも影響しますしね……

engChrName: Welcome to our shop! We deal in the latest in orbal technology!
engSearchText:
Welcome to our shop! We deal in the latest in
orbal technology!
jpnChrName: いらっしゃいませ、当店の製品は どれも最新のモデルばかりですよ。
jpnSearchText:
いらっしゃいませ、当店の製品は
どれも最新のモデルばかりですよ。

engChrName: I attended Basel Institute of Science, so I know my way around all our orbal products!
engSearchText:
I attended Basel Institute of Science, so I know my
way around all our orbal products!
jpnChrName: 自分はバーゼルの理科大学に在学し 最先端の導力技術なども学びました。
jpnSearchText:
自分はバーゼルの理科大学に在学し
最先端の導力技術なども学びました。

engChrName: But ever since I met Ilhan, I haven't had much time for orbal tech. My life's all business development and entrepreneurship.
engSearchText:
But ever since I met Ilhan, I haven't had much time
for orbal tech. My life's all business development
and entrepreneurship.
jpnChrName: イルハンと知り合ってからは 起業だの開発だのに振り回されましたが……
jpnSearchText:
イルハンと知り合ってからは
起業だの開発だのに振り回されましたが……

engChrName: *cough* Anyway, our shop takes pride in providing our customers with the very best in both our products and support.
engSearchText:
*cough* Anyway, our shop takes pride in providing
our customers with the very best in both our products
and support.
jpnChrName: コホン、ともかく当店は商品・サポート共に 最高の物をご提供できると自負しております。
jpnSearchText:
コホン、ともかく当店は商品・サポート共に
最高の物をご提供できると自負しております。

engChrName: I've been real close friends with Ilhan since we were in college. He's Iota's owner.
engSearchText:
I've been real close friends with Ilhan since we were
in college. He's Iota's owner.
jpnChrName: この《イオタ》のオーナー、 イルハンは学生時代からの親友なのです。
jpnSearchText:
この《イオタ》のオーナー、
イルハンは学生時代からの親友なのです。

engChrName: He's just so nonchalant that he started playing at being a barista, despite actually owning the place.
engSearchText:
He's just so nonchalant that he started playing at
being a barista, despite actually owning the place.
jpnChrName: どうにもユルっとした奴で オーナーの癖にバリスタなどを始めて……
jpnSearchText:
どうにもユルっとした奴で
オーナーの癖にバリスタなどを始めて……

engChrName: Meanwhile, he left actually managing the shop to me. Geniuses really are crazy, huh?
engSearchText:
Meanwhile, he left actually managing the shop to me.
Geniuses really are crazy, huh?
jpnChrName: 店の経営は俺任せで。 ふう、才能はあるのに何故ああなんだか……
jpnSearchText:
店の経営は俺任せで。
ふう、才能はあるのに何故ああなんだか……

engChrName: Ilhan's been starting up businesses since we were at the institute. The lucky son of a bitch has succeeded with most of them, too.
engSearchText:
Ilhan's been starting up businesses since we were at
the institute. The lucky son of a bitch has succeeded
with most of them, too.
jpnChrName: イルハンは学生時代から起業して 成功を収めるほど才能のある奴なのです。
jpnSearchText:
イルハンは学生時代から起業して
成功を収めるほど才能のある奴なのです。

engChrName: I don't know how, when he has this devil-may-care attitude about EVERYTHING.
engSearchText:
I don't know how, when he has this devil-may-care
attitude about EVERYTHING.
jpnChrName: ですがどうにもユルっとした性格で……
jpnSearchText: ですがどうにもユルっとした性格で……

engChrName: I wish he took things just a little bit more seriously, every now and then...
engSearchText:
I wish he took things just a little bit more seriously,
every now and then...
jpnChrName: ふう、俺としてはもう少し シャキッとして欲しいんですが。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、俺としてはもう少し
シャキッとして欲しいんですが。

engChrName: Oh, Mr. Arkride! I was just about to get in contact with you.
engSearchText:
Oh, Mr. Arkride! I was just about to get in contact
with you.
jpnChrName: おお、アークライド様！ ちょうど今ご連絡をしようかと。
jpnSearchText:
おお、アークライド様！
ちょうど今ご連絡をしようかと。

engChrName: Hope it's 'cause you have good news for me.
engSearchText: Hope it's 'cause you have good news for me.
jpnChrName: おっ、てことは例のモノが入荷したのか？
jpnSearchText: おっ、てことは例のモノが入荷したのか？

engChrName: I do. Your arts plugins arrived.
engSearchText: I do. Your arts plugins arrived.
jpnChrName: ええ、ご注文頂きました “アーツプラグイン”が届いております。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、ご注文頂きました
“アーツプラグイン”が届いております。

engChrName: Umm... A plugin?
engSearchText: Umm... A plugin?
jpnChrName: えっと、すみません…… その“プラグイン”というのは何ですか？
jpnSearchText:
えっと、すみません……
その“プラグイン”というのは何ですか？

engChrName: Oh, yeah. You probably don't know what those are.
engSearchText: Oh, yeah. You probably don't know what those are.
jpnChrName: ああ、説明しておくか。
jpnSearchText: ああ、説明しておくか。

engChrName: You know your Xipha's arts drivers, yeah?
engSearchText: You know your Xipha's arts drivers, yeah?
jpnChrName: 俺やお前さんが使ってるザイファのアーツは “アーツドライバ”を使ってるのは知ってるな？
jpnSearchText:
俺やお前さんが使ってるザイファのアーツは
“アーツドライバ”を使ってるのは知ってるな？

engChrName: Yes. I have several arts set up in mine.
engSearchText: Yes. I have several arts set up in mine.
jpnChrName: はい、ドライバにいくつかのアーツが セットされているんですよね。
jpnSearchText:
はい、ドライバにいくつかのアーツが
セットされているんですよね。

engChrName: Yeah. They still got some empty slots in them where you can put arts in.
engSearchText:
Yeah. They still got some empty slots in them where
you can put arts in.
jpnChrName: ああ、だがなそのドライバには まだアーツをセットできる空きがあるんだ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、だがなそのドライバには
まだアーツをセットできる空きがあるんだ。

engChrName: Those are custom slots.
engSearchText: Those are custom slots.
jpnChrName: その空きを“カスタムスロット”と呼んでいる。
jpnSearchText: その空きを“カスタムスロット”と呼んでいる。

engChrName: That's right! Plugins are what you use to set arts into custom slots.
engSearchText:
That's right! Plugins are what you use to set arts into
custom slots.
jpnChrName: ええ、そのカスタムスロットに アーツをセットできるのが“プラグイン”です。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、そのカスタムスロットに
アーツをセットできるのが“プラグイン”です。

engChrName: Aaand here are the ones you ordered, Van.
engSearchText: Aaand here are the ones you ordered, Van.
jpnChrName: こちら、ご注文の品お渡しいたしますね。
jpnSearchText: こちら、ご注文の品お渡しいたしますね。

engChrName: Received a variety of plugins.
engSearchText: Received a variety of plugins.
jpnChrName: 各属性の“プラグイン”を手に入れた。
jpnSearchText: <C1>各属性の“プラグイン”を手に入れた。

engChrName: Since you paid for those in advance, I can go straight to setting them for you, if you'd like.
engSearchText:
Since you paid for those in advance, I can go straight
to setting them for you, if you'd like.
jpnChrName: 料金は前払いで入金頂いておりますので。 さっそくセットしていかれますか？
jpnSearchText:
料金は前払いで入金頂いておりますので。
さっそくセットしていかれますか？

engChrName: Be my guest.
engSearchText: Be my guest.
jpnChrName: ああ、頼む。
jpnSearchText: ああ、頼む。

engChrName: Plugins can be set by selecting Set Plugin.
engSearchText: Plugins can be set by selecting Set Plugin.
jpnChrName: 「プラグインセット」からプラグインをセットしてください。
jpnSearchText: <C1>「プラグインセット」からプラグインをセットしてください。

engChrName: Oh, so that's how you set arts in.
engSearchText: Oh, so that's how you set arts in.
jpnChrName: なるほど…… これで好きなアーツが使えるわけですね。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど……
これで好きなアーツが使えるわけですね。

engChrName: Yeah. And you're only shellin' out for the plugin itself. Setting them costs nothing.
engSearchText:
Yeah. And you're only shellin' out for the
plugin itself. Setting them costs nothing.
jpnChrName: ああ、それにプラグインは 一度手に入れればセット自体は無料だからな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、それにプラグインは
一度手に入れればセット自体は無料だからな。

engChrName: That's about as much as I can really teach you. The rest, you'll probably learn as you get used to them.
engSearchText:
That's about as much as I can really teach you.
The rest, you'll probably learn as you get used
to them.
jpnChrName: これも、習うより慣れろだ。 いろいろ試行錯誤してみるのがいいかもな。
jpnSearchText:
これも、習うより慣れろだ。
いろいろ試行錯誤してみるのがいいかもな。

engChrName: That aside, I didn't realize she was also a Xipha user...
engSearchText: That aside, I didn't realize she was also a Xipha user...
jpnChrName: それにしても、そちらのお嬢様も ザイファをご使用とは……
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、そちらのお嬢様も
ザイファをご使用とは……

engChrName: It's a long story.
engSearchText: It's a long story.
jpnChrName: ま、いろいろあってな。
jpnSearchText: ま、いろいろあってな。
