engChrName: Our shop stocks both arts drivers and arts plugins. You're more than welcome to come by if you ever need either!
engSearchText:
Our shop stocks both arts drivers and arts plugins.
You're more than welcome to come by if you ever
need either!
jpnChrName: 当店では、他のアーツドライバやプラグインも 取り扱っておりますので、今後ともご贔屓に。
jpnSearchText:
当店では、他のアーツドライバやプラグインも
取り扱っておりますので、今後ともご贔屓に。

engChrName: Thank you. I will.
engSearchText: Thank you. I will.
jpnChrName: こちらこそ。 よろしくお願いします。
jpnSearchText:
こちらこそ。
よろしくお願いします。

engChrName: Xiphas are currently only available for military and bracer use.
engSearchText:
Xiphas are currently only available for military and
bracer use.
jpnChrName: ザイファはまだ軍や遊撃士向けにしか 流通していませんが……
jpnSearchText:
ザイファはまだ軍や遊撃士向けにしか
流通していませんが……

engChrName: Though there are plans in place to release a more civilian friendly custom model.
engSearchText:
Though there are plans in place to release a more
civilian friendly custom model.
jpnChrName: 一般向けにカスタマイズした“民生品”も 近々売り出される予定だそうで。
jpnSearchText:
一般向けにカスタマイズした“民生品”も
近々売り出される予定だそうで。

engChrName: I don't know the details about it, but it sounds like it'll be quite the leap in convenience for next-generation communication.
engSearchText:
I don't know the details about it, but it sounds like
it'll be quite the leap in convenience for
next-generation communication.
jpnChrName: 俺も詳細は聞いていませんが、持ち運びが容易な 次世代通信端末として有望視されているようですね。
jpnSearchText:
俺も詳細は聞いていませんが、持ち運びが容易な
次世代通信端末として有望視されているようですね。

engChrName: Our shop also stocks all the latest tuning devices. Feel free to ask about them if you like.
engSearchText:
Our shop also stocks all the latest tuning devices.
Feel free to ask about them if you like.
jpnChrName: 当店にも最新式の調整装置を置いております。 どうかいつでもお申し付けくださいね。
jpnSearchText:
当店にも最新式の調整装置を置いております。
どうかいつでもお申し付けくださいね。

engChrName: *sigh* I can't think this much without some caffeine in me...
engSearchText:
*sigh* I can't think this much without some caffeine
in me...
jpnChrName: ふう、考え事をしていたら コーヒーが飲みたくなってきちゃったな。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、考え事をしていたら
コーヒーが飲みたくなってきちゃったな。

engChrName: Ahh, no better companion for a nice brainstorming session than a good cup of joe. The best lesson Professor Cronkite ever gave me.
engSearchText:
Ahh, no better companion for a nice brainstorming
session than a good cup of joe. The best lesson
Professor Cronkite ever gave me.
jpnChrName: やっぱり思索とコーヒーはよく合うよ。 クロンカイト教授から教わったんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
やっぱり思索とコーヒーはよく合うよ。
クロンカイト教授から教わったんだけど……

engChrName: But anyway. I'll take a short break and then start working on some countermeasures.
engSearchText:
But anyway. I'll take a short break and then start
working on some countermeasures.
jpnChrName: って今はそれ所じゃないんだった。 一息ついたら、僕も対策を打たないと。
jpnSearchText:
って今はそれ所じゃないんだった。
一息ついたら、僕も対策を打たないと。

engChrName: There must be a limit to what devils can and can't do. That's what we should take advantage of to keep ourselves safe.
engSearchText:
There must be a limit to what devils can and can't do.
That's what we should take advantage of to keep
ourselves safe.
jpnChrName: “化け物”の行動にもルールがあるみたいだし 身の安全は図れると思う──
jpnSearchText:
“化け物”の行動にもルールがあるみたいだし
身の安全は図れると思う──

engChrName: I'm planning on cooperating with Marduk to help provide people with both food and shelter.
engSearchText:
I'm planning on cooperating with Marduk to help
provide people with both food and shelter.
jpnChrName: ＭＫ社の人たちとも連携しつつ 食事と休める場所を提供していくつもりだよ。
jpnSearchText:
ＭＫ社の人たちとも連携しつつ
食事と休める場所を提供していくつもりだよ。

engChrName: Logically speaking, it doesn't make sense to think that time itself stopped.
engSearchText:
Logically speaking, it doesn't make sense to think
that time itself stopped.
jpnChrName: まるで時空間が“停止”しているような この現象……常識ではありえないね……
jpnSearchText:
まるで時空間が“停止”しているような
この現象……常識ではありえないね……

engChrName: But Professor Cronkite and I have been discussing the matter, and theorizing on it.
engSearchText:
But Professor Cronkite and I have been discussing
the matter, and theorizing on it.
jpnChrName: クロンカイト教授とも意見交換したけど 可能性があるとすれば、恐らく──
jpnSearchText:
クロンカイト教授とも意見交換したけど
可能性があるとすれば、恐らく──

engChrName: If time really did stop, then the only way it'd make sense would be if we were somewhere where the laws of time don't apply in the first place...
engSearchText:
If time really did stop, then the only way it'd make
sense would be if we were somewhere where the
laws of time don't apply in the first place...
jpnChrName: ここがそういった“ルール”の働く 空間だという事、つまり……
jpnSearchText:
ここがそういった“ルール”の働く
空間だという事、つまり……

engChrName: No, actually. The city's normal, but got swallowed up by this whole mess. If so, then the only way to fix this would be to... Hmm...
engSearchText:
No, actually. The city's normal, but got swallowed up
by this whole mess. If so, then the only way to fix this
would be to... Hmm...
jpnChrName: いやでも、通常空間が呑み込まれたとすれば 元に戻す方法は……ぶつぶつ……
jpnSearchText:
いやでも、通常空間が呑み込まれたとすれば
元に戻す方法は……ぶつぶつ……

engChrName: Uhh, my apologies. I was just thinking out loud...
engSearchText: Uhh, my apologies. I was just thinking out loud...
jpnChrName: えっとゴメンよ、ちょっと考え事を……
jpnSearchText: えっとゴメンよ、ちょっと考え事を……

engChrName: If normal laws and theories don't apply to this place, then the only way to fix this would be to... Hmm...
engSearchText:
If normal laws and theories don't apply to this place,
then the only way to fix this would be to... Hmm...
jpnChrName: 特殊な“ルール”の働く空間だとすると 元に戻す方法は……ぶつぶつ……
jpnSearchText:
特殊な“ルール”の働く空間だとすると
元に戻す方法は……ぶつぶつ……

engChrName: Happy Revolution Festival! To celebrate the occasion, all of our patrons today will get a free gift with their visit.
engSearchText:
Happy Revolution Festival! To celebrate the
occasion, all of our patrons today will get a free gift
with their visit.
jpnChrName: 革命記念祭、おめでとう～！ 今日は来店記念にサービスをしているよ。
jpnSearchText:
革命記念祭、おめでとう～！
今日は来店記念にサービスをしているよ。

engChrName: I'm giving out one item to every customer.
engSearchText: I'm giving out one item to every customer.
jpnChrName: お客さんに合わせて 僕から一品贈らせてもらっているんだ。
jpnSearchText:
お客さんに合わせて
僕から一品贈らせてもらっているんだ。

engChrName: Let's see. What do I got here for you two? How about this?
engSearchText:
Let's see. What do I got here for you two? How
about this?
jpnChrName: お二人には……そうだね、 こんな品なんてどうかな？
jpnSearchText:
お二人には……そうだね、
こんな品なんてどうかな？

engChrName: Obtained 2  .
engSearchText:
Obtained 2
.
jpnChrName: {CC_ITEM=ITEM_USE_EP_02}を２個手に入れた。
jpnSearchText: <C1>{CC_ITEM=ITEM_USE_EP_02}を２個手に入れた。

engChrName: Thanks. This'll come in handy.
engSearchText: Thanks. This'll come in handy.
jpnChrName: サンキュー、ありがたく 使わせてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
サンキュー、ありがたく
使わせてもらうぜ。

engChrName: Sure it will. Be sure to come back to Orbal Café Iota soon!
engSearchText:
Sure it will. Be sure to come back to Orbal Café
Iota soon!
jpnChrName: うんうん、オーバルカフェ《イオタ》を 今後ともよろしくね～！
jpnSearchText:
うんうん、オーバルカフェ《イオタ》を
今後ともよろしくね～！

engChrName: Haha, everyone in the city looks like they're having so much fun. Nothin' beats a good festival.
engSearchText:
Haha, everyone in the city looks like they're having so
much fun. Nothin' beats a good festival.
jpnChrName: ふふ、街を行きかう人もみんな 楽しそうだし、やっぱりお祭りはいいよね～。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、街を行きかう人もみんな
楽しそうだし、やっぱりお祭りはいいよね～。

engChrName: Now that I think about it, I feel like Carlo mentioned something important I had to do...
engSearchText:
Now that I think about it, I feel like Carlo mentioned
something important I had to do...
jpnChrName: ってそういえば、カルロに 何か言われてたような……？
jpnSearchText:
ってそういえば、カルロに
何か言われてたような……？

engChrName: Wasn't the Financial Association's Banquet today, actually? Ugh, I guess I'll start getting ready for that soon.
engSearchText:
Wasn't the Financial Association's Banquet
today, actually? Ugh, I guess I'll start getting ready for
that soon.
jpnChrName: 経済連の祝賀会だっけ？ う～ん、もう少ししたら準備を始めようかな。
jpnSearchText:
経済連の祝賀会だっけ？
う～ん、もう少ししたら準備を始めようかな。

engChrName: Carlo gave me a real earful yesterday when I suggested starting a new business.
engSearchText:
Carlo gave me a real earful yesterday when I
suggested starting a new business.
jpnChrName: 新しい事業でも始めようかな～って カルロに話したら、酷く叱られちゃったよ。
jpnSearchText:
新しい事業でも始めようかな～って
カルロに話したら、酷く叱られちゃったよ。

engChrName: Told me it wasn't a coincidence this shop was as successful as it was. That it was the work of all employees here.
engSearchText:
Told me it wasn't a coincidence this shop was as
successful as it was. That it was the work of all
employees here.
jpnChrName: この店がうまく行っているのは 従業員たちが頑張ってくれてるからだって。
jpnSearchText:
この店がうまく行っているのは
従業員たちが頑張ってくれてるからだって。

engChrName: And he's right about that. I've been focusing on the wrong things.
engSearchText:
And he's right about that. I've been focusing on the
wrong things.
jpnChrName: そうだよね……僕とした事が 大切な事を見失ってたみたいだ……
jpnSearchText:
そうだよね……僕とした事が
大切な事を見失ってたみたいだ……

engChrName: That's not the kinda suggestion I can make on a whim.
engSearchText:
That's not the kinda suggestion I can make on
a whim.
jpnChrName: 軽々しく言う事じゃなかったな。 う～ん、ここは一つ………
jpnSearchText:
軽々しく言う事じゃなかったな。
う～ん、ここは一つ………

engChrName: Administrator Wesley has been working hard to come up with new ideas, too.
engSearchText:
Administrator Wesley has been working hard to
come up with new ideas, too.
jpnChrName: ウェスリー支配人も色々知恵を絞って 企画を考えているみたいだね～。
jpnSearchText:
ウェスリー支配人も色々知恵を絞って
企画を考えているみたいだね～。

engChrName: Haha, as if he could ever beat me.
engSearchText: Haha, as if he could ever beat me.
jpnChrName: ふふ、僕も負けてられないな。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、僕も負けてられないな。

engChrName: Iota's doing so well, it might even be time to start branching out to other stuff. Hmm...
engSearchText:
Iota's doing so well, it might even be time to start
branching out to other stuff. Hmm...
jpnChrName: 《イオタ》も順調だし、ここは一つ 新しい事業でも始めようかな？
jpnSearchText:
《イオタ》も順調だし、ここは一つ
新しい事業でも始めようかな？

engChrName: I... I never thought something like this would ever happen.
engSearchText:
I... I never thought something like this would
ever happen.
jpnChrName: こんな事になっちゃうなんてね…… ついこの前までは予想だにしなかったよ……
jpnSearchText:
こんな事になっちゃうなんてね……
ついこの前までは予想だにしなかったよ……

engChrName: The former Institute of Science student in me can't help but have some ideas as to how this happened.
engSearchText:
The former Institute of Science student in me can't
help but have some ideas as to how this happened.
jpnChrName: バーゼル理科大学の出身としても 思う所はあるけれど……
jpnSearchText:
バーゼル理科大学の出身としても
思う所はあるけれど……

engChrName: But I digress. Let me offer you a cup of coffee, to calm down the nerves.
engSearchText:
But I digress. Let me offer you a cup of coffee, to
calm down the nerves.
jpnChrName: 今は、お客さんの心を少しでも癒せるよう 美味しいコーヒーを淹れさせてもらうよ。
jpnSearchText:
今は、お客さんの心を少しでも癒せるよう
美味しいコーヒーを淹れさせてもらうよ。

engChrName: I've been wondering if there's anything I can do.
engSearchText: I've been wondering if there's anything I can do.
jpnChrName: 僕としても、何かできないか 考えてはいるけれど……
jpnSearchText:
僕としても、何かできないか
考えてはいるけれど……

engChrName: But this isn't just some political or economic problem. Throwing mira at it won't solve a thing.
engSearchText:
But this isn't just some political or economic problem.
Throwing mira at it won't solve a thing.
jpnChrName: 経済的・政治的な問題とは違って ミラで解決できるものじゃないからね……
jpnSearchText:
経済的・政治的な問題とは違って
ミラで解決できるものじゃないからね……

engChrName: As of now, what I can do is offer my customers some form of respite, however small.
engSearchText:
As of now, what I can do is offer my customers some
form of respite, however small.
jpnChrName: 今は、目の前のお客さんの心を 少しでも癒すことにするよ。
jpnSearchText:
今は、目の前のお客さんの心を
少しでも癒すことにするよ。

engChrName: Administrator Wesley's taken a real shine to Iota lately.
engSearchText:
Administrator Wesley's taken a real shine to
Iota lately.
jpnChrName: ウェスリー支配人は《イオタ》の 大ファンらしいんだ。
jpnSearchText:
ウェスリー支配人は《イオタ》の
大ファンらしいんだ。

engChrName: I'm glad he's been moving things along. He's building a small terrace area on the rooftop.
engSearchText:
I'm glad he's been moving things along. He's building
a small terrace area on the rooftop.
jpnChrName: ふふ、高じて屋上テラスまで作るなんて ホントありがたい話だよね～。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、高じて屋上テラスまで作るなんて
ホントありがたい話だよね～。

engChrName: The person I look up to the most has to be Professor Hamilton. She's one of Epstein's three disciples.
engSearchText:
The person I look up to the most has to be
Professor Hamilton. She's one of Epstein's
three disciples.
jpnChrName: 僕が一番尊敬しているのは、 やっぱり“三高弟”ハミルトン博士だなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
僕が一番尊敬しているのは、
やっぱり“三高弟”ハミルトン博士だなぁ。

engChrName: She's simply extraordinary. She kept an eye out for me where she could, back when I was studying in the Institute of Science.
engSearchText:
She's simply extraordinary. She kept an eye out for
me where she could, back when I was studying in the
Institute of Science.
jpnChrName: 理科大学に在学中、お世話になってね。 博士は本当に別格だったよ。
jpnSearchText:
理科大学に在学中、お世話になってね。
博士は本当に別格だったよ。

engChrName: I always get the impression that she sees things differently than we do.
engSearchText:
I always get the impression that she sees things
differently than we do.
jpnChrName: それに……あの人の目には、僕らとは 違った世界が見えてる気がするんだよね。
jpnSearchText:
それに……あの人の目には、僕らとは
違った世界が見えてる気がするんだよね。

engChrName: Now that she's resigned as a Verne advisor, she's gotten involved with geological research to aid the eastern parts of Zemuria.
engSearchText:
Now that she's resigned as a Verne advisor, she's
gotten involved with geological research to aid the
eastern parts of Zemuria.
jpnChrName: 今だって、ヴェルヌ社の顧問を辞して 大陸東方の地質改善を研究してる──
jpnSearchText:
今だって、ヴェルヌ社の顧問を辞して
大陸東方の地質改善を研究してる──

engChrName: Her demeanor was always majestic, and something all of my peers looked up to.
engSearchText:
Her demeanor was always majestic, and something all
of my peers looked up to.
jpnChrName: あの人の人柄に惚れこんじゃった学生も 当時は沢山いたな～。
jpnSearchText:
あの人の人柄に惚れこんじゃった学生も
当時は沢山いたな～。

engChrName: Since we're both from the Central East, I felt some sort of...kinship with her.
engSearchText:
Since we're both from the Central East, I felt
some sort of...kinship with her.
jpnChrName: 博士とは同じ中東系って所で シンパシーもあったんだよね。
jpnSearchText:
博士とは同じ中東系って所で
シンパシーもあったんだよね。

engChrName: I wanted to travel with her to the East, but she turned me down.
engSearchText:
I wanted to travel with her to the East, but she turned
me down.
jpnChrName: 大陸東方には僕もついて行きたかったけど 断られちゃってね。
jpnSearchText:
大陸東方には僕もついて行きたかったけど
断られちゃってね。

engChrName: The most I could do to aid her was make a donation towards her research. The funds came from the earnings from my startup, of course.
engSearchText:
The most I could do to aid her was make a donation
towards her research. The funds came from the
earnings from my startup, of course.
jpnChrName: 仕方なくベンチャー起業で稼いだミラを 研究に寄付させてもらったっけ。
jpnSearchText:
仕方なくベンチャー起業で稼いだミラを
研究に寄付させてもらったっけ。

engChrName: She's quite old at this point, but I hope she's been doing well.
engSearchText:
She's quite old at this point, but I hope she's been
doing well.
jpnChrName: もうご高齢だけど……東方でも 元気にされているのかなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
もうご高齢だけど……東方でも
元気にされているのかなぁ。

engChrName: As it turns out, that new regular of ours was the administrator of the department store that's just across the street.
engSearchText:
As it turns out, that new regular of ours was the
administrator of the department store that's just across
the street.
jpnChrName: 最近よく来てくれていたお爺さん…… お向かいの百貨店の支配人だったらしいんだ。
jpnSearchText:
最近よく来てくれていたお爺さん……
お向かいの百貨店の支配人だったらしいんだ。

engChrName: Maybe this means that he's...
engSearchText: Maybe this means that he's...
jpnChrName: ……これは、もしかして……
jpnSearchText: ……これは、もしかして……

engChrName: ...a big fan of Iota!
engSearchText: ...a big fan of Iota!
jpnChrName: 支配人さんも《イオタ》の 大ファンだったって事かな！？
jpnSearchText:
支配人さんも《イオタ》の
大ファンだったって事かな！？

engChrName: Ahaha, that's quite flattering! I know Iota's a whole lot more than just me, but it's still an honor.
engSearchText:
Ahaha, that's quite flattering! I know Iota's a whole
lot more than just me, but it's still an honor.
jpnChrName: アハハ、ちょっと嬉しいよね。 僕としても光栄だなぁ～。
jpnSearchText:
アハハ、ちょっと嬉しいよね。
僕としても光栄だなぁ～。

engChrName: Even though it's raining, it's surprisingly not very humid outside.
engSearchText:
Even though it's raining, it's surprisingly not very
humid outside.
jpnChrName: 今夜は雨が降って、気圧も低いみたいだね。
jpnSearchText: 今夜は雨が降って、気圧も低いみたいだね。

engChrName: On gloomy days like this, I recommend some strong coffee. It'll give your day just that extra kick that it needs.
engSearchText:
On gloomy days like this, I recommend some
strong coffee. It'll give your day just that extra kick
that it needs.
jpnChrName: こんな日は濃いめのコーヒーがお勧めだよ。 膨張しがちな血管を整えてくれるからね。
jpnSearchText:
こんな日は濃いめのコーヒーがお勧めだよ。
膨張しがちな血管を整えてくれるからね。

engChrName: This doesn't work for everyone, but some people find it helps with headaches, too.
engSearchText:
This doesn't work for everyone, but some people find
it helps with headaches, too.
jpnChrName: 体質にもよるけど、頭痛なんかが ましになる人もいるよね～。
jpnSearchText:
体質にもよるけど、頭痛なんかが
ましになる人もいるよね～。

engChrName: I use a slightly different blend on rainy days.
engSearchText: I use a slightly different blend on rainy days.
jpnChrName: 僕も雨の日は、ちょっとだけ ブレンドを変えてるんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
僕も雨の日は、ちょっとだけ
ブレンドを変えてるんだよ。

engChrName: This old dude from earlier kept looking at me weird.
engSearchText: This old dude from earlier kept looking at me weird.
jpnChrName: この前から来てくれる、あのお爺さん…… 僕の事をチラチラ見てくるんだよね。
jpnSearchText:
この前から来てくれる、あのお爺さん……
僕の事をチラチラ見てくるんだよね。

engChrName: I'm kinda suspicious of him. He kept scrutinizing basically everything in the café.
engSearchText:
I'm kinda suspicious of him. He kept scrutinizing
basically everything in the café.
jpnChrName: あと店内も必要以上にジロジロと…… なんだか挙動不審というか……
jpnSearchText:
あと店内も必要以上にジロジロと……
なんだか挙動不審というか……

engChrName: Maybe this means that he's...
engSearchText: Maybe this means that he's...
jpnChrName: ……これは、もしかして……
jpnSearchText: ……これは、もしかして……

engChrName: ...a big fan of Iota! Ahaha, I sure hope that's the case!
engSearchText: ...a big fan of Iota! Ahaha, I sure hope that's the case!
jpnChrName: 《イオタ》の大ファンなのかな？ アハハ、そうだといいな～！
jpnSearchText:
《イオタ》の大ファンなのかな？
アハハ、そうだといいな～！

engChrName: I decided to be a barista on a whim and have kinda just been winging it this whole time. I get self-conscious when people stare...
engSearchText:
I decided to be a barista on a whim and have kinda
just been winging it this whole time. I get
self-conscious when people stare...
jpnChrName: 僕も真似事でバリスタを始めたので あまり見られると恥ずかしいなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
僕も真似事でバリスタを始めたので
あまり見られると恥ずかしいなぁ。

engChrName: I've been practicing so much I might even hold my own decently in a barista championship, but I still feel a little odd.
engSearchText:
I've been practicing so much I might even hold my
own decently in a barista championship, but I still feel
a little odd.
jpnChrName: 一応練習して、バリスタ大会で 優勝するくらいにはなったけど……
jpnSearchText:
一応練習して、バリスタ大会で
優勝するくらいにはなったけど……

engChrName: Guy's here almost every day. Makes me feel a little sheepish.
engSearchText:
Guy's here almost every day. Makes me feel a
little sheepish.
jpnChrName: あのお爺さんは毎日のように来ていて さすがに照れちゃうなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
あのお爺さんは毎日のように来ていて
さすがに照れちゃうなぁ。

engChrName: Hey. You mind if we ask some questions? It's about the woman in this photo.
engSearchText:
Hey. You mind if we ask some questions? It's about
the woman in this photo.
jpnChrName: その写真の女性について よければ聞かせて貰えるか。
jpnSearchText:
その写真の女性について
よければ聞かせて貰えるか。

engChrName: We received a request from a young man asking us to look for his estranged sister, Jessica.
engSearchText:
We received a request from a young man asking us to
look for his estranged sister, Jessica.
jpnChrName: 生き別れのお兄さんからの依頼で、 妹のジェシカさんを探しているんです。
jpnSearchText:
生き別れのお兄さんからの依頼で、
妹のジェシカさんを探しているんです。

engChrName: We talked to Lucia about it. She directed us here.
engSearchText: We talked to Lucia about it. She directed us here.
jpnChrName: ルチアさんから話を聞いて こちらに伺ったんですが……
jpnSearchText:
ルチアさんから話を聞いて
こちらに伺ったんですが……

engChrName: Do you happen to know where she might be living at the moment, or how we could get in contact with her?
engSearchText:
Do you happen to know where she might be living at
the moment, or how we could get in contact
with her?
jpnChrName: 今は何処にお住まいか、 または何処でなら会えるかご存じですか？
jpnSearchText:
今は何処にお住まいか、
または何処でなら会えるかご存じですか？

engChrName: Her brother? Did he give you this photo?
engSearchText: Her brother? Did he give you this photo?
jpnChrName: 生き別れのお兄さん、だって？ けどこの写真は…………
jpnSearchText:
生き別れのお兄さん、だって？
けどこの写真は…………

engChrName: If you know anything at all, please tell us! It'd be a big help!
engSearchText:
If you know anything at all, please tell us! It'd be a
big help!
jpnChrName: ？　知っている事があればなんでも 教えてもらえると助かりますっ！
jpnSearchText:
？　知っている事があればなんでも
教えてもらえると助かりますっ！

engChrName: I'd love to help you, but, unfortunately, I don't know where she moved to. I'm really sorry.
engSearchText:
I'd love to help you, but, unfortunately, I don't know
where she moved to. I'm really sorry.
jpnChrName: ……協力したい気持ちは山々だけど、 残念だが引っ越し先は知らないんだ。
jpnSearchText:
……協力したい気持ちは山々だけど、
残念だが引っ越し先は知らないんだ。

engChrName: I wish I could've been of help.
engSearchText: I wish I could've been of help.
jpnChrName: 力になれなくて、申し訳ない。
jpnSearchText: 力になれなくて、申し訳ない。

engChrName: Aww, seriously?!
engSearchText: Aww, seriously?!
jpnChrName: ええ～っ！　そんなぁ……
jpnSearchText: ええ～っ！　そんなぁ……

engChrName: (I don't think he's being completely honest with us.)
engSearchText: (I don't think he's being completely honest with us.)
jpnChrName: （イルハンさん……   なんだか深刻そうな雰囲気ですね。）
jpnSearchText:
（イルハンさん……
なんだか深刻そうな雰囲気ですね。）

engChrName: (He might know something else about Jessica that he's not telling us.)
engSearchText:
(He might know something else about Jessica that
he's not telling us.)
jpnChrName: （ジェシカさんに関して   何か大事な事を知っているんじゃ……？）
jpnSearchText:
（ジェシカさんに関して
何か大事な事を知っているんじゃ……？）

engChrName: Let's start from the bottom. I'm a spriggan. Not with the police or the guild, and I don't do things their way either.
engSearchText:
Let's start from the bottom. I'm a spriggan. Not with
the police or the guild, and I don't do things their
way either.
jpnChrName: 改めて説明すると俺達は《裏解決屋》でな。 警察や遊撃士とは違うやり方をさせてもらってる。
jpnSearchText:
改めて説明すると俺達は《裏解決屋》でな。
警察や遊撃士とは違うやり方をさせてもらってる。

engChrName: We're pretty flexible, really.
engSearchText: We're pretty flexible, really.
jpnChrName: そういう意味では、 今回の件も融通は利くと思うぜ？
jpnSearchText:
そういう意味では、
今回の件も融通は利くと思うぜ？

engChrName: So, if you're worried about her, why don't you tell us what's goin' on. It'll probably be easier in the long run.
engSearchText:
So, if you're worried about her, why don't you tell us
what's goin' on. It'll probably be easier in the
long run.
jpnChrName: 彼女の心配をしてんなら、 ここでケリを付けちまった方が良いと思うけどな。
jpnSearchText:
彼女の心配をしてんなら、
ここでケリを付けちまった方が良いと思うけどな。

engChrName: So...you know, then?
engSearchText: So...you know, then?
jpnChrName: ケリを付ける、か。 もしかして……気付いているのかい？
jpnSearchText:
ケリを付ける、か。
もしかして……気付いているのかい？

engChrName: Ain't got hard proof, but I got an idea.
engSearchText: Ain't got hard proof, but I got an idea.
jpnChrName: まだ確証はねえが、おおむねな。
jpnSearchText: まだ確証はねえが、おおむねな。

engChrName: Umm, what's going on? I feel like I'm missing something...
engSearchText:
Umm, what's going on? I feel like I'm
missing something...
jpnChrName: むむっ、一体何の事でしょうか？ でも何となく引っかかるような……？
jpnSearchText:
むむっ、一体何の事でしょうか？
でも何となく引っかかるような……？

engChrName: I'm not completely sure, but I think I know what Van's getting at.
engSearchText:
I'm not completely sure, but I think I know what
Van's getting at.
jpnChrName: ……私も確証はありませんけど、 何となく見えて来た気がします。
jpnSearchText:
……私も確証はありませんけど、
何となく見えて来た気がします。

engChrName: And if he's right, then we can't just keep ignoring this.
engSearchText:
And if he's right, then we can't just keep
ignoring this.
jpnChrName: でも、この推測が当たっているなら ヴァンさんの言う通り放って置けませんよ。
jpnSearchText:
でも、この推測が当たっているなら
ヴァンさんの言う通り放って置けませんよ。

engChrName: I know you have your reasons for what you're doing, but if you don't tell us what's going on, then we can't help Jessica.
engSearchText:
I know you have your reasons for what you're doing,
but if you don't tell us what's going on, then we can't
help Jessica.
jpnChrName: イルハンさんの意図は分かりますが、 このままだとジェシカさんの為になりません。
jpnSearchText:
イルハンさんの意図は分かりますが、
このままだとジェシカさんの為になりません。

engChrName: Would you be willing to trust us?
engSearchText: Would you be willing to trust us?
jpnChrName: どうか、私達を信じてもらえないでしょうか……？
jpnSearchText: どうか、私達を信じてもらえないでしょうか……？

engChrName: That's...a good point.
engSearchText: That's...a good point.
jpnChrName: そこまで言うとは……
jpnSearchText: そこまで言うとは……

engChrName: Fine. I trust you.
engSearchText: Fine. I trust you.
jpnChrName: ……分かったよ、 解決事務所の君たちを信じよう。
jpnSearchText:
……分かったよ、
解決事務所の君たちを信じよう。

engChrName: But I don't really have a right to talk about it. I think it's better you hear it from the horse's mouth.
engSearchText:
But I don't really have a right to talk about it. I think
it's better you hear it from the horse's mouth.
jpnChrName: ただし、僕の口からは言えないかな。 本人から聞いた方が早いだろうしね。
jpnSearchText:
ただし、僕の口からは言えないかな。
本人から聞いた方が早いだろうしね。

engChrName: What do you mean?
engSearchText: What do you mean?
jpnChrName: という事は……！
jpnSearchText: という事は……！

engChrName: I'll get in touch with Jessica and see if I can get you guys to meet up.
engSearchText:
I'll get in touch with Jessica and see if I can get you
guys to meet up.
jpnChrName: ああ、ジェシカさんに連絡をとって 君たちと会えるよう話してみよう。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、ジェシカさんに連絡をとって
君たちと会えるよう話してみよう。

engChrName: You know what you're doing, so I leave the rest to you.
engSearchText:
You know what you're doing, so I leave the rest
to you.
jpnChrName: 察して貰えていると思うけど…… 後の事はどうかよろしく頼んだよ。
jpnSearchText:
察して貰えていると思うけど……
後の事はどうかよろしく頼んだよ。

engChrName: Cool. No prob.
engSearchText: Cool. No prob.
jpnChrName: ああ、後は任せておけ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、後は任せておけ。

engChrName: Ilhan got in contact with Jessica through his orbal terminal, arranging for her to meet the team at the café.
engSearchText:
Ilhan got in contact with Jessica through his orbal
terminal, arranging for her to meet the team at
the café.
jpnChrName: その後イルハンは端末を使って連絡をかけ…… ジェシカとオーバルカフェで合流する事となった。
jpnSearchText:
その後イルハンは端末を使って連絡をかけ……
ジェシカとオーバルカフェで合流する事となった。

engChrName: Jessica will be here very soon.
engSearchText: Jessica will be here very soon.
jpnChrName: ジェシカさんなら 間もなく到着するとのことだ。
jpnSearchText:
ジェシカさんなら
間もなく到着するとのことだ。

engChrName: I'll serve you some drinks, so you can just take a seat and wait.
engSearchText:
I'll serve you some drinks, so you can just take a seat
and wait.
jpnChrName: 飲み物を出すから、 君たちはあちらの席で待っててくれ。
jpnSearchText:
飲み物を出すから、
君たちはあちらの席で待っててくれ。

engChrName: I'm leaving things in your hands.
engSearchText: I'm leaving things in your hands.
jpnChrName: ……彼女の事を、どうかよろしく頼んだよ。
jpnSearchText: ……彼女の事を、どうかよろしく頼んだよ。

engChrName: I happened to hear from Jessica a little while ago.
engSearchText: I happened to hear from Jessica a little while ago.
jpnChrName: ついさっき、 ジェシカさんから連絡が来てね。
jpnSearchText:
ついさっき、
ジェシカさんから連絡が来てね。

engChrName: Sounds like you managed to get everything settled without an issue. Thank you so much!
engSearchText:
Sounds like you managed to get everything settled
without an issue. Thank you so much!
jpnChrName: どうやら無事に解決してくれたそうだね。 本当にありがとう！
jpnSearchText:
どうやら無事に解決してくれたそうだね。
本当にありがとう！

engChrName: I didn't really know what to think of you lot when you first approached me about it. In retrospect, I feel silly about doubting you.
engSearchText:
I didn't really know what to think of you lot when
you first approached me about it. In retrospect, I feel
silly about doubting you.
jpnChrName: 最初に話を聞いた時、君たちを少しでも 疑ってしまった自分が恥ずかしいよ。
jpnSearchText:
最初に話を聞いた時、君たちを少しでも
疑ってしまった自分が恥ずかしいよ。

engChrName: Oh, don't worry about it. You had every right to doubt us.
engSearchText:
Oh, don't worry about it. You had every right to
doubt us.
jpnChrName: お気になさらないで下さい、 実際私達も確信はありませんでしたし。
jpnSearchText:
お気になさらないで下さい、
実際私達も確信はありませんでしたし。

engChrName: Haha, yeah. I guess.
engSearchText: Haha, yeah. I guess.
jpnChrName: はは、ありがとう。
jpnSearchText: はは、ありがとう。

engChrName: Here's a little something for you. A token of gratitude.
engSearchText:
Here's a little something for you. A token
of gratitude.
jpnChrName: それじゃあ僕からも、 ささやかだけどお礼をさせて貰おうかな。
jpnSearchText:
それじゃあ僕からも、
ささやかだけどお礼をさせて貰おうかな。

engChrName: Obtained 3  .
engSearchText:
Obtained 3
.
jpnChrName: {CC_ITEM=ITEM_USE_DRINK_01}を３個手に入れた。
jpnSearchText: <C1>{CC_ITEM=ITEM_USE_DRINK_01}を３個手に入れた。

engChrName: Ohh! Thank you SO much!
engSearchText: Ohh! Thank you SO much!
jpnChrName: わぁ～！　ありがとうございます！
jpnSearchText: わぁ～！　ありがとうございます！

engChrName: Thanks. Appreciate it.
engSearchText: Thanks. Appreciate it.
jpnChrName: ありがたく頂いておくぜ。
jpnSearchText: ありがたく頂いておくぜ。

engChrName: I'm from the Central East, but I studied abroad at the Basel Institute of Science.
engSearchText:
I'm from the Central East, but I studied abroad at the
Basel Institute of Science.
jpnChrName: 僕は中東出身でね、バーゼル理科大学に 留学してたんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
僕は中東出身でね、バーゼル理科大学に
留学してたんだよ。

engChrName: The institute was great. They had the best professors in the Republic, and I made a lot of friends there.
engSearchText:
The institute was great. They had the best professors
in the Republic, and I made a lot of friends there.
jpnChrName: 在学中も楽しかったなぁ、いろんな友達が出来て 共和国最高峰の教授陣に教わって。
jpnSearchText:
在学中も楽しかったなぁ、いろんな友達が出来て
共和国最高峰の教授陣に教わって。

engChrName: I had a startup around that time. Unexpectedly, it was real successful! Got a good hunk o' cash from it.
engSearchText:
I had a startup around that time. Unexpectedly, it was
real successful! Got a good hunk o' cash from it.
jpnChrName: あと在学中にベンチャーを立ち上げたら うまく行っちゃってね、纏まった資金もできて。
jpnSearchText:
あと在学中にベンチャーを立ち上げたら
うまく行っちゃってね、纏まった資金もできて。

engChrName: With that, I set up this place. Man, how time flies.
engSearchText: With that, I set up this place. Man, how time flies.
jpnChrName: それでここを立ち上げたんだよねぇ。 ふふっ、あっという間だったな～。
jpnSearchText:
それでここを立ち上げたんだよねぇ。
ふふっ、あっという間だったな～。

engChrName: Carlo and I actually go way back. We both studied at the institute.
engSearchText:
Carlo and I actually go way back. We both studied at
the institute.
jpnChrName: ちなみにカルロは、在学中からの親友なんだ。
jpnSearchText: ちなみにカルロは、在学中からの親友なんだ。

engChrName: He's the one that actually runs this shop. Dunno what I'd do without him.
engSearchText:
He's the one that actually runs this shop. Dunno what
I'd do without him.
jpnChrName: 店長を引き受けてくれてね、 ホントいい奴だよ～。
jpnSearchText:
店長を引き受けてくれてね、
ホントいい奴だよ～。

engChrName: If it weren't for him, I wouldn't have the time to be a simple barista.
engSearchText:
If it weren't for him, I wouldn't have the time to be a
simple barista.
jpnChrName: 僕がのんびりバリスタできるのも カルロのお陰なんだよね。
jpnSearchText:
僕がのんびりバリスタできるのも
カルロのお陰なんだよね。

engChrName: Here's your order: Our seasonal latte. Thank you, and be careful not to burn yourself!
engSearchText:
Here's your order: Our seasonal latte. Thank you, and
be careful not to burn yourself!
jpnChrName: ご注文ありがとう。 限定ラテ、熱いから気を付けてね。
jpnSearchText:
ご注文ありがとう。
限定ラテ、熱いから気を付けてね。

engChrName: Hope you enjoy it, and do come back soon! I'd love to see you here as a regular.
engSearchText:
Hope you enjoy it, and do come back soon! I'd love to
see you here as a regular.
jpnChrName: 気に入ったらまた来てくれると嬉しいよ。
jpnSearchText: 気に入ったらまた来てくれると嬉しいよ。

engChrName: Hey there. Welcome to Orbal Café Iota.
engSearchText: Hey there. Welcome to Orbal Café Iota.
jpnChrName: やあいらっしゃい。 オーバルカフェ《イオタ》へようこそ。
jpnSearchText:
やあいらっしゃい。
オーバルカフェ《イオタ》へようこそ。

engChrName: Did you get a chance to check out our first floor? We manage the orbal side of the café down there.
engSearchText:
Did you get a chance to check out our first floor?
We manage the orbal side of the café down there.
jpnChrName: 下の階の導力製品は見た？ ああいうのを“オーバルストア”っていうんだ。
jpnSearchText:
下の階の導力製品は見た？
ああいうのを“オーバルストア”っていうんだ。

engChrName: And that's where our name came from!
engSearchText: And that's where our name came from!
jpnChrName: それとカフェを組み合わせたから “オーバルカフェ”なんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
それとカフェを組み合わせたから
“オーバルカフェ”なんだけど……

engChrName: Haha, there's no deeper reason for the fusion. I just really liked both orbal tech and cafés!
engSearchText:
Haha, there's no deeper reason for the fusion. I just
really liked both orbal tech and cafés!
jpnChrName: 実は両方、僕の趣味ってだけなんだよね。 アハハ～！
jpnSearchText:
実は両方、僕の趣味ってだけなんだよね。
アハハ～！

engChrName: Just so you know, I'm this place's owner. Ilhan. It's nice to meet you. I would recommend our seasonal latte, if you'd like a drink.
engSearchText:
Just so you know, I'm this place's owner. Ilhan.
It's nice to meet you. I would recommend our
seasonal latte, if you'd like a drink.
jpnChrName: ちなみに僕がオーナーのイルハンです。 限定ラテもあるから是非ゆっくり……
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに僕がオーナーのイルハンです。
限定ラテもあるから是非ゆっくり……

engChrName: Oops, never mind! Looks like we're all sold out. Better luck next time!
engSearchText:
Oops, never mind! Looks like we're all sold out.
Better luck next time!
jpnChrName: って丁度切らしてたっけ。 アハハ、仕入れておくからまた来てよ。
jpnSearchText:
って丁度切らしてたっけ。
アハハ、仕入れておくからまた来てよ。

engChrName: Damn it! I was lookin' forward to seeing what all the talk was about. Keep hearing about how rich the milk you use is.
engSearchText:
Damn it! I was lookin' forward to seeing what all the
talk was about. Keep hearing about how rich the milk
you use is.
jpnChrName: くっ、ここの限定ラテは 濃厚なミルクが絶品だってのに……！
jpnSearchText:
くっ、ここの限定ラテは
濃厚なミルクが絶品だってのに……！

engChrName: Oh, right. (I'd almost forgotten, but I guess this is Van's area of expertise.)
engSearchText:
Oh, right.
(I'd almost forgotten, but I guess this is Van's area
of expertise.)
jpnChrName: そ、そうなんですね。 （ヴァンさん詳しいなぁ……）
jpnSearchText:
そ、そうなんですね。
（ヴァンさん詳しいなぁ……）

engChrName: There's a lot of buzz around our café as of late. It's featured in quite a few magazines as the trendiest spot in all of Edith.
engSearchText:
There's a lot of buzz around our café as of late.
It's featured in quite a few magazines as the trendiest
spot in all of Edith.
jpnChrName: オーバルカフェ──お洒落度Ｎｏ．１って 色んな雑誌にも取り上げてもらってるけど。
jpnSearchText:
オーバルカフェ──お洒落度Ｎｏ．１って
色んな雑誌にも取り上げてもらってるけど。

engChrName: Haha, it's a little embarrassing. I was just trying to combine two of my favorite things.
engSearchText:
Haha, it's a little embarrassing. I was just trying to
combine two of my favorite things.
jpnChrName: 実は僕の趣味を 組み合わせただけなんだよね。
jpnSearchText:
実は僕の趣味を
組み合わせただけなんだよね。

engChrName: I've always dreamed of being a barista, and I'm lucky enough to be able to take it easy and do that.
engSearchText:
I've always dreamed of being a barista, and I'm lucky
enough to be able to take it easy and do that.
jpnChrName: バリスタやるのも夢だったからさ。 まあ好きにのんびりやらせてもらってるよ。
jpnSearchText:
バリスタやるのも夢だったからさ。
まあ好きにのんびりやらせてもらってるよ。

engChrName: Yeah, I know Thorndyke. Arrogant bastard.
engSearchText: Yeah, I know Thorndyke. Arrogant bastard.
jpnChrName: ……ソーンダイクつったか。 タダモンじゃねえな、あの燕尾ヤローはよ。
jpnSearchText:
……ソーンダイクつったか。
タダモンじゃねえな、あの燕尾ヤローはよ。

engChrName: Then you've spoken to Mr. Thorndyke.
engSearchText: Then you've spoken to Mr. Thorndyke.
jpnChrName: ソーンダイクＧＭと 何かお話しされたのでしょうか……？
jpnSearchText:
ソーンダイクＧＭと
何かお話しされたのでしょうか……？

engChrName: To my sheer displeasure. Bastard wanted to buy out Thunders.
engSearchText:
To my sheer displeasure. Bastard wanted to buy
out Thunders.
jpnChrName: ああ、あのヤロー《サンダース》を 丸ごと買いとりたいとか抜かしやがってな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、あのヤロー《サンダース》を
丸ごと買いとりたいとか抜かしやがってな。

engChrName: Said something about 'ensuring strength and operability in these unprecedented circumstances.' Kinda tuned him out.
engSearchText:
Said something about 'ensuring strength and
operability in these unprecedented circumstances.'
Kinda tuned him out.
jpnChrName: この非常時における 戦力と運用性確保のためとか何とか──
jpnSearchText:
この非常時における
戦力と運用性確保のためとか何とか──

engChrName: What a douchebag. According to him, things'll never go back to normal unless we cooperate.
engSearchText:
What a douchebag. According to him, things'll never
go back to normal unless we cooperate.
jpnChrName: ともかくフザケたヤローだぜ。 協力がないと元に戻れる保証はないだとよ。
jpnSearchText:
ともかくフザケたヤローだぜ。
協力がないと元に戻れる保証はないだとよ。

engChrName: He thinks he has the upper hand just 'cause he knows something I don't, the jackass. Got some balls to play the double-faced card on me.
engSearchText:
He thinks he has the upper hand just 'cause he knows
something I don't, the jackass. Got some balls to play
the double-faced card on me.
jpnChrName: 明らかに何かを知って── いや、隠してやがんな？　ったく大したタマだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
明らかに何かを知って──
いや、隠してやがんな？　ったく大したタマだぜ。

engChrName: Yeah. He's the kinda man you wanna be careful with. But I can't imagine you, of all people, even listening to him.
engSearchText:
Yeah. He's the kinda man you wanna be careful with.
But I can't imagine you, of all people, even listening
to him.
jpnChrName: ああ、臭いとは思っちゃいたが…… んな提案、飲めるわけねーだろうによ──
jpnSearchText:
ああ、臭いとは思っちゃいたが……
んな提案、飲めるわけねーだろうによ──

engChrName: Nah, I did. Jerk's pretty convincing when he up and offers you three times the expected amount.
engSearchText:
Nah, I did. Jerk's pretty convincing when he up and
offers you three times the expected amount.
jpnChrName: いや、乗った。 オレの予想の３倍の額を提示しやがってな。
jpnSearchText:
いや、乗った。
オレの予想の３倍の額を提示しやがってな。

engChrName: You took the deal?
engSearchText: You took the deal?
jpnChrName: そ、それは……
jpnSearchText: そ、それは……

engChrName: Don't worry, I ain't no sellout. Deal just applies to abnormal circumstances.
engSearchText:
Don't worry, I ain't no sellout. Deal just applies to
abnormal circumstances.
jpnChrName: 心配すんな、この異常時のみって条件付きだ。 身売りしたわけじゃねーよ。
jpnSearchText:
心配すんな、この異常時のみって条件付きだ。
身売りしたわけじゃねーよ。

engChrName: Not a hundred percent sure what that will apply to, but if I'm gonna take a chance, I might as well do it with the one holding the cards.
engSearchText:
Not a hundred percent sure what that will apply to,
but if I'm gonna take a chance, I might as well do it
with the one holding the cards.
jpnChrName: 理屈は分からねえが、少しでも 目のある方に賭けるべきだろ？
jpnSearchText:
理屈は分からねえが、少しでも
目のある方に賭けるべきだろ？

engChrName: You better deal with this shit soon, or you'll be screwing me out of a lot of money!
engSearchText:
You better deal with this shit soon, or you'll be
screwing me out of a lot of money!
jpnChrName: ってワケで、お前らも全力で当たれよ。 オレに損させねーためにもな！
jpnSearchText:
ってワケで、お前らも全力で当たれよ。
オレに損させねーためにもな！

engChrName: Hah. Keep our weapons tuned up, and we got a deal.
engSearchText: Hah. Keep our weapons tuned up, and we got a deal.
jpnChrName: ハッ、了解だ。 得物の調整は任せたぜ！
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、了解だ。
得物の調整は任せたぜ！

engChrName: Those mafia jerks got us in a biiig mess.
engSearchText: Those mafia jerks got us in a biiig mess.
jpnChrName: マフィアの野郎どもが 何をしでかしたのかは分からねえが──
jpnSearchText:
マフィアの野郎どもが
何をしでかしたのかは分からねえが──

engChrName: Gonna have to teach 'em a lesson, gunsmith style.
engSearchText: Gonna have to teach 'em a lesson, gunsmith style.
jpnChrName: この借りは銃職人としての やり方で返させてもらうとするぜ。
jpnSearchText:
この借りは銃職人としての
やり方で返させてもらうとするぜ。

engChrName: I signed a contract with Marduk, but nothing in it said it was an exclusive deal.
engSearchText:
I signed a contract with Marduk, but nothing in it
said it was an exclusive deal.
jpnChrName: ＭＫ社と契約は交わしたが 民間人の依頼を受けるなとは言われてねえ。
jpnSearchText:
ＭＫ社と契約は交わしたが
民間人の依頼を受けるなとは言われてねえ。

engChrName: Hurry up and do your tune-ups. Never know what might happen, and you don't wanna get caught with your pants down.
engSearchText:
Hurry up and do your tune-ups. Never know what
might happen, and you don't wanna get caught with
your pants down.
jpnChrName: 今のうちに武装を強化しときな。 この先も何があるか分かんねーぞ。
jpnSearchText:
今のうちに武装を強化しときな。
この先も何があるか分かんねーぞ。

engChrName: Hey, gang. Not takin' a break for the festival?
engSearchText: Hey, gang. Not takin' a break for the festival?
jpnChrName: よお、ヴァンたちか。 記念祭の間も解決業務は続けてんのか？
jpnSearchText:
よお、ヴァンたちか。
記念祭の間も解決業務は続けてんのか？

engChrName: Eh, we're just keepin' an eye out. Hope things stay this calm.
engSearchText:
Eh, we're just keepin' an eye out. Hope things stay
this calm.
jpnChrName: ああ、一応な。 何事も無けりゃそれに越した事はねぇが。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、一応な。
何事も無けりゃそれに越した事はねぇが。

engChrName: Huh. Is Kaina not around?
engSearchText: Huh. Is Kaina not around?
jpnChrName: そういえば……カイナさんの お姿が見えませんが？
jpnSearchText:
そういえば……カイナさんの
お姿が見えませんが？

engChrName: Where's Kaina? I don't see her anywhere.
engSearchText: Where's Kaina? I don't see her anywhere.
jpnChrName: そういえば……カイナさんの お姿が見えませんけど……
jpnSearchText:
そういえば……カイナさんの
お姿が見えませんけど……

engChrName: You keeping an eye on that artisan from Creil, I hope.
engSearchText:
You keeping an eye on that artisan from Creil,
I hope.
jpnChrName: そういや、ここでクレイユ村の職人が 厄介になってなかったかよ？
jpnSearchText:
そういや、ここでクレイユ村の職人が
厄介になってなかったかよ？

engChrName: I wonder how the artisan from Creil Village has been doing as of late.
engSearchText:
I wonder how the artisan from Creil Village has been
doing as of late.
jpnChrName: そういえば……こちらにいらした クレイユ村の職人さんはお元気でしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
そういえば……こちらにいらした
クレイユ村の職人さんはお元気でしょうか？

engChrName: I was under the impression an artisan from Creil was training here.
engSearchText:
I was under the impression an artisan from Creil was
training here.
jpnChrName: そういえば……ここでクレイユ村の職人が 修行してるみたいだったけど？
jpnSearchText:
そういえば……ここでクレイユ村の職人が
修行してるみたいだったけど？

engChrName: Huh. Wasn't there a gunsmith from Creil here?
engSearchText: Huh. Wasn't there a gunsmith from Creil here?
jpnChrName: そういえば……ここでクレイユ村の職人さんが 世話になってたみたいだけど。
jpnSearchText:
そういえば……ここでクレイユ村の職人さんが
世話になってたみたいだけど。

engChrName: Hmm... I hope everything's all right with that gunsmith from Creil Village.
engSearchText:
Hmm... I hope everything's all right with that
gunsmith from Creil Village.
jpnChrName: ふむ……ここで世話になっていたという クレイユ村の職人は達者だろうか？
jpnSearchText:
ふむ……ここで世話になっていたという
クレイユ村の職人は達者だろうか？

engChrName: She headed into town with Lashkar. Tryin' to lift his spirits and all that.
engSearchText:
She headed into town with Lashkar. Tryin' to lift his
spirits and all that.
jpnChrName: ああ、あいつはラシュカルを元気づけようって 街に繰り出しているんだ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、あいつはラシュカルを元気づけようって
街に繰り出しているんだ。

engChrName: She's putting on a strong face, but you can tell she's still shaken 'bout the whole deal.
engSearchText:
She's putting on a strong face, but you can tell she's
still shaken 'bout the whole deal.
jpnChrName: ま、カイナも立ち直ったように見えて 引きずってるのも見てりゃ分かるしな……
jpnSearchText:
ま、カイナも立ち直ったように見えて
引きずってるのも見てりゃ分かるしな……

engChrName: The least I could do for her is let her go out and enjoy the festival with her friend. She'll probably be back before dark.
engSearchText:
The least I could do for her is let her go out and enjoy
the festival with her friend. She'll probably be back
before dark.
jpnChrName: 夕方前には戻るらしいが、今日くらいは 昔馴染みと好きにさせてやろうってな。
jpnSearchText:
夕方前には戻るらしいが、今日くらいは
昔馴染みと好きにさせてやろうってな。

engChrName: Got'cha... Hope it helps.
engSearchText: Got'cha... Hope it helps.
jpnChrName: そうか……少しは 落ち着いてくれるといいんだがな。
jpnSearchText:
そうか……少しは
落ち着いてくれるといいんだがな。

engChrName: Don't worry so much about it. I'll keep an eye on her.
engSearchText: Don't worry so much about it. I'll keep an eye on her.
jpnChrName: ……少なくともカイナに関しちゃ 当面はオレが面倒を見るさ。
jpnSearchText:
……少なくともカイナに関しちゃ
当面はオレが面倒を見るさ。

engChrName: What she does after is up to her. All we can do is support and believe in her in the meantime.
engSearchText:
What she does after is up to her. All we can do is
support and believe in her in the meantime.
jpnChrName: その先どんな道を選ぶかはあいつら次第。 ま、オレたちは信じて見守るだけさ。
jpnSearchText:
その先どんな道を選ぶかはあいつら次第。
ま、オレたちは信じて見守るだけさ。

engChrName: It's been quiet here because of the festival. I can manage it by myself.
engSearchText:
It's been quiet here because of the festival. I can
manage it by myself.
jpnChrName: ま、記念祭当日は客も減るんでな。 オレ一人でも十分回せるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、記念祭当日は客も減るんでな。
オレ一人でも十分回せるぜ。

engChrName: If you're lookin' to get something done, better let me know now.
engSearchText:
If you're lookin' to get something done, better let me
know now.
jpnChrName: 注文があるなら今のうちに言いな。
jpnSearchText: 注文があるなら今のうちに言いな。

engChrName: And try to keep an eye out for Lashkar and Kaina. Just in case you bump into them, of course.
engSearchText:
And try to keep an eye out for Lashkar and Kaina.
Just in case you bump into them, of course.
jpnChrName: あと、もしカイナとラシュカルを見かけたら 見守ってやってくれると嬉しいぜ。
jpnSearchText:
あと、もしカイナとラシュカルを見かけたら
見守ってやってくれると嬉しいぜ。

engChrName: If you're looking for Kaina, I sent her home early. She needs some time to herself.
engSearchText:
If you're looking for Kaina, I sent her home early.
She needs some time to herself.
jpnChrName: カイナなら一足先に帰らせたぜ。 まだ休養が必要な時期だろうしな。
jpnSearchText:
カイナなら一足先に帰らせたぜ。
まだ休養が必要な時期だろうしな。

engChrName: I know things will only get busier with the festival comin' up, but it's a much needed break.
engSearchText:
I know things will only get busier with the festival
comin' up, but it's a much needed break.
jpnChrName: 記念祭にかけて忙しくなるが、 あいつにはのんびりさせるつもりだ。
jpnSearchText:
記念祭にかけて忙しくなるが、
あいつにはのんびりさせるつもりだ。

engChrName: Right now's not the time to be worrying about other stuff.
engSearchText:
Right now's not the time to be worrying about
other stuff.
jpnChrName: 気になる話もないわけじゃねえが…… 今のアイツには、あんま聞かせたくねえな。
jpnSearchText:
気になる話もないわけじゃねえが……
今のアイツには、あんま聞かせたくねえな。

engChrName: Much as I wanna know what's up with Almata's weapons poppin' up in the black market, plus whatever Marduk and Zecht Arms are up to.
engSearchText:
Much as I wanna know what's up with Almata's
weapons poppin' up in the black market, plus
whatever Marduk and Zecht Arms are up to.
jpnChrName: ……裏に流れてるアルマータの武装、 ＭＫ社やゼクトアームズ製もあるとか……
jpnSearchText:
……裏に流れてるアルマータの武装、
ＭＫ社やゼクトアームズ製もあるとか……

engChrName: They're shady as all hell. I don't trust it.
engSearchText: They're shady as all hell. I don't trust it.
jpnChrName: どっちも胡散臭ぇ新興メーカーだ。 どうにも信用ならねえ感じがするよな。
jpnSearchText:
どっちも胡散臭ぇ新興メーカーだ。
どうにも信用ならねえ感じがするよな。

engChrName: Verne's weapons portfolio has expanded massively over the past two years, and we got Reinford's contributions to thank for it.
engSearchText:
Verne's weapons portfolio has expanded massively
over the past two years, and we got Reinford's
contributions to thank for it.
jpnChrName: この二年で、帝国ＲＦから技術提供を受けた ヴェルヌ社の武装ラインナップは飛躍的に伸びた。
jpnSearchText:
この二年で、帝国ＲＦから技術提供を受けた
ヴェルヌ社の武装ラインナップは飛躍的に伸びた。

engChrName: But that can't be all there is to it...
engSearchText: But that can't be all there is to it...
jpnChrName: だが、そう簡単な話じゃなさそうだな。 ったくやれやれだぜ……
jpnSearchText:
だが、そう簡単な話じゃなさそうだな。
ったくやれやれだぜ……

engChrName: They'll be unveiling the army's new weapons at the Revolution Festival.
engSearchText:
They'll be unveiling the army's new weapons at the
Revolution Festival.
jpnChrName: ひとまずは革命記念祭、そこでの 共和国軍の“新兵装”お披露目だろうが……
jpnSearchText:
ひとまずは革命記念祭、そこでの
共和国軍の“新兵装”お披露目だろうが……

engChrName: Don't worry about Kaina. I'll take care of her.
engSearchText: Don't worry about Kaina. I'll take care of her.
jpnChrName: カイナの事は任せておけ。 オレが面倒を見てやるからよ。
jpnSearchText:
カイナの事は任せておけ。
オレが面倒を見てやるからよ。

engChrName: I'll keep up with her training.
engSearchText: I'll keep up with her training.
jpnChrName: 修行の方も引き続きつけてやるつもりだ。
jpnSearchText: 修行の方も引き続きつけてやるつもりだ。

engChrName: She's my apprentice, after all, and I don't do things by halves.
engSearchText:
She's my apprentice, after all, and I don't do things
by halves.
jpnChrName: 一度弟子に取った以上、 中途半端をするつもりはねえしな。
jpnSearchText:
一度弟子に取った以上、
中途半端をするつもりはねえしな。

engChrName: Never in my wildest dreams did I expect somethin' like that to happen to Kaina's hometown.
engSearchText:
Never in my wildest dreams did I expect somethin'
like that to happen to Kaina's hometown.
jpnChrName: まさかカイナの故郷がこんな事に なっちまうとは思わなかったが……
jpnSearchText:
まさかカイナの故郷がこんな事に
なっちまうとは思わなかったが……

engChrName: I can't look away from this—not when I'm close with someone from Creil. I plan on lendin' a hand, too.
engSearchText:
I can't look away from this—not when I'm close with
someone from Creil. I plan on lendin' a hand, too.
jpnChrName: 弟子に取った以上は無関係じゃねえ。 オレも力になるつもりだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
弟子に取った以上は無関係じゃねえ。
オレも力になるつもりだぜ。

engChrName: Keep your eyes on the ball, spriggan! Can't be getting caught off guard like this all the time.
engSearchText:
Keep your eyes on the ball, spriggan! Can't be getting
caught off guard like this all the time.
jpnChrName: そっちも油断すんなよ、裏解決屋！ この先何があるか分かったもんじゃねえぜ！
jpnSearchText:
そっちも油断すんなよ、裏解決屋！
この先何があるか分かったもんじゃねえぜ！

engChrName: Hey, Van... You know this kid, too, don't ya?
engSearchText: Hey, Van... You know this kid, too, don't ya?
jpnChrName: よお、ヴァン達か…… こいつとも顔馴染みなのかよ？
jpnSearchText:
よお、ヴァン達か……
こいつとも顔馴染みなのかよ？

engChrName: The guys over at Stanley's introduced us, so I decided to take her up for some training.
engSearchText:
The guys over at Stanley's introduced us, so I decided
to take her up for some training.
jpnChrName: まあいい、スタンリー工房の紹介で ちょいと鍛えてやる事にしたんだ。
jpnSearchText:
まあいい、スタンリー工房の紹介で
ちょいと鍛えてやる事にしたんだ。

engChrName: She's got potential. Been a while since I had an apprentice, so it's just a crash course for now.
engSearchText:
She's got potential. Been a while since I had an
apprentice, so it's just a crash course for now.
jpnChrName: それなりに見所もありそうだしな、 オレも久しぶりに気合い入れてしごいてやるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
それなりに見所もありそうだしな、
オレも久しぶりに気合い入れてしごいてやるぜ。

engChrName: What do you need? I'm adjustin' Mr. Daswani's gun right now. If ya need something, spit it.
engSearchText:
What do you need? I'm adjustin' Mr. Daswani's gun
right now. If ya need something, spit it.
jpnChrName: なんだ？　ダスワニの旦那の 銃を調整してる最中だ、用件なら手短にな。
jpnSearchText:
なんだ？　ダスワニの旦那の
銃を調整してる最中だ、用件なら手短にな。

engChrName: He's real picky. Stuck to the same gun model since he joined the force.
engSearchText:
He's real picky. Stuck to the same gun model since he
joined the force.
jpnChrName: しっかし旦那も拘りが強ぇよな。 新米の頃から同じ形式を使ってるらしいぜ。
jpnSearchText:
しっかし旦那も拘りが強ぇよな。
新米の頃から同じ形式を使ってるらしいぜ。

engChrName: And he's very careful with maintenance. Honestly, you can gauge a lot about someone from how they care for their weapons.
engSearchText:
And he's very careful with maintenance.
Honestly, you can gauge a lot about someone from
how they care for their weapons.
jpnChrName: 手入れも几帳面にしてやがる…… ハッ、やっぱ得物の扱いには性格が出るよな。
jpnSearchText:
手入れも几帳面にしてやがる……
ハッ、やっぱ得物の扱いには性格が出るよな。

engChrName: I totally disassembled his gun. Top to bottom maintenance.
engSearchText:
I totally disassembled his gun. Top to
bottom maintenance.
jpnChrName: 旦那の銃は、完全にバラしてメンテ中だ。
jpnSearchText: 旦那の銃は、完全にバラしてメンテ中だ。

engChrName: If you need anything, get in line. Still got some adjusting to do so I can bring the accuracy up to snuff.
engSearchText:
If you need anything, get in line. Still got some
adjusting to do so I can bring the accuracy up
to snuff.
jpnChrName: きっちり新品同様の精度に調整すっから もうちょい待っててもらわねえとな。
jpnSearchText:
きっちり新品同様の精度に調整すっから
もうちょい待っててもらわねえとな。

engChrName: The custom parts were made by yours truly, by the way. I make sure to customize each weapon to suit their owner perfectly.
engSearchText:
The custom parts were made by yours truly, by
the way. I make sure to customize each weapon to
suit their owner perfectly.
jpnChrName: ちなみにアタッチパーツはウチの製作だ。 旦那にピッタリ合うようカスタムしてあんだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみにアタッチパーツはウチの製作だ。
旦那にピッタリ合うようカスタムしてあんだぜ。

engChrName: Huh. Not the most trustworthy bracer out there, but I guess it makes sense when he's still a junior bracer.
engSearchText:
Huh. Not the most trustworthy bracer out there, but I
guess it makes sense when he's still a junior bracer.
jpnChrName: は～ん？　遊撃士にしちゃ 頼りねえと思ったら、“準”かよ。
jpnSearchText:
は～ん？　遊撃士にしちゃ
頼りねえと思ったら、“準”かよ。

engChrName: Well, whatever. I get paid, I do the job. Has always been my way of handlin' things.
engSearchText:
Well, whatever. I get paid, I do the job. Has always
been my way of handlin' things.
jpnChrName: まあいいや、筋通してミラさえ出せば 面倒くらいは見てやるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
まあいいや、筋通してミラさえ出せば
面倒くらいは見てやるぜ。

engChrName: Comparing him now to Zin and Elaine would be plain unfair, but who knows. Maybe he's actually made of some good stuff.
engSearchText:
Comparing him now to Zin and Elaine would be
plain unfair, but who knows. Maybe he's actually
made of some good stuff.
jpnChrName: ジンやエレインとは比べるべくもねえが 将来化けるって可能性もあるしな。
jpnSearchText:
ジンやエレインとは比べるべくもねえが
将来化けるって可能性もあるしな。

engChrName: For starters, he's got himself a good gun. Guess it won't hurt to nudge him the right way a little.
engSearchText:
For starters, he's got himself a good gun. Guess it
won't hurt to nudge him the right way a little.
jpnChrName: 銃のチョイスも、まあ悪くねえ。 アドバイスくらいはしてやるか。
jpnSearchText:
銃のチョイスも、まあ悪くねえ。
アドバイスくらいはしてやるか。

engChrName: I've been dealing with bracers for a looong time. He ain't got bad taste.
engSearchText:
I've been dealing with bracers for a looong time.
He ain't got bad taste.
jpnChrName: 遊撃士とは付き合いも長いしな。 センスもま、ある方なんじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
遊撃士とは付き合いも長いしな。
センスもま、ある方なんじゃねえか？

engChrName: He won't be measurin' up to Zin or Elaine anytime soon, but a little push here and there won't hurt.
engSearchText:
He won't be measurin' up to Zin or Elaine anytime
soon, but a little push here and there won't hurt.
jpnChrName: ジンやエレインとは比べるべくもねえが…… アドバイスくらいはしてやるか。
jpnSearchText:
ジンやエレインとは比べるべくもねえが……
アドバイスくらいはしてやるか。

engChrName: Gotta do what I gotta as a gunsmith. Not like I haven't been handlin' the army's weapons this whole time.
engSearchText:
Gotta do what I gotta as a gunsmith. Not like I
haven't been handlin' the army's weapons this
whole time.
jpnChrName: ウチは銃職人（ガンスミス）だからな。 共和国軍の得物とも付き合いが長いぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ウチは銃職人（ガンスミス）だからな。
共和国軍の得物とも付き合いが長いぜ。

engChrName: But the ones that come to me for adjustments are the real enthusiasts.
engSearchText:
But the ones that come to me for adjustments are the
real enthusiasts.
jpnChrName: ま、こうして個人で調整に来る奴は 軍人の中でもかなり熱心な方だけどな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、こうして個人で調整に来る奴は
軍人の中でもかなり熱心な方だけどな。

engChrName: The army pulled out all the stops in gettin' everyone kitted out with the latest and greatest, but not everyone was happy.
engSearchText:
The army pulled out all the stops in gettin' everyone
kitted out with the latest and greatest, but not
everyone was happy.
jpnChrName: 近頃は軍の装備刷新で、新しい銃に代わって イマイチ手に馴染まないって声も多い。
jpnSearchText:
近頃は軍の装備刷新で、新しい銃に代わって
イマイチ手に馴染まないって声も多い。

engChrName: Pleasing the displeased is my job, so I've been taking care of 'em.
engSearchText:
Pleasing the displeased is my job, so I've been taking
care of 'em.
jpnChrName: 職人としちゃ、腕のふるい所だよな。
jpnSearchText: 職人としちゃ、腕のふるい所だよな。

engChrName: Hey, Van. You're familiar with Stanley's over in Old Town, yeah?
engSearchText:
Hey, Van. You're familiar with Stanley's over in Old
Town, yeah?
jpnChrName: そういや、旧市街のスタンリー工房には ヴァンも付き合いがあったよな？
jpnSearchText:
そういや、旧市街のスタンリー工房には
ヴァンも付き合いがあったよな？

engChrName: We've been on good terms for a while. They recently got in touch with me, though. Said they wanted to introduce me to someone.
engSearchText:
We've been on good terms for a while. They recently
got in touch with me, though. Said they wanted to
introduce me to someone.
jpnChrName: あそことは昔から付き合いがあるんだが…… さっき紹介したいヤツがいるって連絡があってな。
jpnSearchText:
あそことは昔から付き合いがあるんだが……
さっき紹介したいヤツがいるって連絡があってな。

engChrName: A very promising young craftsman from the countryside. I suppose I'll be meetin' her sometime soon.
engSearchText:
A very promising young craftsman from
the countryside. I suppose I'll be meetin' her
sometime soon.
jpnChrName: 地方の職人娘で、見込みもあるらしいが── ま、どっかのタイミングで会ってみるかね。
jpnSearchText:
地方の職人娘で、見込みもあるらしいが──
ま、どっかのタイミングで会ってみるかね。

engChrName: Speaking of Desire, the boy from Newberry's a member, yeah? Eddy, I mean.
engSearchText:
Speaking of Desire, the boy from Newberry's a
member, yeah? Eddy, I mean.
jpnChrName: 《ディザイア》に入ってるヤツといえば 《ニューベリー》の息子のエディがいるだろ。
jpnSearchText:
《ディザイア》に入ってるヤツといえば
《ニューベリー》の息子のエディがいるだろ。

engChrName: I got no clue where you can find him, but might be worth chattin' him up.
engSearchText:
I got no clue where you can find him, but might be
worth chattin' him up.
jpnChrName: 今どこにいるかは知らないけど 話を聞いてみたらいいんじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
今どこにいるかは知らないけど
話を聞いてみたらいいんじゃねえか？

engChrName: Arms manufacturers have been poppin' up pretty much outta nowhere the past few years. That includes Marduk and Zecht Arms.
engSearchText:
Arms manufacturers have been poppin' up pretty
much outta nowhere the past few years. That includes
Marduk and Zecht Arms.
jpnChrName: 近頃は《マルドゥック社》やら《ゼクトアームズ》やら 素性の知れねえ新興メーカーも多いが──
jpnSearchText:
近頃は《マルドゥック社》やら《ゼクトアームズ》やら
素性の知れねえ新興メーカーも多いが──

engChrName: With the army upgrading all their weaponry over the course of the past two years, this is a pretty exciting time to be in the arms industry.
engSearchText:
With the army upgrading all their weaponry over the
course of the past two years, this is a pretty exciting
time to be in the arms industry.
jpnChrName: この二年で共和国軍の装備刷新も進んでるしな。 業界としても賑わってるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
この二年で共和国軍の装備刷新も進んでるしな。
業界としても賑わってるぜ。

engChrName: Rumor has it that Verne's subsidiaries are working on developing weapons that take advantage of Xipha technology, too.
engSearchText:
Rumor has it that Verne's subsidiaries are working on
developing weapons that take advantage of Xipha
technology, too.
jpnChrName: ヴェルヌ系列も、ザイファ技術を応用した 兵器の開発を進めてるって噂だ。
jpnSearchText:
ヴェルヌ系列も、ザイファ技術を応用した
兵器の開発を進めてるって噂だ。

engChrName: I'm just followin' in my granddad's footsteps, but even my interest is piqued with that.
engSearchText:
I'm just followin' in my granddad's footsteps, but even
my interest is piqued with that.
jpnChrName: オレは爺さんから継いだ技術をふるうだけだが やっぱ興味はあるぜ、その辺りの話はよ。
jpnSearchText:
オレは爺さんから継いだ技術をふるうだけだが
やっぱ興味はあるぜ、その辺りの話はよ。

engChrName: Well, that ain't somethin' you see every day. Girlie, you're a Kruga, yeah?
engSearchText:
Well, that ain't somethin' you see every day.
Girlie, you're a Kruga, yeah?
jpnChrName: ハン……？　こりゃ驚いた。 そっちの子は《クルガ》の出身かい？
jpnSearchText:
ハン……？　こりゃ驚いた。
そっちの子は《クルガ》の出身かい？

engChrName: Y-Yes! It's a long story, but I'm living in Edith now.
engSearchText: Y-Yes! It's a long story, but I'm living in Edith now.
jpnChrName: は、はい！　ちょっと事情があって 今は首都で暮らしてるんです！
jpnSearchText:
は、はい！　ちょっと事情があって
今は首都で暮らしてるんです！

engChrName: Got'cha. You got something unusual on ya.
engSearchText: Got'cha. You got something unusual on ya.
jpnChrName: ほーお、珍しい事もあるもんだ。
jpnSearchText: ほーお、珍しい事もあるもんだ。

engChrName: Let me take a look at your weapon. That's a desert type rifleblade, no?
engSearchText:
Let me take a look at your weapon. That's a desert
type rifleblade, no?
jpnChrName: ちょいと武装を見せてみな。 その突撃銃剣（アサルトソード）も砂漠（デザート）仕様なんだろ？
jpnSearchText:
ちょいと武装を見せてみな。
その突撃銃剣（アサルトソード）も砂漠（デザート）仕様なんだろ？

engChrName: It is! It's gotten some custom work done on it, so the center of mass has changed...
engSearchText:
It is! It's gotten some custom work done on it, so the
center of mass has changed...
jpnChrName: いいですよ！　ちょっとカスタム してありますけど、重心のバランスが──
jpnSearchText:
いいですよ！　ちょっとカスタム
してありますけど、重心のバランスが──

engChrName: Wow, the machinery is so intricate! I always get so pumped looking at anything with a transformation gimmick.
engSearchText:
Wow, the machinery is so intricate! I always get so
pumped looking at anything with a
transformation gimmick.
jpnChrName: いいねェ、この可動部…… 変形ギミックはやっぱ燃えるぜ！
jpnSearchText:
いいねェ、この可動部……
変形ギミックはやっぱ燃えるぜ！

engChrName: (They look like they're having a lot of fun.)
engSearchText: (They look like they're having a lot of fun.)
jpnChrName: （二人とも楽しそう、ですね……）
jpnSearchText: （二人とも楽しそう、ですね……）

engChrName: (Guess that's just what girls are into nowadays. ...I should keep that observation to myself.)
engSearchText:
(Guess that's just what girls are into nowadays.
...I should keep that observation to myself.)
jpnChrName: （一応、年頃の娘同士の会話なんだが   ……ま、言わぬが花か。）
jpnSearchText:
（一応、年頃の娘同士の会話なんだが
……ま、言わぬが花か。）

engChrName: I haven't seen a Kruga rifleblade in so long. Fascinating stuff.
engSearchText:
I haven't seen a Kruga rifleblade in so long.
Fascinating stuff.
jpnChrName: クルガの突撃銃剣を見るのは久々だったが やっぱ拘りがあって面白いよな。
jpnSearchText:
クルガの突撃銃剣を見るのは久々だったが
やっぱ拘りがあって面白いよな。

engChrName: Sorry I couldn't help with your rifle.
engSearchText: Sorry I couldn't help with your rifle.
jpnChrName: 姉貴分のライフルについては 力になれなくて済まねえ。
jpnSearchText:
姉貴分のライフルについては
力になれなくて済まねえ。

engChrName: I'll try digging around, see what I come up with. Come by and say hi next time you get a chance.
engSearchText:
I'll try digging around, see what I come up with.
Come by and say hi next time you get a chance.
jpnChrName: ま、一応こっちでも探ってみるぜ。 また機会があれば顔を出しな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、一応こっちでも探ってみるぜ。
また機会があれば顔を出しな。

engChrName: People assume the Central East is old-fashioned, even in their weaponry.
engSearchText:
People assume the Central East is old-fashioned,
even in their weaponry.
jpnChrName: ちなみに中東といえば 旧式の武装がメジャーな印象もあるが──
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに中東といえば
旧式の武装がメジャーな印象もあるが──

engChrName: But that doesn't account for the wealthier places, like Elsaim and Valis.
engSearchText:
But that doesn't account for the wealthier places, like
Elsaim and Valis.
jpnChrName: 《エルザイム公国》に《ヴァリス市国》みたいな ミラを持ってる“富める国”もある。
jpnSearchText:
《エルザイム公国》に《ヴァリス市国》みたいな
ミラを持ってる“富める国”もある。

engChrName: They deck themselves out with all the latest equipment. Worth looking into, if you get the chance.
engSearchText:
They deck themselves out with all the
latest equipment. Worth looking into, if you get
the chance.
jpnChrName: 連中は各メーカーから最新鋭の武装を導入してるぜ。 機会がありゃあ調べてみな。
jpnSearchText:
連中は各メーカーから最新鋭の武装を導入してるぜ。
機会がありゃあ調べてみな。

engChrName: Hey, Van. Here to get some work done on... Huh?
engSearchText: Hey, Van. Here to get some work done on... Huh?
jpnChrName: ようヴァン、撃剣の整備にでも──
jpnSearchText: ようヴァン、撃剣の整備にでも──

engChrName: Who's the girl? One of your clients or somethin'?
engSearchText: Who's the girl? One of your clients or somethin'?
jpnChrName: って、どうしたんだその娘は。 依頼人か何かか？
jpnSearchText:
って、どうしたんだその娘は。
依頼人か何かか？

engChrName: She's actually my new assistant, believe it or not.
engSearchText: She's actually my new assistant, believe it or not.
jpnChrName: 一応、こう見えて 解決事務所の助手みたいなもんだ。
jpnSearchText:
一応、こう見えて
解決事務所の助手みたいなもんだ。

engChrName: I-It's a pleasure to meet you!
engSearchText: I-It's a pleasure to meet you!
jpnChrName: その、初めまして。
jpnSearchText: その、初めまして。

engChrName: Hey, name's Sylvie. I'm the third generation in a family of gunsmiths.
engSearchText:
Hey, name's Sylvie. I'm the third generation in a
family of gunsmiths.
jpnChrName: ああ、オレはシルヴィ。 祖父の代からの銃職人（ガンスミス）ってヤツだ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、オレはシルヴィ。
祖父の代からの銃職人（ガンスミス）ってヤツだ。

engChrName: Gonna guess you'd never even known there was a shop like this in the department store.
engSearchText:
Gonna guess you'd never even known there was a
shop like this in the department store.
jpnChrName: 慣れ親しんだ百貨店の一角に こういう店もあって驚いたかい？
jpnSearchText:
慣れ親しんだ百貨店の一角に
こういう店もあって驚いたかい？

engChrName: No, I knew of it. I'm familiar with some people that enjoy hunting and competitive shooting.
engSearchText:
No, I knew of it. I'm familiar with some people that
enjoy hunting and competitive shooting.
jpnChrName: いえ、狩猟や競技射撃をする方もいますし、 存在自体は知っていました。
jpnSearchText:
いえ、狩猟や競技射撃をする方もいますし、
存在自体は知っていました。

engChrName: But I guess this isn't the kind of shop I was expecting. It's very...proper.
engSearchText:
But I guess this isn't the kind of shop I was expecting.
It's very...proper.
jpnChrName: ですが……ここまで 本格的なお店とは思っていませんでした。
jpnSearchText:
ですが……ここまで
本格的なお店とは思っていませんでした。

engChrName: If you're gonna do something, gotta do it right. This place's the perfect spot. Got lots of military folks comin' by.
engSearchText:
If you're gonna do something, gotta do it right.
This place's the perfect spot. Got lots of military folks
comin' by.
jpnChrName: やるからには半端な仕事はできないからな。 おかげで軍関係の客なんかも結構来る。
jpnSearchText:
やるからには半端な仕事はできないからな。
おかげで軍関係の客なんかも結構来る。

engChrName: I handle custom orders—modifying weaponry up to my customer's desired specs. Within reason, of course.
engSearchText:
I handle custom orders—modifying weaponry up to
my customer's desired specs. Within reason,
of course.
jpnChrName: 合法の範囲内でも、それなりに 色んな客のニーズに応えられるもんだ。
jpnSearchText:
合法の範囲内でも、それなりに
色んな客のニーズに応えられるもんだ。

engChrName: Your clientele's really gotta trust you to let you tinker with their weapons like that. Myself included.
engSearchText:
Your clientele's really gotta trust you to let you tinker
with their weapons like that. Myself included.
jpnChrName: ま、俺も含めそれだけあんたの腕前が 信頼されてるってこった。
jpnSearchText:
ま、俺も含めそれだけあんたの腕前が
信頼されてるってこった。

engChrName: Don't let the name of the shop trick ya. Sylvie here can modify just about any weapon.
engSearchText:
Don't let the name of the shop trick ya. Sylvie here
can modify just about any weapon.
jpnChrName: 何にせよ、ここでは銃に限らず あらゆる武装の整備を頼むことができる。
jpnSearchText:
何にせよ、ここでは銃に限らず
あらゆる武装の整備を頼むことができる。

engChrName: You got some orbal staff parts lying around, don't ya?
engSearchText: You got some orbal staff parts lying around, don't ya?
jpnChrName: 導力杖のパーツなんかも置いてるよな？
jpnSearchText: 導力杖のパーツなんかも置いてるよな？

engChrName: An orbal staff user? Interesting.
engSearchText: An orbal staff user? Interesting.
jpnChrName: なるほど、その嬢ちゃんは 導力杖を使うのか。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど、その嬢ちゃんは
導力杖を使うのか。

engChrName: Nothin' out of my wheelhouse, of course. Long as there's mira on the table, I'm happy to do my job.
engSearchText:
Nothin' out of my wheelhouse, of course. Long as
there's mira on the table, I'm happy to do my job.
jpnChrName: もちろん何の問題もない。 貰えるモンさえ貰えれば仕事はするぜ。
jpnSearchText:
もちろん何の問題もない。
貰えるモンさえ貰えれば仕事はするぜ。

engChrName: I-I would really appreciate it.
engSearchText: I-I would really appreciate it.
jpnChrName: ど、どうかよろしくお願いします。
jpnSearchText: ど、どうかよろしくお願いします。

engChrName: That's all we had to do at the department store.
engSearchText: That's all we had to do at the department store.
jpnChrName: えっと……これで 百貨店での用事は終わりですね。
jpnSearchText:
えっと……これで
百貨店での用事は終わりですね。

engChrName: Yup. But don't let that stop ya if you wanna go take a look elsewhere.
engSearchText:
Yup. But don't let that stop ya if you wanna go take a
look elsewhere.
jpnChrName: ああ、他にも寄りたい店があれば 別に覗いていってもいいけどな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、他にも寄りたい店があれば
別に覗いていってもいいけどな。

engChrName: The Connections tab on your To-Do List and Notebook has been unlocked.
engSearchText:
The Connections tab on your To-Do List and
Notebook has been unlocked.
jpnChrName: ＴｏＤｏリストとノートメニューの 『コネクト』タブが開封された。
jpnSearchText:
ＴｏＤｏリストとノートメニューの
『コネクト』タブが開封された。

engChrName: Van's weapon is a stun caliber. Not your run of the mill weapon.
engSearchText:
Van's weapon is a stun caliber. Not your run of the
mill weapon.
jpnChrName: ヴァンの得物は“撃剣（スタンキャリバー）”── コイツは中々珍しい武装なんだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンの得物は“撃剣（スタンキャリバー）”──
コイツは中々珍しい武装なんだぜ。

engChrName: No sharp edges, so it's perfect for suppression. Easy to carry around, too.
engSearchText:
No sharp edges, so it's perfect for suppression.
Easy to carry around, too.
jpnChrName: 刃が入ってなくてな、制圧に特化してる分 所持・携帯しやすい代物だ。
jpnSearchText:
刃が入ってなくてな、制圧に特化してる分
所持・携帯しやすい代物だ。

engChrName: A tricky and unwieldy thing, if you ask me. And I ain't too fond of the developer, either.
engSearchText:
A tricky and unwieldy thing, if you ask me. And I
ain't too fond of the developer, either.
jpnChrName: もっともかなり扱いづらい上に、裏技付き…… おまけに開発元が気に喰わねぇが──
jpnSearchText:
もっともかなり扱いづらい上に、裏技付き……
おまけに開発元が気に喰わねぇが──

engChrName: But whatever. Not gonna judge your weapon of choice.
engSearchText:
But whatever. Not gonna judge your weapon
of choice.
jpnChrName: まあいいさ、ヴァンも筋は通してるしな。
jpnSearchText: まあいいさ、ヴァンも筋は通してるしな。

engChrName: Bring it over whenever you need me to tinker with it. That goes for ya, too, girlie. I'll be happy to handle that orbal staff of yours anytime.
engSearchText:
Bring it over whenever you need me to tinker with it.
That goes for ya, too, girlie. I'll be happy to handle
that orbal staff of yours anytime.
jpnChrName: いじりたくなったら何時でもいいな。 嬢ちゃんの導力杖共々、面倒を見てやるよ。
jpnSearchText:
いじりたくなったら何時でもいいな。
嬢ちゃんの導力杖共々、面倒を見てやるよ。

engChrName: You're Kaina, yeah? From Creil Village. Heard you know something here and there about gunsmithing.
engSearchText:
You're Kaina, yeah? From Creil Village. Heard you
know something here and there about gunsmithing.
jpnChrName: お前がクレイユ村から来たカイナか。 そこそこの腕らしいな？
jpnSearchText:
お前がクレイユ村から来たカイナか。
そこそこの腕らしいな？

engChrName: W-Well, my boss said my metalworking is pretty good.
engSearchText:
W-Well, my boss said my metalworking is
pretty good.
jpnChrName: い、一応細かい金属部品の調整なんかは 親方にも誉めてもらってますけど……
jpnSearchText:
い、一応細かい金属部品の調整なんかは
親方にも誉めてもらってますけど……

engChrName: I'm no expert, of course, but...I take just as much pride in my work as my ancestors did!
engSearchText:
I'm no expert, of course, but...I take just as much
pride in my work as my ancestors did!
jpnChrName: まだまだ職人としては半人前です…… それこそご先祖様みたいな矜持を持つには！
jpnSearchText:
まだまだ職人としては半人前です……
それこそご先祖様みたいな矜持を持つには！

engChrName: I heard about that. You took up gunsmithing by reading your family's old notes, yeah?
engSearchText:
I heard about that. You took up gunsmithing by
reading your family's old notes, yeah?
jpnChrName: そういや祖先の鍛冶屋の手記……だっけか？ お前が職人の道を目指したきっかけってのは。
jpnSearchText:
そういや祖先の鍛冶屋の手記……だっけか？
お前が職人の道を目指したきっかけってのは。

engChrName: I feel you. I come from a long line of gunsmiths myself.
engSearchText:
I feel you. I come from a long line of
gunsmiths myself.
jpnChrName: わかるぜ、オレも代々ガンスミスの家系だ。
jpnSearchText: わかるぜ、オレも代々ガンスミスの家系だ。

engChrName: Technology might change, but the real mettle needed to be a gunsmith hasn't.
engSearchText:
Technology might change, but the real mettle needed
to be a gunsmith hasn't.
jpnChrName: どんな時代だろうが、至高の品を仕立てる 職人の本質ってのは変わらねぇもんだ。
jpnSearchText:
どんな時代だろうが、至高の品を仕立てる
職人の本質ってのは変わらねぇもんだ。

engChrName: The road ain't easy, but I'm sure you know that already.
engSearchText:
The road ain't easy, but I'm sure you know
that already.
jpnChrName: だが……それに至る道は甘くねぇ。 ──分かってるんだろうな？
jpnSearchText:
だが……それに至る道は甘くねぇ。
──分かってるんだろうな？

engChrName: I-I do! Thank you so much for taking me in. I won't disappoint you!
engSearchText:
I-I do! Thank you so much for taking me in. I won't
disappoint you!
jpnChrName: が、頑張ります……！ 一週間どうかよろしくお願いしますっ！！
jpnSearchText:
が、頑張ります……！
一週間どうかよろしくお願いしますっ！！

engChrName: All right, all right. Don't freak out over it. But you got the spirit, and I appreciate that.
engSearchText:
All right, all right. Don't freak out over it. But you
got the spirit, and I appreciate that.
jpnChrName: そう構えんな、一応お前の気概は買ってるしな。 あと、堅苦しい敬語も別にいいぜ。
jpnSearchText:
そう構えんな、一応お前の気概は買ってるしな。
あと、堅苦しい敬語も別にいいぜ。

engChrName: But relax a little. We're the same age.
engSearchText: But relax a little. We're the same age.
jpnChrName: 聞く限りじゃ同い年みてえだしな。
jpnSearchText: 聞く限りじゃ同い年みてえだしな。

engChrName: W-We are?!
engSearchText: W-We are?!
jpnChrName: えっ……　えええええええええ！？
jpnSearchText: <S5>えっ……　えええええええええ！？

engChrName: (That's Kaina from Creil Village. Looks like she's training here.)
engSearchText:
(That's Kaina from Creil Village. Looks like she's
training here.)
jpnChrName: （クレイユ村のカイナさん……   こちらの店で修行されるみたいですね。）
jpnSearchText:
（クレイユ村のカイナさん……
こちらの店で修行されるみたいですね。）

engChrName: (Thunders is a pretty well known place.)
engSearchText: (Thunders is a pretty well known place.)
jpnChrName: （ああ、それに《サンダース》って言えば   その筋じゃ有名な工房だよね。）
jpnSearchText:
（ああ、それに《サンダース》って言えば
その筋じゃ有名な工房だよね。）

engChrName: (Although I wasn't aware the owner was so young.)
engSearchText: (Although I wasn't aware the owner was so young.)
jpnChrName: （こんなに若い人が店主だとは   思わなかったけど。）
jpnSearchText:
（こんなに若い人が店主だとは
思わなかったけど。）

engChrName: (Sylvie's been gettin' gunsmithing hammered in by her grandfather since she was young.)
engSearchText:
(Sylvie's been gettin' gunsmithing hammered in by
her grandfather since she was young.)
jpnChrName: （なんでもチビの頃から   爺さんに叩き込まれてるらしい。）
jpnSearchText:
（なんでもチビの頃から
爺さんに叩き込まれてるらしい。）

engChrName: (Yeah, she's only twenty, but she's the real deal. Anyone doin' an apprenticeship under her is in good hands.)
engSearchText:
(Yeah, she's only twenty, but she's the real deal.
Anyone doin' an apprenticeship under her is in
good hands.)
jpnChrName: （まだ二十歳前だが腕は確かだぜ。   ……“弟子”の方にも期待したい所だな。）
jpnSearchText:
（まだ二十歳前だが腕は確かだぜ。
……“弟子”の方にも期待したい所だな。）

engChrName: Oh, it's you guys. Figured you'd be out and about.
engSearchText: Oh, it's you guys. Figured you'd be out and about.
jpnChrName: ……あんたらか。 まあ、動いてるとは思ったぜ。
jpnSearchText:
……あんたらか。
まあ、動いてるとは思ったぜ。

engChrName: Sylvie! And Kaina, too! You're from Creil, right?
engSearchText: Sylvie! And Kaina, too! You're from Creil, right?
jpnChrName: シルヴィさん、それに クレイユ村のカイナさん……！
jpnSearchText:
シルヴィさん、それに
クレイユ村のカイナさん……！

engChrName: Heard you were safe 'cause you were here in the capital.
engSearchText:
Heard you were safe 'cause you were here in
the capital.
jpnChrName: 偶然首都に来ていて 難を逃れたとは聞いちゃいたが……
jpnSearchText:
偶然首都に来ていて
難を逃れたとは聞いちゃいたが……

engChrName: Though you're not the only one. Some other villagers narrowly avoided bein' caught up in this shtick.
engSearchText:
Though you're not the only one. Some other villagers
narrowly avoided bein' caught up in this shtick.
jpnChrName: 村を離れていて難を逃れた 住民がいるとは聞いちゃいたが……
jpnSearchText:
村を離れていて難を逃れた
住民がいるとは聞いちゃいたが……

engChrName: You've been trainin' with Sylvie here for gunsmithing, yeah?
engSearchText:
You've been trainin' with Sylvie here for
gunsmithing, yeah?
jpnChrName: 確か一週間程度、ここで武器職人の 修行しているって話だったか……？
jpnSearchText:
確か一週間程度、ここで武器職人の
修行しているって話だったか……？

engChrName: Yeah. I was gonna go back home for the harvest festival, but my car broke down. I was only planning on staying here one more day.
engSearchText:
Yeah. I was gonna go back home for the harvest
festival, but my car broke down. I was only planning
on staying here one more day.
jpnChrName: うん……本当は収穫祭の日に帰るつもりが 車が故障して一日延びて……
jpnSearchText:
うん……本当は収穫祭の日に帰るつもりが
車が故障して一日延びて……

engChrName: And then...that happened.
engSearchText: And then...that happened.
jpnChrName: それがまさか……こんな事に……
jpnSearchText: それがまさか……こんな事に……

engChrName: My gunsmithing training was supposed to be over after a week.
engSearchText:
My gunsmithing training was supposed to be over
after a week.
jpnChrName: うん……ここで一週間くらい、 職人の修行をさせてもらってて……
jpnSearchText:
うん……ここで一週間くらい、
職人の修行をさせてもらってて……

engChrName: I was gonna go back home for the harvest festival, but my car broke down. I was only planning on staying here one more day.
engSearchText:
I was gonna go back home for the harvest festival, but
my car broke down. I was only planning on staying
here one more day.
jpnChrName: ……本当は収穫祭の日に帰るつもりが 車が故障して一日延びて……
jpnSearchText:
……本当は収穫祭の日に帰るつもりが
車が故障して一日延びて……

engChrName: And then...that happened.
engSearchText: And then...that happened.
jpnChrName: それがまさか……こんな事に……
jpnSearchText: それがまさか……こんな事に……

engChrName: It was so awful, I'm sorry.
engSearchText: It was so awful, I'm sorry.
jpnChrName: そう……だったんですね……
jpnSearchText: そう……だったんですね……

engChrName: I've been swamped with public safety hearings and stuff.
engSearchText:
I've been swamped with public safety hearings
and stuff.
jpnChrName: 公安連中の聴取なんかもあって ドタバタしててな……
jpnSearchText:
公安連中の聴取なんかもあって
ドタバタしててな……

engChrName: Things are calmin' down, but it's still a mess out there.
engSearchText:
Things are calmin' down, but it's still a mess
out there.
jpnChrName: ようやく落ち着いてきたが 街の状況はこの有様、やれやれだぜ……
jpnSearchText:
ようやく落ち着いてきたが
街の状況はこの有様、やれやれだぜ……

engChrName: But don't you worry about figurin' out a livin' situation. You can stay here with me for as long as you need.
engSearchText:
But don't you worry about figurin' out a
livin' situation. You can stay here with me for as long
as you need.
jpnChrName: ま、当面はウチに置いてやるつもりだから その辺りの心配はいらねえけどな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、当面はウチに置いてやるつもりだから
その辺りの心配はいらねえけどな。

engChrName: Thank you, Sylvie. I don't know what I'd do if I didn't have you looking out for me.
engSearchText:
Thank you, Sylvie. I don't know what I'd do if I
didn't have you looking out for me.
jpnChrName: ありがとう、シルヴィさん…… 何から何までお世話になっちゃって……
jpnSearchText:
ありがとう、シルヴィさん……
何から何までお世話になっちゃって……

engChrName: It's fine. You're my apprentice now, so this is as much my business as it is yours.
engSearchText:
It's fine. You're my apprentice now, so this is as much
my business as it is yours.
jpnChrName: いいンだよ、弟子に取った以上 もう無関係じゃねえ。
jpnSearchText:
いいンだよ、弟子に取った以上
もう無関係じゃねえ。

engChrName: Even with your family gone, you're not alone. You can rely on me from here on out.
engSearchText:
Even with your family gone, you're not alone.
You can rely on me from here on out.
jpnChrName: ……もうご両親もいねえんだ、 せめてウチを頼んな。
jpnSearchText:
……もうご両親もいねえんだ、
せめてウチを頼んな。

engChrName: *sniffle* Thank you!
engSearchText: *sniffle* Thank you!
jpnChrName: グスッ、うん……！
jpnSearchText: グスッ、うん……！

engChrName: (I'm glad she has somewhere to stay at least, but that doesn't make the situation any less shitty.)
engSearchText:
(I'm glad she has somewhere to stay at least, but that
doesn't make the situation any less shitty.)
jpnChrName: （身を寄せる所があったのは良かったけど……   やっぱりあまりに残酷ね……）
jpnSearchText:
（身を寄せる所があったのは良かったけど……
やっぱりあまりに残酷ね……）

engChrName: (I'd shame the name Grimcat if I just sat idle and did nothing.)
engSearchText:
(I'd shame the name Grimcat if I just sat idle and
did nothing.)
jpnChrName: （このまま見過ごせないわ、   “幻夜の猫（グリムキャッツ）”としても。）
jpnSearchText:
（このまま見過ごせないわ、
“幻夜の猫（グリムキャッツ）”としても。）

engChrName: Hey, Van. Gang. Heard you guys had a hand in all that Oración business.
engSearchText:
Hey, Van. Gang. Heard you guys had a hand in all
that Oración business.
jpnChrName: おう、ヴァン達か……あんたらが オラシオンの一件に一枚噛んでたのは聞いてるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
おう、ヴァン達か……あんたらが
オラシオンの一件に一枚噛んでたのは聞いてるぜ。

engChrName: What a hodgepodge of evil organizations comin' out of the woodwork it was. Marduk, Zecht Arms... Just to name a few.
engSearchText:
What a hodgepodge of evil organizations comin' out
of the woodwork it was. Marduk, Zecht Arms...
Just to name a few.
jpnChrName: マルドゥックやらゼクトアームズやら、 さながら百鬼夜行が蠢いてたらしいが。
jpnSearchText:
マルドゥックやらゼクトアームズやら、
さながら百鬼夜行が蠢いてたらしいが。

engChrName: As long as it involves weapons, I can count on you to know what's goin' on. Saves me havin' to explain things, I guess.
engSearchText:
As long as it involves weapons, I can count on you to
know what's goin' on. Saves me havin' to explain
things, I guess.
jpnChrName: さすが武器方面の情報には明るいな。 あの街での顛末は言わずもがなってところだ。
jpnSearchText:
さすが武器方面の情報には明るいな。
あの街での顛末は言わずもがなってところだ。

engChrName: Yeah, I know what's up. The underworld should hopefully calm down a li'l with Almata out of the picture.
engSearchText:
Yeah, I know what's up. The underworld should
hopefully calm down a li'l with Almata out of
the picture.
jpnChrName: そうか……まあ、何にせよアルマータは消えた。 これで“裏”も少しは静かになるだろ。
jpnSearchText:
そうか……まあ、何にせよアルマータは消えた。
これで“裏”も少しは静かになるだろ。

engChrName: Good comeuppance to those asshats, for what they did to Kaina.
engSearchText:
Good comeuppance to those asshats, for what they
did to Kaina.
jpnChrName: それに、カイナの仇も 討てた事になるワケだしな──
jpnSearchText:
それに、カイナの仇も
討てた事になるワケだしな──

engChrName: How have you been since the incident, Kaina?
engSearchText: How have you been since the incident, Kaina?
jpnChrName: その……カイナさん、 あれから具合はいかがですか？
jpnSearchText:
その……カイナさん、
あれから具合はいかがですか？

engChrName: Honestly, I don't think it's even dawned on me yet. It's like my head's not caught up with the fact that everyone is just...gone.
engSearchText:
Honestly, I don't think it's even dawned on me yet.
It's like my head's not caught up with the fact that
everyone is just...gone.
jpnChrName: あたしは……正直なところ、あいつらが くたばったって聞いてもピンと来てないんだ。
jpnSearchText:
あたしは……正直なところ、あいつらが
くたばったって聞いてもピンと来てないんだ。

engChrName: I couldn't thank Sylvie enough for taking care of me. And I've been keeping busy working, so at least there's that.
engSearchText:
I couldn't thank Sylvie enough for taking care of me.
And I've been keeping busy working, so at least
there's that.
jpnChrName: ただ、シルヴィさんも良くしてくれてるし、 職人の仕事に打ち込んでる間は落ち着ける……
jpnSearchText:
ただ、シルヴィさんも良くしてくれてるし、
職人の仕事に打ち込んでる間は落ち着ける……

engChrName: I can't forget about the devastating tragedy that struck my village just yet, but...I guess I'm starting to heal, if only a little.
engSearchText:
I can't forget about the devastating tragedy that struck
my village just yet, but...I guess I'm starting to heal, if
only a little.
jpnChrName: 村の事は悲しいし許せないけど…… ふふ、少しは気持ちの整理もできてきたかも。
jpnSearchText:
村の事は悲しいし許せないけど……
ふふ、少しは気持ちの整理もできてきたかも。

engChrName: No need to rush feelin' better, though. You've got time, and I'll take care of ya all throughout.
engSearchText:
No need to rush feelin' better, though. You've got
time, and I'll take care of ya all throughout.
jpnChrName: 焦る事はねえよ。 当面はオレが面倒見てやっからな。
jpnSearchText:
焦る事はねえよ。
当面はオレが面倒見てやっからな。

engChrName: Hang in there. Both for yourself, and for that kid.
engSearchText: Hang in there. Both for yourself, and for that kid.
jpnChrName: カイナはせめて、あの子を支えてやんな。
jpnSearchText: カイナはせめて、あの子を支えてやんな。

engChrName: I will. Lashkar's still so shaken up about everything, I have to be there for him.
engSearchText:
I will. Lashkar's still so shaken up about everything, I
have to be there for him.
jpnChrName: うん、ラシュカルがずっと荒れてて…… やっぱり心配だよ……
jpnSearchText:
うん、ラシュカルがずっと荒れてて……
やっぱり心配だよ……

engChrName: Even with the church taking care of him, I'm the only one that really knows what he's going through.
engSearchText:
Even with the church taking care of him, I'm the only
one that really knows what he's going through.
jpnChrName: 今は寺院に預けてるけど、あの子の気持ちを 分かってあげられるのはあたしだけだしね……
jpnSearchText:
今は寺院に預けてるけど、あの子の気持ちを
分かってあげられるのはあたしだけだしね……

engChrName: You're right. I wish things were better.
engSearchText: You're right. I wish things were better.
jpnChrName: そう、ですね…… 簡単ではなさそうですが……
jpnSearchText:
そう、ですね……
簡単ではなさそうですが……

engChrName: I'll be sure to keep the squirt in mind.
engSearchText: I'll be sure to keep the squirt in mind.
jpnChrName: 俺たちも気に留めておくとするか。
jpnSearchText: 俺たちも気に留めておくとするか。

engChrName: We were finally starting to heal, and then Almata had to do this...
engSearchText:
We were finally starting to heal, and then Almata
had to do this...
jpnChrName: ……せっかくあたしらが前に進もうと思ってたのに、 アルマータはこんな事までするなんて……
jpnSearchText:
……せっかくあたしらが前に進もうと思ってたのに、
アルマータはこんな事までするなんて……

engChrName: I-I can't believe it... But I have to pull myself together and help Sylvie. She'll be helping out with battle prep.
engSearchText:
I-I can't believe it... But I have to pull myself together
and help Sylvie. She'll be helping out with battle prep.
jpnChrName: ……絶対に許せない……でも、シルヴィさんも 戦いに備えると言うなら……
jpnSearchText:
……絶対に許せない……でも、シルヴィさんも
戦いに備えると言うなら……

engChrName: It's the least I can do. I'll have to play my part, however insignificant it is, so that we can get through this. Through them.
engSearchText:
It's the least I can do. I'll have to play my part,
however insignificant it is, so that we can get
through this. Through them.
jpnChrName: あたしも、それを手伝ってあいつらの打倒に 少しでも力になれるなら……！
jpnSearchText:
あたしも、それを手伝ってあいつらの打倒に
少しでも力になれるなら……！
