engChrName: I've been checking up on Lashkar every day. He's still pretty out of it.
engSearchText:
I've been checking up on Lashkar every day. He's still
pretty out of it.
jpnChrName: ラシュカルはずっと荒れてて…… 毎日顔を見に行ってはいるんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
ラシュカルはずっと荒れてて……
毎日顔を見に行ってはいるんだけど……

engChrName: I can't blame him for it. He and Annie were so close, after all. The least I can do is offer him my support.
engSearchText:
I can't blame him for it. He and Annie were so close,
after all. The least I can do is offer him my support.
jpnChrName: でも無理もないよね、あの子はアニーと…… せめてあたしが支えてあげないと……
jpnSearchText:
でも無理もないよね、あの子はアニーと……
せめてあたしが支えてあげないと……

engChrName: Lashkar and I were here in Edith. We were going to head home, but this happened before we did.
engSearchText:
Lashkar and I were here in Edith. We were going to
head home, but this happened before we did.
jpnChrName: あたしとラシュカルは、首都に来てて…… ちょうど帰ろうとした矢先に、こんな事に……
jpnSearchText:
あたしとラシュカルは、首都に来てて……
ちょうど帰ろうとした矢先に、こんな事に……

engChrName: *sniffle* I can't believe they're all gone... Mom, Dad, and everyone else... Just...gone.
engSearchText:
*sniffle* I can't believe they're all gone... Mom, Dad,
and everyone else... Just...gone.
jpnChrName: グスッ……父さんに母さん、村のみんな…… 死んじゃったなんて、まだ信じられなくて……
jpnSearchText:
グスッ……父さんに母さん、村のみんな……
死んじゃったなんて、まだ信じられなくて……

engChrName: I-I need to pull myself together. For Sylvie, and for Lashkar.
engSearchText:
I-I need to pull myself together. For Sylvie, and
for Lashkar.
jpnChrName: でも……しっかりしないと……… シルヴィさんや、ラシュカルのためにも……
jpnSearchText:
でも……しっかりしないと………
シルヴィさんや、ラシュカルのためにも……

engChrName: Ahh! I never thought Sylvie would take me in as her apprentice!
engSearchText:
Ahh! I never thought Sylvie would take me in as
her apprentice!
jpnChrName: くぅぅ～っ！！　まさかトントン拍子で シルヴィさんに弟子入りできるだなんて！！
jpnSearchText:
くぅぅ～っ！！　まさかトントン拍子で
シルヴィさんに弟子入りできるだなんて！！

engChrName: And we're the same age? Man, that feels like a joke. How is she so skilled already? I can't even hope to compare...
engSearchText:
And we're the same age? Man, that feels like a joke.
How is she so skilled already? I can't even hope
to compare...
jpnChrName: で、でも……まさか同い年だったなんて…… 腕前の差に打ちのめされそうだけど……
jpnSearchText:
で、でも……まさか同い年だったなんて……
腕前の差に打ちのめされそうだけど……

engChrName: Get it together, Kaina! This is a wonderful opportunity! Training under one of the Republic's best gunsmiths!
engSearchText:
Get it together, Kaina! This is a
wonderful opportunity! Training under one of the
Republic's best gunsmiths!
jpnChrName: ううん、共和国最高の職人の一人に 出会えたと思えば……！！
jpnSearchText:
ううん、共和国最高の職人の一人に
出会えたと思えば……！！

engChrName: Oooh, I think I'm getting excited all over again. This week, I'll be a sponge! A sponge that absorbs every single drop of knowledge!
engSearchText:
Oooh, I think I'm getting excited all over again.
This week, I'll be a sponge! A sponge that absorbs
every single drop of knowledge!
jpnChrName: 改めて気合が入ったかも！ この一週間、全力で吸収してみせるよ！！
jpnSearchText:
改めて気合が入ったかも！
この一週間、全力で吸収してみせるよ！！

engChrName: Nice to see you back in one piece. Not that I was expecting otherwise.
engSearchText:
Nice to see you back in one piece. Not that I was
expecting otherwise.
jpnChrName: 流石は皆さん、ご無事でしたか。
jpnSearchText: 流石は皆さん、ご無事でしたか。

engChrName: Li-Lian! Good to see y'all are safe over here.
engSearchText: Li-Lian! Good to see y'all are safe over here.
jpnChrName: リーリェン、こっちも 被害は出てねえみたいだな！
jpnSearchText:
リーリェン、こっちも
被害は出てねえみたいだな！

engChrName: Yup. Safe as can be. Got Marduk's people to thank for that. They're pretty capable, all things considered.
engSearchText:
Yup. Safe as can be. Got Marduk's people to thank
for that. They're pretty capable, all things considered.
jpnChrName: ええ、ＭＫ社・警備員のお陰ですね。 いやはやとんでもない連中です。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、ＭＫ社・警備員のお陰ですね。
いやはやとんでもない連中です。

engChrName: I climbed up on the rooftop and took a look out there. I'll say, we're definitely up against real devils in here.
engSearchText:
I climbed up on the rooftop and took a look
out there. I'll say, we're definitely up against real
devils in here.
jpnChrName: ですがこの状況──屋上から伺ってきたんですが あれはまさしく魔、そのものですね……
jpnSearchText:
ですがこの状況──屋上から伺ってきたんですが
あれはまさしく魔、そのものですね……

engChrName: Hmm... It's all so...peculiar. But as unusual as this may be, I almost feel like I've heard about something like this happening before.
engSearchText:
Hmm... It's all so...peculiar. But as unusual as this
may be, I almost feel like I've heard about something
like this happening before.
jpnChrName: ふむ……異様すぎる状況ですが どこかで聞いた事があるような気も……
jpnSearchText:
ふむ……異様すぎる状況ですが
どこかで聞いた事があるような気も……

engChrName: Before?
engSearchText: Before?
jpnChrName: そうなのですか……？
jpnSearchText: そうなのですか……？

engChrName: The hell are you talking about?
engSearchText: The hell are you talking about?

engChrName: Eh, forget about it. Memory's a little hazy and couldn't say for certain.
engSearchText:
Eh, forget about it. Memory's a little hazy and
couldn't say for certain.
jpnChrName: いえ、すみません。 うろ覚えすぎて、ハッキリした事は。
jpnSearchText:
いえ、すみません。
うろ覚えすぎて、ハッキリした事は。

engChrName: Assuming I'm not just conked out at my place and having some whack ass dreams, we better start pulling it together and get things done.
engSearchText:
Assuming I'm not just conked out at my place and
having some whack ass dreams, we better start pulling
it together and get things done.
jpnChrName: ともあれ、これが夢でない以上 やるべき事をやるだけでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
ともあれ、これが夢でない以上
やるべき事をやるだけでしょう。

engChrName: Don't worry about us. I'm a trained member of the Gekka school, after all. Might be a little rusty, but it'll suffice.
engSearchText:
Don't worry about us. I'm a trained member of the
Gekka school, after all. Might be a little rusty, but
it'll suffice.
jpnChrName: ここにいる皆さんの事はご心配なく。 いざとなれば私も月華の力を揮わせて頂きますよ。
jpnSearchText:
ここにいる皆さんの事はご心配なく。
いざとなれば私も月華の力を揮わせて頂きますよ。

engChrName: And if you need any medical supplies, just let me know.
engSearchText:
And if you need any medical supplies, just let
me know.
jpnChrName: 医療品の補給が必要なら 遠慮なく仰ってくださいね。
jpnSearchText:
医療品の補給が必要なら
遠慮なく仰ってくださいね。

engChrName: Appreciate it. I'm glad knowin' we can count on you.
engSearchText: Appreciate it. I'm glad knowin' we can count on you.
jpnChrName: ああ、補給できるのはありがたい。 よろしく頼むぜ！
jpnSearchText:
ああ、補給できるのはありがたい。
よろしく頼むぜ！

engChrName: I get being shaken up still, but right now is when we have to pull ourselves together. Focus on what we can do about it, not what we can't.
engSearchText:
I get being shaken up still, but right now is when we
have to pull ourselves together. Focus on what we can
do about it, not what we can't.
jpnChrName: ……どうにも受け入れがたい状況ですが…… やるべき事をやるだけでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
……どうにも受け入れがたい状況ですが……
やるべき事をやるだけでしょう。

engChrName: Don't worry about us. And if you need any supplies, you know who to ask.
engSearchText:
Don't worry about us. And if you need any supplies,
you know who to ask.
jpnChrName: ここにいる皆さんの事はご心配なく。 薬が必要なら遠慮なく仰ってくださいね。
jpnSearchText:
ここにいる皆さんの事はご心配なく。
薬が必要なら遠慮なく仰ってくださいね。

engChrName: Take a look, take a look! From common medications to exotic remedies, we've got it all!
engSearchText:
Take a look, take a look! From common medications
to exotic remedies, we've got it all!
jpnChrName: 寄ってらっしゃい、見てらっしゃい！ 大陸中の名薬、珍薬♪
jpnSearchText:
寄ってらっしゃい、見てらっしゃい！
大陸中の名薬、珍薬♪

engChrName: We've got a variety of items! From over the counter basics to wonderful cosmetics! We got you covered if you need any souvenirs, too!
engSearchText:
We've got a variety of items! From over the counter
basics to wonderful cosmetics! We got you covered if
you need any souvenirs, too!
jpnChrName: 定番のあの薬から化粧品まで揃ってますよ！ お土産にもいかがです！？
jpnSearchText:
定番のあの薬から化粧品まで揃ってますよ！
お土産にもいかがです！？

engChrName: Just the Tear Balm's fine for me.
engSearchText: Just the Tear Balm's fine for me.
jpnChrName: ティアの薬、１個頼むぜ。
jpnSearchText: ティアの薬、１個頼むぜ。

engChrName: Coming right u—hold on! Van! At least spend a little more! All the festivities should loosen your pockets a little.
engSearchText:
Coming right u—hold on! Van! At least spend a
little more! All the festivities should loosen your
pockets a little.
jpnChrName: ちょっとヴァンさん！ 記念祭の買い物にしちゃショボすぎですよ！
jpnSearchText:
ちょっとヴァンさん！
記念祭の買い物にしちゃショボすぎですよ！

engChrName: Can offer you five Tearals here—no, what am I saying? Here, you can have the whole lot!
engSearchText:
Can offer you five Tearals here—no, what am
I saying? Here, you can have the whole lot!
jpnChrName: ここはティアラルを５個くらい── いえ、思い切ってティアオルの詰め合わせを！
jpnSearchText:
ここはティアラルを５個くらい──
いえ、思い切ってティアオルの詰め合わせを！

engChrName: Look who's got the loose pockets. Awfully kind today, ain'tcha?
engSearchText:
Look who's got the loose pockets. Awfully kind
today, ain'tcha?
jpnChrName: 商売人は元気だよなぁ。
jpnSearchText: 商売人は元気だよなぁ。

engChrName: Haha. Everyone's probably in a good mood because of the Revolution Festival.
engSearchText:
Haha. Everyone's probably in a good mood because
of the Revolution Festival.
jpnChrName: あはは……記念祭といえば かきいれ時ですしね。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……記念祭といえば
かきいれ時ですしね。

engChrName: They should be happy more often! We come here all the time.
engSearchText:
They should be happy more often! We come here all
the time.
jpnChrName: えへへ……このお店には いつもお世話になってますけど！
jpnSearchText:
えへへ……このお店には
いつもお世話になってますけど！

engChrName: I probably would've kicked you out already if all you came for was a measly Tear Balm.
engSearchText:
I probably would've kicked you out already if all you
came for was a measly Tear Balm.
jpnChrName: クク、コイツにとっちゃ ティア１個とかむしろ嫌がらせじゃね？
jpnSearchText:
クク、コイツにとっちゃ
ティア１個とかむしろ嫌がらせじゃね？

engChrName: Heehee. Every store around town has been brimming with customers today, so I understand the mirth.
engSearchText:
Heehee. Every store around town has been brimming
with customers today, so I understand the mirth.
jpnChrName: ふふ、本日はどの店舗も 忙しくなりそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、本日はどの店舗も
忙しくなりそうですね。

engChrName: Today's the perfect time for clients to get carried away. It's easy to overspend when you're content.
engSearchText:
Today's the perfect time for clients to get
carried away. It's easy to overspend when
you're content.
jpnChrName: まあ記念祭の勢いで 高級品を買っちゃう人はいそうだね。
jpnSearchText:
まあ記念祭の勢いで
高級品を買っちゃう人はいそうだね。

engChrName: Well, unlike SOMEONE, I actually could use some stuff. Maybe a beauty mask and a heating pack? My shoulders have been killing me!
engSearchText:
Well, unlike SOMEONE, I actually could use
some stuff. Maybe a beauty mask and a heating pack?
My shoulders have been killing me!
jpnChrName: あたし的には肩こり対策と美容パックを── って今のやっぱナシ！
jpnSearchText:
あたし的には肩こり対策と美容パックを──
って今のやっぱナシ！

engChrName: Heh. What really matters is seeing everyone in high spirits.
engSearchText:
Heh. What really matters is seeing everyone in
high spirits.
jpnChrName: フフ……街に活気があるのは 何よりだろう。
jpnSearchText:
フフ……街に活気があるのは
何よりだろう。

engChrName: It's the Revolution Festival! If there's a time to be merry, it's now!
engSearchText:
It's the Revolution Festival! If there's a time to be
merry, it's now!
jpnChrName: ちょっとちょっと、革命記念祭ですよ？ テンション上げて行きましょうよ～！
jpnSearchText:
ちょっとちょっと、革命記念祭ですよ？
テンション上げて行きましょうよ～！

engChrName: We have some specialty Eastern medicines in stock! Be quick, or they'll all fly away!
engSearchText:
We have some specialty Eastern medicines in stock!
Be quick, or they'll all fly away!
jpnChrName: 東方生薬のイイのも入ってるんです！ ぜひぜひご覧あれ～っ！
jpnSearchText:
東方生薬のイイのも入ってるんです！
ぜひぜひご覧あれ～っ！

engChrName: A lot has happened this year, but we're on the last stretch now.
engSearchText:
A lot has happened this year, but we're on the last
stretch now.
jpnChrName: 今年も色々ありましたけど、 そろそろ年の瀬ですねぇ～。
jpnSearchText:
今年も色々ありましたけど、
そろそろ年の瀬ですねぇ～。

engChrName: If the stars align, I might even open up my own business next year. And by stars I mean mira.
engSearchText:
If the stars align, I might even open up my own
business next year. And by stars I mean mira.
jpnChrName: 来年こそは独立開業したい所ですが 景気の様子を見てからでしょうかね。
jpnSearchText:
来年こそは独立開業したい所ですが
景気の様子を見てからでしょうかね。

engChrName: I get ya. Heard they're finally cutting off war reparations.
engSearchText:
I get ya. Heard they're finally cutting off
war reparations.
jpnChrName: ああ、先の大戦の賠償金が そろそろ打ち止めっつー話だな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、先の大戦の賠償金が
そろそろ打ち止めっつー話だな。

engChrName: I'm worried it might lead to a recession. Cutting all that cash flow's gonna have some repercussions. It's as easy as just saying 'no.'
engSearchText:
I'm worried it might lead to a recession. Cutting all
that cash flow's gonna have some repercussions. It's as
easy as just saying 'no.'
jpnChrName: 失速するようじゃ困りますが 経済はそう単純じゃありませんしね。
jpnSearchText:
失速するようじゃ困りますが
経済はそう単純じゃありませんしね。

engChrName: The pharmaceutical industry's been growing lately. Even Verne's getting in on it, with this new company of theirs that's just started.
engSearchText:
The pharmaceutical industry's been growing lately.
Even Verne's getting in on it, with this new company
of theirs that's just started.
jpnChrName: 製薬業界自体も伸びているんです。 ヴェルヌ系列の新会社も誕生しましたし。
jpnSearchText:
製薬業界自体も伸びているんです。
ヴェルヌ系列の新会社も誕生しましたし。

engChrName: Maybe I should snoop around a little. They're still not open to the public, so now might be as good a time as ever.
engSearchText:
Maybe I should snoop around a little. They're still not
open to the public, so now might be as good a time
as ever.
jpnChrName: 今度視察に行くのもアリですねぇ。 上場前ですし良いタイミングです♪
jpnSearchText:
今度視察に行くのもアリですねぇ。
上場前ですし良いタイミングです♪

engChrName: I wouldn't get my hopes up.
engSearchText: I wouldn't get my hopes up.
jpnChrName: 捕らぬ狸のなんとやら、だな。
jpnSearchText: 捕らぬ狸のなんとやら、だな。

engChrName: You're such a killjoy! Don't worry so much about me. I did my homework on this.
engSearchText:
You're such a killjoy! Don't worry so much about me.
I did my homework on this.
jpnChrName: フフ、ヴァンさんも人が悪いですねぇ。 大丈夫ですよ、ちゃんと計算してますから。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、ヴァンさんも人が悪いですねぇ。
大丈夫ですよ、ちゃんと計算してますから。

engChrName: It's real profitable right now. You could invest your life's savings into helping me set this up and I promise you I wouldn't lose you a single mira.
engSearchText:
It's real profitable right now. You could invest your
life's savings into helping me set this up and I promise
you I wouldn't lose you a single mira.
jpnChrName: 有り金全部、開業用に預けてもらっても 絶対に損はさせませんから！
jpnSearchText:
有り金全部、開業用に預けてもらっても
絶対に損はさせませんから！

engChrName: Yup. But no thanks.
engSearchText: Yup. But no thanks.
jpnChrName: ふう、やれやれだな。
jpnSearchText: ふう、やれやれだな。

engChrName: Hello! It's nice seeing you all here. Busy as always, eh?
engSearchText: Hello! It's nice seeing you all here. Busy as always, eh?
jpnChrName: やあやあ皆さん、お揃いで♪ 今日も今日とてお仕事ですか？
jpnSearchText:
やあやあ皆さん、お揃いで♪
今日も今日とてお仕事ですか？

engChrName: Looks like our mafia troubles are pretty much all over, so we get to enjoy the festival fully from here on!
engSearchText:
Looks like our mafia troubles are pretty much all over,
so we get to enjoy the festival fully from here on!
jpnChrName: マフィアの件もほぼ片付いたようですし 安心して革命記念祭を迎えられますね！
jpnSearchText:
マフィアの件もほぼ片付いたようですし
安心して革命記念祭を迎えられますね！

engChrName: Don't think it's gonna be that easy. There's gonna be consequences for it.
engSearchText:
Don't think it's gonna be that easy. There's gonna be
consequences for it.
jpnChrName: ま、揺れ戻しもありそうだし 万々歳って訳でもねえけどな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、揺れ戻しもありそうだし
万々歳って訳でもねえけどな。

engChrName: I don't like it myself. Even Heiyue is getting in on the cleanup.
engSearchText:
I don't like it myself. Even Heiyue is getting in on
the cleanup.
jpnChrName: “清算”に黒月が噛んでやがるのも 臭えっちゃ臭えしな。
jpnSearchText:
“清算”に黒月が噛んでやがるのも
臭えっちゃ臭えしな。

engChrName: Better that the big shots of the underworld do something useful than hinder everything.
engSearchText:
Better that the big shots of the underworld do
something useful than hinder everything.
jpnChrName: まあそれでも、裏のバランサーが 機能しているのは朗報でしょう。
jpnSearchText:
まあそれでも、裏のバランサーが
機能しているのは朗報でしょう。

engChrName: I'll take Heiyue being a little shady a million times over any genuine threats going on.
engSearchText:
I'll take Heiyue being a little shady a million times
over any genuine threats going on.
jpnChrName: 不穏な動きがあるよりかは １００倍マシですよ。
jpnSearchText:
不穏な動きがあるよりかは
１００倍マシですよ。

engChrName: Don't think I'm a big fan of Heiyue or anything, but I'd rather take this than them doing anything that might threaten us.
engSearchText:
Don't think I'm a big fan of Heiyue or anything, but
I'd rather take this than them doing anything that
might threaten us.
jpnChrName: 私も黒月は好きじゃないですが、 不穏な動きがあるよりかはマシですよ。
jpnSearchText:
私も黒月は好きじゃないですが、
不穏な動きがあるよりかはマシですよ。

engChrName: The Revolution Festival's right around the corner. Here's hoping things'll remain this calm for the rest of the year.
engSearchText:
The Revolution Festival's right around the corner.
Here's hoping things'll remain this calm for the rest
of the year.
jpnChrName: 記念祭も近いですし 平和になることを願いたいものですねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
記念祭も近いですし
平和になることを願いたいものですねぇ。

engChrName: Hey. Sorry you saw that.
engSearchText: Hey. Sorry you saw that.
jpnChrName: やあやあ、恥ずかしい所を 見られちゃいましたね。
jpnSearchText:
やあやあ、恥ずかしい所を
見られちゃいましたね。

engChrName: Xiaoling's one fault is her temper. She's always running on a bit of a short fuse.
engSearchText:
Xiaoling's one fault is her temper. She's always running
on a bit of a short fuse.
jpnChrName: シャオリンは見ての通りのお転婆で、 スグに熱くなるのが玉に瑕です。
jpnSearchText:
シャオリンは見ての通りのお転婆で、
スグに熱くなるのが玉に瑕です。

engChrName: I worry one day it's gonna land her in a sticky situation.
engSearchText:
I worry one day it's gonna land her in a
sticky situation.
jpnChrName: 危険に首を突っ込む事態に ならなきゃいいんですが……
jpnSearchText:
危険に首を突っ込む事態に
ならなきゃいいんですが……

engChrName: I received another letter from my younger sister. She lives in Langport.
engSearchText:
I received another letter from my younger sister.
She lives in Langport.
jpnChrName: またラングポートにいる妹から 手紙が届きましてね。
jpnSearchText:
またラングポートにいる妹から
手紙が届きましてね。

engChrName: All her whining almost masks how hard she's working at bettering herself as a bracer.
engSearchText:
All her whining almost masks how hard she's working
at bettering herself as a bracer.
jpnChrName: フフ、私に対する文句ばかりですが 遊撃士の仕事も頑張ってるようですねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、私に対する文句ばかりですが
遊撃士の仕事も頑張ってるようですねぇ。

engChrName: I think I know who you're talking about. Her name is Xiaoling, right?
engSearchText:
I think I know who you're talking about. Her name is
Xiaoling, right?
jpnChrName: 確かシャオリン、だったか。 ラングポートでも見かけたが。
jpnSearchText:
確かシャオリン、だったか。
ラングポートでも見かけたが。

engChrName: Her Gekka skills landed her a job as a bracer, if I remember correctly.
engSearchText:
Her Gekka skills landed her a job as a bracer, if I
remember correctly.
jpnChrName: そういや《月華》の使い手で 遊撃士をやってるんだったか。
jpnSearchText:
そういや《月華》の使い手で
遊撃士をやってるんだったか。

engChrName: Yup, that's her. Always getting herself in hot water, but she's real sweet.
engSearchText:
Yup, that's her. Always getting herself in hot water,
but she's real sweet.
jpnChrName: ええ、少々危なっかしいですが 可愛い妹ですよ。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、少々危なっかしいですが
可愛い妹ですよ。

engChrName: Sounds like she's been having beef with someone from Heiyue. Oh, I hope she doesn't get into a really dangerous situation.
engSearchText:
Sounds like she's been having beef with someone
from Heiyue. Oh, I hope she doesn't get into a really
dangerous situation.
jpnChrName: 黒月相手にも渡り合っているようですが…… ああいう商売ですから、少々心配です。
jpnSearchText:
黒月相手にも渡り合っているようですが……
ああいう商売ですから、少々心配です。

engChrName: If only she'd behave...
engSearchText: If only she'd behave...
jpnChrName: 無茶をしてないといいんですが……
jpnSearchText: 無茶をしてないといいんですが……

engChrName: All I can do is hope. I'm honestly not on the best terms with my family, so I don't plan on going back anytime soon.
engSearchText:
All I can do is hope. I'm honestly not on the best
terms with my family, so I don't plan on going back
anytime soon.
jpnChrName: ……まあ、実家と折り合いが悪いので 顔を出すつもりはありませんけどね。
jpnSearchText:
……まあ、実家と折り合いが悪いので
顔を出すつもりはありませんけどね。

engChrName: (Heehee. Li-Lian really cares about Xiaoling, despite everything.)
engSearchText:
(Heehee. Li-Lian really cares about Xiaoling,
despite everything.)
jpnChrName: （ふふっ、妹さんの事   本当に大切に想われているんですね。）
jpnSearchText:
（ふふっ、妹さんの事
本当に大切に想われているんですね。）

engChrName: (Never thought I'd see this side to Li-Lian, considering his usual cynicism. Might be a bit much...)
engSearchText:
(Never thought I'd see this side to Li-Lian,
considering his usual cynicism. Might be a
bit much...)
jpnChrName: （ああ、ひねくれ者のこいつにしちゃ   シスコンレベルだよな。）
jpnSearchText:
（ああ、ひねくれ者のこいつにしちゃ
シスコンレベルだよな。）

engChrName: My parents are insisting I go back home ASAP.
engSearchText: My parents are insisting I go back home ASAP.
jpnChrName: ちなみに実家の方は とっとと戻ってこいの一点張りらしく。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに実家の方は
とっとと戻ってこいの一点張りらしく。

engChrName: But I'm not budging. If I go back, that'll just mean a leash. They'll take advantage of me and make me take over the dojo.
engSearchText:
But I'm not budging. If I go back, that'll just mean
a leash. They'll take advantage of me and make me
take over the dojo.
jpnChrName: ヤダヤダ、戻れば道場を 継がされるのが目に見えてますからね。
jpnSearchText:
ヤダヤダ、戻れば道場を
継がされるのが目に見えてますからね。

engChrName: That stuff's not for me. I'd rather leave it to my younger sister. She's still a little clumsy, but she's a whole lot more reliable than I am.
engSearchText:
That stuff's not for me. I'd rather leave it to my
younger sister. She's still a little clumsy, but she's a
whole lot more reliable than I am.
jpnChrName: そういうのは妹に任せますよ。 私と違って、不器用でも実直ですから。
jpnSearchText:
そういうのは妹に任せますよ。
私と違って、不器用でも実直ですから。

engChrName: By the way, Van. Ever thought about investing in a business? To be specific, my business. You HAVE been taking a lot of requests.
engSearchText:
By the way, Van. Ever thought about investing in
a business? To be specific, my business. You HAVE
been taking a lot of requests.
jpnChrName: そういえばヴァンさん、近頃大口の依頼を 積極的に受けているようですが……
jpnSearchText:
そういえばヴァンさん、近頃大口の依頼を
積極的に受けているようですが……

engChrName: You've gotta be loaded, right? What do you say to pumping a little cash into my business?
engSearchText:
You've gotta be loaded, right? What do you say to
pumping a little cash into my business?
jpnChrName: 儲けてるんでしょう？ どうですか、私の独立開業に賭けてみるのは。
jpnSearchText:
儲けてるんでしょう？
どうですか、私の独立開業に賭けてみるのは。

engChrName: As if. Not with all the part-timers I got.
engSearchText: As if. Not with all the part-timers I got.
jpnChrName: いや、言うほど儲かってねえよ。 バイトも雇っちまったしな……
jpnSearchText:
いや、言うほど儲かってねえよ。
バイトも雇っちまったしな……

engChrName: Everyone but Agnès has rent to pay, and that ain't cheap. Gotta pay them all a livable wage.
engSearchText:
Everyone but Agnès has rent to pay, and that
ain't cheap. Gotta pay them all a livable wage.
jpnChrName: アニエス以外は家賃もある、 それなりに払ってやらねえと。
jpnSearchText:
アニエス以外は家賃もある、
それなりに払ってやらねえと。

engChrName: Ahaha! Look at you, acting like a boss. You could almost pass as a proper business!
engSearchText:
Ahaha! Look at you, acting like a boss. You could
almost pass as a proper business!
jpnChrName: アハハ！　なんだか所長っぽいですね。 うん、所長っぽい！
jpnSearchText:
アハハ！　なんだか所長っぽいですね。
うん、所長っぽい！

engChrName: Shut it.
engSearchText: Shut it.
jpnChrName: からかうなっつの。
jpnSearchText: からかうなっつの。

engChrName: But speaking of dough, shouldn't YOU be the one that's rollin' in it, with that recent promotion you got?
engSearchText:
But speaking of dough, shouldn't YOU be the one
that's rollin' in it, with that recent promotion you got?
jpnChrName: お前こそ、今や腕利き薬剤師だろ。 儲けてんじゃねえのか？
jpnSearchText:
お前こそ、今や腕利き薬剤師だろ。
儲けてんじゃねえのか？

engChrName: Oh, no, not at all. I owe this pharmacy so much for all they've done for me. I asked them to keep my salary the same, in fact.
engSearchText:
Oh, no, not at all. I owe this pharmacy so much for
all they've done for me. I asked them to keep my
salary the same, in fact.
jpnChrName: フフ、この薬局には恩義もありますしね。 給料は据え置きでお願いしてるんです。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、この薬局には恩義もありますしね。
給料は据え置きでお願いしてるんです。

engChrName: But once I get my business up and running, THEN all the mira will come rolling in! ♪
engSearchText:
But once I get my business up and running, THEN
all the mira will come rolling in! ♪
jpnChrName: 独立したらガッポガッポ 儲けさせて頂きますけどねぇ♪
jpnSearchText:
独立したらガッポガッポ
儲けさせて頂きますけどねぇ♪

engChrName: You made the right choice quittin' martial arts. The shrewd business style suits you better.
engSearchText:
You made the right choice quittin' martial arts.
The shrewd business style suits you better.
jpnChrName: ……やっぱお前、 武術家よりも商売人向きだな。
jpnSearchText:
……やっぱお前、
武術家よりも商売人向きだな。

engChrName: What a fun day! It's not every day I get to see you behave like a proper boss, you know!
engSearchText:
What a fun day! It's not every day I get to see you
behave like a proper boss, you know!
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんのレアな所長顔が 見れたので、今日は良しとしましょう。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさんのレアな所長顔が
見れたので、今日は良しとしましょう。

engChrName: And do think on that business proposal I mentioned. You'll get a ten percent return on investment. ♪
engSearchText:
And do think on that business proposal I mentioned.
You'll get a ten percent return on investment. ♪
jpnChrName: 独立開業資金の件、考えておいて下さいね。 １．１倍くらいにしてお返ししますから♪
jpnSearchText:
独立開業資金の件、考えておいて下さいね。
１．１倍くらいにしてお返ししますから♪

engChrName: You're such a sly little shit.
engSearchText: You're such a sly little shit.
jpnChrName: 微妙にみみっちいよな、お前もよ。
jpnSearchText: 微妙にみみっちいよな、お前もよ。

engChrName: Not just Langport, but Tharbad also got caught up in that mess a few weeks ago.
engSearchText:
Not just Langport, but Tharbad also got caught up in
that mess a few weeks ago.
jpnChrName: ラングポートでの一件、そして 先月のサルバッドでの騒動……
jpnSearchText:
ラングポートでの一件、そして
先月のサルバッドでの騒動……

engChrName: The media's been pretty mum about it, but I don't doubt A has something to do with it.
engSearchText:
The media's been pretty mum about it, but I don't
doubt A has something to do with it.
jpnChrName: 詳細は伏せられていますが 《Ａ》の台頭ぶりも相当なようですねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
詳細は伏せられていますが
《Ａ》の台頭ぶりも相当なようですねぇ。

engChrName: Talk's been gettin' around about it.
engSearchText: Talk's been gettin' around about it.
jpnChrName: ああ、軽く耳には入ってるみてえだな。
jpnSearchText: ああ、軽く耳には入ってるみてえだな。

engChrName: You hear anything about what's goin' on in Langport?
engSearchText: You hear anything about what's goin' on in Langport?
jpnChrName: 煌都方面の動きは何か聞いてるか？
jpnSearchText: 煌都方面の動きは何か聞いてるか？

engChrName: Just hearsay, and nothing specific, but the elders might finally be getting serious.
engSearchText:
Just hearsay, and nothing specific, but the elders
might finally be getting serious.
jpnChrName: ふう、又聞き程度ですけどね…… “長老会”も本腰を入れ始めているとか。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、又聞き程度ですけどね……
“長老会”も本腰を入れ始めているとか。

engChrName: *sigh* Not a whole lot an ordinary citizen like me can do other than pray things stay peaceful.
engSearchText:
*sigh* Not a whole lot an ordinary citizen like me can
do other than pray things stay peaceful.
jpnChrName: やれやれ、私ども一般市民としては 平和に暮らせるように祈るばかりですよ。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ、私ども一般市民としては
平和に暮らせるように祈るばかりですよ。

engChrName: You ain't exactly my definition of 'ordinary citizen,' but all right. We'll keep an eye out.
engSearchText:
You ain't exactly my definition of 'ordinary citizen,'
but all right. We'll keep an eye out.
jpnChrName: お前が一般市民かは怪しい所だが、 なるほどな……気を付けておくか。
jpnSearchText:
お前が一般市民かは怪しい所だが、
なるほどな……気を付けておくか。

engChrName: That we will. As for now, how about we take the opportunity to restock on medical supplies?
engSearchText:
That we will. As for now, how about we take the
opportunity to restock on medical supplies?
jpnChrName: ええ──合わせて医薬品の補充なども この機会に行っておきましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
ええ──合わせて医薬品の補充なども
この機会に行っておきましょうか。

engChrName: Heiyue might finally be pulling out all the stops.
engSearchText: Heiyue might finally be pulling out all the stops.
jpnChrName: 《黒月》の方も本腰を入れて 動き出している様子……
jpnSearchText:
《黒月》の方も本腰を入れて
動き出している様子……

engChrName: A full-on confrontation between two of the underworld's big shots wouldn't be pretty...
engSearchText:
A full-on confrontation between two of the
underworld's big shots wouldn't be pretty...
jpnChrName: どちらも裏の一大勢力ですからね、 正面からぶつかればどうなる事やら。
jpnSearchText:
どちらも裏の一大勢力ですからね、
正面からぶつかればどうなる事やら。

engChrName: I don't ask for much. Just wanna live in peace.
engSearchText: I don't ask for much. Just wanna live in peace.
jpnChrName: ホント、平和に暮らせると いいんですけどねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ホント、平和に暮らせると
いいんですけどねぇ。

engChrName: Laurel Pharmacy is the perfect place for all your everyday needs! We've got a wide selection of products.
engSearchText:
Laurel Pharmacy is the perfect place for all your
everyday needs! We've got a wide selection
of products.
jpnChrName: この《ローレル薬局》は品揃えの バランスも良く、まさに定番の薬局ですね。
jpnSearchText:
この《ローレル薬局》は品揃えの
バランスも良く、まさに定番の薬局ですね。

engChrName: From brand name drugs to Remiferian medicine and Eastern remedies, we've got it all! Even all-natural cosmetics from the Central East.
engSearchText:
From brand name drugs to Remiferian medicine and
Eastern remedies, we've got it all! Even all-natural
cosmetics from the Central East.
jpnChrName: レミフェリアの大手製、東方の生薬、 中東系の自然素材を使った化粧品など……
jpnSearchText:
レミフェリアの大手製、東方の生薬、
中東系の自然素材を使った化粧品など……

engChrName: Working here has really expanded my horizons. It's an experience I never would have been able to have back in Langport.
engSearchText:
Working here has really expanded my horizons.
It's an experience I never would have been able to
have back in Langport.
jpnChrName: 私もここに勤めて、世界が広がりましたよ。 煌都にいては得られなかった経験です。
jpnSearchText:
私もここに勤めて、世界が広がりましたよ。
煌都にいては得られなかった経験です。

engChrName: I would've done just about anything as long as it didn't have to do with martial arts, but I feel so at home here!
engSearchText:
I would've done just about anything as long as it
didn't have to do with martial arts, but I feel
so at home here!
jpnChrName: フフ、武術以外なら何でも良かったんですが…… 案外薬屋が板についたのかもしれませんね♪
jpnSearchText:
フフ、武術以外なら何でも良かったんですが……
案外薬屋が板についたのかもしれませんね♪

engChrName: There's so much to learn when it comes to pharma. Different cultures and countries all have their own applications of medicine.
engSearchText:
There's so much to learn when it comes to pharma.
Different cultures and countries all have their own
applications of medicine.
jpnChrName: 医薬品は幅も広く、国や文化によっても 無数の種類が存在します。
jpnSearchText:
医薬品は幅も広く、国や文化によっても
無数の種類が存在します。

engChrName: The more you learn, the bigger your world becomes.
engSearchText: The more you learn, the bigger your world becomes.
jpnChrName: フフ、学ぶだけでも世界が広がりますよ。
jpnSearchText: フフ、学ぶだけでも世界が広がりますよ。

engChrName: It was just an excuse to leave Langport at first, but I think I'm actually digging this whole pharmacist deal.
engSearchText:
It was just an excuse to leave Langport at first, but I
think I'm actually digging this whole pharmacist deal.
jpnChrName: 煌都を出るための口実でしたが…… 案外薬屋が板についたのかもしれませんね♪
jpnSearchText:
煌都を出るための口実でしたが……
案外薬屋が板についたのかもしれませんね♪

engChrName: Hold on a sec...
engSearchText: Hold on a sec...
jpnChrName: おや、あなたは……
jpnSearchText: おや、あなたは……

engChrName: Oh, shit! Look who walked in! It's the talk of the town! Er... As long as that town is Langport.
engSearchText:
Oh, shit! Look who walked in! It's the talk of
the town! Er... As long as that town is Langport.
jpnChrName: フフ、煌都の麒麟児さんでしたっけ？ お噂はかねがね～！
jpnSearchText:
フフ、煌都の麒麟児さんでしたっけ？
お噂はかねがね～！

engChrName: Li-Lian?! What the hell, man? Since when are you in the capital?
engSearchText:
Li-Lian?! What the hell, man? Since when are you
in the capital?
jpnChrName: ってアンタはリーリェンじゃねえか。 首都にいやがったのかよ！？
jpnSearchText:
ってアンタはリーリェンじゃねえか。
首都にいやがったのかよ！？

engChrName: I should've guessed you two'd know each other.
engSearchText: I should've guessed you two'd know each other.
jpnChrName: なんだ知り合いだったのか？ まあ同郷出身ならおかしくもねえか。
jpnSearchText:
なんだ知り合いだったのか？
まあ同郷出身ならおかしくもねえか。

engChrName: Hell yeah! Aaron used to come by our dojo.
engSearchText: Hell yeah! Aaron used to come by our dojo.
jpnChrName: ええ、アーロンは月華流（ウチ）の道場に 通っていたんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、アーロンは月華流（ウチ）の道場に
通っていたんですよ。

engChrName: I packed my bags and left Langport as soon as I could, though, so it's not like we got to know each other that well.
engSearchText:
I packed my bags and left Langport as soon as I
could, though, so it's not like we got to know each
other that well.
jpnChrName: 私はとっとと煌都を出ちゃいましたからね、 そう長い付き合いじゃありませんでしたが♪
jpnSearchText:
私はとっとと煌都を出ちゃいましたからね、
そう長い付き合いじゃありませんでしたが♪

engChrName: I'd heard something about my old teacher's assistant ending up as a pharmacist of all things. Weird ass career change, if you ask me.
engSearchText:
I'd heard something about my old teacher's assistant
ending up as a pharmacist of all things. Weird ass
career change, if you ask me.
jpnChrName: 俺がガキの頃にいた胡散臭ぇ師範代だ。 薬屋になったと聞いてたが、やっぱ臭ぇな。
jpnSearchText:
俺がガキの頃にいた胡散臭ぇ師範代だ。
薬屋になったと聞いてたが、やっぱ臭ぇな。

engChrName: And I see your bite hasn't gotten any less sharp!
engSearchText: And I see your bite hasn't gotten any less sharp!
jpnChrName: アハハ、そんな酷い事をおっしゃらず！
jpnSearchText: アハハ、そんな酷い事をおっしゃらず！

engChrName: Way I see it, we should both stick together. Just a couple of Langport's outcasts. I hope I'll be counting on your patronage soon!
engSearchText:
Way I see it, we should both stick together. Just a
couple of Langport's outcasts. I hope I'll be counting
on your patronage soon!
jpnChrName: 同じ“ハブられ組”じゃないですか、 今後も御贔屓にしてくださいよ～！
jpnSearchText:
同じ“ハブられ組”じゃないですか、
今後も御贔屓にしてくださいよ～！

engChrName: Throw in a ten percent discount and I might consider it, you quack.
engSearchText:
Throw in a ten percent discount and I might
consider it, you quack.
jpnChrName: ウゼーんだよ、エセ薬師が。 １割まけるってんなら考えてやるがよ？
jpnSearchText:
ウゼーんだよ、エセ薬師が。
１割まけるってんなら考えてやるがよ？

engChrName: I don't think discount meds are the deal you think they are.
engSearchText:
I don't think discount meds are the deal you think
they are.
jpnChrName: コラコラ、こんな所で 値引き交渉はやめたまえ。
jpnSearchText:
コラコラ、こんな所で
値引き交渉はやめたまえ。

engChrName: Heard the capital is now home to Langport's prodigy.
engSearchText: Heard the capital is now home to Langport's prodigy.
jpnChrName: 煌都の麒麟児アーロン・ウェイが 首都に滞在してるそうですねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
煌都の麒麟児アーロン・ウェイが
首都に滞在してるそうですねぇ。

engChrName: Also heard he's got this new job at Arkride Solutions, too. So, Van. How's Aaron doing?
engSearchText:
Also heard he's got this new job at Arkride
Solutions, too. So, Van. How's Aaron doing?
jpnChrName: 何でもヴァンさんのところに お世話になっているとか──
jpnSearchText:
何でもヴァンさんのところに
お世話になっているとか──

engChrName: You caught on to that pretty quick. Wonder where you get your info from.
engSearchText:
You caught on to that pretty quick. Wonder where
you get your info from.
jpnChrName: お前も結構情報が早い方だよな……
jpnSearchText: お前も結構情報が早い方だよな……

engChrName: Hah, nowhere special. My sister got in touch with me for the first time in a while.
engSearchText:
Hah, nowhere special. My sister got in touch with me
for the first time in a while.
jpnChrName: いやぁ、久々に妹から連絡がありましてね。
jpnSearchText: いやぁ、久々に妹から連絡がありましてね。

engChrName: She told me about what happened over in Langport. A real tragedy.
engSearchText:
She told me about what happened over in Langport.
A real tragedy.
jpnChrName: 煌都での顛末も耳にしていますよ。 大変だったそうですねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
煌都での顛末も耳にしていますよ。
大変だったそうですねぇ。

engChrName: I'm just happy that Aaron's doing fine.
engSearchText: I'm just happy that Aaron's doing fine.
jpnChrName: ふむ、アーロンも 元気にしているといいのですが。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、アーロンも
元気にしているといいのですが。

engChrName: My sister told me all about what happened in Langport.
engSearchText:
My sister told me all about what happened
in Langport.
jpnChrName: 煌都では色々あったそうですねぇ。 妹から聞き及んでいますよ。
jpnSearchText:
煌都では色々あったそうですねぇ。
妹から聞き及んでいますよ。

engChrName: All in all, I'm just glad the worst case scenario didn't come to pass.
engSearchText:
All in all, I'm just glad the worst case scenario didn't
come to pass.
jpnChrName: まあ最悪の事態が回避されただけ 儲けものというものでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
まあ最悪の事態が回避されただけ
儲けものというものでしょう。

engChrName: Not even the police or the guild know exactly what happened, or why.
engSearchText:
Not even the police or the guild know exactly what
happened, or why.
jpnChrName: 一部、警察や遊撃士も掴めていない “事情”があるようですが……
jpnSearchText:
一部、警察や遊撃士も掴めていない
“事情”があるようですが……

engChrName: Eh, whatever. I'm not from Langport anymore. I should probably let go and stop poking my nose in where I'm not needed.
engSearchText:
Eh, whatever. I'm not from Langport anymore.
I should probably let go and stop poking my nose in
where I'm not needed.
jpnChrName: フフ、すでに煌都を出た身です。 首を突っ込むのは止しておきましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、すでに煌都を出た身です。
首を突っ込むのは止しておきましょうか。

engChrName: Look who it is! Van, crew. Welcome!
engSearchText: Look who it is! Van, crew. Welcome!
jpnChrName: やあやあヴァンさん達じゃないですか！
jpnSearchText: やあやあヴァンさん達じゃないですか！

engChrName: Nice seeing a new face around. You guys staying out of trouble?
engSearchText:
Nice seeing a new face around. You guys staying out
of trouble?
jpnChrName: 新顔さんもいらっしゃるようですが 近頃ヤンチャなどしてませんか？
jpnSearchText:
新顔さんもいらっしゃるようですが
近頃ヤンチャなどしてませんか？

engChrName: Now, don't be getting into too many fights. Medicine can't fix everything.
engSearchText:
Now, don't be getting into too many fights.
Medicine can't fix everything.
jpnChrName: あまりヒドイ怪我は薬じゃ治せませんからね。 喧嘩も程々になさってくださいよ？
jpnSearchText:
あまりヒドイ怪我は薬じゃ治せませんからね。
喧嘩も程々になさってくださいよ？

engChrName: I'm not a common thug, you know.
engSearchText: I'm not a common thug, you know.
jpnChrName: 人を喧嘩屋みたいに言うんじゃねえ。
jpnSearchText: 人を喧嘩屋みたいに言うんじゃねえ。

engChrName: And I don't want any lip from a Gekka student. Y'all get beaten up black and blue for sport.
engSearchText:
And I don't want any lip from a Gekka student.
Y'all get beaten up black and blue for sport.
jpnChrName: つーかお前も《月華流》の出身だろ。 打ち身なんかは日常茶飯事だったんじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
つーかお前も《月華流》の出身だろ。
打ち身なんかは日常茶飯事だったんじゃねえか？

engChrName: Gekka's a famous Eastern martial arts school, right?
engSearchText: Gekka's a famous Eastern martial arts school, right?
jpnChrName: 《月華流》……確か 東方で有名な拳法でしたっけ。
jpnSearchText:
《月華流》……確か
東方で有名な拳法でしたっけ。

engChrName: I think so. I've heard about it here and there. I take it you are a student?
engSearchText:
I think so. I've heard about it here and there. I take it
you are a student?
jpnChrName: 時々耳にしますけど…… 拳法の心得がある方だったんですね。
jpnSearchText:
時々耳にしますけど……
拳法の心得がある方だったんですね。

engChrName: FORMER Gekka student. It's a bit of a sore spot.
engSearchText: FORMER Gekka student. It's a bit of a sore spot.
jpnChrName: いや～、そうなんですがね。 そこを突かれると痛いといいますか。
jpnSearchText:
いや～、そうなんですがね。
そこを突かれると痛いといいますか。

engChrName: Everyone in my family's a practitioner. We were pretty notable back in Langport for that.
engSearchText:
Everyone in my family's a practitioner. We were
pretty notable back in Langport for that.
jpnChrName: 私、煌都ラングポートに本拠を置く 《月華》本流筋の家柄なんですが……
jpnSearchText:
私、煌都ラングポートに本拠を置く
《月華》本流筋の家柄なんですが……

engChrName: But it wasn't for me. That kind of environment is just stifling.
engSearchText:
But it wasn't for me. That kind of environment is
just stifling.
jpnChrName: そういう暑苦しいの、 どうにも肌に合わなくてですねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
そういう暑苦しいの、
どうにも肌に合わなくてですねぇ。

engChrName: So I left! And that, you could say, is yours truly's tragic backstory.
engSearchText:
So I left! And that, you could say, is yours truly's
tragic backstory.
jpnChrName: 実家を飛び出しちゃったんですよ～。 ちょっとした黒歴史ってヤツですね♪
jpnSearchText:
実家を飛び出しちゃったんですよ～。
ちょっとした黒歴史ってヤツですね♪

engChrName: And now you're living in the capital. Real big sob story there.
engSearchText:
And now you're living in the capital. Real big sob
story there.
jpnChrName: それで首都暮らし…… お前も気ままな奴だよな。
jpnSearchText:
それで首都暮らし……
お前も気ままな奴だよな。

engChrName: But I guess it's not that unusual. Same thing happened to a mutual acquaintance of ours.
engSearchText:
But I guess it's not that unusual. Same thing
happened to a mutual acquaintance of ours.
jpnChrName: ま、共通の知り合いにも似たような奴が いるし、珍しくもないのかもしれんが。
jpnSearchText:
ま、共通の知り合いにも似たような奴が
いるし、珍しくもないのかもしれんが。

engChrName: Oh, you mean Shenli? I hope he's doing well.
engSearchText: Oh, you mean Shenli? I hope he's doing well.
jpnChrName: ああ、シェンリーですね。 彼も元気にしてますかね～。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、シェンリーですね。
彼も元気にしてますかね～。

engChrName: I try to avoid contact with people from Langport, but every now and then I get curious as to what's been going on there.
engSearchText:
I try to avoid contact with people from Langport, but
every now and then I get curious as to what's been
going on there.
jpnChrName: 煌都方面との連絡は控えてるんですが やはり知人の動向は気になりますねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
煌都方面との連絡は控えてるんですが
やはり知人の動向は気になりますねぇ。

engChrName: Not like I miss it or anything. Living in the capital RULES! Nothing tying me down, so I'm free as a butterfly.
engSearchText:
Not like I miss it or anything. Living in the
capital RULES! Nothing tying me down, so I'm free
as a butterfly.
jpnChrName: 首都暮らしも悪くありませんよ。 地元と違ってしがらみも無いですし♪
jpnSearchText:
首都暮らしも悪くありませんよ。
地元と違ってしがらみも無いですし♪

engChrName: I do wonder about what's up with Langport. With them in charge, how could I not?
engSearchText:
I do wonder about what's up with Langport.
With them in charge, how could I not?
jpnChrName: まあ煌都方面の動向も気になりますけどね。 なにせ“彼ら”の膝元ですし……
jpnSearchText:
まあ煌都方面の動向も気になりますけどね。
なにせ“彼ら”の膝元ですし……

engChrName: *sigh* I just hope my little sister's not being reckless.
engSearchText: *sigh* I just hope my little sister's not being reckless.
jpnChrName: ふう、わが妹も 無茶をしてないといいのですが。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、わが妹も
無茶をしてないといいのですが。

engChrName: Well, well. If it isn't my favorite spriggan!
engSearchText: Well, well. If it isn't my favorite spriggan!
jpnChrName: やぁやぁどうも、 《裏解決屋》さんじゃありませんか♪
jpnSearchText:
やぁやぁどうも、
《裏解決屋》さんじゃありませんか♪

engChrName: And looking just as grumpy as ever! Haha, I don't think I have any medicine for that!
engSearchText:
And looking just as grumpy as ever! Haha, I don't
think I have any medicine for that!
jpnChrName: いつもながら後ろ暗そうな人相── フフ、当店のお薬でも治せるかどうか。
jpnSearchText:
いつもながら後ろ暗そうな人相──
フフ、当店のお薬でも治せるかどうか。

engChrName: I didn't come here to get any lip from you.
engSearchText: I didn't come here to get any lip from you.
jpnChrName: ったくいつもながら人を食った奴だな。 んなモン求めてねーよ！
jpnSearchText:
ったくいつもながら人を食った奴だな。
んなモン求めてねーよ！

engChrName: Oh. You're aware of Van's work?
engSearchText: Oh. You're aware of Van's work?
jpnChrName: ええと、もしかして ヴァンさんのお仕事の事も……？
jpnSearchText:
ええと、もしかして
ヴァンさんのお仕事の事も……？

engChrName: I don't know anything in detail, but yeah.
engSearchText: I don't know anything in detail, but yeah.
jpnChrName: ええ、モチロン。 といっても個人的に面識があるだけですよ。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、モチロン。
といっても個人的に面識があるだけですよ。

engChrName: I'm from the Eastern Quarter, so I know my stuff. Hard to not be aware of the underworld when you come from a place like that.
engSearchText:
I'm from the Eastern Quarter, so I know my stuff.
Hard to not be aware of the underworld when you
come from a place like that.
jpnChrName: 私は東方人街の出身なので、裏の事情も 多少通じているというだけの事。
jpnSearchText:
私は東方人街の出身なので、裏の事情も
多少通じているというだけの事。

engChrName: But don't you worry! This is just an ordinary pharmacy that sells extremely ordinary products.
engSearchText:
But don't you worry! This is just an ordinary
pharmacy that sells extremely ordinary products.
jpnChrName: ここは一般的な薬局ですから 売っているのはごく一般的な薬です。
jpnSearchText:
ここは一般的な薬局ですから
売っているのはごく一般的な薬です。

engChrName: I see you've started stocking Eastern remedies. A little pricey, but they've got their uses.
engSearchText:
I see you've started stocking Eastern remedies. A little
pricey, but they've got their uses.
jpnChrName: 最近は東方生薬も置いてるようだがな。 ま、ちと値は張るが使い処はあるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
最近は東方生薬も置いてるようだがな。
ま、ちと値は張るが使い処はあるぜ。

engChrName: Still strapped for cash, huh? You poor thing...
engSearchText: Still strapped for cash, huh? You poor thing...
jpnChrName: 相変わらず金欠気味なんですねぇ、 可哀想に……
jpnSearchText:
相変わらず金欠気味なんですねぇ、
可哀想に……

engChrName: Watch your mouth.
engSearchText: Watch your mouth.
jpnChrName: お前は一言多いんだっつの。
jpnSearchText: お前は一言多いんだっつの。

engChrName: (Heehee. It's fun coming with Van and seeing him interact with other people.)
engSearchText:
(Heehee. It's fun coming with Van and seeing him
interact with other people.)
jpnChrName: （ふふ……ヴァンさんと一緒だと   全然知らない一面が見えるような……）
jpnSearchText:
（ふふ……ヴァンさんと一緒だと
全然知らない一面が見えるような……）

engChrName: (I learn a little more about him with every little interaction.)
engSearchText:
(I learn a little more about him with every
little interaction.)
jpnChrName: （……新鮮だなぁ、こういうのって。）
jpnSearchText: （……新鮮だなぁ、こういうのって。）

engChrName: This is just your run-of-the-mill pharmacy, and I'm just a normal employee.
engSearchText:
This is just your run-of-the-mill pharmacy, and I'm
just a normal employee.
jpnChrName: ここは一般的な薬局、 私はただの従業員ですけどね。
jpnSearchText:
ここは一般的な薬局、
私はただの従業員ですけどね。

engChrName: But since I'm from the Eastern Quarter, I'm more familiar with more specialized stuff.
engSearchText:
But since I'm from the Eastern Quarter, I'm more
familiar with more specialized stuff.
jpnChrName: 一応は東方人街の出身なので 生薬の扱いには慣れていますよ。
jpnSearchText:
一応は東方人街の出身なので
生薬の扱いには慣れていますよ。

engChrName: Whether it's bruises, cuts, or even internal issues, then I'm your guy!
engSearchText:
Whether it's bruises, cuts, or even internal issues, then
I'm your guy!
jpnChrName: 打撲に切り傷、内臓疾患── 案内ならばお任せあれ、今後共々ご贔屓に♪
jpnSearchText:
打撲に切り傷、内臓疾患──
案内ならばお任せあれ、今後共々ご贔屓に♪

engChrName: Xiaoling, my dearest sister! How have you been?
engSearchText: Xiaoling, my dearest sister! How have you been?
jpnChrName: おおシャオリン、わが妹よ！ 達者にしていたかな？
jpnSearchText:
おおシャオリン、わが妹よ！
達者にしていたかな？

engChrName: I can't believe it's been four years already. Good to know you've outgrown that baby face of yours and finally shaped up to be a fine woman!
engSearchText:
I can't believe it's been four years already. Good to
know you've outgrown that baby face of yours and
finally shaped up to be a fine woman!
jpnChrName: あれから４年か…… うんうん、胸もよく育って♪
jpnSearchText:
あれから４年か……
うんうん、胸もよく育って♪

engChrName: Wish you'd outgrown your big mouth. I'm tempted to punch you right on it.
engSearchText:
Wish you'd outgrown your big mouth. I'm tempted to
punch you right on it.
jpnChrName: ……兄者も相変わらずね── その顔、ぶん殴りたくなるけど……
jpnSearchText:
……兄者も相変わらずね──
その顔、ぶん殴りたくなるけど……

engChrName: But hey. Credit where credit is due—doesn't look like you're half-assing this job.
engSearchText:
But hey. Credit where credit is due—doesn't look like
you're half-assing this job.
jpnChrName: フン、仕事はちゃんとしてるようだし そこは褒めてやってもいいよ。
jpnSearchText:
フン、仕事はちゃんとしてるようだし
そこは褒めてやってもいいよ。

engChrName: Eh, that might be a bit unfair. You were always the better one at Gekka between us two, so I guess it's fair that you'll be taking over the dojo.
engSearchText:
Eh, that might be a bit unfair. You were always the
better one at Gekka between us two, so I guess it's
fair that you'll be taking over the dojo.
jpnChrName: もっとも、兄者は月華奧伝の腕前── 今でも家を継ぐのが筋だと思ってるけどね。
jpnSearchText:
もっとも、兄者は月華奧伝の腕前──
今でも家を継ぐのが筋だと思ってるけどね。

engChrName: Aww, thanks! But don't worry about me half-assing things. The place is yours, after all.
engSearchText:
Aww, thanks! But don't worry about me
half-assing things. The place is yours, after all.
jpnChrName: フフ……言わなかったかい？ 武の道はお前に譲った、と。
jpnSearchText:
フフ……言わなかったかい？
武の道はお前に譲った、と。

engChrName: I'm being serious when I say you're better suited for the role of master. Both skill-wise and personality-wise.
engSearchText:
I'm being serious when I say you're better suited for
the role of master. Both skill-wise
and personality-wise.
jpnChrName: お前の方が人望もあるし、あの家を継ぐに 相応しい──これは嘘偽りない私の本心さ。
jpnSearchText:
お前の方が人望もあるし、あの家を継ぐに
相応しい──これは嘘偽りない私の本心さ。

engChrName: M-Me?!
engSearchText: M-Me?!
jpnChrName: でも──！
jpnSearchText: でも──！

engChrName: I do feel bad about putting all that weight on your shoulders, though.
engSearchText:
I do feel bad about putting all that weight on your
shoulders, though.
jpnChrName: いやしかし、お前に 背負わせてしまったとも思っているよ。
jpnSearchText:
いやしかし、お前に
背負わせてしまったとも思っているよ。

engChrName: I don't want you getting into any trouble...
engSearchText: I don't want you getting into any trouble...
jpnChrName: 特に今回のような、 危険な状況に陥った時は──
jpnSearchText:
特に今回のような、
危険な状況に陥った時は──

engChrName: H-Hmph! I don't see why that's any of your business!
engSearchText: H-Hmph! I don't see why that's any of your business!
jpnChrName: フン……！　腑抜けの兄者に 心配される謂れなどないね！！
jpnSearchText:
フン……！　腑抜けの兄者に
心配される謂れなどないね！！

engChrName: I'm just doing my job as both a bracer and a member of the Gekka school.
engSearchText:
I'm just doing my job as both a bracer and a member
of the Gekka school.
jpnChrName: ワタシは遊撃士の使命を果たすのみ！ 月華の本分もね！！
jpnSearchText:
ワタシは遊撃士の使命を果たすのみ！
月華の本分もね！！

engChrName: *sigh* I know... But please take care? Do it for me, at least.
engSearchText:
*sigh* I know... But please take care? Do it for me,
at least.
jpnChrName: ふう、分かってるよ…… けど精々気を付けてくれよ、シャオリン。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、分かってるよ……
けど精々気を付けてくれよ、シャオリン。

engChrName: Thank you all so much for saving the department store. Or rather, all of Station Street.
engSearchText:
Thank you all so much for saving the
department store. Or rather, all of Station Street.
jpnChrName: 皆さま、百貨店を……駅前通りを救って いただき、本当にありがとうございます。
jpnSearchText:
皆さま、百貨店を……駅前通りを救って
いただき、本当にありがとうございます。

engChrName: You, in addition to Marduk and all the professors deserve my utmost thanks, for trying so hard to illuminate such a dark path.
engSearchText:
You, in addition to Marduk and all the professors
deserve my utmost thanks, for trying so hard to
illuminate such a dark path.
jpnChrName: あなた方もそうですし、ＭＫ社や大学の先生など 多くの方々が、事態の打開に尽力しております。
jpnSearchText:
あなた方もそうですし、ＭＫ社や大学の先生など
多くの方々が、事態の打開に尽力しております。

engChrName: Our entire staff wishes to support those endeavors, and I plan to guide them as their manager.
engSearchText:
Our entire staff wishes to support those endeavors,
and I plan to guide them as their manager.
jpnChrName: 店員一同も彼らのバックアップに全力を尽くす 所存、私も彼らを取りまとめ、力になります。
jpnSearchText:
店員一同も彼らのバックアップに全力を尽くす
所存、私も彼らを取りまとめ、力になります。

engChrName: We'll show everyone what Weston Department Store can really do once we put our mind to it. Please don't hesitate to take advantage of our services!
engSearchText:
We'll show everyone what Weston Department Store
can really do once we put our mind to it. Please don't
hesitate to take advantage of our services!
jpnChrName: 今こそ、ウェストン百貨店の総力を見せる時。 遠慮なく私共をご利用ください！
jpnSearchText:
今こそ、ウェストン百貨店の総力を見せる時。
遠慮なく私共をご利用ください！

engChrName: The festival's finally here.
engSearchText: The festival's finally here.
jpnChrName: いよいよ記念祭が始まりましたな……
jpnSearchText: いよいよ記念祭が始まりましたな……

engChrName: Our efforts have paid off. Our clientele can finally rival that of the Trion Mall.
engSearchText:
Our efforts have paid off. Our clientele can finally
rival that of the Trion Mall.
jpnChrName: 努力が実り、トリオンモールに負けぬだけの お客様が既にいらしております。
jpnSearchText:
努力が実り、トリオンモールに負けぬだけの
お客様が既にいらしております。

engChrName: People have been really keen of our new rooftop space. It's the perfect spot to take a break from the crowds.
engSearchText:
People have been really keen of our new
rooftop space. It's the perfect spot to take a break
from the crowds.
jpnChrName: 屋上スペースも提供できたことで、 この息苦しさも無くお休みいただけますしね。
jpnSearchText:
屋上スペースも提供できたことで、
この息苦しさも無くお休みいただけますしね。

engChrName: I do wish we'd been able to put up a larger variety of events for the festival.
engSearchText:
I do wish we'd been able to put up a larger variety of
events for the festival.
jpnChrName: もっとも……記念祭までに屋上で各種イベントの 開催などが叶わなかった点は無念ですが。
jpnSearchText:
もっとも……記念祭までに屋上で各種イベントの
開催などが叶わなかった点は無念ですが。

engChrName: It definitely would've helped with our appeal. Our real rival is the orbal café, after all.
engSearchText:
It definitely would've helped with our appeal.
Our real rival is the orbal café, after all.
jpnChrName: まあ、当店の改良に寄与してくれたとは言え、 一応はオーバルカフェもライバルです。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、当店の改良に寄与してくれたとは言え、
一応はオーバルカフェもライバルです。

engChrName: It's when the crowds are at their highest that we can truly test our mettle. This will be a fair fight!
engSearchText:
It's when the crowds are at their highest that we can
truly test our mettle. This will be a fair fight!
jpnChrName: この記念すべき日に、改めて正々堂々と 勝負するといたしましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
この記念すべき日に、改めて正々堂々と
勝負するといたしましょうか。

engChrName: Hmm. I'll leave the interior design to someone more capable. I'll focus on deliveries, but those look like they're on track as well.
engSearchText:
Hmm. I'll leave the interior design to someone
more capable. I'll focus on deliveries, but those look
like they're on track as well.
jpnChrName: うむ、そちらの飾りつけは任せるとしよう。 入荷も今の所問題は見られない。
jpnSearchText:
うむ、そちらの飾りつけは任せるとしよう。
入荷も今の所問題は見られない。

engChrName: Though... I think I have an idea to appeal to tourists.
engSearchText: Though... I think I have an idea to appeal to tourists.
jpnChrName: あとは……そうだな、外国人向けの案内は もう少し増やしても良いかもしれん。
jpnSearchText:
あとは……そうだな、外国人向けの案内は
もう少し増やしても良いかもしれん。

engChrName: I'll leave the smaller details to those closer to those running the events. Our main focus this time is garnering interest and making it enjoyable.
engSearchText:
I'll leave the smaller details to those closer to those
running the events. Our main focus this time is
garnering interest and making it enjoyable.
jpnChrName: フェアの詳細は各々の責任者に任せよう、 とにかく今回は盛り上げる事を重視だ。
jpnSearchText:
フェアの詳細は各々の責任者に任せよう、
とにかく今回は盛り上げる事を重視だ。

engChrName: Everything's on track, thanks to everybody's efforts. I'm so proud of all the hard work everyone's put in.
engSearchText:
Everything's on track, thanks to everybody's efforts.
I'm so proud of all the hard work everyone's put in.
jpnChrName: 皆頑張ってくれているしな、この調子なら 問題無く間に合う……本当に皆ご苦労……
jpnSearchText:
皆頑張ってくれているしな、この調子なら
問題無く間に合う……本当に皆ご苦労……

engChrName: It hasn't been an easy year, but that's the more reason to end it with a bang and make this Revolution Festival the best one yet.
engSearchText:
It hasn't been an easy year, but that's the more reason
to end it with a bang and make this Revolution
Festival the best one yet.
jpnChrName: 今年は色々とあった年でしたからな、例年以上に 記念祭ではフェアなどで盛り上げるつもりです。
jpnSearchText:
今年は色々とあった年でしたからな、例年以上に
記念祭ではフェアなどで盛り上げるつもりです。

engChrName: It'd be wonderful if the festival went off without a hitch. It'd take some weight off of everyone's shoulders.
engSearchText:
It'd be wonderful if the festival went off without
a hitch. It'd take some weight off of
everyone's shoulders.
jpnChrName: やはり、祭事を無事に迎えられたことを強く 感じられれば、皆さまも安心できるでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
やはり、祭事を無事に迎えられたことを強く
感じられれば、皆さまも安心できるでしょう。

engChrName: We're still working on the rooftop area. My hope for it is that it'll be a popular lounge area.
engSearchText:
We're still working on the rooftop area. My hope for
it is that it'll be a popular lounge area.
jpnChrName: 屋上スペースもまだ発展途上ではありますが、 安らぎと催し双方に役に立てれば幸いです。
jpnSearchText:
屋上スペースもまだ発展途上ではありますが、
安らぎと催し双方に役に立てれば幸いです。

engChrName: Ilhan might be a creative genius, but he's a little slow everywhere else.
engSearchText:
Ilhan might be a creative genius, but he's a little slow
everywhere else.
jpnChrName: やはりイルハン氏の発想力は大したものです、 別方面に鈍いのは不思議ですが……
jpnSearchText:
やはりイルハン氏の発想力は大したものです、
別方面に鈍いのは不思議ですが……

engChrName: But I shouldn't worry about him so much. We can't focus all our energy on the orbal café when there's also the Trion Mall.
engSearchText:
But I shouldn't worry about him so much. We can't
focus all our energy on the orbal café when there's
also the Trion Mall.
jpnChrName: 何にせよ、ライバルは他にもいる、 例えばトリオンモール……
jpnSearchText:
何にせよ、ライバルは他にもいる、
例えばトリオンモール……

engChrName: The mall in particular is our biggest threat. It might be worth asking Ilhan for advice on the matter.
engSearchText:
The mall in particular is our biggest threat. It might
be worth asking Ilhan for advice on the matter.
jpnChrName: むしろあちらの方が競合は多いですし、彼の知恵を 借りつつ打ち勝つのも一手かもしれませんな。
jpnSearchText:
むしろあちらの方が競合は多いですし、彼の知恵を
借りつつ打ち勝つのも一手かもしれませんな。

engChrName: Our store is stocked up on all kinds of daily necessities that people might need during a state of emergency.
engSearchText:
Our store is stocked up on all kinds of daily
necessities that people might need during a state
of emergency.
jpnChrName: 皆さん、非常事態宣言が発令されましたが、 当店には生活必需品の在庫は十分ございます！
jpnSearchText:
皆さん、非常事態宣言が発令されましたが、
当店には生活必需品の在庫は十分ございます！

engChrName: Though please avoid bulk purchases. It'll only help to raise unease. Treat this shopping trip just as any other.
engSearchText:
Though please avoid bulk purchases. It'll only help to
raise unease. Treat this shopping trip just as
any other.
jpnChrName: 混乱を避けるためにも、買い貯めなどはせず、 普段通りに落ち着いてご購入下さい！
jpnSearchText:
混乱を避けるためにも、買い貯めなどはせず、
普段通りに落ち着いてご購入下さい！

engChrName: We're committed to your customer experience. Anyone in our staff will be able to help in case you need assistance.
engSearchText:
We're committed to your customer experience.
Anyone in our staff will be able to help in case you
need assistance.
jpnChrName: 私どもが責任を持って対応しますので、 何かありましたらスタッフに一声お願いします！
jpnSearchText:
私どもが責任を持って対応しますので、
何かありましたらスタッフに一声お願いします！

engChrName: Everyone's really anxious over our recent state of emergency. It's not just our customers, but staff, too.
engSearchText:
Everyone's really anxious over our recent state
of emergency. It's not just our customers, but
staff, too.
jpnChrName: 件の事件と非常事態宣言で、 お客様もスタッフも不安を感じております……
jpnSearchText:
件の事件と非常事態宣言で、
お客様もスタッフも不安を感じております……

engChrName: My hope is that taking the initiative to make these announcements will help curb the chaos slightly, as well as maintain employee morale.
engSearchText:
My hope is that taking the initiative to make these
announcements will help curb the chaos slightly, as
well as maintain employee morale.
jpnChrName: 私が率先して呼びかける事で少しでも混乱を防ぎ、 従業員の士気を維持することが出来れば……
jpnSearchText:
私が率先して呼びかける事で少しでも混乱を防ぎ、
従業員の士気を維持することが出来れば……

engChrName: I do wonder how Ilhan is holding up through all of this.
engSearchText:
I do wonder how Ilhan is holding up through all
of this.
jpnChrName: ……そういえば、イルハンさんの方は 大丈夫でしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
……そういえば、イルハンさんの方は
大丈夫でしょうか。

engChrName: Perhaps I should go and pay him a visit later today...
engSearchText: Perhaps I should go and pay him a visit later today...
jpnChrName: 夜にでも様子を見に行くといたしましょうか……
jpnSearchText: 夜にでも様子を見に行くといたしましょうか……

engChrName: Hrm... He's incredibly gifted and perceptive when it comes to his business sense, but he's still young. And naïve.
engSearchText:
Hrm... He's incredibly gifted and perceptive when it
comes to his business sense, but he's still young.
And naïve.
jpnChrName: ううむ……イルハン氏はこの経営手腕と 創造性の割に随分と純粋な青年のようで……
jpnSearchText:
ううむ……イルハン氏はこの経営手腕と
創造性の割に随分と純粋な青年のようで……

engChrName: Now that I know him a little better, I feel somewhat bad about this rivalry. Maybe I had him pinned wrong all along.
engSearchText:
Now that I know him a little better, I feel somewhat
bad about this rivalry. Maybe I had him pinned
wrong all along.
jpnChrName: 正直……ライバル視していた身としては 調子が狂うというか歯痒いというか……
jpnSearchText:
正直……ライバル視していた身としては
調子が狂うというか歯痒いというか……

engChrName: I've come to find out his opinion matters a lot to me. Hearing him praise us was elating.
engSearchText:
I've come to find out his opinion matters a lot to me.
Hearing him praise us was elating.
jpnChrName: まあ、彼に賞賛されても悪い気はしないですが……
jpnSearchText: まあ、彼に賞賛されても悪い気はしないですが……

engChrName: I've been workshopping a plan to put in place so we can compete with Orbal Café Iota. I can't back down now. Not this far in.
engSearchText:
I've been workshopping a plan to put in place so we
can compete with Orbal Café Iota. I can't back
down now. Not this far in.
jpnChrName: オーバルカフェへの対抗企画…… 一度決めたからには決行する他ありません。
jpnSearchText:
オーバルカフェへの対抗企画……
一度決めたからには決行する他ありません。

engChrName: I laid it on a little thick, but I don't think he caught on. It's a little disappointing that he didn't...
engSearchText:
I laid it on a little thick, but I don't think he
caught on. It's a little disappointing that he didn't...
jpnChrName: イルハン氏に気づかれていなかったのは 拍子抜けというか、どことなく寂しいですが……
jpnSearchText:
イルハン氏に気づかれていなかったのは
拍子抜けというか、どことなく寂しいですが……

engChrName: Still, I'm glad I had a look. It was quite eye opening. It showed me just how close-minded I've been and where the orbal café's true strengths lie.
engSearchText:
Still, I'm glad I had a look. It was quite eye opening.
It showed me just how close-minded I've been and
where the orbal café's true strengths lie.
jpnChrName: 偵察した甲斐あり、向こうの強みと 当方の視野の狭さに気づかされたものです。
jpnSearchText:
偵察した甲斐あり、向こうの強みと
当方の視野の狭さに気づかされたものです。

engChrName: It's given me a lot to think about. It wasn't a lack of innovation, but rather my blind spots. The rooftop's been our biggest missed opportunity.
engSearchText:
It's given me a lot to think about. It wasn't a lack of
innovation, but rather my blind spots. The rooftop's
been our biggest missed opportunity.
jpnChrName: 当店でもフェアなどの工夫はしてきましたが、 ああした空間活用は盲点でしたからね。
jpnSearchText:
当店でもフェアなどの工夫はしてきましたが、
ああした空間活用は盲点でしたからね。

engChrName: We've started with all the major renovations for the space, so it should be ready relatively soon.
engSearchText:
We've started with all the major renovations for the
space, so it should be ready relatively soon.
jpnChrName: 既に余剰スペースの大規模改修工事は 始まっています、じきに完了するでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
既に余剰スペースの大規模改修工事は
始まっています、じきに完了するでしょう。

engChrName: I plan on figuring out the most effective way to make use of it so we can rival Iota.
engSearchText:
I plan on figuring out the most effective way to make
use of it so we can rival Iota.
jpnChrName: あとは、それを如何にして《イオタ》に 比類するだけの空間活用に繋げられるか……
jpnSearchText:
あとは、それを如何にして《イオタ》に
比類するだけの空間活用に繋げられるか……

engChrName: The success of it will put all my managerial skills and years of experience to the test.
engSearchText:
The success of it will put all my managerial skills and
years of experience to the test.
jpnChrName: ここが長年支配人をしてきた私の、 腕の見せ所であると言えるでしょうね。
jpnSearchText:
ここが長年支配人をしてきた私の、
腕の見せ所であると言えるでしょうね。

engChrName: I just got back from the orbal café, and I'm simply baffled Ilhan hadn't caught on yet.
engSearchText:
I just got back from the orbal café, and I'm simply
baffled Ilhan hadn't caught on yet.
jpnChrName: 先ほどオーバルカフェから帰って来ましたが…… 長い間、イルハン氏に気づかれていなかったとは。
jpnSearchText:
先ほどオーバルカフェから帰って来ましたが……
長い間、イルハン氏に気づかれていなかったとは。

engChrName: Did he think us so insignificant we weren't even on his radar?!
engSearchText:
Did he think us so insignificant we weren't even on
his radar?!
jpnChrName: イルハン氏……最初から我が百貨店の事などは 眼中になかったとでもいうのですか！
jpnSearchText:
イルハン氏……最初から我が百貨店の事などは
眼中になかったとでもいうのですか！

engChrName: Ugh... Whether that's the case or not, he's the real deal. He's talented, and I'd have no lesser rival.
engSearchText:
Ugh... Whether that's the case or not, he's the
real deal. He's talented, and I'd have no lesser rival.
jpnChrName: ですが、それでも彼の手腕と発想力が ライバルとして不足ない事もまた事実……
jpnSearchText:
ですが、それでも彼の手腕と発想力が
ライバルとして不足ない事もまた事実……

engChrName: Just visiting the orbal café has given me a clearer idea of what path our department store should soon take.
engSearchText:
Just visiting the orbal café has given me a clearer idea
of what path our department store should soon take.
jpnChrName: そして私自身も……あの店に通い、 やるべき方向性も見えてきた事ですしな……
jpnSearchText:
そして私自身も……あの店に通い、
やるべき方向性も見えてきた事ですしな……

engChrName: I had a chance to see the owner up close.
engSearchText: I had a chance to see the owner up close.
jpnChrName: オーナーの振る舞いも直に 偵察させてもらっていますが……
jpnSearchText:
オーナーの振る舞いも直に
偵察させてもらっていますが……

engChrName: He's...easygoing. The kind that will welcome anyone with a smile. Even if that someone is the head of the store right across the street.
engSearchText:
He's...easygoing. The kind that will welcome anyone
with a smile. Even if that someone is the head of
the store right across the street.
jpnChrName: 仮にも向かいの百貨店の支配人が来ても 普通の客同様にもてなすとは、余裕があるようで。
jpnSearchText:
仮にも向かいの百貨店の支配人が来ても
普通の客同様にもてなすとは、余裕があるようで。

engChrName: He's totally within his right to do so, of course. Nothing says I can't frequent different stores. I was there in the capacity of a customer.
engSearchText:
He's totally within his right to do so, of course.
Nothing says I can't frequent different stores. I was
there in the capacity of a customer.
jpnChrName: 無論、私が客として来ている以上は 扱いに差をつけてはいけないのは鉄則ですが……
jpnSearchText:
無論、私が客として来ている以上は
扱いに差をつけてはいけないのは鉄則ですが……

engChrName: But he's a whole lot more laid back than I expected of someone of his creative genius. Maybe that's his secret?
engSearchText:
But he's a whole lot more laid back than I expected of
someone of his creative genius. Maybe that's
his secret?
jpnChrName: それにしても、随分と余裕を見せてくれる…… この余裕から発想も湧き出ているのか？
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、随分と余裕を見せてくれる……
この余裕から発想も湧き出ているのか？

engChrName: Hmm... The idea of combining a regular orbal store with a café is quite intriguing, but also fairly efficient when it comes to space.
engSearchText:
Hmm... The idea of combining a regular orbal store
with a café is quite intriguing, but also fairly efficient
when it comes to space.
jpnChrName: ふむ……導力製品の販売とカフェの組み合わせは妙に 思いましたが……空間活用もしているのですか。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ……導力製品の販売とカフェの組み合わせは妙に
思いましたが……空間活用もしているのですか。

engChrName: I see... It gives you the perfect excuse to relax and take your time while you browse orbal devices or finish signing a large contract.
engSearchText:
I see... It gives you the perfect excuse to relax and take
your time while you browse orbal devices or finish
signing a large contract.
jpnChrName: なるほど、導力製品を選んだり契約手続きを している間も寛ぎながら商品を眺められる……
jpnSearchText:
なるほど、導力製品を選んだり契約手続きを
している間も寛ぎながら商品を眺められる……

engChrName: I never would've thought about that myself.
engSearchText: I never would've thought about that myself.
jpnChrName: 確かにこれは、ありそうで無かった 盲点と言えるかもしれませんな……
jpnSearchText:
確かにこれは、ありそうで無かった
盲点と言えるかもしれませんな……

engChrName: (Hold on... Isn't he from the department store?)
engSearchText: (Hold on... Isn't he from the department store?)
jpnChrName: （この人はもしかして……百貨店の……）
jpnSearchText: （この人はもしかして……百貨店の……）

engChrName: Oh. I know you. You're a regular at my department store.
engSearchText:
Oh. I know you. You're a regular at my
department store.
jpnChrName: あ、あなた方は日頃より 百貨店で見かける……
jpnSearchText:
あ、あなた方は日頃より
百貨店で見かける……

engChrName: Don't get the wrong idea! I'm not here to relax—I'm here to gather intel! Covertly, of course.
engSearchText:
Don't get the wrong idea! I'm not here to relax—I'm
here to gather intel! Covertly, of course.
jpnChrName: 別にこれは違うのです、休憩している訳ではなく 言わば偵察のようなもの……！
jpnSearchText:
別にこれは違うのです、休憩している訳ではなく
言わば偵察のようなもの……！

engChrName: I'm here to find out what makes this store so unique. I must broaden my horizons as the department store's administrator, and see what could work for us.
engSearchText:
I'm here to find out what makes this store so unique.
I must broaden my horizons as the department store's
administrator, and see what could work for us.
jpnChrName: 支配人たる私が自ら、この店の独自の強みを知り、 我が百貨店が時代に追従するための──
jpnSearchText:
支配人たる私が自ら、この店の独自の強みを知り、
我が百貨店が時代に追従するための──

engChrName: (We just poked and he basically spilled everything.)
engSearchText: (We just poked and he basically spilled everything.)
jpnChrName: （別に俺達は何も言っていないんだが……）
jpnSearchText: （別に俺達は何も言っていないんだが……）

engChrName: (I think we just caught him off guard, haha.)
engSearchText: (I think we just caught him off guard, haha.)
jpnChrName: （あはは……まあ、見るからに   恥ずかしがっているというか……）
jpnSearchText:
（あはは……まあ、見るからに
恥ずかしがっているというか……）

engChrName: This place's owner is quite the young prodigy.
engSearchText: This place's owner is quite the young prodigy.
jpnChrName: ……あっちにいる若者が件のオーナーか…… 確かに賢そうではありますが……
jpnSearchText:
……あっちにいる若者が件のオーナーか……
確かに賢そうではありますが……

engChrName: But working as a barista must surely be a joke, right? Does he truly have so much time on his hands to spare?
engSearchText:
But working as a barista must surely be a joke, right?
Does he truly have so much time on his hands
to spare?
jpnChrName: 自分でバリスタも兼任しているとは、 随分と余裕があるようですな……
jpnSearchText:
自分でバリスタも兼任しているとは、
随分と余裕があるようですな……

engChrName: Though maybe it's that casual approach that contributes to his success.
engSearchText:
Though maybe it's that casual approach that
contributes to his success.
jpnChrName: とはいえ、ふむ……ああした自由な スタイルも成功に寄与しているのか……？
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ、ふむ……ああした自由な
スタイルも成功に寄与しているのか……？

engChrName: I worry about losing our clientele to all of these recent startups.
engSearchText:
I worry about losing our clientele to all of these
recent startups.
jpnChrName: ふむ……やはりベンチャー系の小売店に 顧客が流れている事は心配ですな。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ……やはりベンチャー系の小売店に
顧客が流れている事は心配ですな。

engChrName: We're not in hot water quite yet, but it wouldn't be smart if a business didn't look forward.
engSearchText:
We're not in hot water quite yet, but it wouldn't be
smart if a business didn't look forward.
jpnChrName: 今のところは当店も黒字ですが、長期的な 動向としては憂慮すべきもので……
jpnSearchText:
今のところは当店も黒字ですが、長期的な
動向としては憂慮すべきもので……

engChrName: I've got my eye on the orbal café in particular. It just opened a few months ago.
engSearchText:
I've got my eye on the orbal café in particular. It just
opened a few months ago.
jpnChrName: 特に数か月前にお向かいに出来た 《オーバルカフェ》なる業態……
jpnSearchText:
特に数か月前にお向かいに出来た
《オーバルカフェ》なる業態……

engChrName: I'll say, they've been doing a good job of attracting attention from both the media and customers alike. Maybe I should see what the hubbub is about.
engSearchText:
I'll say, they've been doing a good job of attracting
attention from both the media and customers alike.
Maybe I should see what the hubbub is about.
jpnChrName: 話題性が随分と強いようですし…… ここはひとつ、探りを入れてみますか……
jpnSearchText:
話題性が随分と強いようですし……
ここはひとつ、探りを入れてみますか……

engChrName: We still try to innovate often, but the things that worked ten years ago don't seem to work quite as well nowadays...
engSearchText:
We still try to innovate often, but the things that
worked ten years ago don't seem to work quite as
well nowadays...
jpnChrName: 私どもとしても、日頃より工夫はしておりますが どうにも１０年前のようにはいかない事も多く……
jpnSearchText:
私どもとしても、日頃より工夫はしておりますが
どうにも１０年前のようにはいかない事も多く……

engChrName: This is a historic department store, but we might be in sore need of an update.
engSearchText:
This is a historic department store, but we might be
in sore need of an update.
jpnChrName: まあ、歴史のある百貨店といえど、 やはりそろそろ新しい風は必要なのでしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、歴史のある百貨店といえど、
やはりそろそろ新しい風は必要なのでしょうか。

engChrName: I could take some inspiration from how our new rival handles things... Hmm...
engSearchText:
I could take some inspiration from how our new rival
handles things... Hmm...
jpnChrName: その意味でも、偵察を兼ねてライバル店を 視察するのも手と言えますか……
jpnSearchText:
その意味でも、偵察を兼ねてライバル店を
視察するのも手と言えますか……

engChrName: Hello, and welcome to Weston Department Store, where we take pride in being part of Edith's history.
engSearchText:
Hello, and welcome to Weston Department Store,
where we take pride in being part of Edith's history.
jpnChrName: いらっしゃいませ、首都と共に歴史を刻んできた 《ウェストン》百貨店へようこそ。
jpnSearchText:
いらっしゃいませ、首都と共に歴史を刻んできた
《ウェストン》百貨店へようこそ。

engChrName: We carry only the highest quality products handled by the greatest experts in their fields. It's our mission to better your shopping experience.
engSearchText:
We carry only the highest quality products handled by
the greatest experts in their fields. It's our mission to
better your shopping experience.
jpnChrName: 一通りの品はそれぞれの専門家でもある店員が 責任を持って取り扱っております。
jpnSearchText:
一通りの品はそれぞれの専門家でもある店員が
責任を持って取り扱っております。

engChrName: You're free to consult an expert if you need a recommendation, too. Feel free to take a look.
engSearchText:
You're free to consult an expert if you need a
recommendation, too. Feel free to take a look.
jpnChrName: 彼らが商品の見繕いなどもお助けしますので、 遠慮なく見ていって下されば。
jpnSearchText:
彼らが商品の見繕いなどもお助けしますので、
遠慮なく見ていって下されば。

engChrName: Our competition grows stronger every day. Not just with the advent of mass production methods, but all new kinds of businesses.
engSearchText:
Our competition grows stronger every day. Not just
with the advent of mass production methods, but all
new kinds of businesses.
jpnChrName: 最近は大量生産技術や新しい業態の出現もあり、 ライバルも多様化していましてな……
jpnSearchText:
最近は大量生産技術や新しい業態の出現もあり、
ライバルも多様化していましてな……

engChrName: And many of our customers have been migrating to the new large-scale mall beneath Trion Tower.
engSearchText:
And many of our customers have been migrating to
the new large-scale mall beneath Trion Tower.
jpnChrName: トリオンタワーの下に出来た大型モールに多くの 客が流れつつある事も事実ではありますしね。
jpnSearchText:
トリオンタワーの下に出来た大型モールに多くの
客が流れつつある事も事実ではありますしね。

engChrName: But our products, handled by experts in their craft, are all of undoubtedly higher quality. That is its own appeal.
engSearchText:
But our products, handled by experts in their craft,
are all of undoubtedly higher quality. That is its
own appeal.
jpnChrName: もっとも、質は間違いなく当店が上ですからね、 お陰様で赤字になる事は無さそうですので。
jpnSearchText:
もっとも、質は間違いなく当店が上ですからね、
お陰様で赤字になる事は無さそうですので。

engChrName: Our store also comes with a new terrace lounge situated on our roof.
engSearchText:
Our store also comes with a new terrace lounge
situated on our roof.
jpnChrName: ……そういう訳で、我が百貨店でも屋上の空間を 活用したテラスを用意しましてな。
jpnSearchText:
……そういう訳で、我が百貨店でも屋上の空間を
活用したテラスを用意しましてな。

engChrName: It's just the perfect open space for our customers to take a break from shopping. Dare I say, just like you can do at Iota!
engSearchText:
It's just the perfect open space for our customers to
take a break from shopping. Dare I say, just like you
can do at Iota!
jpnChrName: この《イオタ》同様に開放感ある空間を 買い物の間に堪能できるようになりましたよ！
jpnSearchText:
この《イオタ》同様に開放感ある空間を
買い物の間に堪能できるようになりましたよ！

engChrName: Ahaha, is that right? That's great to hear!
engSearchText: Ahaha, is that right? That's great to hear!
jpnChrName: アハハ、そうだったんですか～！ 良かったですね、支配人さん！
jpnSearchText:
アハハ、そうだったんですか～！
良かったですね、支配人さん！

engChrName: But that's a lot of big words you're throwing around there! I kinda just winged it when I was designing Iota.
engSearchText:
But that's a lot of big words you're throwing
around there! I kinda just winged it when I was
designing Iota.
jpnChrName: えっとでも、開放感？　空間……？ うーん、僕は適当にデザインしただけですけど。
jpnSearchText:
えっとでも、開放感？　空間……？
うーん、僕は適当にデザインしただけですけど。

engChrName: I'm happy it worked out for you, though!
engSearchText: I'm happy it worked out for you, though!
jpnChrName: まあ何かのご参考になったなら良かったです！
jpnSearchText: まあ何かのご参考になったなら良かったです！

engChrName: E-Excuse me?! You...'winged it'?!
engSearchText: E-Excuse me?! You...'winged it'?!
jpnChrName: え……適当……！？ そう、なんですか……？
jpnSearchText:
え……適当……！？
そう、なんですか……？

engChrName: Yeah. Though it's not like Carlo let me do just ANYTHING. We still had to adhere to all those infrastructure laws, so he tweaked some stuff.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Though it's not like Carlo let me do
just ANYTHING. We still had to adhere to all those
infrastructure laws, so he tweaked some stuff.
jpnChrName: あ、カルロが建築基準法にうるさくて あれこれ手直ししてましたけど。
jpnSearchText:
あ、カルロが建築基準法にうるさくて
あれこれ手直ししてましたけど。

engChrName: I'm looking forward to seeing you guys' new terrace lounge. I'll be sure to come by and take a look!
engSearchText:
I'm looking forward to seeing you guys' new
terrace lounge. I'll be sure to come by and take a look!
jpnChrName: 百貨店の屋上テラス、楽しみですねぇ。 僕も今度遊びに行きますよ～！
jpnSearchText:
百貨店の屋上テラス、楽しみですねぇ。
僕も今度遊びに行きますよ～！

engChrName: Y-Yeah? We'd be...pleased to have you.
engSearchText: Y-Yeah? We'd be...pleased to have you.
jpnChrName: そ、そうですか……ええ、喜んで。
jpnSearchText: そ、そうですか……ええ、喜んで。

engChrName: Feel free to visit whenever you like...
engSearchText: Feel free to visit whenever you like...
jpnChrName: どうかいつでもいらしてください……
jpnSearchText: どうかいつでもいらしてください……

engChrName: I'm in the middle of the workshopping process for my new seasonal latte. I want to have it ready for the Revolution Festival.
engSearchText:
I'm in the middle of the workshopping process for my
new seasonal latte. I want to have it ready for the
Revolution Festival.
jpnChrName: ええ、僕も記念祭に向けて 限定ラテのキレを磨いている所ですよ。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、僕も記念祭に向けて
限定ラテのキレを磨いている所ですよ。

engChrName: Are you guys planning anything in particular for the festival at the department store?
engSearchText:
Are you guys planning anything in particular for the
festival at the department store?
jpnChrName: 百貨店では何かされるんですか？
jpnSearchText: 百貨店では何かされるんですか？

engChrName: Oh, absolutely! We'll be featuring a variety of both street performers and musicians on our rooftop lounge.
engSearchText:
Oh, absolutely! We'll be featuring a variety of both
street performers and musicians on our
rooftop lounge.
jpnChrName: ええ、屋上テラスで大道芸人や ミュージシャンによるパフォーマンスを……！
jpnSearchText:
ええ、屋上テラスで大道芸人や
ミュージシャンによるパフォーマンスを……！

engChrName: Or that was the plan... We actually only came up with it recently, so we haven't really planned it in much detail. It's a little embarrassing.
engSearchText:
Or that was the plan... We actually only came up with
it recently, so we haven't really planned it in
much detail. It's a little embarrassing.
jpnChrName: ……と思ったのですが、急な話過ぎて 企画が纏まらず……ハハお恥ずかしい。
jpnSearchText:
……と思ったのですが、急な話過ぎて
企画が纏まらず……ハハお恥ずかしい。

engChrName: It's just something I'll have to shelf until the start of the new year.
engSearchText:
It's just something I'll have to shelf until the start of
the new year.
jpnChrName: この企画は年明けにでも 検討するとしましょうかね。
jpnSearchText:
この企画は年明けにでも
検討するとしましょうかね。

engChrName: An event venue sounds fantastic! Especially with how popular street performances have been lately!
engSearchText:
An event venue sounds fantastic! Especially with how
popular street performances have been lately!
jpnChrName: いいですね～、イベントスペース！ 最近は路上ライブも人気みたいですし！
jpnSearchText:
いいですね～、イベントスペース！
最近は路上ライブも人気みたいですし！

engChrName: You could also get something for the little kids, too, you know? A play area or some sort of ride, I think.
engSearchText:
You could also get something for the little kids, too,
you know? A play area or some sort of ride, I think.
jpnChrName: あ、それなら……子供の喜ぶ遊具や ミニアトラクションを設置するのはどうでしょう？
jpnSearchText:
あ、それなら……子供の喜ぶ遊具や
ミニアトラクションを設置するのはどうでしょう？

engChrName: Families would love it!
engSearchText: Families would love it!
jpnChrName: きっと親子連れに 人気が出ると思いますけど～！
jpnSearchText:
きっと親子連れに
人気が出ると思いますけど～！

engChrName: I-I see. That may just be what I've been missing...
engSearchText: I-I see. That may just be what I've been missing...
jpnChrName: な、なるほど……それは盲点でしたな。
jpnSearchText: な、なるほど……それは盲点でしたな。

engChrName: A worthy rival will always keep you on your toes. Well done, Ilhan.
engSearchText:
A worthy rival will always keep you on your toes.
Well done, Ilhan.
jpnChrName: いやはや流石はイルハンさん、私が ライバルと見込んだ経営者ですよ。
jpnSearchText:
いやはや流石はイルハンさん、私が
ライバルと見込んだ経営者ですよ。

engChrName: What? Rival? What are you talking about?
engSearchText: What? Rival? What are you talking about?
jpnChrName: え、ライバル……？
jpnSearchText: え、ライバル……？

engChrName: Er... Never mind. Don't worry about it.
engSearchText: Er... Never mind. Don't worry about it.
jpnChrName: あ、いや……何でもない、 気にしないでくだされ。
jpnSearchText:
あ、いや……何でもない、
気にしないでくだされ。

engChrName: Our administrator is always willing to assist, and we'll do everything we can, too.
engSearchText:
Our administrator is always willing to assist, and we'll
do everything we can, too.
jpnChrName: 支配人も皆さんを手伝う事に迷いは無い ようだし、私達も出来る事をするわ。
jpnSearchText:
支配人も皆さんを手伝う事に迷いは無い
ようだし、私達も出来る事をするわ。

engChrName: Emma being here is such a great help, especially with how crazy things are outside.
engSearchText:
Emma being here is such a great help, especially with
how crazy things are outside.
jpnChrName: 外はこんな状況だけど、今の私には エンマもいてくれて百人力よ！
jpnSearchText:
外はこんな状況だけど、今の私には
エンマもいてくれて百人力よ！

engChrName: She provided us with plenty of foodstuffs, so help yourself if you need to!
engSearchText:
She provided us with plenty of foodstuffs, so help
yourself if you need to!
jpnChrName: 食料もエンマに補充してもらった分で 足りているから、遠慮せずに使ってね！
jpnSearchText:
食料もエンマに補充してもらった分で
足りているから、遠慮せずに使ってね！

engChrName: Oh, hello everyone! Sorry, I was catching up with an old friend of mine and I guess I got carried away.
engSearchText:
Oh, hello everyone! Sorry, I was catching up with an
old friend of mine and I guess I got carried away.
jpnChrName: あら皆さんいらっしゃい、旧友と話し込んで しまっていて失礼したわ。
jpnSearchText:
あら皆さんいらっしゃい、旧友と話し込んで
しまっていて失礼したわ。

engChrName: Emma's a produce vendor from Ored. Her family's had a relationship with my farm since back before she took over the family business from her parents.
engSearchText:
Emma's a produce vendor from Ored. Her family's
had a relationship with my farm since back before
she took over the family business from her parents.
jpnChrName: エンマは、オレドの野菜を売る商人なのだけど、 親の代からうちの農場と付き合いがあってねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
エンマは、オレドの野菜を売る商人なのだけど、
親の代からうちの農場と付き合いがあってねぇ。

engChrName: She comes and visits me here in the Republic every so often, even after I moved.
engSearchText:
She comes and visits me here in the Republic every so
often, even after I moved.
jpnChrName: 私が共和国で落ち着いた今でも、 たまにこうして会いに来てくれるのよねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
私が共和国で落ち着いた今でも、
たまにこうして会いに来てくれるのよねぇ。

engChrName: What happened to Creil is a tragedy that will forever weigh on me. But we can't let that hold us back forever. We gotta live our lives for them, too.
engSearchText:
What happened to Creil is a tragedy that will forever
weigh on me. But we can't let that hold us
back forever. We gotta live our lives for them, too.
jpnChrName: クレイユの悲しみは消えないけど…… 彼らのためにも、やる事はしっかりやらなくちゃ。
jpnSearchText:
クレイユの悲しみは消えないけど……
彼らのためにも、やる事はしっかりやらなくちゃ。

engChrName: Food demands always skyrocket right before the festival. We're used to it now, though, so we'd always stock on additional supplies from Creil.
engSearchText:
Food demands always skyrocket right before
the festival. We're used to it now, though, so we'd
always stock on additional supplies from Creil.
jpnChrName: 記念祭前後は食材の需要も増えるしねぇ、去年までは 恒例でクレイユからも追加で仕入れていたけど……
jpnSearchText:
記念祭前後は食材の需要も増えるしねぇ、去年までは
恒例でクレイユからも追加で仕入れていたけど……

engChrName: My friend being able to hook us up this time with produce from Ored has been a lifesaver.
engSearchText:
My friend being able to hook us up this time with
produce from Ored has been a lifesaver.
jpnChrName: 今年は代わりにオレドで農産物の貿易をしている 友人が融通してくれて……有難いわ。
jpnSearchText:
今年は代わりにオレドで農産物の貿易をしている
友人が融通してくれて……有難いわ。

engChrName: I think she mentioned visiting for the Revolution Festival so that might be the perfect time to thank her for it.
engSearchText:
I think she mentioned visiting for the Revolution
Festival so that might be the perfect time to thank her
for it.
jpnChrName: オレドの友人も記念祭には来てくれるようだし、 何かお礼でもしたいものねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
オレドの友人も記念祭には来てくれるようだし、
何かお礼でもしたいものねぇ。

engChrName: I'm happy that the culprits behind the Creil tragedy are out of the picture now and the state of emergency was lifted, but it won't bring them back.
engSearchText:
I'm happy that the culprits behind the Creil tragedy
are out of the picture now and the state of emergency
was lifted, but it won't bring them back.
jpnChrName: クレイユ村でテロを起こした組織が捕まって、 非常事態宣言も解除されたのは良いけど……
jpnSearchText:
クレイユ村でテロを起こした組織が捕まって、
非常事態宣言も解除されたのは良いけど……

engChrName: It's hard to accept that we'll never get another delivery from Creil.
