engSearchText:
It's hard to accept that we'll never get another delivery
from Creil.
jpnChrName: クレイユ村からの、今までならあった 荷物が届かないのは……本当に悲しくて……
jpnSearchText:
クレイユ村からの、今までならあった
荷物が届かないのは……本当に悲しくて……

engChrName: We'd usually order a huge amount of extra produce right before the festival.
engSearchText:
We'd usually order a huge amount of extra produce
right before the festival.
jpnChrName: 例年なら、記念祭前のこの時期は追加で 大量に食材を入荷していたけど……
jpnSearchText:
例年なら、記念祭前のこの時期は追加で
大量に食材を入荷していたけど……

engChrName: This will be the first year we won't. It's a painful reminder that they're really gone.
engSearchText:
This will be the first year we won't. It's a painful
reminder that they're really gone.
jpnChrName: それが無いものだから、改めてもうあの村は 無いんだって感じてしまってね……
jpnSearchText:
それが無いものだから、改めてもうあの村は
無いんだって感じてしまってね……

engChrName: Not even in my wildest dreams would I imagine something like that happening to Creil.
engSearchText:
Not even in my wildest dreams would I imagine
something like that happening to Creil.
jpnChrName: まさかクレイユ村が犠牲になるなんて……
jpnSearchText: まさかクレイユ村が犠牲になるなんて……

engChrName: We've been partnering with the village for so long that I think it's taken me even longer to accept that they're just...not here anymore.
engSearchText:
We've been partnering with the village for so long
that I think it's taken me even longer to accept that
they're just...not here anymore.
jpnChrName: あの村とは付き合いも長かっただけに 今でも信じられないわ……
jpnSearchText:
あの村とは付き合いも長かっただけに
今でも信じられないわ……

engChrName: All of our suppliers were the loveliest of people. Why... Why did this have to happen?
engSearchText:
All of our suppliers were the loveliest of people.
Why... Why did this have to happen?
jpnChrName: 仕入れで会った方も皆良い人ばかりだったのに、 どうしてこんな事に……
jpnSearchText:
仕入れで会った方も皆良い人ばかりだったのに、
どうしてこんな事に……

engChrName: I've handled business with Creil before, as one of our produce suppliers. They were always so kind to me when I stopped on my way home, too...
engSearchText:
I've handled business with Creil before, as one of our
produce suppliers. They were always so kind to me
when I stopped on my way home, too...
jpnChrName: クレイユ村の人達とは仕入れでも付き合ったし、 帰省の際に寄った時にも良くしてもらって……
jpnSearchText:
クレイユ村の人達とは仕入れでも付き合ったし、
帰省の際に寄った時にも良くしてもらって……

engChrName: They didn't deserve this...
engSearchText: They didn't deserve this...
jpnChrName: あの村が今は無いだなんて…… 本当に信じられない……
jpnSearchText:
あの村が今は無いだなんて……
本当に信じられない……

engChrName: Our rooftop terrace is finally open. It's part of Administrator Wesley's plan to compete with Iota.
engSearchText:
Our rooftop terrace is finally open. It's part of
Administrator Wesley's plan to compete with Iota.
jpnChrName: 屋上のテラスが早速オープンしたわ。 支配人が《イオタ》に対抗して企画したアレ。
jpnSearchText:
屋上のテラスが早速オープンしたわ。
支配人が《イオタ》に対抗して企画したアレ。

engChrName: It's the perfect place for our customers to take a much needed shopping break, and we might even start holding events there soon.
engSearchText:
It's the perfect place for our customers to take a much
needed shopping break, and we might even start
holding events there soon.
jpnChrName: 買い物の合間の休憩に彩りを持たせるだけじゃなく、 催しとかもできるみたいでねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
買い物の合間の休憩に彩りを持たせるだけじゃなく、
催しとかもできるみたいでねぇ。

engChrName: It's a little plain for now, but Administrator Wesley is making sure we'll be able to take full advantage of the space in the future.
engSearchText:
It's a little plain for now, but Administrator Wesley
is making sure we'll be able to take full advantage
of the space in the future.
jpnChrName: 今はカフェスペースという形だけど、支配人としては 将来的に色々な使い方を考えているみたいよ。
jpnSearchText:
今はカフェスペースという形だけど、支配人としては
将来的に色々な使い方を考えているみたいよ。

engChrName: He's actually at Ilhan's right now, bragging about it. He finds it to be quite the accomplishment, hah.
engSearchText:
He's actually at Ilhan's right now, bragging about it.
He finds it to be quite the accomplishment, hah.
jpnChrName: ……ちなみに支配人は今、イルハンさんに自慢しに 行っているわ……よほど嬉しかったのね。
jpnSearchText:
……ちなみに支配人は今、イルハンさんに自慢しに
行っているわ……よほど嬉しかったのね。

engChrName: Ilhan didn't realize that Administrator Wesley was, well, the administrator for the store right across the street.
engSearchText:
Ilhan didn't realize that Administrator Wesley was, well,
the administrator for the store right across the street.
jpnChrName: ウェスリー支配人……まさか向こうのお店で 存在に気づかれていなかったなんてね……
jpnSearchText:
ウェスリー支配人……まさか向こうのお店で
存在に気づかれていなかったなんてね……

engChrName: Wesley's a great administrator, sure, but he could work a little on his people skills. Heh.
engSearchText:
Wesley's a great administrator, sure, but he could
work a little on his people skills. Heh.
jpnChrName: まあ、支配人は経営者としては一流だけど、 少し不器用な面もあるし、あり得るわ……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、支配人は経営者としては一流だけど、
少し不器用な面もあるし、あり得るわ……

engChrName: But I digress. Taking advantage of the unused rooftop area was a great idea.
engSearchText:
But I digress. Taking advantage of the unused
rooftop area was a great idea.
jpnChrName: 何にせよ持て余している屋上を活用する アイデアは良いんじゃないかと思うわ。
jpnSearchText:
何にせよ持て余している屋上を活用する
アイデアは良いんじゃないかと思うわ。

engChrName: Even I didn't know about it! I've worked here for thirty years! THIRTY!
engSearchText:
Even I didn't know about it! I've worked here for
thirty years! THIRTY!
jpnChrName: 私も３０年間勤めてきて、あのスペースに ついては気にはなっていたのよねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
私も３０年間勤めてきて、あのスペースに
ついては気にはなっていたのよねぇ……

engChrName: We're currently stocking up on Ored's seasonal vegetables! Creil's produce is fantastic, but I'd love it if you gave our autumnal Ored produce a try.
engSearchText:
We're currently stocking up on Ored's seasonal
vegetables! Creil's produce is fantastic, but I'd love
it if you gave our autumnal Ored produce a try.
jpnChrName: さあ、オレド産の秋野菜ならどんどん入荷中よ。 クレイユ産も良いけどオレド野菜もよろしく！
jpnSearchText:
さあ、オレド産の秋野菜ならどんどん入荷中よ。
クレイユ産も良いけどオレド野菜もよろしく！

engChrName: On a different note, I recently received a letter from my parents! It's been a while since they last wrote.
engSearchText:
On a different note, I recently received a letter from
my parents! It's been a while since they last wrote.
jpnChrName: そうそう、それとは別に、最近連絡が 無かった両親から手紙も来たんだけどねぇ！
jpnSearchText:
そうそう、それとは別に、最近連絡が
無かった両親から手紙も来たんだけどねぇ！

engChrName: And turns out I was worrying for nothing! They hadn't written because they'd gotten distracted with Ored's new movie theater.
engSearchText:
And turns out I was worrying for nothing!
They hadn't written because they'd gotten distracted
with Ored's new movie theater.
jpnChrName: 心配して損したわ、オレドに出来たっていう 映画館やら何やらに夢中で連絡忘れてたんだって！
jpnSearchText:
心配して損したわ、オレドに出来たっていう
映画館やら何やらに夢中で連絡忘れてたんだって！

engChrName: But it looks like things are going great at the farm. Honestly, I don't know where they get all that energy at that age.
engSearchText:
But it looks like things are going great at the farm.
Honestly, I don't know where they get all that energy
at that age.
jpnChrName: まあ、農作業はちゃんとやってるみたいだけど、 思った以上に元気が有り余ってて腰砕けだわ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、農作業はちゃんとやってるみたいだけど、
思った以上に元気が有り余ってて腰砕けだわ。

engChrName: Ored's been changing a lot lately. I recently heard they got a movie theater and even a racetrack.
engSearchText:
Ored's been changing a lot lately. I recently heard
they got a movie theater and even a racetrack.
jpnChrName: 最近は地元のオレドも変わったってね。 映画館やらサーキットやらもできたみたいで。
jpnSearchText:
最近は地元のオレドも変わったってね。
映画館やらサーキットやらもできたみたいで。

engChrName: I haven't visited Ored in a while, now that I have a family here, but maybe it's about time I plan a trip.
engSearchText:
I haven't visited Ored in a while, now that I have a
family here, but maybe it's about time I plan a trip.
jpnChrName: 共和国で家族を持ってからめっきり 帰ってないけど、久しぶりに帰省しようかしら。
jpnSearchText:
共和国で家族を持ってからめっきり
帰ってないけど、久しぶりに帰省しようかしら。

engChrName: Can you believe Administrator Wesley is still over at the orbal café?
engSearchText:
Can you believe Administrator Wesley is still over at
the orbal café?
jpnChrName: ウェスリー支配人……今日はまさか こんな時間までオーバルカフェにいるなんて。
jpnSearchText:
ウェスリー支配人……今日はまさか
こんな時間までオーバルカフェにいるなんて。

engChrName: He's been going there every day for the past week. He insists it's for research purposes, but I just think he likes it there.
engSearchText:
He's been going there every day for the past week.
He insists it's for research purposes, but I just think
he likes it there.
jpnChrName: 偵察だとか言って一週間通っていたけど、 明らかにハマっちゃってるわねこれ……
jpnSearchText:
偵察だとか言って一週間通っていたけど、
明らかにハマっちゃってるわねこれ……

engChrName: He's been struggling lately, doubting his managerial skills, so I'm sure the break will do him some good.
engSearchText:
He's been struggling lately, doubting his managerial
skills, so I'm sure the break will do him some good.
jpnChrName: まあ、最近は経営方針の事で迷いもあるみたいだし、 気分転換になるなら別に良いけど……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、最近は経営方針の事で迷いもあるみたいだし、
気分転換になるなら別に良いけど……

engChrName: That reminds me, I haven't been in touch with my family in a while. They live in Ored. I wonder how they're doing...
engSearchText:
That reminds me, I haven't been in touch with my
family in a while. They live in Ored. I wonder how
they're doing...
jpnChrName: そういえば……最近はオレドの実家と 連絡取っていないけど大丈夫かしら？
jpnSearchText:
そういえば……最近はオレドの実家と
連絡取っていないけど大丈夫かしら？

engChrName: I might've already mentioned it, but my family owns a farm. It's hard work, and my parents aren't getting any younger.
engSearchText:
I might've already mentioned it, but my family owns
a farm. It's hard work, and my parents aren't getting
any younger.
jpnChrName: 言ってたかしら、私の実家ってオレドの 農場なんだけど両親も歳なもので……
jpnSearchText:
言ってたかしら、私の実家ってオレドの
農場なんだけど両親も歳なもので……

engChrName: I've been so busy lately that writing to them has just slipped my mind. I should probably change that, see how they're doing.
engSearchText:
I've been so busy lately that writing to them has just
slipped my mind. I should probably change that, see
how they're doing.
jpnChrName: 最近忙しくて忘れていたけど、 心配だしそろそろ手紙でも出そうかしら。
jpnSearchText:
最近忙しくて忘れていたけど、
心配だしそろそろ手紙でも出そうかしら。

engChrName: Some new imports from the Central East came in today, so be sure to take a look!
engSearchText:
Some new imports from the Central East came in
today, so be sure to take a look!
jpnChrName: 中東からの輸入食品、今朝も新しく 入ったから是非見ていってね。
jpnSearchText:
中東からの輸入食品、今朝も新しく
入ったから是非見ていってね。

engChrName: When people think 'Central East,' they picture barren deserts, but they have some wonderful local specialties. Spices and fruits, to name a few.
engSearchText:
When people think 'Central East,' they picture barren
deserts, but they have some wonderful
local specialties. Spices and fruits, to name a few.
jpnChrName: 中東は砂漠のイメージが強いけど、 意外と一部の果物や香辛料は名産でねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
中東は砂漠のイメージが強いけど、
意外と一部の果物や香辛料は名産でねぇ。

engChrName: Elsaim's cocoa and coffee are really popular and widely renowned for their quality.
engSearchText:
Elsaim's cocoa and coffee are really popular and widely
renowned for their quality.
jpnChrName: 特にエルザイム産のカカオやコーヒーは 昔から高品質だって人気だしねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
特にエルザイム産のカカオやコーヒーは
昔から高品質だって人気だしねぇ。

engChrName: People are slowly growing more familiar with Central Eastern spices as of late, and it's been great for implementing some variety in our cuisine.
engSearchText:
People are slowly growing more familiar with Central
Eastern spices as of late, and it's been great for
implementing some variety in our cuisine.
jpnChrName: 最近では中東の香辛料も知名度が上がってきたし、 食卓の多様化も楽しみなものだわ。
jpnSearchText:
最近では中東の香辛料も知名度が上がってきたし、
食卓の多様化も楽しみなものだわ。

engChrName: Administrator Wesley's been gone for a while...
engSearchText: Administrator Wesley's been gone for a while...
jpnChrName: そういえば今、支配人がちょっと 席を外していてね……
jpnSearchText:
そういえば今、支配人がちょっと
席を外していてね……

engChrName: He said he was going to check up on another store, but he's not back yet. Hope he's doing well.
engSearchText:
He said he was going to check up on another store,
but he's not back yet. Hope he's doing well.
jpnChrName: まあ、他のお店の視察に 行っているんだけど大丈夫かしら……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、他のお店の視察に
行っているんだけど大丈夫かしら……

engChrName: Competition between smaller businesses has been heating up lately. It surely weighs on his mind.
engSearchText:
Competition between smaller businesses has been
heating up lately. It surely weighs on his mind.
jpnChrName: 支配人、最近新しい小売店との競争が 激化してから、どうも思い詰めちゃっていて……
jpnSearchText:
支配人、最近新しい小売店との競争が
激化してから、どうも思い詰めちゃっていて……

engChrName: Maybe I should talk to Administrator Wesley about expanding our sales floor and our catalogue... Hmm...
engSearchText:
Maybe I should talk to Administrator Wesley about
expanding our sales floor and our catalogue...
Hmm...
jpnChrName: 商品の種類も増えそうだし、売り場の拡張も 支配人に相談しようかしらねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
商品の種類も増えそうだし、売り場の拡張も
支配人に相談しようかしらねぇ……

engChrName: Relations with the Empire keep improving, little by little every day. We've had a lot of western product coming in as a result.
engSearchText:
Relations with the Empire keep improving, little by
little every day. We've had a lot of western product
coming in as a result.
jpnChrName: ほら、最近は帝国とも国交が回復して、 西の方の作物もどんどん入ってきていてさ。
jpnSearchText:
ほら、最近は帝国とも国交が回復して、
西の方の作物もどんどん入ってきていてさ。

engChrName: It'd be wonderful to offer a wider variety of Central Eastern spices, but if we don't expand our catalogue, we'd have to remove something.
engSearchText:
It'd be wonderful to offer a wider variety of Central
Eastern spices, but if we don't expand our catalogue,
we'd have to remove something.
jpnChrName: 中東の香辛料ももう少し種類揃えたいけど、 従来の商品の量を減らす訳にもいかないでしょ？
jpnSearchText:
中東の香辛料ももう少し種類揃えたいけど、
従来の商品の量を減らす訳にもいかないでしょ？

engChrName: Expanding would be the better idea. It's always nice, just having extra options.
engSearchText:
Expanding would be the better idea. It's always nice,
just having extra options.
jpnChrName: まあ、選択肢も増えたって事だし、 ある意味では嬉しい悩みなんだけどねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、選択肢も増えたって事だし、
ある意味では嬉しい悩みなんだけどねぇ……

engChrName: I might not look like it, but I actually come from a family of farmers. That's why I get so hung up on this stuff, you see.
engSearchText:
I might not look like it, but I actually come from a
family of farmers. That's why I get so hung up on this
stuff, you see.
jpnChrName: こう見えて私、一応実家が農家なのよ。 だから色々と拘りたくなっちゃうものでねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
こう見えて私、一応実家が農家なのよ。
だから色々と拘りたくなっちゃうものでねぇ。

engChrName: I wish we could focus on different vegetable varieties here, since they can be very different depending on species and where they're from.
engSearchText:
I wish we could focus on different vegetable varieties
here, since they can be very different depending on
species and where they're from.
jpnChrName: 本当なら、同じ野菜でも品種やら産地やらで 全然違うってのをアピールしていきたいのよねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
本当なら、同じ野菜でも品種やら産地やらで
全然違うってのをアピールしていきたいのよねぇ。

engChrName: Hello there! We just had a huge batch of produce come in from Creil this morning.
engSearchText:
Hello there! We just had a huge batch of produce
come in from Creil this morning.
jpnChrName: いらっしゃい、今朝もクレイユの 野菜がたんまり届いたわよ！
jpnSearchText:
いらっしゃい、今朝もクレイユの
野菜がたんまり届いたわよ！

engChrName: We've also got produce from Crossbell and Ored, in case you're picky about where your food comes from.
engSearchText:
We've also got produce from Crossbell and Ored, in
case you're picky about where your food comes from.
jpnChrName: オレド産もクロスベル産ももちろん揃えているし、 産地に拘りのある人も是非見ていくと良いわ。
jpnSearchText:
オレド産もクロスベル産ももちろん揃えているし、
産地に拘りのある人も是非見ていくと良いわ。

engChrName: Only the highest quality produce makes it to our shelves, so I'm sure you'll be spoiled for choice—in a good way, of course!
engSearchText:
Only the highest quality produce makes it to our
shelves, so I'm sure you'll be spoiled for choice—in a
good way, of course!
jpnChrName: どれも厳選したものだからねぇ、 きっと良い意味で迷っちゃうと思うわ！
jpnSearchText:
どれも厳選したものだからねぇ、
きっと良い意味で迷っちゃうと思うわ！

engChrName: There's a lot of competition nowadays undercutting our prices, but I can't imagine we'll be losing our clientele to them anytime soon.
engSearchText:
There's a lot of competition nowadays undercutting
our prices, but I can't imagine we'll be losing our
clientele to them anytime soon.
jpnChrName: 最近は新しい小売店でも安く食材を売っているけど、 うちは固定客がいなくなる気配は無くてねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
最近は新しい小売店でも安く食材を売っているけど、
うちは固定客がいなくなる気配は無くてねぇ。

engChrName: We carefully curate only the highest quality produce—been doing so for YEARS. I'd guess that's what's earned us the trust of our customers.
engSearchText:
We carefully curate only the highest quality
produce—been doing so for YEARS. I'd guess that's
what's earned us the trust of our customers.
jpnChrName: 多少はお高くても、厳選した食材を長年 届けてきた信頼があるんだと思うわ。
jpnSearchText:
多少はお高くても、厳選した食材を長年
届けてきた信頼があるんだと思うわ。

engChrName: Long time no talk, Emma. How are things over in Ored?
engSearchText:
Long time no talk, Emma. How are things over
in Ored?
jpnChrName: 本当に久しぶりねぇ、エンマ。 最近はオレドの方はどう？
jpnSearchText:
本当に久しぶりねぇ、エンマ。
最近はオレドの方はどう？

engChrName: I haven't had a chance to visit my parents lately. Maybe I'll get the chance for New Year's.
engSearchText:
I haven't had a chance to visit my parents lately.
Maybe I'll get the chance for New Year's.
jpnChrName: 私も、しばらく両親に会えてないし 年明け辺りに帰りたいのよねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
私も、しばらく両親に会えてないし
年明け辺りに帰りたいのよねぇ。

engChrName: Things are looking up! Even Ored's quite shaken over what happened here.
engSearchText:
Things are looking up! Even Ored's quite shaken over
what happened here.
jpnChrName: ええ、景気良いわよ！　こないだの事件の 時は流石にオレドも混乱したけど……
jpnSearchText:
ええ、景気良いわよ！　こないだの事件の
時は流石にオレドも混乱したけど……

engChrName: Being here for the Revolution Festival does help ease me a little.
engSearchText:
Being here for the Revolution Festival does help ease
me a little.
jpnChrName: こうして共和国も記念祭を迎えられて、 一緒にお祝いしようってムードなの。
jpnSearchText:
こうして共和国も記念祭を迎えられて、
一緒にお祝いしようってムードなの。

engChrName: I'd like to take this opportunity to expand our market even more, and was hoping you'd be able to help with that.
engSearchText:
I'd like to take this opportunity to expand our market
even more, and was hoping you'd be able to help
with that.
jpnChrName: 私もね、この機にさらに販路を広げたいし、 デボラに手伝ってもらおうかなって。
jpnSearchText:
私もね、この機にさらに販路を広げたいし、
デボラに手伝ってもらおうかなって。

engChrName: Of course you can count on me! There's no one I'd rather work with.
engSearchText:
Of course you can count on me! There's no one I'd
rather work with.
jpnChrName: ええ、任せて頂戴な！ 他でもないエンマの頼みなら力になるわ。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、任せて頂戴な！
他でもないエンマの頼みなら力になるわ。

engChrName: Thanks, Deborah!
engSearchText: Thanks, Deborah!
jpnChrName: ありがとう、デボラ！
jpnSearchText: ありがとう、デボラ！

engChrName: Oh, by the by. I was passing by your family's farm the other day.
engSearchText:
Oh, by the by. I was passing by your family's farm the
other day.
jpnChrName: あ、そうそう思い出したんだけどさ。 この前、たまたまデボラの家の農場近くで──
jpnSearchText:
あ、そうそう思い出したんだけどさ。
この前、たまたまデボラの家の農場近くで──

engChrName: Oh, no way! Ahaha!
engSearchText: Oh, no way! Ahaha!
jpnChrName: あら本当！？　いやだわ、おほほほ！
jpnSearchText: あら本当！？　いやだわ、おほほほ！

engChrName: This whole mess caught everyone by surprise.
engSearchText: This whole mess caught everyone by surprise.
jpnChrName: まさかこんな事に巻き込まれるとは 思わなかったけれど……
jpnSearchText:
まさかこんな事に巻き込まれるとは
思わなかったけれど……

engChrName: I guess we're lucky I'd just brought in a new produce haul. It should last us a while, at least.
engSearchText:
I guess we're lucky I'd just brought in a new
produce haul. It should last us a while, at least.
jpnChrName: ちょうどこのお店に商品を持ってきていたのは 幸いね、しばらく備蓄は保つはずよ。
jpnSearchText:
ちょうどこのお店に商品を持ってきていたのは
幸いね、しばらく備蓄は保つはずよ。

engChrName: Deborah and I will be handling food reserves with the utmost care. We don't know how long it'll go on for, after all.
engSearchText:
Deborah and I will be handling food reserves with the
utmost care. We don't know how long it'll go on for,
after all.
jpnChrName: いつまで続くかわからないけど、食料備蓄の 管理は私とデボラで責任を持ってやるから。
jpnSearchText:
いつまで続くかわからないけど、食料備蓄の
管理は私とデボラで責任を持ってやるから。

engChrName: Deborah's been living in the Republic for a while now. It does me good to see her family doing good whenever I visit. It's a lovely sight.
engSearchText:
Deborah's been living in the Republic for a
while now. It does me good to see her family doing
good whenever I visit. It's a lovely sight.
jpnChrName: デボラ、共和国で家庭を持って長いけど…… いつ来ても充実してそうで嬉しいわ。
jpnSearchText:
デボラ、共和国で家庭を持って長いけど……
いつ来ても充実してそうで嬉しいわ。

engChrName: Haha, not that my own family back in Ored isn't just as lovely, mind you.
engSearchText:
Haha, not that my own family back in Ored isn't just
as lovely, mind you.
jpnChrName: まあ、そういう私もオレドに帰れば 愛する家族が待っているけどね。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、そういう私もオレドに帰れば
愛する家族が待っているけどね。

engChrName: That professor is working on the roof right now.
engSearchText: That professor is working on the roof right now.
jpnChrName: 屋上の方では、あの偉い学者の方が 何か作業をされているようで……
jpnSearchText:
屋上の方では、あの偉い学者の方が
何か作業をされているようで……

engChrName: I'd probably be more a hindrance than support if I was up there, so I'm staying down here and focusing on what I can do.
engSearchText:
I'd probably be more a hindrance than support if I
was up there, so I'm staying down here and focusing
on what I can do.
jpnChrName: お邪魔になるといけないので館内に私も 退避していますが、できるお手伝いはします。
jpnSearchText:
お邪魔になるといけないので館内に私も
退避していますが、できるお手伝いはします。

engChrName: I brought over some ice cream from my stand, so that'll hopefully help with our reserves.
engSearchText:
I brought over some ice cream from my stand, so
that'll hopefully help with our reserves.
jpnChrName: 屋上カフェの商品も持ってこれたので、 食料の面で力になれれば……
jpnSearchText:
屋上カフェの商品も持ってこれたので、
食料の面で力になれれば……

engChrName: People have really been enjoying our rooftop lately. The view of the festival is just amazing up there.
engSearchText:
People have really been enjoying our rooftop lately.
The view of the festival is just amazing up there.
jpnChrName: 屋上から見る記念祭も壮観ですね、 ずいぶん多くの方に楽しんでもらえています。
jpnSearchText:
屋上から見る記念祭も壮観ですね、
ずいぶん多くの方に楽しんでもらえています。

engChrName: Having space up on the rooftop will hopefully help in making the store feel less crowded, even when there's more people around.
engSearchText:
Having space up on the rooftop will hopefully help
in making the store feel less crowded, even when
there's more people around.
jpnChrName: 屋上にこうしたスペースがあれば、お客さんが 増えても館内の息苦しさも減りますし。
jpnSearchText:
屋上にこうしたスペースがあれば、お客さんが
増えても館内の息苦しさも減りますし。

engChrName: Seeing people enjoying the place has made me feel great about taking on the job as manager of the rooftop terrace.
engSearchText:
Seeing people enjoying the place has made me feel
great about taking on the job as manager of the
rooftop terrace.
jpnChrName: 改めてこの百貨店に、屋上カフェ担当として 転職した甲斐がありますよ！
jpnSearchText:
改めてこの百貨店に、屋上カフェ担当として
転職した甲斐がありますよ！

engChrName: Administrator Wesley has been workshopping other ways to attract customers to the rooftop area during the festival, including new items and events.
engSearchText:
Administrator Wesley has been workshopping other
ways to attract customers to the rooftop area during the
festival, including new items and events.
jpnChrName: 支配人さんは他にも屋上テラスに店を置く事や 記念祭でのイベントなども考えているようです。
jpnSearchText:
支配人さんは他にも屋上テラスに店を置く事や
記念祭でのイベントなども考えているようです。

engChrName: I'm still new here, but I hope I'll be able to get along with everyone. A good workplace environment leads to good work being done!
engSearchText:
I'm still new here, but I hope I'll be able to get along
with everyone. A good workplace environment leads
to good work being done!
jpnChrName: 私も早く他のスタッフたちに馴染んで、 一緒に百貨店を盛り上げてきたいですね。
jpnSearchText:
私も早く他のスタッフたちに馴染んで、
一緒に百貨店を盛り上げてきたいですね。

engChrName: Fingers crossed this will be the first of many years working here. But no use worrying about the future! Gotta focus on the now!
engSearchText:
Fingers crossed this will be the first of many years
working here. But no use worrying about the future!
Gotta focus on the now!
jpnChrName: 来年以降もこのお店にはお世話になりたいですし…… 今は記念祭に向けて頑張っていかないと！
jpnSearchText:
来年以降もこのお店にはお世話になりたいですし……
今は記念祭に向けて頑張っていかないと！

engChrName: Customers have finally started coming to the rooftop terrace now that things are finally quieting down. Our numbers are on the up and up.
engSearchText:
Customers have finally started coming to the rooftop
terrace now that things are finally quieting down.
Our numbers are on the up and up.
jpnChrName: この前の事件の混乱も落ち着いてきて…… 屋上も認知され始めて、お客さんも増えてきました。
jpnSearchText:
この前の事件の混乱も落ち着いてきて……
屋上も認知され始めて、お客さんも増えてきました。

engChrName: And I'm sure even more people will come over when the Revolution Festival rolls around!
engSearchText:
And I'm sure even more people will come over when
the Revolution Festival rolls around!
jpnChrName: 記念祭を経て、きっと多くのお客さんたちが この屋上テラスに来てくれる事になるでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
記念祭を経て、きっと多くのお客さんたちが
この屋上テラスに来てくれる事になるでしょう。

engChrName: I literally had just gotten this job when this incident suddenly happened.
engSearchText:
I literally had just gotten this job when this incident
suddenly happened.
jpnChrName: 転職早々、まさかこんな事件が 起こってしまうなんて……
jpnSearchText:
転職早々、まさかこんな事件が
起こってしまうなんて……

engChrName: But it's not like people can just put their lives on hold entirely. They still need to come shopping for dailies.
engSearchText:
But it's not like people can just put their lives on
hold entirely. They still need to come shopping
for dailies.
jpnChrName: でも、生活のためにお客さんたちは 百貨店に訪れ続けています……
jpnSearchText:
でも、生活のためにお客さんたちは
百貨店に訪れ続けています……

engChrName: It's my job as the terrace's manager to offer everyone some respite from all the chaos going on now.
engSearchText:
It's my job as the terrace's manager to offer everyone
some respite from all the chaos going on now.
jpnChrName: お客さんたちが少しでも心を落ち着けられるよう、 カフェスペースの担当なりに頑張らないと……
jpnSearchText:
お客さんたちが少しでも心を落ち着けられるよう、
カフェスペースの担当なりに頑張らないと……

engChrName: Starting today, Weston Department Store's rooftop terrace is officially open!
engSearchText:
Starting today, Weston Department Store's rooftop
terrace is officially open!
jpnChrName: ウェストン百貨店の“屋上庭園”、本日より 正式にサービス開始となります。
jpnSearchText:
ウェストン百貨店の“屋上庭園”、本日より
正式にサービス開始となります。

engChrName: My name's Milty. I'm the new recruit in charge of managing the rooftop.
engSearchText:
My name's Milty. I'm the new recruit in charge of
managing the rooftop.
jpnChrName: 私は屋上テラスのカフェスペース担当として 新しく入りました、ミルテと申します。
jpnSearchText:
私は屋上テラスのカフェスペース担当として
新しく入りました、ミルテと申します。

engChrName: I ran a café at my old job. It was in a large shopping center that also doubled as an event venue, so I hope the experience will help here!
engSearchText:
I ran a café at my old job. It was in a large shopping
center that also doubled as an event venue, so I
hope the experience will help here!
jpnChrName: 前職でもイベントもある大きな施設内でカフェを 担当していましたので、経験を活かせれば。
jpnSearchText:
前職でもイベントもある大きな施設内でカフェを
担当していましたので、経験を活かせれば。

engChrName: There's a lot of room on the roof for holding events, not to mention the killer view. I hope we'll be able to pull something like that off soon!
engSearchText:
There's a lot of room on the roof for holding events,
not to mention the killer view. I hope we'll be able to
pull something like that off soon!
jpnChrName: 確かにこの屋上はスペースに余裕もあり 景色も良いし、良い着眼点ですねー。
jpnSearchText:
確かにこの屋上はスペースに余裕もあり
景色も良いし、良い着眼点ですねー。

engChrName: It is my responsibility as manager to ensure our rooftop lounge is just the perfect hangout spot!
engSearchText:
It is my responsibility as manager to ensure our
rooftop lounge is just the perfect hangout spot!
jpnChrName: この居心地の良さを活かしたテラスを作れるよう、 カフェ担当としても精一杯努力したいです。
jpnSearchText:
この居心地の良さを活かしたテラスを作れるよう、
カフェ担当としても精一杯努力したいです。

engChrName: I expect the place to become popular with children once we install some children's playsets and start holding events here.
engSearchText:
I expect the place to become popular with children
once we install some children's playsets and start
holding events here.
jpnChrName: 他にも、何かショーをやったり遊具を置いたりしたら 子供の集客も増やせそうですよねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
他にも、何かショーをやったり遊具を置いたりしたら
子供の集客も増やせそうですよねぇ。

engChrName: Nice to meet you! My name is Milty. I'll start working in the department store next week. I stopped by to finish making some arrangements.
engSearchText:
Nice to meet you! My name is Milty. I'll start
working in the department store next week. I stopped
by to finish making some arrangements.
jpnChrName: 次週からこの百貨店で働く予定のミルテです。 挨拶と事前の打ち合わせに来たのですが……
jpnSearchText:
次週からこの百貨店で働く予定のミルテです。
挨拶と事前の打ち合わせに来たのですが……

engChrName: Well, that was the plan, anyway. Looks like the boss is busy right now. Might have to do some window shopping to kill time.
engSearchText:
Well, that was the plan, anyway. Looks like the boss
is busy right now. Might have to do some window
shopping to kill time.
jpnChrName: 支配人さんはまだお忙しいのでしょうか？ ならば少し、お店を見ながら待ちましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
支配人さんはまだお忙しいのでしょうか？
ならば少し、お店を見ながら待ちましょうか。

engChrName: We'd been waiting for the Revolution Festival to come around for so long, and now this had to happen.
engSearchText:
We'd been waiting for the Revolution Festival to
come around for so long, and now this had to happen.
jpnChrName: せっかくの記念祭がこのような事に なってしまうとは……
jpnSearchText:
せっかくの記念祭がこのような事に
なってしまうとは……

engChrName: But we can't be lounging around dumbfounded forever. Administrator Wesley's decided we have to help.
engSearchText:
But we can't be lounging around dumbfounded
forever. Administrator Wesley's decided we have
to help.
jpnChrName: とはいえ、支配人も決断された以上、 私も戸惑ってばかりではいられません。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ、支配人も決断された以上、
私も戸惑ってばかりではいられません。

engChrName: You must be sure you're wearing the appropriate clothes. Especially if you don't know exactly what you're getting into.
engSearchText:
You must be sure you're wearing the
appropriate clothes. Especially if you don't know
exactly what you're getting into.
jpnChrName: 何があるか判らぬ環境へ飛び込むなら、 身を委ねる衣服も重要なものになる。
jpnSearchText:
何があるか判らぬ環境へ飛び込むなら、
身を委ねる衣服も重要なものになる。

engChrName: Do let me know if you need anything.
engSearchText: Do let me know if you need anything.
jpnChrName: 必要な物があれば、何でもご相談ください。
jpnSearchText: 必要な物があれば、何でもご相談ください。

engChrName: After everything that's happened, we should be thankful we get to celebrate the Revolution Festival in peace.
engSearchText:
After everything that's happened, we should be
thankful we get to celebrate the Revolution Festival
in peace.
jpnChrName: 革命記念祭、無事に迎えることが出来て何よりです。 何分、直前にあんな事がありましたしね……
jpnSearchText:
革命記念祭、無事に迎えることが出来て何よりです。
何分、直前にあんな事がありましたしね……

engChrName: Now's the time to be festive. Are you interested in a particularly festive attire?
engSearchText:
Now's the time to be festive. Are you interested in a
particularly festive attire?
jpnChrName: ともあれ、今は祝賀の時です。 それに相応しい装いもあると言えましょう。
jpnSearchText:
ともあれ、今は祝賀の時です。
それに相応しい装いもあると言えましょう。

engChrName: If you'd like to take this opportunity to kit yourself with a new ensemble, you're at the right place.
engSearchText:
If you'd like to take this opportunity to kit yourself
with a new ensemble, you're at the right place.
jpnChrName: 皆さんも、もし今からでも装いを整えたいなら 是非とも当店をご利用ください。
jpnSearchText:
皆さんも、もし今からでも装いを整えたいなら
是非とも当店をご利用ください。

engChrName: Everyone's seeking new vestments for the upcoming Revolution Festival. It's nice seeing an every year occurrence still present—tensions are easing.
engSearchText:
Everyone's seeking new vestments for the upcoming
Revolution Festival. It's nice seeing an every year
occurrence still present—tensions are easing.
jpnChrName: 記念祭に向けて服を新調しに来るお客様も 例年通りで、皆前向きに戻れたようで何よりです。
jpnSearchText:
記念祭に向けて服を新調しに来るお客様も
例年通りで、皆前向きに戻れたようで何よりです。

engChrName: I've thought about running a promotional campaign for Oración designer clothing this winter.
engSearchText:
I've thought about running a promotional campaign
for Oración designer clothing this winter.
jpnChrName: ……この冬はオラシオン系ブランドの服を 推し出すキャンペーンも考えていましてね。
jpnSearchText:
……この冬はオラシオン系ブランドの服を
推し出すキャンペーンも考えていましてね。

engChrName: No one from the fashion industry got arrested, thankfully, but stock prices in Oración have been plummeting regardless due to everything.
engSearchText:
No one from the fashion industry got arrested,
thankfully, but stock prices in Oración have been
plummeting regardless due to everything.
jpnChrName: 服飾産業に逮捕者は無かったとはいえ、かの事件で オラシオンの企業の株価は下落傾向にあります。
jpnSearchText:
服飾産業に逮捕者は無かったとはいえ、かの事件で
オラシオンの企業の株価は下落傾向にあります。

engChrName: I'd be delighted in lending my own support to our partners in the clothing industry to help rectify the public's opinion.
engSearchText:
I'd be delighted in lending my own support to our
partners in the clothing industry to help rectify the
public's opinion.
jpnChrName: 取引先の衣類メーカーを少しでも応援し、 イメージを回復するための力になれればと。
jpnSearchText:
取引先の衣類メーカーを少しでも応援し、
イメージを回復するための力になれればと。

engChrName: It's a relief to see the emergency state lifted. Though things are calming down, we must keep ever present the lives we lost—they won't come back.
engSearchText:
It's a relief to see the emergency state lifted.
Though things are calming down, we must keep ever
present the lives we lost—they won't come back.
jpnChrName: 非常事態宣言も解除され……事態が落ち着いたようで 何よりです、失われた命は戻りませんが……
jpnSearchText:
非常事態宣言も解除され……事態が落ち着いたようで
何よりです、失われた命は戻りませんが……

engChrName: Who would've guessed that some of Oración's leading companies would've held ties to the mafia? Quite the surprise coming from ETWS and Quincy.
engSearchText:
Who would've guessed that some of Oración's
leading companies would've held ties to the mafia?
Quite the surprise coming from ETWS and Quincy.
jpnChrName: しかし、エトワスやクインシーなどオラシオンの 有力企業がマフィアと繋がっていたとは……
jpnSearchText:
しかし、エトワスやクインシーなどオラシオンの
有力企業がマフィアと繋がっていたとは……

engChrName: We do business with some high-end clothing suppliers in Oración. I worried for a moment that there might be arrests among them as well.
engSearchText:
We do business with some high-end clothing
suppliers in Oración. I worried for a moment that
there might be arrests among them as well.
jpnChrName: オラシオンの高級衣料品業者とも取引はあるので、 彼らにも逮捕者が出ないかひやひやしました。
jpnSearchText:
オラシオンの高級衣料品業者とも取引はあるので、
彼らにも逮捕者が出ないかひやひやしました。

engChrName: Fortunately, none of our partners or clients have been shown to have ties with the mafia. It was such a relief to hear.
engSearchText:
Fortunately, none of our partners or clients have been
shown to have ties with the mafia. It was such a relief
to hear.
jpnChrName: どうやらうちの取引先にはマフィアの協力者は いなかったようで……安心しましたよ。
jpnSearchText:
どうやらうちの取引先にはマフィアの協力者は
いなかったようで……安心しましたよ。

engChrName: For such a tragedy to strike right on the cusp of both the Revolution Festival and the EGC...
engSearchText:
For such a tragedy to strike right on the cusp of both
the Revolution Festival and the EGC...
jpnChrName: まさか記念祭やＥＧＣを前にして こんなにも酷い事件が起きるとは……
jpnSearchText:
まさか記念祭やＥＧＣを前にして
こんなにも酷い事件が起きるとは……

engChrName: I can hardly imagine anyone would be in the headspace for clothes shopping when a state of emergency has been issued.
engSearchText:
I can hardly imagine anyone would be in the
headspace for clothes shopping when a state of
emergency has been issued.
jpnChrName: 非常事態宣言も出たとなると……やはり皆さんも 服を買っている場合ではないでしょうが……
jpnSearchText:
非常事態宣言も出たとなると……やはり皆さんも
服を買っている場合ではないでしょうが……

engChrName: Regardless, our department store will endeavor to support everyone during these trying times.
engSearchText:
Regardless, our department store will endeavor to
support everyone during these trying times.
jpnChrName: とはいえ……支配人を始め、百貨店の皆も 店でできる事をしようとされている……
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ……支配人を始め、百貨店の皆も
店でできる事をしようとされている……

engChrName: I...should probably start that process by quitting my whining.
engSearchText:
I...should probably start that process by quitting
my whining.
jpnChrName: ならば私も……少なくとも泣き言を 言っている場合ではありませんな……
jpnSearchText:
ならば私も……少なくとも泣き言を
言っている場合ではありませんな……

engChrName: A massive shipment of winter and designer clothes recently arrived at our store. They're expected to be in fashion this coming year.
engSearchText:
A massive shipment of winter and designer clothes
recently arrived at our store. They're expected to be in
fashion this coming year.
jpnChrName: 冬服と来年の流行を先取りできると予想される デザイナーの服を一挙に入荷しました。
jpnSearchText:
冬服と来年の流行を先取りできると予想される
デザイナーの服を一挙に入荷しました。

engChrName: The change in season is the perfect time to update your wardrobe. Not to mention the upcoming EGC.
engSearchText:
The change in season is the perfect time to update
your wardrobe. Not to mention the upcoming EGC.
jpnChrName: この時期は衣替えの季節な上に年末の ＥＧＣも控えていますしね。
jpnSearchText:
この時期は衣替えの季節な上に年末の
ＥＧＣも控えていますしね。

engChrName: People are opting to update their wardrobes right now, before both the EGC and the Revolution Festival. It's quite the opportune time to do so.
engSearchText:
People are opting to update their wardrobes right
now, before both the EGC and the Revolution
Festival. It's quite the opportune time to do so.
jpnChrName: あとは、今のうちからＥＧＣの前にある 革命記念祭のために服を新調する方もいて……
jpnSearchText:
あとは、今のうちからＥＧＣの前にある
革命記念祭のために服を新調する方もいて……

engChrName: Most profits in the Republic's clothing industry are generated around November.
engSearchText:
Most profits in the Republic's clothing industry are
generated around November.
jpnChrName: まあ、とにかく共和国の１１月は アパレル業界にとっては稼ぎ時でしてね。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、とにかく共和国の１１月は
アパレル業界にとっては稼ぎ時でしてね。

engChrName: That reminds me. Administrator Wesley's recently put some new plans of his into effect.
engSearchText:
That reminds me. Administrator Wesley's recently
put some new plans of his into effect.
jpnChrName: そういえば最近、ウェスリー支配人が 何やら新たな企画で自ら動いているとか。
jpnSearchText:
そういえば最近、ウェスリー支配人が
何やら新たな企画で自ら動いているとか。

engChrName: I'm slow on the uptake where fashion's not concerned, so I only found out recently. It's nice seeing the store as a whole keep up with the times.
engSearchText:
I'm slow on the uptake where fashion's not
concerned, so I only found out recently. It's nice
seeing the store as a whole keep up with the times.
jpnChrName: 専門外の事には疎いもので最近知ったのですが、 この百貨店も時代に合わせるという事でしょうね。
jpnSearchText:
専門外の事には疎いもので最近知ったのですが、
この百貨店も時代に合わせるという事でしょうね。

engChrName: I'll trust Administrator Wesley's judgment in this situation, and perhaps I should follow his lead.
engSearchText:
I'll trust Administrator Wesley's judgment in this situation,
and perhaps I should follow his lead.
jpnChrName: 何にせよ、支配人の提案ならば信用できましょう。 私も私なりに、服のフェアでも検討しますかね。
jpnSearchText:
何にせよ、支配人の提案ならば信用できましょう。
私も私なりに、服のフェアでも検討しますかね。

engChrName: We've been very slowly rolling out our winter stock. Synthetic coats appear to be the most desirable fashion item this year and season.
engSearchText:
We've been very slowly rolling out our winter stock.
Synthetic coats appear to be the most desirable
fashion item this year and season.
jpnChrName: そろそろ冬服も仕入れ始めています。 今年は新型の化繊コートが注目されていましてね。
jpnSearchText:
そろそろ冬服も仕入れ始めています。
今年は新型の化繊コートが注目されていましてね。

engChrName: The manufacturing of synthetic items, including fabrics, has affected the clothing industry lately. It's a recent development by Verne.
engSearchText:
The manufacturing of synthetic items, including
fabrics, has affected the clothing industry lately. It's a
recent development by Verne.
jpnChrName: 昨今ではヴェルヌなどの化繊技術も 服飾産業に一定の影響を持っておりますが……
jpnSearchText:
昨今ではヴェルヌなどの化繊技術も
服飾産業に一定の影響を持っておりますが……

engChrName: Though their research is much more in-depth than trying to replace natural fibers. They're looking into the benefits of combining both.
engSearchText:
Though their research is much more in-depth than
trying to replace natural fibers. They're looking into
the benefits of combining both.
jpnChrName: 単に天然繊維を代替するのではなく、数種の繊維の 利点を併せ持つ物も研究されているようで。
jpnSearchText:
単に天然繊維を代替するのではなく、数種の繊維の
利点を併せ持つ物も研究されているようで。

engChrName: I'm rather intrigued to find out what will be the theme for this year's EGC.
engSearchText:
I'm rather intrigued to find out what will be the
theme for this year's EGC.
jpnChrName: そういえば、今年末のＥＧＣ（イーディス・ガールズコレクション）は どのような傾向になるのでしょうな……
jpnSearchText:
そういえば、今年末のＥＧＣ（イーディス・ガールズコレクション）は
どのような傾向になるのでしょうな……

engChrName: All eyes are on the show, so it's the biggest trend setter in the fashion world.
engSearchText:
All eyes are on the show, so it's the biggest trend
setter in the fashion world.
jpnChrName: あの祭典は翌年の流行を決める一方で、やはり 有名人のファッションの影響も大きいもので。
jpnSearchText:
あの祭典は翌年の流行を決める一方で、やはり
有名人のファッションの影響も大きいもので。

engChrName: Actors from the Film Festival and general celebrities always dress differently every year, and the new styles always make an impact.
engSearchText:
Actors from the Film Festival and general celebrities
always dress differently every year, and the new styles
always make an impact.
jpnChrName: 今年の映画祭では役者さん方も去年までと違う装いを 見せるでしょうし、影響が予想されております。
jpnSearchText:
今年の映画祭では役者さん方も去年までと違う装いを
見せるでしょうし、影響が予想されております。

engChrName: How bothersome... Counterfeit designer goods have been resurfacing in the market as of late.
engSearchText:
How bothersome... Counterfeit designer goods have
been resurfacing in the market as of late.
jpnChrName: ふむ、困りましたね………最近はまた ブランド品の贋作が出回っているとか……
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、困りましたね………最近はまた
ブランド品の贋作が出回っているとか……

engChrName: They have always been quite the hassle to deal with.
engSearchText: They have always been quite the hassle to deal with.
jpnChrName: 以前から偽物のブランドは問題でしたが……
jpnSearchText: 以前から偽物のブランドは問題でしたが……

engChrName: They recently started resorting to tactics like slight alteration to logos. It definitely lands them in a more gray area.
engSearchText:
They recently started resorting to tactics like slight
alteration to logos. It definitely lands them in a more
gray area.
jpnChrName: 最近では微妙にロゴを変えるなど、 グレーな手口の物も増えているようでしてね。
jpnSearchText:
最近では微妙にロゴを変えるなど、
グレーな手口の物も増えているようでしてね。

engChrName: They can't claim to be complete copies, but their mere existence can affect the sales and reputation of the genuine articles.
engSearchText:
They can't claim to be complete copies, but their
mere existence can affect the sales and reputation of
the genuine articles.
jpnChrName: 完全な偽物でないにせよ、模倣品で実物の 売上や評判に影響があると考えものです……
jpnSearchText:
完全な偽物でないにせよ、模倣品で実物の
売上や評判に影響があると考えものです……

engChrName: On top of the capital, Tharbad and Langport have been facing challenges regarding these counterfeit items.
engSearchText:
On top of the capital, Tharbad and Langport have
been facing challenges regarding these
counterfeit items.
jpnChrName: 最近では首都や煌都だけでなく、サルバッドでも 模倣品の販売が増えつつあるようでしてね……
jpnSearchText:
最近では首都や煌都だけでなく、サルバッドでも
模倣品の販売が増えつつあるようでしてね……

engChrName: I don't think it's related with the counterfeit designer goods issues that were had abroad, at least.
engSearchText:
I don't think it's related with the counterfeit designer
goods issues that were had abroad, at least.
jpnChrName: 以前に国外でも問題を起こしていた偽ブランドの 業者とは別口のようではありますが……
jpnSearchText:
以前に国外でも問題を起こしていた偽ブランドの
業者とは別口のようではありますが……

engChrName: But I still would rather not see these sorts of items become commonplace.
engSearchText:
But I still would rather not see these sorts of items
become commonplace.
jpnChrName: その手の業者が増えるのは正直 勘弁願いたいものですよ……
jpnSearchText:
その手の業者が増えるのは正直
勘弁願いたいものですよ……

engChrName: Fashion culture varies wildly depending on location, even here in the capital.
engSearchText:
Fashion culture varies wildly depending on location,
even here in the capital.
jpnChrName: 首都でも地区によって 服飾文化に差はありましてね。
jpnSearchText:
首都でも地区によって
服飾文化に差はありましてね。

engChrName: Tyrell's a hotbed for youth fashion, for example.
engSearchText: Tyrell's a hotbed for youth fashion, for example.
jpnChrName: 例えばタイレル地区などは若者らしい ファッションの中心地と言えるでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
例えばタイレル地区などは若者らしい
ファッションの中心地と言えるでしょう。

engChrName: All while the Seiden District houses plenty of boutiques. Those tend to stock independent brands, making their fashion style very unique.
engSearchText:
All while the Seiden District houses plenty
of boutiques. Those tend to stock independent
brands, making their fashion style very unique.
jpnChrName: サイデン地区には独自ブランドのブティックが ありますし、地方独自の服飾文化も存在します。
jpnSearchText:
サイデン地区には独自ブランドのブティックが
ありますし、地方独自の服飾文化も存在します。

engChrName: Our store's strong suit is being able to offer our customers a wide variety of clothing styles from different regions, all in one place.
engSearchText:
Our store's strong suit is being able to offer our
customers a wide variety of clothing styles from
different regions, all in one place.
jpnChrName: 当店の強みは、そうした多様な服飾品を 各方面より広く揃えられる事とも言えましょう。
jpnSearchText:
当店の強みは、そうした多様な服飾品を
各方面より広く揃えられる事とも言えましょう。

engChrName: Langport's fashion culture is shaped by its Eastern roots, while Tharbad's in turn is shaped by the Central East heritage in the region.
engSearchText:
Langport's fashion culture is shaped by its Eastern
roots, while Tharbad's in turn is shaped by the
Central East heritage in the region.
jpnChrName: 地方でもラングポートは東方の、サルバッドは 中東の影響を受けた服飾文化を形成しましたが……
jpnSearchText:
地方でもラングポートは東方の、サルバッドは
中東の影響を受けた服飾文化を形成しましたが……

engChrName: Oración, to the north, is still quite traditional regarding old kingdom customs, and it definitely shows in what people there wear.
engSearchText:
Oración, to the north, is still quite traditional
regarding old kingdom customs, and it definitely
shows in what people there wear.
jpnChrName: 北部の“オラシオン市”はまた違って、 旧王国時代の伝統が服飾にも色濃く残ります。
jpnSearchText:
北部の“オラシオン市”はまた違って、
旧王国時代の伝統が服飾にも色濃く残ります。

engChrName: And while Oración is definitely the biggest hub for traditionalist fashion, it by no means doesn't have an influence in the capital, too.
engSearchText:
And while Oración is definitely the biggest hub for
traditionalist fashion, it by no means doesn't have an
influence in the capital, too.
jpnChrName: いわゆる貴族趣味、と思われがちですが、 そうした様式も一定の人気はありましてね。
jpnSearchText:
いわゆる貴族趣味、と思われがちですが、
そうした様式も一定の人気はありましてね。

engChrName: There's quite a few established brands in Oración that offer traditional formalwear for formal occasions.
engSearchText:
There's quite a few established brands in Oración that
offer traditional formalwear for formal occasions.
jpnChrName: オラシオンでは社交界などにも向いた昔ながらの 礼服を扱う老舗ブランドも多くあるものです。
jpnSearchText:
オラシオンでは社交界などにも向いた昔ながらの
礼服を扱う老舗ブランドも多くあるものです。

engChrName: Welcome to Jardin Boutique.
engSearchText: Welcome to Jardin Boutique.
jpnChrName: ブティック《ジャルダン》へようこそ。
jpnSearchText: ブティック《ジャルダン》へようこそ。

engChrName: We carry a wide array of clothing styles in our boutique that aim to cater to all of our customer's unique tastes.
engSearchText:
We carry a wide array of clothing styles in our
boutique that aim to cater to all of our customer's
unique tastes.
jpnChrName: どうやらお客様は、それぞれ お召し物にはこだわりがおありのようで。
jpnSearchText:
どうやらお客様は、それぞれ
お召し物にはこだわりがおありのようで。

engChrName: Whether it's the elderly or our younger clients, we carry something for everyone.
engSearchText:
Whether it's the elderly or our younger clients, we
carry something for everyone.
jpnChrName: 当店ではご年配の方から若者まで、 様々な年代のスタイルを取り扱っておりますので。
jpnSearchText:
当店ではご年配の方から若者まで、
様々な年代のスタイルを取り扱っておりますので。

engChrName: Please, take your time looking around.
engSearchText: Please, take your time looking around.
jpnChrName: どうかごゆっくりご覧くださいませ。
jpnSearchText: どうかごゆっくりご覧くださいませ。

engChrName: We will! Thank you so much.
engSearchText: We will! Thank you so much.
jpnChrName: ふふ、ご丁寧にありがとうございます。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、ご丁寧にありがとうございます。

engChrName: I can attest to this shop's selection. I've come here myself on occasion.
engSearchText:
I can attest to this shop's selection. I've come here
myself on occasion.
jpnChrName: ここのお店は本当に品揃えが豊富で 私も何度か利用させてもらっていますけど……
jpnSearchText:
ここのお店は本当に品揃えが豊富で
私も何度か利用させてもらっていますけど……

engChrName: Have you ever visited this shop, Van?
engSearchText: Have you ever visited this shop, Van?
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんも立ち寄られたりするんですか？
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさんも立ち寄られたりするんですか？

engChrName: Eh, I guess. Here and there. Mostly for the accessories they stock, more than the clothes.
engSearchText:
Eh, I guess. Here and there. Mostly for the
accessories they stock, more than the clothes.
jpnChrName: ま、服に限らず小物とかも充実してるしな。 俺もたまに使わせてもらってるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、服に限らず小物とかも充実してるしな。
俺もたまに使わせてもらってるぜ。

engChrName: Heehee, I see.
engSearchText: Heehee, I see.
jpnChrName: ふふ、そうなんですね。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、そうなんですね。

engChrName: The Connections tab on your To-Do List and Notebook has been unlocked.
engSearchText:
The Connections tab on your To-Do List and
Notebook has been unlocked.
jpnChrName: ＴｏＤｏリストとノートメニューの 『コネクト』タブが開封された。
jpnSearchText:
ＴｏＤｏリストとノートメニューの
『コネクト』タブが開封された。

engChrName: Yimai said he was heading to the repair shop. I'd recommend paying it a visit if you're still looking for him.
engSearchText:
Yimai said he was heading to the repair shop.
I'd recommend paying it a visit if you're still looking
for him.
jpnChrName: イーマイさんでしたら、この後 中古修理屋に向かうと仰っていましたよ。
jpnSearchText:
イーマイさんでしたら、この後
中古修理屋に向かうと仰っていましたよ。

engChrName: That was about twenty minutes ago. You're likely to catch him if you hurry there.
engSearchText:
That was about twenty minutes ago. You're likely to
catch him if you hurry there.
jpnChrName: 数十分前の事ですし、まだそちらに いらっしゃるのではないでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
数十分前の事ですし、まだそちらに
いらっしゃるのではないでしょうか？

engChrName: (He's probably referring to the repair shop in Old Town.)
engSearchText:
(He's probably referring to the repair shop in
Old Town.)
jpnChrName: （中古修理屋といえば旧市街のあそこだな。）
jpnSearchText: （中古修理屋といえば旧市街のあそこだな。）

engChrName: (We should head there and try to catch the old geezer.)
engSearchText:
(We should head there and try to catch the
old geezer.)
jpnChrName: （爺さんがまた移動する前に   追いつけるといいんだが……）
jpnSearchText:
（爺さんがまた移動する前に
追いつけるといいんだが……）

engChrName: Everything we just talked about aside, that customer right there's been staring very intently at me this whole time.
engSearchText:
Everything we just talked about aside, that customer
right there's been staring very intently at me this
whole time.
jpnChrName: それにしてもあちらのお客様は…… ず、随分と熱心に見てくれているようで……
jpnSearchText:
それにしてもあちらのお客様は……
ず、随分と熱心に見てくれているようで……

engChrName: I'd be more than happy to give them a clothing recommendation, but all their staring has me somewhat intimidated, haha...
engSearchText:
I'd be more than happy to give them a clothing
recommendation, but all their staring has me
somewhat intimidated, haha...
jpnChrName: 本来なら私からお勧めするべきなのですが…… 流石に近寄りづらいというか……はは……
jpnSearchText:
本来なら私からお勧めするべきなのですが……
流石に近寄りづらいというか……はは……

engChrName: If there's something I can hope for, at least, is that Beth will change her way of thinking after this situation.
engSearchText:
If there's something I can hope for, at least, is that
Beth will change her way of thinking after
this situation.
jpnChrName: ベスちゃんはまあ……これを機に考え方を 改められる事に期待するとして……
jpnSearchText:
ベスちゃんはまあ……これを機に考え方を
改められる事に期待するとして……

engChrName: But for now, our focus should be survival right now. I wonder if my hubby's okay...
engSearchText:
But for now, our focus should be survival right now.
I wonder if my hubby's okay...
jpnChrName: 今は皆で生き残る事を第一に考えないと。 あたしも早く夫の安否確認しないとだし。
jpnSearchText:
今は皆で生き残る事を第一に考えないと。
あたしも早く夫の安否確認しないとだし。

engChrName: I try helping out the store as much as possible, considering I'm a regular here.
engSearchText:
I try helping out the store as much as possible,
considering I'm a regular here.
jpnChrName: まあ、常連としてお店の手伝いで出来る 範囲の事はさせてもらうとするわ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、常連としてお店の手伝いで出来る
範囲の事はさせてもらうとするわ。

engChrName: The festival this year has been so vibrant and cheery you could hardly believe what preceded us.
engSearchText:
The festival this year has been so vibrant and cheery
you could hardly believe what preceded us.
jpnChrName: 今年の記念祭も華やかねぇ、あんな事件が あった後とは思えないくらい皆明るいわ。
jpnSearchText:
今年の記念祭も華やかねぇ、あんな事件が
あった後とは思えないくらい皆明るいわ。

engChrName: Well, I got our dinner reservations done so now I can focus on our side dishes for the upcoming days.
engSearchText:
Well, I got our dinner reservations done so now I can
focus on our side dishes for the upcoming days.
jpnChrName: さて、私の方はディナーの予約もできたし、 明日以降のおかずを買わないとね。
jpnSearchText:
さて、私の方はディナーの予約もできたし、
明日以降のおかずを買わないとね。

engChrName: I imagine my husband will come home exhausted. Perfect time for me to pamper him a little!
engSearchText:
I imagine my husband will come home exhausted.
Perfect time for me to pamper him a little!
jpnChrName: 夫も疲れて帰ってくるだろうし、明日以降も それなりに労ってあげないと。
jpnSearchText:
夫も疲れて帰ってくるだろうし、明日以降も
それなりに労ってあげないと。

engChrName: As long as no horrible catastrophe falls upon us, my hubby and I will be spending the new year together!
engSearchText:
As long as no horrible catastrophe falls upon us, my
hubby and I will be spending the new year together!
jpnChrName: ふふ、予定通りなら年越しまでは 夫と過ごせそうだしねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、予定通りなら年越しまでは
夫と過ごせそうだしねぇ。

engChrName: Beth ended up deciding she'd boyfriend hunt during the Revolution Festival.
engSearchText:
Beth ended up deciding she'd boyfriend hunt during
the Revolution Festival.
jpnChrName: ちなみにベスちゃん……結局、 記念祭で男探す事にしたらしいわ。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみにベスちゃん……結局、
記念祭で男探す事にしたらしいわ。

engChrName: While I know she's desperate, I don't think she'll get anywhere by acting like this.
engSearchText:
While I know she's desperate, I don't think she'll get
anywhere by acting like this.
jpnChrName: 今更他の手が思いつかなかったのでしょうけど…… あの考え方じゃ上手くいかない気がするわ。
jpnSearchText:
今更他の手が思いつかなかったのでしょうけど……
あの考え方じゃ上手くいかない気がするわ。

engChrName: Oh, well. Make your mistakes while you're young, I'd say. All I can do is be a shoulder to cry on when it inevitably goes wrong.
engSearchText:
Oh, well. Make your mistakes while you're young,
I'd say. All I can do is be a shoulder to cry on when it
inevitably goes wrong.
jpnChrName: まあ、若いうちは失敗から学ぶものだし、せいぜい 打ちひしがれてるところで諭してあげましょ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、若いうちは失敗から学ぶものだし、せいぜい
打ちひしがれてるところで諭してあげましょ。

engChrName: *sigh* I did get the impression something was wrong with Beth, but I guess now everything's come back to bite her.
engSearchText:
*sigh* I did get the impression something was wrong
with Beth, but I guess now everything's come back to
bite her.
jpnChrName: ふう……ベスちゃん、何かおかしいとは 思っていたけど、こういう勘違いしてたのね。
jpnSearchText:
ふう……ベスちゃん、何かおかしいとは
思っていたけど、こういう勘違いしてたのね。

engChrName: Complacency's a killer. If she expects everything to fall into her lap, she'll miss out on the wonderful things she COULD be doing at the festival.
engSearchText:
Complacency's a killer. If she expects everything to
fall into her lap, she'll miss out on the wonderful
things she COULD be doing at the festival.
jpnChrName: やれやれ、こういう都合のいい考え方をしている ようでは記念祭の機会も活かせないだろうけど……
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ、こういう都合のいい考え方をしている
ようでは記念祭の機会も活かせないだろうけど……

engChrName: Though she's still young. The most I can do is keep an eye on her and hope she'll eventually come to her senses.
engSearchText:
Though she's still young. The most I can do is keep
an eye on her and hope she'll eventually come to
her senses.
jpnChrName: ま、この子もまだ若いし、考えを改められると 信じてせいぜい見守るとしようかしら。
jpnSearchText:
ま、この子もまだ若いし、考えを改められると
信じてせいぜい見守るとしようかしら。

engChrName: Phew. Thank the Goddess my husband is fine. I'm relieved to hear he'll be making it home the night of the Revolution Festival.
engSearchText:
Phew. Thank the Goddess my husband is fine.
I'm relieved to hear he'll be making it home the night
of the Revolution Festival.
jpnChrName: ふう、夫も無事なようだし、記念祭の日の夜には 帰れるらしくて安心したわ。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、夫も無事なようだし、記念祭の日の夜には
帰れるらしくて安心したわ。

engChrName: I would've preferred that he come here before then, but he's been busy with his work trip...
engSearchText:
I would've preferred that he come here before then,
but he's been busy with his work trip...
jpnChrName: 本当は記念祭の前日には帰って欲しかったけど、 流石に出張先でも立て込んでるみたいでねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
本当は記念祭の前日には帰って欲しかったけど、
流石に出張先でも立て込んでるみたいでねぇ。

engChrName: Oh, well. The evening paints itself as the perfect time to have a fancy dinner.
engSearchText:
Oh, well. The evening paints itself as the perfect time
to have a fancy dinner.
jpnChrName: ま、夜だけでも一緒に過ごせるなら、 せめて豪華なディナーでも洒落込もうかしら。
jpnSearchText:
ま、夜だけでも一緒に過ごせるなら、
せめて豪華なディナーでも洒落込もうかしら。

engChrName: Beth's been really hopeful she'll snag a guy during the Revolution Festival.
engSearchText:
Beth's been really hopeful she'll snag a guy during the
Revolution Festival.
jpnChrName: ところでベスちゃん、結局記念祭の日に オトコを探すって張り切ってるようね。
jpnSearchText:
ところでベスちゃん、結局記念祭の日に
オトコを探すって張り切ってるようね。

engChrName: Of course I can see you meeting the one at the festival—that's where I met my hubby.
engSearchText:
Of course I can see you meeting the one at the
festival—that's where I met my hubby.
jpnChrName: まあ、確かに記念祭の中で出会って、 と言う話も聞くし私もそうだったけど……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、確かに記念祭の中で出会って、
と言う話も聞くし私もそうだったけど……

engChrName: But when your mind is clouded so badly by that prospect, you'll end up missing out on the best things in life.
engSearchText:
But when your mind is clouded so badly by that
prospect, you'll end up missing out on the best things
in life.
jpnChrName: あんまり下心があると 逆にチャンス逃すような気もするけどねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
あんまり下心があると
逆にチャンス逃すような気もするけどねぇ。

engChrName: Ah... I wonder if my husband's okay? If I remember correctly, his trip was supposed to take him to Ored.
engSearchText:
Ah... I wonder if my husband's okay? If I remember
correctly, his trip was supposed to take him to Ored.
jpnChrName: お、夫は大丈夫かしら…… 確か、今の出張先はオレドだったはず……
jpnSearchText:
お、夫は大丈夫かしら……
確か、今の出張先はオレドだったはず……

engChrName: Creil is on the way there... I mean, it's not as though he was supposed to stop in Creil, but...
engSearchText:
Creil is on the way there... I mean, it's not as
though he was supposed to stop in Creil, but...
jpnChrName: と、途中にクレイユがあるけど、まさか このタイミングで立ち寄ったりは……
jpnSearchText:
と、途中にクレイユがあるけど、まさか
このタイミングで立ち寄ったりは……

engChrName: No, I'm sure he's fine... But! What if the route up to Ored is blocked now and he's stuck! Oh, oooh... I need to get in touch with him ASAP!
engSearchText:
No, I'm sure he's fine... But! What if the route up
to Ored is blocked now and he's stuck! Oh, oooh...
I need to get in touch with him ASAP!
jpnChrName: ああ、でも陸路だと足止めになっている かもしれないし……早く連絡取らないと……！
jpnSearchText:
ああ、でも陸路だと足止めになっている
かもしれないし……早く連絡取らないと……！

engChrName: Ugh. I didn't want it to sound like I was bragging about my husband, but I couldn't help just blabbing on about him.
engSearchText:
Ugh. I didn't want it to sound like I was bragging
about my husband, but I couldn't help just blabbing
on about him.
jpnChrName: うーん、惚気を語ろうと思ったつもりも別に 無かったのだけど、いつの間にかねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
うーん、惚気を語ろうと思ったつもりも別に
無かったのだけど、いつの間にかねぇ……

engChrName: Though if you ask me about my relationship with him, of course I'll talk about his virtues. It's the most important part of it all.
engSearchText:
Though if you ask me about my relationship with
him, of course I'll talk about his virtues. It's the most
important part of it all.
jpnChrName: でも、夫との関係性を語るとなると どうしても彼の人となりも重要だしねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
でも、夫との関係性を語るとなると
どうしても彼の人となりも重要だしねぇ。

engChrName: I just wish Beth understood that.
engSearchText: I just wish Beth understood that.
jpnChrName: どうもベスちゃん、その辺りを いまいちわかっていないような……
jpnSearchText:
どうもベスちゃん、その辺りを
いまいちわかっていないような……

engChrName: Beth and I have had a few teatime chats as of late. I'd say we've grown quite close since.
engSearchText:
Beth and I have had a few teatime chats as of late.
I'd say we've grown quite close since.
jpnChrName: ベスちゃんとはこの前から何度か お話したりお茶して仲良くなれてね。
jpnSearchText:
ベスちゃんとはこの前から何度か
お話したりお茶して仲良くなれてね。

engChrName: Even though she's young enough she could be my daughter, conversation's never boring. We have so much in common.
engSearchText:
Even though she's young enough she could be my
daughter, conversation's never boring. We have so
much in common.
jpnChrName: ベスちゃんは娘ほどの年だけど、趣味も合って お話する分には楽しいのよねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ベスちゃんは娘ほどの年だけど、趣味も合って
お話する分には楽しいのよねぇ。

engChrName: Though I don't think she listens to me when she asks for advice in finding a husband.
engSearchText:
Though I don't think she listens to me when she asks
for advice in finding a husband.
jpnChrName: でも……何かしら、どうにも旦那探しの 話は上手く伝わっていないような……
jpnSearchText:
でも……何かしら、どうにも旦那探しの
話は上手く伝わっていないような……

engChrName: She's not the kind of person I expected to attract the attention of while out shopping.
engSearchText:
She's not the kind of person I expected to attract the
attention of while out shopping.
jpnChrName: うーん、まさか気ままにショッピングしてたら こんな子に注目されちゃってたなんてねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
うーん、まさか気ままにショッピングしてたら
こんな子に注目されちゃってたなんてねぇ。

engChrName: But she's a great conversationalist, and her taste in fashion is impeccable!
engSearchText:
But she's a great conversationalist, and her taste in
fashion is impeccable!
jpnChrName: まあ、この子もブランドを見るセンスは良いし、 話すものも面白そうではあるわ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、この子もブランドを見るセンスは良いし、
話すものも面白そうではあるわ。

engChrName: I think we'd get along, so I'll give it a try.
engSearchText: I think we'd get along, so I'll give it a try.
jpnChrName: 気も合いそうだし、これも縁と思って 付き合ってあげようかしらねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
気も合いそうだし、これも縁と思って
付き合ってあげようかしらねぇ。

engChrName: *sigh* My hubby won't be coming home quite yet. It's been boring, not having him to talk to.
engSearchText:
*sigh* My hubby won't be coming home quite yet.
It's been boring, not having him to talk to.
jpnChrName: ふう、夫も当分帰ってこないか…… 正直、話し相手が減ると退屈でねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、夫も当分帰ってこないか……
正直、話し相手が減ると退屈でねぇ。

engChrName: I know some wives like indulging themselves in secret while their husbands are away, but I don't know.
engSearchText:
I know some wives like indulging themselves in secret
while their husbands are away, but I don't know.
jpnChrName: 世の中には夫がいない時こそ隠れて贅沢を、 なんてお嫁さんもいるらしいけれど……
jpnSearchText:
世の中には夫がいない時こそ隠れて贅沢を、
なんてお嫁さんもいるらしいけれど……

engChrName: I don't see a reason why I'd have to hide from him. He's always been so generous with me, after all. And it's not like I'm doing anything wrong.
engSearchText:
I don't see a reason why I'd have to hide from him.
He's always been so generous with me, after all.
And it's not like I'm doing anything wrong.
jpnChrName: うちの場合、夫が寛大だからそんなにコソコソ しなくていいし、別にやましい事もしてないし……
jpnSearchText:
うちの場合、夫が寛大だからそんなにコソコソ
しなくていいし、別にやましい事もしてないし……

engChrName: Though he's so sweet and kind I can imagine some sly woman trying to take advantage of him while he's away!
engSearchText:
Though he's so sweet and kind I can imagine some
sly woman trying to take advantage of him while
he's away!
jpnChrName: むしろうちの夫、人が良過ぎて出張先で 悪い女に捕まらないかの方が不安なくらいよ。
jpnSearchText:
むしろうちの夫、人が良過ぎて出張先で
悪い女に捕まらないかの方が不安なくらいよ。

engChrName: I really appreciate my husband allowing me to overextend myself a little and indulge here and there. He always notices when I do, too.
engSearchText:
I really appreciate my husband allowing me to
overextend myself a little and indulge here and there.
He always notices when I do, too.
jpnChrName: うちの夫、贅沢させてくれるのも有難いけど、 気が利くから贅沢のし甲斐もあって面白いの。
jpnSearchText:
うちの夫、贅沢させてくれるのも有難いけど、
気が利くから贅沢のし甲斐もあって面白いの。

engChrName: He'll note when I use high-quality ingredients in my food, and commends me quite often on the variety.
engSearchText:
He'll note when I use high-quality ingredients in my
food, and commends me quite often on the variety.
jpnChrName: 高級食材を料理すれば気づいてくれて 色々感想も語ってくれるし……
jpnSearchText:
高級食材を料理すれば気づいてくれて
色々感想も語ってくれるし……

engChrName: Not to mention he never fails to mention when I'm wearing designer clothes and will compliment even the smallest things.
engSearchText:
Not to mention he never fails to mention when I'm
wearing designer clothes and will compliment even
the smallest things.
jpnChrName: ブランド服で着飾った時も、結構細かいところを 褒めてくれたりしちゃうしねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ブランド服で着飾った時も、結構細かいところを
褒めてくれたりしちゃうしねぇ。

engChrName: I don't indulge for HIM to notice, but it does feel nice!
engSearchText:
I don't indulge for HIM to notice, but it does
feel nice!
jpnChrName: ま、まあ私も別に夫のためにやってる 訳じゃないけど……楽しみは多い方が良いしね！
jpnSearchText:
ま、まあ私も別に夫のためにやってる
訳じゃないけど……楽しみは多い方が良いしね！

engChrName: Hmm. Maybe I should look for something to treat my hubby with, considering he's not been home in so long.
engSearchText:
Hmm. Maybe I should look for something to treat
my hubby with, considering he's not been home in
so long.
jpnChrName: うーん、久しぶりに夫も帰ってくるし、 たまには彼の好みに合ったものも……
jpnSearchText:
うーん、久しぶりに夫も帰ってくるし、
たまには彼の好みに合ったものも……

engChrName: Since I'm already here, I'll go to the second floor and take a look at the neckties, I'm sure he'd love to have some new ones. ♪
engSearchText:
Since I'm already here, I'll go to the second floor and
take a look at the neckties, I'm sure he'd love to have
some new ones. ♪
jpnChrName: せっかくだし２Ｆでネクタイも買おうかしら、 旦那のネクタイもだいぶ使い込んでるし♪
jpnSearchText:
せっかくだし２Ｆでネクタイも買おうかしら、
旦那のネクタイもだいぶ使い込んでるし♪

engChrName: ...Not that I'm looking forward to him coming home or anything!
engSearchText:
...Not that I'm looking forward to him coming home
or anything!
jpnChrName: ……って、べ、別に旦那の帰宅を 楽しみにしてる訳じゃないのよ？
jpnSearchText:
……って、べ、別に旦那の帰宅を
楽しみにしてる訳じゃないのよ？

engChrName: But I can't have my husband leave me either. I couldn't afford this life of luxury without his money...
engSearchText:
But I can't have my husband leave me either.
I couldn't afford this life of luxury without
his money...
jpnChrName: ほら、高収入の夫に愛想尽かされたら 私も贅沢できなくなっちゃうし……
jpnSearchText:
ほら、高収入の夫に愛想尽かされたら
私も贅沢できなくなっちゃうし……

engChrName: Aaand I overspent again. Sure couldn't do that without my husband's salary.
engSearchText:
Aaand I overspent again. Sure couldn't do that
without my husband's salary.
jpnChrName: ふう、今日も贅沢しちゃった…… やっぱり旦那の収入は大切よねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、今日も贅沢しちゃった……
やっぱり旦那の収入は大切よねぇ。

engChrName: My life would be a whole lot different if I'd chosen a different man. Instead, I bagged myself a rising star in a top-tier firm!
engSearchText:
My life would be a whole lot different if I'd chosen a
different man. Instead, I bagged myself a rising star in
a top-tier firm!
jpnChrName: 一流商社の出世株と結婚しなきゃ、 あたしもこんな思い出来なかったのかも。
jpnSearchText:
一流商社の出世株と結婚しなきゃ、
あたしもこんな思い出来なかったのかも。

engChrName: I should be grateful for his generosity!
engSearchText: I should be grateful for his generosity!
jpnChrName: でもまあ、うちの旦那は懐の深さにも 感謝せざるを得ないわよねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
でもまあ、うちの旦那は懐の深さにも
感謝せざるを得ないわよねぇ。

engChrName: There's always a bit of everything in this department store.
engSearchText:
There's always a bit of everything in this
department store.
jpnChrName: ここの百貨店は昔から本当に 品ぞろえが良いのよね。
jpnSearchText:
ここの百貨店は昔から本当に
品ぞろえが良いのよね。

engChrName: Not just everyday consumables, but a wide range of luxury goods, too.
engSearchText:
Not just everyday consumables, but a wide range of
luxury goods, too.
jpnChrName: 高級品も、日々の消耗品も何でも 揃っちゃって……
jpnSearchText:
高級品も、日々の消耗品も何でも
揃っちゃって……

engChrName: And with how kind both staff and management are, a whole day goes by in the blink of an eye!
engSearchText:
And with how kind both staff and management are, a
whole day goes by in the blink of an eye!
jpnChrName: それでいて店員さんや支配人さんも気が利いてるから ついつい長居しちゃうのよねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
それでいて店員さんや支配人さんも気が利いてるから
ついつい長居しちゃうのよねぇ。

engChrName: Now, after my hard work sorting out all side dishes for the next few days, I think I'll reward myself with some afternoon tea. It's been a while.
engSearchText:
Now, after my hard work sorting out all side dishes
for the next few days, I think I'll reward myself with
some afternoon tea. It's been a while.
jpnChrName: さて、向こう数日のおかずは買ったし…… 久しぶりにアフタヌーンティーといこうかしら。
jpnSearchText:
さて、向こう数日のおかずは買ったし……
久しぶりにアフタヌーンティーといこうかしら。

engChrName: No afternoon tea is complete without Quincy Bell cookies.
engSearchText:
No afternoon tea is complete without Quincy
Bell cookies.
jpnChrName: やっぱりお洒落なアフタヌーンティーには クインシー・ベルのクッキーよねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
やっぱりお洒落なアフタヌーンティーには
クインシー・ベルのクッキーよねぇ。

engChrName: How convenient is it that this department store also stocks Quincy sweets! Now, what to pick, what to pick? ♪
engSearchText:
How convenient is it that this department store also
stocks Quincy sweets! Now, what to pick, what
to pick? ♪
jpnChrName: この百貨店はクインシー社のお菓子も あるから迷うのよねぇ♪
jpnSearchText:
この百貨店はクインシー社のお菓子も
あるから迷うのよねぇ♪

engChrName: Tips for finding a rich husband? I...don't think I can give you tips on that...
engSearchText:
Tips for finding a rich husband? I...don't think I can
give you tips on that...
jpnChrName: 高収入の夫を見つけるコツ？ そうねぇ、コツというほどの物は無いけど……
jpnSearchText:
高収入の夫を見つけるコツ？
そうねぇ、コツというほどの物は無いけど……

engChrName: Pleasepleaseplease, Marguerite! I crave a life of comfort and luxury just like yours!
engSearchText:
Pleasepleaseplease, Marguerite! I crave a life of
comfort and luxury just like yours!
jpnChrName: マルグリットさん、是非教えてください！ あたしも、プチセレブ的な生活、したいんです！
jpnSearchText:
マルグリットさん、是非教えてください！
あたしも、プチセレブ的な生活、したいんです！

engChrName: All I need is a good and dependable husband with a juicy salary.
engSearchText:
All I need is a good and dependable husband with a
juicy salary.
jpnChrName: 収入と甲斐性のある旦那さんさえ見つければ きっとあたしでも……
jpnSearchText:
収入と甲斐性のある旦那さんさえ見つければ
きっとあたしでも……

engChrName: Yes, I get that part...
engSearchText: Yes, I get that part...
jpnChrName: ま、まあ気持ちはわかるわ……
jpnSearchText: ま、まあ気持ちはわかるわ……

engChrName: ...Maybe let's start easy. How about I tell you how I met my husband?
engSearchText:
...Maybe let's start easy. How about I tell you how
I met my husband?
jpnChrName: それなら一応、私と夫との馴れ初めについて 詳しく教えてあげようかしら……
jpnSearchText:
それなら一応、私と夫との馴れ初めについて
詳しく教えてあげようかしら……

engChrName: You'd think my husband's good nature and kindness would make him gullible, but you'd be surprised.
engSearchText:
You'd think my husband's good nature and kindness
would make him gullible, but you'd be surprised.
jpnChrName: それでねぇ、うちの旦那はお人好しで 騙されそうには見えるのだけど……
jpnSearchText:
それでねぇ、うちの旦那はお人好しで
騙されそうには見えるのだけど……

engChrName: I learned while on our honeymoon just how dependable and reliable he can really be.
engSearchText:
I learned while on our honeymoon just how
dependable and reliable he can really be.
jpnChrName: 新婚旅行に行った時は何気に頼もしい 面も見せてくれてねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
新婚旅行に行った時は何気に頼もしい
面も見せてくれてねぇ……

engChrName: It's not just about how deep his pockets are at the end of the day.
engSearchText:
It's not just about how deep his pockets are at the end
of the day.
jpnChrName: ほんと、収入と懐の深さだけじゃないのよね、 何やかんや言って……
jpnSearchText:
ほんと、収入と懐の深さだけじゃないのよね、
何やかんや言って……

engChrName: Umm, Marguerite? You got...kinda sappy all of a sudden.
engSearchText:
Umm, Marguerite? You got...kinda sappy all of
a sudden.
jpnChrName: あの～マルグリットさん……？ いつの間にか、惚気話になってる気が……
jpnSearchText:
あの～マルグリットさん……？
いつの間にか、惚気話になってる気が……

engChrName: What happened to talking about how to bag a rich husband?
engSearchText:
What happened to talking about how to bag a
rich husband?
jpnChrName: 高収入のオトコと出会う機会と ハートを掴む方法のお話はどこに？
jpnSearchText:
高収入のオトコと出会う機会と
ハートを掴む方法のお話はどこに？

engChrName: O-Oh, sorry. I got carried away there...
engSearchText: O-Oh, sorry. I got carried away there...
jpnChrName: え……？　ああ、いけないいけない。 ついつい話がそれてしまったかしら？
jpnSearchText:
え……？　ああ、いけないいけない。
ついつい話がそれてしまったかしら？

engChrName: Right, right. I was talking about how I met my husband. It was during the Revolution Festival...
engSearchText:
Right, right. I was talking about how I met
my husband. It was during the Revolution Festival...
jpnChrName: え、ええと……そうそう、私が夫と出会ったのは 記念祭の時のパーティーの中で──
jpnSearchText:
え、ええと……そうそう、私が夫と出会ったのは
記念祭の時のパーティーの中で──

engChrName: (Marguerite's very different than what I thought she'd be. Her stories are still interesting, don't get me wrong! Just...different.)
engSearchText:
(Marguerite's very different than what I thought
she'd be. Her stories are still interesting, don't get
me wrong! Just...different.)
jpnChrName: （マルグリットさん……参考になる話も多いけど、   少し思っていたのと違うような……）
jpnSearchText:
（マルグリットさん……参考になる話も多いけど、
少し思っていたのと違うような……）

engChrName: My husband said he'd be home late tonight, but he sent me just the sweetest letter, and—
engSearchText:
My husband said he'd be home late tonight, but he
sent me just the sweetest letter, and—
jpnChrName: それでね、うちの旦那は帰りは遅れてしまうけど、 くれた手紙がまた気の利いた内容で──
jpnSearchText:
それでね、うちの旦那は帰りは遅れてしまうけど、
くれた手紙がまた気の利いた内容で──

engChrName: Hey, Marguerite, I got this vibe from you earlier, but I was wondering...
engSearchText:
Hey, Marguerite, I got this vibe from you earlier, but
I was wondering...
jpnChrName: マルグリットさん……もしかして、前にも 思ったんですけど……
jpnSearchText:
マルグリットさん……もしかして、前にも
思ったんですけど……

engChrName: You don't actually...LIKE your husband, do you?
engSearchText: You don't actually...LIKE your husband, do you?
jpnChrName: フツーに旦那さんの事、お好きなんですか？
jpnSearchText: フツーに旦那さんの事、お好きなんですか？

engChrName: H-Huh? What kind of question is that?!
engSearchText: H-Huh? What kind of question is that?!
jpnChrName: え、ええ……って、わざわざ言わせないでよ 恥ずかしいわね！
jpnSearchText:
え、ええ……って、わざわざ言わせないでよ
恥ずかしいわね！

engChrName: Is it that hard to imagine I'd love my husband for his thoughtfulness and kindness, and not just for his deep pockets?
engSearchText:
Is it that hard to imagine I'd love my husband for his
thoughtfulness and kindness, and not just for his
deep pockets?
jpnChrName: そりゃあ、あんな気が利いて懐の深い人、 収入に関係無く好きでもおかしくないでしょ！？
jpnSearchText:
そりゃあ、あんな気が利いて懐の深い人、
収入に関係無く好きでもおかしくないでしょ！？

engChrName: B-But here I thought you were totally a gold digger! That you were only in it with him because he's crazy rich!
engSearchText:
B-But here I thought you were totally a gold digger!
That you were only in it with him because he's
crazy rich!
jpnChrName: えぇ～！　て、てっきりマルグリットさんも旦那の 収入目当てで捕まえたクチだと思ってたのに！
jpnSearchText:
えぇ～！　て、てっきりマルグリットさんも旦那の
収入目当てで捕まえたクチだと思ってたのに！

engChrName: Well, that explains why listening to you talk about your relationship wasn't, like, clicking at ALL.
engSearchText:
Well, that explains why listening to you talk about
your relationship wasn't, like, clicking at ALL.
jpnChrName: はぁ……どうりであたしの目指してるものと 違うなって気がしていた訳ね……
jpnSearchText:
はぁ……どうりであたしの目指してるものと
違うなって気がしていた訳ね……

engChrName: You're being awfully rude, Beth.
engSearchText: You're being awfully rude, Beth.
jpnChrName: ベスちゃん……あなた、結構失礼な事を 言っているんだけど自覚あるかしら？
jpnSearchText:
ベスちゃん……あなた、結構失礼な事を
言っているんだけど自覚あるかしら？

engChrName: I'm not exactly thrilled to hear that that's what you thought of me...
engSearchText:
I'm not exactly thrilled to hear that that's what you
thought of me...
jpnChrName: 私の事をそんな世に聞くような悪妻だと 思っていたのも複雑な気分だけど……
jpnSearchText:
私の事をそんな世に聞くような悪妻だと
思っていたのも複雑な気分だけど……

engChrName: But that aside, do you really think that any relationship you ever involve yourself in will work out with that attitude of yours?
engSearchText:
But that aside, do you really think that any
relationship you ever involve yourself in will work out
with that attitude of yours?
jpnChrName: それ以前に、高収入の旦那さんを探すにしても そんな心持で本当に上手くいくとでも？
jpnSearchText:
それ以前に、高収入の旦那さんを探すにしても
そんな心持で本当に上手くいくとでも？

engChrName: I-I'm sorry?
engSearchText: I-I'm sorry?
jpnChrName: ま、マルグリットさん……？
jpnSearchText: ま、マルグリットさん……？

engChrName: Maybe I'm being a tad too blunt, but the way you're acting shows absolutely no respect for your prospective partner at all.
engSearchText:
Maybe I'm being a tad too blunt, but the way you're
acting shows absolutely no respect for your
prospective partner at all.
jpnChrName: あのねぇ、そうやって少しも相手を尊重 できないようじゃね……
jpnSearchText:
あのねぇ、そうやって少しも相手を尊重
できないようじゃね……

engChrName: No man, rich or not, will want a lasting relationship with you when you treat them that way.
engSearchText:
No man, rich or not, will want a lasting relationship
with you when you treat them that way.
jpnChrName: 運よく高収入の旦那を見つけても、 絶対に長続きしないわよ、覚えておきなさい。
jpnSearchText:
運よく高収入の旦那を見つけても、
絶対に長続きしないわよ、覚えておきなさい。

engChrName: Except for some lowlife looking to take advantage of YOU, instead.
engSearchText:
Except for some lowlife looking to take advantage of
YOU, instead.
jpnChrName: そもそも、そんな下心丸出しで近づいて 騙されるような程度の男は──
jpnSearchText:
そもそも、そんな下心丸出しで近づいて
騙されるような程度の男は──

engChrName: N-No! But gold digging is my life's mission! What else am I supposed to do?!
engSearchText:
N-No! But gold digging is my life's mission!
What else am I supposed to do?!
jpnChrName: そ、そんなぁ……あたしの 玉の輿ドリームがまた振り出しに……！
jpnSearchText:
そ、そんなぁ……あたしの
玉の輿ドリームがまた振り出しに……！

engChrName: Ugh... It's bad enough that I can't get any quality men to pay any attention to me...
engSearchText:
Ugh... It's bad enough that I can't get any quality men
to pay any attention to me...
jpnChrName: うう……ゼンゼン優良物件のオトコに振り向いて もらえないだけでもついてないのに……
jpnSearchText:
うう……ゼンゼン優良物件のオトコに振り向いて
もらえないだけでもついてないのに……

engChrName: Why is my life such a struggle? And my Revolution Festival plans went down the drain... Just my luck. *sniffle*
engSearchText:
Why is my life such a struggle? And my Revolution
Festival plans went down the drain... Just my luck.
*sniffle*
jpnChrName: どうしてこんな……あ、あたしの 記念祭がァ……ついてないわ……シクシク。
jpnSearchText:
どうしてこんな……あ、あたしの
記念祭がァ……ついてないわ……シクシク。

engChrName: Might be a good chance for you to take a lesson to heart. The world doesn't work like that.
engSearchText:
Might be a good chance for you to take a lesson
to heart. The world doesn't work like that.
jpnChrName: まあ、それに関しては今回の失敗から学ぶと良いわ。 世の中、そう上手くいくものじゃないから。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、それに関しては今回の失敗から学ぶと良いわ。
世の中、そう上手くいくものじゃないから。

engChrName: Everyone's priorities lie elsewhere right now, and, honestly, so should yours. We'll talk more about it once things have settled.
engSearchText:
Everyone's priorities lie elsewhere right now, and,
honestly, so should yours. We'll talk more about it
once things have settled.
jpnChrName: それより、今はこの状況を皆で生き残る事を 考えましょ、落ち着いたらまた話してあげるから。
jpnSearchText:
それより、今はこの状況を皆で生き残る事を
考えましょ、落ち着いたらまた話してあげるから。

engChrName: B-But Marguerite...
engSearchText: B-But Marguerite...
jpnChrName: ま、マルグリットさぁん……
jpnSearchText: ま、マルグリットさぁん……

engChrName: Your attitude might not be the only thing that needs some fixing. You've got to do something about your face, dear.
engSearchText:
Your attitude might not be the only thing that needs
some fixing. You've got to do something about your
face, dear.
jpnChrName: あと……考え方改めるにしても、その化粧は どう考えてもナシだと思うからね？
jpnSearchText:
あと……考え方改めるにしても、その化粧は
どう考えてもナシだと思うからね？

engChrName: You look more like a disco ball than a woman with that much glitter on you. No decent man will approach you when your face looks like a headlight.
engSearchText:
You look more like a disco ball than a woman with
that much glitter on you. No decent man will
approach you when your face looks like a headlight.
jpnChrName: 正直、水商売の人でもそんなミラーボールみたいな 顔にはしないでしょ……男の人も敬遠するわ。
jpnSearchText:
正直、水商売の人でもそんなミラーボールみたいな
顔にはしないでしょ……男の人も敬遠するわ。

engChrName: M-Marguerite, thank you. You always help me out, even at a time like this.
engSearchText:
M-Marguerite, thank you. You always help me out,
even at a time like this.
jpnChrName: こんな……こんな時でもマルグリットさん、 あたしに優しくしてくれて……
jpnSearchText:
こんな……こんな時でもマルグリットさん、
あたしに優しくしてくれて……

engChrName: I-It's because you're so kind that you get to live a happy life with a rich husband...
engSearchText:
I-It's because you're so kind that you get to live a
happy life with a rich husband...
jpnChrName: そりゃあ……高収入の旦那さんと 円満にやっていけるわけだわ……
jpnSearchText:
そりゃあ……高収入の旦那さんと
円満にやっていけるわけだわ……

engChrName: Meanwhile, I'm... I'm...
engSearchText: Meanwhile, I'm... I'm...
jpnChrName: それなのに、あたしは……
jpnSearchText: それなのに、あたしは……

engChrName: Why don't you start by wiping away those tears? And you may as well wash off your makeup at the same time. Two birds with one stone!
engSearchText:
Why don't you start by wiping away those tears?
And you may as well wash off your makeup at the
same time. Two birds with one stone!
jpnChrName: ……とりあえず涙と一緒に 化粧落として来たら……？
jpnSearchText:
……とりあえず涙と一緒に
化粧落として来たら……？

engChrName: Heehee. I didn't get that many new clothes, but I definitely went all out with makeup!
engSearchText:
Heehee. I didn't get that many new clothes, but I
definitely went all out with makeup!
jpnChrName: ウフフ、服はあまり買えなかったけど お化粧は張り切って来ちゃった！
jpnSearchText:
ウフフ、服はあまり買えなかったけど
お化粧は張り切って来ちゃった！

engChrName: I'm going to look much more sparkly than usual! People won't be able to tear their eyes away with these party vibes I'm giving off!
engSearchText:
I'm going to look much more sparkly than usual!
People won't be able to tear their eyes away with
these party vibes I'm giving off!
jpnChrName: いつもより特にラメ多め！ 華やかな雰囲気で目立てるわ、きっと！
jpnSearchText:
いつもより特にラメ多め！
華やかな雰囲気で目立てるわ、きっと！

engChrName: If an eager rich businessman approaches me, I'm so NOT letting him slip from my grasp!
engSearchText:
If an eager rich businessman approaches me, I'm so
NOT letting him slip from my grasp!
jpnChrName: ウフフ、浮かれてる高収入の優良物件が 喰いついてきたら逃がさないわ！
jpnSearchText:
ウフフ、浮かれてる高収入の優良物件が
喰いついてきたら逃がさないわ！

engChrName: I should be able to make use of some of the advice Marguerite gave me!
engSearchText:
I should be able to make use of some of the advice
Marguerite gave me!
jpnChrName: 一応、マルグリットさんの言う事も 多少は参考に出来るだろうしね！
jpnSearchText:
一応、マルグリットさんの言う事も
多少は参考に出来るだろうしね！

engChrName: Like how elite men go weak at the knees for women who they think 'get' them.
engSearchText:
Like how elite men go weak at the knees for women
who they think 'get' them.
jpnChrName: 例えば、エリート男は自分を理解して くれそうな女性に弱い、とかいうの！
jpnSearchText:
例えば、エリート男は自分を理解して
くれそうな女性に弱い、とかいうの！

engChrName: Screw accessorizing. Makeup is where I'm bringing my A-game!
engSearchText:
Screw accessorizing. Makeup is where I'm bringing
my A-game!
jpnChrName: ウフフ、ちょっとアクセサリーを盛ったのも あるけど、お化粧には特に気合い入れたわ！
jpnSearchText:
ウフフ、ちょっとアクセサリーを盛ったのも
あるけど、お化粧には特に気合い入れたわ！

engChrName: Men can't help but be drawn to shiny things! The shinier, the better! I'll be a man magnet today!
engSearchText:
Men can't help but be drawn to shiny things!
The shinier, the better! I'll be a man magnet today!
jpnChrName: やっぱり、こういう雰囲気なら オトコも煌びやかなモノに寄ってくるでしょ！
jpnSearchText:
やっぱり、こういう雰囲気なら
オトコも煌びやかなモノに寄ってくるでしょ！

engChrName: Ugh. Here I thought Marguerite and I were kindred spirits.
engSearchText:
Ugh. Here I thought Marguerite and I were
kindred spirits.
jpnChrName: が～ん……てっきりマルグリットさんも あたしと同じクチだと思ってたのに……
jpnSearchText:
が～ん……てっきりマルグリットさんも
あたしと同じクチだと思ってたのに……

engChrName: But whatever! Who cares about what she says?! The Revolution Festival is just around the corner! This will be my big chance!
engSearchText:
But whatever! Who cares about what she says?!
The Revolution Festival is just around the corner!
This will be my big chance!
jpnChrName: で、でもマルグリットさんがどう言おうと、 チャンスの記念祭はすぐそこ……
jpnSearchText:
で、でもマルグリットさんがどう言おうと、
チャンスの記念祭はすぐそこ……

engChrName: This is it! The final battle! I gotta keep going!
engSearchText: This is it! The final battle! I gotta keep going!
jpnChrName: あ、後には退けないじゃないの！
jpnSearchText: あ、後には退けないじゃないの！

engChrName: The Revolution Festival is finally here! The day when all the capital's best catches have their guard down!
engSearchText:
The Revolution Festival is finally here! The day when
all the capital's best catches have their guard down!
jpnChrName: もうすぐ記念祭！　エリートのオトコも 浮かれて隙を見せる日！
jpnSearchText:
もうすぐ記念祭！　エリートのオトコも
浮かれて隙を見せる日！

engChrName: There's no way that I'm going to miss this opportunity to find myself a loaded husband!
engSearchText:
There's no way that I'm going to miss this
opportunity to find myself a loaded husband!
jpnChrName: 高収入の旦那を見つけるにはこの機を逃す 訳にはいかないわ！
jpnSearchText:
高収入の旦那を見つけるにはこの機を逃す
訳にはいかないわ！
