engChrName: I dolled up as best as my budget allowed. Watch out, 'cause today I'm on the hunt, and my prey is a good, stable husband with deep pockets!
engSearchText:
I dolled up as best as my budget allowed. Watch out,
'cause today I'm on the hunt, and my prey is a good,
stable husband with deep pockets!
jpnChrName: 今のお財布が許す範囲でおめかしして 優良物件のオトコを……！
jpnSearchText:
今のお財布が許す範囲でおめかしして
優良物件のオトコを……！

engChrName: Marguerite was really worried over her husband.
engSearchText: Marguerite was really worried over her husband.
jpnChrName: マルグリットさん……あんなに 旦那さんを心配して……
jpnSearchText:
マルグリットさん……あんなに
旦那さんを心配して……

engChrName: I feel like I totally read her wrong.
engSearchText: I feel like I totally read her wrong.
jpnChrName: もしかして……あたしの認識、 色々と間違っていたのかしら……
jpnSearchText:
もしかして……あたしの認識、
色々と間違っていたのかしら……

engChrName: (I already heard everything she could share about a happy and healthy marriage. And there's nothing healthier in a marriage than a healthy wallet!)
engSearchText:
(I already heard everything she could share about a
happy and healthy marriage. And there's nothing
healthier in a marriage than a healthy wallet!)
jpnChrName: （うーん、旦那さんとの円満の秘訣とか   高収入以外の長所はもうわかったから……）
jpnSearchText:
（うーん、旦那さんとの円満の秘訣とか
高収入以外の長所はもうわかったから……）

engChrName: (Next step is to ask her how to pounce! The final frontier of netting myself a rich husband of my own!)
engSearchText:
(Next step is to ask her how to pounce! The final
frontier of netting myself a rich husband of my own!)
jpnChrName: （そういうオトコを捕まえてモノにする方法！   実用的な話を聞きたいのよ、そろそろ！）
jpnSearchText:
（そういうオトコを捕まえてモノにする方法！
実用的な話を聞きたいのよ、そろそろ！）

engChrName: Huh? Did Marguerite go home already?
engSearchText: Huh? Did Marguerite go home already?
jpnChrName: あれ、マルグリットさん今日はもう 帰っちゃったのかしら……
jpnSearchText:
あれ、マルグリットさん今日はもう
帰っちゃったのかしら……

engChrName: Here I was hoping to ask her for some more hot tips on finding a hot man with an even hotter bank account.
engSearchText:
Here I was hoping to ask her for some more hot tips
on finding a hot man with an even hotter
bank account.
jpnChrName: うーん、高収入の旦那をゲットする秘訣、 今日も聞きたかったけど……
jpnSearchText:
うーん、高収入の旦那をゲットする秘訣、
今日も聞きたかったけど……

engChrName: Oh, well. I see her here at the department store all the time, so it's not like I can't ask next time.
engSearchText:
Oh, well. I see her here at the department store all
the time, so it's not like I can't ask next time.
jpnChrName: まあ良いわ、同じ百貨店の常連同士、 いくらでも機会はあるもん。
jpnSearchText:
まあ良いわ、同じ百貨店の常連同士、
いくらでも機会はあるもん。

engChrName: According to Marguerite, looking good is the first step to netting yourself a wealthy man!
engSearchText:
According to Marguerite, looking good is the first
step to netting yourself a wealthy man!
jpnChrName: マルグリットさんが言うには、やっぱり高収入の オトコと出会うには身だしなみも大事らしいわ！
jpnSearchText:
マルグリットさんが言うには、やっぱり高収入の
オトコと出会うには身だしなみも大事らしいわ！

engChrName: It's vital that they view you as a suitable match, or something like that...
engSearchText:
It's vital that they view you as a suitable match, or
something like that...
jpnChrName: こう、相手に自分と釣り合う女性だと 思われるのが肝要だとか何とかで……
jpnSearchText:
こう、相手に自分と釣り合う女性だと
思われるのが肝要だとか何とかで……

engChrName: It'll be a little tough on my wallet, but let's see it as an investment in my future! Once I get married, I won't have to worry about my spending!
engSearchText:
It'll be a little tough on my wallet, but let's see it as an
investment in my future! Once I get married, I won't
have to worry about my spending!
jpnChrName: お財布的に辛いけど、ゲットしちゃえばその後は 散財し放題だし、先行投資ってやつよね～。
jpnSearchText:
お財布的に辛いけど、ゲットしちゃえばその後は
散財し放題だし、先行投資ってやつよね～。

engChrName: Aww, man. I wonder what Marguerite did to snag herself a husband that wealthy?
engSearchText:
Aww, man. I wonder what Marguerite did to snag
herself a husband that wealthy?
jpnChrName: ぐふふ……マルグリットさんがどうやって 高収入の旦那さんをゲットしたのか……
jpnSearchText:
ぐふふ……マルグリットさんがどうやって
高収入の旦那さんをゲットしたのか……

engChrName: Once I find out, I'm sure I'll get to live in the lap of luxury too!
engSearchText:
Once I find out, I'm sure I'll get to live in the lap of
luxury too!
jpnChrName: これを押さえて、あたしもきっと プチ玉の輿を実現してみせるわよ～！
jpnSearchText:
これを押さえて、あたしもきっと
プチ玉の輿を実現してみせるわよ～！

engChrName: Now that I think about it, I heard that old lady I see here all the time has a really loaded husband.
engSearchText:
Now that I think about it, I heard that old lady I see
here all the time has a really loaded husband.
jpnChrName: そういえば、たまに見かける常連のおばさん…… 旦那さんがそれなりに高収入らしいわね。
jpnSearchText:
そういえば、たまに見かける常連のおばさん……
旦那さんがそれなりに高収入らしいわね。

engChrName: Maybe she's willing to share her knowledge with me?!
engSearchText: Maybe she's willing to share her knowledge with me?!
jpnChrName: それなら、そういう高収入のオトコを モノにするテクとか知ってたりしないかしら！？
jpnSearchText:
それなら、そういう高収入のオトコを
モノにするテクとか知ってたりしないかしら！？

engChrName: That way I can also get married to a rich man!
engSearchText: That way I can also get married to a rich man!
jpnChrName: あたしも、高収入の旦那さえいれば……！
jpnSearchText: あたしも、高収入の旦那さえいれば……！

engChrName: They got new bags and cardigans in stock.
engSearchText: They got new bags and cardigans in stock.
jpnChrName: 来てみたらまた新しいモデルの カーディガンとバッグが出てる……
jpnSearchText:
来てみたらまた新しいモデルの
カーディガンとバッグが出てる……

engChrName: But, ugh... My part-time wages can only cover one of them. Or two...
engSearchText:
But, ugh... My part-time wages can only cover one
of them. Or two...
jpnChrName: うー……私のバイト代だと、買えても どれか一つか二つ……
jpnSearchText:
うー……私のバイト代だと、買えても
どれか一つか二つ……

engChrName: New items keep coming out and I barely have the money to buy any of them. It's so frustrating...
engSearchText:
New items keep coming out and I barely have the
money to buy any of them. It's so frustrating...
jpnChrName: そうそう買えないのに新作が次々出てくるの…… 本当にもどかしいわよね……
jpnSearchText:
そうそう買えないのに新作が次々出てくるの……
本当にもどかしいわよね……

engChrName: Someone pinch me! There's no way those are Pintilie bags! Man, I'm gonna drool...
engSearchText:
Someone pinch me! There's no way those are
Pintilie bags! Man, I'm gonna drool...
jpnChrName: じゅ、じゅるり……《ピンティリエ》の 最新レギンス……そそられるわぁ……
jpnSearchText:
じゅ、じゅるり……《ピンティリエ》の
最新レギンス……そそられるわぁ……

engChrName: Wait, I AM drooling! The heck... At least it didn't get on anything.
engSearchText:
Wait, I AM drooling! The heck... At least it didn't
get on anything.
jpnChrName: おっと、本当に涎が……かかって しまっていたら危なかったわね……
jpnSearchText:
おっと、本当に涎が……かかって
しまっていたら危なかったわね……

engChrName: And those shoes are to die for... Man, I need to hurry up and find a husband that'll just hand me a big wad of mira and tell me to go nuts.
engSearchText:
And those shoes are to die for... Man, I need to hurry
up and find a husband that'll just hand me a big wad
of mira and tell me to go nuts.
jpnChrName: あっちにも良さげな靴が……早く 大人買いさせてくれる旦那さん見つけないと……
jpnSearchText:
あっちにも良さげな靴が……早く
大人買いさせてくれる旦那さん見つけないと……

engChrName: Thank you for helping get things under control in this district.
engSearchText:
Thank you for helping get things under control in
this district.
jpnChrName: この地区の鎮静化にご協力いただき ありがとうございます。
jpnSearchText:
この地区の鎮静化にご協力いただき
ありがとうございます。

engChrName: We'll continue to stand by and protect the nearby residence.
engSearchText:
We'll continue to stand by and protect the
nearby residence.
jpnChrName: 我々は引き続き、近隣住民の保護と 事態打開のためのオペレーションを実行します。
jpnSearchText:
我々は引き続き、近隣住民の保護と
事態打開のためのオペレーションを実行します。

engChrName: We're a little short on people, so we need to be smart about this.
engSearchText:
We're a little short on people, so we need to be smart
about this.
jpnChrName: とはいえ手数も限られていますし、 効率よく動く必要がありそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ手数も限られていますし、
効率よく動く必要がありそうですね。

engChrName: This department store will be our temporary base. We can both protect everyone and gather information while we're here.
engSearchText:
This department store will be our temporary base.
We can both protect everyone and gather information
while we're here.
jpnChrName: 我々はこの百貨店を臨時拠点とし、 近隣住民の保護と状況の分析を行っています。
jpnSearchText:
我々はこの百貨店を臨時拠点とし、
近隣住民の保護と状況の分析を行っています。

engChrName: Now that Mr. Thorndyke is back, a defense regime is also being assembled.
engSearchText:
Now that Mr. Thorndyke is back, a defense regime is
also being assembled.
jpnChrName: ソーンダイクＧＭもお戻りになりましたし、 防衛体制は整いつつありますよ。
jpnSearchText:
ソーンダイクＧＭもお戻りになりましたし、
防衛体制は整いつつありますよ。

engChrName: That aside... How exactly are we supposed to get rid of the source of the problem here?
engSearchText:
That aside... How exactly are we supposed to get rid
of the source of the problem here?
jpnChrName: とはいえ、“元凶”を絶つには どうしたものか……
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ、“元凶”を絶つには
どうしたものか……

engChrName: Let me thank you all on behalf of all employees here.
engSearchText: Let me thank you all on behalf of all employees here.
jpnChrName: 皆さん、ありがとうございます…… お店の一員として改めて……
jpnSearchText:
皆さん、ありがとうございます……
お店の一員として改めて……

engChrName: Ilhan and Carlo said the whole store will offer our support to you and everyone else out there.
engSearchText:
Ilhan and Carlo said the whole store will offer our
support to you and everyone else out there.
jpnChrName: イルハンさんや店長も、皆さんやこの状況に 立ち向かう人達を店を挙げて応援するとの事です。
jpnSearchText:
イルハンさんや店長も、皆さんやこの状況に
立ち向かう人達を店を挙げて応援するとの事です。

engChrName: My part will be relatively small when compared to the two of them, but I plan on helping regardless.
engSearchText:
My part will be relatively small when compared to the
two of them, but I plan on helping regardless.
jpnChrName: お二人に比べたら出来る事の少ない私ですが…… それでも、力になるつもりです！
jpnSearchText:
お二人に比べたら出来る事の少ない私ですが……
それでも、力になるつもりです！

engChrName: Let me know if you need anything!
engSearchText: Let me know if you need anything!
jpnChrName: 必要な事があれば、お声かけ下さい！
jpnSearchText: 必要な事があれば、お声かけ下さい！

engChrName: Oh! I-I'm so glad you're not hurt...!
engSearchText: Oh! I-I'm so glad you're not hurt...!
jpnChrName: あ……み、皆さん無事でよかったです……！
jpnSearchText: あ……み、皆さん無事でよかったです……！

engChrName: Even being able to walk outside is impressive enough, things being what they are right now.
engSearchText:
Even being able to walk outside is impressive enough,
things being what they are right now.
jpnChrName: この状況で外を歩いてこられるだなんて 驚きですよ……
jpnSearchText:
この状況で外を歩いてこられるだなんて
驚きですよ……

engChrName: Ilhan and Carlo are helping out Professor Cronkite in the meantime.
engSearchText:
Ilhan and Carlo are helping out Professor Cronkite in
the meantime.
jpnChrName: ……当店では、クロンカイト教授をイルハンさんや 店長がサポートしようとしている状況でして……
jpnSearchText:
……当店では、クロンカイト教授をイルハンさんや
店長がサポートしようとしている状況でして……

engChrName: It's admirable that they're trying to lend their aid, even at a time like this.
engSearchText:
It's admirable that they're trying to lend their aid,
even at a time like this.
jpnChrName: こんな事になっても適切にすべき事を見出せる お二人には……改めて敬服です。
jpnSearchText:
こんな事になっても適切にすべき事を見出せる
お二人には……改めて敬服です。

engChrName: I do wonder if this is only happening in the capital...
engSearchText: I do wonder if this is only happening in the capital...
jpnChrName: それにしても、この異変は首都だけで 済んでいるのでしょうか……？
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、この異変は首都だけで
済んでいるのでしょうか……？

engChrName: I worry about my family in Anchorville. I don't know what I'd do if something were to happen to them...
engSearchText:
I worry about my family in Anchorville. I don't know
what I'd do if something were to happen to them...
jpnChrName: もし、アンカーヴィルの実家にも 何かあったら私は……
jpnSearchText:
もし、アンカーヴィルの実家にも
何かあったら私は……

engChrName: My grandmother's condition has improved so much that even her doctor is impressed. She was able to watch the Revolution Festival broadcast remotely.
engSearchText:
My grandmother's condition has improved so much
that even her doctor is impressed. She was able to
watch the Revolution Festival broadcast remotely.
jpnChrName: お祖母ちゃん、お医者さんも驚くほど良くなった みたいで、記念祭も中継を見ているらしいです。
jpnSearchText:
お祖母ちゃん、お医者さんも驚くほど良くなった
みたいで、記念祭も中継を見ているらしいです。

engChrName: Her face brightened a lot after she saw me.
engSearchText: Her face brightened a lot after she saw me.
jpnChrName: お祖母ちゃんは孫の顔を見れたお陰で 元気になったって言ってるらしいですけど……
jpnSearchText:
お祖母ちゃんは孫の顔を見れたお陰で
元気になったって言ってるらしいですけど……

engChrName: She was so happy to see me get this far. And it wouldn't have happened without everyone who's supported me.
engSearchText:
She was so happy to see me get this far. And it
wouldn't have happened without everyone who's
supported me.
jpnChrName: ふふ、でしたら私を送り届けてくれた 皆さんのお陰でもありますね！
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、でしたら私を送り届けてくれた
皆さんのお陰でもありますね！

engChrName: I heard this morning that Grandma's health took a turn for the better.
engSearchText:
I heard this morning that Grandma's health took a
turn for the better.
jpnChrName: 病に伏していたお祖母ちゃん、いくらか 今朝から快方に向かっているようで……
jpnSearchText:
病に伏していたお祖母ちゃん、いくらか
今朝から快方に向かっているようで……

engChrName: And just in time for the Revolution Festival! It must be a good omen, right?
engSearchText:
And just in time for the Revolution Festival! It must
be a good omen, right?
jpnChrName: ふふ、記念祭のタイミングでだなんて 縁起が良いですよね……
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、記念祭のタイミングでだなんて
縁起が良いですよね……

engChrName: I don't think she's improved enough to be able to see the events, but progress is progress.
engSearchText:
I don't think she's improved enough to be able to see
the events, but progress is progress.
jpnChrName: もっとも、まだ記念祭の行事を見るほど 元気ではないようなのが残念ですが……
jpnSearchText:
もっとも、まだ記念祭の行事を見るほど
元気ではないようなのが残念ですが……

engChrName: Getting ready for the Revolution Festival is when it really dawns on you that the year is almost over.
engSearchText:
Getting ready for the Revolution Festival is when it
really dawns on you that the year is almost over.
jpnChrName: 記念祭に向けての準備をしていると、 今年ももう終わりなんだって感じますよね……
jpnSearchText:
記念祭に向けての準備をしていると、
今年ももう終わりなんだって感じますよね……

engChrName: I've only been working here part time for three months, to be fair.
engSearchText:
I've only been working here part time for three
months, to be fair.
jpnChrName: 私もバイトを始めて三ヶ月になります。
jpnSearchText: 私もバイトを始めて三ヶ月になります。

engChrName: But that only means I still have a lot of room to improve! I have to live up to the store's reputation.
engSearchText:
But that only means I still have a lot of room
to improve! I have to live up to the store's reputation.
jpnChrName: なおの事このお店に相応しく、 私ももっと色々と覚えていかないと……！
jpnSearchText:
なおの事このお店に相応しく、
私ももっと色々と覚えていかないと……！

engChrName: It's a relief to see things finally calm down. Honestly, I panicked a little when everything was still going on...
engSearchText:
It's a relief to see things finally calm down.
Honestly, I panicked a little when
everything was still going on...
jpnChrName: また平和が戻ってきましたね……私はやっぱり 若輩者だし、取り乱す事もあったけれど……
jpnSearchText:
また平和が戻ってきましたね……私はやっぱり
若輩者だし、取り乱す事もあったけれど……

engChrName: But the owner and boss barely even batted an eye. They just kept going about things so calmly and helped direct me.
engSearchText:
But the owner and boss barely even batted an eye.
They just kept going about things so calmly and
helped direct me.
jpnChrName: オーナーや店長は冷静にやるべき事をして、 私にもどうすればいいか教えてくれて……
jpnSearchText:
オーナーや店長は冷静にやるべき事をして、
私にもどうすればいいか教えてくれて……

engChrName: I'm so glad I got a job here.
engSearchText: I'm so glad I got a job here.
jpnChrName: このお店に就職して、本当に良かったです。
jpnSearchText: このお店に就職して、本当に良かったです。

engChrName: I still can't believe what happened to Creil...
engSearchText: I still can't believe what happened to Creil...
jpnChrName: いきなり村が消されるなんてそんな…… 正直、今でも信じられないけど……
jpnSearchText:
いきなり村が消されるなんてそんな……
正直、今でも信じられないけど……

engChrName: It's hard to even wrap my head around it. Honestly, it was scarier than when the war broke out.
engSearchText:
It's hard to even wrap my head around it. Honestly, it
was scarier than when the war broke out.
jpnChrName: 何があったのか全く想像できなくて、 一昨年の戦争よりよほど怖いというか……
jpnSearchText:
何があったのか全く想像できなくて、
一昨年の戦争よりよほど怖いというか……

engChrName: But if the boss and the owner are both carrying on okay, then I just have to follow their lead!
engSearchText:
But if the boss and the owner are both carrying on
okay, then I just have to follow their lead!
jpnChrName: でも、店長やオーナーも冷静に頑張っているし、 私も何とかしてお店に貢献しないと……！
jpnSearchText:
でも、店長やオーナーも冷静に頑張っているし、
私も何とかしてお店に貢献しないと……！

engChrName: Still, the state of emergency really worries me...
engSearchText: Still, the state of emergency really worries me...
jpnChrName: それにしても……非常事態宣言だなんて……
jpnSearchText: それにしても……非常事態宣言だなんて……

engChrName: What about my parents' house and the hospital? I hope Grandma is okay...
engSearchText:
What about my parents' house and the hospital?
I hope Grandma is okay...
jpnChrName: 実家にも病院にもこれじゃあ…… おばあちゃん、大丈夫かな……？
jpnSearchText:
実家にも病院にもこれじゃあ……
おばあちゃん、大丈夫かな……？

engChrName: I heard the department store just opened up the rooftop terrace as a sort of lounge area.
engSearchText:
I heard the department store just opened up the
rooftop terrace as a sort of lounge area.
jpnChrName: 百貨店の方に、屋上テラスっていう 休憩スペースが出来たらしいですねー。
jpnSearchText:
百貨店の方に、屋上テラスっていう
休憩スペースが出来たらしいですねー。

engChrName: I bet it's a nice place to relax, especially with the incredible view of the city up there. They could even go as far as making it a small rooftop park.
engSearchText:
I bet it's a nice place to relax, especially with the
incredible view of the city up there. They could even
go as far as making it a small rooftop park.
jpnChrName: 確かに景色や風通しも良いし、公園みたいな 感じにもできそうな気もしますー。
jpnSearchText:
確かに景色や風通しも良いし、公園みたいな
感じにもできそうな気もしますー。

engChrName: But the timing of it is kind of suspicious... They weren't copying our store, were they?!
engSearchText:
But the timing of it is kind of suspicious...
They weren't copying our store, were they?!
jpnChrName: でも、このタイミングでって事は…… もしかして支配人さん、当店に触発されて？
jpnSearchText:
でも、このタイミングでって事は……
もしかして支配人さん、当店に触発されて？

engChrName: Well, I guess imitation is the sincerest form of flattery.
engSearchText:
Well, I guess imitation is the sincerest form
of flattery.
jpnChrName: だとしたら、立派な支配人さんも触発させる うちのオーナー、やっぱり凄いですね……
jpnSearchText:
だとしたら、立派な支配人さんも触発させる
うちのオーナー、やっぱり凄いですね……

engChrName: Oh, now that I think about it, I have to put in a request for some time off.
engSearchText:
Oh, now that I think about it, I have to put in a
request for some time off.
jpnChrName: そういえば……近々、私も有休申請しなきゃ。
jpnSearchText: そういえば……近々、私も有休申請しなきゃ。

engChrName: My family lives all the way in Anchorville, and my grandmother's health hasn't been so good lately...
engSearchText:
My family lives all the way in Anchorville, and my
grandmother's health hasn't been so good lately...
jpnChrName: 私、実家がアンカーヴィルの方なんですけど、 最近おばあちゃんの具合が悪いみたいで……
jpnSearchText:
私、実家がアンカーヴィルの方なんですけど、
最近おばあちゃんの具合が悪いみたいで……

engChrName: I'd like to pay them a visit next time I get the chance.
engSearchText: I'd like to pay them a visit next time I get the chance.
jpnChrName: どこかのタイミングで顔を見せにいって あげたいところなんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
どこかのタイミングで顔を見せにいって
あげたいところなんですよ。

engChrName: Was the man that was coming by really the department store's manager?!
engSearchText:
Was the man that was coming by really the
department store's manager?!
jpnChrName: あれ、何かさっきオーナーとカルロ店長の 話を聞いていた感じだともしかして……
jpnSearchText:
あれ、何かさっきオーナーとカルロ店長の
話を聞いていた感じだともしかして……

engChrName: I heard Ilhan and Carlo talking about it the other day, but I'm not sure...
engSearchText:
I heard Ilhan and Carlo talking about it the other day,
but I'm not sure...
jpnChrName: 最近来てくれていたお爺さん、本当にお向かいの 百貨店の支配人さんだったんですか！？
jpnSearchText:
最近来てくれていたお爺さん、本当にお向かいの
百貨店の支配人さんだったんですか！？

engChrName: I go there all the time. I should've noticed sooner...
engSearchText: I go there all the time. I should've noticed sooner...
jpnChrName: うーん、百貨店にもそれなりに行くのに何で 気づかなかったんだろう……
jpnSearchText:
うーん、百貨店にもそれなりに行くのに何で
気づかなかったんだろう……

engChrName: Did I exhaust all my brain cells cramming in info about orbal devices? Did I run out of space in my brain?
engSearchText:
Did I exhaust all my brain cells cramming in info
about orbal devices? Did I run out of space in
my brain?
jpnChrName: 最近は導力製品の事で頭一杯に なり過ぎていたのかな……？
jpnSearchText:
最近は導力製品の事で頭一杯に
なり過ぎていたのかな……？

engChrName: Hi there! Welcome to Iota. Do you wish to hear about this month's staff pick?
engSearchText:
Hi there! Welcome to Iota. Do you wish to hear
about this month's staff pick?
jpnChrName: いらっしゃいませ、《イオタ》へようこそ。
jpnSearchText: いらっしゃいませ、《イオタ》へようこそ。

engChrName: We recommend taking a look at our brand-new vacuum cleaners and lamps! More efficient, and not as hot.
engSearchText:
We recommend taking a look at our brand-new
vacuum cleaners and lamps! More efficient, and
not as hot.
jpnChrName: 今月のおすすめは最新掃除機とライトスタンド。 どちらも熱が籠りにくく長持ちする設計で……
jpnSearchText:
今月のおすすめは最新掃除機とライトスタンド。
どちらも熱が籠りにくく長持ちする設計で……

engChrName: The secret is behind Verne's newly patented low-load quartz circuitry and high conversion efficiency...
engSearchText:
The secret is behind Verne's newly patented low-load
quartz circuitry and high conversion efficiency...
jpnChrName: その秘訣は、ヴェルヌが新たに特許を取得した 低負荷型の結晶回路と変換効率の高さで……
jpnSearchText:
その秘訣は、ヴェルヌが新たに特許を取得した
低負荷型の結晶回路と変換効率の高さで……

engChrName: Oh. I see you memorized the new product features without even looking at the manual!
engSearchText:
Oh. I see you memorized the new product features
without even looking at the manual!
jpnChrName: おお、マニュアルや説明書も参照せず、 ちゃんと届いた品の特色を覚えていますね。
jpnSearchText:
おお、マニュアルや説明書も参照せず、
ちゃんと届いた品の特色を覚えていますね。

engChrName: Good job right there. Especially with the explanation! It can be the tipping point towards convincing a customer. Kudos there, Isla!
engSearchText:
Good job right there. Especially with the explanation!
It can be the tipping point towards convincing
a customer. Kudos there, Isla!
jpnChrName: お客さんに説得力を持たせる、最低限の 技術的説明もできています。
jpnSearchText:
お客さんに説得力を持たせる、最低限の
技術的説明もできています。

engChrName: Ahaha, thanks. I've been enjoying learning more about orbal products.
engSearchText:
Ahaha, thanks. I've been enjoying learning more
about orbal products.
jpnChrName: えへへ、ありがとうございます。 最近は導力製品の勉強も楽しくて。
jpnSearchText:
えへへ、ありがとうございます。
最近は導力製品の勉強も楽しくて。

engChrName: Haha, glad to hear that! The job should be fun, too, after all.
engSearchText:
Haha, glad to hear that! The job should be fun, too,
after all.
jpnChrName: はは、この仕事は楽しくやってこそですから。
jpnSearchText: はは、この仕事は楽しくやってこそですから。

engChrName: I know you said it wasn't what you were expecting, but I really appreciate all your hard work.
engSearchText:
I know you said it wasn't what you were expecting,
but I really appreciate all your hard work.
jpnChrName: 最初はイメージと違うと言っていたのに、 頑張ってくれているようで何よりです。
jpnSearchText:
最初はイメージと違うと言っていたのに、
頑張ってくれているようで何よりです。

engChrName: Get the hang of your current job, and I'll teach you some basic maintenance after that.
engSearchText:
Get the hang of your current job, and I'll teach you
some basic maintenance after that.
jpnChrName: もう少し慣れたら、簡単な修理なども 教えてあげるとしましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
もう少し慣れたら、簡単な修理なども
教えてあげるとしましょうか。

engChrName: I'd love that! Learning about these devices has honestly just made me want to tear them apart even more.
engSearchText:
I'd love that! Learning about these devices has
honestly just made me want to tear them apart
even more.
jpnChrName: はい！　機械の事を勉強していたら、 中がどうなっているかも気になってきましたし……
jpnSearchText:
はい！　機械の事を勉強していたら、
中がどうなっているかも気になってきましたし……

engChrName: I totally wanna see inside them!
engSearchText: I totally wanna see inside them!
jpnChrName: 是非ともお願いします！
jpnSearchText: 是非ともお願いします！

engChrName: I've actually surprised myself. I used to find reading manuals a real struggle.
engSearchText:
I've actually surprised myself. I used to find reading
manuals a real struggle.
jpnChrName: 正直、自分でもびっくりです…… 前はマニュアル読むのにもひと苦労だったのに……
jpnSearchText:
正直、自分でもびっくりです……
前はマニュアル読むのにもひと苦労だったのに……

engChrName: Now, I really want to learn more about orbal products and better handle the products our store sells.
engSearchText:
Now, I really want to learn more about orbal products
and better handle the products our store sells.
jpnChrName: 今では、もっと導力製品の事を詳しく知って、 お店の商品ももっと上手く扱いたいなって！
jpnSearchText:
今では、もっと導力製品の事を詳しく知って、
お店の商品ももっと上手く扱いたいなって！

engChrName: I've got Carlo's mentorship and Ilhan's thoughtfulness to thank for that!
engSearchText:
I've got Carlo's mentorship and Ilhan's
thoughtfulness to thank for that!
jpnChrName: これもカルロ店長の指導と、イルハンさんの お気遣いあってのものですよ！
jpnSearchText:
これもカルロ店長の指導と、イルハンさんの
お気遣いあってのものですよ！

engChrName: This posh-looking elderly gentleman has started paying the café regular visits lately.
engSearchText:
This posh-looking elderly gentleman has
started paying the café regular visits lately.
jpnChrName: そういえば最近、品の良いお爺さんが よく来るようになってくれましてね。
jpnSearchText:
そういえば最近、品の良いお爺さんが
よく来るようになってくれましてね。

engChrName: He seems interested in our owner. Maybe he's looking for a friend?
engSearchText:
He seems interested in our owner. Maybe he's
looking for a friend?
jpnChrName: オーナーに興味があるようだけど、 仲良くなりたいとかなのでしょうか……？
jpnSearchText:
オーナーに興味があるようだけど、
仲良くなりたいとかなのでしょうか……？

engChrName: But I can't shake the feeling that I've seen him somewhere before...
engSearchText:
But I can't shake the feeling that I've seen him
somewhere before...
jpnChrName: それにしてもあのお爺さん、 誰かに似ているような気も……
jpnSearchText:
それにしてもあのお爺さん、
誰かに似ているような気も……

engChrName: You can't deny just how good Ilhan's coffee is!
engSearchText: You can't deny just how good Ilhan's coffee is!
jpnChrName: それにしても、うちのオーナーの 淹れてくれるコーヒーは本当に美味しいですよね。
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、うちのオーナーの
淹れてくれるコーヒーは本当に美味しいですよね。

engChrName: And here I was thinking that doubling as both the owner AND a barista in his own establishment would be hard on him.
engSearchText:
And here I was thinking that doubling as both the
owner AND a barista in his own establishment would
be hard on him.
jpnChrName: 最初は、オーナーさんがバリスタ兼任なんて 大変そうだなとも思いましたけど……
jpnSearchText:
最初は、オーナーさんがバリスタ兼任なんて
大変そうだなとも思いましたけど……

engChrName: But it's like Ilhan was born to make coffee. He always looks so happy behind the counter!
engSearchText:
But it's like Ilhan was born to make coffee. He always
looks so happy behind the counter!
jpnChrName: 適材適所とはこの事というか……オーナーも バリスタをしている時は本当に楽しそうですし。
jpnSearchText:
適材適所とはこの事というか……オーナーも
バリスタをしている時は本当に楽しそうですし。

engChrName: I'm real glad I got this job. This is my most interesting workplace yet!
engSearchText:
I'm real glad I got this job. This is my most
interesting workplace yet!
jpnChrName: 本当、このお店に入って良かったですよ…… こんなに面白いお店、初めてです……！
jpnSearchText:
本当、このお店に入って良かったですよ……
こんなに面白いお店、初めてです……！

engChrName: Ilhan and Carlo apparently worked together ever since they were studying.
engSearchText:
Ilhan and Carlo apparently worked together ever
since they were studying.
jpnChrName: イルハンさんとカルロ店長、大学時代から ずっと一緒にやってきたそうですね……
jpnSearchText:
イルハンさんとカルロ店長、大学時代から
ずっと一緒にやってきたそうですね……

engChrName: I'm not surprised. Those two look like they can read each other's minds, they know each other so well! They're so supportive of each other.
engSearchText:
I'm not surprised. Those two look like they can read
each other's minds, they know each other so well!
They're so supportive of each other.
jpnChrName: そう思えば、あの二人の以心伝心というか、 自然と支え合っている感じも納得……
jpnSearchText:
そう思えば、あの二人の以心伝心というか、
自然と支え合っている感じも納得……

engChrName: I recently started helping customers all by myself! I stopped relying on Carlo's help so much.
engSearchText:
I recently started helping customers all by myself!
I stopped relying on Carlo's help so much.
jpnChrName: 最近はカルロ店長のフォロー無しで 大抵の対応が出来るようになってきました！
jpnSearchText:
最近はカルロ店長のフォロー無しで
大抵の対応が出来るようになってきました！

engChrName: I hope I can continue learning how to offer our customers more specialized customer support with their orbal devices.
engSearchText:
I hope I can continue learning how to offer our
customers more specialized customer support with
their orbal devices.
jpnChrName: これからはもっと、導力製品の専門的な カスタマーサポートも覚えていきたいな……
jpnSearchText:
これからはもっと、導力製品の専門的な
カスタマーサポートも覚えていきたいな……

engChrName: I thought I'd work as a barista, but this isn't so bad. There's so much interesting stuff to learn in this position, too!
engSearchText:
I thought I'd work as a barista, but this isn't so bad.
There's so much interesting stuff to learn in this
position, too!
jpnChrName: カフェに就職したつもりだったけど…… 慣れてみると、この仕事も奥深いもので……！
jpnSearchText:
カフェに就職したつもりだったけど……
慣れてみると、この仕事も奥深いもので……！

engChrName: Speaking of help, my boss does an amazing job of supporting Ilhan, too.
engSearchText:
Speaking of help, my boss does an amazing job of
supporting Ilhan, too.
jpnChrName: それにしても、フォローといえば……店長の イルハンさんへのサポートも凄いですよね。
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、フォローといえば……店長の
イルハンさんへのサポートも凄いですよね。

engChrName: They compliment each other's weaknesses, making sure they can make their individual strengths flourish. Carlo makes it look so casual.
engSearchText:
They compliment each other's weaknesses, making
sure they can make their individual strengths flourish.
Carlo makes it look so casual.
jpnChrName: イルハンさんの強みを生かせるように、 足りない部分をさり気無く請け負って……
jpnSearchText:
イルハンさんの強みを生かせるように、
足りない部分をさり気無く請け負って……

engChrName: I could learn a thing or two...
engSearchText: I could learn a thing or two...
jpnChrName: ああいうところも、観察して 見習って行くべきでしょうか……
jpnSearchText:
ああいうところも、観察して
見習って行くべきでしょうか……

engChrName: Hello! Welcome to Iota. If it's household orbal devices you want, they're over here!
engSearchText:
Hello! Welcome to Iota. If it's household orbal
devices you want, they're over here!
jpnChrName: いらっしゃいませ、《イオタ》へようこそ。 家庭用の導力製品はこちらですよー。
jpnSearchText:
いらっしゃいませ、《イオタ》へようこそ。
家庭用の導力製品はこちらですよー。

engChrName: Phew... It feels like I've finally gotten used to this stuff. This kind of work is really refreshing and interesting once you actually give it a go.
engSearchText:
Phew... It feels like I've finally gotten used to
this stuff. This kind of work is really refreshing and
interesting once you actually give it a go.
jpnChrName: ……ふう、ようやく少し慣れて来たかな。 働いてみると、新しくて面白いし……
jpnSearchText:
……ふう、ようやく少し慣れて来たかな。
働いてみると、新しくて面白いし……

engChrName: And the store's atmosphere can't be beat. I really hope I can keep this job long-term.
engSearchText:
And the store's atmosphere can't be beat. I really
hope I can keep this job long-term.
jpnChrName: 何より、お店の雰囲気自体は本当に素敵だし、 長く働いて行きたいですよ。
jpnSearchText:
何より、お店の雰囲気自体は本当に素敵だし、
長く働いて行きたいですよ。

engChrName: But I have to brush up on my orbal knowledge if I wanna do that! Can't rely on my boss all the time.
engSearchText:
But I have to brush up on my orbal knowledge if I
wanna do that! Can't rely on my boss all the time.
jpnChrName: そのためにも、少しでも導力製品の知識をつけて、 店長に頼らず自分でできるようにならないと……
jpnSearchText:
そのためにも、少しでも導力製品の知識をつけて、
店長に頼らず自分でできるようにならないと……

engChrName: Oh, hi... Are you looking for an orbal device? Hold on a minute, please...
engSearchText:
Oh, hi... Are you looking for an orbal device?
Hold on a minute, please...
jpnChrName: あ、いらっしゃいませ…… 導力製品をお探しですか、少しお待ちを……
jpnSearchText:
あ、いらっしゃいませ……
導力製品をお探しですか、少しお待ちを……

engChrName: I'm still new here, so I might need to look at the manual for any more complicated questions. I apologize in advance for the inconvenience.
engSearchText:
I'm still new here, so I might need to look at the
manual for any more complicated questions.
I apologize in advance for the inconvenience.
jpnChrName: すみません、まだ入ったばかりなのでマニュアルを 見ながらになるかもしれないですが……
jpnSearchText:
すみません、まだ入ったばかりなのでマニュアルを
見ながらになるかもしれないですが……

engChrName: I'll try my very hardest to fulfill your expectations, so your patience would be very much appreciated!
engSearchText:
I'll try my very hardest to fulfill your expectations, so
your patience would be very much appreciated!
jpnChrName: お客様のご期待に沿うよう頑張りますので、 大目に見ていただけるとありがたいです！
jpnSearchText:
お客様のご期待に沿うよう頑張りますので、
大目に見ていただけるとありがたいです！

engChrName: Here I was thinking the orbal café would require more café knowledge than orbal knowledge, but boy, was I wrong.
engSearchText:
Here I was thinking the orbal café would require
more café knowledge than orbal knowledge, but boy,
was I wrong.
jpnChrName: オーバル“カフェ”の募集って聞いて入社したけど、 思った以上に導力製品の知識が必要で……
jpnSearchText:
オーバル“カフェ”の募集って聞いて入社したけど、
思った以上に導力製品の知識が必要で……

engChrName: Still, it's a trendy and fun place to work. Not exactly what I had in mind, but I'm not giving up! I'll give it my best shot!
engSearchText:
Still, it's a trendy and fun place to work. Not exactly
what I had in mind, but I'm not giving up! I'll give it
my best shot!
jpnChrName: でも、お洒落で楽しいですし、イメージとは 違っていたけど勉強しながら頑張っています！
jpnSearchText:
でも、お洒落で楽しいですし、イメージとは
違っていたけど勉強しながら頑張っています！

engChrName: Experience with customers has really helped me lately. My boss hasn't even had to step in that much as of late!
engSearchText:
Experience with customers has really helped
me lately. My boss hasn't even had to step in that
much as of late!
jpnChrName: 最近では店長に注意されるのも減ったし、 このままお客様のために成長できればなと。
jpnSearchText:
最近では店長に注意されるのも減ったし、
このままお客様のために成長できればなと。

engChrName: I'm glad nothing interrupted the actual Revolution Festival!
engSearchText:
I'm glad nothing interrupted the actual
Revolution Festival!
jpnChrName: うふふ、記念祭本番に行事が 差し込まれなくて良かったわ♪
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、記念祭本番に行事が
差し込まれなくて良かったわ♪

engChrName: It's good to lift your spirits at times like these with things you enjoy, after all!
engSearchText:
It's good to lift your spirits at times like these with
things you enjoy, after all!
jpnChrName: やっぱり、こういう時は自分が 本当に楽しめる過ごし方をしなきゃ♪
jpnSearchText:
やっぱり、こういう時は自分が
本当に楽しめる過ごし方をしなきゃ♪

engChrName: With everyone still shaken up over everything, I'm glad that the Revolution Festival is still taking place.
engSearchText:
With everyone still shaken up over everything, I'm
glad that the Revolution Festival is still
taking place.
jpnChrName: 記念祭も予定通りにできるようで 何よりだわ……地元の皆は今も混乱しているけど。
jpnSearchText:
記念祭も予定通りにできるようで
何よりだわ……地元の皆は今も混乱しているけど。

engChrName: Especially with some Oración big shots like Auclair and Daltie involved in all of this...
engSearchText:
Especially with some Oración big shots like Auclair
and Daltie involved in all of this...
jpnChrName: 何せ、オラシオンの名士のオークレール氏や ダルティエ氏が事件に関わっていたんだもの……
jpnSearchText:
何せ、オラシオンの名士のオークレール氏や
ダルティエ氏が事件に関わっていたんだもの……

engChrName: Nothing to do about it, I guess! Things should calm down after the festival, at least.
engSearchText:
Nothing to do about it, I guess! Things should calm
down after the festival, at least.
jpnChrName: まあ、記念祭を経て一区切りつけば…… 少しは落ち着きを取り戻すとは思うけどねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、記念祭を経て一区切りつけば……
少しは落ち着きを取り戻すとは思うけどねぇ。

engChrName: Markley and my husband have been very anxious this whole time, insisting I go home.
engSearchText:
Markley and my husband have been very anxious this
whole time, insisting I go home.
jpnChrName: もう帰らないといけないなんて、 マークリーも夫もお堅い事……
jpnSearchText:
もう帰らないといけないなんて、
マークリーも夫もお堅い事……

engChrName: But now that we finally purchased an apartment in the capital, I wanted to settle in and adjust to the culture here.
engSearchText:
But now that we finally purchased an apartment in
the capital, I wanted to settle in and adjust to the
culture here.
jpnChrName: せっかく首都にマンションを買ったのだし、 根を張って文化に馴染みたかったのにねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
せっかく首都にマンションを買ったのだし、
根を張って文化に馴染みたかったのにねぇ。

engChrName: Oh, my. Is it that late already? I should get going home, though perhaps I'll stop by the department store first.
engSearchText:
Oh, my. Is it that late already? I should get going
home, though perhaps I'll stop by the department
store first.
jpnChrName: 今日も長居してしまったわね…… そうだわ、いっそ百貨店にも寄ってみようかしら？
jpnSearchText:
今日も長居してしまったわね……
そうだわ、いっそ百貨店にも寄ってみようかしら？

engChrName: I'm in the mood to cook for myself for a change.
engSearchText: I'm in the mood to cook for myself for a change.
jpnChrName: 何だか久しぶりに自分で料理を 作ってみたくなってきちゃったしね。
jpnSearchText:
何だか久しぶりに自分で料理を
作ってみたくなってきちゃったしね。

engChrName: Now that I finally have an apartment of my own, I try to make the most of those mundane parts of life.
engSearchText:
Now that I finally have an apartment of my own, I try
to make the most of those mundane parts of life.
jpnChrName: せっかくマンションで暮らしてるのだもの、 そういう事も楽しんでみなくっちゃ。
jpnSearchText:
せっかくマンションで暮らしてるのだもの、
そういう事も楽しんでみなくっちゃ。

engChrName: It's not just been café scouting for me the past few days. I've taken to exploring the whole city. I even visited Trion Tower for the first time.
engSearchText:
It's not just been café scouting for me the past few
days. I've taken to exploring the whole city. I even
visited Trion Tower for the first time.
jpnChrName: ここ数日はカフェ以外にも街を回ったわ、 トリオンタワーも初めて行ってね。
jpnSearchText:
ここ数日はカフェ以外にも街を回ったわ、
トリオンタワーも初めて行ってね。

engChrName: Who knew it'd take me until this stage in my life to slow down and smell the roses? Different cultures and stores can all be so fascinating.
engSearchText:
Who knew it'd take me until this stage in my life to
slow down and smell the roses? Different cultures and
stores can all be so fascinating.
jpnChrName: 本当、まさかこの歳になって色々な 文化やお店、娯楽の面白さに気づけるなんてねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
本当、まさかこの歳になって色々な
文化やお店、娯楽の面白さに気づけるなんてねぇ。

engChrName: As a child, all I did was attend fancy balls and take violin lessons. To me, that was the height of culture.
engSearchText:
As a child, all I did was attend fancy balls and take
violin lessons. To me, that was the height of culture.
jpnChrName: 子供の頃からバイオリンを習ったり、舞踏会に 行って、それが文化の全てと思ってたけど……
jpnSearchText:
子供の頃からバイオリンを習ったり、舞踏会に
行って、それが文化の全てと思ってたけど……

engChrName: It's taken me until now to realize just how narrow that worldview is.
engSearchText:
It's taken me until now to realize just how narrow
that worldview is.
jpnChrName: 見ていた世界が狭かったんだなって思うわ……
jpnSearchText: 見ていた世界が狭かったんだなって思うわ……

engChrName: These places are all so fascinating, I just had to recommend them to the ladies back in Oración.
engSearchText:
These places are all so fascinating, I just had to
recommend them to the ladies back in Oración.
jpnChrName: オラシオンのご婦人方にも、こういうお店も 面白いわって勧めているんだけどねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
オラシオンのご婦人方にも、こういうお店も
面白いわって勧めているんだけどねぇ……

engChrName: They sadly didn't seem interested. Everyone there is so old-fashioned—cutting edge technology doesn't catch their eye.
engSearchText:
They sadly didn't seem interested. Everyone there is
so old-fashioned—cutting edge technology doesn't
catch their eye.
jpnChrName: どうにも皆、新し過ぎるものを避けたがるというか、 興味を持とうとしてくれなくてねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
どうにも皆、新し過ぎるものを避けたがるというか、
興味を持とうとしてくれなくてねぇ。

engChrName: I suppose that's Oración for you, but it's a shame regardless. And I say that as someone from there.
engSearchText:
I suppose that's Oración for you, but it's a
shame regardless. And I say that as someone
from there.
jpnChrName: 土地柄ともいうのだろうけど、地元ながら 少し勿体ない気もするわ。
jpnSearchText:
土地柄ともいうのだろうけど、地元ながら
少し勿体ない気もするわ。

engChrName: I made the right choice buying an apartment in the capital, with there being interesting state-of-the-art stores like this one in the vicinity.
engSearchText:
I made the right choice buying an apartment in the
capital, with there being interesting state-of-the-art
stores like this one in the vicinity.
jpnChrName: こういう最先端のお店もあって面白いし、 首都にマンション買っておいて正解だったわ。
jpnSearchText:
こういう最先端のお店もあって面白いし、
首都にマンション買っておいて正解だったわ。

engChrName: I used to spend the summer at our holiday home, but there's so much more to see and do in the capital that this might be my new top choice.
engSearchText:
I used to spend the summer at our holiday home, but
there's so much more to see and do in the capital that
this might be my new top choice.
jpnChrName: 前は地方の別荘で夏を越していたけど、 首都の方が刺激もあって良いかもねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
前は地方の別荘で夏を越していたけど、
首都の方が刺激もあって良いかもねぇ。

engChrName: This café is so cozy, despite how trendy it is. It's still quite comfortable and homey, even despite all the cutting-edge tech they have in stock.
engSearchText:
This café is so cozy, despite how trendy it is. It's still
quite comfortable and homey, even despite all the
cutting-edge tech they have in stock.
jpnChrName: お洒落なカフェだしついつい寛いじゃうけど、 導力製品も最新のがちゃんと揃っているのね……
jpnSearchText:
お洒落なカフェだしついつい寛いじゃうけど、
導力製品も最新のがちゃんと揃っているのね……

engChrName: I wonder what I should buy... Oh, well! No reason to rush whatsoever. I'm in no rush to leave the capital.
engSearchText:
I wonder what I should buy... Oh, well! No reason to
rush whatsoever. I'm in no rush to leave the capital.
jpnChrName: どれを買って行こうかしら……まあ、首都の 滞在は余裕があるし、ゆっくり考えるわ。
jpnSearchText:
どれを買って行こうかしら……まあ、首都の
滞在は余裕があるし、ゆっくり考えるわ。

engChrName: I never get tired of this place, no matter how many times I come here.
engSearchText:
I never get tired of this place, no matter how many
times I come here.
jpnChrName: このお店なら何度来ても飽きなさそうだしねぇ。
jpnSearchText: このお店なら何度来ても飽きなさそうだしねぇ。

engChrName: Oh, so this is that orbal store I've heard so much about.
engSearchText:
Oh, so this is that orbal store I've heard so
much about.
jpnChrName: まあ、これが噂に聞く 新しいオーバルストアね……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、これが噂に聞く
新しいオーバルストアね……

engChrName: What a novel idea to combine the café setting with an orbal store. Gives you the time to relax with a nice cup of coffee while you browse around.
engSearchText:
What a novel idea to combine the café setting with
an orbal store. Gives you the time to relax with a nice
cup of coffee while you browse around.
jpnChrName: カフェと組み合わせてゆっくり 見ていけるなんて斬新で面白いわぁ……
jpnSearchText:
カフェと組み合わせてゆっくり
見ていけるなんて斬新で面白いわぁ……

engChrName: A stylish place like this would have been unthinkable back in my hometown of Oración.
engSearchText:
A stylish place like this would have been unthinkable
back in my hometown of Oración.
jpnChrName: お洒落なお店だけど、私達の地元オラシオンでは こういうお店は考えもしなかったわよねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
お洒落なお店だけど、私達の地元オラシオンでは
こういうお店は考えもしなかったわよねぇ。

engChrName: Hmm... Mistress Olivia has more or less finished all her negotiations.
engSearchText:
Hmm... Mistress Olivia has more or less finished all
her negotiations.
jpnChrName: いえ……確かに奥様は、一通りの代理は 一応済ませてはおりますが……
jpnSearchText:
いえ……確かに奥様は、一通りの代理は
一応済ませてはおりますが……

engChrName: The master is still very busy in Oración, so you'd imagine she'd show some restraint whilst she's here.
engSearchText:
The master is still very busy in Oración, so you'd
imagine she'd show some restraint whilst she's here.
jpnChrName: 旦那様は今でもオラシオンで多忙と言いますし、 少しは自重されても……
jpnSearchText:
旦那様は今でもオラシオンで多忙と言いますし、
少しは自重されても……

engChrName: He's got a lot on his hands, trying to quell the chaos that Daltie and Edmond's arrests have caused.
engSearchText:
He's got a lot on his hands, trying to quell the chaos
that Daltie and Edmond's arrests have caused.
jpnChrName: ダルティエ氏やエドモン氏の逮捕により、 旦那様も混乱を治めるため奔走されています。
jpnSearchText:
ダルティエ氏やエドモン氏の逮捕により、
旦那様も混乱を治めるため奔走されています。

engChrName: As such, he will be spending the entirety of the Revolution Festival in Oración.
engSearchText:
As such, he will be spending the entirety of the
Revolution Festival in Oración.
jpnChrName: 一応、記念祭に関してはオラシオンでの 式典には通しで出席されるようでして。
jpnSearchText:
一応、記念祭に関してはオラシオンでの
式典には通しで出席されるようでして。

engChrName: That's why Mistress Olivia is here. She's here to act as his representative in the capital while the master is busy. Or...she's supposed to, anyhow.
engSearchText:
That's why Mistress Olivia is here. She's here to act
as his representative in the capital while the master
is busy. Or...she's supposed to, anyhow.
jpnChrName: 首都では奥様に代理をしていただく予定ですが…… 覚えていらっしゃいますかな？
jpnSearchText:
首都では奥様に代理をしていただく予定ですが……
覚えていらっしゃいますかな？

engChrName: *sigh* In reality, she's just acting like she's here to sightsee, and not like she has duties to fulfill.
engSearchText:
*sigh* In reality, she's just acting like she's here to
sightsee, and not like she has duties to fulfill.
jpnChrName: ……はぁ、やはり覚えておられぬようで。 記念祭での各行事もこれではどうなるやら。
jpnSearchText:
……はぁ、やはり覚えておられぬようで。
記念祭での各行事もこれではどうなるやら。

engChrName: It'd be for the best if Mistress Olivia could return to Oración for the time being, but neither her nor the master seem to care much right now.
engSearchText:
It'd be for the best if Mistress Olivia could return to
Oración for the time being, but neither her nor the
master seem to care much right now.
jpnChrName: 一時オラシオンに帰るのは良いにしても、 旦那様も甘い所もありますしなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
一時オラシオンに帰るのは良いにしても、
旦那様も甘い所もありますしなぁ……

engChrName: Some carelessness is fine here and there, but it's like she's forgotten why she's actually here.
engSearchText:
Some carelessness is fine here and there, but it's like
she's forgotten why she's actually here.
jpnChrName: それは良いのですが奥様……首都に滞在している もともとの目的、覚えていらっしゃいますか？
jpnSearchText:
それは良いのですが奥様……首都に滞在している
もともとの目的、覚えていらっしゃいますか？

engChrName: The apartment purchase here in Edith was done with the express purpose of making her work as representative easier.
engSearchText:
The apartment purchase here in Edith was done with
the express purpose of making her work as
representative easier.
jpnChrName: 多忙を極める旦那様の代理を首都にてつつがなく こなせるよう、別邸を用意したはずですが……
jpnSearchText:
多忙を極める旦那様の代理を首都にてつつがなく
こなせるよう、別邸を用意したはずですが……

engChrName: Yes, sir... I think it may be a good idea for Mistress Olivia to return to Oración for the time being.
engSearchText:
Yes, sir... I think it may be a good idea for Mistress
Olivia to return to Oración for the time being.
jpnChrName: はい、旦那様……そろそろ奥様も一旦、 オラシオンに戻られた方が良いかと。
jpnSearchText:
はい、旦那様……そろそろ奥様も一旦、
オラシオンに戻られた方が良いかと。

engChrName: If her job was to spend all her time relaxing at trendy state-of-the-art cafés, she'd be excelling at it.
engSearchText:
If her job was to spend all her time relaxing at trendy
state-of-the-art cafés, she'd be excelling at it.
jpnChrName: 単に最新鋭の洒落た店に 入り浸るだけならまだしも……
jpnSearchText:
単に最新鋭の洒落た店に
入り浸るだけならまだしも……

engChrName: However, it seems as if she has forgotten the reason why we purchased an apartment here in the capital in the first place...
engSearchText:
However, it seems as if she has forgotten the reason
why we purchased an apartment here in the capital
in the first place...
jpnChrName: 首都に別邸を用意した本来の理由も、 いつの間にか忘れている節もございます。
jpnSearchText:
首都に別邸を用意した本来の理由も、
いつの間にか忘れている節もございます。

engChrName: Mistress Olivia has taken quite a shine towards this establishment, but I do wonder if her attachment has started to border on excessive.
engSearchText:
Mistress Olivia has taken quite a shine towards this
establishment, but I do wonder if her attachment has
started to border on excessive.
jpnChrName: 奥様は大層この店を気に入られたようですが、 正直入れ込み過ぎでございましょう……
jpnSearchText:
奥様は大層この店を気に入られたようですが、
正直入れ込み過ぎでございましょう……

engChrName: Then again, I wouldn't quite say it's a bad thing either...
engSearchText:
Then again, I wouldn't quite say it's a bad
thing either...
jpnChrName: とはいえ……どういったものか…… 現状何か支障がある訳でも……
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ……どういったものか……
現状何か支障がある訳でも……

engChrName: Her time spent in this orbal café might just be for the purpose of purchasing some goods for the master.
engSearchText:
Her time spent in this orbal café might just be for the
purpose of purchasing some goods for the master.
jpnChrName: オーバルカフェにきているなら、という事で 旦那様より生活導力製品の購入を頼まれましてな。
jpnSearchText:
オーバルカフェにきているなら、という事で
旦那様より生活導力製品の購入を頼まれましてな。

engChrName: The store does seem to stock quite high-end orbal appliances not commonly available.
engSearchText:
The store does seem to stock quite high-end orbal
appliances not commonly available.
jpnChrName: やはりこの店には、普通の量販店には 出回っていない次世代モデルもあるようで……
jpnSearchText:
やはりこの店には、普通の量販店には
出回っていない次世代モデルもあるようで……

engChrName: Though Mistress Olivia isn't the most experienced in the field of orbal devices, so I would much rather she'd leave the task to me.
engSearchText:
Though Mistress Olivia isn't the most experienced in
the field of orbal devices, so I would much rather
she'd leave the task to me.
jpnChrName: 奥様は正直機械にはお詳しくないので、 私に見繕って欲しいとの事です。
jpnSearchText:
奥様は正直機械にはお詳しくないので、
私に見繕って欲しいとの事です。

engChrName: That said...it is part of my job to keep her in check as well. She tends to be a bit of a free spirit.
engSearchText:
That said...it is part of my job to keep her in check
as well. She tends to be a bit of a free spirit.
jpnChrName: とはいえ……奔放な奥様のお目付けも 私の役目ではありますしな。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ……奔放な奥様のお目付けも
私の役目ではありますしな。

engChrName: While I do agree the purchase of the apartment in the city was necessary, I feel like restraint is being left by the wayside overall.
engSearchText:
While I do agree the purchase of the apartment in the
city was necessary, I feel like restraint is being left by
the wayside overall.
jpnChrName: マンションを首都に買ったのは良いにせよ、 ある程度引き締めていかねば。
jpnSearchText:
マンションを首都に買ったのは良いにせよ、
ある程度引き締めていかねば。

engChrName: Mistress Olivia has taken quite a shine to this establishment. I'm not surprised, considering a store like this isn't commonplace in Oración.
engSearchText:
Mistress Olivia has taken quite a shine to
this establishment. I'm not surprised, considering a
store like this isn't commonplace in Oración.
jpnChrName: 奥様は随分とこのお店が気に入られたようで。 やはりオラシオンでは見ない系統ですしなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
奥様は随分とこのお店が気に入られたようで。
やはりオラシオンでは見ない系統ですしなぁ。

engChrName: Regardless of that, she could stand to show some restraint. Her trip here is for business, after all. Not for pleasure.
engSearchText:
Regardless of that, she could stand to show
some restraint. Her trip here is for business, after all.
Not for pleasure.
jpnChrName: とはいえ……あまり羽目を外し過ぎてもいけません、 一応は旦那様の代理をする事もありますし。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ……あまり羽目を外し過ぎてもいけません、
一応は旦那様の代理をする事もありますし。

engChrName: Haha. Coming to this café was a fantastic choice.
engSearchText: Haha. Coming to this café was a fantastic choice.
jpnChrName: はは、来て正解でしたな奥様。
jpnSearchText: はは、来て正解でしたな奥様。

engChrName: This orbal café seems to be a new business.
engSearchText: This orbal café seems to be a new business.
jpnChrName: ここは《オーバルカフェ》という 新しい業態のお店だそうで。
jpnSearchText:
ここは《オーバルカフェ》という
新しい業態のお店だそうで。

engChrName: I've heard that the owner is still a young man with a track record of successful start-ups ever since his school days.
engSearchText:
I've heard that the owner is still a young man with a
track record of successful start-ups ever since his
school days.
jpnChrName: 何でも、学生時代からベンチャーで成功した 若い方が立ち上げられたとの事ですよ。
jpnSearchText:
何でも、学生時代からベンチャーで成功した
若い方が立ち上げられたとの事ですよ。

engChrName: We've got a lot to learn from novel ideas like this...
engSearchText: We've got a lot to learn from novel ideas like this...
jpnChrName: こうした斬新な発想、我々も見習って いきたいものですなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
こうした斬新な発想、我々も見習って
いきたいものですなぁ……

engChrName: Your work to liberate this area is much appreciated.
engSearchText: Your work to liberate this area is much appreciated.
jpnChrName: ……この周囲を解放して下さり…… ありがとうございます。
jpnSearchText:
……この周囲を解放して下さり……
ありがとうございます。

engChrName: Seeing you work so hard to help out has made me realize I should strive for the same.
engSearchText:
Seeing you work so hard to help out has made me
realize I should strive for the same.
jpnChrName: 皆さんを見ていると、やっぱり自分も できる事を探さなきゃって思いまして……
jpnSearchText:
皆さんを見ていると、やっぱり自分も
できる事を探さなきゃって思いまして……

engChrName: Not by fighting, of course. I'm putting my observational skills to the test so that I may help relay information to Marduk and the guild both.
engSearchText:
Not by fighting, of course. I'm putting my
observational skills to the test so that I may help
relay information to Marduk and the guild both.
jpnChrName: 分かる範囲で状況を整理して、ギルドや ＭＫ社の人たちにもお伝えしています。
jpnSearchText:
分かる範囲で状況を整理して、ギルドや
ＭＫ社の人たちにもお伝えしています。

engChrName: My hope is to be able to contribute with helping refugees. No matter how small, I must do my part.
engSearchText:
My hope is to be able to contribute with
helping refugees. No matter how small, I must do
my part.
jpnChrName: 少しでも人々の避難や捜索に 役立つことが出来れば……！
jpnSearchText:
少しでも人々の避難や捜索に
役立つことが出来れば……！

engChrName: I'm unsure as to what I should do in a situation like this... It's so out of my depth.
engSearchText:
I'm unsure as to what I should do in a situation
like this... It's so out of my depth.
jpnChrName: どうしましょう……正直、 私の理解の範疇を越えていて……
jpnSearchText:
どうしましょう……正直、
私の理解の範疇を越えていて……

engChrName: While it's reassuring to have Professor Cronkite and Associate Professor Esmeray with us...
engSearchText:
While it's reassuring to have Professor Cronkite and
Associate Professor Esmeray with us...
jpnChrName: クロンカイト教授やエスメレー准教授が いらっしゃる事は本当に心強いですが……
jpnSearchText:
クロンカイト教授やエスメレー准教授が
いらっしゃる事は本当に心強いですが……

engChrName: ...I can't help but feel pathetic at not being able to contribute whatsoever.
engSearchText:
...I can't help but feel pathetic at not being able to
contribute whatsoever.
jpnChrName: 力になれない自分が情けないというか……
jpnSearchText: 力になれない自分が情けないというか……

engChrName: And so the year came and went.
engSearchText: And so the year came and went.
jpnChrName: 今年もこの時を迎えることが出来ましたね……
jpnSearchText: 今年もこの時を迎えることが出来ましたね……

engChrName: It wasn't really my intention to become a regular of this establishment, but I can't deny it's helped me make progress on my thesis.
engSearchText:
It wasn't really my intention to become a regular of
this establishment, but I can't deny it's helped me
make progress on my thesis.
jpnChrName: 今年はいつの間にかここの常連になっていましたが、 お陰様でレポート課題も捗りましたし……
jpnSearchText:
今年はいつの間にかここの常連になっていましたが、
お陰様でレポート課題も捗りましたし……

engChrName: Analyzing the organizational logistics and transportation system behind the festival might be a fun endeavor.
engSearchText:
Analyzing the organizational logistics and
transportation system behind the festival might be a
fun endeavor.
jpnChrName: ふふ、でも記念祭に見る物流や交通の 事情も分析したら面白そうですね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、でも記念祭に見る物流や交通の
事情も分析したら面白そうですね。

engChrName: I'll continue doing research in the capital during the upcoming year as well, so it looks like my regular visits to this café will continue.
engSearchText:
I'll continue doing research in the capital during the
upcoming year as well, so it looks like my regular
visits to this café will continue.
jpnChrName: まあ、何にせよ来年も首都の調査をする以上、 ここのお世話になる事は多そうです。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、何にせよ来年も首都の調査をする以上、
ここのお世話になる事は多そうです。

engChrName: Now that I think about it, a lot more institute associates have been invited to the festival than usual.
engSearchText:
Now that I think about it, a lot more institute
associates have been invited to the festival than usual.
jpnChrName: そういえば……今年の記念祭には大学の関係者も 例年以上に多く招待されているようで。
jpnSearchText:
そういえば……今年の記念祭には大学の関係者も
例年以上に多く招待されているようで。

engChrName: Professor Cronkite was to be expected, of course, considering his involvement in the development of the new weaponry being unveiled.
engSearchText:
Professor Cronkite was to be expected, of course,
considering his involvement in the development of
the new weaponry being unveiled.
jpnChrName: お披露目される新兵装に携わったという クロンカイト教授は予想していましたが……
jpnSearchText:
お披露目される新兵装に携わったという
クロンカイト教授は予想していましたが……

engChrName: But Professor Hamilton being here caught me off guard. I'd love to get the chance to speak with her.
engSearchText:
But Professor Hamilton being here caught me
off guard. I'd love to get the chance to speak with her.
jpnChrName: まさかハミルトン博士までいらっしゃるとは。 お話しを伺う機会があれば嬉しいのですが……
jpnSearchText:
まさかハミルトン博士までいらっしゃるとは。
お話しを伺う機会があれば嬉しいのですが……

engChrName: The Basel Institute of Science's professors have all been invited to the Revolution Festival this year.
engSearchText:
The Basel Institute of Science's professors have all
been invited to the Revolution Festival this year.
jpnChrName: 革命記念祭……うちの大学の教授陣も 招待されているんですよね。
jpnSearchText:
革命記念祭……うちの大学の教授陣も
招待されているんですよね。

engChrName: I'm aware that Professor Hamilton wasn't present last year, nor a few years before that. It's her first time attending in a while.
engSearchText:
I'm aware that Professor Hamilton wasn't present last
year, nor a few years before that. It's her first time
attending in a while.
jpnChrName: 去年は来られなかったハミルトン博士には 何年ぶりの記念祭になるのかしら……
jpnSearchText:
去年は来られなかったハミルトン博士には
何年ぶりの記念祭になるのかしら……

engChrName: I did hear they're planning on unveiling new weaponry, that with which Professor Cronkite himself was involved in developing.
engSearchText:
I did hear they're planning on unveiling new
weaponry, that with which Professor Cronkite
himself was involved in developing.
jpnChrName: そういえば、新兵器も披露されるって聞くけど、 設計者はクロンカイト教授なんですよね。
jpnSearchText:
そういえば、新兵器も披露されるって聞くけど、
設計者はクロンカイト教授なんですよね。

engChrName: Weaponry is not one of my areas of interest, but I'm nonetheless intrigued to see the fruits of his labor.
engSearchText:
Weaponry is not one of my areas of interest, but I'm
nonetheless intrigued to see the fruits of his labor.
jpnChrName: 兵器自体は興味ないけど……クロンカイト教授の 成果という意味では見るのが楽しみですね。
jpnSearchText:
兵器自体は興味ないけど……クロンカイト教授の
成果という意味では見るのが楽しみですね。

engChrName: I'm so grateful that we get the opportunity to properly celebrate the Revolution Festival again this year.
engSearchText:
I'm so grateful that we get the opportunity to properly
celebrate the Revolution Festival again this year.
jpnChrName: 今年もちゃんと記念祭を迎えられるのが、 こんなに有難く感じるなんて……
jpnSearchText:
今年もちゃんと記念祭を迎えられるのが、
こんなに有難く感じるなんて……

engChrName: Classes and research have gone back to normal in Basel as well, so things are finally going back to normal.
engSearchText:
Classes and research have gone back to normal in
Basel as well, so things are finally going back
to normal.
jpnChrName: バーゼルの方も今では授業も研究も元通りに 再開しているし、前を向いて行きませんと。
jpnSearchText:
バーゼルの方も今では授業も研究も元通りに
再開しているし、前を向いて行きませんと。

engChrName: Nothing will ever bring Professor Callaghan back, but time marches on ever forward. The institute will continue their research programs for his sake.
engSearchText:
Nothing will ever bring Professor Callaghan back, but
time marches on ever forward. The institute will
continue their research programs for his sake.
jpnChrName: キャラハン教授は戻ってこないけど……彼のためにも 大学は研究に力を入れていくようだし。
jpnSearchText:
キャラハン教授は戻ってこないけど……彼のためにも
大学は研究に力を入れていくようだし。

engChrName: What happened to Creil is still so hard to wrap my head around...
engSearchText:
What happened to Creil is still so hard to wrap my
head around...
jpnChrName: クレイユ村……まさか、あんな兵器が 使われることがあるなんて……
jpnSearchText:
クレイユ村……まさか、あんな兵器が
使われることがあるなんて……

engChrName: It's not my area of study, so I'm not sure about all the details.
engSearchText:
It's not my area of study, so I'm not sure about all
the details.
jpnChrName: そういえば、私は専門外だから 詳しくはないけど……
jpnSearchText:
そういえば、私は専門外だから
詳しくはないけど……

engChrName: But I feel like I remember a hypothetical discussion regarding those kinds of weapons in one of Professor Callaghan's lectures.
engSearchText:
But I feel like I remember a hypothetical discussion
regarding those kinds of weapons in one of Professor
Callaghan's lectures.
jpnChrName: 前にキャラハン教授がそういう兵器の仮説を…… 物理の講義で少し話してたような気も……
jpnSearchText:
前にキャラハン教授がそういう兵器の仮説を……
物理の講義で少し話してたような気も……

engChrName: Maybe he was manipulated by the mafia in some way?
engSearchText:
Maybe he was manipulated by the mafia in
some way?
jpnChrName: もしかして……キャラハン教授が マフィアに利用されたのって……
jpnSearchText:
もしかして……キャラハン教授が
マフィアに利用されたのって……

engChrName: Y-You're Professor Hamilton's student. Quatre, right? I wasn't aware you were in the capital.
engSearchText:
Y-You're Professor Hamilton's student.
Quatre, right? I wasn't aware you were in the capital.
jpnChrName: あ、あなたは確かハミルトン博士の 弟子のカトル君……首都に来ていたんですか？
jpnSearchText:
あ、あなたは確かハミルトン博士の
弟子のカトル君……首都に来ていたんですか？

engChrName: Oh, you must be Kei. You're Associate Professor Tain's student.
engSearchText:
Oh, you must be Kei. You're Associate Professor
Tain's student.
jpnChrName: えっと、確かトウェイン准教授の ところのケイさんでしたか。
jpnSearchText:
えっと、確かトウェイン准教授の
ところのケイさんでしたか。

engChrName: I heard you're carrying out some field research regarding urban engineering.
engSearchText:
I heard you're carrying out some field research
regarding urban engineering.
jpnChrName: なるほど、都市工学の実地調査を しているとは小耳に挟んでいたけど……
jpnSearchText:
なるほど、都市工学の実地調査を
しているとは小耳に挟んでいたけど……

engChrName: Yes. That's why I come to the capital so often. Though right now I'm mostly here just to visit my parents.
engSearchText:
Yes. That's why I come to the capital so often.
Though right now I'm mostly here just to visit
my parents.
jpnChrName: ええ、この前まではそれで首都に来てました。 今は帰省中なだけなんですけどね……
jpnSearchText:
ええ、この前まではそれで首都に来てました。
今は帰省中なだけなんですけどね……

engChrName: They were worried half to death after everything that happened in Basel.
engSearchText:
They were worried half to death after everything that
happened in Basel.
jpnChrName: バーゼルであんな事があったものだから 親も随分と心配しているもので……
jpnSearchText:
バーゼルであんな事があったものだから
親も随分と心配しているもので……

engChrName: I mean, I get why your folks would be worried. Shit got real messy back there.
engSearchText:
I mean, I get why your folks would be worried.
Shit got real messy back there.
jpnChrName: 都市封鎖まであった訳だしな…… そりゃ、家族がいたら心配するのも当然か。
jpnSearchText:
都市封鎖まであった訳だしな……
そりゃ、家族がいたら心配するのも当然か。

engChrName: The institute's still dealing with the aftermath of losing one of its professors, so a lot of classes are being canceled.
engSearchText:
The institute's still dealing with the aftermath of
losing one of its professors, so a lot of classes are
being canceled.
jpnChrName: まあ、教授も一人亡くなった上に事後処理も 残っているから、休講もまだ多くて……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、教授も一人亡くなった上に事後処理も
残っているから、休講もまだ多くて……

engChrName: It's a little better now with Professor Hamilton taking charge, but it's not perfect either.
engSearchText:
It's a little better now with Professor Hamilton taking
charge, but it's not perfect either.
jpnChrName: もっとも、ハミルトン博士が帰ってきて 主導してくれているから混乱も無いようだけど。
jpnSearchText:
もっとも、ハミルトン博士が帰ってきて
主導してくれているから混乱も無いようだけど。

engChrName: So I'll be staying with my parents until things settle down back at the institute.
engSearchText:
So I'll be staying with my parents until things settle
down back at the institute.
jpnChrName: まあ、それもあって私も大学方面が落ち着くまでは 親の近くにいてあげようと思いまして。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、それもあって私も大学方面が落ち着くまでは
親の近くにいてあげようと思いまして。

engChrName: I see... Gran must be working really hard.
engSearchText: I see... Gran must be working really hard.
jpnChrName: そうか……やっぱりグランマが 頑張ってくれているんだ……
jpnSearchText:
そうか……やっぱりグランマが
頑張ってくれているんだ……

engChrName: You mentioned your parents, didn't you...?
engSearchText: You mentioned your parents, didn't you...?
jpnChrName: それにしても……親、か……
jpnSearchText: それにしても……親、か……

engChrName: Hmm? What was that, Quatre?
engSearchText: Hmm? What was that, Quatre?
jpnChrName: カトル君……？ どうかしましたか？
jpnSearchText:
カトル君……？
どうかしましたか？

engChrName: Nothing... Don't mind me.
engSearchText: Nothing... Don't mind me.
jpnChrName: いや……何でもないよ。
jpnSearchText: いや……何でもないよ。

engChrName: Well, I wish you the best of luck in your research as a fellow student.
engSearchText:
Well, I wish you the best of luck in your research as a
fellow student.
jpnChrName: とにかく、同じバーゼル理科大学の学生として 首都でもよろしく頼むよ。
jpnSearchText:
とにかく、同じバーゼル理科大学の学生として
首都でもよろしく頼むよ。

engChrName: Things seem to be getting back on track in Basel, partially thanks to Professor Hamilton's hard work.
engSearchText:
Things seem to be getting back on track in Basel,
partially thanks to Professor Hamilton's hard work.
jpnChrName: バーゼルはハミルトン博士の活躍もあって、 順調に立て直しが進んでいるみたいですよ。
jpnSearchText:
バーゼルはハミルトン博士の活躍もあって、
順調に立て直しが進んでいるみたいですよ。

engChrName: I never expected to get the chance to see her again, although I wish it could have been under less worrying circumstances.
engSearchText:
I never expected to get the chance to see her again,
although I wish it could have been under less
worrying circumstances.
jpnChrName: しかし……緊急時とは言え、まさか再び ハミルトン博士にお目にかかれるなんて……
jpnSearchText:
しかし……緊急時とは言え、まさか再び
ハミルトン博士にお目にかかれるなんて……

engChrName: Last I'd seen her was during my first year trip at the institute. She was just as lovely this time as she was back then.
engSearchText:
Last I'd seen her was during my first year trip at
the institute. She was just as lovely this time as she
was back then.
jpnChrName: 私が一年生の時に旅立って以来になるけど…… 相変わらず本当に立派な方ですよね……
jpnSearchText:
私が一年生の時に旅立って以来になるけど……
相変わらず本当に立派な方ですよね……

engChrName: I know she was going to continue her research into the desertification of the east, so I imagine she'll be returning to her travels soon.
engSearchText:
I know she was going to continue her research into
the desertification of the east, so I imagine she'll be
returning to her travels soon.
jpnChrName: 東方で不毛化の原因を探っていたというけど、 また旅立ってしまうのでしょうか……
jpnSearchText:
東方で不毛化の原因を探っていたというけど、
また旅立ってしまうのでしょうか……

engChrName: I should be able to get back to Basel by the end of the day if I take the next train.
engSearchText:
I should be able to get back to Basel by the end of the
day if I take the next train.
jpnChrName: この次の便に乗れれば日付が変わる前に バーゼルに到着できそう……
jpnSearchText:
この次の便に乗れれば日付が変わる前に
バーゼルに到着できそう……

engChrName: The main reason for my visiting of Edith is to visit my parents, but I'm quite enjoying my field research, too.
engSearchText:
The main reason for my visiting of Edith is to visit
my parents, but I'm quite enjoying my field
research, too.
jpnChrName: 実家があるからというのもあるけど、 やっぱりフィールドワークも楽しいものですよ。
jpnSearchText:
実家があるからというのもあるけど、
やっぱりフィールドワークも楽しいものですよ。

engChrName: I might be able to motivate some of the underclassmen to take on field research, too, if I could show them how much fun it can be.
engSearchText:
I might be able to motivate some of the
underclassmen to take on field research, too, if I could
show them how much fun it can be.
jpnChrName: いまいちやる気の足りない後輩も、こういう 楽しさを教えられたら真面目になるんでしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
いまいちやる気の足りない後輩も、こういう
楽しさを教えられたら真面目になるんでしょうか。

engChrName: I've been trying to conduct some investigation into the capital's underground infrastructure on the side.
engSearchText:
I've been trying to conduct some investigation into
the capital's underground infrastructure on the side.
jpnChrName: 追加で色々と首都の地下インフラについて 調査をしてみていたのだけど……
jpnSearchText:
追加で色々と首都の地下インフラについて
調査をしてみていたのだけど……

engChrName: Utilizing underground space in the form of a subway really is a revolutionary idea, isn't it?
engSearchText:
Utilizing underground space in the form of a subway
really is a revolutionary idea, isn't it?
jpnChrName: やっぱり地下鉄という形での地下空間の 活用は改めて画期的なものですね……
jpnSearchText:
やっぱり地下鉄という形での地下空間の
活用は改めて画期的なものですね……

engChrName: But there are plenty of spaces that were abandoned during the development process that still have untapped potential.
engSearchText:
But there are plenty of spaces that were abandoned
during the development process that still have
untapped potential.
jpnChrName: ただ逆に、開発から残されて活用され きっていない空間も結構あるみたいで。
jpnSearchText:
ただ逆に、開発から残されて活用され
きっていない空間も結構あるみたいで。

engChrName: A whole district could be created out of all that unused underground space, so it'd be a shame for it to go to waste.
engSearchText:
A whole district could be created out of all that
unused underground space, so it'd be a shame for it to
go to waste.
jpnChrName: これだけの地下空間、その気になれば 一つの街も作れそうなのに勿体ないですね。
jpnSearchText:
これだけの地下空間、その気になれば
一つの街も作れそうなのに勿体ないですね。

engChrName: One of the most fascinating aspects of urban engineering is just conserving the history behind the places you're helping develop.
engSearchText:
One of the most fascinating aspects of urban
engineering is just conserving the history behind the
places you're helping develop.
jpnChrName: 都市工学の面白さって、意外と歴史とかも 絡んでくるところだと思うんです。
jpnSearchText:
都市工学の面白さって、意外と歴史とかも
絡んでくるところだと思うんです。

engChrName: How to keep old geographical landmarks around and preserve their history while continuing to develop their utility.
engSearchText:
How to keep old geographical landmarks around and
preserve their history while continuing to develop
their utility.
jpnChrName: 元々あった土台とか、かつての地誌計画の遺産を どう使うのかと言う話も多いし……
jpnSearchText:
元々あった土台とか、かつての地誌計画の遺産を
どう使うのかと言う話も多いし……

engChrName: Trion Tower and Edith's subways called to me. They're the reason I chose to pursue this field.
engSearchText:
Trion Tower and Edith's subways called to me.
They're the reason I chose to pursue this field.
jpnChrName: 首都でトリオンタワーや地下鉄を見ていて、それを 感じたのが今の分野を選んだきっかけですね。
jpnSearchText:
首都でトリオンタワーや地下鉄を見ていて、それを
感じたのが今の分野を選んだきっかけですね。

engChrName: I don't know if I would've pursued it, and gone on to study at the Basel Institute of Science, had I lived anywhere else.
engSearchText:
I don't know if I would've pursued it, and gone on
to study at the Basel Institute of Science, had I lived
anywhere else.
jpnChrName: そういう意味では、首都で育ったからこそ バーゼル理科大学に入ったと言えそうです。
jpnSearchText:
そういう意味では、首都で育ったからこそ
バーゼル理科大学に入ったと言えそうです。

engChrName: My parents' place being in the capital has come in handy for me. It facilitates me visiting for research so often.
engSearchText:
My parents' place being in the capital has come in
handy for me. It facilitates me visiting for research
so often.
jpnChrName: 追加調査のためにまた首都に来てしまいました…… 実家が首都にあるのが専攻分野に役立つとは。
jpnSearchText:
追加調査のためにまた首都に来てしまいました……
実家が首都にあるのが専攻分野に役立つとは。

engChrName: Associate Professor Tain is the institute's main specialist in urban engineering.
engSearchText:
Associate Professor Tain is the institute's main
specialist in urban engineering.
jpnChrName: そういえば大学で都市工学を専門にしているのは 主にトウェイン准教授ですけど……
jpnSearchText:
そういえば大学で都市工学を専門にしているのは
主にトウェイン准教授ですけど……

engChrName: Though Professor Cronkite has some experience in the field, too. He was involved with Trion Tower, after all.
engSearchText:
Though Professor Cronkite has some experience in
the field, too. He was involved with Trion Tower,
after all.
jpnChrName: クロンカイト教授はどうなのでしょう、 トリオンタワーには関心があるようですが。
jpnSearchText:
クロンカイト教授はどうなのでしょう、
トリオンタワーには関心があるようですが。

engChrName: Well, he's a genius, after all. Far be it for him to limit himself and his knowledge to just one area of expertise.
engSearchText:
Well, he's a genius, after all. Far be it for him to limit
himself and his knowledge to just one area
of expertise.
jpnChrName: まあ、クロンカイト教授は天才だし…… 専門に関係無く大抵の事はわかりますか。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、クロンカイト教授は天才だし……
専門に関係無く大抵の事はわかりますか。

engChrName: While Professor Cronkite is definitely one of the biggest names in Basel, there's still plenty of other geniuses at the institute.
engSearchText:
While Professor Cronkite is definitely one of the
biggest names in Basel, there's still plenty of other
geniuses at the institute.
jpnChrName: バーゼル理科大、クロンカイト教授は有名だけど 他にも天才や秀才って言われる人も多くて……
jpnSearchText:
バーゼル理科大、クロンカイト教授は有名だけど
他にも天才や秀才って言われる人も多くて……

engChrName: It's hard not to feel self-conscious about your mediocrity when your next-door neighbor skipped to doing his master's degree at fifteen.
engSearchText:
It's hard not to feel self-conscious about your
mediocrity when your next-door neighbor skipped to
doing his master's degree at fifteen.
jpnChrName: １５歳で飛び級して修士をしている子もいるし、 私みたいな凡才には少々肩身が狭いんですよね。
jpnSearchText:
１５歳で飛び級して修士をしている子もいるし、
私みたいな凡才には少々肩身が狭いんですよね。

engChrName: I've been researching the urban structure of the capital while visiting my parents. Thanks to this place, my stay has been really productive.
engSearchText:
I've been researching the urban structure of the
capital while visiting my parents. Thanks to this
place, my stay has been really productive.
jpnChrName: 実家帰省ついでに首都の都市構造を調べて 纏めていたけど、このお店のお陰で捗りますよ。
jpnSearchText:
実家帰省ついでに首都の都市構造を調べて
纏めていたけど、このお店のお陰で捗りますよ。

engChrName: I thought to check it out since I heard the owner also studied at the institute. It turned out to be a really comfortable spot to work in.
engSearchText:
I thought to check it out since I heard the owner also
studied at the institute. It turned out to be a really
comfortable spot to work in.
jpnChrName: 経営者が同じ大学出身って聞いてせっかくだから 来てみたけど、思った以上に居心地がよくて……
jpnSearchText:
経営者が同じ大学出身って聞いてせっかくだから
来てみたけど、思った以上に居心地がよくて……

engChrName: The excellent connection makes working a cinch, but the atmosphere is great for when you need to take a break and recharge, too.
engSearchText:
The excellent connection makes working a cinch, but
the atmosphere is great for when you need to take
a break and recharge, too.
jpnChrName: まさかこんなに通信環境も良くて作業しやすいのに、 すぐに寛いで頭を休められるなんて……
jpnSearchText:
まさかこんなに通信環境も良くて作業しやすいのに、
すぐに寛いで頭を休められるなんて……

engChrName: I have to give it to Ilhan. This idea was a success.
engSearchText: I have to give it to Ilhan. This idea was a success.
jpnChrName: 流石、噂に聞くだけあって斬新なものを考えますね、 イルハン先輩って……
jpnSearchText:
流石、噂に聞くだけあって斬新なものを考えますね、
イルハン先輩って……

engChrName: As a result, the influence of Trion Tower can be observed in various aspects of the capital's urban design...
engSearchText:
As a result, the influence of Trion Tower can be
observed in various aspects of the capital's
urban design...
jpnChrName: ……であるからして、首都の都市設計には トリオンタワーの影響も随所に……
jpnSearchText:
……であるからして、首都の都市設計には
トリオンタワーの影響も随所に……

engChrName: In addition, the industrial structure, which was future proofed under the assumption that the underground transportation system would expand...
engSearchText:
In addition, the industrial structure, which was future
proofed under the assumption that the underground
transportation system would expand...
jpnChrName: 加えて地下鉄による交通インフラの 普及を前提とした産業構造も……
jpnSearchText:
加えて地下鉄による交通インフラの
普及を前提とした産業構造も……

engChrName: Phew, time to take a break. It's easy to relax after some hard work in this store. I don't even have to think of the impending tasks I haven't done!
engSearchText:
Phew, time to take a break. It's easy to relax after
some hard work in this store. I don't even have to
think of the impending tasks I haven't done!
jpnChrName: ふう、流石に疲れてしまいましたね…… そんな時にも休みやすいからこのお店は助かります。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、流石に疲れてしまいましたね……
そんな時にも休みやすいからこのお店は助かります。

engChrName: Anyway, I'm almost halfway through my urban engineering report. Time to put my nose to the grindstone!
engSearchText:
Anyway, I'm almost halfway through my urban
engineering report. Time to put my nose to
the grindstone!
jpnChrName: さて、都市工学のレポートももう少しで 折り返しですし頑張らないと……！
jpnSearchText:
さて、都市工学のレポートももう少しで
折り返しですし頑張らないと……！

engChrName: That wallet was a birthday gift from my parents. It's really special to me.
engSearchText:
That wallet was a birthday gift from my parents.
It's really special to me.
jpnChrName: あの財布は誕生日に 両親から貰った大事な物なんです。
jpnSearchText:
あの財布は誕生日に
両親から貰った大事な物なんです。

engChrName: I'm willing to pay whatever's necessary to get it back, even if I have to purchase it back from the black market.
engSearchText:
I'm willing to pay whatever's necessary to get it back,
even if I have to purchase it back from the
black market.
jpnChrName: 勿論、闇市から買い取る事になったら お金はちゃんと支払いますから……
jpnSearchText:
勿論、闇市から買い取る事になったら
お金はちゃんと支払いますから……

engChrName: Thank you so much, and good luck with your search!
engSearchText: Thank you so much, and good luck with your search!
jpnChrName: 調査の程、どうかよろしくお願いします……！
jpnSearchText: 調査の程、どうかよろしくお願いします……！

engChrName: Been a while since I last got the chance to buy some stock from repair shops and black market dealers.
engSearchText:
Been a while since I last got the chance to buy some
stock from repair shops and black market dealers.
jpnChrName: 久々にあちこち回っての、 闇市やら修理屋やらで仕入れてきたんじゃが。
jpnSearchText:
久々にあちこち回っての、
闇市やら修理屋やらで仕入れてきたんじゃが。

engChrName: I did happen to hear a survivor of Creil's been working at Thunders.
engSearchText:
I did happen to hear a survivor of Creil's been
working at Thunders.
jpnChrName: クレイユ村の生き残りが 《サンダース》に勤めてると聞いてな。
jpnSearchText:
クレイユ村の生き残りが
《サンダース》に勤めてると聞いてな。

engChrName: Mighty awful, what happened there. I feel sorry for the lass.
engSearchText:
Mighty awful, what happened there. I feel sorry for
the lass.
jpnChrName: ふむ、流石に不憫というか……
jpnSearchText: ふむ、流石に不憫というか……

engChrName: It's the kind of wound even revenge can't heal. You don't just bounce back from something so awful.
engSearchText:
It's the kind of wound even revenge can't heal.
You don't just bounce back from something so awful.
jpnChrName: せめて仇は取られたんじゃろうが、 それで気が済むかはそれぞれじゃしなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
せめて仇は取られたんじゃろうが、
それで気が済むかはそれぞれじゃしなぁ……

engChrName: I'm not the most spotless person here, but I still feel just awful for her. Can't imagine what she's going through.
engSearchText:
I'm not the most spotless person here, but I still feel
just awful for her. Can't imagine what she's
going through.
jpnChrName: ワシもこんな商売をやっとるが、 流石に不憫というか……
jpnSearchText:
ワシもこんな商売をやっとるが、
流石に不憫というか……

engChrName: These indiscriminate attacks are just unforgivable.
engSearchText: These indiscriminate attacks are just unforgivable.
jpnChrName: “無差別”というやつは、 やはり許せんのう……
jpnSearchText:
“無差別”というやつは、
やはり許せんのう……

engChrName: Station Street's changed a whole lot since I was last above ground. It's all new and trendy shops around.
engSearchText:
Station Street's changed a whole lot since I was last
above ground. It's all new and trendy shops around.
jpnChrName: 駅前に来るのは久々ねぇ。 うふふ、オシャレなお店もできて。
jpnSearchText:
駅前に来るのは久々ねぇ。
うふふ、オシャレなお店もできて。

engChrName: Leaves an old lady like me in the dust, I'd say. Spend a little too much time underground, and the whole world changes 'round ya.
engSearchText:
Leaves an old lady like me in the dust, I'd say.
Spend a little too much time underground, and the
whole world changes 'round ya.
jpnChrName: やっぱり地下暮らしばかりだと 流行り物にも疎くなっていけないわ……
jpnSearchText:
やっぱり地下暮らしばかりだと
流行り物にも疎くなっていけないわ……

engChrName: This old woman'll have to spend some time reacquaintin' herself. But it's not all so bad. ㈱
engSearchText:
This old woman'll have to spend some time
reacquaintin' herself. But it's not all so bad. ㈱
jpnChrName: うふふ、次の“商売”のためにも 一回りしてみましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、次の“商売”のためにも
一回りしてみましょうか。

engChrName: Now, what's a dashing and handsome young man like you doing under this chilly rain?
engSearchText:
Now, what's a dashing and handsome young man like
you doing under this chilly rain?
jpnChrName: おっ、水も滴るイイ男♪ どうどう、身体冷えたんとちゃう～？
jpnSearchText:
おっ、水も滴るイイ男♪
どうどう、身体冷えたんとちゃう～？

engChrName: You should come and take refuge at our wonderful hotel! Our girls will warm you right up ...and more, should you want it!
engSearchText:
You should come and take refuge at our
wonderful hotel! Our girls will warm you right up
...and more, should you want it!
jpnChrName: ええホテルあるんよ～、オンナノコが くんずほぐれつ温めてくれるパラダイス！
jpnSearchText:
ええホテルあるんよ～、オンナノコが
くんずほぐれつ温めてくれるパラダイス！

engChrName: It's 5,000 mira for a two-hour session. A bargain, if you ask me! You can even extend the session, or take the services home with you!
engSearchText:
It's 5,000 mira for a two-hour session. A bargain, if
you ask me! You can even extend the session, or take
the services home with you!
jpnChrName: ２時間５０００ミラポッキリ！ 延長戦もお持ち帰りも兄さん次第やで～っ！？
jpnSearchText:
２時間５０００ミラポッキリ！
延長戦もお持ち帰りも兄さん次第やで～っ！？

engChrName: (Lotta barkers 'round Station Street, I guess.)
engSearchText: (Lotta barkers 'round Station Street, I guess.)
jpnChrName: （この客引きは確か……   駅前にも出没してるみてえだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（この客引きは確か……
駅前にも出没してるみてえだな。）

engChrName: (Gotta give it to this dude for puttin' in the effort to sell it under this weather.)
engSearchText:
(Gotta give it to this dude for puttin' in the effort to
sell it under this weather.)
jpnChrName: （中々手広くやってるようだが……）
jpnSearchText: （中々手広くやってるようだが……）

engChrName: Our group, WithU, will disband if the label doesn't see numbers they like.
engSearchText:
Our group, WithU, will disband if the label doesn't
see numbers they like.
jpnChrName: 私たちのユニット、《ウィズユー》…… 売れないと解散させられてしまうの。
jpnSearchText:
私たちのユニット、《ウィズユー》……
売れないと解散させられてしまうの。

engChrName: We can't let that happen, so we'll make our debut a success! They'll see the true potential behind us!
engSearchText:
We can't let that happen, so we'll make our debut
a success! They'll see the true potential behind us!
jpnChrName: だから最初で最後のライブだけは 絶対に成功させる……存続も認めさせる！
jpnSearchText:
だから最初で最後のライブだけは
絶対に成功させる……存続も認めさせる！

engChrName: If we can't do it, then no one can! I'm sure of it now!
engSearchText: If we can't do it, then no one can! I'm sure of it now!
jpnChrName: ……ええ、私たちならできるはずよ。 最近やっとそんな確信が持てるようになったの。
jpnSearchText:
……ええ、私たちならできるはずよ。
最近やっとそんな確信が持てるようになったの。

engChrName: Come on, come on! Go, go! Come on, come on! To the moon!
engSearchText:
Come on, come on! Go, go!
Come on, come on! To the moon!
jpnChrName: 行け行けＧＯＧＯ！！ 月までＧＯＧＯ！！
jpnSearchText:
行け行けＧＯＧＯ！！
月までＧＯＧＯ！！

engChrName: Thank you so much, everyone!
engSearchText: Thank you so much, everyone!
jpnChrName: ……みんな、ありがと～っ！！
jpnSearchText: <S5>……みんな、ありがと～っ！！

engChrName: Good work with today's performance. Not one hundred percent perfect, but the audience liked it. I think we did good.
engSearchText:
Good work with today's performance. Not one
hundred percent perfect, but the audience liked it.
I think we did good.
jpnChrName: ひとまず今日のイベント、お疲れ様！ 失敗もあったけど息は合ってたと思うわ。
jpnSearchText:
ひとまず今日のイベント、お疲れ様！
失敗もあったけど息は合ってたと思うわ。

engChrName: We have to practice so we can nail our big performance during the Revolution Festival.
engSearchText:
We have to practice so we can nail our big
performance during the Revolution Festival.
jpnChrName: お客さんの反応も良かったし…… あとは革命記念祭当日の本番ライブで──
jpnSearchText:
お客さんの反応も良かったし……
あとは革命記念祭当日の本番ライブで──

engChrName: Aww, Seyla! Come on, quit it with all the business talk! Relax for a moment and toast with me!
engSearchText:
Aww, Seyla! Come on, quit it with all the
business talk! Relax for a moment and toast with me!
jpnChrName: セイラさんっ！　ムズカシー話は置いて 今はカンパイしましょうよっ！！
jpnSearchText:
セイラさんっ！　ムズカシー話は置いて
今はカンパイしましょうよっ！！

engChrName: To the success of WithU's debut performance!
engSearchText: To the success of WithU's debut performance!
jpnChrName: 《ウィズユー》初ライブの成功を祈って！！
jpnSearchText: 《ウィズユー》初ライブの成功を祈って！！

engChrName: Y-Yeah... You're right. Let's go and celebrate our future success!
engSearchText:
Y-Yeah... You're right. Let's go and celebrate our
future success!
jpnChrName: そ、そうね……貴女の言う通りだわ。 ──今日は前祝いと行きましょう！
jpnSearchText:
そ、そうね……貴女の言う通りだわ。
──今日は前祝いと行きましょう！

engChrName: Yeah! I just KNOW it's going to work out for us! We're gonna kill it with our debut performance!
engSearchText:
Yeah! I just KNOW it's going to work out for us!
We're gonna kill it with our debut performance!
jpnChrName: はいっ！！　ゼッタイ上手く行きます！！ ライブ成功を祈って、カンパーイ！！
jpnSearchText:
はいっ！！　ゼッタイ上手く行きます！！
ライブ成功を祈って、カンパーイ！！

engChrName: Oh, spriggan!
engSearchText: Oh, spriggan!
jpnChrName: あっ、裏解決屋さん……！
jpnSearchText: あっ、裏解決屋さん……！

engChrName: Thank you so, so much for earlier.
engSearchText: Thank you so, so much for earlier.
jpnChrName: えへへー、さっきは皆で 盛り上がって楽しかったですね！
jpnSearchText:
えへへー、さっきは皆で
盛り上がって楽しかったですね！

engChrName: I have something here for you, actually! I hope you like it.
engSearchText:
I have something here for you, actually! I hope you
like it.
jpnChrName: ふふ、私達のプレゼントも 喜んでもらえていたらいいのだけど。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、私達のプレゼントも
喜んでもらえていたらいいのだけど。

engChrName: Oh, dang. A home cooked meal? Hope no one gets jealous that I'm getting this from a top of the line idol.
engSearchText:
Oh, dang. A home cooked meal? Hope no one gets
jealous that I'm getting this from a top of the
line idol.
jpnChrName: ああ、アイドルの手作り料理なんて 貴重なモンをありがとよ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、アイドルの手作り料理なんて
貴重なモンをありがとよ。

engChrName: Thanks. I'll be sure to enjoy it later.
engSearchText: Thanks. I'll be sure to enjoy it later.
jpnChrName: 後でありがたく頂くとするさ。
jpnSearchText: 後でありがたく頂くとするさ。
