engChrName: T-Top of the line idol? Hearing that makes me so happy!
engSearchText:
T-Top of the line idol? Hearing that makes me
so happy!
jpnChrName: “アイドル”の……ですか。 そう言ってもらえると嬉しいですっ！
jpnSearchText:
“アイドル”の……ですか。
そう言ってもらえると嬉しいですっ！

engChrName: I'm even more motivated now, Seyla!
engSearchText: I'm even more motivated now, Seyla!
jpnChrName: ますます気合が入っちゃいましたね、 セイラさんっ！
jpnSearchText:
ますます気合が入っちゃいましたね、
セイラさんっ！

engChrName: Yeah! We'll work hard and stay as idols!
engSearchText: Yeah! We'll work hard and stay as idols!
jpnChrName: ええ、これからもアイドルでいる為にも 最善を尽くしましょう……！
jpnSearchText:
ええ、これからもアイドルでいる為にも
最善を尽くしましょう……！

engChrName: I know a lot hinges on our debut performance, yeah...
engSearchText: I know a lot hinges on our debut performance, yeah...
jpnChrName: 今度の初ライブがとっても 大切なものなのは分かってます。
jpnSearchText:
今度の初ライブがとっても
大切なものなのは分かってます。

engChrName: But I believe in us! As long as we're together, we'll make the impossible possible!
engSearchText:
But I believe in us! As long as we're together, we'll
make the impossible possible!
jpnChrName: でも……あたし信じてますから！ セイラさんとなら限界だって越えられるって！
jpnSearchText:
でも……あたし信じてますから！
セイラさんとなら限界だって越えられるって！

engChrName: We gave it our all in today's performance! We just have to keep it up for the first day!
engSearchText:
We gave it our all in today's performance! We just
have to keep it up for the first day!
jpnChrName: えへへっ、今日も全力で歌って踊ったし 当日も楽しんじゃいますよ～っ！！
jpnSearchText:
えへへっ、今日も全力で歌って踊ったし
当日も楽しんじゃいますよ～っ！！

engChrName: Don't stare, or you'll make my heart race. ♪
engSearchText: Don't stare, or you'll make my heart race. ♪
jpnChrName: ドキドキするから見つめないで～っ♪
jpnSearchText: <S5>ドキドキするから見つめないで～っ♪

engChrName: We'll be performing live at the Revolution Festival! We'd love to see you all there!
engSearchText:
We'll be performing live at the Revolution
Festival! We'd love to see you all there!
jpnChrName: 革命記念祭にステージやります！ ぜひ見に来てくださいね～っ！
jpnSearchText:
革命記念祭にステージやります！
ぜひ見に来てくださいね～っ！

engChrName: Everyone looks so dejected today...
engSearchText: Everyone looks so dejected today...
jpnChrName: 行き交う皆さんも 暗い表情ばかりですけど……
jpnSearchText:
行き交う皆さんも
暗い表情ばかりですけど……

engChrName: It'd be wonderful if we could get a bit of respite right about now.
engSearchText:
It'd be wonderful if we could get a bit of respite right
about now.
jpnChrName: こんな時だからこそ、皆様に 落ち着ける時間をご提供できたら幸いです。
jpnSearchText:
こんな時だからこそ、皆様に
落ち着ける時間をご提供できたら幸いです。

engChrName: Please make sure you all pace yourselves. And remember to take breaks.
engSearchText:
Please make sure you all pace yourselves. And
remember to take breaks.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんたちも、どうか たまには一息つかれてくださいね。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさんたちも、どうか
たまには一息つかれてくださいね。

engChrName: Hello, Shino! Nice seeing you here today.
engSearchText: Hello, Shino! Nice seeing you here today.
jpnChrName: あっ、シノさん……！ こちらにいらしてたんですね！
jpnSearchText:
あっ、シノさん……！
こちらにいらしてたんですね！

engChrName: Hello, everyone. I've decided to set up shop in Station Square today.
engSearchText:
Hello, everyone. I've decided to set up shop in
Station Square today.
jpnChrName: はい、こんにちは。 今日は駅前広場に来てみました。
jpnSearchText:
はい、こんにちは。
今日は駅前広場に来てみました。

engChrName: Once the midday meal rush came around, my lunch sets began flying off the shelves, so to speak.
engSearchText:
Once the midday meal rush came around, my lunch
sets began flying off the shelves, so to speak.
jpnChrName: お昼時なのもあって ランチセットが人気みたいで。
jpnSearchText:
お昼時なのもあって
ランチセットが人気みたいで。

engChrName: The family-friendly offerings have been particularly popular. I'll have to take note of that. ♪
engSearchText:
The family-friendly offerings have been particularly
popular. I'll have to take note of that. ♪
jpnChrName: 味付けもファミリー向けが好まれますね。 私も勉強になります♪
jpnSearchText:
味付けもファミリー向けが好まれますね。
私も勉強になります♪

engChrName: Fishin' for new customers by setting up shop all around town, are you?
engSearchText:
Fishin' for new customers by setting up shop all
around town, are you?
jpnChrName: なるほど、あちこちに店を出して 客層を掴んでるっつーわけか。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど、あちこちに店を出して
客層を掴んでるっつーわけか。

engChrName: Oh, I know I'd love a combo with a little bit of everything! Like burgers and omelets and desserts!
engSearchText:
Oh, I know I'd love a combo with a little bit
of everything! Like burgers and omelets and desserts!
jpnChrName: ハンバーグとかオムレツとか デザートがあると食べたくなっちゃいます！
jpnSearchText:
ハンバーグとかオムレツとか
デザートがあると食べたくなっちゃいます！

engChrName: Hook, line, and sinker...
engSearchText: Hook, line, and sinker...
jpnChrName: ……そして完全に釣られてる奴が一人……
jpnSearchText: ……そして完全に釣られてる奴が一人……

engChrName: A-Ahaha...
engSearchText: A-Ahaha...
jpnChrName: あ、あはは……
jpnSearchText: あ、あはは……

engChrName: A medley of children's favorites... I'll be sure to keep that idea in mind.
engSearchText:
A medley of children's favorites... I'll be sure to keep
that idea in mind.
jpnChrName: 子供たちに人気な定番メニューですね。 参考にさせていただきます。
jpnSearchText:
子供たちに人気な定番メニューですね。
参考にさせていただきます。

engChrName: A lot of customers usually stop by for some daytime drinking, but the lunch combos have been pretty popular around here.
engSearchText:
A lot of customers usually stop by for some daytime
drinking, but the lunch combos have been pretty
popular around here.
jpnChrName: 昼飲みに来てくれる方も多いですが、 案外ランチセットも人気です。
jpnSearchText:
昼飲みに来てくれる方も多いですが、
案外ランチセットも人気です。

engChrName: Every location has its preferences, I suppose. ♪
engSearchText: Every location has its preferences, I suppose. ♪
jpnChrName: 色々な場所に出店すると 勉強になりますね♪
jpnSearchText:
色々な場所に出店すると
勉強になりますね♪

engChrName: No one knows what's even happening, but the bracers are just as dependable...
engSearchText:
No one knows what's even happening, but the bracers
are just as dependable...
jpnChrName: ……こんな事になっても、遊撃士の人たちは 相変わらず頼もしくてさ……
jpnSearchText:
……こんな事になっても、遊撃士の人たちは
相変わらず頼もしくてさ……

engChrName: Here I felt like such a big deal, but all I did was help with some random chores... Man, I'm stupid.
engSearchText:
Here I felt like such a big deal, but all I did was help
with some random chores... Man, I'm stupid.
jpnChrName: はは……ちょっと雑用の手伝いで役に立てたって 舞い上がってたオレがバカみてぇだ……
jpnSearchText:
はは……ちょっと雑用の手伝いで役に立てたって
舞い上がってたオレがバカみてぇだ……

engChrName: Even Kaina's repairing weapons right now! Everyone's way more useful than me...
engSearchText:
Even Kaina's repairing weapons right now!
Everyone's way more useful than me...
jpnChrName: カイナ姉ちゃんも、職人として 武器の手入れで役に立ててて……
jpnSearchText:
カイナ姉ちゃんも、職人として
武器の手入れで役に立ててて……

engChrName: And all I can do is...
engSearchText: And all I can do is...
jpnChrName: それなのに、オレは……オレは……！
jpnSearchText: それなのに、オレは……オレは……！

engChrName: Wh-What? What's going on?!
engSearchText: Wh-What? What's going on?!
jpnChrName: な、なんだよ…… 何なんだよこれ……！？
jpnSearchText:
な、なんだよ……
何なんだよこれ……！？

engChrName: You're kidding. A-Are the guys that killed Annie behind this, too?!
engSearchText:
You're kidding. A-Are the guys that killed Annie
behind this, too?!
jpnChrName: これも……アニーたちを殺した、 あの連中が……そんな……！
jpnSearchText:
これも……アニーたちを殺した、
あの連中が……そんな……！

engChrName: W-We need to stop them! But...what can I even do? Damn it!
engSearchText:
W-We need to stop them! But...what can I even do?
Damn it!
jpnChrName: くそ……一体これ以上…… オレはどうすれば……うぐっ……！
jpnSearchText:
くそ……一体これ以上……
オレはどうすれば……うぐっ……！

engChrName: Hey, long time no see!
engSearchText: Hey, long time no see!
jpnChrName: あ、兄ちゃんたち久しぶりだな！
jpnSearchText: あ、兄ちゃんたち久しぶりだな！

engChrName: Guess what? They're letting me help out with some of the guild's paperwork!
engSearchText:
Guess what? They're letting me help out with some
of the guild's paperwork!
jpnChrName: 今、ギルドで事務方面の手伝いを やらせてもらってたんだ！
jpnSearchText:
今、ギルドで事務方面の手伝いを
やらせてもらってたんだ！

engChrName: They said they were impressed with my enthusiasm and let me have a chance to experience working with them first hand!
engSearchText:
They said they were impressed with my enthusiasm
and let me have a chance to experience working with
them first hand!
jpnChrName: いやぁ、以前に見学させてもらった時に 熱意を買われて体験させてくれて！
jpnSearchText:
いやぁ、以前に見学させてもらった時に
熱意を買われて体験させてくれて！

engChrName: I'm planning to stay here for about a week, while Kaina's at the department store.
engSearchText:
I'm planning to stay here for about a week, while
Kaina's at the department store.
jpnChrName: 百貨店に行ってるカイナ姉ちゃん共々、 向こう一週間くらい世話になる予定だぜ。
jpnSearchText:
百貨店に行ってるカイナ姉ちゃん共々、
向こう一週間くらい世話になる予定だぜ。

engChrName: I thought helping out with reception would be boring, actually.
engSearchText:
I thought helping out with reception would be
boring, actually.
jpnChrName: 最初は事務とか受付の手伝いってのも 地味だなと思ってたけど……
jpnSearchText:
最初は事務とか受付の手伝いってのも
地味だなと思ってたけど……

engChrName: But now that I'm actually doing it? It's super interesting! It's all a part of a bracer's job.
engSearchText:
But now that I'm actually doing it? It's
super interesting! It's all a part of a bracer's job.
jpnChrName: やってみると、遊撃士の事も改めてわかるし 案外面白いもんだぜ？
jpnSearchText:
やってみると、遊撃士の事も改めてわかるし
案外面白いもんだぜ？

engChrName: Helping out clients is really satisfying, and I even get to see bracers working up close!
engSearchText:
Helping out clients is really satisfying, and I even get
to see bracers working up close!
jpnChrName: 特に依頼者の案内なんかは、やりがいもあるし 遊撃士の動き方も見えてくるもんだ！
jpnSearchText:
特に依頼者の案内なんかは、やりがいもあるし
遊撃士の動き方も見えてくるもんだ！

engChrName: What's with all the vigilante types nowadays, taking the law into their hands?
engSearchText:
What's with all the vigilante types nowadays, taking
the law into their hands?
jpnChrName: 最近は法律を盾に取るような連中もいるし──
jpnSearchText: 最近は法律を盾に取るような連中もいるし──

engChrName: *sigh* Makes me wish I could just arrest people on the spot, but things are never that simple...
engSearchText:
*sigh* Makes me wish I could just arrest people on
the spot, but things are never that simple...
jpnChrName: はあ、もういっそ現場判断でバンバン 検挙したいくらいなんだけど。
jpnSearchText:
はあ、もういっそ現場判断でバンバン
検挙したいくらいなんだけど。

engChrName: It's frustrating lately. I keep hearing stories about heinous crimes going unpunished due to insufficient or inconclusive evidence.
engSearchText:
It's frustrating lately. I keep hearing stories about
heinous crimes going unpunished due to insufficient
or inconclusive evidence.
jpnChrName: 最近歯痒い話が多いわよね…… 事件っぽいけど決め手に欠けるというか……
jpnSearchText:
最近歯痒い話が多いわよね……
事件っぽいけど決め手に欠けるというか……

engChrName: Things like scams or pyramid schemes. Those are the kinds of cases where arrests can't and won't be made.
engSearchText:
Things like scams or pyramid schemes. Those are the
kinds of cases where arrests can't and won't be made.
jpnChrName: 詐欺にしてもネズミ講にしても、 検挙に踏み切れないケースがあって……
jpnSearchText:
詐欺にしてもネズミ講にしても、
検挙に踏み切れないケースがあって……

engChrName: There's laws to abide by, after all. Even if they get in the way, too...
engSearchText:
There's laws to abide by, after all. Even if they get in
the way, too...
jpnChrName: まあ、それが法治国家やからねぇ…… とはいえ、どうにもならんのもなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、それが法治国家やからねぇ……
とはいえ、どうにもならんのもなぁ……

engChrName: It's those cases where the state should get off their behinds and do somethin', but of course the bracer guild keeps stealin' the spotlight.
engSearchText:
It's those cases where the state should get off their
behinds and do somethin', but of course the bracer
guild keeps stealin' the spotlight.
jpnChrName: そういう事件こそ、国家権力が遊撃士より 役に立つべき場面やろうに。
jpnSearchText:
そういう事件こそ、国家権力が遊撃士より
役に立つべき場面やろうに。

engChrName: Yeah! And then there are those that abuse the law to protect themselves.
engSearchText:
Yeah! And then there are those that abuse the law to
protect themselves.
jpnChrName: そうそう！　でも逆に法律を 盾に取るような連中もいて──
jpnSearchText:
そうそう！　でも逆に法律を
盾に取るような連中もいて──

engChrName: I guess the system hasn't kept up with the reality of matters nowadays.
engSearchText:
I guess the system hasn't kept up with the reality of
matters nowadays.
jpnChrName: こういうの、制度が現状に 追い付いていないって言うのかしらね……
jpnSearchText:
こういうの、制度が現状に
追い付いていないって言うのかしらね……

engChrName: The police headquarters gets a fair amount of reports about scams or pyramid schemes.
engSearchText:
The police headquarters gets a fair amount of
reports about scams or pyramid schemes.
jpnChrName: 本署の方でも結構、詐欺やらネズミ講やらの 相談は受け付けとるんやけどなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
本署の方でも結構、詐欺やらネズミ講やらの
相談は受け付けとるんやけどなぁ。

engChrName: But I hear it's hard to get arrest warrants for these new sorts of crimes.
engSearchText:
But I hear it's hard to get arrest warrants for these
new sorts of crimes.
jpnChrName: 何というか、新しいタイプの犯罪は 令状取るのにも苦労するらしいで～。
jpnSearchText:
何というか、新しいタイプの犯罪は
令状取るのにも苦労するらしいで～。

engChrName: It's a hard world we live in. Even for the police.
engSearchText: It's a hard world we live in. Even for the police.
jpnChrName: 警察しとっても世知辛いちゅうか、 難しい世の中やで、ホンマ～。
jpnSearchText:
警察しとっても世知辛いちゅうか、
難しい世の中やで、ホンマ～。

engChrName: I came by today for a visit. I actually work at the Crossbell Consulate.
engSearchText:
I came by today for a visit. I actually work at the
Crossbell Consulate.
jpnChrName: 僕はクロスベルの領事館に 勤めているんですが……
jpnSearchText:
僕はクロスベルの領事館に
勤めているんですが……

engChrName: But today's my daughter's birthday, so I took the day off. I better hurry up and get there soon!
engSearchText:
But today's my daughter's birthday, so I took the
day off. I better hurry up and get there soon!
jpnChrName: 娘の誕生日に合わせて休みを取りまして。 はは、早く帰ってやらないとですね！
jpnSearchText:
娘の誕生日に合わせて休みを取りまして。
はは、早く帰ってやらないとですね！

engChrName: Oh, just look at those two!
engSearchText: Oh, just look at those two!
jpnChrName: まあ！　あのお二人は……！
jpnSearchText: まあ！　あのお二人は……！

engChrName: To think that there are still girls around with such a beautiful bond...
engSearchText:
To think that there are still girls around with such a
beautiful bond...
jpnChrName: このようなペア──もとい仲睦まじい 女の子たちがまだいらしただなんて──
jpnSearchText:
このようなペア──もとい仲睦まじい
女の子たちがまだいらしただなんて──

engChrName: They called themselves idols, I think? How cute.
engSearchText: They called themselves idols, I think? How cute.
jpnChrName: “アイドル”と言いましたか…… ハァハァ……なんと尊い……！
jpnSearchText:
“アイドル”と言いましたか……
ハァハァ……なんと尊い……！

engChrName: Wait, no! I can't allow my earthly desires to get the better of me again!
engSearchText:
Wait, no! I can't allow my earthly desires to get the
better of me again!
jpnChrName: ……ハッ、また私とした事が…… ぼ、煩悩に呑まれるわけには……！
jpnSearchText:
……ハッ、また私とした事が……
ぼ、煩悩に呑まれるわけには……！

engChrName: I only just repented for them and pledged to celebrate the Revolution Festival and memorial service without them, but look at me already!
engSearchText:
I only just repented for them and pledged to celebrate
the Revolution Festival and memorial service without
them, but look at me already!
jpnChrName: いけません、記念祭と追悼式典は 煩悩を排して迎えると懺悔したばかりなのに……！
jpnSearchText:
いけません、記念祭と追悼式典は
煩悩を排して迎えると懺悔したばかりなのに……！

engChrName: But I just can't ignore the way my heart is beating. Huh? They're putting on a show at the Revolution Festival?
engSearchText:
But I just can't ignore the way my heart is beating.
Huh? They're putting on a show at the
Revolution Festival?
jpnChrName: ですがこの胸の高鳴りは…… えっ！？　記念祭にもライブを……？
jpnSearchText:
ですがこの胸の高鳴りは……
えっ！？　記念祭にもライブを……？

engChrName: Please, Sky Goddess... Guide me forward, illuminate my path...
engSearchText:
Please, Sky Goddess... Guide me forward, illuminate
my path...
jpnChrName: ああ、空の女神よ…… 私は一体どうしたら……！
jpnSearchText:
ああ、空の女神よ……
私は一体どうしたら……！

engChrName: What a horrible tragedy... So many precious lives were taken.
engSearchText:
What a horrible tragedy... So many precious lives
were taken.
jpnChrName: ……この度、本当に不幸な出来事があり…… 罪の無い方々の尊い命が失われました。
jpnSearchText:
……この度、本当に不幸な出来事があり……
罪の無い方々の尊い命が失われました。

engChrName: There will be a memorial mass held in Edith Grand Cathedral. I'm making sure people are aware of it.
engSearchText:
There will be a memorial mass held in Edith
Grand Cathedral. I'm making sure people are aware
of it.
jpnChrName: イーディス大聖堂でも追悼ミサを行っており、 そのお知らせを張り出しているのです。
jpnSearchText:
イーディス大聖堂でも追悼ミサを行っており、
そのお知らせを張り出しているのです。

engChrName: We hope many will join us today in praying to the Goddess for those we lost. May their souls find peace.
engSearchText:
We hope many will join us today in praying to the
Goddess for those we lost. May their souls find peace.
jpnChrName: 少しでも多くの方に、クレイユ村の方々の 魂の安寧を祈っていただきたいものです……
jpnSearchText:
少しでも多くの方に、クレイユ村の方々の
魂の安寧を祈っていただきたいものです……

engChrName: Oh... Those two seem to be getting on pretty well.
engSearchText: Oh... Those two seem to be getting on pretty well.
jpnChrName: あら、あのお二人は……ふふ、 随分と仲が良いのですね……
jpnSearchText:
あら、あのお二人は……ふふ、
随分と仲が良いのですね……

engChrName: It makes me so happy to see two sweet girls having such a lovely bond...
engSearchText:
It makes me so happy to see two sweet girls having
such a lovely bond...
jpnChrName: やはり、無垢な女の子同士の仲睦まじい姿は 見ていると何か幸せな気持ちになるというか……
jpnSearchText:
やはり、無垢な女の子同士の仲睦まじい姿は
見ていると何か幸せな気持ちになるというか……

engChrName: Wait, I was meant to be doing some shopping... I'd better hurry up and go back to the cathedral.
engSearchText:
Wait, I was meant to be doing some shopping...
I'd better hurry up and go back to the cathedral.
jpnChrName: っと、そういえば買い出しの途中でした…… 早く大聖堂に帰らねば。
jpnSearchText:
っと、そういえば買い出しの途中でした……
早く大聖堂に帰らねば。

engChrName: Still, I'm grateful I get to see such a sight.
engSearchText: Still, I'm grateful I get to see such a sight.
jpnChrName: ふふ、この光景を見れた事に感謝を。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、この光景を見れた事に感謝を。

engChrName: Wow, what a sight! You can see the whole front of the station!
engSearchText:
Wow, what a sight! You can see the whole front of
the station!
jpnChrName: わわっ、いい景色～！ 駅前がぜんぶ見渡せるなんて！
jpnSearchText:
わわっ、いい景色～！
駅前がぜんぶ見渡せるなんて！

engChrName: Kinda makes you wanna shout, 'hi!' at the people down below, right, Apollo?
engSearchText:
Kinda makes you wanna shout, 'hi!' at the people
down below, right, Apollo?
jpnChrName: 『ヤッホー』って言いたく なっちゃうわよね、アポロっ！
jpnSearchText:
『ヤッホー』って言いたく
なっちゃうわよね、アポロっ！

engChrName: Woof?
engSearchText: Woof?
jpnChrName: ……ウォフン？
jpnSearchText: ……ウォフン？

engChrName: I'm pretty restless myself, but the least I could do is hear Chignon out.
engSearchText:
I'm pretty restless myself, but the least I could do is
hear Chignon out.
jpnChrName: あたしも落ち着かないけど…… シニョンの話、なるべく聞いてあげないとね。
jpnSearchText:
あたしも落ち着かないけど……
シニョンの話、なるべく聞いてあげないとね。

engChrName: Actually, I think I saw Renne head towards the guild a bit ago.
engSearchText:
Actually, I think I saw Renne head towards the guild
a bit ago.
jpnChrName: そういえば、さっきレン先輩が ギルドに入っていくのが見えたけど……
jpnSearchText:
そういえば、さっきレン先輩が
ギルドに入っていくのが見えたけど……

engChrName: She went to the Basel guild branch, too. What is she up to? Who IS she?
engSearchText:
She went to the Basel guild branch, too. What is she
up to? Who IS she?
jpnChrName: うーん、バーゼルでもギルド支部に行ってたし ……先輩ってホントに何者なんだろ？
jpnSearchText:
うーん、バーゼルでもギルド支部に行ってたし
……先輩ってホントに何者なんだろ？

engChrName: There's still a fair amount of unresolved issues, but I suspect that won't be the case for too much longer.
engSearchText:
There's still a fair amount of unresolved issues, but
I suspect that won't be the case for too much longer.
jpnChrName: 不明瞭な事柄も多いけれど、 今の状況はそう長くは続かないわ。
jpnSearchText:
不明瞭な事柄も多いけれど、
今の状況はそう長くは続かないわ。

engChrName: The government, guild headquarters, and secret forces are aware of the neighboring countries' movements and taking action against them.
engSearchText:
The government, guild headquarters, and secret
forces are aware of the neighboring countries'
movements and taking action against them.
jpnChrName: 政府系機関、ギルドの総本部、裏の勢力に 周辺諸国も把握と対処に動いている──
jpnSearchText:
政府系機関、ギルドの総本部、裏の勢力に
周辺諸国も把握と対処に動いている──

engChrName: Based on the footage that guy left behind, at least.
engSearchText: Based on the footage that guy left behind, at least.
jpnChrName: あのお兄さんが残した映像を元にね。
jpnSearchText: あのお兄さんが残した映像を元にね。

engChrName: It won't be long until they make a move, so do prepare yourself.
engSearchText:
It won't be long until they make a move, so do
prepare yourself.
jpnChrName: 近々動きがあるはずよ。 貴方たちも心構えはしておきなさい。
jpnSearchText:
近々動きがあるはずよ。
貴方たちも心構えはしておきなさい。

engChrName: We can't rule out that what happened in Basel could happen here, too.
engSearchText:
We can't rule out that what happened in Basel could
happen here, too.
jpnChrName: こんな事態ですし、バーゼルのような 騒動が起きないとも限りません……
jpnSearchText:
こんな事態ですし、バーゼルのような
騒動が起きないとも限りません……

engChrName: I think I'll send my weapons in for some maintenance. It's been a while since I last did so.
engSearchText:
I think I'll send my weapons in for
some maintenance. It's been a while since I last
did so.
jpnChrName: 久々に武器の手入れを しておこうと思いまして。
jpnSearchText:
久々に武器の手入れを
しておこうと思いまして。

engChrName: This weapon still doesn't feel right in my hands.
engSearchText: This weapon still doesn't feel right in my hands.
jpnChrName: ……しかし、やはり手に馴染む剣が 手元にないのは心細いですね……
jpnSearchText:
……しかし、やはり手に馴染む剣が
手元にないのは心細いですね……

engChrName: It's a shame I couldn't bring my actual weapon with me to Calvard. It's still at my parents' place.
engSearchText:
It's a shame I couldn't bring my actual weapon with
me to Calvard. It's still at my parents' place.
jpnChrName: 実家で使っていた剣は、流石に カルバードには持ち込めませんでしたし。
jpnSearchText:
実家で使っていた剣は、流石に
カルバードには持ち込めませんでしたし。

engChrName: Everything's still really messy, but worrying alone won't do me good. Might as well prepare, just in case.
engSearchText:
Everything's still really messy, but worrying alone
won't do me good. Might as well prepare, just in case.
jpnChrName: 情勢に不安はありますが、 今は備えるしかなさそうです。
jpnSearchText:
情勢に不安はありますが、
今は備えるしかなさそうです。

engChrName: I want to protect my classmates and everyone in this country. I should at least make sure my equipment is in working order.
engSearchText:
I want to protect my classmates and everyone in
this country. I should at least make sure my
equipment is in working order.
jpnChrName: 僕も同窓生やこの国の人たちを守りたい── せめて武器の手入れをしておかないと。
jpnSearchText:
僕も同窓生やこの国の人たちを守りたい──
せめて武器の手入れをしておかないと。

engChrName: I heard a lot about this orbal café, but this is my first time here, actually. It's a lot more innovative than I pictured it.
engSearchText:
I heard a lot about this orbal café, but this is my first
time here, actually. It's a lot more innovative than I
pictured it.
jpnChrName: ここが噂の“オーバルカフェ”── 驚いたな、どこまでも斬新というか……
jpnSearchText:
ここが噂の“オーバルカフェ”──
驚いたな、どこまでも斬新というか……

engChrName: It's modern, but not sterile. It's actually quite homey, and the staff really show that they care.
engSearchText:
It's modern, but not sterile. It's actually quite homey,
and the staff really show that they care.
jpnChrName: そしてモダニズムの中にも 確かなホスピタリティを感じる──
jpnSearchText:
そしてモダニズムの中にも
確かなホスピタリティを感じる──

engChrName: What a nice spot.
engSearchText: What a nice spot.
jpnChrName: うん、素晴らしいね。
jpnSearchText: うん、素晴らしいね。

engChrName: Look at you, man. You feel like you're straight out of a magazine cover. All looks, and nothing up in your head.
engSearchText:
Look at you, man. You feel like you're straight out of
a magazine cover. All looks, and nothing up in
your head.
jpnChrName: さらっと絵になりやがってよぉ…… この天然イケメンが！
jpnSearchText:
さらっと絵になりやがってよぉ……
この天然イケメンが！

engChrName: You've still got a long way to come, Julian. I can't believe you haven't noticed what the REAL charm of this place is!
engSearchText:
You've still got a long way to come, Julian. I can't
believe you haven't noticed what the REAL charm of
this place is!
jpnChrName: ハッ、だがまだまだだねぇ、ユリアン。 この店の真の魅力に気づいてねえとはなっ！
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、だがまだまだだねぇ、ユリアン。
この店の真の魅力に気づいてねえとはなっ！

engChrName: The...real charm?
engSearchText: The...real charm?
jpnChrName: えっと、真の魅力……？
jpnSearchText: えっと、真の魅力……？

engChrName: Yeah, man! All the girls! Trendy places like these are just chick magnets!
engSearchText:
Yeah, man! All the girls! Trendy places like these are
just chick magnets!
jpnChrName: 見ろよ、若い女性客が多いだろ！？ オンナってのはオシャレな店に集まんだよ！
jpnSearchText:
見ろよ、若い女性客が多いだろ！？
オンナってのはオシャレな店に集まんだよ！

engChrName: I didn't bring you here to gape at the place—we're here to woo some babes!
engSearchText:
I didn't bring you here to gape at the place—we're
here to woo some babes!
jpnChrName: つまりお前をここに誘った目的は１つ── ナンパに決まってらァ！！
jpnSearchText:
つまりお前をここに誘った目的は１つ──
ナンパに決まってらァ！！

engChrName: You're nothing if not determined...
engSearchText: You're nothing if not determined...
jpnChrName: ナ、ナンパって…… ブレないなぁ、ライエルは。
jpnSearchText:
ナ、ナンパって……
ブレないなぁ、ライエルは。

engChrName: AND I have my ace in the hole! No way we're not scoring with you in tow!
engSearchText:
AND I have my ace in the hole! No way we're not
scoring with you in tow!
jpnChrName: 頼むぜユリアン～！！　お前が一緒なら ゼッテー成功できるんだっての！！
jpnSearchText:
頼むぜユリアン～！！　お前が一緒なら
ゼッテー成功できるんだっての！！

engChrName: Oh, hey Agnès! What'cha doin'? Who's this guy?
engSearchText: Oh, hey Agnès! What'cha doin'? Who's this guy?
jpnChrName: あれ、アニエスちゃんじゃーん！ ……ってそっちの人は？
jpnSearchText:
あれ、アニエスちゃんじゃーん！
……ってそっちの人は？

engChrName: Isn't he her boss? I visited the place the other day.
engSearchText: Isn't he her boss? I visited the place the other day.
jpnChrName: この前伺った バイト先の方でしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
この前伺った
バイト先の方でしょうか？

engChrName: Yeah, this is him. I'm actually at work right now.
engSearchText: Yeah, this is him. I'm actually at work right now.
jpnChrName: ええ、そうなんです。 今も一応仕事中でして。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、そうなんです。
今も一応仕事中でして。

engChrName: O-Oh! Work, right! Man, you freaked me out there. Totally thought you were out on a date or something.
engSearchText:
O-Oh! Work, right! Man, you freaked me out there.
Totally thought you were out on a date or something.
jpnChrName: だ、だよな～っ！　いや～カレシと デート中なのかとビビッちまったぜ～！
jpnSearchText:
だ、だよな～っ！　いや～カレシと
デート中なのかとビビッちまったぜ～！

engChrName: I shouldn't have doubted you for even a second! Though speaking of dates, what'cha feel to grabbing some tea with me sometime?
engSearchText:
I shouldn't have doubted you for even a second!
Though speaking of dates, what'cha feel to grabbing
some tea with me sometime?
jpnChrName: いや、オレはアニエスちゃんを信じてたぜっ！ ってわけでさ～今度一緒にお茶しねぇ～？
jpnSearchText:
いや、オレはアニエスちゃんを信じてたぜっ！
ってわけでさ～今度一緒にお茶しねぇ～？

engChrName: (I don't exactly NOT like Lyle, but I'm not sure I wanna say yes, either...)
engSearchText:
(I don't exactly NOT like Lyle, but I'm not sure I
wanna say yes, either...)
jpnChrName: （ライエル君、悪い人じゃ   ないんですけど……）
jpnSearchText:
（ライエル君、悪い人じゃ
ないんですけど……）

engChrName: (Nothin' wrong with being upfront about it.)
engSearchText: (Nothin' wrong with being upfront about it.)
jpnChrName: （ま、分かりやすい青少年ってのも   嫌いじゃないがな。）
jpnSearchText:
（ま、分かりやすい青少年ってのも
嫌いじゃないがな。）

engChrName: (Aaand there he goes again. I'm gonna have to talk to him about this before he embarrasses himself any more.)
engSearchText:
(Aaand there he goes again. I'm gonna have to talk to
him about this before he embarrasses himself
any more.)
jpnChrName: （はは、なんだかすみません……   自分からも注意しておきますから。）
jpnSearchText:
（はは、なんだかすみません……
自分からも注意しておきますから。）

engChrName: It's like you're my lucky star, Julian.
engSearchText: It's like you're my lucky star, Julian.
jpnChrName: だからよ、ユリアンと仲良くなれたのは オレにとって渡りに舟なんだっつの。
jpnSearchText:
だからよ、ユリアンと仲良くなれたのは
オレにとって渡りに舟なんだっつの。

engChrName: I swear my luck was down in the dumps till now, but I've been on my A-game ever since you came around!
engSearchText:
I swear my luck was down in the dumps till now, but
I've been on my A-game ever since you came around!
jpnChrName: ここンとこナンパもスランプ気味だしよ、 美少年のお前には是非付き合ってもらわねーと！
jpnSearchText:
ここンとこナンパもスランプ気味だしよ、
美少年のお前には是非付き合ってもらわねーと！

engChrName: Haha. If anything, at least you're honest with me.
engSearchText: Haha. If anything, at least you're honest with me.
jpnChrName: はは、ライエルのそういう表裏のない所は 嫌いじゃないけどね。
jpnSearchText:
はは、ライエルのそういう表裏のない所は
嫌いじゃないけどね。

engChrName: You should get yourself a nice part-time gig! I got one not too long ago, actually.
engSearchText:
You should get yourself a nice part-time gig! I got
one not too long ago, actually.
jpnChrName: へへっ、時給のいいバイト見つけてよ！ この前から入ってんだ。
jpnSearchText:
へへっ、時給のいいバイト見つけてよ！
この前から入ってんだ。

engChrName: I sorely needed some cash after all those failed dates and stuff.
engSearchText:
I sorely needed some cash after all those failed dates
and stuff.
jpnChrName: 先月はナンパも連敗しちまったし 懐具合が寂しくてよ～。
jpnSearchText:
先月はナンパも連敗しちまったし
懐具合が寂しくてよ～。

engChrName: Cooking jobs turned out to be a piece of cake, pun totally intended! I cook at home all the time, so I'm used to it.
engSearchText:
Cooking jobs turned out to be a piece of cake, pun
totally intended! I cook at home all the time, so I'm
used to it.
jpnChrName: ま、メシの支度は毎日家族分用意してっから 料理系のバイトならお手のモンだぜ！
jpnSearchText:
ま、メシの支度は毎日家族分用意してっから
料理系のバイトならお手のモンだぜ！

engChrName: (Huh. Kid's got some wholesome in him. Not just chicks up in his brain.)
engSearchText:
(Huh. Kid's got some wholesome in him. Not just
chicks up in his brain.)
jpnChrName: （軽薄な野郎かと思ってたら   結構健気な感じっつーか……）
jpnSearchText:
（軽薄な野郎かと思ってたら
結構健気な感じっつーか……）

engChrName: (I remember Lyle saying he was having quite a tough time at home, since it's just him and his mom...)
engSearchText:
(I remember Lyle saying he was having quite a tough
time at home, since it's just him and his mom...)
jpnChrName: （そういえばライエル君、母子家庭で   何かと苦労してるって言ってましたね……）
jpnSearchText:
（そういえばライエル君、母子家庭で
何かと苦労してるって言ってましたね……）

engChrName: My mom's health isn't the best, so I take care of all the cooking and house chores.
engSearchText:
My mom's health isn't the best, so I take care of all
the cooking and house chores.
jpnChrName: 母ちゃん身体弱ぇからな～、 料理とか家事全般やってっけど……
jpnSearchText:
母ちゃん身体弱ぇからな～、
料理とか家事全般やってっけど……

engChrName: *sigh* Is my househusband appeal not good enough?
engSearchText: *sigh* Is my househusband appeal not good enough?
jpnChrName: んな事しててもちっとも ナンパテク上がんねーし。
jpnSearchText:
んな事しててもちっとも
ナンパテク上がんねーし。

engChrName: What's a high schooler supposed to do with this lame a love life?
engSearchText:
What's a high schooler supposed to do with this lame
a love life?
jpnChrName: 悩ましいよな、男子高校生ってのもよ。
jpnSearchText: 悩ましいよな、男子高校生ってのもよ。

engChrName: (I think everyone wants a guy that can take care of himself, but maybe don't put that in the first date résumé.)
engSearchText:
(I think everyone wants a guy that can take care
of himself, but maybe don't put that in the first
date résumé.)
jpnChrName: （家事ができりゃ   それなりにモテそうだがな。）
jpnSearchText:
（家事ができりゃ
それなりにモテそうだがな。）

engChrName: (Ahaha... Lyle's nice if you get to know him.)
engSearchText: (Ahaha... Lyle's nice if you get to know him.)
jpnChrName: （あはは……ライエル君の   イメージには無いみたいですね。）
jpnSearchText:
（あはは……ライエル君の
イメージには無いみたいですね。）

engChrName: Oh, this is a good angle! Pan the camera to get a good shot of the Central Station...
engSearchText:
Oh, this is a good angle! Pan the camera to get a
good shot of the Central Station...
jpnChrName: あ、この角度良いかも！ カメラパンしながら中央駅を映して──
jpnSearchText:
あ、この角度良いかも！
カメラパンしながら中央駅を映して──

engChrName: And if I add a voiceover to it, it'll feel like the start of a real movie!
engSearchText:
And if I add a voiceover to it, it'll feel like the start of
a real movie!
jpnChrName: うん、ナレーションを当てれば 映画の冒頭っぽくできそう！！
jpnSearchText:
うん、ナレーションを当てれば
映画の冒頭っぽくできそう！！

engChrName: All that's left is to put it all together! This is gonna be hard. Maybe Renne would know what to do?
engSearchText:
All that's left is to put it all together! This is gonna
be hard. Maybe Renne would know what to do?
jpnChrName: あとは映像編集だよね～……難しそうだけど ……レン先輩なら教えてくれるかなぁ？
jpnSearchText:
あとは映像編集だよね～……難しそうだけど
……レン先輩なら教えてくれるかなぁ？

engChrName: (They trying to make a movie? Well, damn. Good for them.)
engSearchText:
(They trying to make a movie? Well, damn. Good
for them.)
jpnChrName: （へえ、自分で映画を作ろうってのか。   大した熱意じゃねえか。）
jpnSearchText:
（へえ、自分で映画を作ろうってのか。
大した熱意じゃねえか。）

engChrName: (Chignon's been really enthused ever since she bought that camera.)
engSearchText:
(Chignon's been really enthused ever since she bought
that camera.)
jpnChrName: （ええ、シニョンってば   カメラを買ってから張り切っていて。）
jpnSearchText:
（ええ、シニョンってば
カメラを買ってから張り切っていて。）

engChrName: (She's determined to get her own slot for the school festival.)
engSearchText:
(She's determined to get her own slot for the
school festival.)
jpnChrName: （学藝祭の出し物にしたいって   気合を入れてるみたいです。）
jpnSearchText:
（学藝祭の出し物にしたいって
気合を入れてるみたいです。）

engChrName: It's mindblowing that I finally get to use all my favorite film techniques!
engSearchText:
It's mindblowing that I finally get to use all my
favorite film techniques!
jpnChrName: う～ん、憧れだった撮影技術が 自分で実践できるなんてサイコー！！
jpnSearchText:
う～ん、憧れだった撮影技術が
自分で実践できるなんてサイコー！！

engChrName: Second hand it might've been, but this camera was my BEST purchase ever! Next step: I gotta figure out editing!
engSearchText:
Second hand it might've been, but this camera was
my BEST purchase ever! Next step: I gotta figure
out editing!
jpnChrName: 中古品だけど買ってよかったな～っ！ あとはなんとか映像編集を……！
jpnSearchText:
中古品だけど買ってよかったな～っ！
あとはなんとか映像編集を……！

engChrName: I visited Creil Village once when I was taking a movie location tour. It was a really nice place...
engSearchText:
I visited Creil Village once when I was taking a movie
location tour. It was a really nice place...
jpnChrName: クレイユ村……ロケ地巡りで一回だけ行ったけど 本当に良いところだったの……
jpnSearchText:
クレイユ村……ロケ地巡りで一回だけ行ったけど
本当に良いところだったの……

engChrName: Even when it was still all black and white, the atmosphere came through just perfectly through the screen in the early days of cinema.
engSearchText:
Even when it was still all black and white, the
atmosphere came through just perfectly through the
screen in the early days of cinema.
jpnChrName: だからこそ、黎明期の映画でも空気感が 活かせて、白黒なのに鮮やかな──
jpnSearchText:
だからこそ、黎明期の映画でも空気感が
活かせて、白黒なのに鮮やかな──

engChrName: Oh, umm... Maybe now's not the time to be talking about movies...
engSearchText:
Oh, umm... Maybe now's not the time to be talking
about movies...
jpnChrName: あ……こんな時に映画の話なんて 不謹慎かな……あはは、あたしったら……
jpnSearchText:
あ……こんな時に映画の話なんて
不謹慎かな……あはは、あたしったら……

engChrName: *sigh* This whole deal is so depressing. Creil was there one moment and then, poof. Gone the next.
engSearchText:
*sigh* This whole deal is so depressing. Creil was
there one moment and then, poof. Gone the next.
jpnChrName: まさかこんな事が起こるなんて…… ……はぁぁ、気ばかり滅入っちゃうよ～……
jpnSearchText:
まさかこんな事が起こるなんて……
……はぁぁ、気ばかり滅入っちゃうよ～……

engChrName: We don't have any classes this afternoon, so I'm just kinda restless.
engSearchText:
We don't have any classes this afternoon, so I'm just
kinda restless.
jpnChrName: うん……授業も午前中だけになっちゃったし どうにも落ち着かないよね……
jpnSearchText:
うん……授業も午前中だけになっちゃったし
どうにも落ち着かないよね……

engChrName: You've visited Creil Village, right, Chignon?
engSearchText: You've visited Creil Village, right, Chignon?
jpnChrName: シニョンはクレイユ村に行った事が あったんだっけ？
jpnSearchText:
シニョンはクレイユ村に行った事が
あったんだっけ？

engChrName: Yeah. It was my pilgrimage to some of the holy ground of early filmmaking.
engSearchText:
Yeah. It was my pilgrimage to some of the holy
ground of early filmmaking.
jpnChrName: うん……あそこ、映画のロケ地にも使われてて 前に聖地巡りで行ったんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
うん……あそこ、映画のロケ地にも使われてて
前に聖地巡りで行ったんだけど……

engChrName: What a quiet little town it was. The lady at the inn basically treated me like family.
engSearchText:
What a quiet little town it was. The lady at the inn
basically treated me like family.
jpnChrName: のどかで宿のお姉さんも親切だったし 本当にいい場所だったのに………
jpnSearchText:
のどかで宿のお姉さんも親切だったし
本当にいい場所だったのに………

engChrName: (Feels like I'm listening to children on their way back home from school.)
engSearchText:
(Feels like I'm listening to children on their way back
home from school.)
jpnChrName: （学校帰りに話を   聞いてやってるみたいだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（学校帰りに話を
聞いてやってるみたいだな。）

engChrName: (This constant stream of bad news has left a lot of students feeling down.)
engSearchText:
(This constant stream of bad news has left a lot of
students feeling down.)
jpnChrName: （ええ、連日の暗い報道で   落ち込んでる生徒も多くて……）
jpnSearchText:
（ええ、連日の暗い報道で
落ち込んでる生徒も多くて……）

engChrName: (Even then, I try my best to listen to their problems as part of the Student Council.)
engSearchText:
(Even then, I try my best to listen to their problems as
part of the Student Council.)
jpnChrName: （生徒会でもなるべく相談に   乗るようにしているんですよね。）
jpnSearchText:
（生徒会でもなるべく相談に
乗るようにしているんですよね。）

engChrName: Why is everyone so annoying? Sasha especially.
engSearchText: Why is everyone so annoying? Sasha especially.
jpnChrName: サーシャの奴もそうだが…… どいつもこいつもウルセェんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
サーシャの奴もそうだが……
どいつもこいつもウルセェんだよ。

engChrName: Ugh, just leave me alone!
engSearchText: Ugh, just leave me alone!
jpnChrName: ハッ、放っとけっつーの！！
jpnSearchText: ハッ、放っとけっつーの！！

engChrName: Practice will start getting way more intense now that the basketball club made it to nationals.
engSearchText:
Practice will start getting way more intense now that
the basketball club made it to nationals.
jpnChrName: バスケ部は全国大会まで行ったし、 練習も手が抜けないのよね～。
jpnSearchText:
バスケ部は全国大会まで行ったし、
練習も手が抜けないのよね～。

engChrName: But I can't put my juniors in danger, either! It's my duty to escort them home.
engSearchText:
But I can't put my juniors in danger, either! It's my
duty to escort them home.
jpnChrName: とはいえ後輩を危険に晒すわけにはいかないし。 しっかりエスコートしないとね♪
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ後輩を危険に晒すわけにはいかないし。
しっかりエスコートしないとね♪

engChrName: This is such a promising opportunity! I gotta focus!
engSearchText: This is such a promising opportunity! I gotta focus!
jpnChrName: ふう、久々に有望な話になりそうだし 私も気合を入れないと……！
jpnSearchText:
ふう、久々に有望な話になりそうだし
私も気合を入れないと……！

engChrName: I can't afford to waste any time. I can do this!
engSearchText: I can't afford to waste any time. I can do this!
jpnChrName: そう、時間は貴重なの。 全力で頑張るのよ、ソニア！！
jpnSearchText:
そう、時間は貴重なの。
全力で頑張るのよ、ソニア！！

engChrName: Was that Mr. Powell we saw earlier?
engSearchText: Was that Mr. Powell we saw earlier?
jpnChrName: ……ってそういえば、さっき表で パウエル先生を見かけたような……？
jpnSearchText:
……ってそういえば、さっき表で
パウエル先生を見かけたような……？

engChrName: Maybe he's doing a night patrol. It'd be so awkward if he saw us...
engSearchText:
Maybe he's doing a night patrol. It'd be so awkward if
he saw us...
jpnChrName: 夜の見回りかしら。 顔を合わせたら流石に気まずいわね……
jpnSearchText:
夜の見回りかしら。
顔を合わせたら流石に気まずいわね……

engChrName: (What's that teacher up to?)
engSearchText: (What's that teacher up to?)
jpnChrName: （……この先生は……）
jpnSearchText: （……この先生は……）

engChrName: (...I probably shouldn't stick my nose in.)
engSearchText: (...I probably shouldn't stick my nose in.)
jpnChrName: （まあいい、声を掛けるのは止めておくか。）
jpnSearchText: （まあいい、声を掛けるのは止めておくか。）

engChrName: As long as you're with them, Sasha, I don't have to worry.
engSearchText:
As long as you're with them, Sasha, I don't have
to worry.
jpnChrName: ま、サーシャが付いてるなら安心ね。
jpnSearchText: ま、サーシャが付いてるなら安心ね。

engChrName: I still have a bit of night patrol left to go, so feel free to reach out if you get in any trouble.
engSearchText:
I still have a bit of night patrol left to go, so feel free
to reach out if you get in any trouble.
jpnChrName: 先生、もう少し夜回りしてるから 何かあったら連絡しなさいよ～っ！
jpnSearchText:
先生、もう少し夜回りしてるから
何かあったら連絡しなさいよ～っ！

engChrName: Oh, Ms. Sonia! Are you on night watch again?
engSearchText: Oh, Ms. Sonia! Are you on night watch again?
jpnChrName: あ、ソニア先生じゃないですか！ 今日も夜回りですか～！？
jpnSearchText:
あ、ソニア先生じゃないですか！
今日も夜回りですか～！？

engChrName: That I am. Someone's got to keep all these delinquents out past curfew in check!
engSearchText:
That I am. Someone's got to keep all these
delinquents out past curfew in check!
jpnChrName: ええ、夜遊びするような非行生徒には 鉄拳をお見舞いする必要があるからね！
jpnSearchText:
ええ、夜遊びするような非行生徒には
鉄拳をお見舞いする必要があるからね！

engChrName: I'm guessing you're on your way back from club practice? It's rather late...
engSearchText:
I'm guessing you're on your way back from
club practice? It's rather late...
jpnChrName: そういうサーシャ達は部活の帰りかしら？ 随分遅いみたいだけど……
jpnSearchText:
そういうサーシャ達は部活の帰りかしら？
随分遅いみたいだけど……

engChrName: Oh, yeah. You see, the winter nationals are just around the corner.
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah. You see, the winter nationals are just
around the corner.
jpnChrName: アハハ、冬の全国大会が近くって。
jpnSearchText: アハハ、冬の全国大会が近くって。

engChrName: So it's extra important I escort the students at least partway home, since they don't have club practice.
engSearchText:
So it's extra important I escort the students at least
partway home, since they don't have club practice.
jpnChrName: ま、その分自宅組の女生徒は 途中までエスコートしますけどね！
jpnSearchText:
ま、その分自宅組の女生徒は
途中までエスコートしますけどね！

engChrName: Thank you so much, Sasha! I've heard so many scary stories recently...
engSearchText:
Thank you so much, Sasha! I've heard so many scary
stories recently...
jpnChrName: サーシャ先輩、ありがとうございます！ 最近は色々と怖い話も聞くし……
jpnSearchText:
サーシャ先輩、ありがとうございます！
最近は色々と怖い話も聞くし……

engChrName: B-But with you by my side, I won't feel as nervous!
engSearchText: B-But with you by my side, I won't feel as nervous!
jpnChrName: で、でも先輩が一緒なら安心できます！
jpnSearchText: で、でも先輩が一緒なら安心できます！

engChrName: Yeah! You're way more trustworthy than some stinking boys!
engSearchText:
Yeah! You're way more trustworthy than some
stinking boys!
jpnChrName: うんうん、下手な男子より よっぽど頼りになるわよねっ！
jpnSearchText:
うんうん、下手な男子より
よっぽど頼りになるわよねっ！

engChrName: Just as popular with your underclassmen as ever.
engSearchText: Just as popular with your underclassmen as ever.
jpnChrName: うーん、相変わらず後輩から 人気があるわね～……
jpnSearchText:
うーん、相変わらず後輩から
人気があるわね～……

engChrName: Well, take care. Let me know if you need any help, all right?
engSearchText:
Well, take care. Let me know if you need any help,
all right?
jpnChrName: ま、ともかく気を付けてね。 何かあったら先生に連絡を入れる事！
jpnSearchText:
ま、ともかく気を付けてね。
何かあったら先生に連絡を入れる事！

engChrName: I will! You have my word as the general club manager. ♪
engSearchText:
I will! You have my word as the general
club manager. ♪
jpnChrName: 了解です、部活連統括の名に懸けて♪
jpnSearchText: 了解です、部活連統括の名に懸けて♪

engChrName: You look like you've got something weighing on your mind as well...
engSearchText:
You look like you've got something weighing on your
mind as well...
jpnChrName: 君も抱えている物があるようだが……
jpnSearchText: 君も抱えている物があるようだが……

engChrName: It's my job as a teacher to listen to you.
engSearchText: It's my job as a teacher to listen to you.
jpnChrName: こんな時間に会ってしまった以上、 教師としても話を聞かせてもらわなくてはね。
jpnSearchText:
こんな時間に会ってしまった以上、
教師としても話を聞かせてもらわなくてはね。

engChrName: Hey, James... What are you doing in a place like this?
engSearchText: Hey, James... What are you doing in a place like this?
jpnChrName: おやジェイムス君…… こんな所で何をしているのかね？
jpnSearchText:
おやジェイムス君……
こんな所で何をしているのかね？

engChrName: (Of course I'd run into one of the instructors.)
engSearchText: (Of course I'd run into one of the instructors.)
jpnChrName: （チッ……先公かよ、メンドクセェ……）
jpnSearchText: （チッ……先公かよ、メンドクセェ……）

engChrName: None of your business.
engSearchText: None of your business.
jpnChrName: なんでもねーよ、 アンタにゃ関係ねえだろ。
jpnSearchText:
なんでもねーよ、
アンタにゃ関係ねえだろ。

engChrName: Hrm... It's fine if you're just on your way back from shopping, but it's starting to get late.
engSearchText:
Hrm... It's fine if you're just on your way back from
shopping, but it's starting to get late.
jpnChrName: ふむ、買い物の帰りならいいんだが 時間が時間だからねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、買い物の帰りならいいんだが
時間が時間だからねぇ。

engChrName: I've been...worried about you. I get the impression that you've had a hard time fitting in at school.
engSearchText:
I've been...worried about you. I get the impression
that you've had a hard time fitting in at school.
jpnChrName: それに……君はどうやら、今の学校に居場所が 無いと感じているようだから気になってね。
jpnSearchText:
それに……君はどうやら、今の学校に居場所が
無いと感じているようだから気になってね。

engChrName: Wh-Why are you even bringing that up?! That's old news!
engSearchText:
Wh-Why are you even bringing that up?! That's
old news!
jpnChrName: ………っ………！ また古い話を持ち出しやがって……
jpnSearchText:
………っ………！
また古い話を持ち出しやがって……

engChrName: Forget it! I'm going home! Not in the mood for an annoying lecture right now.
engSearchText:
Forget it! I'm going home! Not in the mood for an
annoying lecture right now.
jpnChrName: ──もういい、俺は帰る！ ウダウダウルセェんだよ、糞が……！
jpnSearchText:
──もういい、俺は帰る！
ウダウダウルセェんだよ、糞が……！

engChrName: Fancy seeing you here, spriggan.
engSearchText: Fancy seeing you here, spriggan.
jpnChrName: む、裏解決屋──お前か。
jpnSearchText: む、裏解決屋──お前か。

engChrName: Right back at ya. You lookin' for weapons today?
engSearchText: Right back at ya. You lookin' for weapons today?
jpnChrName: お前かとはご挨拶だな。 あんたこそ得物の物色かい？
jpnSearchText:
お前かとはご挨拶だな。
あんたこそ得物の物色かい？

engChrName: Or you lookin' at the buyers instead?
engSearchText: Or you lookin' at the buyers instead?
jpnChrName: それとも── “客層”のリサーチにでも来たとかか？
jpnSearchText:
それとも──
“客層”のリサーチにでも来たとかか？

engChrName: I've frequented this shop for my gun maintenance and customization since the old owner was still in charge.
engSearchText:
I've frequented this shop for my gun maintenance and
customization since the old owner was still in charge.
jpnChrName: フン、銃の調整は“先代”の頃から ここに頼んでいるというだけだ。
jpnSearchText:
フン、銃の調整は“先代”の頃から
ここに頼んでいるというだけだ。

engChrName: Possession of firearms is permitted under Republic law for the purposes of self-defense.
engSearchText:
Possession of firearms is permitted under Republic
law for the purposes of self-defense.
jpnChrName: 一応、共和国法で自衛目的の範囲内なら 銃の購入と所持は認められているからな。
jpnSearchText:
一応、共和国法で自衛目的の範囲内なら
銃の購入と所持は認められているからな。

engChrName: Though you need a license to be a gun owner, of course. Not that you even use one. And speaking of, what ARE you doing here, spriggan?
engSearchText:
Though you need a license to be a gun owner, of
course. Not that you even use one. And speaking of,
what ARE you doing here, spriggan?
jpnChrName: むろん許可制だが── お前は使ってないようだが何の用だ？
jpnSearchText:
むろん許可制だが──
お前は使ってないようだが何の用だ？

engChrName: Just lookin' for custom parts. Somethin' that'll fit a self-defense baton.
engSearchText:
Just lookin' for custom parts. Somethin' that'll fit a
self-defense baton.
jpnChrName: それこそ自衛用の“特殊警棒”の カスタムパーツあたりの物色にな。
jpnSearchText:
それこそ自衛用の“特殊警棒”の
カスタムパーツあたりの物色にな。

engChrName: Gotta shell out for my assistants, you know. Even if the costs are startin' to pile up.
engSearchText:
Gotta shell out for my assistants, you know. Even if
the costs are startin' to pile up.
jpnChrName: 助手どもの分も見繕う必要があるから 出費がかさんで仕方ねえぜ。
jpnSearchText:
助手どもの分も見繕う必要があるから
出費がかさんで仕方ねえぜ。

engChrName: You're shameless, you know that? Do you have any idea what kind of authority I hold?
engSearchText:
You're shameless, you know that? Do you have any
idea what kind of authority I hold?
jpnChrName: またぬけぬけと…… 俺の立場を何だと思っている。
jpnSearchText:
またぬけぬけと……
俺の立場を何だと思っている。

engChrName: Bah, forget it. Let's put the fact that you're dragging a bunch of civvies around with you on the backburner for the moment...
engSearchText:
Bah, forget it. Let's put the fact that you're dragging a
bunch of civvies around with you on the backburner
for the moment...
jpnChrName: まあいい──民間人を 連れ回してることはともかく。
jpnSearchText:
まあいい──民間人を
連れ回してることはともかく。

engChrName: You should at least put some thought into upgrading your equipment. Trouble could strike at any moment, and it's dangerous to be unprepared.
engSearchText:
You should at least put some thought into upgrading
your equipment. Trouble could strike at any moment,
and it's dangerous to be unprepared.
jpnChrName: 危ない状況になった時に備えて、 せめて装備には気を配ってやれ。
jpnSearchText:
危ない状況になった時に備えて、
せめて装備には気を配ってやれ。

engChrName: Yeah, yeah. Don't need you to tell me to be careful.
engSearchText: Yeah, yeah. Don't need you to tell me to be careful.
jpnChrName: へいへい、分かってますって。
jpnSearchText: へいへい、分かってますって。

engChrName: (Well, aren't you a softie. Knew there was a nice side to you.)
engSearchText:
(Well, aren't you a softie. Knew there was a nice side
to you.)
jpnChrName: （……何だかんだお人好しっつーか、   芯が通ってるんだよな、このオッサン。）
jpnSearchText:
（……何だかんだお人好しっつーか、
芯が通ってるんだよな、このオッサン。）

engChrName: What's that smirk for? For your information, I—
engSearchText: What's that smirk for? For your information, I—
jpnChrName: ……何をニヤついている？ いいか、この機会に言っておくが──
jpnSearchText:
……何をニヤついている？
いいか、この機会に言っておくが──

engChrName: Hey, honey. What's wrong?
engSearchText: Hey, honey. What's wrong?
jpnChrName: もしもし、俺だ、どうした？
jpnSearchText: もしもし、俺だ、どうした？

engChrName: Oh, I'm already done for the day. I just stopped by one of the stores in front of the station.
engSearchText:
Oh, I'm already done for the day. I just stopped by
one of the stores in front of the station.
jpnChrName: ああ、今日はもう上がりだ。 ちょっと駅前の店に用事があってな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、今日はもう上がりだ。
ちょっと駅前の店に用事があってな。

engChrName: I'll be back home soon, don't worry. I'll even stop by for one of Gigi's favorite cupcakes on the way—
engSearchText:
I'll be back home soon, don't worry. I'll even stop by
for one of Gigi's favorite cupcakes on the way—
jpnChrName: もう少ししたら帰るから、お土産に ジジの好きなカップケーキでも……
jpnSearchText:
もう少ししたら帰るから、お土産に
ジジの好きなカップケーキでも……

engChrName: Huh? No? Maybe a bagel, then...?
engSearchText: Huh? No? Maybe a bagel, then...?
jpnChrName: ──え、いらないって？ だ、だったら君の好きなベーグルを……
jpnSearchText:
──え、いらないって？
だ、だったら君の好きなベーグルを……

engChrName: ...Yeah. Yeah. Love you. See you later.
engSearchText: ...Yeah. Yeah. Love you. See you later.
jpnChrName: ……ああ、ああ。 愛しているよ、それじゃあ。
jpnSearchText:
……ああ、ああ。
愛しているよ、それじゃあ。

engChrName: What? You got a problem?
engSearchText: What? You got a problem?
jpnChrName: ……なんだ、文句でもあるのか？
jpnSearchText: ……なんだ、文句でもあるのか？

engChrName: Nope. Not at all.
engSearchText: Nope. Not at all.
jpnChrName: いやいや、とんでもない。
jpnSearchText: いやいや、とんでもない。

engChrName: That your wife, I'm guessing? Didn't know you had a daughter either. Look at you playin' the family man.
engSearchText:
That your wife, I'm guessing? Didn't know you had a
daughter either. Look at you playin' the family man.
jpnChrName: 今のは奥さんで、娘さんもいんのか？ 良いパパをやってるみたいじゃないか。
jpnSearchText:
今のは奥さんで、娘さんもいんのか？
良いパパをやってるみたいじゃないか。

engChrName: Watch it, spriggan! Stay far, far away from my personal life.
engSearchText:
Watch it, spriggan! Stay far, far away from my
personal life.
jpnChrName: ええい、 しれっと把握するんじゃない！
jpnSearchText:
ええい、
しれっと把握するんじゃない！

engChrName: If you're lookin' for a gift, I can vouch for the new cheesecakes they got in stock downstairs. Just sayin'.
engSearchText:
If you're lookin' for a gift, I can vouch for the new
cheesecakes they got in stock downstairs. Just sayin'.
jpnChrName: ちなみに土産なら、下の店の 新作チーズケーキがお勧めだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに土産なら、下の店の
新作チーズケーキがお勧めだぜ。

engChrName: Nice and sweet. Lemon flavor, too. Guarantee the kiddo's gonna love 'em.
engSearchText:
Nice and sweet. Lemon flavor, too. Guarantee the
kiddo's gonna love 'em.
jpnChrName: レモン風味でサッパリしてるから 年頃の娘さんにもウケはいいだろ。
jpnSearchText:
レモン風味でサッパリしてるから
年頃の娘さんにもウケはいいだろ。

engChrName: Cheesecake? Now that's an idea... N-Not that I was asking for your opinion!
engSearchText:
Cheesecake? Now that's an idea... N-Not that I was
asking for your opinion!
jpnChrName: そ、そうか…… ──だから余計なお世話だっ！
jpnSearchText:
そ、そうか……
──だから余計なお世話だっ！

engChrName: You'll start straightening up one day, when you have a family. With one on the line, you don't just get to do whatever you want.
engSearchText:
You'll start straightening up one day, when you have
a family. With one on the line, you don't just get to
do whatever you want.
jpnChrName: 言っておくがお前もいずれ家庭を持てば 好き勝手はできなくなるんだからな。
jpnSearchText:
言っておくがお前もいずれ家庭を持てば
好き勝手はできなくなるんだからな。

engChrName: ...But I'm gonna give it to you, the cheesecakes might be a good idea to cheer Gigi up.
engSearchText:
...But I'm gonna give it to you, the cheesecakes might
be a good idea to cheer Gigi up.
jpnChrName: ……だが新作チーズケーキか。 何とかそれでジジの機嫌を少しでも……
jpnSearchText:
……だが新作チーズケーキか。
何とかそれでジジの機嫌を少しでも……

engChrName: (Even the SID top dogs go all soft for their family, huh.)
engSearchText:
(Even the SID top dogs go all soft for their
family, huh.)
jpnChrName: （やれやれ、強面の特捜課警部も   娘にかかっちゃ形無しみてぇだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（やれやれ、強面の特捜課警部も
娘にかかっちゃ形無しみてぇだな。）

engChrName: They approved my request to take the afternoon of the Revolution Festival off work.
engSearchText:
They approved my request to take the afternoon of
the Revolution Festival off work.
jpnChrName: それでさぁ、記念祭の日には何とか 午後だけ有休の申請が通ったからさぁ……
jpnSearchText:
それでさぁ、記念祭の日には何とか
午後だけ有休の申請が通ったからさぁ……

engChrName: I might actually get to take my girlfriend on a date for once.
engSearchText:
I might actually get to take my girlfriend on a date
for once.
jpnChrName: 久しぶりに彼女と一緒に デートができそうなんだよねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
久しぶりに彼女と一緒に
デートができそうなんだよねぇ。

engChrName: Ohh, that'll be nice.
engSearchText: Ohh, that'll be nice.
jpnChrName: へぇ～、それは良かったですね。
jpnSearchText: へぇ～、それは良かったですね。

engChrName: You sure now's the time to talk about it?
engSearchText: You sure now's the time to talk about it?
jpnChrName: で、それならそれで、私達相手に そんな感じで大丈夫なんですか？
jpnSearchText:
で、それならそれで、私達相手に
そんな感じで大丈夫なんですか？

engChrName: We'll only do half a day during the Revolution Festival, sure, but today's just a normal duty day.
engSearchText:
We'll only do half a day during the Revolution
Festival, sure, but today's just a normal duty day.
jpnChrName: ていうか、記念祭の日は半休だとしても 今日は普通に仕事のはずですよね？
jpnSearchText:
ていうか、記念祭の日は半休だとしても
今日は普通に仕事のはずですよね？

engChrName: Shouldn't you get going back to the station?
engSearchText: Shouldn't you get going back to the station?
jpnChrName: いい加減、持ち場に戻ったらどうですか？
jpnSearchText: いい加減、持ち場に戻ったらどうですか？

engChrName: Last I heard you talking about going on a date was around the Film Festival.
engSearchText:
Last I heard you talking about going on a date was
around the Film Festival.
jpnChrName: ……というか前にデートの話してたの、 映画祭の頃でしたよね？
jpnSearchText:
……というか前にデートの話してたの、
映画祭の頃でしたよね？

engChrName: Don't tell me you've been neglecting her since then?
engSearchText: Don't tell me you've been neglecting her since then?
jpnChrName: もしかして……あれから彼女さん ほったらかしにしてたりしないですよね？
jpnSearchText:
もしかして……あれから彼女さん
ほったらかしにしてたりしないですよね？

engChrName: You could be...nicer, you know?
engSearchText: You could be...nicer, you know?
jpnChrName: ぐ、ぐぬっ……ど、どうしてそんな キツイ事を言うんだい君達は……
jpnSearchText:
ぐ、ぐぬっ……ど、どうしてそんな
キツイ事を言うんだい君達は……

engChrName: *sigh* Tyrell's girls are too eccentric for me, and the women in the police department just have no cool.
engSearchText:
*sigh* Tyrell's girls are too eccentric for me, and the
women in the police department just have no cool.
jpnChrName: ふう、タイレルにいる子達も癖が強いし、 やっぱり警察の女の子は僕に厳しいよ……
jpnSearchText:
ふう、タイレルにいる子達も癖が強いし、
やっぱり警察の女の子は僕に厳しいよ……

engChrName: Dating someone outside of the office was the best idea I've ever had. An office romance probably would've gone real bad...
engSearchText:
Dating someone outside of the office was the best
idea I've ever had. An office romance probably
would've gone real bad...
jpnChrName: やっぱり、職場恋愛じゃなくて 全然違う仕事の彼女作って正解だったよ。
jpnSearchText:
やっぱり、職場恋愛じゃなくて
全然違う仕事の彼女作って正解だったよ。

engChrName: We haven't seen much of the terrorists ever since the attacks in Basel and Anchorville last month.
engSearchText:
We haven't seen much of the terrorists ever since the
attacks in Basel and Anchorville last month.
jpnChrName: 先月のバーゼル・アンカーヴィル同時テロ以来 どうにも足取りが途絶えちゃってさ～。
jpnSearchText:
先月のバーゼル・アンカーヴィル同時テロ以来
どうにも足取りが途絶えちゃってさ～。

engChrName: Anything come up on your side of things?
engSearchText: Anything come up on your side of things?
jpnChrName: アニエスちゃんたちも 何かいい情報知ってたりしな～い？
jpnSearchText:
アニエスちゃんたちも
何かいい情報知ってたりしな～い？

engChrName: Nothing we can share. Sorry.
engSearchText: Nothing we can share. Sorry.
jpnChrName: すみません、お話できる事は何も……
jpnSearchText: すみません、お話できる事は何も……

engChrName: (The police are also having a rough go of it, huh.)
engSearchText: (The police are also having a rough go of it, huh.)
jpnChrName: （警察も苦労してるみてえだな。）
jpnSearchText: （警察も苦労してるみてえだな。）

engChrName: We haven't been able to track down Almata, regardless of how hard we look.
engSearchText:
We haven't been able to track down Almata,
regardless of how hard we look.
jpnChrName: ……という訳で、どれだけ探しても アルマータの尻尾は掴めずにいるんです。
jpnSearchText:
……という訳で、どれだけ探しても
アルマータの尻尾は掴めずにいるんです。

engChrName: *sigh* Man, I feel close to my limit.
engSearchText: *sigh* Man, I feel close to my limit.
jpnChrName: はぁ～……僕にしては 頑張ってる方だと思うんですけどねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
はぁ～……僕にしては
頑張ってる方だと思うんですけどねぇ……

engChrName: You're having a hard time, too, yeah? That why you're on patrol duty?
engSearchText:
You're having a hard time, too, yeah? That why
you're on patrol duty?
jpnChrName: 君も苦労しとるなぁ、それで今は 通常の巡回業務というわけか。
jpnSearchText:
君も苦労しとるなぁ、それで今は
通常の巡回業務というわけか。

engChrName: I guess Almata HAS been quiet.
engSearchText: I guess Almata HAS been quiet.
jpnChrName: まあ、確かにアルマータも 今は静かなようだが……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、確かにアルマータも
今は静かなようだが……

engChrName: But we can't relax just yet. We never know when they'll strike again, after all.
engSearchText:
But we can't relax just yet. We never know when
they'll strike again, after all.
jpnChrName: いつまた動き出すかもわからないのも また事実だしなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
いつまた動き出すかもわからないのも
また事実だしなぁ。

engChrName: It's hard to request a day off when things are like this.
engSearchText: It's hard to request a day off when things are like this.
jpnChrName: はぁ、このままじゃ有休申請も 出しづらくって。
jpnSearchText:
はぁ、このままじゃ有休申請も
出しづらくって。

engChrName: We'd better hurry up and arrest those guys! At least then I'll be able to get back in my girlfriend's good books.
engSearchText:
We'd better hurry up and arrest those guys! At least
then I'll be able to get back in my girlfriend's
good books.
jpnChrName: 彼女の機嫌を取るためにも、 早く連中を逮捕したいですよ～！
jpnSearchText:
彼女の機嫌を取るためにも、
早く連中を逮捕したいですよ～！

engChrName: Flimsy motivation aside, I guess we're both aiming for the same thing. Let's catch those guys.
engSearchText:
Flimsy motivation aside, I guess we're both aiming for
the same thing. Let's catch those guys.
jpnChrName: う～ん、動機はアレだが私も気持ちは同じだ。 共に職務に励まねばな。
jpnSearchText:
う～ん、動機はアレだが私も気持ちは同じだ。
共に職務に励まねばな。

engChrName: It's so rare I get the chance to talk to these two. I always find our discussions most fascinating.
engSearchText:
It's so rare I get the chance to talk to these two.
I always find our discussions most fascinating.
jpnChrName: フフ、お二方とも中々お話する機会が無いもので、 どの話題も大変興味深いですねえ。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、お二方とも中々お話する機会が無いもので、
どの話題も大変興味深いですねえ。

engChrName: Now, we at Heiyue find ourselves very interested in finding out more about Professor Cronkite's contractual partner and Marduk's future prospects.
engSearchText:
Now, we at Heiyue find ourselves very interested in
finding out more about Professor Cronkite's
contractual partner and Marduk's future prospects.
jpnChrName: クロンカイト教授の契約相手や ＭＫ社の今後の展望について……
jpnSearchText:
クロンカイト教授の契約相手や
ＭＫ社の今後の展望について……

engChrName: I would definitely appreciate the chance to converse about each other's opinions.
engSearchText:
I would definitely appreciate the chance to converse
about each other's opinions.
jpnChrName: 黒月としても注目している情報ですし、 是非腹の探り合いをさせて頂きたい所です。
jpnSearchText:
黒月としても注目している情報ですし、
是非腹の探り合いをさせて頂きたい所です。

engChrName: Hey, man, do whatever you want. Err... Actually, maybe don't.
engSearchText:
Hey, man, do whatever you want. Err...
Actually, maybe don't.
jpnChrName: 勝手にやってろ…… いや、それもそれで気味悪いんだが。
jpnSearchText:
勝手にやってろ……
いや、それもそれで気味悪いんだが。

engChrName: I quite enjoyed the café right across the street, but even then, I can't say I'm altogether too fond of the drinks here.
engSearchText:
I quite enjoyed the café right across the street, but
even then, I can't say I'm altogether too fond of the
drinks here.
jpnChrName: しかし向かいのカフェは良かったが ここのドリンクは今一つ、いや三つだな。
jpnSearchText:
しかし向かいのカフェは良かったが
ここのドリンクは今一つ、いや三つだな。

engChrName: Basel-style cafés don't seem to have made their mark in the capital just yet.
engSearchText:
Basel-style cafés don't seem to have made their mark
in the capital just yet.
jpnChrName: どうも首都にはバーゼル系のカフェスタイルが まだまだ浸透していないようだ。
jpnSearchText:
どうも首都にはバーゼル系のカフェスタイルが
まだまだ浸透していないようだ。

engChrName: Actually, they seem to be spreading more in the Ored direction...
engSearchText:
Actually, they seem to be spreading more in the
Ored direction...
jpnChrName: フフ、バーゼルスタイルはむしろ、 オレド方面などで広まりつつありますね。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、バーゼルスタイルはむしろ、
オレド方面などで広まりつつありますね。

engChrName: I believe I heard that the Langport-style café that sells Eastern tea over at Trion Tower is giving the Basel-style one some fierce competition.
engSearchText:
I believe I heard that the Langport-style café that sells
Eastern tea over at Trion Tower is giving the
Basel-style one some fierce competition.
jpnChrName: 確かトリオンタワーではバーゼル系のカフェと 煌都系の東方茶カフェが鎬を削っているとか？
jpnSearchText:
確かトリオンタワーではバーゼル系のカフェと
煌都系の東方茶カフェが鎬を削っているとか？

engChrName: Indeed. In fact, that establishment is managed by yours truly. We have the privilege of enjoying quite the favorable reputation.
engSearchText:
Indeed. In fact, that establishment is managed by
yours truly. We have the privilege of enjoying quite
the favorable reputation.
jpnChrName: ええ、手前どもの経営する店ですが なかなか好評を頂いておりまして。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、手前どもの経営する店ですが
なかなか好評を頂いておりまして。

engChrName: It's not just our staples capturing the public's interest, like our brown sugar bubble tea. Our newest fruit vinegar item has also proven popular.
engSearchText:
It's not just our staples capturing the public's interest,
like our brown sugar bubble tea. Our newest fruit
vinegar item has also proven popular.
jpnChrName: 最近では黒糖にパールなどの定番以外にも 果実酢（フルーツビネガー）を使った新商品が人気です。
jpnSearchText:
最近では黒糖にパールなどの定番以外にも
果実酢（フルーツビネガー）を使った新商品が人気です。

engChrName: Would you two be interested in trying the deep, complex flavor of Eastern tea at some point? It's an entirely different experience from coffee.
engSearchText:
Would you two be interested in trying the deep,
complex flavor of Eastern tea at some point? It's an
entirely different experience from coffee.
jpnChrName: いずれお二方には、珈琲とはまた違う、 東方茶の奥深さにも触れて頂きたいかと。
jpnSearchText:
いずれお二方には、珈琲とはまた違う、
東方茶の奥深さにも触れて頂きたいかと。

engChrName: Hmm... Sounds enticing.
engSearchText: Hmm... Sounds enticing.
jpnChrName: ふむ…… なかなかそそる響きではある。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ……
なかなかそそる響きではある。

engChrName: Now we absolutely HAVE to give it a try.
engSearchText: Now we absolutely HAVE to give it a try.
jpnChrName: フフ、そこまで言われては 試さないわけにはいきませんな。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、そこまで言われては
試さないわけにはいきませんな。

engChrName: (Damn. Shit might not be authentic, but I still wanna give it a try...)
engSearchText:
(Damn. Shit might not be authentic, but I still wanna
give it a try...)
jpnChrName: （ぐっ……フェイクかもしれねぇが   聞いてたら微妙にそそりやがるな。）
jpnSearchText:
（ぐっ……フェイクかもしれねぇが
聞いてたら微妙にそそりやがるな。）

engChrName: (Maybe I should go and take a look around Trion Tower...)
engSearchText:
(Maybe I should go and take a look around
Trion Tower...)
jpnChrName: （トリオンタワーか。   この後、見回りのついでにでも──）
jpnSearchText:
（トリオンタワーか。
この後、見回りのついでにでも──）

engChrName: (It's not hard to guess what Van's thinking about right now.)
engSearchText:
(It's not hard to guess what Van's thinking about
right now.)
jpnChrName: （うーん、ヴァンさんが   何を考えているのか丸わかりですね。）
jpnSearchText:
（うーん、ヴァンさんが
何を考えているのか丸わかりですね。）

engChrName: (I could go for a drink right now...)
engSearchText: (I could go for a drink right now...)
jpnChrName: （……うう。   喉が渇いてきちゃいました。）
jpnSearchText:
（……うう。
喉が渇いてきちゃいました。）

engChrName: (Oh, yeah. Those kinds of cafés are all over Langport.)
engSearchText:
(Oh, yeah. Those kinds of cafés are all
over Langport.)
jpnChrName: （東方茶カフェか。   確かに煌都じゃ定番だよな。）
jpnSearchText:
（東方茶カフェか。
確かに煌都じゃ定番だよな。）

engChrName: (Coffee and Eastern tea... I kind of feel like I'm seeing the same mistakes happen all over again...)
engSearchText:
(Coffee and Eastern tea... I kind of feel like I'm
seeing the same mistakes happen all over again...)
jpnChrName: （珈琲に東方茶……   何とか違いは再現されていますが……）
jpnSearchText:
（珈琲に東方茶……
何とか違いは再現されていますが……）

engChrName: (Hmm. Yang spends more time thinking about coffee than his actual studies.)
engSearchText:
(Hmm. Yang spends more time thinking about coffee
than his actual studies.)
jpnChrName: （うーん、ヤン兄は博士以上に   珈琲にはうるさいからなぁ……）
jpnSearchText:
（うーん、ヤン兄は博士以上に
珈琲にはうるさいからなぁ……）

engChrName: (Oh, I love that Eastern café! Their tea is honestly amazing.)
engSearchText:
(Oh, I love that Eastern café! Their tea is
honestly amazing.)
jpnChrName: （ああ、あの東方茶カフェか……   確かにどれも美味しかったわね。）
jpnSearchText:
（ああ、あの東方茶カフェか……
確かにどれも美味しかったわね。）

engChrName: (And the world marches ever forward. But even if times change, I'm not ready to cast old-fashioned coffee shops aside just yet.)
engSearchText:
(And the world marches ever forward. But even if
times change, I'm not ready to cast old-fashioned
coffee shops aside just yet.)
jpnChrName: （フフ、時代も変わったものだ。   昔ながらの喫茶も捨てがたいが。）
jpnSearchText:
（フフ、時代も変わったものだ。
昔ながらの喫茶も捨てがたいが。）

engChrName: That was quite the impressive show of skill back there. It would seem Twinings and the Security Chief weren't exaggerating their reports after all.
engSearchText:
That was quite the impressive show of skill back
there. It would seem Twinings and the Security
Chief weren't exaggerating their reports after all.
jpnChrName: トワイニング君や警備主任から 聞いていた通り、見事な手際だったね。
jpnSearchText:
トワイニング君や警備主任から
聞いていた通り、見事な手際だったね。

engChrName: Either way, I'm pleased to see you've been making sufficient use of both your holo core and stun caliber.
engSearchText:
Either way, I'm pleased to see you've been
making sufficient use of both your holo core
and stun caliber.
jpnChrName: 撃剣（スタンキャリバー）もホロウコアも 活用してもらえているようで何よりだ。
jpnSearchText:
撃剣（スタンキャリバー）もホロウコアも
活用してもらえているようで何よりだ。

engChrName: Heh... Apologies for my haughty tone. I'm sure I'll receive a scolding for it from a certain service concierge later.
engSearchText:
Heh... Apologies for my haughty tone. I'm sure
I'll receive a scolding for it from a certain service
concierge later.
jpnChrName: フッ……などと、偉そうな事ばかり言っていたら また彼らに睨まれてしまうかもしれないが。
jpnSearchText:
フッ……などと、偉そうな事ばかり言っていたら
また彼らに睨まれてしまうかもしれないが。

engChrName: As for now, though, you can rest assured that we at Marduk are doing all we can to resolve the situation at hand.
engSearchText:
As for now, though, you can rest assured
that we at Marduk are doing all we can to resolve
the situation at hand.
jpnChrName: ともかく、ＭＫとしてもこの異変の 解決に向けて展開している最中だ。
jpnSearchText:
ともかく、ＭＫとしてもこの異変の
解決に向けて展開している最中だ。

engChrName: I look forward to seeing what you and your assistants will accomplish from here on out. Make sure to do your best as well, Risette.
engSearchText:
I look forward to seeing what you and your
assistants will accomplish from here on out.
Make sure to do your best as well, Risette.
jpnChrName: 君たち解決事務所の活躍にも期待しているよ。 トワイニング君も頑張ってくれたまえ。
jpnSearchText:
君たち解決事務所の活躍にも期待しているよ。
トワイニング君も頑張ってくれたまえ。

engChrName: On another note, I happened to speak to Security Chief Kasim just before time stopped.
engSearchText:
On another note, I happened to speak to Security
Chief Kasim just before time stopped.
jpnChrName: ちなみに、時空停止する直前に カシム警備主任と連絡を取っていてね。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに、時空停止する直前に
カシム警備主任と連絡を取っていてね。

engChrName: He's also been entrusted with his own independent operation on top of his job of watching for the populace's safety.
engSearchText:
He's also been entrusted with his own independent
operation on top of his job of watching for the
populace's safety.
jpnChrName: 彼には一般市民の安全確保と共に 独自のオペレーションを任せている。
jpnSearchText:
彼には一般市民の安全確保と共に
独自のオペレーションを任せている。

engChrName: I'm sure he'll be able to get to the bottom of things.
engSearchText: I'm sure he'll be able to get to the bottom of things.
jpnChrName: この状況の打開に少しは貢献できるだろう。
jpnSearchText: この状況の打開に少しは貢献できるだろう。

engChrName: Yeah. I ran into him in Riverside. Just as imposin' as ever.
engSearchText:
Yeah. I ran into him in Riverside. Just as imposin'
as ever.
jpnChrName: ええ、リバーサイドで会いましたが 相変わらずの手際でしたよ。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、リバーサイドで会いましたが
相変わらずの手際でしたよ。

engChrName: (Can't shake this odd feelin' here.)
engSearchText: (Can't shake this odd feelin' here.)
jpnChrName: （微妙に引っかかる所も   無い訳じゃないが……）
jpnSearchText:
（微妙に引っかかる所も
無い訳じゃないが……）

engChrName: An independent operation, huh.
engSearchText: An independent operation, huh.
jpnChrName: 独自のオペレーションですか……
jpnSearchText: 独自のオペレーションですか……

engChrName: (Well, at least he's lookin' into things.)
engSearchText: (Well, at least he's lookin' into things.)
jpnChrName: （だがあの人が動いているなら   頼もしい事この上ねえな。）
jpnSearchText:
（だがあの人が動いているなら
頼もしい事この上ねえな。）

engChrName: I must thank you for your significant contributions towards the development of both the holo core and stun caliber.
engSearchText:
I must thank you for your significant contributions
towards the development of both the holo core and
stun caliber.
jpnChrName: 例の一件もあり、撃剣（スタンキャリバー）やホロウコアの テスターとして大いに貢献してくれているようだね。
jpnSearchText:
例の一件もあり、撃剣（スタンキャリバー）やホロウコアの
テスターとして大いに貢献してくれているようだね。

engChrName: Your contributions as a tester have been invaluable. I'm certainly counting on you and Risette.
engSearchText:
Your contributions as a tester have been invaluable.
I'm certainly counting on you and Risette.
jpnChrName: 改めて君には礼を言わせてもらうよ。 今後とも、リゼット君ともども宜しく頼む。
jpnSearchText:
改めて君には礼を言わせてもらうよ。
今後とも、リゼット君ともども宜しく頼む。

engChrName: I'd love to talk to you all in private, if I get the chance.
engSearchText:
I'd love to talk to you all in private, if I get
the chance.
jpnChrName: 機会があれば、個人的にも君たちと ゆっくり言葉を交わしてみたいものだな。
jpnSearchText:
機会があれば、個人的にも君たちと
ゆっくり言葉を交わしてみたいものだな。

engChrName: Sure. I can hear you out. After that, though? No promises.
engSearchText:
Sure. I can hear you out. After that, though?
No promises.
jpnChrName: そいつはどうも。 気乗りするかどうかは別の話だがな。
jpnSearchText:
そいつはどうも。
気乗りするかどうかは別の話だがな。

engChrName: We should be able to get in touch with Chief Rouran shortly. It'll be a retroactive report, but it's best that we stay prepared.
engSearchText:
We should be able to get in touch with Chief
Rouran shortly. It'll be a retroactive report, but it's
best that we stay prepared.
jpnChrName: ロウラン室長ともじきに連絡が取れるでしょう。 事後報告にはなるけど体制を整えておきましょう。
jpnSearchText:
ロウラン室長ともじきに連絡が取れるでしょう。
事後報告にはなるけど体制を整えておきましょう。

engChrName: Allowing Almata to continue on this path is something not even the Goddess could abide by.
engSearchText:
Allowing Almata to continue on this path is
something not even the Goddess could abide by.
jpnChrName: ……このままアルマータを野放しに することだけは女神もお許しにならないはず。
jpnSearchText:
……このままアルマータを野放しに
することだけは女神もお許しにならないはず。

engChrName: The CID will, of course, make a concerted effort to put a stop to this.
engSearchText:
The CID will, of course, make a concerted effort to
put a stop to this.
jpnChrName: ＣＩＤも総力を挙げて食い止めなくては。
jpnSearchText: ＣＩＤも総力を挙げて食い止めなくては。

engChrName: For starters, I plan on getting in touch with each district.
engSearchText:
For starters, I plan on getting in touch with
each district.
jpnChrName: ともかく、私も関係各所と連絡を取って 体勢を立て直すつもりよ。
jpnSearchText:
ともかく、私も関係各所と連絡を取って
体勢を立て直すつもりよ。

engChrName: Have you considered joining forces with Risette? I expect that'd make conducting your investigation more efficient.
engSearchText:
Have you considered joining forces with Risette?
I expect that'd make conducting your investigation
more efficient.
jpnChrName: 貴方はリゼットさんとの合流を図ってみては？ 状況の調査を進めてもらう為にもその方が効率的かと。
jpnSearchText:
貴方はリゼットさんとの合流を図ってみては？
状況の調査を進めてもらう為にもその方が効率的かと。

engChrName: Today's the perfect day for a clandestine meeting, so it's when we have to keep our eyes peeled.
engSearchText:
Today's the perfect day for a clandestine meeting, so
it's when we have to keep our eyes peeled.
jpnChrName: ふぅ、今日は密会をするには好条件だから 各方面で警戒はしていたけれど……
jpnSearchText:
ふぅ、今日は密会をするには好条件だから
各方面で警戒はしていたけれど……

engChrName: But out of everyone that showed up today, it had to be Heiyue, Marduk's general manager, and that famous professor.
engSearchText:
But out of everyone that showed up today, it had to
be Heiyue, Marduk's general manager, and that
famous professor.
jpnChrName: よりによって、腹の読めない黒月と ＭＫ社のＧＭ……それと噂の教授だなんてね。
jpnSearchText:
よりによって、腹の読めない黒月と
ＭＫ社のＧＭ……それと噂の教授だなんてね。

engChrName: (Phew, I know who I need to update later...)
engSearchText: (Phew, I know who I need to update later...)
jpnChrName: （ふう、後であの方にも報告しないと……）
jpnSearchText: （ふう、後であの方にも報告しないと……）

engChrName: The Revolution Festival is going to consist of two official events—the ceremony and the memorial mass at the cathedral.
engSearchText:
The Revolution Festival is going to consist of two
official events—the ceremony and the memorial mass
at the cathedral.
jpnChrName: 革命記念祭の公式行事は、 記念式典と大聖堂での追悼ミサになるわ。
jpnSearchText:
革命記念祭の公式行事は、
記念式典と大聖堂での追悼ミサになるわ。

engChrName: We plan on tightening security measures everywhere, regardless of the current state of matters with Almata.
engSearchText:
We plan on tightening security measures everywhere,
regardless of the current state of matters with Almata.
jpnChrName: 《Ａ》がいようといまいと、 警備は万全を期して行うつもりだけど……
jpnSearchText:
《Ａ》がいようといまいと、
警備は万全を期して行うつもりだけど……

engChrName: Were they able to still, the Revolution Festival would've been the perfect time to strike.
engSearchText:
Were they able to still, the Revolution Festival
would've been the perfect time to strike.
jpnChrName: 連中が勢力を保ったままでいたら、 記念祭は格好の餌食になったでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
連中が勢力を保ったままでいたら、
記念祭は格好の餌食になったでしょう。

engChrName: To be honest, I do feel somewhat relieved.
engSearchText: To be honest, I do feel somewhat relieved.
jpnChrName: 正直な所、胸を撫で下ろしている部分もあるわね。
jpnSearchText: 正直な所、胸を撫で下ろしている部分もあるわね。

engChrName: Thought you might show up sooner or later. I take it this is about the unofficial partnership between the guild and CID?
engSearchText:
Thought you might show up sooner or later. I take it
this is about the unofficial partnership between the
guild and CID?
jpnChrName: ふむ、そろそろ来る頃だと思っていたが。 要件はギルドとＣＩＤの“非公式提携”だね？
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、そろそろ来る頃だと思っていたが。
要件はギルドとＣＩＤの“非公式提携”だね？

engChrName: That it is. Glad that we're on the same page, at least.
engSearchText: That it is. Glad that we're on the same page, at least.
jpnChrName: ええ──話が早くて助かります。
jpnSearchText: ええ──話が早くて助かります。

engChrName: Our first priority should be getting the situation under control, not being at each other's throats.
engSearchText:
Our first priority should be getting the situation
under control, not being at each other's throats.
jpnChrName: この事態、何としても収拾しなくては…… その為にもいがみ合っている場合ではないでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
この事態、何としても収拾しなくては……
その為にもいがみ合っている場合ではないでしょう。

engChrName: I guarantee you that the guild holds no ill will towards the CID.
engSearchText:
I guarantee you that the guild holds no ill will towards
the CID.
jpnChrName: ふふ、我々は別にＣＩＤを 敵視しているわけではないがね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、我々は別にＣＩＤを
敵視しているわけではないがね。

engChrName: ...Even if you DID steal Kilika from us.
engSearchText: ...Even if you DID steal Kilika from us.
jpnChrName: ギルド所属だったキリカ君を そちらに取られた事も含めて。
jpnSearchText:
ギルド所属だったキリカ君を
そちらに取られた事も含めて。

engChrName: W-Well, umm... That was more than five years ago now. Surely, water under the bridge?
engSearchText:
W-Well, umm... That was more than five years
ago now. Surely, water under the bridge?
jpnChrName: そ、それは…… もう５年も前の話と聞いていますが……
jpnSearchText:
そ、それは……
もう５年も前の話と聞いていますが……

engChrName: (They can't still be mad about that! I guess wisdom and age don't necessarily pair together...)
engSearchText:
(They can't still be mad about that! I guess wisdom
and age don't necessarily pair together...)
jpnChrName: （というか思いっきり根に持ってるじゃない！   この人も見た目によらず大人げないわね！？）
jpnSearchText:
（というか思いっきり根に持ってるじゃない！
この人も見た目によらず大人げないわね！？）

engChrName: I do agree with you for the most part. When it comes to saving the citizens of this capital, every minute counts.
engSearchText:
I do agree with you for the most part. When it comes
to saving the citizens of this capital, every
minute counts.
jpnChrName: ……まあともかく、大筋は同意しよう。 首都中の市民を救うためにも一刻を争うだろう。
jpnSearchText:
……まあともかく、大筋は同意しよう。
首都中の市民を救うためにも一刻を争うだろう。

engChrName: Precisely! You'll have to excuse me for jumping right into it, but how about we discuss the main points of our collaboration?
engSearchText:
Precisely! You'll have to excuse me for jumping right
into it, but how about we discuss the main points of
our collaboration?
jpnChrName: ええ……！　早速ですが 要点を詰めるとしましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
ええ……！　早速ですが
要点を詰めるとしましょうか。

engChrName: Hmm... The coffee here isn't bad at all.
engSearchText: Hmm... The coffee here isn't bad at all.
jpnChrName: ふむ、やはりここの珈琲は なかなかに悪くない。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、やはりここの珈琲は
なかなかに悪くない。

engChrName: This place has brought Basel-style coffee to a whole new level, though I expected no less than perfection from an Institute of Science graduate.
engSearchText:
This place has brought Basel-style coffee to a whole
new level, though I expected no less than perfection
from an Institute of Science graduate.
jpnChrName: 経営者が理科大学出身なだけあって バーゼルスタイルを進化させているようだ。
jpnSearchText:
経営者が理科大学出身なだけあって
バーゼルスタイルを進化させているようだ。

engChrName: All you ever talk about is coffee, you know.
engSearchText: All you ever talk about is coffee, you know.
jpnChrName: ふう、ヤン兄さんは相変わらず カフェにはうるさいよね～。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、ヤン兄さんは相変わらず
カフェにはうるさいよね～。

engChrName: You're, like, at least a LIIITTLE concerned about Professor Hamilton and Quatre, right?
engSearchText:
You're, like, at least a LIIITTLE concerned about
Professor Hamilton and Quatre, right?
jpnChrName: ……カトル君や博士のこと、 ちょっとは心配じゃないの～？
jpnSearchText:
……カトル君や博士のこと、
ちょっとは心配じゃないの～？

engChrName: Of course, but worrying won't get me anywhere. Speculation is pointless unless you put those thoughts into action.
engSearchText:
Of course, but worrying won't get me anywhere.
Speculation is pointless unless you put those thoughts
into action.
jpnChrName: ただ心配しても意味はなかろう。 思考と実践が伴ってこその価値だ。
jpnSearchText:
ただ心配しても意味はなかろう。
思考と実践が伴ってこその価値だ。

engChrName: I believe you're already aware of that, aren't you, Esmeray?
engSearchText:
I believe you're already aware of that, aren't
you, Esmeray?
jpnChrName: エスメレー──お前もそれは 当然身についているはずだろう？
jpnSearchText:
エスメレー──お前もそれは
当然身についているはずだろう？

engChrName: Umm... I mean... Yes.
engSearchText: Umm... I mean... Yes.
jpnChrName: うう、否定はしないけど～……
jpnSearchText: うう、否定はしないけど～……

engChrName: (Though they're both colleagues, I hear these two behave more like siblings.)
engSearchText:
(Though they're both colleagues, I hear these two
behave more like siblings.)
jpnChrName: （同門だそうだけど、聞いていた通り、   兄妹みたいな関係みたいね。）
jpnSearchText:
（同門だそうだけど、聞いていた通り、
兄妹みたいな関係みたいね。）

engChrName: (Cody was supposed to be with President Rocksmith. I wonder if he's all right?)
engSearchText:
(Cody was supposed to be with President Rocksmith.
I wonder if he's all right?)
jpnChrName: （コーディも……ロックスミス閣下に   付いていた筈だけど大丈夫なのかしら？）
jpnSearchText:
（コーディも……ロックスミス閣下に
付いていた筈だけど大丈夫なのかしら？）

engChrName: It's amazing how quickly Kaela and the bracers work.
engSearchText: It's amazing how quickly Kaela and the bracers work.
jpnChrName: カエラさんも遊撃士の皆さんも テキパキとしててすごいなぁ～。
jpnSearchText:
カエラさんも遊撃士の皆さんも
テキパキとしててすごいなぁ～。

engChrName: Aaall righty! Time for me and Yang to put our heads together and see what we can come up with!
engSearchText:
Aaall righty! Time for me and Yang to put our heads
together and see what we can come up with!
jpnChrName: よしっ……わたしもヤン兄さんと一緒に 研究者としてアプローチ出来ないか検討してみるよ～！
jpnSearchText:
よしっ……わたしもヤン兄さんと一緒に
研究者としてアプローチ出来ないか検討してみるよ～！

engChrName: We can't just sit and do nothing when both Professor Hamilton and Quatre need our help!
engSearchText:
We can't just sit and do nothing when both Professor
Hamilton and Quatre need our help!
jpnChrName: ハミルトン博士やカトル君の為にも じっとしてられないしね～。
jpnSearchText:
ハミルトン博士やカトル君の為にも
じっとしてられないしね～。

engChrName: Take care, guys!
engSearchText: Take care, guys!
jpnChrName: ヴァン君たちも、どうか気を付けて～！
jpnSearchText: ヴァン君たちも、どうか気を付けて～！

engChrName: It's amazing how quickly Kaela and the bracers work.
engSearchText: It's amazing how quickly Kaela and the bracers work.
jpnChrName: カエラさんも遊撃士の皆さんも テキパキとしててすごいなぁ～。
jpnSearchText:
カエラさんも遊撃士の皆さんも
テキパキとしててすごいなぁ～。

engChrName: All righty! Time for me and Yang to put our heads together and see what we can come up with!
engSearchText:
All righty! Time for me and Yang to put our heads
together and see what we can come up with!
jpnChrName: よしっ……わたしもヤン兄さんと一緒に 研究者としてアプローチ出来ないか検討してみます～！
jpnSearchText:
よしっ……わたしもヤン兄さんと一緒に
研究者としてアプローチ出来ないか検討してみます～！

engChrName: We can't just sit and do nothing when both Professor Hamilton and Quatre need our help!
engSearchText:
We can't just sit and do nothing when both Professor
Hamilton and Quatre need our help!
jpnChrName: ハミルトン博士やカトル君の為にも じっとしてられませんから～。
jpnSearchText:
ハミルトン博士やカトル君の為にも
じっとしてられませんから～。

engChrName: Please be careful, guys!
engSearchText: Please be careful, guys!
jpnChrName: 皆さんの方も、どうか気を付けて下さいね～！
jpnSearchText: 皆さんの方も、どうか気を付けて下さいね～！

engChrName: Geez. Yang's barely even fazed by this whole schtick.
engSearchText: Geez. Yang's barely even fazed by this whole schtick.
jpnChrName: も～、こんな時でも ヤン兄さんは相変わらずなんだから～。
jpnSearchText:
も～、こんな時でも
ヤン兄さんは相変わらずなんだから～。

engChrName: I do hope both Quatre and Professor Hamilton managed to evacuate somewhere safe...
engSearchText:
I do hope both Quatre and Professor Hamilton
managed to evacuate somewhere safe...
jpnChrName: はぁ……カトル君も博士も、 安全な所に避難できてたらいいんだけど～……
jpnSearchText:
はぁ……カトル君も博士も、
安全な所に避難できてたらいいんだけど～……

engChrName: Am I really the oldest one here?
engSearchText: Am I really the oldest one here?
jpnChrName: はぁ……まさかわたしが一番年上だったなんて～……
jpnSearchText: はぁ……まさかわたしが一番年上だったなんて～……

engChrName: Well, whatever! I'm just as capable a researcher!
engSearchText: Well, whatever! I'm just as capable a researcher!
jpnChrName: でもいいもん、わたしだって研究者としては できるオンナのはずっ……！
jpnSearchText:
でもいいもん、わたしだって研究者としては
できるオンナのはずっ……！

engChrName: This is my opportunity to make some new friends! We're all career women, so we've got that in common!
engSearchText:
This is my opportunity to make some new
friends! We're all career women, so we've
got that in common!
jpnChrName: キャリアウーマン仲間として この機会にお友達になってみせるんだから～！
jpnSearchText:
キャリアウーマン仲間として
この機会にお友達になってみせるんだから～！

engChrName: Uh, sure. Good luck with that?
engSearchText: Uh, sure. Good luck with that?
jpnChrName: なんだその……まあ頑張ってくれよ。
jpnSearchText: なんだその……まあ頑張ってくれよ。

engChrName: Gotti's a famous movie director, right?
engSearchText: Gotti's a famous movie director, right?
jpnChrName: そういえば、ゴッチ監督って 有名な映画監督なんだったよね～？
jpnSearchText:
そういえば、ゴッチ監督って
有名な映画監督なんだったよね～？

engChrName: We don't have any movie theaters near the institute, so I haven't seen many films.
engSearchText:
We don't have any movie theaters near the institute,
so I haven't seen many films.
jpnChrName: 大学の近くに映画館が無いから、 映画ってあんまり観た事がないんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
大学の近くに映画館が無いから、
映画ってあんまり観た事がないんだけど……

engChrName: Buuut I should have the time during the Revolution Festival. Maybe watching one will teach me a thing or two!
engSearchText:
Buuut I should have the time during the
Revolution Festival. Maybe watching one
will teach me a thing or two!
jpnChrName: 記念祭の日は時間に余裕もありそうだし 社会勉強として観てみてもいいかもね～。
jpnSearchText:
記念祭の日は時間に余裕もありそうだし
社会勉強として観てみてもいいかもね～。

engChrName: Though still missing a special something to take it over the edge, I can't quite complain when I shouldn't even have this chance in the first place.
engSearchText:
Though still missing a special something to take it
