over the edge, I can't quite complain when I shouldn't
even have this chance in the first place.
jpnChrName: ふむ、相変わらず今三つだな…… だがこの状況では飲めるだけマシか。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、相変わらず今三つだな……
だがこの状況では飲めるだけマシか。

engChrName: Don't you agree, Mr. Arkride?
engSearchText: Don't you agree, Mr. Arkride?
jpnChrName: ──そうは思わないか、アークライド所長。
jpnSearchText: ──そうは思わないか、アークライド所長。

engChrName: Agree with what?
engSearchText: Agree with what?
jpnChrName: ……？ どういう意味だ。
jpnSearchText:
……？
どういう意味だ。

engChrName: That even if the quality of a product leaves a lot to be desired, its relative value skyrockets during times of crisis.
engSearchText:
That even if the quality of a product leaves a lot to be
desired, its relative value skyrockets during times
of crisis.
jpnChrName: なに、低クオリティだったとしても 非常時には相対価値が上がるという事だ。
jpnSearchText:
なに、低クオリティだったとしても
非常時には相対価値が上がるという事だ。

engChrName: You know the proverb, 'hunger is the best sauce'? Well, that isn't just a theory.
engSearchText:
You know the proverb, 'hunger is the best sauce'?
Well, that isn't just a theory.
jpnChrName: 空腹は最高のスパイスというのは 単なる精神論というわけではない──
jpnSearchText:
空腹は最高のスパイスというのは
単なる精神論というわけではない──

engChrName: It is an extremely logical and systematic social, psychological, and physical phenomenon.
engSearchText:
It is an extremely logical and systematic social,
psychological, and physical phenomenon.
jpnChrName: 極めて合理的かつシステマティックな 社会・心理・身体現象と言えるだろう。
jpnSearchText:
極めて合理的かつシステマティックな
社会・心理・身体現象と言えるだろう。

engChrName: Umm, Professor? What might you...?
engSearchText: Umm, Professor? What might you...?
jpnChrName: あの、教授？ ……一体なにを………
jpnSearchText:
あの、教授？
……一体なにを………

engChrName: If I may ask, what are your thoughts on this phenomenon happening?
engSearchText:
If I may ask, what are your thoughts on this
phenomenon happening?
jpnChrName: 時に──君たちはどうして この停止現象が起きていると思う？
jpnSearchText:
時に──君たちはどうして
この停止現象が起きていると思う？

engChrName: Or, more than that, why do you think it is that some people can move, while some can't?
engSearchText:
Or, more than that, why do you think it is that
some people can move, while some can't?
jpnChrName: 正確にはなぜ、動く者が動き、 停まっている者は停まっていると？
jpnSearchText:
正確にはなぜ、動く者が動き、
停まっている者は停まっていると？

engChrName: Hold on a second...
engSearchText: Hold on a second...
jpnChrName: ……！ そいつは……
jpnSearchText:
……！
そいつは……

engChrName: I-If we knew that, then we wouldn't be going through all this trouble...
engSearchText:
I-If we knew that, then we wouldn't be going through
all this trouble...
jpnChrName: そ、それが判ったら 苦労はしないのでは……
jpnSearchText:
そ、それが判ったら
苦労はしないのでは……

engChrName: Huh?
engSearchText: Huh?

engChrName: (...Hmm. Fascinating.)
engSearchText: (...Hmm. Fascinating.)
jpnChrName: （……ふむ。   興味深いですね。）
jpnSearchText:
（……ふむ。
興味深いですね。）

engChrName: There's no effect without cause.
engSearchText: There's no effect without cause.
jpnChrName: 確かなのはどんな現象にも “因果”が必ずあるという事だ。
jpnSearchText:
確かなのはどんな現象にも
“因果”が必ずあるという事だ。

engChrName: You may be able to change or manipulate it, but it won't necessarily mean you've eradicated said cause.
engSearchText:
You may be able to change or manipulate it, but it
won't necessarily mean you've eradicated said cause.
jpnChrName: たとえそれを操作できたとしても 操作した因果が消える訳ではない。
jpnSearchText:
たとえそれを操作できたとしても
操作した因果が消える訳ではない。

engChrName: I recommend you keep that in mind if you're going to continue looking into this anomaly.
engSearchText:
I recommend you keep that in mind if you're going to
continue looking into this anomaly.
jpnChrName: ──この先も異変を探るつもりなら 留意しておきたまえ。
jpnSearchText:
──この先も異変を探るつもりなら
留意しておきたまえ。

engChrName: ...Got'cha. Guess it makes sense one of Hamilton's pupils and Quatre's senior would know something more.
engSearchText:
...Got'cha. Guess it makes sense one of Hamilton's
pupils and Quatre's senior would know
something more.
jpnChrName: ……ハン、流石ハミルトン門下にして カトルの一番の兄弟子というべきか。
jpnSearchText:
……ハン、流石ハミルトン門下にして
カトルの一番の兄弟子というべきか。

engChrName: We'll keep it in mind.
engSearchText: We'll keep it in mind.
jpnChrName: 判った── せいぜい肝に銘じておくさ。
jpnSearchText:
判った──
せいぜい肝に銘じておくさ。

engChrName: As irritating as Esmeray can be, I believe collaborating with her is my best recourse.
engSearchText:
As irritating as Esmeray can be, I believe
collaborating with her is my best recourse.
jpnChrName: さて……エスメレーが煩いのもあるが、 そろそろ頃合か。
jpnSearchText:
さて……エスメレーが煩いのもあるが、
そろそろ頃合か。

engChrName: I'm planning on trying an orbal tech-based approach to this anomaly henceforth.
engSearchText:
I'm planning on trying an orbal tech-based approach
to this anomaly henceforth.
jpnChrName: この後、この異変に対して導力学的な アプローチを試みてみるつもりだ。
jpnSearchText:
この後、この異変に対して導力学的な
アプローチを試みてみるつもりだ。

engChrName: I suppose I could offer my assistance, should I make any discoveries. If time remains frozen, it will only prove to be a hindrance to my research.
engSearchText:
I suppose I could offer my assistance, should I make
any discoveries. If time remains frozen, it will only
prove to be a hindrance to my research.
jpnChrName: 何か分かれば手を貸すのもやぶさかでない。 停まったままでは研究の妨げでしかないからな。
jpnSearchText:
何か分かれば手を貸すのもやぶさかでない。
停まったままでは研究の妨げでしかないからな。

engChrName: My first thought regarding the frozen time is that it has something to do with orbal technology.
engSearchText:
My first thought regarding the frozen time is that it
has something to do with orbal technology.
jpnChrName: 人が停まるこの現象…… 導力が関係しているようにも思えるが。
jpnSearchText:
人が停まるこの現象……
導力が関係しているようにも思えるが。

engChrName: Though, much as I wish I could, it does not fall to me to be doing the field research.
engSearchText:
Though, much as I wish I could, it does not fall to me
to be doing the field research.
jpnChrName: 興味深くはあっても、足を使って 調査に赴くのは私の役目ではあるまい。
jpnSearchText:
興味深くはあっても、足を使って
調査に赴くのは私の役目ではあるまい。

engChrName: I'll just sit down and enjoy a nice cup of coffee while I wait for the news to come to me.
engSearchText:
I'll just sit down and enjoy a nice cup of coffee while I
wait for the news to come to me.
jpnChrName: 珈琲を楽しみながら朗報でも待たせてもらおう。
jpnSearchText: 珈琲を楽しみながら朗報でも待たせてもらおう。

engChrName: Heiyue's White Orchid Dragon seems to be more capable than even rumors painted him to be.
engSearchText:
Heiyue's White Orchid Dragon seems to be more
capable than even rumors painted him to be.
jpnChrName: 黒月の《白蘭竜》だったか。 噂以上のやり手ではあるようだ。
jpnSearchText:
黒月の《白蘭竜》だったか。
噂以上のやり手ではあるようだ。

engChrName: Heiyue itself doesn't interest me, but I suppose no harm will come of having this sort of interaction every so often.
engSearchText:
Heiyue itself doesn't interest me, but I suppose no
harm will come of having this sort of interaction every
so often.
jpnChrName: 黒月自体に興味はないが── ふむ、たまにはこういう交流も悪くなかろう。
jpnSearchText:
黒月自体に興味はないが──
ふむ、たまにはこういう交流も悪くなかろう。

engChrName: His Highness told me to take a breather and relax for a while.
engSearchText:
His Highness told me to take a breather and relax for
a while.
jpnChrName: 殿下から休憩がてら息抜きをするよう 仰せつかっていましてね。
jpnSearchText:
殿下から休憩がてら息抜きをするよう
仰せつかっていましてね。

engChrName: I'm still supervising the meeting, of course, but its a nice change of pace still.
engSearchText:
I'm still supervising the meeting, of course, but its a
nice change of pace still.
jpnChrName: あの会合の監視を行いながらではありますが…… 思いがけず気分転換になっている部分もあります。
jpnSearchText:
あの会合の監視を行いながらではありますが……
思いがけず気分転換になっている部分もあります。

engChrName: While I don't plan on letting my guard down, I'd enjoy getting to sit on these meetings for a little longer.
engSearchText:
While I don't plan on letting my guard down, I'd
enjoy getting to sit on these meetings for a
little longer.
jpnChrName: 気を抜くつもりはありませんが、 もう暫く同席させて頂きましょう。
jpnSearchText:
気を抜くつもりはありませんが、
もう暫く同席させて頂きましょう。

engChrName: Congratulations! You're our thousandth customer this month!
engSearchText:
Congratulations! You're our thousandth customer
this month!
jpnChrName: おめでとうございますっ！　お客様は今月に入って ちょうど千人目のご来店となります！
jpnSearchText:
おめでとうございますっ！　お客様は今月に入って
ちょうど千人目のご来店となります！

engChrName: Here's your gift certificate! We're doing a special offer at the moment.
engSearchText:
Here's your gift certificate! We're doing a special
offer at the moment.
jpnChrName: 現在キャンペーン中で、キリ番のお客様には 商品券をプレゼントさせて頂きます！
jpnSearchText:
現在キャンペーン中で、キリ番のお客様には
商品券をプレゼントさせて頂きます！

engChrName: Huh? Really?! Yaaay!
engSearchText: Huh? Really?! Yaaay!
jpnChrName: ええっ！　本当に良いんですか！？ やりましたっ～！
jpnSearchText:
ええっ！　本当に良いんですか！？
やりましたっ～！

engChrName: My editor loved my Tharbad report, too. One lucky thing after the other!
engSearchText:
My editor loved my Tharbad report, too. One lucky
thing after the other!
jpnChrName: サルバッド取材も評価されたし 今日はいい事続きです！
jpnSearchText:
サルバッド取材も評価されたし
今日はいい事続きです！

engChrName: At this rate, I might even be able to find Dingo!
engSearchText: At this rate, I might even be able to find Dingo!
jpnChrName: あっ、この調子で行けば ディンゴさんも見つかるかも……！？
jpnSearchText:
あっ、この調子で行けば
ディンゴさんも見つかるかも……！？

engChrName: (Luck just finds you everywhere.)
engSearchText: (Luck just finds you everywhere.)
jpnChrName: （相変わらずの幸運体質……ってやつか。）
jpnSearchText: （相変わらずの幸運体質……ってやつか。）

engChrName: Dingo really helped me out with the whole Tharbad situation...
engSearchText:
Dingo really helped me out with the whole
Tharbad situation...
jpnChrName: サルバッドの一件ではディンゴさんにも お世話になったから……
jpnSearchText:
サルバッドの一件ではディンゴさんにも
お世話になったから……

engChrName: I wanted to tell him how impressed my editor was with the report...
engSearchText:
I wanted to tell him how impressed my editor was
with the report...
jpnChrName: 編集長から良い評価を貰えたって 伝えたいんだけどなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
編集長から良い評価を貰えたって
伝えたいんだけどなぁ……

engChrName: Do you...remember that Langport case from a while ago?
engSearchText:
Do you...remember that Langport case from a
while ago?
jpnChrName: はぁ……先日のラングポートでの 一件なんですけど。
jpnSearchText:
はぁ……先日のラングポートでの
一件なんですけど。

engChrName: Just as I was chasing a scoop about that ghost ship, Heiyue and the bracers started making some noise...
engSearchText:
Just as I was chasing a scoop about that ghost ship,
Heiyue and the bracers started making some noise...
jpnChrName: 幽霊船のネタを追っている内に、 黒月や遊撃士の方がざわついていて……
jpnSearchText:
幽霊船のネタを追っている内に、
黒月や遊撃士の方がざわついていて……

engChrName: Before I knew it, the case had already been solved!
engSearchText: Before I knew it, the case had already been solved!
jpnChrName: わたしの知らない内に、 何か事件が解決しちゃってたみたいなんですよ！
jpnSearchText:
わたしの知らない内に、
何か事件が解決しちゃってたみたいなんですよ！

engChrName: Bet that must've sucked.
engSearchText: Bet that must've sucked.
jpnChrName: そうか、そいつは残念だったな。
jpnSearchText: そうか、そいつは残念だったな。

engChrName: (But...we were the ones that solved it?)
engSearchText: (But...we were the ones that solved it?)
jpnChrName: （私達が当事者だったんですけどね……）
jpnSearchText: （私達が当事者だったんですけどね……）

engChrName: (He's acting like we didn't have anything to do with it.)
engSearchText:
(He's acting like we didn't have anything to do
with it.)
jpnChrName: （他人事みたいに言ってますね……）
jpnSearchText: （他人事みたいに言ってますね……）

engChrName: (Bet my ass, you liar.)
engSearchText: (Bet my ass, you liar.)
jpnChrName: （ハッ、白々しい事言いやがって。）
jpnSearchText: （ハッ、白々しい事言いやがって。）

engChrName: It did. But I wasn't gonna give up there! So I spent some time afterwards digging for more info in Langport.
engSearchText:
It did. But I wasn't gonna give up there! So I spent
some time afterwards digging for more info
in Langport.
jpnChrName: はい……でも諦める訳にはいかないと思って あの後煌都を調べ回ったんです。
jpnSearchText:
はい……でも諦める訳にはいかないと思って
あの後煌都を調べ回ったんです。

engChrName: *sigh* It was a waste of time. I didn't find anything. What's worse, Heiyue wouldn't take their eyes off me the whole time. It was terrible!
engSearchText:
*sigh* It was a waste of time. I didn't find anything.
What's worse, Heiyue wouldn't take their eyes off me
the whole time. It was terrible!
jpnChrName: それなのに、何の情報も出てこないし 黒月の人に睨まれるしで、散々でしたよ……
jpnSearchText:
それなのに、何の情報も出てこないし
黒月の人に睨まれるしで、散々でしたよ……

engChrName: Sorry to hear that. Guess you'll just have to give up on that case and find somethin' else.
engSearchText:
Sorry to hear that. Guess you'll just have to give up on
that case and find somethin' else.
jpnChrName: ご愁傷様だったが…… ま、諦めて次のネタを探す事だな。
jpnSearchText:
ご愁傷様だったが……
ま、諦めて次のネタを探す事だな。

engChrName: Yeah. That's what Dingo said.
engSearchText: Yeah. That's what Dingo said.
jpnChrName: はい……この前ディンゴさんにも そう言われちゃいました。
jpnSearchText:
はい……この前ディンゴさんにも
そう言われちゃいました。

engChrName: I was so, so close, too...
engSearchText: I was so, so close, too...
jpnChrName: はぁ…… 大スクープの予感がしてたのになぁ～……
jpnSearchText:
はぁ……
大スクープの予感がしてたのになぁ～……

engChrName: Speaking of Dingo, he's looked real flustered these past few days.
engSearchText:
Speaking of Dingo, he's looked real flustered these
past few days.
jpnChrName: そういえば先日からディンゴさんが 何やら慌ただしくしているようなんです。
jpnSearchText:
そういえば先日からディンゴさんが
何やら慌ただしくしているようなんです。

engChrName: Wonder if he's planning on heading out for a story? Ohh, I smell a big scoop!
engSearchText:
Wonder if he's planning on heading out for a story?
Ohh, I smell a big scoop!
jpnChrName: もしかして出張するつもりなんじゃ……？ それに大スクープの予感もします……！
jpnSearchText:
もしかして出張するつもりなんじゃ……？
それに大スクープの予感もします……！

engChrName: Whatever it is, I just HAVE to pursue it!
engSearchText: Whatever it is, I just HAVE to pursue it!
jpnChrName: これは何としても追いかけないとっ！
jpnSearchText: これは何としても追いかけないとっ！

engChrName: I'm not sure how Isla's returning home, but I wish her luck in safely traveling back to her family.
engSearchText:
I'm not sure how Isla's returning home, but I wish her
luck in safely traveling back to her family.
jpnChrName: アイラさん……どのようにして向かったのか 存じませんが、無事ご実家に行けると良いですね。
jpnSearchText:
アイラさん……どのようにして向かったのか
存じませんが、無事ご実家に行けると良いですね。

engChrName: I'm taking over for her in the meantime. Didn't want her to worry about work while she was away.
engSearchText:
I'm taking over for her in the meantime. Didn't want
her to worry about work while she was away.
jpnChrName: アイラさんが安心してお見舞いに行くためにも、 当分は私が代理でサービスを行います。
jpnSearchText:
アイラさんが安心してお見舞いに行くためにも、
当分は私が代理でサービスを行います。

engChrName: If there's anything you need, don't hesitate to ask.
engSearchText: If there's anything you need, don't hesitate to ask.
jpnChrName: 何かご用がありましたら、 私の方にお声掛けいただければと。
jpnSearchText:
何かご用がありましたら、
私の方にお声掛けいただければと。

engChrName: This is no ordinary show! It's a special occasion, so we should dial up the sex appeal!
engSearchText:
This is no ordinary show! It's a special occasion, so we
should dial up the sex appeal!
jpnChrName: しかしせっかくの機会じゃ。 記念式典にもエロの要素を……
jpnSearchText:
しかしせっかくの機会じゃ。
記念式典にもエロの要素を……

engChrName: Come on, Judith! Just picture everyone's jaws dropping the second you walk in, wearing some really erotic clothes!
engSearchText:
Come on, Judith! Just picture everyone's jaws
dropping the second you walk in, wearing some really
erotic clothes!
jpnChrName: どうかねジュディス君！ 君があられもない姿で乱入するというのは……！
jpnSearchText:
どうかねジュディス君！
君があられもない姿で乱入するというのは……！

engChrName: Yeah, not happening.
engSearchText: Yeah, not happening.
jpnChrName: ふう、申し訳ないけど遠慮しておきます。
jpnSearchText: ふう、申し訳ないけど遠慮しておきます。

engChrName: Oh, I know! What if Judith AND Nina both burst in wearing something really sexy?!
engSearchText:
Oh, I know! What if Judith AND Nina both burst in
wearing something really sexy?!
jpnChrName: そうじゃ！　ジュディス君やニナ君が あられもない姿で乱入するというのは……！
jpnSearchText:
そうじゃ！　ジュディス君やニナ君が
あられもない姿で乱入するというのは……！

engChrName: I need to get in touch with them ASAP!
engSearchText: I need to get in touch with them ASAP!
jpnChrName: 急遽連絡を取ってみるか！
jpnSearchText: 急遽連絡を取ってみるか！

engChrName: (Almost guaranteed that's also gonna be a no.)
engSearchText: (Almost guaranteed that's also gonna be a no.)
jpnChrName: （なんとなく断られそうだが……）
jpnSearchText: （なんとなく断られそうだが……）

engChrName: Director Gotti asked me to take care of the ceremony and the production equipment for Trion Tower.
engSearchText:
Director Gotti asked me to take care of the ceremony
and the production equipment for Trion Tower.
jpnChrName: ゴッチ監督から依頼されてんのは、 記念式典だのトリオンタワーの演出機材だのだな。
jpnSearchText:
ゴッチ監督から依頼されてんのは、
記念式典だのトリオンタワーの演出機材だのだな。

engChrName: It's still three days away, but that won't stop him from talking my ear off about all the details.
engSearchText:
It's still three days away, but that won't stop him from
talking my ear off about all the details.
jpnChrName: ３日前だってのに、ああしたいだの こうしたいだのと煩くてな。
jpnSearchText:
３日前だってのに、ああしたいだの
こうしたいだのと煩くてな。

engChrName: Can't blame the man too much, though. Nothing wrong with being a perfectionist, so I'll do my best to live up to expectations.
engSearchText:
Can't blame the man too much, though.
Nothing wrong with being a perfectionist, so I'll do
my best to live up to expectations.
jpnChrName: だがまあ……納得いくまで追及する姿勢は嫌いじゃねえ。 こっちも出来る限り付き合ってやるとするさ。
jpnSearchText:
だがまあ……納得いくまで追及する姿勢は嫌いじゃねえ。
こっちも出来る限り付き合ってやるとするさ。

engChrName: The long-awaited Revolution Festival is finally here! Is everyone having fun?
engSearchText:
The long-awaited Revolution Festival is finally here!
Is everyone having fun?
jpnChrName: イエーイ、待ちに待った記念祭！ みんな楽しんでるかー！？
jpnSearchText:
イエーイ、待ちに待った記念祭！
みんな楽しんでるかー！？

engChrName: Everybody go wild! Everybody say hey! Let's let loose and have some fun! ♪
engSearchText:
Everybody go wild! Everybody say hey! Let's let loose
and have some fun! ♪
jpnChrName: こういうのはノッたもん勝ちさ、 がんがんアゲていこうぜぇ♪
jpnSearchText:
こういうのはノッたもん勝ちさ、
がんがんアゲていこうぜぇ♪

engChrName: Achoo! Oh, damn it.
engSearchText: Achoo! Oh, damn it.
jpnChrName: ……はっくしょん！　ちくしょい！
jpnSearchText: ……はっくしょん！　ちくしょい！

engChrName: Sure, it's cold, but I'm an outdoor creature! I'm not gonna give in just because of a slight chill!
engSearchText:
Sure, it's cold, but I'm an outdoor creature! I'm not
gonna give in just because of a slight chill!
jpnChrName: さ、流石に寒いがオレはいつまでも風の子！ これしきの寒さには負けないぜ！
jpnSearchText:
さ、流石に寒いがオレはいつまでも風の子！
これしきの寒さには負けないぜ！

engChrName: What was that? Why am I out in nothing but swimming trunks in the middle of winter?
engSearchText:
What was that? Why am I out in nothing but
swimming trunks in the middle of winter?
jpnChrName: え？　どうしてこの季節に 海パン一丁なのかって？
jpnSearchText:
え？　どうしてこの季節に
海パン一丁なのかって？

engChrName: Hahaha! I might've gotten a little too excited and dived right off the bridge in Riverside! Flew through the skies right before hitting the water!
engSearchText:
Hahaha! I might've gotten a little too excited and
dived right off the bridge in Riverside! Flew through
the skies right before hitting the water!
jpnChrName: ハハハ、実は昂り過ぎてさっき、リバーサイドの 橋からダイナミックにダイブしちゃってよぉ！
jpnSearchText:
ハハハ、実は昂り過ぎてさっき、リバーサイドの
橋からダイナミックにダイブしちゃってよぉ！

engChrName: And I wasn't about to just sit there until my clothes dried off! ♪
engSearchText:
And I wasn't about to just sit there until my clothes
dried off! ♪
jpnChrName: だが、服が渇くまでジッとは してられないからなぁ♪
jpnSearchText:
だが、服が渇くまでジッとは
してられないからなぁ♪

engChrName: *sigh* My older brother's the same as always. His laziness is honestly kinda disarming.
engSearchText:
*sigh* My older brother's the same as always.
His laziness is honestly kinda disarming.
jpnChrName: ふう……兄者は相変わらずね。 ま、この腑抜けぶりで少し緊張解れたね。
jpnSearchText:
ふう……兄者は相変わらずね。
ま、この腑抜けぶりで少し緊張解れたね。

engChrName: I don't know how things are going to shake out, but I won't falter. I swear, as a bracer and member of the Gekka school.
engSearchText:
I don't know how things are going to shake out, but I
won't falter. I swear, as a bracer and member of the
Gekka school.
jpnChrName: ……あたしもこの状況でどうなるか わからないけど、月華と遊撃士の使命、果たすよ。
jpnSearchText:
……あたしもこの状況でどうなるか
わからないけど、月華と遊撃士の使命、果たすよ。

engChrName: My brother's part of the reason I took this path.
engSearchText: My brother's part of the reason I took this path.
jpnChrName: 何やかんや、今のあたしがこの道に 専念できてるのも兄者のお陰でもあるね。
jpnSearchText:
何やかんや、今のあたしがこの道に
専念できてるのも兄者のお陰でもあるね。

engChrName: I've a lot to live up to. I have to make up for his shortcomings, after all!
engSearchText:
I've a lot to live up to. I have to make up for his
shortcomings, after all!
jpnChrName: せいぜい、兄者の分も筋通すね！
jpnSearchText: せいぜい、兄者の分も筋通すね！

engChrName: August 27th, 6:44PM
engSearchText: August 27th, 6:44PM

engChrName: Seventh District, Central Station
engSearchText: Seventh District, Central Station
jpnChrName: 首都七区　イーディス中央駅通り
jpnSearchText: 首都七区　イーディス中央駅通り

engChrName: Feels like the sun went down real fast.
engSearchText: Feels like the sun went down real fast.
jpnChrName: ……日も暮れたか。
jpnSearchText: ……日も暮れたか。

engChrName: But even at this hour with nothing goin' on, there're so many people.
engSearchText:
But even at this hour with nothing goin' on, there're
so many people.
jpnChrName: イベントでもないのに 相変わらず人が多い場所だぜ。
jpnSearchText:
イベントでもないのに
相変わらず人が多い場所だぜ。

engChrName: It is how most people arrive in the city, after all—not to mention all the department stores.
engSearchText:
It is how most people arrive in the city, after all—not
to mention all the department stores.
jpnChrName: 首都の玄関口で 老舗デパートなんかもありますから……
jpnSearchText:
首都の玄関口で
老舗デパートなんかもありますから……

engChrName: There's also that fancy new orbal store that doubles as a café that's been drawing a lot of customers.
engSearchText:
There's also that fancy new orbal store that doubles as
a café that's been drawing a lot of customers.
jpnChrName: 最近だとカフェが併設された、お洒落な 導力製品のお店が出来たと聞いています。
jpnSearchText:
最近だとカフェが併設された、お洒落な
導力製品のお店が出来たと聞いています。

engChrName: Yeah. I know the one.
engSearchText: Yeah. I know the one.
jpnChrName: オーバルカフェってヤツだな。 ちょうど目の前だ。
jpnSearchText:
オーバルカフェってヤツだな。
ちょうど目の前だ。

engChrName: Funny to think how much this area's changed in just a couple of years. Those big screens weren't here before, either.
engSearchText:
Funny to think how much this area's changed in just
a couple of years. Those big screens weren't here
before, either.
jpnChrName: 街頭ビジョンか…… ２、３年前には無かったんだが。
jpnSearchText:
街頭ビジョンか……
２、３年前には無かったんだが。

engChrName: But now it's hard to imagine them not bein' here. City's changin' so fast it makes your head spin.
engSearchText:
But now it's hard to imagine them not bein' here.
City's changin' so fast it makes your head spin.
jpnChrName: すっかり馴染んでやがる。 目まぐるしいったらありゃしねえ。
jpnSearchText:
すっかり馴染んでやがる。
目まぐるしいったらありゃしねえ。

engChrName: Heehee. True, it is.
engSearchText: Heehee. True, it is.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、確かに。
jpnSearchText: ふふっ、確かに。

engChrName: A very good evening to you, Edith. It is now 6:45PM—which means it's time for today's evening news.
engSearchText:
A very good evening to you, Edith. It is now
6:45PM—which means it's time for today's
evening news.
jpnChrName: １８：４５になりました。 この時間のニュースをお伝えします。
jpnSearchText:
１８：４５になりました。
この時間のニュースをお伝えします。

engChrName: President Gramheart held a press briefing at the presidential building in Vantail at 3PM today.
engSearchText:
President Gramheart held a press briefing at the
presidential building in Vantail at 3PM today.
jpnChrName: 本日１５時、ヴァンタイユ地区大統領府で グラムハート大統領が定例会見を開きました。
jpnSearchText:
本日１５時、ヴァンタイユ地区大統領府で
グラムハート大統領が定例会見を開きました。

engChrName: He discussed this year's ending of the reparations from Erebonia and with it, the impact it will have on Calvard's future.
engSearchText:
He discussed this year's ending of the reparations
from Erebonia and with it, the impact it will have on
Calvard's future.
jpnChrName: 主な内容は、エレボニア帝国からの賠償金が 年内に終了することについての今後の見通しです。
jpnSearchText:
主な内容は、エレボニア帝国からの賠償金が
年内に終了することについての今後の見通しです。

engChrName: It has been two years since the Erebonian Empire launched an unprovoked war of aggression against us—a vile act we were generous enough to forgive.
engSearchText:
It has been two years since the Erebonian Empire
launched an unprovoked war of aggression against
us—a vile act we were generous enough to forgive.
jpnChrName: ２年前、一方的に侵略戦争を仕掛けてきた帝国に 我々は寛大な心でその過ちを赦しました。
jpnSearchText:
２年前、一方的に侵略戦争を仕掛けてきた帝国に
我々は寛大な心でその過ちを赦しました。

engChrName: The price it paid in the form of reparations was steep, but every last mira was, in my strong opinion, justified.
engSearchText:
The price it paid in the form of reparations was steep,
but every last mira was, in my strong
opinion, justified.
jpnChrName: 代償たる賠償金の総額は莫大なものでしたが、 それらは全て正当なもの──
jpnSearchText:
代償たる賠償金の総額は莫大なものでしたが、
それらは全て正当なもの──

engChrName: I believe its actions—its atrocities—the past several centuries are behind it.
engSearchText:
I believe its actions—its atrocities—the past several
centuries are behind it.
jpnChrName: 数百年もの暴虐を水に流し、大陸諸国の一員として 復帰する手助けすらした対価とも言えるでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
数百年もの暴虐を水に流し、大陸諸国の一員として
復帰する手助けすらした対価とも言えるでしょう。

engChrName: I warmly welcome it back to the international community with open arms, promoting an era of peace between us— even when it comes to Crossbell State.
engSearchText:
I warmly welcome it back to the international community
with open arms, promoting an era of peace between us—
even when it comes to Crossbell State.
jpnChrName: そして現在、我が国と帝国は、クロスベルも含め かつてないほど平穏な関係を築くに至っています。
jpnSearchText:
そして現在、我が国と帝国は、クロスベルも含め
かつてないほど平穏な関係を築くに至っています。

engChrName: With reparations due to come to an end this year, some have raised concerns that an economic recession is on the horizon. Those fears are unfounded.
engSearchText:
With reparations due to come to an end this year,
some have raised concerns that an economic recession
is on the horizon. Those fears are unfounded.
jpnChrName: その礎となった賠償金が年内に終了するにあたり、 景気低迷を案じる声もありますが、全くの杞憂です。
jpnSearchText:
その礎となった賠償金が年内に終了するにあたり、
景気低迷を案じる声もありますが、全くの杞憂です。

engChrName: We have used these past two years to transform our economy. To bolster our capital. To better our technology.
engSearchText:
We have used these past two years to transform
our economy. To bolster our capital. To better
our technology.
jpnChrName: 二年にわたる経済成長、資本の蓄積、技術革新は カルバードを大陸最大の国家へと成長させました。
jpnSearchText:
二年にわたる経済成長、資本の蓄積、技術革新は
カルバードを大陸最大の国家へと成長させました。

engChrName: No nation has surpassed what we have accomplished, because no nation can. We cannot take our supremacy for granted.
engSearchText:
No nation has surpassed what we have accomplished,
because no nation can. We cannot take our
supremacy for granted.
jpnChrName: もはや我々を上回る国家は存在しえない── ですが当然、その状況に慢心はできません。
jpnSearchText:
もはや我々を上回る国家は存在しえない──
ですが当然、その状況に慢心はできません。

engChrName: I have every intention of taking this power and using it to lead our great world as a whole to a more glorious, prosperous future.
engSearchText:
I have every intention of taking this power and using
it to lead our great world as a whole to a more
glorious, prosperous future.
jpnChrName: ゼムリア大陸を、世界を主導する立場として 今後は帝国も含めた大陸諸国を導く事こそが……
jpnSearchText:
ゼムリア大陸を、世界を主導する立場として
今後は帝国も含めた大陸諸国を導く事こそが……

engChrName: Well, if it isn't everyone's favorite president. He's a little heavy handed, but you can't say he hasn't delivered.
engSearchText:
Well, if it isn't everyone's favorite president. He's
a little heavy handed, but you can't say he
hasn't delivered.
jpnChrName: ……ロイ・グラムハートか。 色々強引みたいだが、実際大したタマだな。
jpnSearchText:
……ロイ・グラムハートか。
色々強引みたいだが、実際大したタマだな。

engChrName: Calvard's GDP passed the Empire's in his first year in office, and this year's on track to surpass that—by a lot.
engSearchText:
Calvard's GDP passed the Empire's in his first year in
office, and this year's on track to surpass that—by
a lot.
jpnChrName: 就任一年目にしてＧＤＰは帝国越え── 今年に入ってからも大幅に上回る勢いとは。
jpnSearchText:
就任一年目にしてＧＤＰは帝国越え──
今年に入ってからも大幅に上回る勢いとは。

engChrName: ...Yes. I suppose that's true.
engSearchText: ...Yes. I suppose that's true.
jpnChrName: ……そうですね。
jpnSearchText: ……そうですね。

engChrName: He's been enacting some very dangerous policies across the board...and not just economically.
engSearchText:
He's been enacting some very dangerous policies
across the board...and not just economically.
jpnChrName: 経済のみならず、様々な分野で 大胆な施策を出しているみたいです。
jpnSearchText:
経済のみならず、様々な分野で
大胆な施策を出しているみたいです。

engChrName: Compared to the last guy, yeah. Samuel Rocksmith seemed more grounded.
engSearchText:
Compared to the last guy, yeah. Samuel Rocksmith
seemed more grounded.
jpnChrName: まあ、前のロックスミスの方が 地に足が付いていたとも言えるが……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、前のロックスミスの方が
地に足が付いていたとも言えるが……

engChrName: Anyway, didn't mean to talk politics.
engSearchText: Anyway, didn't mean to talk politics.
jpnChrName: ──政治談義はさておき、 とっとと向かうとしよう。
jpnSearchText:
──政治談義はさておき、
とっとと向かうとしよう。

engChrName: Would prefer not to waste time in rival territory.
engSearchText: Would prefer not to waste time in rival territory.
jpnChrName: 何せこのあたりは 商売敵の本拠地もあるからな。
jpnSearchText:
何せこのあたりは
商売敵の本拠地もあるからな。

engChrName: You have a rival?
engSearchText: You have a rival?

engChrName: Oh, the Bracer Guild. I do remember hearing they had a branch near Central Station.
engSearchText:
Oh, the Bracer Guild. I do remember hearing they
had a branch near Central Station.
jpnChrName: 遊撃士協会……そういえば中央駅の 近くにあると聞いたことがありました。
jpnSearchText:
遊撃士協会……そういえば中央駅の
近くにあると聞いたことがありました。

engChrName: Yep. Maybe they aren't expecting to hear anything close to home, but they've still got a sharp crew on board.
engSearchText:
Yep. Maybe they aren't expecting to hear anything
close to home, but they've still got a sharp crew
on board.
jpnChrName: ああ、灯台下暗しかもしれねえが、 鼻が利く連中でもある。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、灯台下暗しかもしれねえが、
鼻が利く連中でもある。

engChrName: So let's get to work. We gotta get what you're looking for before the duo who got Giacomo do.
engSearchText:
So let's get to work. We gotta get what you're looking
for before the duo who got Giacomo do.
jpnChrName: “二人組”共々出し抜いて 先に依頼品を押さえちまうぞ。
jpnSearchText:
“二人組”共々出し抜いて
先に依頼品を押さえちまうぞ。

engChrName: Right. Do you know where the entrance to his base is, then?
engSearchText:
Right. Do you know where the entrance to his base
is, then?
jpnChrName: ……はい。 それで隠れ家の入口というのは？
jpnSearchText:
……はい。
それで隠れ家の入口というのは？

engChrName: Right over there.
engSearchText: Right over there.
jpnChrName: すぐそこだ。
jpnSearchText: すぐそこだ。

engChrName: The alley next to that old department store leads to the door we're lookin' for. C'mon.
engSearchText:
The alley next to that old department store leads to
the door we're lookin' for. C'mon.
jpnChrName: あの老舗デパートの脇道に ゲートがある──行ってみるぞ。
jpnSearchText:
あの老舗デパートの脇道に
ゲートがある──行ってみるぞ。

engChrName: Yes, sir!
engSearchText: Yes, sir!
jpnChrName: はいっ……！
jpnSearchText: はいっ……！

engChrName: This is it?
engSearchText: This is it?
jpnChrName: この扉が……
jpnSearchText: この扉が……

engChrName: Yeah. This one doesn't lead to the subway...
engSearchText: Yeah. This one doesn't lead to the subway...
jpnChrName: ここはちょいと特殊でな。 地下鉄とは別の場所に繋がってる。
jpnSearchText:
ここはちょいと特殊でな。
地下鉄とは別の場所に繋がってる。

engChrName: ...but you can still jimmy it the same way.
engSearchText: ...but you can still jimmy it the same way.
jpnChrName: 開く手順は似たようなモンだが。
jpnSearchText: 開く手順は似たようなモンだが。

engChrName: Was Giacomo the one who altered the locks like this?
engSearchText: Was Giacomo the one who altered the locks like this?
jpnChrName: あの……これもジャコモさんが 仕掛けたものなんですか？
jpnSearchText:
あの……これもジャコモさんが
仕掛けたものなんですか？

engChrName: Not him. It's just been a thing us shady folks have known about for a while.
engSearchText:
Not him. It's just been a thing us shady folks have
known about for a while.
jpnChrName: いや、昔から裏稼業の連中には ある程度知られている仕掛けでな。
jpnSearchText:
いや、昔から裏稼業の連中には
ある程度知られている仕掛けでな。

engChrName: There're places like this all over the city people make good use of.
engSearchText:
There're places like this all over the city people make
good use of.
jpnChrName: こういった場所は他にもあって 色々と便利に使われているわけだ。
jpnSearchText:
こういった場所は他にもあって
色々と便利に使われているわけだ。

engChrName: CID knows about 'em, too. They just leave it alone.
engSearchText: CID knows about 'em, too. They just leave it alone.
jpnChrName: ま、ＣＩＤやギルドも把握しながら あえて泳がせてるみたいだが。
jpnSearchText:
ま、ＣＩＤやギルドも把握しながら
あえて泳がせてるみたいだが。

engChrName: Th-They do? Why?
engSearchText: Th-They do? Why?
jpnChrName: そ、そんなことが……
jpnSearchText: そ、そんなことが……

engChrName: ...I'm sorry. I keep egging conversation on when we really need to move.
engSearchText:
...I'm sorry. I keep egging conversation on when we
really need to move.
jpnChrName: ──すみません、 そんな場合じゃありませんよね。
jpnSearchText:
──すみません、
そんな場合じゃありませんよね。

engChrName: I'm ready for whatever we'll find here.
engSearchText: I'm ready for whatever we'll find here.
jpnChrName: 覚悟はできています。 行きましょう、ヴァンさん。
jpnSearchText:
覚悟はできています。
行きましょう、ヴァンさん。

engChrName: Good. 'Cause there's no turnin' back now.
engSearchText: Good. 'Cause there's no turnin' back now.
jpnChrName: 上等だ、そんじゃあ入るぞ。
jpnSearchText: 上等だ、そんじゃあ入るぞ。

engChrName: Hmm? Is something wrong?
engSearchText: Hmm? Is something wrong?
jpnChrName: ？　どうしました？
jpnSearchText: ？　どうしました？

engChrName: Nah. We can go in.
engSearchText: Nah. We can go in.
jpnChrName: 何でもない、行くぞ。
jpnSearchText: 何でもない、行くぞ。

engChrName: (Was that just my imagination? ...Ehh, I don't pick up a scent, so I guess it doesn't matter either way.)
engSearchText:
(Was that just my imagination? ...Ehh, I don't pick
up a scent, so I guess it doesn't matter either way.)
jpnChrName: （……気のせいか？ ま、匂わないならいいだろ。）
jpnSearchText:
（……気のせいか？
ま、匂わないならいいだろ。）

engChrName: Heehee. His nose is as sharp as ever.
engSearchText: Heehee. His nose is as sharp as ever.
jpnChrName: ……ふふっ。 相変わらず鼻が利くみたいね。
jpnSearchText:
……ふふっ。
相変わらず鼻が利くみたいね。

engChrName: Aidios knows how this is going to end...but it better be with my classmate safe, spriggan.
engSearchText:
Aidios knows how this is going to end...but it better
be with my classmate safe, spriggan.
jpnChrName: どう転ぶかは分からないけど…… 大切な後輩をよろしくね、裏解決屋（スプリガン）さん。
jpnSearchText:
どう転ぶかは分からないけど……
大切な後輩をよろしくね、裏解決屋（スプリガン）さん。

engChrName: Man, all that build up and then they're outta stuff to make the lattes with. What a let down.
engSearchText:
Man, all that build up and then they're outta stuff to
make the lattes with. What a let down.
jpnChrName: やれやれ、新作ラテが まさかの材料切れとはな……
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ、新作ラテが
まさかの材料切れとはな……

engChrName: At least the coffee was good!
engSearchText: At least the coffee was good!
jpnChrName: 残念でしたね。 珈琲も美味しかったですけど。
jpnSearchText:
残念でしたね。
珈琲も美味しかったですけど。

engChrName: I guess. Maybe I'll mosey by this evening and see if they've restocked.
engSearchText:
I guess. Maybe I'll mosey by this evening and see if
they've restocked.
jpnChrName: 夕方には販売再開するとか言ってたし あとでまた覗いてみるか……？（ブツブツ）
jpnSearchText:
夕方には販売再開するとか言ってたし
あとでまた覗いてみるか……？（ブツブツ）

engChrName: Definitely not gonna hang around this neck of the woods if I don't have to.
engSearchText:
Definitely not gonna hang around this neck of the
woods if I don't have to.
jpnChrName: ……まあいい、とっとと行くか。 あんまりウダウダ、長居したくない場所だしな。
jpnSearchText:
……まあいい、とっとと行くか。
あんまりウダウダ、長居したくない場所だしな。

engChrName: So your distaste of the guild even trumps your love of sweets?
engSearchText:
So your distaste of the guild even trumps your love
of sweets?
jpnChrName: あはは……よっぽど ギルドが苦手なんですね。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……よっぽど
ギルドが苦手なんですね。

engChrName: (Or maybe this is more about one specific bracer...)
engSearchText: (Or maybe this is more about one specific bracer...)
jpnChrName: （ううん、どちらかというと   あの時の──）
jpnSearchText:
（ううん、どちらかというと
あの時の──）

engChrName: Why're you staring at me like that?
engSearchText: Why're you staring at me like that?
jpnChrName: ？　どうした──
jpnSearchText: ？　どうした──

engChrName: Hey there. Working hard or hardly working?
engSearchText: Hey there. Working hard or hardly working?
jpnChrName: よう、やってるみたいだな？
jpnSearchText: よう、やってるみたいだな？

engChrName: Huh?
engSearchText: Huh?

engChrName: Ugh. You again...
engSearchText: Ugh. You again...
jpnChrName: お、お前は……！
jpnSearchText: お、お前は……！

engChrName: Van and...the girl from before.
engSearchText: Van and...the girl from before.
jpnChrName: ヴァン？　それに……
jpnSearchText: ヴァン？　それに……

engChrName: Oh, hello, Elaine.
engSearchText: Oh, hello, Elaine.
jpnChrName: エレインさんと…… あの大きな人は、確か──
jpnSearchText:
エレインさんと……
あの大きな人は、確か──

engChrName: Bah. Shoulda bolted when we had the chance.
engSearchText: Bah. Shoulda bolted when we had the chance.
jpnChrName: チッ……遅かったか。
jpnSearchText: チッ……遅かったか。

engChrName: So you're the kid Elaine grew up with, huh?
engSearchText: So you're the kid Elaine grew up with, huh?
jpnChrName: ハハ、お前さんが噂の エレインの昔馴染みってやつか。
jpnSearchText:
ハハ、お前さんが噂の
エレインの昔馴染みってやつか。

engChrName: Nice to meet you. I'm—
engSearchText: Nice to meet you. I'm—
jpnChrName: 初めましてになるが、俺は──
jpnSearchText: 初めましてになるが、俺は──

engChrName: Zin the Immovable. One of the guild's go-to guys.
engSearchText: Zin the Immovable. One of the guild's go-to guys.
jpnChrName: 共和国ギルドの重鎮、《不動》。
jpnSearchText: 共和国ギルドの重鎮、《不動》。

engChrName: A master-level Taito practitioner and A-rank bracer—though some folks say you should be S-rank by now.
engSearchText:
A master-level Taito practitioner and A-rank
bracer—though some folks say you should be S-rank
by now.
jpnChrName: 泰斗流の奥義皆伝にして Ａ級以上っつう噂の御仁だな。
jpnSearchText:
泰斗流の奥義皆伝にして
Ａ級以上っつう噂の御仁だな。

engChrName: You know your stuff.
engSearchText: You know your stuff.
jpnChrName: おっと、そう来たか。
jpnSearchText: おっと、そう来たか。

engChrName: I'm Zin Vathek. Don't think I'm quite the figure you make me out to be, though.
engSearchText:
I'm Zin Vathek. Don't think I'm quite the figure you
make me out to be, though.
jpnChrName: ジン・ヴァセックだ。 重鎮ってガラじゃないけどな。
jpnSearchText:
ジン・ヴァセックだ。
重鎮ってガラじゃないけどな。

engChrName: It's nice to finally meet you, spriggan.
engSearchText: It's nice to finally meet you, spriggan.
jpnChrName: 《解決事務所》だったか？ 話はちょくちょく聞いている。
jpnSearchText:
《解決事務所》だったか？
話はちょくちょく聞いている。

engChrName: Sounds like we owe you for the other day.
engSearchText: Sounds like we owe you for the other day.
jpnChrName: 先日の件でも世話になったようだ。 改めて礼を言わせてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
先日の件でも世話になったようだ。
改めて礼を言わせてもらうぜ。

engChrName: Don't sweat it. Not about to pass up the chance to put you guys in my debt.
engSearchText:
Don't sweat it. Not about to pass up the chance to
put you guys in my debt.
jpnChrName: こっちの仕事のついでに 恩を売らせてもらっただけさ。
jpnSearchText:
こっちの仕事のついでに
恩を売らせてもらっただけさ。

engChrName: Name's Van Arkride.
engSearchText: Name's Van Arkride.
jpnChrName: ──ヴァン・アークライドだ。 あんたとは知り合いたく無かったが。
jpnSearchText:
──ヴァン・アークライドだ。
あんたとは知り合いたく無かったが。

engChrName: Would've rather not met you, but here we are.
engSearchText: Would've rather not met you, but here we are.
jpnChrName: こうなっちまった以上、 せいぜいお手柔らかに頼むぜ。
jpnSearchText:
こうなっちまった以上、
せいぜいお手柔らかに頼むぜ。

engChrName: That so? Heh. Well, it's nice to meet you all the same.
engSearchText:
That so? Heh. Well, it's nice to meet you all
the same.
jpnChrName: ほう……？　ハハッ、 よく分からんがこちらこそ宜しくだ。
jpnSearchText:
ほう……？　ハハッ、
よく分からんがこちらこそ宜しくだ。

engChrName: Wh-Why are you being so friendly to him?!
engSearchText: Wh-Why are you being so friendly to him?!
jpnChrName: ちょ、ジンさん……！ なに和やかに話してるんですか！？
jpnSearchText:
ちょ、ジンさん……！
なに和やかに話してるんですか！？

engChrName: This guy's been stealing our jobs and doing shady stuff for years!
engSearchText:
This guy's been stealing our jobs and doing shady
stuff for years!
jpnChrName: 言ったでしょう、ここ数年、 俺たちの陰で動いているヤツがいるって！
jpnSearchText:
言ったでしょう、ここ数年、
俺たちの陰で動いているヤツがいるって！

engChrName: To be honest, we probably have reasonable grounds to apprehend him!
engSearchText:
To be honest, we probably have reasonable grounds
to apprehend him!
jpnChrName: 商売敵、いや──場合によったら 取り締まりの対象かもしれませんよ！？
jpnSearchText:
商売敵、いや──場合によったら
取り締まりの対象かもしれませんよ！？

engChrName: Can't argue there.
engSearchText: Can't argue there.
jpnChrName: ま、否定はしきれねぇな。
jpnSearchText: ま、否定はしきれねぇな。

engChrName: *sigh* That's so like you to say.
engSearchText: *sigh* That's so like you to say.
jpnChrName: ふう……そこは 嘘でも否定しておきなさい。
jpnSearchText:
ふう……そこは
嘘でも否定しておきなさい。

engChrName: Zin, we have nothing to gain by associating with this man.
engSearchText:
Zin, we have nothing to gain by associating with
this man.
jpnChrName: ジンさん、彼については宜しくする必要も 気に掛けておく必要もないでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
ジンさん、彼については宜しくする必要も
気に掛けておく必要もないでしょう。

engChrName: Come what may, he will expertly skirt the line of legality and our code to avoid incriminating himself.
engSearchText:
Come what may, he will expertly skirt the line of
legality and our code to avoid incriminating himself.
jpnChrName: こちらの規約スレスレで動いていそうですし、 尻尾を掴むのは難しいと思います。
jpnSearchText:
こちらの規約スレスレで動いていそうですし、
尻尾を掴むのは難しいと思います。

engChrName: We need not interact with him more than the bare minimum necessary to do our duties, as we did the other day.
engSearchText:
We need not interact with him more than the bare
minimum necessary to do our duties, as we did the
other day.
jpnChrName: 先日の件みたいに、必要があれば 最低限のやり取りをするだけで十分かと。
jpnSearchText:
先日の件みたいに、必要があれば
最低限のやり取りをするだけで十分かと。

engChrName: See? She gets me.
engSearchText: See? She gets me.
jpnChrName: おっ、分かってるねぇ。
jpnSearchText: おっ、分かってるねぇ。

engChrName: Be quiet, Van.
engSearchText: Be quiet, Van.
jpnChrName: ──貴方は黙っていなさい。
jpnSearchText: ──貴方は黙っていなさい。

engChrName: ...Yes, ma'am.
engSearchText: ...Yes, ma'am.

engChrName: W-Wow...
engSearchText: W-Wow...
jpnChrName: エ、エレインさん……
jpnSearchText: エ、エレインさん……

engChrName: (I thought as much...)
engSearchText: (I thought as much...)

engChrName: Hahaha! Isn't that something?
engSearchText: Hahaha! Isn't that something?
jpnChrName: ハッハッハッ、成程なぁ。 こいつは見込み以上だったようだ。
jpnSearchText:
ハッハッハッ、成程なぁ。
こいつは見込み以上だったようだ。

engChrName: You've got a Xipha, right?
engSearchText: You've got a Xipha, right?
jpnChrName: となると── お前さん、ザイファは持ってるな？
jpnSearchText:
となると──
お前さん、ザイファは持ってるな？

engChrName: Uh, yeah? What's it to you?
engSearchText: Uh, yeah? What's it to you?
jpnChrName: まあ、持ってるけどよ。 ……なんだ、連絡先でもってか？
jpnSearchText:
まあ、持ってるけどよ。
……なんだ、連絡先でもってか？

engChrName: Contact information exchanged with the Calvard Bracer Guild—commissions received.
engSearchText:
Contact information exchanged with the Calvard
Bracer Guild—commissions received.
jpnChrName: カルバード遊撃士協会を含めた連絡先を交換、 ついでに“委託依頼”を受け取ったわよ。
jpnSearchText:
カルバード遊撃士協会を含めた連絡先を交換、
ついでに“委託依頼”を受け取ったわよ。

engChrName: Wait, what?!
engSearchText: Wait, what?!
jpnChrName: おいっ！？
jpnSearchText: おいっ！？

engChrName: Are you sure this is wise?!
engSearchText: Are you sure this is wise?!
jpnChrName: ジンさん……！？
jpnSearchText: ジンさん……！？

engChrName: You can't be serious...
engSearchText: You can't be serious...
jpnChrName: ま、まさかコイツに──
jpnSearchText: ま、まさかコイツに──

engChrName: See, we just got in a few big jobs...
engSearchText: See, we just got in a few big jobs...
jpnChrName: いや～、ちょいと大きめの依頼が 幾つも入っちまった所でな。
jpnSearchText:
いや～、ちょいと大きめの依頼が
幾つも入っちまった所でな。

engChrName: ...but Elaine and I are going to be out of town for a few days.
engSearchText:
...but Elaine and I are going to be out of town for a
few days.
jpnChrName: これから俺やエレインなんかは 数日、首都を留守にするんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
これから俺やエレインなんかは
数日、首都を留守にするんだよ。

engChrName: You wouldn't mind helping us out a bit, would ya?
engSearchText: You wouldn't mind helping us out a bit, would ya?
jpnChrName: そこでと言っちゃあなんだが── 少々、ギルドの案件を手伝わないか？
jpnSearchText:
そこでと言っちゃあなんだが──
少々、ギルドの案件を手伝わないか？

engChrName: I don't see the harm in letting you take care of some simple jobs like monster exterminations.
engSearchText:
I don't see the harm in letting you take care of some
simple jobs like monster exterminations.
jpnChrName: “手配魔獣”みたいな単純なヤツを 手分けしてもらえたらってのもあるが……
jpnSearchText:
“手配魔獣”みたいな単純なヤツを
手分けしてもらえたらってのもあるが……

engChrName: Well, that and some are a little too gray for us, if you catch my meaning.
engSearchText:
Well, that and some are a little too gray for us, if you
catch my meaning.
jpnChrName: 俺たちじゃ動きにくい案件なんかも 回せると思うぜ？
jpnSearchText:
俺たちじゃ動きにくい案件なんかも
回せると思うぜ？

engChrName: H-Hold on...
engSearchText: H-Hold on...
jpnChrName: な、な……
jpnSearchText: な、な……

engChrName: I guess looks can be deceivin', huh?
engSearchText: I guess looks can be deceivin', huh?
jpnChrName: ハッ…… こっちも見誤ってたようだ。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……
こっちも見誤ってたようだ。

engChrName: You're built like a bear, but sly as a fox.
engSearchText: You're built like a bear, but sly as a fox.
jpnChrName: クマみたいなガタイして とんだ狸かキツネじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
クマみたいなガタイして
とんだ狸かキツネじゃねえか。

engChrName: All right. I'll take your jobs—for 20% more than your goin' rate.
engSearchText:
All right. I'll take your jobs—for 20% more than your
goin' rate.
jpnChrName: いいだろう──ギルドの規定の ２割増しなら引き受けてやる。
jpnSearchText:
いいだろう──ギルドの規定の
２割増しなら引き受けてやる。

engChrName: But if they ain't my style, I'm not doin' it. That work for you?
engSearchText:
But if they ain't my style, I'm not doin' it. That work
for you?
jpnChrName: ただし趣味じゃねえ案件は受けねえ。 それでいいな？
jpnSearchText:
ただし趣味じゃねえ案件は受けねえ。
それでいいな？

engChrName: Sure does. You can look over the two I just sent you, but I don't think there should be an issue with either.
engSearchText:
Sure does. You can look over the two I just sent you,
but I don't think there should be an issue with either.
jpnChrName: おうよ、２つほど送ったが その心配はないと思うぜ。
jpnSearchText:
おうよ、２つほど送ったが
その心配はないと思うぜ。

engChrName: I'd like you to take care of at least one of 'em. It's in a place you've got a bit of a connection to now.
engSearchText:
I'd like you to take care of at least one of 'em. It's in a
place you've got a bit of a connection to now.
jpnChrName: できれば１つは頼みたい所だが。 お前さんたちに縁がある場所だしな。
jpnSearchText:
できれば１つは頼みたい所だが。
お前さんたちに縁がある場所だしな。

engChrName: Oh? Well, whatever. I'll look at 'em later.
engSearchText: Oh? Well, whatever. I'll look at 'em later.
jpnChrName: はん……？ まあ、確認してみるけどよ。
jpnSearchText:
はん……？
まあ、確認してみるけどよ。

engChrName: Th-This isn't a good idea! We can't trust a shady character like this guy with our work!
engSearchText:
Th-This isn't a good idea! We can't trust a shady
character like this guy with our work!
jpnChrName: お、俺は納得できませんよ！ 何だってこんな胡乱（うろん）なヤツに──
jpnSearchText:
お、俺は納得できませんよ！
何だってこんな胡乱（うろん）なヤツに──

engChrName: I understand your reservations, but with as much work as we have piling up, now's not the time to get picky about help.
engSearchText:
I understand your reservations, but with as much
work as we have piling up, now's not the time to get
picky about help.
jpnChrName: まあまあ、お前さんも含めて 全員手持ちで一杯一杯なんだからよ。
jpnSearchText:
まあまあ、お前さんも含めて
全員手持ちで一杯一杯なんだからよ。

engChrName: I'll handle the reports and getting this approved. That okay with you, Elaine?
engSearchText:
I'll handle the reports and getting this approved.
That okay with you, Elaine?
jpnChrName: この件については俺が回しておく。 エレインもそれで構わないな？
jpnSearchText:
この件については俺が回しておく。
エレインもそれで構わないな？

engChrName: *sigh* So be it.
engSearchText: *sigh* So be it.
jpnChrName: ……ふう、分かりました。
jpnSearchText: ……ふう、分かりました。

engChrName: Well, we've got a train to catch. See you two around.
engSearchText: Well, we've got a train to catch. See you two around.
jpnChrName: そろそろ列車の時間だ。 またなアークライド、お嬢ちゃんも。
jpnSearchText:
そろそろ列車の時間だ。
またなアークライド、お嬢ちゃんも。

engChrName: Alvis and I will go buy the tickets, so if you wanna say anything to this guy, make it quick.
engSearchText:
Alvis and I will go buy the tickets, so if you wanna say
anything to this guy, make it quick.
jpnChrName: ──先に切符を取っておく。 挨拶したいんなら手早くな。
jpnSearchText:
──先に切符を取っておく。
挨拶したいんなら手早くな。

engChrName: Wh-What do you...?
engSearchText: Wh-What do you...?
jpnChrName: え、ちょっと……
jpnSearchText: え、ちょっと……

engChrName: Grr...
engSearchText: Grr...

engChrName: *sigh* Unbelievable...
engSearchText: *sigh* Unbelievable...
jpnChrName: ふう……まったく。
jpnSearchText: ふう……まったく。

engChrName: I see you're just as popular with your seniors as ever. Too bad only men fall for it.
engSearchText:
I see you're just as popular with your seniors as ever.
Too bad only men fall for it.
jpnChrName: ──相変わらず年上受けがいいわね？ 同性限定ではあるけど。
jpnSearchText:
──相変わらず年上受けがいいわね？
同性限定ではあるけど。

engChrName: My charms work on the ladies, too, y'know.
engSearchText: My charms work on the ladies, too, y'know.
jpnChrName: 失礼な、お姉様にもモテモテだっつーの。
jpnSearchText: 失礼な、お姉様にもモテモテだっつーの。

engChrName: Might've met my match with that guy, though. Zin's gonna be a tougher cookie than I thought.
engSearchText:
Might've met my match with that guy, though.
Zin's gonna be a tougher cookie than I thought.
jpnChrName: しかし《不動》か── 噂よりも数段以上やりやがるな。
jpnSearchText:
しかし《不動》か──
噂よりも数段以上やりやがるな。

engChrName: Finally see how he can go toe to toe with that freak of nature.
engSearchText:
Finally see how he can go toe to toe with that freak
of nature.
jpnChrName: ………あの化物と 互角ってのも納得だぜ。
jpnSearchText:
………あの化物と
互角ってのも納得だぜ。

engChrName: ...Hmm? No, never mind. I don't have time to dig into that right now.
engSearchText:
...Hmm? No, never mind. I don't have time to dig
into that right now.
jpnChrName: ……？　まあいいわ、 こちらも時間がないことだし。
jpnSearchText:
……？　まあいいわ、
こちらも時間がないことだし。

engChrName: Just so you know, A's been silent since what happened. It'll be a while until we learn anything more.
engSearchText:
Just so you know, A's been silent since what
happened. It'll be a while until we learn
anything more.
jpnChrName: ちなみに《Ａ》については完全黙秘。 まだしばらくは掛かるでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに《Ａ》については完全黙秘。
まだしばらくは掛かるでしょう。

engChrName: Figures.
engSearchText: Figures.
jpnChrName: ま、だろうな。
jpnSearchText: ま、だろうな。

engChrName: So you're a client of his, correct? Agnès, was it?
engSearchText: So you're a client of his, correct? Agnès, was it?
jpnChrName: 改めて──アニエスさんだったかしら？ 彼に何かを依頼したという。
jpnSearchText:
改めて──アニエスさんだったかしら？
彼に何かを依頼したという。

engChrName: Y-Yes, that's right! I really appreciate your help the other day, too!
engSearchText:
Y-Yes, that's right! I really appreciate your help the
other day, too!
jpnChrName: あ、はいっ……！ 先日はお世話になりました。
jpnSearchText:
あ、はいっ……！
先日はお世話になりました。

engChrName: I appreciate the sentiment, but I didn't contribute much, really.
engSearchText:
I appreciate the sentiment, but I didn't contribute
much, really.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、特に何かが 出来たわけじゃないけれど。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、特に何かが
出来たわけじゃないけれど。

engChrName: What are you doing out and about with him today, though?
engSearchText:
What are you doing out and about with him
today, though?
jpnChrName: それはともかく── どうして今日も、彼と一緒に？
jpnSearchText:
それはともかく──
どうして今日も、彼と一緒に？

engChrName: Given that you're not wearing your uniform, is your request not over yet?
engSearchText:
Given that you're not wearing your uniform, is your
request not over yet?
jpnChrName: 制服ではないけれど…… 依頼の続きといったところかしら？
jpnSearchText:
制服ではないけれど……
依頼の続きといったところかしら？

engChrName: Well—
engSearchText: Well—
jpnChrName: いや、そいつは──
jpnSearchText: いや、そいつは──

engChrName: Umm... That is part of it, yes.
engSearchText: Umm... That is part of it, yes.
jpnChrName: その、依頼についてはヴァンさんに 継続してお願いしているんですが……
jpnSearchText:
その、依頼についてはヴァンさんに
継続してお願いしているんですが……

engChrName: But I'm also working part-time at Arkride Solutions now.
engSearchText:
But I'm also working part-time at Arkride
Solutions now.
jpnChrName: それとは別に、事務所のお手伝いを させてもらう事になりまして。
jpnSearchText:
それとは別に、事務所のお手伝いを
させてもらう事になりまして。

engChrName: Today's my first day on the job.
engSearchText: Today's my first day on the job.
jpnChrName: 今日がアルバイトの初日なんです。
jpnSearchText: 今日がアルバイトの初日なんです。

engChrName: Wha...
engSearchText: Wha...

engChrName: Explain yourself. Now.
engSearchText: Explain yourself. Now.
jpnChrName: ………どういう事、ヴァン？
jpnSearchText: ………どういう事、ヴァン？

engChrName: Hey, I tried to turn her down!
engSearchText: Hey, I tried to turn her down!
jpnChrName: まあ聞け、俺は反対したんだ。
jpnSearchText: まあ聞け、俺は反対したんだ。

engChrName: I'm tellin' you, she's craftier than she looks! Sure, there is some other stuff goin' on, but—
engSearchText:
I'm tellin' you, she's craftier than she looks!
Sure, there is some other stuff goin' on, but—
jpnChrName: だがこう見えて強引というか強情でな。 事情もあって仕方なくっつーか──
jpnSearchText:
だがこう見えて強引というか強情でな。
事情もあって仕方なくっつーか──

engChrName: No 'stuff' could excuse this! What are you THINKING?!
engSearchText:
No 'stuff' could excuse this! What are
you THINKING?!
jpnChrName: 事情もあってじゃないわ！ いったい何を考えているの！？
jpnSearchText:
事情もあってじゃないわ！
いったい何を考えているの！？

engChrName: She's a civilian! What would you do if she got—?!
engSearchText:
She's a civilian! What would you do if
she got—?!
jpnChrName: 彼女、普通の民間人なんでしょう！？ 貴方の裏の仕事に巻き込んだら──
jpnSearchText:
彼女、普通の民間人なんでしょう！？
貴方の裏の仕事に巻き込んだら──

engChrName: Elaine! The train's leaving in a minute!
engSearchText: Elaine! The train's leaving in a minute!
jpnChrName: エレインさん……！ まだですか、もう発車時刻ですよ！
jpnSearchText:
エレインさん……！
まだですか、もう発車時刻ですよ！

engChrName: Wait, did he just say 'Elaine'?
engSearchText: Wait, did he just say 'Elaine'?
jpnChrName: エレイン……？
jpnSearchText: エレイン……？

engChrName: What? THE Elaine? No way!
engSearchText: What? THE Elaine? No way!
jpnChrName: おおっ、あの有名な──！
jpnSearchText: おおっ、あの有名な──！

engChrName: ...This conversation is not over, for the record. Don't think you can avoid me forever.
engSearchText:
...This conversation is not over, for the record.
Don't think you can avoid me forever.
jpnChrName: ……そのうち詳しい話を 聞かせてもらうから覚悟なさい。
jpnSearchText:
……そのうち詳しい話を
聞かせてもらうから覚悟なさい。

engChrName: Agnès, please, please be careful. You better keep her safe.
engSearchText:
Agnès, please, please be careful. You better keep
her safe.
jpnChrName: アニエスさん、くれぐれも気をつけて。 ヴァン──しっかり彼女を守るのよ。
jpnSearchText:
アニエスさん、くれぐれも気をつけて。
ヴァン──しっかり彼女を守るのよ。

engChrName: Sorry to keep you waiting.
engSearchText: Sorry to keep you waiting.
jpnChrName: ごめんなさい、アルヴィス君。
jpnSearchText: <S3>ごめんなさい、アルヴィス君。

engChrName: Don't sweat it—but we need to go!
engSearchText: Don't sweat it—but we need to go!
jpnChrName: いえ、急ぎましょう。
jpnSearchText: <S3>いえ、急ぎましょう。

engChrName: Umm...
engSearchText: Umm...
jpnChrName: え、えっと……
jpnSearchText: え、えっと……

engChrName: Bah. Somethin' tells me she's gonna keep houndin' for answers till she gets one.
engSearchText:
Bah. Somethin' tells me she's gonna keep houndin'
for answers till she gets one.
jpnChrName: ったく、あの調子じゃ納得するまで 突っ込んで来そうだな。
jpnSearchText:
ったく、あの調子じゃ納得するまで
突っ込んで来そうだな。

engChrName: Now how am I gonna shake her off next time...?
engSearchText: Now how am I gonna shake her off next time...?
jpnChrName: 今のうちに躱し方を……（ブツブツ）
jpnSearchText: 今のうちに躱し方を……（ブツブツ）

engChrName: So...I take it you two are close?
engSearchText: So...I take it you two are close?
jpnChrName: ……その、やっぱり 随分親しくされているんですね？
jpnSearchText:
……その、やっぱり
随分親しくされているんですね？

engChrName: That's a generous way to put it. We just go way back, is all.
engSearchText:
That's a generous way to put it. We just go way back,
is all.
jpnChrName: いや、だから只の昔馴染みだっての。
jpnSearchText: いや、だから只の昔馴染みだっての。

engChrName: Even though we've both been in the capital for a while, I hadn't seen her for three years till just recently.
engSearchText:
Even though we've both been in the capital for a
while, I hadn't seen her for three years till
just recently.
jpnChrName: お互い首都にいたってのに この前、３年振りに会ったくらいだ。
jpnSearchText:
お互い首都にいたってのに
この前、３年振りに会ったくらいだ。

engChrName: I...see. But you seemed so... Never mind.
engSearchText: I...see. But you seemed so... Never mind.
jpnChrName: そうなんですか…… ………それにしては…………
jpnSearchText:
そうなんですか……
………それにしては…………

engChrName: Huh? Well, anyway. Coulda gone without meetin' the big guy, to be honest.
engSearchText:
Huh? Well, anyway. Coulda gone without meetin'
the big guy, to be honest.
jpnChrName: ？　エレインはともかく、 妙な縁が出来ちまったようだな。
jpnSearchText:
？　エレインはともかく、
妙な縁が出来ちまったようだな。

engChrName: I mean, who'd've guessed Zin the Immovable, of all people, would be dumpin' work on us.
engSearchText:
I mean, who'd've guessed Zin the Immovable, of all
people, would be dumpin' work on us.
jpnChrName: 《不動のジン》──まさか仕事を こっちに押し付けてくるとは。
jpnSearchText:
《不動のジン》──まさか仕事を
こっちに押し付けてくるとは。

engChrName: I know what you mean. Even people outside of Calvard would recognize his name.
engSearchText:
I know what you mean. Even people outside of
Calvard would recognize his name.
jpnChrName: お名前は聞いたことがあります。 国内外でも有名な遊撃士ですよね？
jpnSearchText:
お名前は聞いたことがあります。
国内外でも有名な遊撃士ですよね？

engChrName: Did you look at the jobs he sent to your Xipha yet?
engSearchText: Did you look at the jobs he sent to your Xipha yet?
jpnChrName: えっと、ヴァンさんの端末に ２つ依頼を送ったそうですけど……
jpnSearchText:
えっと、ヴァンさんの端末に
２つ依頼を送ったそうですけど……

engChrName: Not yet. *sigh* Guess I oughta look.
engSearchText: Not yet. *sigh* Guess I oughta look.
jpnChrName: 仕方ねえ──一応確認するか。
jpnSearchText: 仕方ねえ──一応確認するか。

engChrName: Oh...
engSearchText: Oh...
jpnChrName: これって……
jpnSearchText: これって……

engChrName: So that's their game.
engSearchText: So that's their game.
jpnChrName: ……なるほどな。
jpnSearchText: ……なるほどな。

engChrName: One of them sounds like my usual kind of thing.
engSearchText: One of them sounds like my usual kind of thing.
jpnChrName: もう一つも確かに“裏”向きだが、 ジャコモが殺られたリバーサイドの整備路──
jpnSearchText:
もう一つも確かに“裏”向きだが、
ジャコモが殺られたリバーサイドの整備路──

engChrName: As for the other, the cops took so long investigatin' Giacomo that a monster moseyed in, eh?
engSearchText:
As for the other, the cops took so long investigatin'
Giacomo that a monster moseyed in, eh?
jpnChrName: 警察の封鎖解除が遅れたせいで 奥に放置された手配魔獣ときたか。
jpnSearchText:
警察の封鎖解除が遅れたせいで
奥に放置された手配魔獣ときたか。

engChrName: So it seems...
engSearchText: So it seems...

engChrName: Handy that both of 'em are close to the areas we were already plannin' to cover.
engSearchText:
Handy that both of 'em are close to the areas we were
already plannin' to cover.
jpnChrName: 一応、今日のエリア内ではあるが 完全に予定外の追加オーダーだ。
jpnSearchText:
一応、今日のエリア内ではあるが
完全に予定外の追加オーダーだ。

engChrName: None of this was on the docket, though.
engSearchText: None of this was on the docket, though.
jpnChrName: ここらで切り上げて お前は先に事務所に戻ってるか？
jpnSearchText:
ここらで切り上げて
お前は先に事務所に戻ってるか？

engChrName: You're cool to call it a day and head back to the office.
engSearchText:
You're cool to call it a day and head back to
the office.
jpnChrName: 何ならもうバイトを上がってもいい。
jpnSearchText: 何ならもうバイトを上がってもいい。

engChrName: I'd like to keep helping, if you'll have me.
engSearchText: I'd like to keep helping, if you'll have me.
jpnChrName: いえ、当然手伝わせて下さい。
jpnSearchText: いえ、当然手伝わせて下さい。

engChrName: This is my first day on the job after all.
engSearchText: This is my first day on the job after all.
jpnChrName: 大切なアルバイト初日── 何とかやり遂げてみたいんです。
jpnSearchText:
大切なアルバイト初日──
何とかやり遂げてみたいんです。

engChrName: Heh. Then I guess we oughta get back to work.
engSearchText: Heh. Then I guess we oughta get back to work.
jpnChrName: ハッ、いいだろう。 そんじゃあ裏解決業務、再開だな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、いいだろう。
そんじゃあ裏解決業務、再開だな。

engChrName: What are YOU doing here?
engSearchText: What are YOU doing here?
jpnChrName: ヴァン……！？ どうして貴方がここへ……
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン……！？
どうして貴方がここへ……

engChrName: Arkride, you made it!
engSearchText: Arkride, you made it!
jpnChrName: おお、よく来たなアークライド。
jpnSearchText: おお、よく来たなアークライド。

engChrName: I called him over to hash out some important business.
engSearchText:
I called him over to hash out some
important business.
jpnChrName: 実は俺が呼んでおいたんだ。 少し話を聞きたくてな。
jpnSearchText:
実は俺が呼んでおいたんだ。
少し話を聞きたくてな。

engChrName: You heard the man. Quit glaring daggers at me.
engSearchText: You heard the man. Quit glaring daggers at me.
jpnChrName: ま、そういうことだ。 そんな風に睨まないでくれ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、そういうことだ。
そんな風に睨まないでくれ。

engChrName: It's...uh...good to see you again.
engSearchText: It's...uh...good to see you again.
jpnChrName: ……その、ご無沙汰しています。
jpnSearchText: ……その、ご無沙汰しています。

engChrName: The same to you. Let me guess, you're working again today?
engSearchText:
The same to you. Let me guess, you're working
again today?
jpnChrName: アニエスさん…… 今日もアルバイトなのね？
jpnSearchText:
アニエスさん……
今日もアルバイトなのね？

engChrName: And then there's this one...
engSearchText: And then there's this one...
jpnChrName: それに………
jpnSearchText: それに………

engChrName: Hmm? Oh, right! My name is Ferida Al-Fayed.
engSearchText: Hmm? Oh, right! My name is Ferida Al-Fayed.
jpnChrName: ？　──初めまして、 フェリーダ・アルファイドといいます。
jpnSearchText:
？　──初めまして、
フェリーダ・アルファイドといいます。

engChrName: I work with Agnès and Van now.
engSearchText: I work with Agnès and Van now.
jpnChrName: 訳あってアニエスさん同様、 “ばいと”として雇ってもらってます。
jpnSearchText:
訳あってアニエスさん同様、
“ばいと”として雇ってもらってます。

engChrName: I'm still learning the ropes, but I'll take on any job— no matter how dangerous!
engSearchText:
I'm still learning the ropes, but I'll take on any job—
no matter how dangerous!
jpnChrName: まだ未熟者ですが、 どんな危険なお仕事でも頑張ります！
jpnSearchText:
まだ未熟者ですが、
どんな危険なお仕事でも頑張ります！

engChrName: Come on, you think I had a choice in this?
engSearchText: Come on, you think I had a choice in this?
jpnChrName: 待て、俺としても不本意なんだ……！
jpnSearchText: 待て、俺としても不本意なんだ……！

engChrName: 'Sides, it's plain as day she ain't your average kid.
engSearchText: 'Sides, it's plain as day she ain't your average kid.
jpnChrName: それによく見ろ、素人じゃねえ。
jpnSearchText: それによく見ろ、素人じゃねえ。

engChrName: Are you a jaeger by any chance?
engSearchText: Are you a jaeger by any chance?
jpnChrName: もしかして………猟兵とか？
jpnSearchText: もしかして………猟兵とか？

engChrName: Yes! I'm from the Warriors of Kruga. Well, until I got kicked out, that is.
engSearchText:
Yes! I'm from the Warriors of Kruga. Well, until I
got kicked out, that is.
jpnChrName: はいっ、クルガ戦士団の出身です。 今は勘当されちゃってますけど……
jpnSearchText:
はいっ、クルガ戦士団の出身です。
今は勘当されちゃってますけど……

engChrName: I see... So you were involved in what happened in Creil.
engSearchText:
I see... So you were involved in what happened
in Creil.
jpnChrName: そう、貴女がクレイユの事件の……
jpnSearchText: そう、貴女がクレイユの事件の……

engChrName: That's just the topic I was hoping to discuss.
engSearchText: That's just the topic I was hoping to discuss.
jpnChrName: 早速だが、まさにその事件について 詳しい話を聞かせてくれないか？
jpnSearchText:
早速だが、まさにその事件について
詳しい話を聞かせてくれないか？

engChrName: Mind filling us in on what went down? Alvis' story was full of holes.
engSearchText:
Mind filling us in on what went down? Alvis' story
was full of holes.
jpnChrName: アルヴィスから一通りは聞いたが、 不明瞭な点も多くてな。
jpnSearchText:
アルヴィスから一通りは聞いたが、
不明瞭な点も多くてな。

engChrName: ...I'll tell you what I can, but nothin' about my clients.
engSearchText: ...I'll tell you what I can, but nothin' about my clients.
jpnChrName: ………仕方ねえな。 全部を話せるわけじゃねえが──
jpnSearchText:
………仕方ねえな。
全部を話せるわけじゃねえが──

engChrName: Van explained the nightmare that unfolded in Creil...
engSearchText: Van explained the nightmare that unfolded in Creil...
jpnChrName: クレイユ村の周辺で起きたあの悪夢のような事件……
jpnSearchText: <C1>クレイユ村の周辺で起きたあの悪夢のような事件……

engChrName: ...though he naturally left out details such as the Geneses.
engSearchText:
...though he naturally left out details such as
the Geneses.
jpnChrName: 《ゲネシス》など一部の要素を除いて ジンたちと情報を共有した。
jpnSearchText:
《ゲネシス》など一部の要素を除いて
ジンたちと情報を共有した。

engChrName: Hmm... That Walter's just full of surprises.
engSearchText: Hmm... That Walter's just full of surprises.
jpnChrName: ふむ、まさかヴァルターの奴がな……
jpnSearchText: ふむ、まさかヴァルターの奴がな……

engChrName: Old friend of yours, right? Heard you used to run together with your Taito stuff.
engSearchText:
Old friend of yours, right? Heard you used to run
together with your Taito stuff.
jpnChrName: やはり知り合いだったか。 《泰斗》絡みとは聞いちゃいるが。
jpnSearchText:
やはり知り合いだったか。
《泰斗》絡みとは聞いちゃいるが。

engChrName: Your info-gathering's served you well.
engSearchText: Your info-gathering's served you well.
jpnChrName: ハハ、さすがの情報通だ。
jpnSearchText: ハハ、さすがの情報通だ。

engChrName: We trained under the same master until Walter lost his way over ten years ago.
engSearchText:
We trained under the same master until Walter lost
his way over ten years ago.
jpnChrName: ──あいつは俺の“元兄弟子”さ。 十年以上前に道を違えたがな。
jpnSearchText:
──あいつは俺の“元兄弟子”さ。
十年以上前に道を違えたがな。

engChrName: But that's enough about me.
engSearchText: But that's enough about me.
jpnChrName: ま、それはともかく。
jpnSearchText: ま、それはともかく。

engChrName: It's interesting that the society sent an Enforcer after A's people.
engSearchText:
It's interesting that the society sent an Enforcer after
A's people.
jpnChrName: 結社の執行者であるあいつが《Ａ》の幹部を 追ってるっていうのは、割と重要な情報だぜ。
jpnSearchText:
結社の執行者であるあいつが《Ａ》の幹部を
追ってるっていうのは、割と重要な情報だぜ。

engChrName: Agreed. I could have easily seen them joining forces at some point.
engSearchText:
Agreed. I could have easily seen them joining forces
at some point.
jpnChrName: ……そうですね、場合によっては 結託していてもおかしくなさそうですが。
jpnSearchText:
……そうですね、場合によっては
結託していてもおかしくなさそうですが。

engChrName: Though, that seems out of the question now.
engSearchText: Though, that seems out of the question now.
jpnChrName: むしろ対立──いえ敵対しているような 雰囲気すら感じさせますね。
jpnSearchText:
むしろ対立──いえ敵対しているような
雰囲気すら感じさせますね。

engChrName: Far as I know, the society's been quiet the last year or so.
engSearchText:
Far as I know, the society's been quiet the last year
or so.
jpnChrName: 《結社》はここ一年くらい 目立った動きはねえんだったか。
jpnSearchText:
《結社》はここ一年くらい
目立った動きはねえんだったか。

engChrName: Guessin' you guys are still chasin' them?
engSearchText: Guessin' you guys are still chasin' them?
jpnChrName: そっちの尻尾も掴みたいってか？
jpnSearchText: そっちの尻尾も掴みたいってか？

engChrName: They're always a concern, but we can hardly prioritize them over Almata right now.
engSearchText:
They're always a concern, but we can hardly
prioritize them over Almata right now.
jpnChrName: ああ──とはいえ今はどうしても アルマータの方が優先順位は上だが。
jpnSearchText:
ああ──とはいえ今はどうしても
アルマータの方が優先順位は上だが。

engChrName: Hmm...
engSearchText: Hmm...
jpnChrName: ふむ……
jpnSearchText: ふむ……

engChrName: All that aside, I'm curious how deceased jaegers were able to get up and move around.
engSearchText:
All that aside, I'm curious how deceased jaegers were
able to get up and move around.
jpnChrName: ……個人的には、全滅した筈の猟兵たちが どうして動けたのかも気になるのだけど？
jpnSearchText:
……個人的には、全滅した筈の猟兵たちが
どうして動けたのかも気になるのだけど？

engChrName: Your bracer buddy was seein' things. None of that happened.
engSearchText:
Your bracer buddy was seein' things. None of
that happened.
jpnChrName: ハハ、そりゃ誤情報だろ？ ギルドのあの若いのの勘違いとか。
jpnSearchText:
ハハ、そりゃ誤情報だろ？
ギルドのあの若いのの勘違いとか。

engChrName: Don't try that with me. There were sightings of monsters behaving strangely, too.
engSearchText:
Don't try that with me. There were sightings of
monsters behaving strangely, too.
jpnChrName: そんなわけないでしょう……！ 異常な状態の軍用魔獣も目撃されている！
jpnSearchText:
そんなわけないでしょう……！
異常な状態の軍用魔獣も目撃されている！

engChrName: And Alvis isn't our only witness, a police officer on the scene also saw the Eisenschild leader disa—
engSearchText:
And Alvis isn't our only witness, a police officer on
the scene also saw the Eisenschild leader disa—
jpnChrName: アルヴィス君以外にも、現地の駐在警官が アイゼンシルト中隊長の消滅を目撃して──
jpnSearchText:
アルヴィス君以外にも、現地の駐在警官が
アイゼンシルト中隊長の消滅を目撃して──

engChrName: *sigh*...
engSearchText: *sigh*...
jpnChrName: ……アイーダさん………
jpnSearchText: ……アイーダさん………

engChrName: I'm sorry. That was very insensitive of me.
engSearchText: I'm sorry. That was very insensitive of me.
jpnChrName: ごめんなさい…… 配慮が足りなかったわね。
jpnSearchText:
ごめんなさい……
配慮が足りなかったわね。

engChrName: Well, I'm sure you've got your reasons for keeping quiet.
engSearchText:
Well, I'm sure you've got your reasons for
keeping quiet.
jpnChrName: ま、事情があるなら無理には聞かんさ。 そちらの方はお前さんたちに任せるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、事情があるなら無理には聞かんさ。
そちらの方はお前さんたちに任せるぜ。

engChrName: We're up to our ears in work as is, so it's not like we can help out with whatever you're dealing with.
engSearchText:
We're up to our ears in work as is, so it's not like we
can help out with whatever you're dealing with.
jpnChrName: こっちはこっちで余裕もないしな、 更に増えてる案件の対応だけで手一杯だ。
jpnSearchText:
こっちはこっちで余裕もないしな、
更に増えてる案件の対応だけで手一杯だ。

engChrName: Hmm. Maybe it's about time to call in some backup.
engSearchText: Hmm. Maybe it's about time to call in some backup.
jpnChrName: お前さんたちにも期待したいが…… ……そろそろ助っ人が必要かもしれんなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
お前さんたちにも期待したいが……
……そろそろ助っ人が必要かもしれんなぁ。

engChrName: Oh?
engSearchText: Oh?
jpnChrName: へえ、助っ人ねぇ？
jpnSearchText: へえ、助っ人ねぇ？

engChrName: Bracers from the other Calvardian branches, I presume?
engSearchText:
Bracers from the other Calvardian branches,
I presume?
jpnChrName: 首都以外から、という事でしょうか？
jpnSearchText: 首都以外から、という事でしょうか？

engChrName: Actually, no. We're so short-staffed nationwide that branches are already sharing personnel to get by.
engSearchText:
Actually, no. We're so short-staffed nationwide that
branches are already sharing personnel to get by.
jpnChrName: いえ、どこの地方支部も大変だし、 こちらが手伝いに向かうくらいでね。
jpnSearchText:
いえ、どこの地方支部も大変だし、
こちらが手伝いに向かうくらいでね。

engChrName: We've been toying with bringing in someone from another country to help ease the load.
engSearchText:
We've been toying with bringing in someone from
another country to help ease the load.
jpnChrName: 実は“他国”の支部から ちょっとした当てがあるのだけど……
jpnSearchText:
実は“他国”の支部から
ちょっとした当てがあるのだけど……

engChrName: Unfortunately, whether they can come or not is still up in the air.
engSearchText:
Unfortunately, whether they can come or not is still
up in the air.
jpnChrName: ま、それも決まってるわけじゃないし、 しばらく今の面子で回すしかないだろう。
jpnSearchText:
ま、それも決まってるわけじゃないし、
しばらく今の面子で回すしかないだろう。

engChrName: So for the time being, I'll just have to dump as much work on you as you can take!
engSearchText:
So for the time being, I'll just have to dump as much
work on you as you can take!
jpnChrName: そういうわけで、お前さんたちにも バンバン委託するからよろしく頼むぜ！
jpnSearchText:
そういうわけで、お前さんたちにも
バンバン委託するからよろしく頼むぜ！

engChrName: Bucko, we've got plenty to deal with already, y'know.
engSearchText: Bucko, we've got plenty to deal with already, y'know.
jpnChrName: ってオイ……！ バンバンは無理だぞ、バンバンは！
jpnSearchText:
ってオイ……！
バンバンは無理だぞ、バンバンは！

engChrName: Don't worry! I'm with you guys now, remember?
engSearchText: Don't worry! I'm with you guys now, remember?
jpnChrName: 大丈夫ですっ、わたしも頑張りますから！
jpnSearchText: 大丈夫ですっ、わたしも頑張りますから！

engChrName: Ferida, please take care of yourself.
engSearchText: Ferida, please take care of yourself.
jpnChrName: ふふ、あまり無茶はしないでね。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、あまり無茶はしないでね。

engChrName: And, Van, from now on I'll be sending your tasks straight to your Xipha via orbmail.
engSearchText:
And, Van, from now on I'll be sending your tasks
straight to your Xipha via orbmail.
jpnChrName: ──ヴァン、今後は私から 掲示板を通して委託案件を送るわ。
jpnSearchText:
──ヴァン、今後は私から
掲示板を通して委託案件を送るわ。

engChrName: If an emergency happens, I may need to call. Don't ignore me if I do, all right?
engSearchText:
If an emergency happens, I may need to call.
Don't ignore me if I do, all right?
jpnChrName: ザイファでの連絡も取れるようにして。 くれぐれも勝手に雲隠れしないように。
jpnSearchText:
ザイファでの連絡も取れるようにして。
くれぐれも勝手に雲隠れしないように。

engChrName: Sure thing.
engSearchText: Sure thing.

engChrName: Achoo!
engSearchText: Achoo!
jpnChrName: ぶえっくしょい！！
jpnSearchText: ぶえっくしょい！！

engChrName: I hope you're not getting a cold...
engSearchText: I hope you're not getting a cold...
jpnChrName: ジンさん、まさか風邪ですか？
jpnSearchText: ジンさん、まさか風邪ですか？

engChrName: *sniff* Nah. Probably just a certain lady talking about me somewhere.
engSearchText:
*sniff* Nah. Probably just a certain lady talking about
me somewhere.
jpnChrName: ズズ……いやぁ、大丈夫さ。 どこぞのご婦人に噂でもされたかねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ズズ……いやぁ、大丈夫さ。
どこぞのご婦人に噂でもされたかねぇ。

engChrName: Back on topic, what were you saying, Alvis?
engSearchText: Back on topic, what were you saying, Alvis?
jpnChrName: ふう、冗談はさておき── 続けて頂戴、アルヴィス君。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、冗談はさておき──
続けて頂戴、アルヴィス君。

engChrName: Oh, right. Just that we have more threats to keep our eyes on than just the usual suspects and the society.
engSearchText:
Oh, right. Just that we have more threats to keep our
eyes on than just the usual suspects and the society.
jpnChrName: はい、それ以外に 注意すべきは《結社》ですが……
jpnSearchText:
はい、それ以外に
注意すべきは《結社》ですが……

engChrName: Namely, that group that defeated the Eisenschild unit.
engSearchText:
Namely, that group that defeated the
Eisenschild unit.
jpnChrName: アイゼンシルトの中隊を 全滅させた勢力も謎のままです。
jpnSearchText:
アイゼンシルトの中隊を
全滅させた勢力も謎のままです。

engChrName: While they aren't part of Almata per se, the two groups seem related.
engSearchText:
While they aren't part of Almata per se, the two
groups seem related.
jpnChrName: アルマータの構成員たちとも やはり違っていそうですし。
jpnSearchText:
アルマータの構成員たちとも
やはり違っていそうですし。

engChrName: Agreed. Though, judging by the Almata executives that appeared in Langport, we'll have our hands full with them alone.
engSearchText:
Agreed. Though, judging by the Almata executives
that appeared in Langport, we'll have our hands full
with them alone.
jpnChrName: ええ、煌都に現れた幹部２名も 恐るべき使い手だったみたいだけど。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、煌都に現れた幹部２名も
恐るべき使い手だったみたいだけど。

engChrName: That said, I do agree we'll need to add the group Melchior originally came from to our watch list.
engSearchText:
That said, I do agree we'll need to add the group
Melchior originally came from to our watch list.
jpnChrName: メルキオルという幹部の“古巣”── ……どうも複雑な背景がありそうね。
jpnSearchText:
メルキオルという幹部の“古巣”──
……どうも複雑な背景がありそうね。

engChrName: Not to mention all the potential interlopers from the East...
engSearchText:
Not to mention all the potential interlopers from
the East...
jpnChrName: “東”も含めて未確認勢力は多数いるし、 何が入り込んでいてもおかしくないわ。
jpnSearchText:
“東”も含めて未確認勢力は多数いるし、
何が入り込んでいてもおかしくないわ。

engChrName: All the while, the CID shows no interest in sharing information.
engSearchText:
All the while, the CID shows no interest in
sharing information.
jpnChrName: ＣＩＤなら何か掴んでいそうだけど……
jpnSearchText: ＣＩＤなら何か掴んでいそうだけど……

engChrName: Those guys've only gotten stingier with time.
engSearchText: Those guys've only gotten stingier with time.
jpnChrName: あちらさんも最近、今まで以上に 情報を寄越さなくなってるからなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
あちらさんも最近、今まで以上に
情報を寄越さなくなってるからなぁ。

engChrName: And something tells me there's more to it than wanting to save face.
engSearchText:
And something tells me there's more to it than
wanting to save face.
jpnChrName: それも単なる縄張り争い以上の。
jpnSearchText: それも単なる縄張り争い以上の。

engChrName: I have the same feeling.
engSearchText: I have the same feeling.
jpnChrName: ええ……そんな気配は感じます。
jpnSearchText: ええ……そんな気配は感じます。

engChrName: So for the time being, we're on our own.
engSearchText: So for the time being, we're on our own.
jpnChrName: やっぱり地道にギルドの情報網を 当たっていくしかありませんね。
jpnSearchText:
やっぱり地道にギルドの情報網を
当たっていくしかありませんね。

engChrName: Not quite. We can always call in a certain spriggan for backup.
engSearchText:
Not quite. We can always call in a certain spriggan
for backup.
jpnChrName: ああ、例の裏解決屋── お前さんの昔馴染みなんかも含めてな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、例の裏解決屋──
お前さんの昔馴染みなんかも含めてな。

engChrName: Why do you insist on relying on that criminal for help?!
engSearchText:
Why do you insist on relying on that criminal
for help?!
jpnChrName: じょ、冗談じゃないですよ！ あんな胡散臭いヤツの手なんか……！
jpnSearchText:
じょ、冗談じゃないですよ！
あんな胡散臭いヤツの手なんか……！

engChrName: I protest as well, Zin. I'm more inclined to send you to get information out of the CID for us.
engSearchText:
I protest as well, Zin. I'm more inclined to send you
to get information out of the CID for us.
jpnChrName: ええ、それよりいっそジンさんに 切り込んでもらうのはどうでしょう？
jpnSearchText:
ええ、それよりいっそジンさんに
切り込んでもらうのはどうでしょう？

engChrName: Why don't you invite your master's daughter to dinner? You were students together, as I recall.
engSearchText:
Why don't you invite your master's daughter
to dinner? You were students together, as I recall.
jpnChrName: 噂の妹弟子──いえ姉弟子の方を たとえばお食事に誘ってみたりとか。
jpnSearchText:
噂の妹弟子──いえ姉弟子の方を
たとえばお食事に誘ってみたりとか。

engChrName: I'm sure you two have a LOT to talk about.
engSearchText: I'm sure you two have a LOT to talk about.
jpnChrName: 私方面のツテよりよほど有望では？
jpnSearchText: 私方面のツテよりよほど有望では？

engChrName: Have mercy on me...
engSearchText: Have mercy on me...
jpnChrName: 悪い、勘弁してくれ。
jpnSearchText: 悪い、勘弁してくれ。

engChrName: Man, you used to be such a softie. How'd you get so tough?
engSearchText:
Man, you used to be such a softie. How'd you get
so tough?
jpnChrName: ったく、お前さんも手強くなったなぁ。 最初の頃はもっと可愛げがあったモンだが。
jpnSearchText:
ったく、お前さんも手強くなったなぁ。
最初の頃はもっと可愛げがあったモンだが。

engChrName: I owe it to years of training.
engSearchText: I owe it to years of training.
jpnChrName: 伊達に何年も鍛えられていませんので。
jpnSearchText: 伊達に何年も鍛えられていませんので。

engChrName: By the way, my suggestion just now wasn't a joke.
engSearchText: By the way, my suggestion just now wasn't a joke.
jpnChrName: ──それに先ほどの話は あくまでも真面目な提案ですよ？
jpnSearchText:
──それに先ほどの話は
あくまでも真面目な提案ですよ？

engChrName: You are well acquainted with her, she once worked for the guild, and she has the former president's confidence, too.
engSearchText:
You are well acquainted with her, she once worked
for the guild, and she has the former president's
confidence, too.
jpnChrName: かつてギルドに在籍し、前大統領の 信頼も篤かったというＣＩＤ室長──
jpnSearchText:
かつてギルドに在籍し、前大統領の
信頼も篤かったというＣＩＤ室長──

engChrName: We'd get a lot more out of her than my old friend at the CID.
engSearchText:
We'd get a lot more out of her than my old friend at
the CID.
jpnChrName: 私のもう一人の昔馴染みより よほど腹を割って話せそうですし。
jpnSearchText:
私のもう一人の昔馴染みより
よほど腹を割って話せそうですし。

engChrName: You do have a point...
engSearchText: You do have a point...
jpnChrName: エレインさん……
jpnSearchText: エレインさん……

engChrName: Hmm...
engSearchText: Hmm...
jpnChrName: ……ふむ。
jpnSearchText: ……ふむ。

engChrName: You mean the Flying Swallow, right?
engSearchText: You mean the Flying Swallow, right?
jpnChrName: たしか《飛燕（ひえん）紅児（こうじ）》だっけ。
jpnSearchText: たしか《飛燕（ひえん）紅児（こうじ）》だっけ。

engChrName: Ah! You made it.
engSearchText: Ah! You made it.
jpnChrName: ハハ…… お疲れさん、待ってたぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ハハ……
お疲れさん、待ってたぜ。

engChrName: Has it already been a year? And did you get taller?
engSearchText: Has it already been a year? And did you get taller?
jpnChrName: ふふ、一年ぶりくらいかしら？ また背が伸びたみたいね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、一年ぶりくらいかしら？
また背が伸びたみたいね。

engChrName: Somehow, yeah. I think I'm done growing, though.
engSearchText: Somehow, yeah. I think I'm done growing, though.
jpnChrName: ん、さすがにこれ以上は 打ち止めっぽいけど。
jpnSearchText:
ん、さすがにこれ以上は
打ち止めっぽいけど。

engChrName: You're that ace bracer from the Empire, right?
engSearchText: You're that ace bracer from the Empire, right?
jpnChrName: き、君があの…… 帝国の若きエースっていう。
jpnSearchText:
き、君があの……
帝国の若きエースっていう。

engChrName: I suppose. The name's Fie Claussell.
engSearchText: I suppose. The name's Fie Claussell.
jpnChrName: ──遊撃士フィー・クラウゼル、 本日をもって共和国ギルドに着任する。
jpnSearchText:
──遊撃士フィー・クラウゼル、
本日をもって共和国ギルドに着任する。

engChrName: Starting today, I'll be working with you all here in Calvard.
engSearchText:
Starting today, I'll be working with you all here
in Calvard.
jpnChrName: よろしく、ジン、エレインたちも。
jpnSearchText: よろしく、ジン、エレインたちも。

engChrName: Afterward, they went to Station Street to pick up some odds and ends.
engSearchText:
Afterward, they went to Station Street to pick up
some odds and ends.
jpnChrName: その後、ヴァンたちは 最後に駅前通りに立ち寄り──
jpnSearchText:
その後、ヴァンたちは
最後に駅前通りに立ち寄り──

engChrName: Then, when it came time to return to the office...
engSearchText: Then, when it came time to return to the office...
jpnChrName: いくつかの細々とした備品を購入し、 事務所に戻ることになったが……
jpnSearchText:
いくつかの細々とした備品を購入し、
事務所に戻ることになったが……

engChrName: October 18th, 3:30PM
engSearchText: October 18th, 3:30PM

engChrName: It's a little early, but I think we should call it a day.
engSearchText: It's a little early, but I think we should call it a day.
jpnChrName: ──ちょいと早いが 今日の業務はこれで終わりだ。
jpnSearchText:
──ちょいと早いが
今日の業務はこれで終わりだ。

engChrName: You can head on back to the office. Agnès, feel free to go straight to the dorms, if you want.
engSearchText:
You can head on back to the office. Agnès, feel free
to go straight to the dorms, if you want.
jpnChrName: それぞれ事務所に戻るもよし、 アニエスはもう帰ってもいいぞ？
jpnSearchText:
それぞれ事務所に戻るもよし、
アニエスはもう帰ってもいいぞ？

engChrName: Really?
engSearchText: Really?

engChrName: Does this have to do with your conversation with that bracer earlier?
engSearchText:
Does this have to do with your conversation with that
bracer earlier?
jpnChrName: ひょっとして あの《不動》さんの……
jpnSearchText:
ひょっとして
あの《不動》さんの……

engChrName: Is this about your call with the big guy earlier?
engSearchText: Is this about your call with the big guy earlier?
jpnChrName: ハン……？ さっきの《不動》のか？
jpnSearchText:
ハン……？
さっきの《不動》のか？

engChrName: Nah, it's nothing that important.
engSearchText: Nah, it's nothing that important.
jpnChrName: ま、大した用じゃねえさ。
jpnSearchText: ま、大した用じゃねえさ。

engChrName: Oh, and your trial period's over, Risette. I dunno how long you were plannin' on hangin' around, but we're happy to have you.
engSearchText:
Oh, and your trial period's over, Risette. I dunno how
long you were plannin' on hangin' around, but we're
happy to have you.
jpnChrName: リゼット──試用期間も終わりだ。 いつまでか分からんが宜しく頼むぜ。
jpnSearchText:
リゼット──試用期間も終わりだ。
いつまでか分からんが宜しく頼むぜ。

engChrName: Thank you. I'll bring the supplies we purchased back to our base.
engSearchText:
Thank you. I'll bring the supplies we purchased back
to our base.
jpnChrName: はい、こちらこそ。 備品は運んでおきますので。
jpnSearchText:
はい、こちらこそ。
備品は運んでおきますので。

engChrName: 'Preciate it. Anyway, don't stay out too late now, guys.
engSearchText:
'Preciate it. Anyway, don't stay out too late
now, guys.
jpnChrName: 頼んだ──そんじゃあお前らも あんまり遅くならずに帰れよ？
jpnSearchText:
頼んだ──そんじゃあお前らも
あんまり遅くならずに帰れよ？

engChrName: Oh...
engSearchText: Oh...

engChrName: Hmph. Why is he running off all on his own?
engSearchText: Hmph. Why is he running off all on his own?
jpnChrName: むう…… 何だか面白くないです。
jpnSearchText:
むう……
何だか面白くないです。

engChrName: Do you think we should track him?
engSearchText: Do you think we should track him?
jpnChrName: そうだ──気になりますし 後を追いかけてみませんかっ？
jpnSearchText:
そうだ──気になりますし
後を追いかけてみませんかっ？

engChrName: Hmph. Something about this rubs me the wrong way.
engSearchText: Hmph. Something about this rubs me the wrong way.
jpnChrName: ハン……気に食わねえな。
jpnSearchText: ハン……気に食わねえな。

engChrName: What do you say we tail him?
engSearchText: What do you say we tail him?
jpnChrName: ハッ、こうなりゃ ヤツの後をつけてみるか。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、こうなりゃ
ヤツの後をつけてみるか。

engChrName: W-We shouldn't invade his privacy...
engSearchText: W-We shouldn't invade his privacy...
jpnChrName: ええっ……！？ で、でもそんな事をしたら……
jpnSearchText:
ええっ……！？
で、でもそんな事をしたら……

engChrName: But aren't you curious, Agnès?
engSearchText: But aren't you curious, Agnès?
jpnChrName: アニエスさんも気になりますよね？ よねっ……！？
jpnSearchText:
アニエスさんも気になりますよね？
よねっ……！？

engChrName: You're not fooling anyone. We both know you want to find out what's up.
engSearchText:
You're not fooling anyone. We both know you want
to find out what's up.
jpnChrName: カマトトぶってんじゃねえよ。 ……オメーも気になるんだろ？
jpnSearchText:
カマトトぶってんじゃねえよ。
……オメーも気になるんだろ？

engChrName: I-I mean... Yes, but...
engSearchText: I-I mean... Yes, but...
jpnChrName: そ、それは……でも……
jpnSearchText: そ、それは……でも……

engChrName: Risette, aren't you against prying into Van's business, too?
engSearchText:
Risette, aren't you against prying into Van's
business, too?
jpnChrName: あ、リゼットさんは反対ですよね？ プライベートかもしれませんし……
jpnSearchText:
あ、リゼットさんは反対ですよね？
プライベートかもしれませんし……

engChrName: On the contrary, I'm in full support.
engSearchText: On the contrary, I'm in full support.
jpnChrName: いえ──
jpnSearchText: いえ──

engChrName: I've been fiercely curious about his destination.
engSearchText: I've been fiercely curious about his destination.
jpnChrName: ……少々個人的に 気になっていた目的地のようです。
jpnSearchText:
……少々個人的に
気になっていた目的地のようです。

engChrName: Furthermore, it seemed he was going there for the sake of his acquaintance rather than for personal business.
engSearchText:
Furthermore, it seemed he was going there for the
