sake of his acquaintance rather than for
personal business.
jpnChrName: どうやら先方の都合で、ヴァン様の プライベートでは無さそうですし……
jpnSearchText:
どうやら先方の都合で、ヴァン様の
プライベートでは無さそうですし……

engChrName: But in truth, I was recommended to start spending more time as I please, so I intend to do just that.
engSearchText:
But in truth, I was recommended to start spending
more time as I please, so I intend to do just that.
jpnChrName: ──何より“自分の時間”を取るよう 勧められたので有意義に活用したいかと。
jpnSearchText:
──何より“自分の時間”を取るよう
勧められたので有意義に活用したいかと。

engChrName: Wh-What?!
engSearchText: Wh-What?!
jpnChrName: え、ええ～っ！？
jpnSearchText: え、ええ～っ！？

engChrName: All right! Then we shouldn't leave anyone out.
engSearchText: All right! Then we shouldn't leave anyone out.
jpnChrName: 決まりですね！　──そうなると 追っ手は多いに越したことは……
jpnSearchText:
決まりですね！　──そうなると
追っ手は多いに越したことは……

engChrName: Let's call Aaron!
engSearchText: Let's call Aaron!
jpnChrName: アーロンさんにも連絡しましょうっ。
jpnSearchText: アーロンさんにも連絡しましょうっ。

engChrName: Nice save, maid. We could use some help, though.
engSearchText: Nice save, maid. We could use some help, though.
jpnChrName: 決まりだな──そうなると 追っ手は多いに越したことはねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
決まりだな──そうなると
追っ手は多いに越したことはねぇ。

engChrName: Let's give the pipsqueak a call.
engSearchText: Let's give the pipsqueak a call.
jpnChrName: クク、チビにも連絡すっか。
jpnSearchText: クク、チビにも連絡すっか。

engChrName: Will you be coming along, Ms. Claudel?
engSearchText: Will you be coming along, Ms. Claudel?
jpnChrName: ……どうされます、アニエス様？
jpnSearchText: ……どうされます、アニエス様？

engChrName: I-I... *sigh* Fine, I don't want to be the only one left out!
engSearchText:
I-I... *sigh* Fine, I don't want to be the only one
left out!
jpnChrName: ううっ…… な、仲間はずれはイヤですっ！
jpnSearchText:
ううっ……
な、仲間はずれはイヤですっ！

engChrName: I really thought you were more mature than this...
engSearchText: I really thought you were more mature than this...
jpnChrName: ……リゼットさんはもうちょっと 大人な常識人だと思っていました……
jpnSearchText:
……リゼットさんはもうちょっと
大人な常識人だと思っていました……

engChrName: I apologize for my imperfect nature. I am still only 20, after all.
engSearchText:
I apologize for my imperfect nature. I am still only
20, after all.
jpnChrName: これでもまだ二十歳ですので…… 至らぬ所はご容赦ください。
jpnSearchText:
これでもまだ二十歳ですので……
至らぬ所はご容赦ください。

engChrName: October 23rd, 1208, 6:32AM
engSearchText: October 23rd, 1208, 6:32AM

engChrName: Perhaps we arrived a little early.
engSearchText: Perhaps we arrived a little early.
jpnChrName: ちょっと早く着きすぎたかしら。
jpnSearchText: ちょっと早く着きすぎたかしら。

engChrName: Odette and Albert are coming from the 10th district, so they should be here before long.
engSearchText:
Odette and Albert are coming from the 10th district,
so they should be here before long.
jpnChrName: オデットやアルベール君は十区だったわね。 そろそろ来るでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
オデットやアルベール君は十区だったわね。
そろそろ来るでしょう。

engChrName: Umm... I'm really sorry I've asked so much of you.
engSearchText: Umm... I'm really sorry I've asked so much of you.
jpnChrName: その……先輩、すみません。 勝手な都合ばかりお願いしてしまって。
jpnSearchText:
その……先輩、すみません。
勝手な都合ばかりお願いしてしまって。

engChrName: Don't worry, though. Even though I'll be away from the group, I promise I won't let it affect my work!
engSearchText:
Don't worry, though. Even though I'll be away from
the group, I promise I won't let it affect my work!
jpnChrName: 別行動は増えるかもしれませんが 研修もおろそかにしませんから！
jpnSearchText:
別行動は増えるかもしれませんが
研修もおろそかにしませんから！

engChrName: Heehee. I never had any doubt. In fact, I've already told the—
engSearchText:
Heehee. I never had any doubt. In fact, I've already
told the—
jpnChrName: ふふ、それはいいわ。 一応みんなにはもう──
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、それはいいわ。
一応みんなにはもう──

engChrName: Agnès!
engSearchText: Agnès!
jpnChrName: アニエスさーんっ！
jpnSearchText: アニエスさーんっ！

engChrName: Oh!
engSearchText: Oh!

engChrName: Well, you're early. All ready to head out?
engSearchText: Well, you're early. All ready to head out?
jpnChrName: 早いじゃねえか。 そっちもこれから出発か？
jpnSearchText:
早いじゃねえか。
そっちもこれから出発か？

engChrName: Almost. The others should be—
engSearchText: Almost. The others should be—
jpnChrName: はい、他のみんなと待ち合わせ中で──
jpnSearchText: はい、他のみんなと待ち合わせ中で──

engChrName: Oh! You finished working on the car!
engSearchText: Oh! You finished working on the car!
jpnChrName: ……！ カスタム、終わったんですね？
jpnSearchText:
……！
カスタム、終わったんですね？

engChrName: Yeah. A mechanic over in Riverside had to lend a hand, but we got 'er ready in time.
engSearchText:
Yeah. A mechanic over in Riverside had to lend a
hand, but we got 'er ready in time.
jpnChrName: ああ、リバーサイドの整備屋と協力して なんとか間に合わせてな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、リバーサイドの整備屋と協力して
なんとか間に合わせてな。

engChrName: If I squint hard enough, I can almost fool myself into thinking it's a limo.
engSearchText:
If I squint hard enough, I can almost fool myself into
thinking it's a limo.
jpnChrName: いや～、やっぱ広いのはいいぜ。 流石にあのリムジンには負けるがよ。
jpnSearchText:
いや～、やっぱ広いのはいいぜ。
流石にあのリムジンには負けるがよ。

engChrName: The maximum occupancy has been improved from five to eight passengers—and it sports its own on-board computer.
engSearchText:
The maximum occupancy has been improved from
five to eight passengers—and it sports its own
on-board computer.
jpnChrName: 定員は５名から８名に増加、 “専用端末”も搭載できました。
jpnSearchText:
定員は５名から８名に増加、
“専用端末”も搭載できました。

engChrName: We could even fit Agnès AND her friends now!
engSearchText: We could even fit Agnès AND her friends now!
jpnChrName: えへへ、いざとなったらアニエスさんと お友達まで乗れちゃいますねっ！
jpnSearchText:
えへへ、いざとなったらアニエスさんと
お友達まで乗れちゃいますねっ！

engChrName: I suppose you could.
engSearchText: I suppose you could.
jpnChrName: あ……ふふっ、確かに。
jpnSearchText: あ……ふふっ、確かに。

engChrName: You've been up to some interesting business, now haven't you?
engSearchText:
You've been up to some interesting business, now
haven't you?
jpnChrName: ふうん、色々と面白いことに なっているみたいね？
jpnSearchText:
ふうん、色々と面白いことに
なっているみたいね？

engChrName: Not half as interestin' as any trip you're in charge of.
engSearchText: Not half as interestin' as any trip you're in charge of.
jpnChrName: そっちもお前さんが率いる時点で どう考えても面白くなりそうだが……
jpnSearchText:
そっちもお前さんが率いる時点で
どう考えても面白くなりそうだが……

engChrName: On the other hand, it's real reassurin' to know you'll be around in Basel. You know, just in case.
engSearchText:
On the other hand, it's real reassurin' to know you'll
be around in Basel. You know, just in case.
jpnChrName: ま、安心っちゃ安心か。 現地で何かあったら頼むぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、安心っちゃ安心か。
現地で何かあったら頼むぜ。

engChrName: I could say the same of you.
engSearchText: I could say the same of you.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、そちらこそ宜しく。
jpnSearchText: ふふっ、そちらこそ宜しく。

engChrName: Hmm? Why do you seem to know each other so well?
engSearchText: Hmm? Why do you seem to know each other so well?
jpnChrName: ……？　えっと…… 先輩とヴァンさんって……
jpnSearchText:
……？　えっと……
先輩とヴァンさんって……

engChrName: Heehee. We have a little...history together, you see. ❤
engSearchText: Heehee. We have a little...history together, you see. ❤
jpnChrName: うふふ、実は昔、 ちょっとした縁があってね❤
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、実は昔、
ちょっとした縁があってね❤

engChrName: Oh, my...
engSearchText: Oh, my...
jpnChrName: わわっ……
jpnSearchText: わわっ……

engChrName: Ding, ding—another challenger enters the ring.
engSearchText: Ding, ding—another challenger enters the ring.
jpnChrName: ほう……お安くねぇなァ？
jpnSearchText: ほう……お安くねぇなァ？

engChrName: We're talkin' about five years ago here. Stop bein' such a damn tease.
engSearchText:
We're talkin' about five years ago here. Stop bein'
such a damn tease.
jpnChrName: ５年も前の話じゃねえか。 お前さんも悪戯が過ぎんぞ？
jpnSearchText:
５年も前の話じゃねえか。
お前さんも悪戯が過ぎんぞ？

engChrName: Oh, dear. How cold of you.
engSearchText: Oh, dear. How cold of you.
jpnChrName: あん、つれないわね。
jpnSearchText: あん、つれないわね。

engChrName: ...I'm not going to get a real answer to this, am I?
engSearchText: ...I'm not going to get a real answer to this, am I?
jpnChrName: ……えっと、詳しい話が 気になりすぎるんですが……
jpnSearchText:
……えっと、詳しい話が
気になりすぎるんですが……

engChrName: Regardless, what are you all doing here?
engSearchText: Regardless, what are you all doing here?
jpnChrName: そういえばどうして わざわざ出発前に駅に……？
jpnSearchText:
そういえばどうして
わざわざ出発前に駅に……？

engChrName: Oh, right. Hey, Risette.
engSearchText: Oh, right. Hey, Risette.
jpnChrName: ああ、そうだった。
jpnSearchText: ああ、そうだった。

engChrName: This is for you, Ms. Claudel.
engSearchText: This is for you, Ms. Claudel.
jpnChrName: アニエス様、こちらを。
jpnSearchText: アニエス様、こちらを。

engChrName: There are sandwiches for breakfast, as well as some coffee.
engSearchText:
There are sandwiches for breakfast, as well as
some coffee.
jpnChrName: モーニングのサンドイッチと コーヒーになります。
jpnSearchText:
モーニングのサンドイッチと
コーヒーになります。

engChrName: Victor and Paulette asked us to give it to you!
engSearchText: Victor and Paulette asked us to give it to you!
jpnChrName: ビクトルさんとポーレットさんから アニエスさんたちに預かりましてっ。
jpnSearchText:
ビクトルさんとポーレットさんから
アニエスさんたちに預かりましてっ。

engChrName: They made more than enough for your friends to have some, too!
engSearchText:
They made more than enough for your friends to
have some, too!
jpnChrName: たくさん作ったので お友達とどうぞ、だそうです！
jpnSearchText:
たくさん作ったので
お友達とどうぞ、だそうです！

engChrName: How thoughtful of them.
engSearchText: How thoughtful of them.

engChrName: I concur, and it smells wonderful, too.
engSearchText: I concur, and it smells wonderful, too.
jpnChrName: ありがたく頂くわ。 うん、美味しそうな匂いね。
jpnSearchText:
ありがたく頂くわ。
うん、美味しそうな匂いね。

engChrName: Knowing the chef, it's sure to be great.
engSearchText: Knowing the chef, it's sure to be great.
jpnChrName: ……はい、私が保証します。
jpnSearchText: ……はい、私が保証します。

engChrName: What's going on here?!
engSearchText: What's going on here?!
jpnChrName: ああっ、何をやってるんだ！？
jpnSearchText: ああっ、何をやってるんだ！？

engChrName: *whistle* Had to get in a heartfelt goodbye before you left? Don't make too much of a show of it, you two! ❤
engSearchText:
*whistle* Had to get in a heartfelt goodbye before
you left? Don't make too much of a show of it,
you two! ❤
jpnChrName: ひゅ～、見送りっていうか逢引き？ 出発前にいけないんだ～❤
jpnSearchText:
ひゅ～、見送りっていうか逢引き？
出発前にいけないんだ～❤

engChrName: No way, she really does have a boyfriend at her job!
engSearchText: No way, she really does have a boyfriend at her job!
jpnChrName: バイト先の恋人！？ う、ウソだろおおっ……！？
jpnSearchText:
バイト先の恋人！？
う、ウソだろおおっ……！？

engChrName: No she does not!
engSearchText: No she does not!
jpnChrName: あるわけないだろうっ！？
jpnSearchText: あるわけないだろうっ！？

engChrName: Please, everyone, this is a misunderstanding.
engSearchText: Please, everyone, this is a misunderstanding.
jpnChrName: も、もう…… そんなのじゃないですからっ！
jpnSearchText:
も、もう……
そんなのじゃないですからっ！

engChrName: Uhh, we'll go ahead and get out of your hair now.
engSearchText: Uhh, we'll go ahead and get out of your hair now.
jpnChrName: やれやれ…… ま、こっちはそろそろ行くぜ。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ……
ま、こっちはそろそろ行くぜ。

engChrName: We'll see you again in Basel, Agnès. Race ya there.
engSearchText: We'll see you again in Basel, Agnès. Race ya there.
jpnChrName: ──そんじゃ、バーゼルでな。 どっちが先に着くかは分からんが。
jpnSearchText:
──そんじゃ、バーゼルでな。
どっちが先に着くかは分からんが。

engChrName: R-Right! Travel safely, everyone.
engSearchText: R-Right! Travel safely, everyone.
jpnChrName: はい……！ ヴァンさんたちもお気をつけて。
jpnSearchText:
はい……！
ヴァンさんたちもお気をつけて。

engChrName: Ah. Figured you'd come by eventually.
engSearchText: Ah. Figured you'd come by eventually.
jpnChrName: ──来たか。
jpnSearchText: ──来たか。

engChrName: Hey.
engSearchText: Hey.
jpnChrName: お疲れ。
jpnSearchText: お疲れ。

engChrName: I can't say I'm surprised. You all feel compelled to act, too, I take it?
engSearchText:
I can't say I'm surprised. You all feel compelled to act,
too, I take it?
jpnChrName: 当然だろうけど 貴方たちも動いてたのね。
jpnSearchText:
当然だろうけど
貴方たちも動いてたのね。

engChrName: Yeah. Looks like you guys are real busy here.
engSearchText: Yeah. Looks like you guys are real busy here.
jpnChrName: ああ、だがかなりの修羅場みたいだな。
jpnSearchText: ああ、だがかなりの修羅場みたいだな。

engChrName: Supremely. The two of us were out of town when it happened and had to rush right back.
engSearchText:
Supremely. The two of us were out of town when it
happened and had to rush right back.
jpnChrName: ああ……実は外から 帰ってきたばかりでな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ……実は外から
帰ってきたばかりでな。

engChrName: We have to go back out again soon, though.
engSearchText: We have to go back out again soon, though.
jpnChrName: またすぐに出かける。
jpnSearchText: またすぐに出かける。

engChrName: I wasn't expecting to find you here, too, Renne. You must have left extra early.
engSearchText:
I wasn't expecting to find you here, too, Renne.
You must have left extra early.
jpnChrName: 先輩もこちらだったなんて…… 今朝、早くに出かけていましたね？
jpnSearchText:
先輩もこちらだったなんて……
今朝、早くに出かけていましたね？

engChrName: It seemed wise to come and exchange information on what Liberl and the society are up to.
engSearchText:
It seemed wise to come and exchange information on
what Liberl and the society are up to.
jpnChrName: リベールや結社方面の動きも含めて 情報交換をしに来たってわけ。
jpnSearchText:
リベールや結社方面の動きも含めて
情報交換をしに来たってわけ。

engChrName: I take it you all are here for the same reason?
engSearchText: I take it you all are here for the same reason?
jpnChrName: 貴方たちもそのために来たのでしょう？
jpnSearchText: 貴方たちもそのために来たのでしょう？

engChrName: Yeah. Sorry for eatin' into your time, but can we talk for a bit?
engSearchText:
Yeah. Sorry for eatin' into your time, but can we talk
for a bit?
jpnChrName: まあな……忙しい中悪いが、 少し話に付き合ってくれ。
jpnSearchText:
まあな……忙しい中悪いが、
少し話に付き合ってくれ。

engChrName: So the whole region around Creil really did get locked down by the army, huh?
engSearchText:
So the whole region around Creil really did get locked
down by the army, huh?
jpnChrName: 聞いてはいたがクレイユ一帯は 軍が完全に封鎖中、ってわけか。
jpnSearchText:
聞いてはいたがクレイユ一帯は
軍が完全に封鎖中、ってわけか。

engChrName: Can't say I blame them.
engSearchText: Can't say I blame them.
jpnChrName: ま、当然だろうけどな。
jpnSearchText: ま、当然だろうけどな。

engChrName: It's to the point where not even press or the bracers can get close.
engSearchText:
It's to the point where not even press or the bracers
can get close.
jpnChrName: 封鎖はいいけど、マスコミはおろか、 遊撃士すら立入禁止という徹底ぶり。
jpnSearchText:
封鎖はいいけど、マスコミはおろか、
遊撃士すら立入禁止という徹底ぶり。

engChrName: Everyone gets the same stock response from the authorities.
engSearchText:
Everyone gets the same stock response from
the authorities.
jpnChrName: 当局からギルドに 正式通達されたことは一つだけだ。
jpnSearchText:
当局からギルドに
正式通達されたことは一つだけだ。

engChrName: 'There are no confirmed survivors among the villagers or visitors.'
engSearchText:
'There are no confirmed survivors among the villagers
or visitors.'
jpnChrName: 『住民や訪問者の安否は確認できず、   現地での生存者はゼロ』──ってな。
jpnSearchText:
『住民や訪問者の安否は確認できず、
現地での生存者はゼロ』──ってな。

engChrName: Hmm...
engSearchText: Hmm...

engChrName: That's awful...
engSearchText: That's awful...
jpnChrName: ……そんな……
jpnSearchText: ……そんな……

engChrName: So if there's nobody left, why are they keepin' the area under lock and key?
engSearchText:
So if there's nobody left, why are they keepin' the area
under lock and key?
jpnChrName: その上で厳重に封鎖されてるってことは 何か懸念があるのか？
jpnSearchText:
その上で厳重に封鎖されてるってことは
何か懸念があるのか？

engChrName: As it so happens, the three disciples are rushing to the scene.
engSearchText:
As it so happens, the three disciples are rushing to
the scene.
jpnChrName: ええ、実は“三高弟”全員が 現地入りする事態みたいでね。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、実は“三高弟”全員が
現地入りする事態みたいでね。

engChrName: All three?! Not just Professor Hamilton?!
engSearchText: All three?! Not just Professor Hamilton?!
jpnChrName: 博士だけじゃなく、他のお二人も！？
jpnSearchText: 博士だけじゃなく、他のお二人も！？

engChrName: Professors A. Russell, G. Schmidt, and L. Hamilton...
engSearchText:
Professors A. Russell, G. Schmidt, and L.
Hamilton...
jpnChrName: Ａ・ラッセル博士、Ｇ・シュミット博士に Ｌ・ハミルトン博士──
jpnSearchText:
Ａ・ラッセル博士、Ｇ・シュミット博士に
Ｌ・ハミルトン博士──

engChrName: ...the continent's three greatest minds all in one place.
engSearchText: ...the continent's three greatest minds all in one place.
jpnChrName: 大陸最高峰の頭脳が集結ですか。
jpnSearchText: 大陸最高峰の頭脳が集結ですか。

engChrName: I can't imagine they wanted to reunite under circumstances like these.
engSearchText:
I can't imagine they wanted to reunite under
circumstances like these.
jpnChrName: 何年ぶりになるかは分からないけど、 嬉しくない同窓会になったでしょうね。
jpnSearchText:
何年ぶりになるかは分からないけど、
嬉しくない同窓会になったでしょうね。

engChrName: This can't be any ordinary post-disaster investigation, then...
engSearchText:
This can't be any ordinary post-disaster
investigation, then...
jpnChrName: ……勿論、ただの 事後調査ってわけじゃないわよね？
jpnSearchText:
……勿論、ただの
事後調査ってわけじゃないわよね？

engChrName: Indeed, and I'm sure Quatre knows why as well.
engSearchText: Indeed, and I'm sure Quatre knows why as well.
jpnChrName: ええ、カトル君なら 分かると思うけど……
jpnSearchText:
ええ、カトル君なら
分かると思うけど……

engChrName: The initial devastation caused by nuclear weapons is not the only reason why they are forbidden.
engSearchText:
The initial devastation caused by nuclear weapons is
not the only reason why they are forbidden.
jpnChrName: 『反応兵器』が戒められていた理由の “もう一つ”に関係しているわ。
jpnSearchText:
『反応兵器』が戒められていた理由の
“もう一つ”に関係しているわ。

engChrName: Following detonation, radioactive particles will blanket the blast zone.
engSearchText:
Following detonation, radioactive particles will
blanket the blast zone.
jpnChrName: 爆発時に発生するという《放射線》── それによる生物と環境への深刻な“汚染”。
jpnSearchText:
爆発時に発生するという《放射線》──
それによる生物と環境への深刻な“汚染”。

engChrName: While still theoretical, it's thought this radiation will cause horrible chronic damage to both organisms and the environment.
engSearchText:
While still theoretical, it's thought this radiation will
cause horrible chronic damage to both organisms and
the environment.
jpnChrName: ……あくまで理論上の可能性だけど、 決して軽視できるリスクじゃないはずだ。
jpnSearchText:
……あくまで理論上の可能性だけど、
決して軽視できるリスクじゃないはずだ。

engChrName: When one of these weapons explodes, radioactive particles spread from the point of detonation.
engSearchText:
When one of these weapons explodes, radioactive
particles spread from the point of detonation.
jpnChrName: 爆発時に大量発生するという《放射線》── それによる生物と環境への深刻な“汚染”。
jpnSearchText:
爆発時に大量発生するという《放射線》──
それによる生物と環境への深刻な“汚染”。

engChrName: While still theoretical, it's thought this radiation will cause horrible chronic damage to both organisms and the environment.
engSearchText:
While still theoretical, it's thought this radiation will
cause horrible chronic damage to both organisms and
the environment.
jpnChrName: ……あくまで理論上の可能性だけれど、 決して軽視できるリスクじゃないでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
……あくまで理論上の可能性だけれど、
決して軽視できるリスクじゃないでしょう。

engChrName: So, even just being in the area could be dangerous, right?
engSearchText:
So, even just being in the area could be
dangerous, right?
jpnChrName: ……よく分かりませんが、 近づくこと自体が危険というわけですか。
jpnSearchText:
……よく分かりませんが、
近づくこと自体が危険というわけですか。

engChrName: Given all that, I can KIND of understand why the army would be mobilized to seal off the area.
engSearchText:
Given all that, I can KIND of understand why the
army would be mobilized to seal off the area.
jpnChrName: その意味では軍の出動と完全封鎖も 仕方がないと思わなくもないけど……
jpnSearchText:
その意味では軍の出動と完全封鎖も
仕方がないと思わなくもないけど……

engChrName: Yeah, but we're talking about a village being blown away here. By our principles and for the sake of public safety, the guild can't ignore this.
engSearchText:
Yeah, but we're talking about a village being blown
away here. By our principles and for the sake of
public safety, the guild can't ignore this.
jpnChrName: 村一つが全滅したんだ──ギルドの理念からも 治安維持面からも、到底見過ごすことは出来ん。
jpnSearchText:
村一つが全滅したんだ──ギルドの理念からも
治安維持面からも、到底見過ごすことは出来ん。

engChrName: That's why high-ranking bracers from all over the continent are starting to gather in Calvard.
engSearchText:
That's why high-ranking bracers from all over the
continent are starting to gather in Calvard.
jpnChrName: 現在、大陸全土に散らばる高位遊撃士たちが 続々と共和国入りを始めていてな。
jpnSearchText:
現在、大陸全土に散らばる高位遊撃士たちが
続々と共和国入りを始めていてな。

engChrName: On top of many A and B-ranks, word has it the head branch in Leman is considering sending an S-rank as well.
engSearchText:
On top of many A and B-ranks, word has it the head
branch in Leman is considering sending an S-rank
as well.
jpnChrName: Ｂ級以上が数十名、レマン総本部からは “Ｓ級”の派遣すら検討されてるらしいわ。
jpnSearchText:
Ｂ級以上が数十名、レマン総本部からは
“Ｓ級”の派遣すら検討されてるらしいわ。

engChrName: Pullin' out the big guns and putting them in charge, huh?
engSearchText:
Pullin' out the big guns and putting them in
charge, huh?
jpnChrName: 非公式の“Ｓ級”までかよ…… そいつに連中の対処を任せるってことか？
jpnSearchText:
非公式の“Ｓ級”までかよ……
そいつに連中の対処を任せるってことか？

engChrName: Actually, no.
engSearchText: Actually, no.
jpnChrName: いや、アルマータについては、 俺たちが直接動くつもりだ。
jpnSearchText:
いや、アルマータについては、
俺たちが直接動くつもりだ。

engChrName: Those of us already here will go after Almata while the newcomers cover the capital and other areas in need.
engSearchText:
Those of us already here will go after Almata while
the newcomers cover the capital and other areas
in need.
jpnChrName: 助っ人たちにはその間の首都や それ以外の守りを頼みたいと思っている。
jpnSearchText:
助っ人たちにはその間の首都や
それ以外の守りを頼みたいと思っている。

engChrName: I may even call in some personal backup.
engSearchText: I may even call in some personal backup.
jpnChrName: わたしも直接動くけど、 “別のツテ”も当たってみるつもり。
jpnSearchText:
わたしも直接動くけど、
“別のツテ”も当たってみるつもり。

engChrName: Well, I say that, but knowing them, they may already be on their way.
engSearchText:
Well, I say that, but knowing them, they may already
be on their way.
jpnChrName: ──というより、 もうとっくに動き始めてるかな？
jpnSearchText:
──というより、
もうとっくに動き始めてるかな？

engChrName: Oh?
engSearchText: Oh?
jpnChrName: 別のツテ、か。
jpnSearchText: 別のツテ、か。

engChrName: Hmm. (Must be the...whatever they're called from the Empire.)
engSearchText:
Hmm.
(Must be the...whatever they're called from
the Empire.)
jpnChrName: ハン……？ （帝国の何たらっつー……）
jpnSearchText:
ハン……？
（帝国の何たらっつー……）

engChrName: By the way, I noticed Elaine isn't here. Is she out on another job?
engSearchText:
By the way, I noticed Elaine isn't here. Is she out on
another job?
jpnChrName: ……そういえばエレインさんが 見当たりませんが、依頼の対応に？
jpnSearchText:
……そういえばエレインさんが
見当たりませんが、依頼の対応に？

engChrName: Yeah. The idea's to handle as much work as we can before we dedicate ourselves to rooting out Almata.
engSearchText:
Yeah. The idea's to handle as much work as we can
before we dedicate ourselves to rooting out Almata.
jpnChrName: ああ、本格的に動き出す前に 出来るだけ“他の案件”を片付けたくてな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、本格的に動き出す前に
出来るだけ“他の案件”を片付けたくてな。

engChrName: So she's handling some stuff elsewhere in the capital right now.
engSearchText:
So she's handling some stuff elsewhere in the capital
right now.
jpnChrName: それで俺たち同様、首都を飛び回っている。
jpnSearchText: それで俺たち同様、首都を飛び回っている。

engChrName: I'm a little worried about her, to be honest.
engSearchText: I'm a little worried about her, to be honest.
jpnChrName: うん…… でも、ちょっと心配だね。
jpnSearchText:
うん……
でも、ちょっと心配だね。

engChrName: ...Whaddaya mean?
engSearchText: ...Whaddaya mean?

engChrName: Everyone was shocked by what happened to Creil, but Elaine seemed especially shaken.
engSearchText:
Everyone was shocked by what happened to Creil,
but Elaine seemed especially shaken.
jpnChrName: クレイユはわたしもショックだったけど それ以上に思い入れがあったみたいで……
jpnSearchText:
クレイユはわたしもショックだったけど
それ以上に思い入れがあったみたいで……

engChrName: She rushed out right after to start working and gathering information like a woman possessed.
engSearchText:
She rushed out right after to start working and
gathering information like a woman possessed.
jpnChrName: 何だか思い詰めたように情報収集して 鬼気迫る感じで仕事をこなしてる。
jpnSearchText:
何だか思い詰めたように情報収集して
鬼気迫る感じで仕事をこなしてる。

engChrName: That's disconcerting...
engSearchText: That's disconcerting...
jpnChrName: それは……確かに心配ですね……
jpnSearchText: それは……確かに心配ですね……

engChrName: We've all been there on jobs plenty of times, so she's probably just rattled.
engSearchText:
We've all been there on jobs plenty of times, so she's
probably just rattled.
jpnChrName: 無理もねぇ、俺も含めて 巡回ルートで何度も訪れてる場所だ。
jpnSearchText:
無理もねぇ、俺も含めて
巡回ルートで何度も訪れてる場所だ。

engChrName: But if you see her around, check in on her, all right?
engSearchText: But if you see her around, check in on her, all right?
jpnChrName: ま、見かけたら 念のため声をかけてやってくれ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、見かけたら
念のため声をかけてやってくれ。

engChrName: Will do.
engSearchText: Will do.
jpnChrName: ……ああ。
jpnSearchText: ……ああ。

engChrName: If I may, I'd like to address a certain elephant in the room...
engSearchText:
If I may, I'd like to address a certain elephant in
the room...
jpnChrName: ところでさっきから 気になっていたのだけど……
jpnSearchText:
ところでさっきから
気になっていたのだけど……

engChrName: ...or should I say the actress? You've snagged quite the famous employee.
engSearchText:
...or should I say the actress? You've snagged quite
the famous employee.
jpnChrName: また増えたみたいね？ しかも今回は“大物”みたい。
jpnSearchText:
また増えたみたいね？
しかも今回は“大物”みたい。

engChrName: I'm surprised you can afford her day rate. Are you filming an advertisement for the office or something?
engSearchText:
I'm surprised you can afford her day rate. Are you
filming an advertisement for the office or something?
jpnChrName: 新しい助手にしては時給高そう。 事務所の広告でも作るの？
jpnSearchText:
新しい助手にしては時給高そう。
事務所の広告でも作るの？

engChrName: Wh-Who, me...? Oh, hello, everyone. (How did they see through me?!)
engSearchText:
Wh-Who, me...? Oh, hello, everyone.
(How did they see through me?!)
jpnChrName: ど、どうも～…… （って早速バレてる？）
jpnSearchText:
ど、どうも～……
（って早速バレてる？）

engChrName: Don't mind me. I'm more of a secretary than an assistant, anyway.
engSearchText:
Don't mind me. I'm more of a secretary than an
assistant, anyway.
jpnChrName: あたしは助手というより秘書？ みたいなものだから、気にしないで頂戴。
jpnSearchText:
あたしは助手というより秘書？
みたいなものだから、気にしないで頂戴。

engChrName: I believe Risette has both those positions covered...
engSearchText: I believe Risette has both those positions covered...
jpnChrName: えっと、秘書はどちらかというと リゼットさんのような……
jpnSearchText:
えっと、秘書はどちらかというと
リゼットさんのような……

engChrName: I ain't payin' you shit, just so we're clear.
engSearchText: I ain't payin' you shit, just so we're clear.
jpnChrName: 言っとくが給料は出さねぇぞ？
jpnSearchText: 言っとくが給料は出さねぇぞ？

engChrName: At least TRY to cover for me!
engSearchText: At least TRY to cover for me!
jpnChrName: ええい、話を合わせなさいよっ！
jpnSearchText: ええい、話を合わせなさいよっ！

engChrName: Well, I haven't received any stolen item reports, so I see no need to meddle.
engSearchText:
Well, I haven't received any stolen item reports, so I
see no need to meddle.
jpnChrName: ま、こっちとしては民間人からの 被害届もないから別に構わんがね。
jpnSearchText:
ま、こっちとしては民間人からの
被害届もないから別に構わんがね。

engChrName: At least you don't have the same gaudy sensibilities as a certain other phantom thief I could name.
engSearchText:
At least you don't have the same gaudy sensibilities as
a certain other phantom thief I could name.
jpnChrName: うふふ、《怪盗Ｂ》みたいな 悪趣味なことはしてないみたいだし。
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、《怪盗Ｂ》みたいな
悪趣味なことはしてないみたいだし。

engChrName: I agree with you both.
engSearchText: I agree with you both.
jpnChrName: ん、忙しいから放置かな。
jpnSearchText: ん、忙しいから放置かな。

engChrName: Ahaha...
engSearchText: Ahaha...
jpnChrName: あはは………
jpnSearchText: あはは………

engChrName: (She really is bad at hiding it, isn't she?)
engSearchText: (She really is bad at hiding it, isn't she?)
jpnChrName: （分かってたけど完全に……）
jpnSearchText: （分かってたけど完全に……）

engChrName: (How is she so bad at this?)
engSearchText: (How is she so bad at this?)
jpnChrName: （分かっちゃいたが完全に……）
jpnSearchText: （分かっちゃいたが完全に……）

engChrName: (She is rather bad at hiding it, isn't she?)
engSearchText: (She is rather bad at hiding it, isn't she?)
jpnChrName: （分かっていましたが完全に……）
jpnSearchText: （分かっていましたが完全に……）

engChrName: (I'm amazed the whole world doesn't know at this point.)
engSearchText:
(I'm amazed the whole world doesn't know at
this point.)
jpnChrName: （バレバレですね。）
jpnSearchText: （バレバレですね。）

engChrName: (It's a wonder the whole world hasn't realized it by now.)
engSearchText:
(It's a wonder the whole world hasn't realized it
by now.)
jpnChrName: （バレてらっしゃいますね。）
jpnSearchText: （バレてらっしゃいますね。）

engChrName: (How she hasn't been called out yet is a mystery.)
engSearchText: (How she hasn't been called out yet is a mystery.)
jpnChrName: （バレてやがんな。）
jpnSearchText: （バレてやがんな。）

engChrName: The eye of the storm won't last for much longer.
engSearchText: The eye of the storm won't last for much longer.
jpnChrName: ──まあ、じきに事態も動くだろう。
jpnSearchText: ──まあ、じきに事態も動くだろう。

engChrName: We'll do what we can to make use of that video and the info you've given us on the Gardens' and Almata's execs.
engSearchText:
We'll do what we can to make use of that video and
the info you've given us on the Gardens' and
Almata's execs.
jpnChrName: 提供してくれた映像や、アルマータと庭園の 幹部情報なんかも有効活用させてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
提供してくれた映像や、アルマータと庭園の
幹部情報なんかも有効活用させてもらうぜ。

engChrName: Don't mention it.
engSearchText: Don't mention it.
jpnChrName: ああ──アンタらになら文句はねぇ。
jpnSearchText: ああ──アンタらになら文句はねぇ。

engChrName: Anyway, we'll leave you to your work now.
engSearchText: Anyway, we'll leave you to your work now.
jpnChrName: そんじゃ、そろそろ行くぜ。
jpnSearchText: そんじゃ、そろそろ行くぜ。

engChrName: Van, please wait.
engSearchText: Van, please wait.
jpnChrName: 待って──ヴァンさん。
jpnSearchText: 待って──ヴァンさん。

engChrName: Was that journalist a friend of yours?
engSearchText: Was that journalist a friend of yours?
jpnChrName: ……貴方のお友達だったかしら？ あのジャーナリストのお兄さん。
jpnSearchText:
……貴方のお友達だったかしら？
あのジャーナリストのお兄さん。

engChrName: Yeah. Knew him for about five years.
engSearchText: Yeah. Knew him for about five years.
jpnChrName: ……ああ、 ５年くらいの付き合いだった。
jpnSearchText:
……ああ、
５年くらいの付き合いだった。

engChrName: I remember helpin' you two strike a deal half a year ago, come to think of it.
engSearchText:
I remember helpin' you two strike a deal half a year
ago, come to think of it.
jpnChrName: そういや半年前、あいつとお前さんの “取引”を俺も手伝ってたんだったか。
jpnSearchText:
そういや半年前、あいつとお前さんの
“取引”を俺も手伝ってたんだったか。

engChrName: That you did. I worked with him many times, and truly owe him a lot.
engSearchText:
That you did. I worked with him many times, and
truly owe him a lot.
jpnChrName: ええ……何度か情報交換したり、 お世話になったことがあったけど。
jpnSearchText:
ええ……何度か情報交換したり、
お世話になったことがあったけど。

engChrName: The world lost a wonderful person.
engSearchText: The world lost a wonderful person.
jpnChrName: 惜しい人を亡くしたわね。
jpnSearchText: 惜しい人を亡くしたわね。

engChrName: Renne...
engSearchText: Renne...
jpnChrName: 先輩、ヴァンさん……
jpnSearchText: 先輩、ヴァンさん……

engChrName: For now, all I can say is this.
engSearchText: For now, all I can say is this.
jpnChrName: ……今言えるのは一つだけだ。
jpnSearchText: ……今言えるのは一つだけだ。

engChrName: We won't let the gifts he left us go to waste. No matter what.
engSearchText:
We won't let the gifts he left us go to waste.
No matter what.
jpnChrName: あいつが遺したものを無駄に するつもりはねぇ──絶対にな。
jpnSearchText:
あいつが遺したものを無駄に
するつもりはねぇ──絶対にな。

engChrName: I'll work toward the same goal, then.
engSearchText: I'll work toward the same goal, then.
jpnChrName: そう……なら私も出来るだけの ことはさせてもらうわ。
jpnSearchText:
そう……なら私も出来るだけの
ことはさせてもらうわ。

engChrName: Wh-What just happened...? And why's everyone frozen?!
engSearchText:
Wh-What just happened...? And why's
everyone frozen?!
jpnChrName: ま、街に空が…… どうしてみんな停まって……！？
jpnSearchText:
ま、街に空が……
どうしてみんな停まって……！？

engChrName: Wh-Wh-Whaa... What's going on?!
engSearchText: Wh-Wh-Whaa... What's going on?!
jpnChrName: なにこれ……なによこれえええ！？
jpnSearchText: なにこれ……なによこれえええ！？

engChrName: Everyone, stay calm! Huh?!
engSearchText: Everyone, stay calm! Huh?!
jpnChrName: み、みなさん落ち着いて──……ッ！？
jpnSearchText: み、みなさん落ち着いて──……ッ！？

engChrName: Eww, what's with that creepy ball?
engSearchText: Eww, what's with that creepy ball?
jpnChrName: な、なにあのキモいのー！？
jpnSearchText: な、なにあのキモいのー！？

engChrName: I-I dunno, but I've gotta snap a pic of this!
engSearchText: I-I dunno, but I've gotta snap a pic of this!
jpnChrName: わ、わっかんないけど 映える？し写メらないと──
jpnSearchText:
わ、わっかんないけど
映える？し写メらないと──

engChrName: Holy guacamole! Real beasties!
engSearchText: Holy guacamole! Real beasties!
jpnChrName: コ、コイツはハードだぜ……！
jpnSearchText: コ、コイツはハードだぜ……！

engChrName: M-Mommy!
engSearchText: M-Mommy!
jpnChrName: お、おかあさぁあん……！
jpnSearchText: お、おかあさぁあん……！

engChrName: Let's hurry, Myna!
engSearchText: Let's hurry, Myna!
jpnChrName: マイナ、こっちに──！
jpnSearchText: マイナ、こっちに──！

engChrName: Bah...
engSearchText: Bah...

engChrName: It looks like time has stopped in this area, too.
engSearchText: It looks like time has stopped in this area, too.
jpnChrName: ふむ、どうやらここも “停まって”いるようだね。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、どうやらここも
“停まって”いるようだね。

engChrName: The effect extends this far, huh?
engSearchText: The effect extends this far, huh?
jpnChrName: ここも……みたいですね。
jpnSearchText: ここも……みたいですね。

engChrName: Yeah. There are a lot more people frozen here than in Old Town, too.
engSearchText:
Yeah. There are a lot more people frozen here than in
Old Town, too.
jpnChrName: ん、旧市街より 遙かに“停まって”いるかな。
jpnSearchText:
ん、旧市街より
遙かに“停まって”いるかな。

engChrName: About as many as you'd expect for there being a festival going on, huh?
engSearchText:
About as many as you'd expect for there being a
festival going on, huh?
jpnChrName: 流石に祭りだけあって “停まってる”連中も多いな。
jpnSearchText:
流石に祭りだけあって
“停まってる”連中も多いな。

engChrName: Indeed. Though, it's not too surprising.
engSearchText: Indeed. Though, it's not too surprising.
jpnChrName: ああ、予想された事態だろう。
jpnSearchText: ああ、予想された事態だろう。

engChrName: This area has been frozen, too...
engSearchText: This area has been frozen, too...
jpnChrName: ……ここもやっぱり……
jpnSearchText: ……ここもやっぱり……

engChrName: About as many as you'd expect for there being a festival going on, huh?
engSearchText:
About as many as you'd expect for there being a
festival going on, huh?
jpnChrName: さすが記念祭中だけあって “停まってる”連中も多いな。
jpnSearchText:
さすが記念祭中だけあって
“停まってる”連中も多いな。

engChrName: We should probably assume the whole city's the same at this point.
engSearchText:
We should probably assume the whole city's the same
at this point.
jpnChrName: もう首都全体が 同じと思った方がいいね。
jpnSearchText:
もう首都全体が
同じと思った方がいいね。

engChrName: It's safe to assume the entire city is in a similar state.
engSearchText: It's safe to assume the entire city is in a similar state.
jpnChrName: もはや首都全域が 同じだと考えるべきだろう。
jpnSearchText:
もはや首都全域が
同じだと考えるべきだろう。

engChrName: Here they come! And something's tellin' me they won't be as much of a pushover as the others.
engSearchText:
Here they come! And something's tellin' me they
won't be as much of a pushover as the others.
jpnChrName: 出やがったか！ ──だがコイツは……
jpnSearchText:
出やがったか！
──だがコイツは……

engChrName: Heh. Looks like—these seem like they'll put up much more of a fight.
engSearchText:
Heh. Looks like—these seem like they'll put up much
more of a fight.
jpnChrName: フフ、どうやら先ほどの 連中とは一味違うようだ……！
jpnSearchText:
フフ、どうやら先ほどの
連中とは一味違うようだ……！

engChrName: Evil spirits sighted!
engSearchText: Evil spirits sighted!
jpnChrName: 悪しきジンを確認……！
jpnSearchText: 悪しきジンを確認……！

engChrName: These look like they've been enhanced by a demon sphere, too!
engSearchText:
These look like they've been enhanced by a demon
sphere, too!
jpnChrName: しかもやっぱり“魔球”で 強化されているみたい……！
jpnSearchText:
しかもやっぱり“魔球”で
強化されているみたい……！

engChrName: Here they come!
engSearchText: Here they come!
jpnChrName: ハッ、出やがったか！
jpnSearchText: ハッ、出やがったか！

engChrName: These look to have been enhanced by a demon sphere, too.
engSearchText:
These look to have been enhanced by a demon
sphere, too.
jpnChrName: しかもやはり“魔球”で 強化されているようだ。
jpnSearchText:
しかもやはり“魔球”で
強化されているようだ。

engChrName: Hah! Get outta here, losers!
engSearchText: Hah! Get outta here, losers!
jpnChrName: ハッ……！ ウゼエんだっつーの！
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……！
ウゼエんだっつーの！

engChrName: O Arusha, grant us your protection!
engSearchText: O Arusha, grant us your protection!
jpnChrName: 翼の女神（アルーシャ）よ、我らに加護を！
jpnSearchText: 翼の女神（アルーシャ）よ、我らに加護を！

engChrName: This'll be a breeze!
engSearchText: This'll be a breeze!
jpnChrName: 速攻で片付ける……！
jpnSearchText: 速攻で片付ける……！

engChrName: One minute will be more than sufficient for foes like you!
engSearchText:
One minute will be more than sufficient for foes
like you!
jpnChrName: １分で終わらせるぞ！
jpnSearchText: １分で終わらせるぞ！

engChrName: That takes care of 'em. What was up with those auras they had, though?
engSearchText:
That takes care of 'em. What was up with those auras
they had, though?
jpnChrName: 片付けたか…… だが、今のオーラは。
jpnSearchText:
片付けたか……
だが、今のオーラは。

engChrName: I'm wondering the same thing. They were in a different league compared to the last batch.
engSearchText:
I'm wondering the same thing. They were in a
different league compared to the last batch.
jpnChrName: うん、先ほど戦った時とは 明らかに違っていたようだね。
jpnSearchText:
うん、先ほど戦った時とは
明らかに違っていたようだね。

engChrName: Whew... These things are still a real headache.
engSearchText: Whew... These things are still a real headache.
jpnChrName: ふう…… 相変わらず手こずったが。
jpnSearchText:
ふう……
相変わらず手こずったが。

engChrName: At least they were kinda small.
engSearchText: At least they were kinda small.
jpnChrName: 比較的小型でしたし 何とかなりましたねっ。
jpnSearchText:
比較的小型でしたし
何とかなりましたねっ。

engChrName: At least they're small time. Not like they're gonna give us much trouble.
engSearchText:
At least they're small time. Not like they're gonna
give us much trouble.
jpnChrName: 所詮はザコだし、 やりようは幾らでもあんだろ。
jpnSearchText:
所詮はザコだし、
やりようは幾らでもあんだろ。

engChrName: The demon spheres're gonna have to buff 'em up a hell of a lot more than that if they want 'em to stand a chance against this crew.
engSearchText:
The demon spheres're gonna have to buff 'em up a
hell of a lot more than that if they want 'em to stand a
chance against this crew.
jpnChrName: 魔球で強化されてたとはいえ、 この面子なら危なげはねぇな。
jpnSearchText:
魔球で強化されてたとはいえ、
この面子なら危なげはねぇな。

engChrName: Yeah!
engSearchText: Yeah!
jpnChrName: えへへ、そうですねっ。
jpnSearchText: えへへ、そうですねっ。

engChrName: Heh. Damn right.
engSearchText: Heh. Damn right.
jpnChrName: ハン、当然だろ。
jpnSearchText: ハン、当然だろ。

engChrName: Tch!
engSearchText: Tch!
jpnChrName: チイッ……！
jpnSearchText: チイッ……！

engChrName: They've got us surrounded!
engSearchText: They've got us surrounded!
jpnChrName: 囲まれたか……！
jpnSearchText: 囲まれたか……！

engChrName: They've got us surrounded!
engSearchText: They've got us surrounded!
jpnChrName: 囲まれた……！
jpnSearchText: 囲まれた……！

engChrName: They've got us surrounded!
engSearchText: They've got us surrounded!
jpnChrName: 囲まれたか……！
jpnSearchText: 囲まれたか……！

engChrName: Haaah!
engSearchText: Haaah!
jpnChrName: おおおおおっ……！
jpnSearchText: おおおおおっ……！

engChrName: Nice timin'!
engSearchText: Nice timin'!
jpnChrName: アンタらか……！
jpnSearchText: アンタらか……！

engChrName: Thanks for the save!
engSearchText: Thanks for the save!
jpnChrName: アルヴィスにみんなも……！
jpnSearchText: アルヴィスにみんなも……！

engChrName: Figures you're around these parts.
engSearchText: Figures you're around these parts.
jpnChrName: ハッ、そういや ど真ん前だったな……！
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、そういや
ど真ん前だったな……！

engChrName: They are not the only ones here, either.
engSearchText: They are not the only ones here, either.
jpnChrName: ああ、彼らだけではないよ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、彼らだけではないよ。

engChrName: Fire!
engSearchText: Fire!
jpnChrName: 撃て（ファイエル）！！
jpnSearchText: 撃て（ファイエル）！！

engChrName: That's my brother's boss!
engSearchText: That's my brother's boss!
jpnChrName: お兄ちゃんの会社の……
jpnSearchText: お兄ちゃんの会社の……

engChrName: The general manager of Marduk paired with the genius professor.
engSearchText:
The general manager of Marduk paired with the
genius professor.
jpnChrName: フフ、マルドゥックのＧＭに 噂の天才殿だったかな？
jpnSearchText:
フフ、マルドゥックのＧＭに
噂の天才殿だったかな？

engChrName: Mr. Thorndyke and Professor Cronkite, is it?
engSearchText: Mr. Thorndyke and Professor Cronkite, is it?
jpnChrName: ソーンダイクＧＭに 教授もいらっしゃったか。
jpnSearchText:
ソーンダイクＧＭに
教授もいらっしゃったか。

engChrName: And they're packin' some heat, too.
engSearchText: And they're packin' some heat, too.
jpnChrName: ハッ、戦力的には かなり居るみてぇだが……
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、戦力的には
かなり居るみてぇだが……

engChrName: Hey, now. The heck're you doin'?
engSearchText: Hey, now. The heck're you doin'?
jpnChrName: おいおい……何やってんだ？
jpnSearchText: おいおい……何やってんだ？

engChrName: Stay out of this, spriggan. Or wait... Are you on their side?
engSearchText:
Stay out of this, spriggan. Or wait... Are you on
their side?
jpnChrName: 裏解決屋は黙っててくれ。 それともそちらの味方をするのか？
jpnSearchText:
裏解決屋は黙っててくれ。
それともそちらの味方をするのか？

engChrName: Umm... I'm not following.
engSearchText: Umm... I'm not following.
jpnChrName: えっと、どういう事？
jpnSearchText: えっと、どういう事？

engChrName: We've gotta get to the bottom of something, that's all.
engSearchText:
We've gotta get to the bottom of something,
that's all.
jpnChrName: ま、ちょっとした行き違いってヤツさ。
jpnSearchText: ま、ちょっとした行き違いってヤツさ。

engChrName: When all hell broke loose, we hurried out to help people ASAP.
engSearchText:
When all hell broke loose, we hurried out to help
people ASAP.
jpnChrName: あの通信の後、こんな風になって 俺らも慌てて対処し始めたんだが……
jpnSearchText:
あの通信の後、こんな風になって
俺らも慌てて対処し始めたんだが……

engChrName: Only to be greeted by these people already aiding in the evacuation efforts.
engSearchText:
Only to be greeted by these people already aiding in
the evacuation efforts.
jpnChrName: 彼らはあたし達より先に動き始めて 動ける市民の誘導なんかもし始めたのよ。
jpnSearchText:
彼らはあたし達より先に動き始めて
動ける市民の誘導なんかもし始めたのよ。

engChrName: Which is fine in theory. But they were just too well prepared—like they knew all of this was going to happen.
engSearchText:
Which is fine in theory. But they were just too well
prepared—like they knew all of this was going
to happen.
jpnChrName: それ自体は文句はないけど…… まるで予め見越していたみたいにね。
jpnSearchText:
それ自体は文句はないけど……
まるで予め見越していたみたいにね。

engChrName: I get'cha now.
engSearchText: I get'cha now.
jpnChrName: なるほどな……
jpnSearchText: なるほどな……

engChrName: I believe there's been a terrible misunderstanding here.
engSearchText:
I believe there's been a terrible
misunderstanding here.
jpnChrName: いや、まったくの誤解なんだがね。
jpnSearchText: いや、まったくの誤解なんだがね。

engChrName: It's purely coincidental that my men and I happen to be here.
engSearchText:
It's purely coincidental that my men and I happen to
be here.
jpnChrName: 我が社の警備隊員にしても 偶然、近くに居合わせていただけで。
jpnSearchText:
我が社の警備隊員にしても
偶然、近くに居合わせていただけで。

engChrName: Y-You can't honestly expect us to believe that!
engSearchText: Y-You can't honestly expect us to believe that!
jpnChrName: そ、そんな説明が 通用すると思ってるんですか！？
jpnSearchText:
そ、そんな説明が
通用すると思ってるんですか！？

engChrName: We SAW you with one of Heiyue's leaders! That makes you even more suspicious!
engSearchText:
We SAW you with one of Heiyue's leaders!
That makes you even more suspicious!
jpnChrName: 黒月の幹部も一緒だったみたいだし 何を考えてるか分かったもんじゃない！
jpnSearchText:
黒月の幹部も一緒だったみたいだし
何を考えてるか分かったもんじゃない！

engChrName: And what's your excuse, Professor Cronkite? Why are you with them?
engSearchText:
And what's your excuse, Professor Cronkite? Why are
you with them?
jpnChrName: クロンカイト教授も…… どうして彼らと一緒だったんですか？
jpnSearchText:
クロンカイト教授も……
どうして彼らと一緒だったんですか？

engChrName: Must I really explain my actions here?
engSearchText: Must I really explain my actions here?
jpnChrName: 君たちに説明する義理はなかろう？
jpnSearchText: 君たちに説明する義理はなかろう？

engChrName: To understand the most unusual phenomenon that has taken place today, I enlisted help to investigate it.
engSearchText:
To understand the most unusual phenomenon that
has taken place today, I enlisted help to investigate it.
jpnChrName: この現象そのものは多少興味深い。 彼らには解析に協力してもらうだけだ。
jpnSearchText:
この現象そのものは多少興味深い。
彼らには解析に協力してもらうだけだ。
……っ……！

engChrName: Are you fighting AGAIN?!
engSearchText: Are you fighting AGAIN?!
jpnChrName: ちょっと……！ また揉めているんですか！？
jpnSearchText:
ちょっと……！
また揉めているんですか！？

engChrName: There you are, Second Lieutenant.
engSearchText: There you are, Second Lieutenant.
jpnChrName: カエラ少尉、こちらに居たか。
jpnSearchText: カエラ少尉、こちらに居たか。

engChrName: Glad to see you're doin' okay, too, Professor.
engSearchText: Glad to see you're doin' okay, too, Professor.
jpnChrName: 准教授さんも無事で何よりだ。
jpnSearchText: 准教授さんも無事で何よりだ。

engChrName: It's a relief to see you in one piece, sir!
engSearchText: It's a relief to see you in one piece, sir!
jpnChrName: キンケイド補佐官、 ご無事でしたか……！
jpnSearchText:
キンケイド補佐官、
ご無事でしたか……！

engChrName: Glad to see you're both lookin' well.
engSearchText: Glad to see you're both lookin' well.
jpnChrName: 少尉に准教授…… 無事だったみてえだな。
jpnSearchText:
少尉に准教授……
無事だったみてえだな。

engChrName: The same to you.
engSearchText: The same to you.
jpnChrName: ええ、そちらも。
jpnSearchText: ええ、そちらも。

engChrName: I'm glad you're all okay, too!
engSearchText: I'm glad you're all okay, too!
jpnChrName: ヴァン君たちも無事で何よりだよ～！
jpnSearchText: ヴァン君たちも無事で何よりだよ～！

engChrName: I'm glad you're all okay, too!
engSearchText: I'm glad you're all okay, too!
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんたちも無事で何よりです～！
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさんたちも無事で何よりです～！

engChrName: We have no time for infighting—the safety of Edith's civilians should be priority number one.
engSearchText:
We have no time for infighting—the safety of Edith's
civilians should be priority number one.
jpnChrName: 双方とも、今は市民の安全を 第一にお願いします……！
jpnSearchText:
双方とも、今は市民の安全を
第一にお願いします……！

engChrName: If words won't convince you to stop, I'll be forced to exert the full authority of the CID. Understand?
engSearchText:
If words won't convince you to stop, I'll be forced to
exert the full authority of the CID. Understand?
jpnChrName: 聞けないのであれば ＣＩＤの指揮下に入って頂きますよ！？
jpnSearchText:
聞けないのであれば
ＣＩＤの指揮下に入って頂きますよ！？

engChrName: Y-You've got to be joking!
engSearchText: Y-You've got to be joking!
jpnChrName: じょ、冗談じゃない……！
jpnSearchText: じょ、冗談じゃない……！

engChrName: I know we SHOULD be working together, but I just can't trust the likes of them.
engSearchText:
I know we SHOULD be working together, but I just
can't trust the likes of them.
jpnChrName: ハッ、協力すべきってのは分かるが アンタらとなれ合うことはできねぇな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、協力すべきってのは分かるが
アンタらとなれ合うことはできねぇな。

engChrName: Well, if the president wills it, we'll comply.
engSearchText: Well, if the president wills it, we'll comply.
jpnChrName: フフ、大統領閣下のオーダーがあれば 我々の方は吝（やぶさ）かでもないがね？
jpnSearchText:
フフ、大統領閣下のオーダーがあれば
我々の方は吝（やぶさ）かでもないがね？

engChrName: Th-That's not quite what I meant...
engSearchText: Th-That's not quite what I meant...
jpnChrName: そ、それは……
jpnSearchText: そ、それは……

engChrName: ...I think I see what's happening here now.
engSearchText: ...I think I see what's happening here now.
jpnChrName: ……なるほど、そういう状況。
jpnSearchText: ……なるほど、そういう状況。

engChrName: Hmm... I believe I understand the situation now.
engSearchText: Hmm... I believe I understand the situation now.
jpnChrName: ふむ、状況は概ね理解した。
jpnSearchText: ふむ、状況は概ね理解した。

engChrName: Seeing as Mr. Arkride has only just arrived, perhaps it would be wise to recount the details in more depth.
engSearchText:
Seeing as Mr. Arkride has only just arrived, perhaps it
would be wise to recount the details in more depth.
jpnChrName: まあ、アークライド君も来たばかりだ。 改めて状況整理も悪くないだろう。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、アークライド君も来たばかりだ。
改めて状況整理も悪くないだろう。

engChrName: Come along...Alvis, was it? We can continue this conversation in the café.
engSearchText:
Come along...Alvis, was it? We can continue this
conversation in the café.
jpnChrName: アルヴィス君だったか、君も来たまえ。 オーバルカフェで話をしようじゃないか。
jpnSearchText:
アルヴィス君だったか、君も来たまえ。
オーバルカフェで話をしようじゃないか。

engChrName: Sure, that's fine by me...but who put you in charge?!
engSearchText: Sure, that's fine by me...but who put you in charge?!
jpnChrName: まあ、そのくらいなら…… ってどうしてアンタが仕切るんだ！？
jpnSearchText:
まあ、そのくらいなら……
ってどうしてアンタが仕切るんだ！？

engChrName: They entered the café and listened as everyone relayed what they knew of the situation.
engSearchText:
They entered the café and listened as everyone
relayed what they knew of the situation.
jpnChrName: その後、オーバルカフェに入ったヴァンたちは 各方面の代表から異変時の状況を改めて聞かされた。
jpnSearchText:
その後、オーバルカフェに入ったヴァンたちは
各方面の代表から異変時の状況を改めて聞かされた。

engChrName: Their experiences mirrored each other—a strange call followed by the city and sky changing ominously, and most people being frozen in time.
engSearchText:
Their experiences mirrored each other—a strange call
followed by the city and sky changing ominously, and
most people being frozen in time.
jpnChrName: やはり奇妙な通信が入った後、街と空に異変が発生し、 一部を除いた者たちは“停まって”しまったという。
jpnSearchText:
やはり奇妙な通信が入った後、街と空に異変が発生し、
一部を除いた者たちは“停まって”しまったという。

engChrName: They entered the café and listened as everyone relayed what they knew of the situation.
engSearchText:
They entered the café and listened as everyone
relayed what they knew of the situation.
jpnChrName: その後、オーバルカフェに入ったヴァンたちは 各方面の代表と異変時の情報を改めて共有した。
jpnSearchText:
その後、オーバルカフェに入ったヴァンたちは
各方面の代表と異変時の情報を改めて共有した。

engChrName: They also learned where Risette and Naje, who had been with the second lieutenant and Esmeray, were now.
engSearchText:
They also learned where Risette and Naje, who had
been with the second lieutenant and Esmeray,
were now.
jpnChrName: なお異変発生時、少尉やエスメレーと一緒にいた リゼットに公国護衛官ナージェだったが……
jpnSearchText:
なお異変発生時、少尉やエスメレーと一緒にいた
リゼットに公国護衛官ナージェだったが……

engChrName: So Naje went out lookin' for the crown prince...
engSearchText: So Naje went out lookin' for the crown prince...
jpnChrName: 護衛官殿は公太子殿下を捜しに……
jpnSearchText: 護衛官殿は公太子殿下を捜しに……

engChrName: ...and Risette is investigating with Cao to learn more about what's happening.
engSearchText:
...and Risette is investigating with Cao to learn more
about what's happening.
jpnChrName: リゼットは異変を調べるため 白蘭竜（ツァオ・リー）とこの周辺を探っているのか。
jpnSearchText:
リゼットは異変を調べるため
白蘭竜（ツァオ・リー）とこの周辺を探っているのか。

engChrName: It sounds like they've got their eyes set on the demon spheres just like us.
engSearchText:
It sounds like they've got their eyes set on the demon
spheres just like us.
jpnChrName: しかもわたしたちと同じように “魔球”を捜しているみたいですね……！
jpnSearchText:
しかもわたしたちと同じように
“魔球”を捜しているみたいですね……！

engChrName: Sounds like they're after the demon spheres, too.
engSearchText: Sounds like they're after the demon spheres, too.
jpnChrName: ハッ、しかも俺と同じく “魔球”を捜してるみてぇだな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、しかも俺と同じく
“魔球”を捜してるみてぇだな。

engChrName: No clue why Cao would be helping out, though.
engSearchText: No clue why Cao would be helping out, though.
jpnChrName: あのツァオがどういう 風の吹き回しとは思うが。
jpnSearchText:
あのツァオがどういう
風の吹き回しとは思うが。

engChrName: I'm curious about that strange sphere that appeared in the sky and then disappeared, too.
engSearchText:
I'm curious about that strange sphere that appeared in
the sky and then disappeared, too.
jpnChrName: ふむ、異変時に上空に現れて消えた 怪しげな“球”を気に掛けていたが……
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、異変時に上空に現れて消えた
怪しげな“球”を気に掛けていたが……

engChrName: That's right. Naje seemed to feel really bad about leaving, but the prince is her number one priority.
engSearchText:
That's right. Naje seemed to feel really bad about
leaving, but the prince is her number one priority.
jpnChrName: うん、ナージェさんは 随分申し訳なさそうだったかな～。
jpnSearchText:
うん、ナージェさんは
随分申し訳なさそうだったかな～。

engChrName: Hooonestly, I can't blame her.
engSearchText: Hooonestly, I can't blame her.
jpnChrName: でもシェリド殿下の心配が 一番になっちゃうのは仕方ないよねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
でもシェリド殿下の心配が
一番になっちゃうのは仕方ないよねぇ。

engChrName: As for Miss Twinings, she is technically still under your employ.
engSearchText:
As for Miss Twinings, she is technically still under
your employ.
jpnChrName: ちなみにトワイニング君については そちらの事務所に出向中の身だからね。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみにトワイニング君については
そちらの事務所に出向中の身だからね。

engChrName: I believe that is why she wished to investigate, so I granted her request.
engSearchText:
I believe that is why she wished to investigate, so I
granted her request.
jpnChrName: メンバーとして異変調査を優先したいとの 申し出に、私としても許可した次第だ。
jpnSearchText:
メンバーとして異変調査を優先したいとの
申し出に、私としても許可した次第だ。

engChrName: Of course, the White Orchid Dragon has his motives—not that I could hazard a guess as to what those are.
engSearchText:
Of course, the White Orchid Dragon has his
motives—not that I could hazard a guess as to what
those are.
jpnChrName: フフ、白蘭竜殿の思惑については 私にも分からないが……
jpnSearchText:
フフ、白蘭竜殿の思惑については
私にも分からないが……

engChrName: Given his foresight, he no doubt wants to learn something about the current phenomenon.
engSearchText:
Given his foresight, he no doubt wants to learn
something about the current phenomenon.
jpnChrName: 一歩も二歩も先を見ている男だ。 独自に何かを掴むつもりなのだろう。
jpnSearchText:
一歩も二歩も先を見ている男だ。
独自に何かを掴むつもりなのだろう。

engChrName: Talent like his is wasted on the likes of Heiyue... though perhaps such an environment is where he truly shines.
engSearchText:
Talent like his is wasted on the likes of Heiyue...
though perhaps such an environment is where he
truly shines.
jpnChrName: 黒月ごときには勿体ない── いや、だから意味があるとも言えるか。
jpnSearchText:
黒月ごときには勿体ない──
いや、だから意味があるとも言えるか。

engChrName: Ugh... Why do we have to rely on weapon designers, PMCs, and criminals?
engSearchText:
Ugh... Why do we have to rely on weapon designers,
PMCs, and criminals?
jpnChrName: くっ、軍事会社に犯罪組織、 次世代兵器の開発者が一体何を……
jpnSearchText:
くっ、軍事会社に犯罪組織、
次世代兵器の開発者が一体何を……

engChrName: I'm currently working on contacting police officers and CID affiliates who haven't been frozen.
engSearchText:
I'm currently working on contacting police officers
and CID affiliates who haven't been frozen.
jpnChrName: 私の方では現在、“停止”していない 警察官やＣＩＤ関係者と連絡を取っています。
jpnSearchText:
私の方では現在、“停止”していない
警察官やＣＩＤ関係者と連絡を取っています。

engChrName: Between that effort and assisting civilians in need, I haven't been able to help investigate at all— as frustrating as that is.
engSearchText:
Between that effort and assisting civilians in need,
I haven't been able to help investigate at all—
as frustrating as that is.
jpnChrName: 保護を求めている市民への対応もあって 調査を手伝えていないのは歯がゆいですが……
jpnSearchText:
保護を求めている市民への対応もあって
調査を手伝えていないのは歯がゆいですが……

engChrName: We're in the same boat, really. This should be a situation where the guild can shine, but we still can't help much.
engSearchText:
We're in the same boat, really. This should be a
situation where the guild can shine, but we still can't
help much.
jpnChrName: こちらも同じだ……こういう時こそ 出番なのにそちらまで手が回らなくて……
jpnSearchText:
こちらも同じだ……こういう時こそ
出番なのにそちらまで手が回らなくて……

engChrName: Ugh. If only Elaine or Zin were here...
engSearchText: Ugh. If only Elaine or Zin were here...
jpnChrName: クソッ……こんな時に ジンさんやエレインさんが居てくれれば。
jpnSearchText:
クソッ……こんな時に
ジンさんやエレインさんが居てくれれば。

engChrName: No kidding. At the least, I'm sure they're both okay, wherever they are.
engSearchText:
No kidding. At the least, I'm sure they're both okay,
wherever they are.
jpnChrName: ……確かに。 多分、無事だとは思うけど。
jpnSearchText:
……確かに。
多分、無事だとは思うけど。

engChrName: Either way, if one of my employees is hittin' the pavement, I've gotta go back 'em up.
engSearchText:
Either way, if one of my employees is hittin' the
pavement, I've gotta go back 'em up.
jpnChrName: ……ま、いずれにせよ、 ウチのメンバーが調べている案件だ。
jpnSearchText:
……ま、いずれにせよ、
ウチのメンバーが調べている案件だ。

engChrName: Leave Risette to us, and focus on your own stuff.
engSearchText: Leave Risette to us, and focus on your own stuff.
jpnChrName: バックアップはこちらが向かう。 あんたらは自分の役目を果たしてくれ。
jpnSearchText:
バックアップはこちらが向かう。
あんたらは自分の役目を果たしてくれ。

engChrName: Count me in.
engSearchText: Count me in.
jpnChrName: フフ、及ばずながら力になるよ。
jpnSearchText: フフ、及ばずながら力になるよ。

engChrName: We've got this!
engSearchText: We've got this!
jpnChrName: お任せくださいっ！
jpnSearchText: お任せくださいっ！

engChrName: Something tells me the super maid and Cao are doing a-okay on their own, though.
engSearchText:
Something tells me the super maid and Cao are
doing a-okay on their own, though.
jpnChrName: ハッ、メイドにツァオなら 心配はいらねぇだろうがな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、メイドにツァオなら
心配はいらねぇだろうがな。

engChrName: I will continue my operation with them. This area is in your hands, Lieutenant.
engSearchText:
I will continue my operation with them. This area is
in your hands, Lieutenant.
jpnChrName: そちらは私がフォローする。 少尉、こちらの方は任せた。
jpnSearchText:
そちらは私がフォローする。
少尉、こちらの方は任せた。

engChrName: Yes, sir!
engSearchText: Yes, sir!
jpnChrName: イエス・サー！
jpnSearchText: イエス・サー！

engChrName: Thanks. I'm counting on you all.
engSearchText: Thanks. I'm counting on you all.
jpnChrName: ええ、よろしく頼みます。
jpnSearchText: ええ、よろしく頼みます。

engChrName: I'll make my way back to the guild. I don't think we can afford to have anyone standing around right now.
engSearchText:
I'll make my way back to the guild. I don't think we
can afford to have anyone standing around right now.
jpnChrName: ……俺はギルドに戻る。 どうしても手一杯だからな。
jpnSearchText:
……俺はギルドに戻る。
どうしても手一杯だからな。

engChrName: I'm counting on you, everyone!
engSearchText: I'm counting on you, everyone!
jpnChrName: フィー、アークライドも そちらの方はどうか任せた！
jpnSearchText:
フィー、アークライドも
そちらの方はどうか任せた！

engChrName: Leave it to us.
engSearchText: Leave it to us.
jpnChrName: ん、任せて。
jpnSearchText: ん、任せて。

engChrName: I'm counting on you, Arkride!
engSearchText: I'm counting on you, Arkride!
jpnChrName: アークライド…… そちらの方はどうか任せた！
jpnSearchText:
アークライド……
そちらの方はどうか任せた！

engChrName: No problem. Good luck with everything on your end.
engSearchText: No problem. Good luck with everything on your end.
jpnChrName: ああ、そっちも気張りな。
jpnSearchText: ああ、そっちも気張りな。

engChrName: Please do what you can for Risette!
engSearchText: Please do what you can for Risette!
jpnChrName: ヴァン君たち、リゼットちゃんのこと どうかお願いね～。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン君たち、リゼットちゃんのこと
どうかお願いね～。

engChrName: Please do what you can for Risette!
engSearchText: Please do what you can for Risette!
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんたち、リゼットちゃんのこと どうかお願いしますね～。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさんたち、リゼットちゃんのこと
どうかお願いしますね～。

engChrName: Best of luck and fair travels.
engSearchText: Best of luck and fair travels.
jpnChrName: フフ、せいぜい頑張りたまえ。
jpnSearchText: フフ、せいぜい頑張りたまえ。

engChrName: I'll be returning to the department store, what of you, Professor?
engSearchText:
I'll be returning to the department store, what of
you, Professor?
jpnChrName: ──私は百貨店に戻りますが 教授はどうしますか？
jpnSearchText:
──私は百貨店に戻りますが
教授はどうしますか？

engChrName: Since I find myself in a café, I intend on resting here for a short while before returning to work.
engSearchText:
Since I find myself in a café, I intend on resting here
for a short while before returning to work.
jpnChrName: 折角なのでカフェで 一服してから戻るつもりだ。
jpnSearchText:
折角なのでカフェで
一服してから戻るつもりだ。

engChrName: Oh!
engSearchText: Oh!
jpnChrName: おお……！
jpnSearchText: おお……！

engChrName: The air's clearing!
engSearchText: The air's clearing!
jpnChrName: 瘴気が消えて……！
jpnSearchText: 瘴気が消えて……！

engChrName: They did it!
engSearchText: They did it!
jpnChrName: やってくれたみたいね……！
jpnSearchText: やってくれたみたいね……！

engChrName: Heehee. Van and his friends are always so reliable!
engSearchText: Heehee. Van and his friends are always so reliable!
jpnChrName: うふふ、やっぱり ヴァン君たちは凄いなぁ～！
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、やっぱり
ヴァン君たちは凄いなぁ～！

engChrName: Well, that settles that. Though I must say, Professor, your theory is most fascinating.
engSearchText:
Well, that settles that. Though I must say, Professor,
your theory is most fascinating.
jpnChrName: トワイニング君たちの成果か。 ……フフ、しかし教授の説も面白い。
jpnSearchText:
トワイニング君たちの成果か。
……フフ、しかし教授の説も面白い。

engChrName: It has the capacity to be fascinating, but at present it is merely a hypothesis. The truth of the matter will only become clear with time.
engSearchText:
It has the capacity to be fascinating, but at present it
is merely a hypothesis. The truth of the matter will
only become clear with time.
jpnChrName: 現時点では仮説に過ぎないが。 まあ、そのうち明らかになるだろう。
jpnSearchText:
現時点では仮説に過ぎないが。
まあ、そのうち明らかになるだろう。

engChrName: They returned to the orbal café to report back to Second Lieutenant Kaela, and to discuss their next move.
engSearchText:
They returned to the orbal café to report back to
Second Lieutenant Kaela, and to discuss their
next move.
jpnChrName: ──その後、オーバルカフェに戻ったヴァンたちは カエラ少尉たちに報告しつつ今後について話し合った。
jpnSearchText:
──その後、オーバルカフェに戻ったヴァンたちは
カエラ少尉たちに報告しつつ今後について話し合った。

engChrName: So you wish to continue working with Arkride Solutions for the time being, then?
engSearchText:
So you wish to continue working with Arkride
Solutions for the time being, then?
jpnChrName: ──成程、あくまでアークライド事務所の メンバーとして動きたいと。
jpnSearchText:
──成程、あくまでアークライド事務所の
メンバーとして動きたいと。

engChrName: I do. While I am aware that our chief of security and yourself have goals of your own in this situation...
engSearchText:
I do. While I am aware that our chief of security and
yourself have goals of your own in this situation...
jpnChrName: はい、ＧＭや警備主任に何らかの意図が おありなのは承知していますが……
jpnSearchText:
はい、ＧＭや警備主任に何らかの意図が
おありなのは承知していますが……

engChrName: ...I do not believe my return would significantly contribute to furthering those goals.
engSearchText:
...I do not believe my return would significantly
contribute to furthering those goals.
jpnChrName: 現時点で外れているわたくしが戻っても 十分なお手伝いはできないかと。
jpnSearchText:
現時点で外れているわたくしが戻っても
十分なお手伝いはできないかと。

engChrName: As such, I believe that continuing as I am will best serve Marduk's interests.
engSearchText:
As such, I believe that continuing as I am will best
serve Marduk's interests.
jpnChrName: ならばこのまま出向先の一員として動き 共和国首都の危機的状況に対応する──
jpnSearchText:
ならばこのまま出向先の一員として動き
共和国首都の危機的状況に対応する──

engChrName: So I ask that you allow me to continue on with the solutions office as I have been.
engSearchText:
So I ask that you allow me to continue on with
the solutions office as I have been.
jpnChrName: その方が結果的にマルドゥック社の 利益にも繋がるのではないかと具申します。
jpnSearchText:
その方が結果的にマルドゥック社の
利益にも繋がるのではないかと具申します。

engChrName: Heh.
engSearchText: Heh.
jpnChrName: ハン……
jpnSearchText: ハン……

engChrName: Risette...
engSearchText: Risette...
jpnChrName: リゼットさん……
jpnSearchText: リゼットさん……

engChrName: Heehee...
engSearchText: Heehee...
jpnChrName: ふふっ……
jpnSearchText: ふふっ……

engChrName: For the record, I had fully intended on approving your decision without the rousing speech.
engSearchText:
For the record, I had fully intended on approving
your decision without the rousing speech.
jpnChrName: フフ、最初から認めるつもりだったが 改めての決意表明というわけか。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、最初から認めるつもりだったが
改めての決意表明というわけか。

engChrName: Very well. We at Marduk consider fairness to be one of our guiding principles.
engSearchText:
Very well. We at Marduk consider fairness to be one
of our guiding principles.
jpnChrName: いいだろう──マルドゥック社は “フェアネス”を社是としている。
jpnSearchText:
いいだろう──マルドゥック社は
“フェアネス”を社是としている。

engChrName: Go ahead and show us just how much value you can bring to the table.
engSearchText:
Go ahead and show us just how much value you can
bring to the table.
jpnChrName: せいぜい君自身の価値を示したまえ。
jpnSearchText: せいぜい君自身の価値を示したまえ。

engChrName: Thank you, sir. I shall.
engSearchText: Thank you, sir. I shall.
jpnChrName: はい、承知しております。
jpnSearchText: はい、承知しております。

engChrName: Hmm... So when do we begin the bidding for who can loan her next?
engSearchText:
Hmm... So when do we begin the bidding for who
can loan her next?
jpnChrName: うーん、ますますこちらにも 出向して頂きたいですねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
うーん、ますますこちらにも
出向して頂きたいですねぇ。

engChrName: Hey! We're tryin' to have a serious discussion here!
engSearchText: Hey! We're tryin' to have a serious discussion here!
jpnChrName: アンタは混ぜっ返すんじゃねえよ！
jpnSearchText: アンタは混ぜっ返すんじゃねえよ！

engChrName: Save your breath, that guy's never gonna change.
engSearchText: Save your breath, that guy's never gonna change.
jpnChrName: 諦めろやヴァン。 そーいうヤツだからよ。
jpnSearchText:
諦めろやヴァン。
そーいうヤツだからよ。

engChrName: I was being half serious, at least.
engSearchText: I was being half serious, at least.
jpnChrName: まあ本気半分の冗談はともかく。
jpnSearchText: まあ本気半分の冗談はともかく。

engChrName: Regardless, since we happen to be together, I'd like to travel with you all for a while longer.
engSearchText:
Regardless, since we happen to be together, I'd like to
travel with you all for a while longer.
jpnChrName: 先ほどの共闘ついでに、私も少しばかり ヴァンさん達に同行させてください。
jpnSearchText:
先ほどの共闘ついでに、私も少しばかり
ヴァンさん達に同行させてください。

engChrName: I am concerned about Lady Ashen's well-being, as well as some notable others.
engSearchText:
I am concerned about Lady Ashen's well-being, as
well as some notable others.
jpnChrName: アシェン様の無事も心配ですし、 他にも気になる方々がいますので。
jpnSearchText:
アシェン様の無事も心配ですし、
他にも気になる方々がいますので。

engChrName: I am relieved to know that Lady Ashen is well, but there are some other notable individuals I remain concerned about.
engSearchText:
I am relieved to know that Lady Ashen is well, but
there are some other notable individuals I remain
concerned about.
jpnChrName: アシェン様はご無事のようですが 他にも気になる方々がいますので。
jpnSearchText:
アシェン様はご無事のようですが
他にも気になる方々がいますので。

engChrName: Oh, right. Fan and Gien are in the capital right now, too, yeah?
engSearchText:
Oh, right. Fan and Gien are in the capital right now,
too, yeah?
jpnChrName: そうだな……ファンのオッサンや ギエン爺さんも首都にいたか。
jpnSearchText:
そうだな……ファンのオッサンや
ギエン爺さんも首都にいたか。

engChrName: *sigh* Can't say I'm all that thrilled about havin' you of all people covering our backs.
engSearchText:
*sigh* Can't say I'm all that thrilled about havin' you
of all people covering our backs.
jpnChrName: ふう、正直アンタの 同行ってのはゾッとしねえが……
jpnSearchText:
ふう、正直アンタの
同行ってのはゾッとしねえが……

engChrName: ...But you did help one of my people, so I'll put up with it this time. Welcome to the team.
engSearchText:
...But you did help one of my people, so I'll put up
with it this time. Welcome to the team.
jpnChrName: スタッフを手伝ってくれた借りもあるし せいぜいお手柔らかに頼むぜ。
jpnSearchText:
スタッフを手伝ってくれた借りもあるし
せいぜいお手柔らかに頼むぜ。

engChrName: Splendid. It always pays to put others in your debt when the opportunity presents!
engSearchText:
Splendid. It always pays to put others in your debt
when the opportunity presents!
jpnChrName: フフ、こちらこそ。 いや～、貸しは作っておくものですねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、こちらこそ。
いや～、貸しは作っておくものですねぇ。

engChrName: I knew the catch was comin'!
engSearchText: I knew the catch was comin'!
jpnChrName: ってそれが狙いか！？
jpnSearchText: ってそれが狙いか！？

engChrName: (Heehee.)
engSearchText: (Heehee.)
jpnChrName: （あはは……）
jpnSearchText: （あはは……）

engChrName: (They go together surprisingly well.)
engSearchText: (They go together surprisingly well.)
jpnChrName: （うふふ、この２人、   意外と気が合ってるのかな？）
jpnSearchText:
（うふふ、この２人、
意外と気が合ってるのかな？）

engChrName: (Indeed. Such are Mr. Arkride's charms.)
engSearchText: (Indeed. Such are Mr. Arkride's charms.)
jpnChrName: （ええ……それとヴァン様の   人徳の賜物でしょう。）
jpnSearchText:
（ええ……それとヴァン様の
人徳の賜物でしょう。）

engChrName: Maybe it's time we part ways.
engSearchText: Maybe it's time we part ways.
jpnChrName: ふふ、そういう事なら 私はそろそろお暇しようかな。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、そういう事なら
私はそろそろお暇しようかな。

engChrName: If you've got the White Orchid Dragon on your side, you hardly need me.
engSearchText:
If you've got the White Orchid Dragon on your side,
you hardly need me.
jpnChrName: 白蘭竜殿が同行するなら それ以上の助力も無用だろう。
jpnSearchText:
白蘭竜殿が同行するなら
それ以上の助力も無用だろう。

engChrName: Makes sense. Thanks for all the help you've given us.
engSearchText: Makes sense. Thanks for all the help you've given us.
jpnChrName: そうか……短い間だが 世話になっちまったな。
jpnSearchText:
そうか……短い間だが
世話になっちまったな。

engChrName: Not at all. Hanging out with you helped me get a better handle on the situation, so it worked out for both of us.
engSearchText:
Not at all. Hanging out with you helped me get a
better handle on the situation, so it worked out for
both of us.
jpnChrName: いや、こちらこそ 色々と状況が整理できたよ。
jpnSearchText:
いや、こちらこそ
色々と状況が整理できたよ。

engChrName: I'm going to meet up with Kurogane and the others, so if we learn anything, we'll give you a heads up.
engSearchText:
I'm going to meet up with Kurogane and the others,
so if we learn anything, we'll give you a heads up.
jpnChrName: クロガネたちと合流するつもりだけど 何か分かったらお互い協力しよう。
jpnSearchText:
クロガネたちと合流するつもりだけど
何か分かったらお互い協力しよう。

engChrName: Heehee. In that case, I think I'll be off.
engSearchText: Heehee. In that case, I think I'll be off.
jpnChrName: ふふ、そういう事なら わたしはここまでにしておくかな。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、そういう事なら
わたしはここまでにしておくかな。

engChrName: Once I've traded info with the others bracers, I want to check on the situation around the rest of the city.
engSearchText:
Once I've traded info with the others bracers, I want
to check on the situation around the rest of the city.
jpnChrName: ギルドで情報交換をしたら 他のエリアも当たってみたいし。
jpnSearchText:
ギルドで情報交換をしたら
他のエリアも当たってみたいし。

engChrName: We'd really appreciate that, Fie.
engSearchText: We'd really appreciate that, Fie.
jpnChrName: フィー……助かるぜ。
jpnSearchText: フィー……助かるぜ。

engChrName: Makes sense. Thanks for helpin' out all this time.
engSearchText: Makes sense. Thanks for helpin' out all this time.
jpnChrName: そうか…… 短い間だが世話になったな。
jpnSearchText:
そうか……
短い間だが世話になったな。

engChrName: We'll let you know if we learn anything new.
engSearchText: We'll let you know if we learn anything new.
jpnChrName: 何か分かったら連絡するからよ。
jpnSearchText: 何か分かったら連絡するからよ。

engChrName: Thank you so much, Fie. It was fun working together!
engSearchText:
Thank you so much, Fie. It was fun
working together!
jpnChrName: フィーさん…… ありがとうございましたっ！
jpnSearchText:
フィーさん……
ありがとうございましたっ！

engChrName: Haha. Same to you.
engSearchText: Haha. Same to you.
jpnChrName: ふふ、こちらこそ。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、こちらこそ。

engChrName: As soon as I find Elaine, I'll be sure to let her know you're all right.
engSearchText:
As soon as I find Elaine, I'll be sure to let her know
you're all right.
jpnChrName: エレインも何とか見つけて ヴァンが無事だったって伝えとく。
jpnSearchText:
エレインも何とか見つけて
ヴァンが無事だったって伝えとく。

engChrName: Thanks, I guess.
engSearchText: Thanks, I guess.
jpnChrName: ああ……よろしく頼むわ。
jpnSearchText: ああ……よろしく頼むわ。

engChrName: Hmm... In that case, this seems a good time for me to take my leave.
engSearchText:
Hmm... In that case, this seems a good time for me to
take my leave.
jpnChrName: ふむ、そういう事なら 私はここまでとしておこう。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、そういう事なら
私はここまでとしておこう。

engChrName: I do have other duties to attend to after all.
engSearchText: I do have other duties to attend to after all.
jpnChrName: こちらはこちらで 動く必要があるからな。
jpnSearchText:
こちらはこちらで
動く必要があるからな。

engChrName: Can't say I'm surprised. Just try not to die out there, buddy.
engSearchText:
Can't say I'm surprised. Just try not to die out
there, buddy.
jpnChrName: ま、お前の立場なら当然か。 せいぜいくたばるんじゃねえぞ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、お前の立場なら当然か。
せいぜいくたばるんじゃねえぞ。

engChrName: I could say the same to you.
engSearchText: I could say the same to you.
jpnChrName: フッ、こちらの台詞だ。
jpnSearchText: フッ、こちらの台詞だ。

engChrName: Lieutenant, Mr. Thorndyke, Professor Cronkite.
engSearchText: Lieutenant, Mr. Thorndyke, Professor Cronkite.
jpnChrName: ──少尉、ソーンダイクＧＭに クロンカイト教授も。
jpnSearchText:
──少尉、ソーンダイクＧＭに
クロンカイト教授も。

engChrName: While I'm here, I'd like to exchange information.
engSearchText: While I'm here, I'd like to exchange information.
jpnChrName: 少々情報交換させてください。
jpnSearchText: 少々情報交換させてください。

engChrName: Understood!
engSearchText: Understood!
jpnChrName: 了解です……！
jpnSearchText: 了解です……！

engChrName: No objections here.
engSearchText: No objections here.
jpnChrName: フフ、構わないよ。
jpnSearchText: フフ、構わないよ。

engChrName: Very well. I'd wanted to speak with you regardless.
engSearchText: Very well. I'd wanted to speak with you regardless.
jpnChrName: ああ、こちらも幾つか 確認しておきたい事がある。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、こちらも幾つか
確認しておきたい事がある。

engChrName: After reuniting with Risette (and a markedly less trustworthy ally), the group was ready to travel to their next destination.
engSearchText:
After reuniting with Risette (and a markedly less
trustworthy ally), the group was ready to travel to
their next destination.
jpnChrName: こうしてリゼットと合流したヴァンは 油断ならない同行者も一時的に迎え……
jpnSearchText:
こうしてリゼットと合流したヴァンは
油断ならない同行者も一時的に迎え……

engChrName: Either Old Town or Riverside where they had reason to believe their friends resided.
engSearchText:
Either Old Town or Riverside where they had reason
to believe their friends resided.
jpnChrName: 改めて、事務所メンバーが居る可能性が高い 旧市街かリバーサイドを目指すことにした。
jpnSearchText:
改めて、事務所メンバーが居る可能性が高い
旧市街かリバーサイドを目指すことにした。

engChrName: After reuniting with Risette (and a markedly less trustworthy ally), the group was ready to travel to their next destination.
engSearchText:
After reuniting with Risette (and a markedly less
trustworthy ally), the group was ready to travel to
their next destination.
jpnChrName: こうしてリゼットと合流したヴァンたちは 油断ならない同行者も一時的に迎え……
jpnSearchText:
こうしてリゼットと合流したヴァンたちは
油断ならない同行者も一時的に迎え……

engChrName: First, however, they needed to discuss their next move.
engSearchText:
First, however, they needed to discuss their
next move.
jpnChrName: 今後の方針について 改めて話し合うことにした。
jpnSearchText:
今後の方針について
改めて話し合うことにした。

engChrName: After reuniting with Risette (and a markedly less trustworthy ally), the group was ready to travel to their next destination.
engSearchText:
After reuniting with Risette (and a markedly less
trustworthy ally), the group was ready to travel to
their next destination.
jpnChrName: こうしてリゼットと合流したヴァンたちは 油断ならない同行者も一時的に迎え……
jpnSearchText:
こうしてリゼットと合流したヴァンたちは
油断ならない同行者も一時的に迎え……

engChrName: Specifically, the Riverside District, where they had reason to believe another of their friends resided.
engSearchText:
Specifically, the Riverside District, where they had
reason to believe another of their friends resided.
jpnChrName: 改めて、事務所メンバーが居る可能性が高い リバーサイドを目指すことにした。
jpnSearchText:
改めて、事務所メンバーが居る可能性が高い
リバーサイドを目指すことにした。

engChrName: After reuniting with Risette (and a markedly less trustworthy ally), the group was ready to travel to their next destination.
engSearchText:
After reuniting with Risette (and a markedly less
trustworthy ally), the group was ready to travel to
their next destination.
jpnChrName: こうしてリゼットと合流したヴァンたちは 油断ならない同行者も一時的に迎え……
jpnSearchText:
こうしてリゼットと合流したヴァンたちは
油断ならない同行者も一時的に迎え……

engChrName: Specifically, Old Town, where they had reason to believe another of their friends resided.
engSearchText:
Specifically, Old Town, where they had reason to
believe another of their friends resided.
jpnChrName: 改めて、事務所メンバーが居る可能性が高い 近場の旧市街を目指すことにした。
jpnSearchText:
改めて、事務所メンバーが居る可能性が高い
近場の旧市街を目指すことにした。

engChrName: Risette rejoined the party.
engSearchText: Risette rejoined the party.
jpnChrName: リゼットがパーティに合流しました。
jpnSearchText: <C1>リゼットがパーティに合流しました。

engChrName: Cao joined as a guest in Shizuna's place.
engSearchText: Cao joined as a guest in Shizuna's place.
jpnChrName: シズナがゲストから抜け、 ツァオが一時的に加入しました。
jpnSearchText:
シズナがゲストから抜け、
ツァオが一時的に加入しました。

engChrName: Cao joined as a guest in Fie's place.
engSearchText: Cao joined as a guest in Fie's place.
jpnChrName: フィーがゲストから抜け、 ツァオが一時的に加入しました。
jpnSearchText:
フィーがゲストから抜け、
ツァオが一時的に加入しました。

engChrName: Cao joined as a guest in Kincaid's place.
engSearchText: Cao joined as a guest in Kincaid's place.
jpnChrName: キンケイドがゲストから抜け、 ツァオが一時的に加入しました。
jpnSearchText:
キンケイドがゲストから抜け、
ツァオが一時的に加入しました。

engChrName: Cao joined as a guest in Fie's place.
engSearchText: Cao joined as a guest in Fie's place.
jpnChrName: フィーがゲストから抜け、 ツァオが一時的に加入しました。
jpnSearchText:
フィーがゲストから抜け、
ツァオが一時的に加入しました。

engChrName: Cao joined as a guest in Kincaid's place.
engSearchText: Cao joined as a guest in Kincaid's place.
jpnChrName: キンケイドがゲストから抜け、 ツァオが一時的に加入しました。
jpnSearchText:
キンケイドがゲストから抜け、
ツァオが一時的に加入しました。

engChrName: To advance the main story, inspect the car and select the next destination.
engSearchText:
To advance the main story, inspect the car and select
the next destination.
jpnChrName: ストーリーを進める場合、 車を調べて新たな行き先を選んで下さい。
jpnSearchText:
ストーリーを進める場合、
車を調べて新たな行き先を選んで下さい。

engChrName: If I may, a word about your plan to travel north through the center of the city.
engSearchText:
If I may, a word about your plan to travel north
through the center of the city.
jpnChrName: ──ああ、ちなみに首都の 中心部から北側についてですが……
jpnSearchText:
──ああ、ちなみに首都の
中心部から北側についてですが……

engChrName: There was heavy traffic on the capital expressway when the crisis struck, so I fear that route may be impassable by car.
engSearchText:
There was heavy traffic on the capital expressway
when the crisis struck, so I fear that route
may be impassable by car.
jpnChrName: 異変時に首都高が渋滞していたらしく、 車で向かうのは難しいかもしれません。
jpnSearchText:
異変時に首都高が渋滞していたらしく、
車で向かうのは難しいかもしれません。

engChrName: Bah. Really?
engSearchText: Bah. Really?
jpnChrName: ……！　そうなのか。
jpnSearchText: ……！　そうなのか。

engChrName: Makes sense, but damn, that sucks.
engSearchText: Makes sense, but damn, that sucks.
jpnChrName: チッ……この状況だから 仕方ないっちゃ仕方ねえが。
jpnSearchText:
チッ……この状況だから
仕方ないっちゃ仕方ねえが。

engChrName: We could likely still make the journey if we used back roads and the like, but it would be much slower.
engSearchText:
We could likely still make the journey if we used back
roads and the like, but it would be much slower.
jpnChrName: 裏道なども調べれば 方法もありそうですが……
jpnSearchText:
裏道なども調べれば
方法もありそうですが……

engChrName: Isn't there another route that we could take?
engSearchText: Isn't there another route that we could take?
jpnChrName: な、何とか移動する方法は ないんでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
な、何とか移動する方法は
ないんでしょうか？

engChrName: I was about to suggest one, actually. What say you to taking a detour through the Blacklight District?
engSearchText:
I was about to suggest one, actually. What say you to
taking a detour through the Blacklight District?
jpnChrName: そこで提案ですが── 《黒芒街》を経由するのはどうでしょう？
jpnSearchText:
そこで提案ですが──
《黒芒街》を経由するのはどうでしょう？

engChrName: Not only would it give us a route, but a number of skilled warriors are gathered there. It could give us extra strength going forward.
engSearchText:
Not only would it give us a route, but a number of
skilled warriors are gathered there. It could give us
extra strength going forward.
jpnChrName: かなりの手練れが集まっていたようですし 他の街区に向かう足場にもなるでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
かなりの手練れが集まっていたようですし
他の街区に向かう足場にもなるでしょう。

engChrName: That's not a bad idea, actually.
engSearchText: That's not a bad idea, actually.
jpnChrName: なるほど…… 確かにそいつは手かもしれんな。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど……
確かにそいつは手かもしれんな。

engChrName: I think my master was there, too. It'd be a huge help to have him with us.
engSearchText:
I think my master was there, too. It'd be a huge help
to have him with us.
jpnChrName: 師父（せんせい）もいた筈だし、 合流できたら言うことねえだろう。
jpnSearchText:
師父（せんせい）もいた筈だし、
合流できたら言うことねえだろう。

engChrName: Yeah, he is one damn strong dude.
engSearchText: Yeah, he is one damn strong dude.
jpnChrName: ハッ、確かにあのジジイは心強いな。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、確かにあのジジイは心強いな。

engChrName: We may be able to resupply there as well.
engSearchText: We may be able to resupply there as well.
jpnChrName: それにあの街区なら物資の補給も できるかもしれません。
jpnSearchText:
それにあの街区なら物資の補給も
できるかもしれません。

engChrName: All right. Best way to the Blacklight District from here is that secret entrance in Riverside.
engSearchText:
All right. Best way to the Blacklight District from
here is that secret entrance in Riverside.
jpnChrName: よし、黒芒街に行くなら リバーサイドの“裏口”に向かうぞ。
jpnSearchText:
よし、黒芒街に行くなら
リバーサイドの“裏口”に向かうぞ。

engChrName: But there's no way to be sure the route there'll be safe, so better make sure we're prepared before headin' off.
engSearchText:
But there's no way to be sure the route there'll be safe,
so better make sure we're prepared before headin' off.
jpnChrName: 道中で何があるか分からねぇ。 準備も万全にしておくか。
jpnSearchText:
道中で何があるか分からねぇ。
準備も万全にしておくか。

engChrName: Roger that!
engSearchText: Roger that!
jpnChrName: はいっ！
jpnSearchText: はいっ！

engChrName: Then let us be off.
engSearchText: Then let us be off.
jpnChrName: フフ、それでは参りましょうか。
jpnSearchText: フフ、それでは参りましょうか。

engChrName: To advance the main story, go to the underground entrance in the northern part of Riverside.
engSearchText:
To advance the main story, go to the underground
entrance in the northern part of Riverside.
jpnChrName: ストーリーを進める場合、リバーサイド北の 一角にある地下道への入口へ向かって下さい。
jpnSearchText:
ストーリーを進める場合、リバーサイド北の
一角にある地下道への入口へ向かって下さい。

engChrName: (Hmm... Now where should we go next?)
engSearchText: (Hmm... Now where should we go next?)
jpnChrName: （さて、どこに向かうか……）
jpnSearchText: （さて、どこに向かうか……）

engChrName: Once a district has been selected, the others will be temporarily unavailable.
engSearchText:
Once a district has been selected, the others will be
temporarily unavailable.
jpnChrName: 一度行き先を選択するとしばらくの間、 他のエリアに行くことは出来ません。
jpnSearchText:
一度行き先を選択するとしばらくの間、
他のエリアに行くことは出来ません。

engChrName: (Ferida was the one stationed in this district. I'm guessin' she's still there, too.)
engSearchText:
(Ferida was the one stationed in this district.
I'm guessin' she's still there, too.)
jpnChrName: （ここの担当はフェリだったか……   多分持ち場は離れていない筈だ。）
jpnSearchText:
（ここの担当はフェリだったか……
多分持ち場は離れていない筈だ。）

engChrName: (Time to go find her!)
engSearchText: (Time to go find her!)
jpnChrName: （何としても見つけて合流するぞ！）
jpnSearchText: （何としても見つけて合流するぞ！）

engChrName: (Aaron was the one stationed in this district. I'm guessin' he's still there, too.)
engSearchText:
(Aaron was the one stationed in this district.
I'm guessin' he's still there, too.)
jpnChrName: （ここの担当はアーロンだったか……   多分持ち場は離れていない筈だ。）
jpnSearchText:
（ここの担当はアーロンだったか……
多分持ち場は離れていない筈だ。）

engChrName: (Time to go find him!)
engSearchText: (Time to go find him!)
jpnChrName: （何としても見つけて合流するぞ！）
jpnSearchText: （何としても見つけて合流するぞ！）

engChrName: December 24th, 1208, 4:53PM
engSearchText: December 24th, 1208, 4:53PM

engChrName: Well, guess this is it, huh?
engSearchText: Well, guess this is it, huh?
jpnChrName: ──そんじゃ、 色々世話になっちまったな。
jpnSearchText:
──そんじゃ、
色々世話になっちまったな。

engChrName: Clean up after all that took longer than I expected, but glad I still had you all around to help out.
engSearchText:
Clean up after all that took longer than I expected,
but glad I still had you all around to help out.
jpnChrName: まさかあそこまで尾を引くとは 思わなかったからよ。
jpnSearchText:
まさかあそこまで尾を引くとは
思わなかったからよ。

engChrName: Don't even mention it!
engSearchText: Don't even mention it!
jpnChrName: ううんっ、とんでもないです！
jpnSearchText: ううんっ、とんでもないです！

engChrName: Juggling the work with my Sunday School exams was hard but also really fun!
engSearchText:
Juggling the work with my Sunday School exams was
hard but also really fun!
jpnChrName: 日曜学校の試験もあって大変でしたけど…… ホント楽しかったですっ！
jpnSearchText:
日曜学校の試験もあって大変でしたけど……
ホント楽しかったですっ！

engChrName: *sigh* I still can't believe Almata made such a mess of the orbal network...
engSearchText:
*sigh* I still can't believe Almata made such a mess of
the orbal network...
jpnChrName: ふう、アルマータが導力ネットに あんなヤバイのを仕込んでたとはね……
jpnSearchText:
ふう、アルマータが導力ネットに
あんなヤバイのを仕込んでたとはね……

engChrName: You know it's bad when it takes Professor Hamilton and the others half a month to repair it.
engSearchText:
You know it's bad when it takes Professor Hamilton
and the others half a month to repair it.
jpnChrName: おかげで博士たちも半月拘束されてたし。
jpnSearchText: おかげで博士たちも半月拘束されてたし。

engChrName: Figures, though. Turns out that one of Heiyue's elders was supporting Almata's plan.
engSearchText:
Figures, though. Turns out that one of Heiyue's
elders was supporting Almata's plan.
jpnChrName: ハン、黒月周りもだな。 長老の一人が繋がってやがったとは。
jpnSearchText:
ハン、黒月周りもだな。
長老の一人が繋がってやがったとは。

engChrName: Explains why Cao and Gien showed up here in Edith all of a sudden, though.
engSearchText:
Explains why Cao and Gien showed up here in Edith
all of a sudden, though.
jpnChrName: 道理でツァオとギエン爺さんが 首都に来てたわけだ。
jpnSearchText:
道理でツァオとギエン爺さんが
首都に来てたわけだ。

engChrName: Wrenches in the gears aside, you all did great.
engSearchText: Wrenches in the gears aside, you all did great.
jpnChrName: ……ま、それぞれご苦労だった。
jpnSearchText: ……ま、それぞれご苦労だった。

engChrName: 'Specially you, Risette. If Marduk hadn't loaned you over, I dunno what we would've done.
engSearchText:
'Specially you, Risette. If Marduk hadn't loaned you
over, I dunno what we would've done.
jpnChrName: リゼットは出向、お疲れさんだった。 ──本当に助けられちまったな。
