engChrName: So just stick with me. And keep your eyes peeled for trouble.
engSearchText:
So just stick with me. And keep your eyes peeled
for trouble.
jpnChrName: だがまあ、俺について来ればわかるだろ。 そんで一応周囲への警戒は怠らねえようにな。
jpnSearchText:
だがまあ、俺について来ればわかるだろ。
そんで一応周囲への警戒は怠らねえようにな。

engChrName: Understood!
engSearchText: Understood!
jpnChrName: はい、分かりました。
jpnSearchText: はい、分かりました。

engChrName: (We thankfully managed to avoid getting searched by Nate...)
engSearchText:
(We thankfully managed to avoid getting searched
by Nate...)
jpnChrName: （そういえば、はぐらかされてしまいましたけど……）
jpnSearchText: （そういえば、はぐらかされてしまいましたけど……）

engChrName: (But I can't deny I'm rather curious myself about what's in the case.)
engSearchText:
(But I can't deny I'm rather curious myself about
what's in the case.)
jpnChrName: （結局あのアタッシュケースの中身は   何なんでしょうか……？）
jpnSearchText:
（結局あのアタッシュケースの中身は
何なんでしょうか……？）

engChrName: Could you guys be...?
engSearchText: Could you guys be...?
jpnChrName: 貴方がたは、もしかして……？
jpnSearchText: 貴方がたは、もしかして……？

engChrName: We're from Arkride Solutions.
engSearchText: We're from Arkride Solutions.
jpnChrName: ああ《アークライド解決事務所》のモンだ。
jpnSearchText: ああ《アークライド解決事務所》のモンだ。

engChrName: You're Roderick, I take it?
engSearchText: You're Roderick, I take it?
jpnChrName: アンタがロデリックで間違いねえか？
jpnSearchText: アンタがロデリックで間違いねえか？

engChrName: That's right.
engSearchText: That's right.
jpnChrName: ええ──ロデリックと申します。
jpnSearchText: ええ──ロデリックと申します。

engChrName: I'm the only survivor of the terrorist attack you've been investigating, though I was only a kid at the time.
engSearchText:
I'm the only survivor of the terrorist attack you've
been investigating, though I was only a kid at
the time.
jpnChrName: 私があの事件の唯一の生き残り。 当時、子どもだった男です。
jpnSearchText:
私があの事件の唯一の生き残り。
当時、子どもだった男です。

engChrName: Let me start by giving you this locket back, then.
engSearchText: Let me start by giving you this locket back, then.
jpnChrName: まずは、このロケットをアンタに返さねえとな。
jpnSearchText: まずは、このロケットをアンタに返さねえとな。

engChrName: Van handed the locket over to Roderick.
engSearchText: Van handed the locket over to Roderick.
jpnChrName: ヴァンはロケットをロデリックに渡した。
jpnSearchText: <C1>ヴァンはロケットをロデリックに渡した。

engChrName: Thank you very much. I'll be sure to treasure it.
engSearchText: Thank you very much. I'll be sure to treasure it.
jpnChrName: ありがとうございます。 ……大事な宝物になりそうです。
jpnSearchText:
ありがとうございます。
……大事な宝物になりそうです。

engChrName: I take it you're the one that had it this whole time?
engSearchText: I take it you're the one that had it this whole time?
jpnChrName: そして……こちらの方が 例のロケットの持ち主ですか？
jpnSearchText:
そして……こちらの方が
例のロケットの持ち主ですか？

engChrName: Yeah. His name's Bruno.
engSearchText: Yeah. His name's Bruno.
jpnChrName: ああ、ブルーノっつう爺さんだ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、ブルーノっつう爺さんだ。

engChrName: He's the man who stole it from the hotel you were staying at twenty years ago.
engSearchText:
He's the man who stole it from the hotel you were
staying at twenty years ago.
jpnChrName: ２０年前、アンタの泊ってたホテルから ロケットを盗んだ張本人だとよ。
jpnSearchText:
２０年前、アンタの泊ってたホテルから
ロケットを盗んだ張本人だとよ。

engChrName: Then you're the thief who just so happened to target our room the same day those terrorists came for us...
engSearchText:
Then you're the thief who just so happened to target
our room the same day those terrorists came for us...
jpnChrName: あの日……偶然居合わせた泥棒は 貴方だったんですね。
jpnSearchText:
あの日……偶然居合わせた泥棒は
貴方だったんですね。

engChrName: Heard you told the police that you didn't remember anything at the time.
engSearchText:
Heard you told the police that you didn't remember
anything at the time.
jpnChrName: 警察には当時の記憶がねえと 証言してたそうだが……
jpnSearchText:
警察には当時の記憶がねえと
証言してたそうだが……

engChrName: I thought you'd have forgotten me.
engSearchText: I thought you'd have forgotten me.
jpnChrName: 俺の事を覚えてやがるのか。
jpnSearchText: 俺の事を覚えてやがるのか。

engChrName: Oh, I would never forget you.
engSearchText: Oh, I would never forget you.
jpnChrName: ええ、勿論。 忘れられるはずもないじゃないですか。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、勿論。
忘れられるはずもないじゃないですか。

engChrName: Then why did you cover for me?!
engSearchText: Then why did you cover for me?!
jpnChrName: ────！ それならどうして警察に俺の事をッ！
jpnSearchText:
────！
それならどうして警察に俺の事をッ！

engChrName: ...No. I suppose it doesn't matter at this point.
engSearchText: ...No. I suppose it doesn't matter at this point.
jpnChrName: ……いや、それは今更か。
jpnSearchText: ……いや、それは今更か。

engChrName: I'm... I'm sorry. I may not have been the man that killed your parents, but I still let 'em die.
engSearchText:
I'm... I'm sorry. I may not have been the man that
killed your parents, but I still let 'em die.
jpnChrName: ……あの時は……悪かったな。 俺はアンタの両親を見殺しにしたも同然だ。
jpnSearchText:
……あの時は……悪かったな。
俺はアンタの両親を見殺しにしたも同然だ。

engChrName: If you want revenge, I'll take it. You can even turn me in to the cops if you want. I won't resist.
engSearchText:
If you want revenge, I'll take it. You can even turn me
in to the cops if you want. I won't resist.
jpnChrName: 俺の事を煮ても焼いても文句は言わねえよ。 今から警察署に行くってんならそれに従うぜ。
jpnSearchText:
俺の事を煮ても焼いても文句は言わねえよ。
今から警察署に行くってんならそれに従うぜ。

engChrName: Bruno...
engSearchText: Bruno...
jpnChrName: ブルーノさん……
jpnSearchText: ブルーノさん……

engChrName: ...Bruno.
engSearchText: ...Bruno.
jpnChrName: ……ブルーノさん。
jpnSearchText: ……ブルーノさん。

engChrName: For twenty years, I've wanted to meet you. For twenty years, I wanted to say something to you.
engSearchText:
For twenty years, I've wanted to meet you. For twenty
years, I wanted to say something to you.
jpnChrName: 僕は２０年前から、こうして お会いして話したい事があったんです。
jpnSearchText:
僕は２０年前から、こうして
お会いして話したい事があったんです。

engChrName: Thank you. Thank you for saving my life.
engSearchText: Thank you. Thank you for saving my life.
jpnChrName: ──あの時は、僕を助けてくれて ありがとうございました。
jpnSearchText:
──あの時は、僕を助けてくれて
ありがとうございました。

engChrName: Wh-What?!
engSearchText: Wh-What?!
jpnChrName: な、なんだと……！？
jpnSearchText: な、なんだと……！？

engChrName: When I woke up that night, the first thing I saw was two men standing by my parents' bed.
engSearchText:
When I woke up that night, the first thing I saw was
two men standing by my parents' bed.
jpnChrName: あの日──夜中に目が覚めると 両親のベッドの側に男が２人立っていました。
jpnSearchText:
あの日──夜中に目が覚めると
両親のベッドの側に男が２人立っていました。

engChrName: Both of them drenched in blood. It was too late for my parents. I was so scared that I couldn't move.
engSearchText:
Both of them drenched in blood. It was too late for
my parents. I was so scared that I couldn't move.
jpnChrName: その時にはもう……両親は血に濡れていて。 僕は怖くて動けずにいたんです。
jpnSearchText:
その時にはもう……両親は血に濡れていて。
僕は怖くて動けずにいたんです。

engChrName: It would've been too late for me, too, if you hadn't appeared then.
engSearchText:
It would've been too late for me, too, if you hadn't
appeared then.
jpnChrName: でも、そこに現れたのが ブルーノさん……貴方でした。
jpnSearchText:
でも、そこに現れたのが
ブルーノさん……貴方でした。

engChrName: You didn't hesitate. You looked me in the eyes and immediately took my hand and led me out of the room.
engSearchText:
You didn't hesitate. You looked me in the eyes and
immediately took my hand and led me out of
the room.
jpnChrName: 僕と目が合うと、手を掴んで こっそり部屋から連れ出してくれましたよね。
jpnSearchText:
僕と目が合うと、手を掴んで
こっそり部屋から連れ出してくれましたよね。

engChrName: I'll admit I noticed you pocketing Mom's locket as you did.
engSearchText:
I'll admit I noticed you pocketing Mom's locket as
you did.
jpnChrName: その途中で、落ちていた母のロケットを ポケットに入れてましたけど……
jpnSearchText:
その途中で、落ちていた母のロケットを
ポケットに入れてましたけど……

engChrName: (I guess he wasn't willing to pass up on the opportunity.)
engSearchText:
(I guess he wasn't willing to pass up on
the opportunity.)
jpnChrName: （そこは抜け目ないんですね……）
jpnSearchText: （そこは抜け目ないんですね……）

engChrName: (He was still a thief at the end of the day...)
engSearchText: (He was still a thief at the end of the day...)
jpnChrName: （そこはちゃっかりしてるんですね……）
jpnSearchText: （そこはちゃっかりしてるんですね……）

engChrName: (Heh. Came to loot the place and wasn't gonna leave empty handed, huh?)
engSearchText:
(Heh. Came to loot the place and wasn't gonna leave
empty handed, huh?)
jpnChrName: （ハッ、盗みに来たからには   タダじゃ帰れなかったってか。）
jpnSearchText:
（ハッ、盗みに来たからには
タダじゃ帰れなかったってか。）

engChrName: But you still saved my life. You told me not to tell anyone about you after you left, and I listened. You were my hero. Still are.
engSearchText:
But you still saved my life. You told me not to tell
anyone about you after you left, and I listened.
You were my hero. Still are.
jpnChrName: そんな命の恩人の──僕のヒーローが、 別れ際に『俺のことは黙ってろ』と言ったんです。
jpnSearchText:
そんな命の恩人の──僕のヒーローが、
別れ際に『俺のことは黙ってろ』と言ったんです。

engChrName: That's why I never told the police or my relatives about you. You've been my secret this whole time.
engSearchText:
That's why I never told the police or my relatives
about you. You've been my secret this whole time.
jpnChrName: だから警察にも親戚にも言わず…… 今日この日まで胸に仕舞っていたんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
だから警察にも親戚にも言わず……
今日この日まで胸に仕舞っていたんですよ。

engChrName: Tough nut to crack, huh?
engSearchText: Tough nut to crack, huh?
jpnChrName: 義理がてえのも考えモンだな、爺さんよ。
jpnSearchText: 義理がてえのも考えモンだな、爺さんよ。

engChrName: You... You idiot! I'm no hero!
engSearchText: You... You idiot! I'm no hero!
jpnChrName: ……ッ、馬鹿野郎！ 俺なんかがヒーローな訳ねえだろうが……ッ！
jpnSearchText:
……ッ、馬鹿野郎！
俺なんかがヒーローな訳ねえだろうが……ッ！

engChrName: I just didn't think I was gonna chance on a murder scene and I led you away without even thinking about it!
engSearchText:
I just didn't think I was gonna chance on a murder
scene and I led you away without even thinking
about it!
jpnChrName: 殺しの現場だったとは思わなくて、 つい連れ出しちまっただけなのに……
jpnSearchText:
殺しの現場だったとは思わなくて、
つい連れ出しちまっただけなのに……

engChrName: Then you had to go and thank me after that... You sounded so pitiful...
engSearchText:
Then you had to go and thank me after that...
You sounded so pitiful...
jpnChrName: あの時……お前が消えちまいそうな声で 『ありがとう』なんて言うから……
jpnSearchText:
あの時……お前が消えちまいそうな声で
『ありがとう』なんて言うから……

engChrName: That one thing's continued to haunt me all these years!
engSearchText:
That one thing's continued to haunt me all
these years!
jpnChrName: それからずっと、お前の言葉が耳に残って 邪魔で仕方なかったんだよ……！
jpnSearchText:
それからずっと、お前の言葉が耳に残って
邪魔で仕方なかったんだよ……！

engChrName: So I started making more and more mistakes, until I finally gave up thieving!
engSearchText:
So I started making more and more mistakes, until I
finally gave up thieving!
jpnChrName: だから下手を打つ事が増えちまって…… 引退するハメになっちまったんだ……！
jpnSearchText:
だから下手を打つ事が増えちまって……
引退するハメになっちまったんだ……！

engChrName: Really? I'm...very sorry about that.
engSearchText: Really? I'm...very sorry about that.
jpnChrName: それは……申し訳ありませんでした。
jpnSearchText: それは……申し訳ありませんでした。

engChrName: Bah! Get that smile off your face!
engSearchText: Bah! Get that smile off your face!
jpnChrName: チッ、笑ってんじゃねえ！
jpnSearchText: チッ、笑ってんじゃねえ！

engChrName: But...I guess that means it's thanks to you that I was able to change.
engSearchText:
But...I guess that means it's thanks to you that I was
able to change.
jpnChrName: だがまあ……アンタのおかげで俺も変われた。
jpnSearchText: だがまあ……アンタのおかげで俺も変われた。

engChrName: I should be thanking you, not the other way around.
engSearchText: I should be thanking you, not the other way around.
jpnChrName: 感謝しなきゃいけねえのは、俺の方だな。
jpnSearchText: 感謝しなきゃいけねえのは、俺の方だな。

engChrName: Haha... It makes me genuinely happy to hear I was able to do something for you after everything you did for me.
engSearchText:
Haha... It makes me genuinely happy to hear I was
able to do something for you after everything you did
for me.
jpnChrName: はは……僕も命の恩人の 力になれていたなら嬉しいですよ。
jpnSearchText:
はは……僕も命の恩人の
力になれていたなら嬉しいですよ。

engChrName: You sure are a piece of work, old man.
engSearchText: You sure are a piece of work, old man.
jpnChrName: やれやれ、世話の焼ける爺さんだぜ。
jpnSearchText: やれやれ、世話の焼ける爺さんだぜ。

engChrName: Still, it sounds like this was a happy ending for everyone.
engSearchText:
Still, it sounds like this was a happy ending
for everyone.
jpnChrName: これで一件落着ですね。
jpnSearchText: これで一件落着ですね。

engChrName: But that wraps that job up!
engSearchText: But that wraps that job up!
jpnChrName: でも、これで一件落着ですよね。
jpnSearchText: でも、これで一件落着ですよね。

engChrName: Man, that was corny as hell. But I guess it's not that bad to see that from time to time.
engSearchText:
Man, that was corny as hell. But I guess it's not that
bad to see that from time to time.
jpnChrName: とんだ茶番劇だったが…… ま、たまにはいいかもな。
jpnSearchText:
とんだ茶番劇だったが……
ま、たまにはいいかもな。

engChrName: The party kept Bruno and Roderick company as the two of them talked for a while longer.
engSearchText:
The party kept Bruno and Roderick company as the
two of them talked for a while longer.
jpnChrName: その後、ヴァン達はブルーノ老人と ロデリックの語らいをしばし見守り……
jpnSearchText:
その後、ヴァン達はブルーノ老人と
ロデリックの語らいをしばし見守り……

engChrName: Eventually, they saw Roderick off, who—as much as he wished he could stay—was forced to leave for a business meeting.
engSearchText:
Eventually, they saw Roderick off, who—as much as
he wished he could stay—was forced to leave for a
business meeting.
jpnChrName: この後商談が入っているため、 惜しみつつも立ち去るロデリックを見送ったのだった。
jpnSearchText:
この後商談が入っているため、
惜しみつつも立ち去るロデリックを見送ったのだった。

engChrName: Well, I'm gonna head off.
engSearchText: Well, I'm gonna head off.
jpnChrName: ……それじゃ俺も行かせてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText: ……それじゃ俺も行かせてもらうぜ。

engChrName: I'll make sure to wire you your money later.
engSearchText: I'll make sure to wire you your money later.
jpnChrName: 依頼料はきっちり振り込んでおいてやる。
jpnSearchText: 依頼料はきっちり振り込んでおいてやる。

engChrName: Cheers.
engSearchText: Cheers.
jpnChrName: ああ、頼んだぜ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、頼んだぜ。

engChrName: Uhh... Listen, this is all thanks to you guys...
engSearchText: Uhh... Listen, this is all thanks to you guys...
jpnChrName: その……なんだ。 お前達のおかげで…………
jpnSearchText:
その……なんだ。
お前達のおかげで…………

engChrName: What's that? Can you say that again?
engSearchText: What's that? Can you say that again?
jpnChrName: え、何だって？ 声が小さくて聞こえねえよ。
jpnSearchText:
え、何だって？
声が小さくて聞こえねえよ。

engChrName: Bah! Forget it! See ya!
engSearchText: Bah! Forget it! See ya!
jpnChrName: チッ、うるせえ！ それじゃあな！
jpnSearchText:
チッ、うるせえ！
それじゃあな！

engChrName: Heehee. He's not one for being honest with his feelings, is he?
engSearchText:
Heehee. He's not one for being honest with his
feelings, is he?
jpnChrName: ふふっ、素直じゃないですね。
jpnSearchText: ふふっ、素直じゃないですね。

engChrName: Not everyone can be honest with themselves!
engSearchText: Not everyone can be honest with themselves!
jpnChrName: えへへ、素直じゃないですね。
jpnSearchText: えへへ、素直じゃないですね。

engChrName: Dude needs to learn to speak his heart more.
engSearchText: Dude needs to learn to speak his heart more.
jpnChrName: 素直じゃねえ爺さんだ。
jpnSearchText: 素直じゃねえ爺さんだ。

engChrName: You're right about that one.
engSearchText: You're right about that one.
jpnChrName: ハッ……だな。
jpnSearchText: ハッ……だな。

engChrName: After Bruno departed, Van contacted editor-in-chief Sullivan to update her on what happened.
engSearchText:
After Bruno departed, Van contacted editor-in-chief
Sullivan to update her on what happened.
jpnChrName: その後ヴァンはサリバン編集長に一報を入れると……
jpnSearchText: <C1>その後ヴァンはサリバン編集長に一報を入れると……

engChrName: She concluded that there was no reason to publish what they had learned as there were no threats to the public.
engSearchText:
She concluded that there was no reason to publish
what they had learned as there were no threats to
the public.
jpnChrName: 事件性がないのなら、無駄に騒ぎ立てるような 報道はしないという話を受け……
jpnSearchText:
事件性がないのなら、無駄に騒ぎ立てるような
報道はしないという話を受け……

engChrName: And so it was that, unbeknownst to the world, the story of the former thief and the locket he stole came to a happy end.
engSearchText:
And so it was that, unbeknownst to the world, the story
of the former thief and the locket he stole came to a
happy end.
jpnChrName: 元泥棒とロケットを巡る一件は 静かに幕を閉じたのだった。
jpnSearchText:
元泥棒とロケットを巡る一件は
静かに幕を閉じたのだった。

engChrName: Quest Change of Heart completed!
engSearchText: Quest Change of Heart completed!
jpnChrName: クエスト【とあるブツの返却】を達成した！
jpnSearchText: <C1>クエスト【<C2>とあるブツの返却<C1>】を達成した！

engChrName: Received
engSearchText: Received
jpnChrName: 報酬としてミラの振り込みを確認した。
jpnSearchText: 報酬として<C2><C0>ミラの振り込みを確認した。

engChrName: Could you guys be...?
engSearchText: Could you guys be...?
jpnChrName: 貴方がたは、もしかして……？
jpnSearchText: 貴方がたは、もしかして……？

engChrName: We're from Arkride Solutions.
engSearchText: We're from Arkride Solutions.
jpnChrName: ああ《アークライド解決事務所》のモンだ。
jpnSearchText: ああ《アークライド解決事務所》のモンだ。

engChrName: You're Roderick, I take it?
engSearchText: You're Roderick, I take it?
jpnChrName: アンタがロデリックで間違いねえか？
jpnSearchText: アンタがロデリックで間違いねえか？

engChrName: That's right.
engSearchText: That's right.
jpnChrName: ええ──ロデリックと申します。
jpnSearchText: ええ──ロデリックと申します。

engChrName: I'm the only survivor of the terrorist attack you've been investigating, though I was only a kid at the time.
engSearchText:
I'm the only survivor of the terrorist attack you've
been investigating, though I was only a kid at
the time.
jpnChrName: 私があの事件の唯一の生き残り。 当時、子どもだった男です。
jpnSearchText:
私があの事件の唯一の生き残り。
当時、子どもだった男です。

engChrName: Let me start by giving you this locket back, then.
engSearchText: Let me start by giving you this locket back, then.
jpnChrName: まずは、このロケットをアンタに返さねえとな。
jpnSearchText: まずは、このロケットをアンタに返さねえとな。

engChrName: Van handed the locket over to Roderick.
engSearchText: Van handed the locket over to Roderick.
jpnChrName: ヴァンはロケットをロデリックに渡した。
jpnSearchText: <C1>ヴァンはロケットをロデリックに渡した。

engChrName: Thank you very much. I'll be sure to treasure it.
engSearchText: Thank you very much. I'll be sure to treasure it.
jpnChrName: ありがとうございます。 ……大事な宝物になりそうです。
jpnSearchText:
ありがとうございます。
……大事な宝物になりそうです。

engChrName: I take it you're the one that had it this whole time?
engSearchText: I take it you're the one that had it this whole time?
jpnChrName: そして……こちらの方が 例のロケットの持ち主ですか？
jpnSearchText:
そして……こちらの方が
例のロケットの持ち主ですか？

engChrName: Yeah. His name's Bruno.
engSearchText: Yeah. His name's Bruno.
jpnChrName: ああ、ブルーノっつう爺さんだ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、ブルーノっつう爺さんだ。

engChrName: He bought it on the black market, and has been tryin' to get it back to its rightful owner.
engSearchText:
He bought it on the black market, and has been tryin'
to get it back to its rightful owner.
jpnChrName: 爺さんはロケットを闇市で買って 写真の人物に返してやろうと思ったらしくてな。
jpnSearchText:
爺さんはロケットを闇市で買って
写真の人物に返してやろうと思ったらしくてな。

engChrName: Don't go gettin' the wrong idea. He didn't actually steal it from you.
engSearchText:
Don't go gettin' the wrong idea. He didn't actually
steal it from you.
jpnChrName: ロケット泥棒の本人ではねえから 誤解しないでやってくれ。
jpnSearchText:
ロケット泥棒の本人ではねえから
誤解しないでやってくれ。

engChrName: I...see... That's a shame.
engSearchText: I...see... That's a shame.
jpnChrName: そう、でしたか……それは残念ですね。
jpnSearchText: そう、でしたか……それは残念ですね。

engChrName: What do you mean?
engSearchText: What do you mean?
jpnChrName: ……残念っつうのはどういう意味だ？
jpnSearchText: ……残念っつうのはどういう意味だ？

engChrName: I've been wanting to meet the man who stole it for twenty years now, so that I could thank him.
engSearchText:
I've been wanting to meet the man who stole it for
twenty years now, so that I could thank him.
jpnChrName: もしあの泥棒の方とお会いできたら…… お礼を伝えたかったんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
もしあの泥棒の方とお会いできたら……
お礼を伝えたかったんですよ。

engChrName: Th-Thank him?!
engSearchText: Th-Thank him?!
jpnChrName: お、お礼だと！？
jpnSearchText: お、お礼だと！？

engChrName: Why the hell would you wanna thank the thief that took advantage of you in the middle of a terrorist attack?!
engSearchText:
Why the hell would you wanna thank the thief that
took advantage of you in the middle of a
terrorist attack?!
jpnChrName: ヤツはテロリストがいる中でも 盗みを働いたクソ野郎なんだろ！？
jpnSearchText:
ヤツはテロリストがいる中でも
盗みを働いたクソ野郎なんだろ！？

engChrName: Haha. I'm not gonna deny that that's what he did.
engSearchText: Haha. I'm not gonna deny that that's what he did.
jpnChrName: はは……それはそうなんですけど。
jpnSearchText: はは……それはそうなんですけど。

engChrName: But he also saved my life. He's a hero to me.
engSearchText: But he also saved my life. He's a hero to me.
jpnChrName: 彼は僕を助けてくれた命の恩人── ヒーローみたいな存在なんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
彼は僕を助けてくれた命の恩人──
ヒーローみたいな存在なんですよ。

engChrName: Never heard someone call a thief their hero, but I guess there's a first time for everything.
engSearchText:
Never heard someone call a thief their hero, but I
guess there's a first time for everything.
jpnChrName: コソ泥がヒーローねえ……
jpnSearchText: コソ泥がヒーローねえ……

engChrName: When I woke up that night, the first thing I saw was two men standing by my parents' bed.
engSearchText:
When I woke up that night, the first thing I saw was
two men standing by my parents' bed.
jpnChrName: あの日──夜中に目が覚めると 両親のベッドの側に男が２人立っていました。
jpnSearchText:
あの日──夜中に目が覚めると
両親のベッドの側に男が２人立っていました。

engChrName: Both of them drenched in blood. It was too late for my parents. I was so scared that I couldn't move.
engSearchText:
Both of them drenched in blood. It was too late for
my parents. I was so scared that I couldn't move.
jpnChrName: その時にはもう……両親は血に濡れていて。 僕は怖くて動けずにいたんです。
jpnSearchText:
その時にはもう……両親は血に濡れていて。
僕は怖くて動けずにいたんです。

engChrName: And that's when this old man showed up. A thief, really.
engSearchText:
And that's when this old man showed up. A
thief, really.
jpnChrName: でも、そこに現れたのが 年配の泥棒の男でした。
jpnSearchText:
でも、そこに現れたのが
年配の泥棒の男でした。

engChrName: As soon as our eyes met, he took my hand and led me out of the room. No hesitation.
engSearchText:
As soon as our eyes met, he took my hand and led me
out of the room. No hesitation.
jpnChrName: 僕と目が合うと、手を掴んで こっそり部屋から連れ出してくれたんです。
jpnSearchText:
僕と目が合うと、手を掴んで
こっそり部屋から連れ出してくれたんです。

engChrName: I'll admit that I noticed him pocketing Mom's locket as we ran.
engSearchText:
I'll admit that I noticed him pocketing Mom's locket
as we ran.
jpnChrName: その途中で、落ちていた母のロケットを ポケットに入れてましたけど……
jpnSearchText:
その途中で、落ちていた母のロケットを
ポケットに入れてましたけど……

engChrName: (I guess he wasn't willing to pass up on the opportunity.)
engSearchText:
(I guess he wasn't willing to pass up on
the opportunity.)
jpnChrName: （そこは抜け目ないんですね……）
jpnSearchText: （そこは抜け目ないんですね……）

engChrName: (He was still a thief at the end of the day...)
engSearchText: (He was still a thief at the end of the day...)
jpnChrName: （そこはちゃっかりしてるんですね……）
jpnSearchText: （そこはちゃっかりしてるんですね……）

engChrName: (Heh. Came to loot the place and wasn't gonna leave empty handed, huh?)
engSearchText:
(Heh. Came to loot the place and wasn't gonna leave
empty handed, huh?)
jpnChrName: （ハッ、盗みに来たからには   タダじゃ帰れなかったってか。）
jpnSearchText:
（ハッ、盗みに来たからには
タダじゃ帰れなかったってか。）

engChrName: But he still saved my life. Regardless of everything, he's my hero. And, when he left, he asked me not to tell anyone about him.
engSearchText:
But he still saved my life. Regardless of everything,
he's my hero. And, when he left, he asked me not to
tell anyone about him.
jpnChrName: そんな命の恩人が 別れ際に『俺のことは黙ってろ』と言ったんです。
jpnSearchText:
そんな命の恩人が
別れ際に『俺のことは黙ってろ』と言ったんです。

engChrName: So that's why I never told the police or my relatives about him. He's been my secret this whole time.
engSearchText:
So that's why I never told the police or my relatives
about him. He's been my secret this whole time.
jpnChrName: だから警察にも親戚にも言わず…… 今日この日まで胸に仕舞っていたんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
だから警察にも親戚にも言わず……
今日この日まで胸に仕舞っていたんですよ。

engChrName: Gotta give it to you, man. You're loyal. Even to the man who stole your things.
engSearchText:
Gotta give it to you, man. You're loyal. Even to the
man who stole your things.
jpnChrName: なるほど……義理がてえのも考えモンだな。 遺品を盗まれちまってるってのによ。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど……義理がてえのも考えモンだな。
遺品を盗まれちまってるってのによ。

engChrName: To be fair to him, the locket's the only thing he took.
engSearchText: To be fair to him, the locket's the only thing he took.
jpnChrName: はは……結局盗まれたのはロケット一つですしね。
jpnSearchText: はは……結局盗まれたのはロケット一つですしね。

engChrName: Don't be an idiot! 'The only thing he took'?! He shouldn't have taken anything at all! A piece of shit like that has no business being anyone's hero!
engSearchText:
Don't be an idiot! 'The only thing he took'?!
He shouldn't have taken anything at all! A piece of
shit like that has no business being anyone's hero!
jpnChrName: 馬鹿野郎……そんなクソ野郎が ヒーローな訳ねえだろうが……！
jpnSearchText:
馬鹿野郎……そんなクソ野郎が
ヒーローな訳ねえだろうが……！

engChrName: He probably just didn't think he was gonna chance on a murder scene and took you without thinking!
engSearchText:
He probably just didn't think he was gonna chance on
a murder scene and took you without thinking!
jpnChrName: どうせ、殺しの現場だったとは思わなくて、 つい連れ出しちまっただけだろうによ……！
jpnSearchText:
どうせ、殺しの現場だったとは思わなくて、
つい連れ出しちまっただけだろうによ……！

engChrName: You know, maybe you're right. But that doesn't change the fact that he's the only reason I'm still here today.
engSearchText:
You know, maybe you're right. But that doesn't
change the fact that he's the only reason I'm still
here today.
jpnChrName: はは……それでも、 命を助けてもらった事実は変わりませんから。
jpnSearchText:
はは……それでも、
命を助けてもらった事実は変わりませんから。

engChrName: I don't want to ask any more of you, but if you do ever find the man who stole it, could you give him a message from me?
engSearchText:
I don't want to ask any more of you, but if you do
ever find the man who stole it, could you give him a
message from me?
jpnChrName: 万が一、ロケットを闇市に流した人物が 分かったら伝言をお願いします。
jpnSearchText:
万が一、ロケットを闇市に流した人物が
分かったら伝言をお願いします。

engChrName: Tell him, 'Thank you so much. You're still my hero to this very day.'
engSearchText:
Tell him, 'Thank you so much. You're still my hero to
this very day.'
jpnChrName: 貴方は今でも僕のヒーローです、 ありがとうございました……って。
jpnSearchText:
貴方は今でも僕のヒーローです、
ありがとうございました……って。

engChrName: Sure. If we just so happen to run into him.
engSearchText: Sure. If we just so happen to run into him.
jpnChrName: ああ、万が一分かったらな。
jpnSearchText: ああ、万が一分かったらな。

engChrName: I appreciate it. Now... I think I should be going.
engSearchText: I appreciate it. Now... I think I should be going.
jpnChrName: それでは、僕はこの辺りで失礼しますね。
jpnSearchText: それでは、僕はこの辺りで失礼しますね。

engChrName: Thank you again, sir.
engSearchText: Thank you again, sir.
jpnChrName: ありがとうございました、ブルーノさん。
jpnSearchText: ありがとうございました、ブルーノさん。

engChrName: ...I've done nothing to deserve your thanks.
engSearchText: ...I've done nothing to deserve your thanks.
jpnChrName: ……礼なんて言われる筋合いはねえよ。
jpnSearchText: ……礼なんて言われる筋合いはねえよ。

engChrName: ...You sure that was for the best?
engSearchText: ...You sure that was for the best?
jpnChrName: で……これで良かったのか？
jpnSearchText: で……これで良かったのか？

engChrName: Yeah... Yeah, I am.
engSearchText: Yeah... Yeah, I am.
jpnChrName: ああ……勿論だ。
jpnSearchText: ああ……勿論だ。

engChrName: He grew up to be quite different from what I thought he'd be.
engSearchText:
He grew up to be quite different from what I thought
he'd be.
jpnChrName: 思ってたよりも変わった性格を してやがったが……
jpnSearchText:
思ってたよりも変わった性格を
してやがったが……

engChrName: But an upright and honest young man like that shouldn't be bowing his head to criminal scum like me to begin with.
engSearchText:
But an upright and honest young man like that
shouldn't be bowing his head to criminal scum like
me to begin with.
jpnChrName: 真っ当に生きてるヤツが 裏の人間に頭を下げるべきじゃねえしな。
jpnSearchText:
真っ当に生きてるヤツが
裏の人間に頭を下げるべきじゃねえしな。

engChrName: If you say so.
engSearchText: If you say so.
jpnChrName: ハッ、そうかよ。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、そうかよ。

engChrName: I'll be on my way, then.
engSearchText: I'll be on my way, then.
jpnChrName: それじゃ俺も行かせてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText: それじゃ俺も行かせてもらうぜ。

engChrName: I'll make sure to wire you your money later.
engSearchText: I'll make sure to wire you your money later.
jpnChrName: 依頼料はきっちり振り込んでおいてやる。
jpnSearchText: 依頼料はきっちり振り込んでおいてやる。

engChrName: Thanks.
engSearchText: Thanks.
jpnChrName: ああ、よろしく頼んだぜ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、よろしく頼んだぜ。

engChrName: I really owe you for what you did.
engSearchText: I really owe you for what you did.
jpnChrName: 世話になっちまったな、色々と。
jpnSearchText: 世話になっちまったな、色々と。

engChrName: Talk about a difficult old man.
engSearchText: Talk about a difficult old man.
jpnChrName: やれやれ、難儀な爺さんだな。
jpnSearchText: やれやれ、難儀な爺さんだな。

engChrName: Heehee. Still, I suppose this is case closed.
engSearchText: Heehee. Still, I suppose this is case closed.
jpnChrName: ふふ、でもこれで一件落着ですね。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、でもこれで一件落着ですね。

engChrName: But that wraps things up!
engSearchText: But that wraps things up!
jpnChrName: でも、これで一件落着ですよね！
jpnSearchText: でも、これで一件落着ですよね！

engChrName: Hard agree. But, hey, at least the job's done.
engSearchText: Hard agree. But, hey, at least the job's done.
jpnChrName: 全くだぜ。 だがこれで、一件落着ってか。
jpnSearchText:
全くだぜ。
だがこれで、一件落着ってか。

engChrName: After Bruno departed, Van contacted editor-in-chief Sullivan to update her on what happened.
engSearchText:
After Bruno departed, Van contacted editor-in-chief
Sullivan to update her on what happened.
jpnChrName: その後ヴァンはサリバン編集長に一報を入れると……
jpnSearchText: <C1>その後ヴァンはサリバン編集長に一報を入れると……

engChrName: She concluded that there was no reason to publish what they had learned as there were no threats to the public.
engSearchText:
She concluded that there was no reason to publish
what they had learned as there were no threats to
the public.
jpnChrName: 事件性がないのなら、無駄に騒ぎ立てるような 報道はしないという話を受け……
jpnSearchText:
事件性がないのなら、無駄に騒ぎ立てるような
報道はしないという話を受け……

engChrName: And so it was that, unbeknown to the world, the story of the former thief and the locket he stole came to a happy end.
engSearchText:
And so it was that, unbeknown to the world, the story
of the former thief and the locket he stole came to a
happy end.
jpnChrName: 元泥棒とロケットを巡る一件は 静かに幕を閉じたのだった。
jpnSearchText:
元泥棒とロケットを巡る一件は
静かに幕を閉じたのだった。

engChrName: Quest Change of Heart completed!
engSearchText: Quest Change of Heart completed!
jpnChrName: クエスト【とあるブツの返却】を達成した！
jpnSearchText: <C1>クエスト【<C2>とあるブツの返却<C1>】を達成した！

engChrName: Received
engSearchText: Received
jpnChrName: 報酬としてミラの振り込みを確認した。
jpnSearchText: 報酬として<C2><C0>ミラの振り込みを確認した。

engChrName: Are you Stephan? The guy that wrote that request?
engSearchText: Are you Stephan? The guy that wrote that request?
jpnChrName: よう、アンタが依頼をくれたステファンだな。
jpnSearchText: よう、アンタが依頼をくれたステファンだな。

engChrName: We're with Arkride Solutions.
engSearchText: We're with Arkride Solutions.
jpnChrName: 《裏解決屋》をやってる 《アークライド解決事務所》のモンだが。
jpnSearchText:
《裏解決屋》をやってる
《アークライド解決事務所》のモンだが。

engChrName: You really came!
engSearchText: You really came!
jpnChrName: 貴方達があの……！？
jpnSearchText: 貴方達があの……！？

engChrName: Oh, thank goodness. I was worried you wouldn't even see my request.
engSearchText:
Oh, thank goodness. I was worried you wouldn't even
see my request.
jpnChrName: 良かった……僕の依頼、 ちゃんと読んでもらえたんですね。
jpnSearchText:
良かった……僕の依頼、
ちゃんと読んでもらえたんですね。

engChrName: You mentioned worrying about the safety of your father?
engSearchText:
You mentioned worrying about the safety of
your father?
jpnChrName: 依頼内容は、お父様の安否の確認という事でしたね。
jpnSearchText: 依頼内容は、お父様の安否の確認という事でしたね。

engChrName: Yeah. He got himself caught up in a suspicious-sounding new religion.
engSearchText:
Yeah. He got himself caught up in a
suspicious-sounding new religion.
jpnChrName: はい、その……最近僕の父親が 新興宗教にはまってしまったんです。
jpnSearchText:
はい、その……最近僕の父親が
新興宗教にはまってしまったんです。

engChrName: What he chooses to believe is his own choice, of course—but I haven't been able to get in touch with him for some time now.
engSearchText:
What he chooses to believe is his own choice, of
course—but I haven't been able to get in touch with
him for some time now.
jpnChrName: それだけならまだ良いんですけど…… 連絡が全く取れなくなってしまいまして。
jpnSearchText:
それだけならまだ良いんですけど……
連絡が全く取れなくなってしまいまして。

engChrName: That's why I'd like you to try and find out if he's all right or not.
engSearchText:
That's why I'd like you to try and find out if he's all
right or not.
jpnChrName: そこで皆さんに、父の行方を探して 無事かどうか確認してもらいたいんです。
jpnSearchText:
そこで皆さんに、父の行方を探して
無事かどうか確認してもらいたいんです。

engChrName: That's all? Don't want us to try and knock some sense into him?
engSearchText:
That's all? Don't want us to try and knock some sense
into him?
jpnChrName: 無事かどうかの確認だけでいいのか？
jpnSearchText: 無事かどうかの確認だけでいいのか？

engChrName: Feel like that's what most people in your position would try to do.
engSearchText:
Feel like that's what most people in your position
would try to do.
jpnChrName: こういう場合は、 宗教をやめさせたいってのが大半だと思うが。
jpnSearchText:
こういう場合は、
宗教をやめさせたいってのが大半だと思うが。

engChrName: I have mixed feelings on the whole situation, to be honest. That religion in particular.
engSearchText:
I have mixed feelings on the whole situation, to
be honest. That religion in particular.
jpnChrName: 確かに……そうかもしれませんね。 そこに関しては複雑な所なんですけど。
jpnSearchText:
確かに……そうかもしれませんね。
そこに関しては複雑な所なんですけど。

engChrName: It hasn't been ALL bad on us, or him, really.
engSearchText: It hasn't been ALL bad on us, or him, really.
jpnChrName: 父にとっても僕にとっても、 入信して良かった点もありましたから……
jpnSearchText:
父にとっても僕にとっても、
入信して良かった点もありましたから……

engChrName: Have you heard about them? They're called Libra Domina.
engSearchText:
Have you heard about them? They're called
Libra Domina.
jpnChrName: その、皆さんは《リブラ・ドミナ》を知っていますか？
jpnSearchText: その、皆さんは《リブラ・ドミナ》を知っていますか？

engChrName: Never heard of it, no.
engSearchText: Never heard of it, no.
jpnChrName: いや、初めて聞く名前だな。
jpnSearchText: いや、初めて聞く名前だな。

engChrName: Nor have I.
engSearchText: Nor have I.
jpnChrName: 私も聞いた事がありません……
jpnSearchText: 私も聞いた事がありません……

engChrName: Its fundamental beliefs are largely the same as those of the Septian Church. They worship Aidios, for one.
engSearchText:
Its fundamental beliefs are largely the same as those
of the Septian Church. They worship Aidios, for one.
jpnChrName: 基本的な部分は教会と同じで、 女神エイドスを奉じているんですけど。
jpnSearchText:
基本的な部分は教会と同じで、
女神エイドスを奉じているんですけど。

engChrName: But, on top of that, it's also based heavily on the concept of karma—doing good deeds brings rewards, while bad ones do the opposite.
engSearchText:
But, on top of that, it's also based heavily on the
concept of karma—doing good deeds brings rewards,
while bad ones do the opposite.
jpnChrName: 善行には善行が、悪行には悪行が返ってくる、 因果応報の教えが教義となっている宗教なんです。
jpnSearchText:
善行には善行が、悪行には悪行が返ってくる、
因果応報の教えが教義となっている宗教なんです。

engChrName: It doesn't sound so bad to me...
engSearchText: It doesn't sound so bad to me...
jpnChrName: それだけ聞くと、確かに 悪い宗教じゃなさそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
それだけ聞くと、確かに
悪い宗教じゃなさそうですね。

engChrName: Doesn't sound so bad, but what's the catch here?
engSearchText: Doesn't sound so bad, but what's the catch here?
jpnChrName: どうせ裏がありそうなモンだが。 それだけ聞くと確かにマトモな宗教だな。
jpnSearchText:
どうせ裏がありそうなモンだが。
それだけ聞くと確かにマトモな宗教だな。

engChrName: As I said, it's actually done a lot of good for him.
engSearchText: As I said, it's actually done a lot of good for him.
jpnChrName: はい……
jpnSearchText: はい……

engChrName: My father was kind of a terrible person before he joined them, you see.
engSearchText:
My father was kind of a terrible person before he
joined them, you see.
jpnChrName: まず少し前までの父は、 本当にロクでもない人でした──
jpnSearchText:
まず少し前までの父は、
本当にロクでもない人でした──

engChrName: He refused to work, and would just spend all his time either gambling or drinking himself silly.
engSearchText:
He refused to work, and would just spend all his time
either gambling or drinking himself silly.
jpnChrName: 仕事もせずに、毎日ギャンブルで遊び惚けて。 朝から晩まで酒を飲んでいるような人でした。
jpnSearchText:
仕事もせずに、毎日ギャンブルで遊び惚けて。
朝から晩まで酒を飲んでいるような人でした。

engChrName: Mom got tired of it, and they eventually divorced. I didn't see him after that. Well, not until recently...
engSearchText:
Mom got tired of it, and they eventually divorced.
I didn't see him after that. Well, not until recently...
jpnChrName: そしてついに母と離婚したんですけど。 その後、僕が様子を見に行ったら……
jpnSearchText:
そしてついに母と離婚したんですけど。
その後、僕が様子を見に行ったら……

engChrName: When I finally met him again, it was like he was a totally different person. A friend of his apparently recommended he join the church, which he did.
engSearchText:
When I finally met him again, it was like he was a
totally different person. A friend of his apparently
recommended he join the church, which he did.
jpnChrName: 父の友人の紹介で入会したようで── 心を改めたのか、人が変わっていたんです。
jpnSearchText:
父の友人の紹介で入会したようで──
心を改めたのか、人が変わっていたんです。

engChrName: And the church put him back on the right track.
engSearchText: And the church put him back on the right track.
jpnChrName: ほお、つまりだらしない父親から マトモな父親になってたって訳か。
jpnSearchText:
ほお、つまりだらしない父親から
マトモな父親になってたって訳か。

engChrName: Pretty much. He became a really hard worker and dropped both drinking and gambling.
engSearchText:
Pretty much. He became a really hard worker and
dropped both drinking and gambling.
jpnChrName: はい……酒もギャンブルも止めて、 真面目に働くようになりました。
jpnSearchText:
はい……酒もギャンブルも止めて、
真面目に働くようになりました。

engChrName: He's shown regret for turning his back on his family at the time, too. I can't say it's all bad. I'm partly happy he joined, actually.
engSearchText:
He's shown regret for turning his back on his family
at the time, too. I can't say it's all bad. I'm partly
happy he joined, actually.
jpnChrName: 家族を省みなかった事も反省していて…… その意味では入信して良かったと思います。
jpnSearchText:
家族を省みなかった事も反省していて……
その意味では入信して良かったと思います。

engChrName: But I just can't shake this...anxiety I feel the more I hear about them.
engSearchText:
But I just can't shake this...anxiety I feel the more I
hear about them.
jpnChrName: でも、詳しく聞けば聞く程 胡散臭い部分もありまして。
jpnSearchText:
でも、詳しく聞けば聞く程
胡散臭い部分もありまして。

engChrName: What have you heard about them?
engSearchText: What have you heard about them?
jpnChrName: 胡散臭い部分、ですか。 具体的にお教えいただけますか。
jpnSearchText:
胡散臭い部分、ですか。
具体的にお教えいただけますか。

engChrName: Once people join the church, they start trying to convince anyone and everyone to join, too.
engSearchText:
Once people join the church, they start trying to
convince anyone and everyone to join, too.
jpnChrName: その……入信して以来、手当たり次第に 勧誘するようになったんです。
jpnSearchText:
その……入信して以来、手当たり次第に
勧誘するようになったんです。

engChrName: Recruiting more members is considered one of the good deeds I mentioned earlier, and it lets you...'level up' as a person.
engSearchText:
Recruiting more members is considered one of the
good deeds I mentioned earlier, and it lets you...'level
up' as a person.
jpnChrName: そうして信者を増やす事で善行を積むと、 人としての“ステージ”が上がるとかで……
jpnSearchText:
そうして信者を増やす事で善行を積むと、
人としての“ステージ”が上がるとかで……

engChrName: I've heard that those who donate particularly large sums of mira are given special blessings by the religion's guru, too.
engSearchText:
I've heard that those who donate particularly large
sums of mira are given special blessings by the
religion's guru, too.
jpnChrName: 他にも、多額の寄付をした者は特別に 教祖から祝福を与えられるという話もありました。
jpnSearchText:
他にも、多額の寄付をした者は特別に
教祖から祝福を与えられるという話もありました。

engChrName: My father's hoping that if he does enough good deeds, he'll be able to bring our family back together.
engSearchText:
My father's hoping that if he does enough good
deeds, he'll be able to bring our family back together.
jpnChrName: 父としては、善行を積んだ末に いつか家族を取り戻したいそうですけど……
jpnSearchText:
父としては、善行を積んだ末に
いつか家族を取り戻したいそうですけど……

engChrName: Nothing wrong with wanting to do good things, yeah, but I'm not too sure about the recruitment and donations.
engSearchText:
Nothing wrong with wanting to do good things, yeah,
but I'm not too sure about the recruitment
and donations.
jpnChrName: 善行を積むのはいいとしても、 勧誘や寄付金（ミラ）っていうのは違いますよね。
jpnSearchText:
善行を積むのはいいとしても、
勧誘や寄付金（ミラ）っていうのは違いますよね。

engChrName: The Arusha who I believe in has no interest in those things.
engSearchText:
The Arusha who I believe in has no interest in
those things.
jpnChrName: それで翼の女神（アルーシャ）が お喜びになるとはとても思えません……
jpnSearchText:
それで翼の女神（アルーシャ）が
お喜びになるとはとても思えません……

engChrName: Can't blame you. That's shady as hell.
engSearchText: Can't blame you. That's shady as hell.
jpnChrName: ハッ、ソイツは確かに 絵に描いたような胡散臭さだな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、ソイツは確かに
絵に描いたような胡散臭さだな。

engChrName: So that's why you're worried?
engSearchText: So that's why you're worried?
jpnChrName: だからこそお父さんの安否が 心配という事ですね。
jpnSearchText:
だからこそお父さんの安否が
心配という事ですね。

engChrName: Yes. I mean, what if it's just the tip of the iceberg? What if there are worse things happening behind closed doors that I don't know about?
engSearchText:
Yes. I mean, what if it's just the tip of the iceberg?
What if there are worse things happening behind
closed doors that I don't know about?
jpnChrName: そうなんです、他にも僕が知らない事が 裏で行われてるんじゃないかって……
jpnSearchText:
そうなんです、他にも僕が知らない事が
裏で行われてるんじゃないかって……

engChrName: So, could I ask you to go and check on him?
engSearchText: So, could I ask you to go and check on him?
jpnChrName: だからどうか、父が今どうしているのか 安否の確認をしてもらえませんか？
jpnSearchText:
だからどうか、父が今どうしているのか
安否の確認をしてもらえませんか？

engChrName: Hmm... This really is a job more fit for us than the guild or the cops.
engSearchText:
Hmm... This really is a job more fit for us than the
guild or the cops.
jpnChrName: そうだな、警察や遊撃士よりは 俺達の方が身軽に調査できそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
そうだな、警察や遊撃士よりは
俺達の方が身軽に調査できそうだ。

engChrName: (What should we do? Should we take the job on right now?)
engSearchText:
(What should we do? Should we take the job on
right now?)
jpnChrName: （さてと、今すぐ   請け負っちまってもいいか……？）
jpnSearchText:
（さてと、今すぐ
請け負っちまってもいいか……？）

engChrName: I'm really worried that something sinister is going on behind the scenes in the religion my father joined.
engSearchText:
I'm really worried that something sinister is going on
behind the scenes in the religion my father joined.
jpnChrName: 父が入信した新興宗教の裏側で 何が行われているのか不安なんです……
jpnSearchText:
父が入信した新興宗教の裏側で
何が行われているのか不安なんです……

engChrName: I haven't been able to get in touch with him for a while now, so I'd really appreciate it if you could at least check if he's okay.
engSearchText:
I haven't been able to get in touch with him for a
while now, so I'd really appreciate it if you could at
least check if he's okay.
jpnChrName: だからどうか、音信不通の父の安否だけでも 確認してもらう事は出来ませんか？
jpnSearchText:
だからどうか、音信不通の父の安否だけでも
確認してもらう事は出来ませんか？

engChrName: Hmm... This really is a job more fit for us than the guild or the cops.
engSearchText:
Hmm... This really is a job more fit for us than the
guild or the cops.
jpnChrName: そうだな、警察や遊撃士よりは 俺達の方が身軽に調査できそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
そうだな、警察や遊撃士よりは
俺達の方が身軽に調査できそうだ。

engChrName: (What should we do? Should we take the job on right now?)
engSearchText:
(What should we do? Should we take the job on
right now?)
jpnChrName: （さてと、今すぐ   請け負っちまってもいいか……？）
jpnSearchText:
（さてと、今すぐ
請け負っちまってもいいか……？）

engChrName: You mind waitin' a bit? We'll take the job, don't worry.
engSearchText:
You mind waitin' a bit? We'll take the job,
don't worry.
jpnChrName: 依頼を請け負わせてもらうつもりだが…… 今は間が悪くてな。
jpnSearchText:
依頼を請け負わせてもらうつもりだが……
今は間が悪くてな。

engChrName: We'll come back and let you know when we're ready to start investigatin'.
engSearchText:
We'll come back and let you know when we're ready
to start investigatin'.
jpnChrName: 改めて声をかけさせてもらってもいいか。
jpnSearchText: 改めて声をかけさせてもらってもいいか。

engChrName: I see... Of course. Just let me know, then.
engSearchText: I see... Of course. Just let me know, then.
jpnChrName: そうでしたか…… 分かりました、大丈夫です。
jpnSearchText:
そうでしたか……
分かりました、大丈夫です。

engChrName: I'll wait right here.
engSearchText: I'll wait right here.
jpnChrName: それじゃあここでお待ちしていますね。
jpnSearchText: それじゃあここでお待ちしていますね。

engChrName: Sure. We'll take your job on.
engSearchText: Sure. We'll take your job on.
jpnChrName: いいぜ、請け負わせてもらおうじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText: いいぜ、請け負わせてもらおうじゃねえか。

engChrName: With that settled, next step is figurin' out where to start lookin'.
engSearchText:
With that settled, next step is figurin' out where to
start lookin'.
jpnChrName: 問題は、どこから宗教を 探っていくかっつう所だが……
jpnSearchText:
問題は、どこから宗教を
探っていくかっつう所だが……

engChrName: You said a friend of your dad's the one that convinced him to join the church, yeah?
engSearchText:
You said a friend of your dad's the one that convinced
him to join the church, yeah?
jpnChrName: 確かアンタの父親は友人に勧誘されて 入信したとか言ってたよな。
jpnSearchText:
確かアンタの父親は友人に勧誘されて
入信したとか言ってたよな。

engChrName: Yes, that's right. His name is Carson.
engSearchText: Yes, that's right. His name is Carson.
jpnChrName: はい、カーソンさんという方です。
jpnSearchText: はい、カーソンさんという方です。

engChrName: I remember hearing that he's usually in the Riverside District at this time of day.
engSearchText:
I remember hearing that he's usually in the Riverside
District at this time of day.
jpnChrName: 以前お会いした時に聞いた話なんですが……
jpnSearchText: 以前お会いした時に聞いた話なんですが……

engChrName: Around the terrace area specifically.
engSearchText: Around the terrace area specifically.
jpnChrName: この時間はリバーサイドの テラスエリア付近にいるそうでして……
jpnSearchText:
この時間はリバーサイドの
テラスエリア付近にいるそうでして……

engChrName: I think most people that want to join the religion or have any sort of interest in it have to go through him.
engSearchText:
I think most people that want to join the religion or
have any sort of interest in it have to go through him.
jpnChrName: 入信したい時や、興味がある人がいたら 声をかけるようにと言われました。
jpnSearchText:
入信したい時や、興味がある人がいたら
声をかけるようにと言われました。

engChrName: Good start as any. All right, let's head to Riverside and see if we can find this Carson.
engSearchText:
Good start as any. All right, let's head to Riverside
and see if we can find this Carson.
jpnChrName: それなら丁度いい。 今から向かって適当に探してみるか。
jpnSearchText:
それなら丁度いい。
今から向かって適当に探してみるか。

engChrName: Just leave the rest to us.
engSearchText: Just leave the rest to us.
jpnChrName: 後は俺達に任せておいてくれ。
jpnSearchText: 後は俺達に任せておいてくれ。

engChrName: We'll let you know if we learn anything useful.
engSearchText: We'll let you know if we learn anything useful.
jpnChrName: 結果が分かり次第、 改めてご連絡させて頂きますね。
jpnSearchText:
結果が分かり次第、
改めてご連絡させて頂きますね。

engChrName: Thank you! Good luck!
engSearchText: Thank you! Good luck!
jpnChrName: はい、よろしくお願いします……！
jpnSearchText: はい、よろしくお願いします……！

engChrName: We should go ahead and make our way over to the terrace area of the Riverside District.
engSearchText:
We should go ahead and make our way over to the
terrace area of the Riverside District.
jpnChrName: では早速、リバーサイドの テラスエリアへ参りましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
では早速、リバーサイドの
テラスエリアへ参りましょうか。

engChrName: Quest New Religions started!
engSearchText: Quest New Religions started!
jpnChrName: クエスト【新興宗教にはまった父】を開始した！
jpnSearchText: <C1>クエスト【<C2>新興宗教にはまった父<C1>】を開始した！

engChrName: So they've gone underground. It's quite the ideal place for any illicit activities if going undetected is your goal.
engSearchText:
So they've gone underground. It's quite the ideal
place for any illicit activities if going undetected is
your goal.
jpnChrName: 地下遺跡ですか…… 人目を避けるには相応しい場所ですね。
jpnSearchText:
地下遺跡ですか……
人目を避けるには相応しい場所ですね。

engChrName: Let's get after 'em, or we're gonna lose 'em!
engSearchText: Let's get after 'em, or we're gonna lose 'em!
jpnChrName: 見失わねえ内に急いで追いかけるぞ！
jpnSearchText: 見失わねえ内に急いで追いかけるぞ！

engChrName: Right!
engSearchText: Right!
jpnChrName: 了解（ウーラ）！
jpnSearchText: 了解（ウーラ）！

engChrName: It's time to go settle this!
engSearchText: It's time to go settle this!
jpnChrName: ああ、ここでケリを付けてやろうじゃねえか！
jpnSearchText: ああ、ここでケリを付けてやろうじゃねえか！

engChrName: I'm so glad you're okay, Dad.
engSearchText: I'm so glad you're okay, Dad.
jpnChrName: 父さん……無事でよかった。
jpnSearchText: 父さん……無事でよかった。

engChrName: You look like you've lost a bit of weight since I last saw you, though.
engSearchText:
You look like you've lost a bit of weight since I last
saw you, though.
jpnChrName: 見ない内に、少し痩せたんじゃない？
jpnSearchText: 見ない内に、少し痩せたんじゃない？

engChrName: Haha, maybe I did.
engSearchText: Haha, maybe I did.
jpnChrName: はは、まあそうかもしれないな……
jpnSearchText: はは、まあそうかもしれないな……

engChrName: I'm so sorry for worrying you, son.
engSearchText: I'm so sorry for worrying you, son.
jpnChrName: 本当に、心配をかけて悪かった。
jpnSearchText: 本当に、心配をかけて悪かった。

engChrName: I was just so desperate to get our family back together... The church gave me hope that I might, and I foolishly clung to it.
engSearchText:
I was just so desperate to get our family
back together... The church gave me hope that I
might, and I foolishly clung to it.
jpnChrName: 家族３人揃ってたあの頃に戻りたいばかりに、 今更出来る事を探して、宗教に縋り付いて……
jpnSearchText:
家族３人揃ってたあの頃に戻りたいばかりに、
今更出来る事を探して、宗教に縋り付いて……

engChrName: After everything, I was led astray again. I'm so ashamed. I still have work to do to be the man I want to be.
engSearchText:
After everything, I was led astray again. I'm
so ashamed. I still have work to do to be the man I
want to be.
jpnChrName: 本当に自分が情けないよ。 この腐った性根から叩き直す必要がありそうだな。
jpnSearchText:
本当に自分が情けないよ。
この腐った性根から叩き直す必要がありそうだな。

engChrName: If anything, it's good to see you being so honest with yourself.
engSearchText:
If anything, it's good to see you being so honest
with yourself.
jpnChrName: はは……殊勝な事を言うようになっちゃって。
jpnSearchText: はは……殊勝な事を言うようになっちゃって。

engChrName: Don't worry. I'll be here to support you through it all, Dad. We'll improve, together. No matter how long it takes...
engSearchText:
Don't worry. I'll be here to support you through it
all, Dad. We'll improve, together. No matter how
long it takes...
jpnChrName: まあ、その時は僕も付き合うからさ。 一緒にゆっくり変わっていこうよ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、その時は僕も付き合うからさ。
一緒にゆっくり変わっていこうよ。

engChrName: Oh, Stephan... Thank you.
engSearchText: Oh, Stephan... Thank you.
jpnChrName: ありがとう、ステファン……
jpnSearchText: ありがとう、ステファン……

engChrName: It's so nice seeing a happy ending.
engSearchText: It's so nice seeing a happy ending.
jpnChrName: ふふ、本当に良かったですね。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、本当に良かったですね。

engChrName: I really can't thank you enough.
engSearchText: I really can't thank you enough.
jpnChrName: 君たちにも改めて礼を言わせてくれ。
jpnSearchText: 君たちにも改めて礼を言わせてくれ。

engChrName: Nor can I. I shudder to think what could've happened if you hadn't come in to help when you did.
engSearchText:
Nor can I. I shudder to think what could've happened
if you hadn't come in to help when you did.
jpnChrName: 裏解決屋の皆さんがいなければ、 父はどうなっていた事か……
jpnSearchText:
裏解決屋の皆さんがいなければ、
父はどうなっていた事か……

engChrName: Thank you so, so much.
engSearchText: Thank you so, so much.
jpnChrName: 本当にありがとうございました。 皆さんには感謝してもしきれませんよ。
jpnSearchText:
本当にありがとうございました。
皆さんには感謝してもしきれませんよ。

engChrName: Don't mention it. Just doin' my job.
engSearchText: Don't mention it. Just doin' my job.
jpnChrName: なに、依頼料分の仕事をしただけだ。
jpnSearchText: なに、依頼料分の仕事をしただけだ。

engChrName: The guru and the artifact both have been lost.
engSearchText: The guru and the artifact both have been lost.
jpnChrName: 教祖が亡くなり、古代遺物は破壊……
jpnSearchText: 教祖が亡くなり、古代遺物は破壊……

engChrName: It's only a matter of time before the church itself falls apart, now that it lacks its leader.
engSearchText:
It's only a matter of time before the church itself falls
apart, now that it lacks its leader.
jpnChrName: 求心力が失われた今、 いずれ宗教団体は廃れ消え去る事でしょう。
jpnSearchText:
求心力が失われた今、
いずれ宗教団体は廃れ消え去る事でしょう。

engChrName: The guru and his accomplices have been arrested. I'm certain it's only a matter of time before the police dismantles the church itself.
engSearchText:
The guru and his accomplices have been arrested.
I'm certain it's only a matter of time before the police
dismantles the church itself.
jpnChrName: 教祖並びに関係者は逮捕…… 残された教団も警察の手で解体されるそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
教祖並びに関係者は逮捕……
残された教団も警察の手で解体されるそうですね。

engChrName: And the police said they would help with the care of anyone feeling the shock of the events that just happened.
engSearchText:
And the police said they would help with the care
of anyone feeling the shock of the events that
just happened.
jpnChrName: 信者たちに関しても 警察がアフターケアを行うとの事でした。
jpnSearchText:
信者たちに関しても
警察がアフターケアを行うとの事でした。

engChrName: Now you can do your best not to cause any more trouble!
engSearchText:
Now you can do your best not to cause any
more trouble!
jpnChrName: これからは息子さんを 困らせないようにしてあげて下さいね。
jpnSearchText:
これからは息子さんを
困らせないようにしてあげて下さいね。

engChrName: Now you can keep your head low and make sure you don't screw up that bad again.
engSearchText:
Now you can keep your head low and make sure you
don't screw up that bad again.
jpnChrName: ま、またカモにされないように 今後は気を付けるこったな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、またカモにされないように
今後は気を付けるこったな。

engChrName: Oh, of course. You've got my word on that.
engSearchText: Oh, of course. You've got my word on that.
jpnChrName: ああ、勿論だとも。
jpnSearchText: ああ、勿論だとも。

engChrName: Well, I think it's about time we let you get back to work. Once more, thank you. And take care!
engSearchText:
Well, I think it's about time we let you get back
to work. Once more, thank you. And take care!
jpnChrName: それじゃあ僕達はこれで失礼しますね。 本当にありがとうございました……！
jpnSearchText:
それじゃあ僕達はこれで失礼しますね。
本当にありがとうございました……！

engChrName: Sure. Same to you.
engSearchText: Sure. Same to you.
jpnChrName: おう、達者でな。
jpnSearchText: おう、達者でな。

engChrName: Quest New Religions completed!
engSearchText: Quest New Religions completed!
jpnChrName: クエスト【新興宗教にはまった父】を達成した！
jpnSearchText: <C1>クエスト【<C2>新興宗教にはまった父<C1>】を達成した！

engChrName: Received
engSearchText: Received
jpnChrName: 報酬としてミラの振り込みを確認した。
jpnSearchText: 報酬として<C2><C0>ミラの振り込みを確認した。

engChrName: The hell, man?! Who do those guys think they are?!
engSearchText:
The hell, man?! Who do those guys think
they are?!
jpnChrName: クソッ！ あいつら調子に乗りやがって──！
jpnSearchText:
クソッ！
あいつら調子に乗りやがって──！

engChrName: Chill it, Downey! I get how you feel, but shouting's doing nothing for us!
engSearchText:
Chill it, Downey! I get how you feel, but shouting's
doing nothing for us!
jpnChrName: 落ち着いて下さいッスダウニーさん！ 気持ちは分かるッスけど……
jpnSearchText:
落ち着いて下さいッスダウニーさん！
気持ちは分かるッスけど……

engChrName: Oh, but I'm NOT lettin' them get away with this! Hell no! Not with our street racer pride on the line!
engSearchText:
Oh, but I'm NOT lettin' them get away with this!
Hell no! Not with our street racer pride on the line!
jpnChrName: でも、首都の走り屋として これ以上は見過ごせないでしょ！
jpnSearchText:
でも、首都の走り屋として
これ以上は見過ごせないでしょ！

engChrName: Seconded. We should take our chance while we can.
engSearchText: Seconded. We should take our chance while we can.
jpnChrName: ああ……ここまで来たら 受けて立つしかなさそうだな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ……ここまで来たら
受けて立つしかなさそうだな。

engChrName: What's goin' on here?
engSearchText: What's goin' on here?
jpnChrName: おっと、なんだか知らねえが 穏やかじゃねえ雰囲気だな。
jpnSearchText:
おっと、なんだか知らねえが
穏やかじゃねえ雰囲気だな。

engChrName: Van!
engSearchText: Van!
jpnChrName: おっと、ヴァンさんじゃないか。
jpnSearchText: おっと、ヴァンさんじゃないか。

engChrName: Guess I could let ya know.
engSearchText: Guess I could let ya know.
jpnChrName: ヴァンになら 相談してもいいかもしれないね～。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンになら
相談してもいいかもしれないね～。

engChrName: There's this bunch of street racers causing trouble for us ever since they turned up in the capital.
engSearchText:
There's this bunch of street racers causing trouble for
us ever since they turned up in the capital.
jpnChrName: 実は、少し前から首都に来るようになった 走り屋の連中とウチらとで揉めてるんだ。
jpnSearchText:
実は、少し前から首都に来るようになった
走り屋の連中とウチらとで揉めてるんだ。

engChrName: They're taunting us, I tell you! They drive like madmen around town just to get on our nerves!
engSearchText:
They're taunting us, I tell you! They drive like
madmen around town just to get on our nerves!
jpnChrName: あいつら……危険走行もなんのそので 俺達の事を煽ってきやがるんだ！
jpnSearchText:
あいつら……危険走行もなんのそので
俺達の事を煽ってきやがるんだ！

engChrName: I ran my car into a guardrail thanks to their dumb asses! Argh, just thinking about it gets me angry all over again!
engSearchText:
I ran my car into a guardrail thanks to their
dumb asses! Argh, just thinking about it gets me
angry all over again!
jpnChrName: そのせいで愛車をガードレールにぶつけちまって…… クソッ、思い出しただけでも腹が立つぜ！
jpnSearchText:
そのせいで愛車をガードレールにぶつけちまって……
クソッ、思い出しただけでも腹が立つぜ！

engChrName: The hand-me-down I got from Downey got trashed real bad, too. Dude, she had to be sent to the body shop...
engSearchText:
The hand-me-down I got from Downey got trashed
real bad, too. Dude, she had to be sent to the
body shop...
jpnChrName: ちなみに、ダウニーさんのお下がりの オレの車もダメにしちまって修理中ッス……
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに、ダウニーさんのお下がりの
オレの車もダメにしちまって修理中ッス……

engChrName: How can we let loose and enjoy a sweet drive with them tearing it up around town?
engSearchText:
How can we let loose and enjoy a sweet drive with
them tearing it up around town?
jpnChrName: こんな事が続くと、 首都の道路を気持ちよく走れないッスよ……
jpnSearchText:
こんな事が続くと、
首都の道路を気持ちよく走れないッスよ……

engChrName: Yeah, they sound pretty bad. Who're we dealin' with here?
engSearchText:
Yeah, they sound pretty bad. Who're we dealin'
with here?
jpnChrName: ふむ……そいつはタチが悪そうな相手だな。 ちなみにどんなやつらなんだ？
jpnSearchText:
ふむ……そいつはタチが悪そうな相手だな。
ちなみにどんなやつらなんだ？

engChrName: They call themselves the High Bloods. There's four of them, and they all come from Oración.
engSearchText:
They call themselves the High Bloods. There's four
of them, and they all come from Oración.
jpnChrName: 連中の名前は『ハイブラッズ』── オラシオン出身の４人組なんだ。
jpnSearchText:
連中の名前は『ハイブラッズ』──
オラシオン出身の４人組なんだ。

engChrName: They used to stick to their turf, but they recently started moving here.
engSearchText:
They used to stick to their turf, but they recently
started moving here.
jpnChrName: 普段はオラシオンを拠点にしてたが 首都まで足を伸ばすようになったらしい。
jpnSearchText:
普段はオラシオンを拠点にしてたが
首都まで足を伸ばすようになったらしい。

engChrName: They're all rich kids, obviously, and their cars are really souped up.
engSearchText:
They're all rich kids, obviously, and their cars are
really souped up.
jpnChrName: ４人とも家が金持ちらしくてな、 マシンにかなりのミラをかけてやがるんだ。
jpnSearchText:
４人とも家が金持ちらしくてな、
マシンにかなりのミラをかけてやがるんだ。

engChrName: What's more, their leader Lucio is the grandson of ETWS' current company president.
engSearchText:
What's more, their leader Lucio is the grandson of
ETWS' current company president.
jpnChrName: その上、リーダーのルシオって人は エトワス社社長の孫みたいでね～。
jpnSearchText:
その上、リーダーのルシオって人は
エトワス社社長の孫みたいでね～。

engChrName: He's got a modded ETWS sports car. Ain't no slouch as a driver, either.
engSearchText:
He's got a modded ETWS sports car. Ain't no slouch
as a driver, either.
jpnChrName: エトワスの改造スポーツカーを乗り回してて、 その上ドライビングテクも並外れてるの！
jpnSearchText:
エトワスの改造スポーツカーを乗り回してて、
その上ドライビングテクも並外れてるの！

engChrName: Last we raced, he passed me by like I was just crawlin' through the street! Can you believe that?
engSearchText:
Last we raced, he passed me by like I was just crawlin'
through the street! Can you believe that?
jpnChrName: はぁ……前に競り合った時、 あっさり抜かれて悔しかったんだよね～。
jpnSearchText:
はぁ……前に競り合った時、
あっさり抜かれて悔しかったんだよね～。

engChrName: Hol' up! You said it was the ETWS president's grandson?!
engSearchText:
Hol' up! You said it was the ETWS
president's grandson?!
jpnChrName: はぁ！？　エトワス社社長の孫だと！？
jpnSearchText: はぁ！？　エトワス社社長の孫だと！？

engChrName: Man, that sucks. Last thing you need is someone related to the company's top brass being a dick.
engSearchText:
Man, that sucks. Last thing you need is someone
related to the company's top brass being a dick.
jpnChrName: メーカー会社の関係者の素行が悪いとか、 最低じゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
メーカー会社の関係者の素行が悪いとか、
最低じゃねえか。

engChrName: And he's not the worst of it.
engSearchText: And he's not the worst of it.
jpnChrName: ああ……でも、問題なのはソイツだけじゃないんだ。
jpnSearchText: ああ……でも、問題なのはソイツだけじゃないんだ。

engChrName: There's another guy that's an even more reckless driver.
engSearchText:
There's another guy that's an even more
reckless driver.
jpnChrName: いや……むしろ危険走行でいえば コイツの方が厄介だ。
jpnSearchText:
いや……むしろ危険走行でいえば
コイツの方が厄介だ。

engChrName: His name's Damian, and he styles himself as their main fighter.
engSearchText:
His name's Damian, and he styles himself as their
main fighter.
jpnChrName: ダミアン──ハイブラッズの特攻役を 気取ってるバイク乗りの野郎でな。
jpnSearchText:
ダミアン──ハイブラッズの特攻役を
気取ってるバイク乗りの野郎でな。

engChrName: He's all cocky, taunting us from his bike just 'cause he can take tighter turns than any of our cars!
engSearchText:
He's all cocky, taunting us from his bike just 'cause he
can take tighter turns than any of our cars!
jpnChrName: ヤツは小回りが利かない車をコケにして、 こっちを挑発してきやがるんだ。
jpnSearchText:
ヤツは小回りが利かない車をコケにして、
こっちを挑発してきやがるんだ。

engChrName: He's the one that did my baby in! I'll never forgive that bastard. Never!
engSearchText:
He's the one that did my baby in! I'll never forgive
that bastard. Never!
jpnChrName: そのせいで俺の愛車も……クソッ！
jpnSearchText: そのせいで俺の愛車も……クソッ！

engChrName: He thinks he's better than us car drivers, does he?
engSearchText: He thinks he's better than us car drivers, does he?
jpnChrName: ははあ……車乗りに対して 随分と舐めた真似してくれたみてえだな。
jpnSearchText:
ははあ……車乗りに対して
随分と舐めた真似してくれたみてえだな。

engChrName: So, what're you planning to do about these guys? Surely you're not just gonna let 'em keep runnin' wild?
engSearchText:
So, what're you planning to do about these guys?
Surely you're not just gonna let 'em keep
runnin' wild?
jpnChrName: で？　お前らは連中をどうするつもりなんだ。 まさか放置しておく訳じゃねえだろ。
jpnSearchText:
で？　お前らは連中をどうするつもりなんだ。
まさか放置しておく訳じゃねえだろ。

engChrName: Definitely not. We've tried warning them over and over to stop behaving like this, but it's fallen on deaf ears.
engSearchText:
Definitely not. We've tried warning them over and
over to stop behaving like this, but it's fallen on
deaf ears.
jpnChrName: まあな……これでも、前から何度も 危険走行を止めるように注意して来たんだ。
jpnSearchText:
まあな……これでも、前から何度も
危険走行を止めるように注意して来たんだ。

engChrName: Since they're not heeding warnings like that, I tried talking to Lucio directly.
engSearchText:
Since they're not heeding warnings like that, I tried
talking to Lucio directly.
jpnChrName: それでも効果がねえから、 この前改めてルシオと話をしたんだが。
jpnSearchText:
それでも効果がねえから、
この前改めてルシオと話をしたんだが。

engChrName: Only thing he said was, 'If you want us to leave, you'll have to best us in a race.'
engSearchText:
Only thing he said was, 'If you want us to leave, you'll
have to best us in a race.'
jpnChrName: 『俺達との勝負（レース）に勝てれば首都から出て行ってやる』 ──あいつはそう言ってきやがったんだ。
jpnSearchText:
『俺達との勝負（レース）に勝てれば首都から出て行ってやる』
──あいつはそう言ってきやがったんだ。

engChrName: We're actually on our way to the race right now.
engSearchText: We're actually on our way to the race right now.
jpnChrName: それで、今まさにこれから ハイブラッズとの勝負に向かう所だったってわけ。
jpnSearchText:
それで、今まさにこれから
ハイブラッズとの勝負に向かう所だったってわけ。

engChrName: Yeah? Guess my timing's just that good.
engSearchText: Yeah? Guess my timing's just that good.
jpnChrName: なんだ、それじゃ随分といいタイミングで 俺が来ちまったってことか。
jpnSearchText:
なんだ、それじゃ随分といいタイミングで
俺が来ちまったってことか。

engChrName: You could say that, haha.
engSearchText: You could say that, haha.
jpnChrName: はは、まあそうなるな。
jpnSearchText: はは、まあそうなるな。

engChrName: There's four of them, but me 'n Graham are the only ones with rides right now.
engSearchText:
There's four of them, but me 'n Graham are the only
ones with rides right now.
jpnChrName: 相手は４台、それに対してこっちは 私とグレアムの２台だけ──
jpnSearchText:
相手は４台、それに対してこっちは
私とグレアムの２台だけ──

engChrName: And that's not even countin' car specs and driving ability... Hate to admit it, but it's stacked. And not in our favor.
engSearchText:
And that's not even countin' car specs and
driving ability... Hate to admit it, but it's stacked.
And not in our favor.
jpnChrName: スペックや実力差を差し引いても、 厳しい勝負になっちゃうかもね～。
jpnSearchText:
スペックや実力差を差し引いても、
厳しい勝負になっちゃうかもね～。

engChrName: But we can't just give up!
engSearchText: But we can't just give up!
jpnChrName: だけど──！
jpnSearchText: だけど──！

engChrName: Yeah. Better to lose outright than to flake out on them and just lose by default.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Better to lose outright than to flake out on
them and just lose by default.
jpnChrName: ここで引き下がっちまったら 連中に降伏したも同然だろ。
jpnSearchText:
ここで引き下がっちまったら
連中に降伏したも同然だろ。

engChrName: Not like we're hoping to lose, though! We're not backing down until they're in the ground!
engSearchText:
Not like we're hoping to lose, though! We're not
backing down until they're in the ground!
jpnChrName: だからこそ絶対に引けねえ── 負ける訳には行かねえんだ。
jpnSearchText:
だからこそ絶対に引けねえ──
負ける訳には行かねえんだ。

engChrName: Wish us luck.
engSearchText: Wish us luck.
jpnChrName: 俺達の勝利を女神に祈っててくれよな。
jpnSearchText: 俺達の勝利を女神に祈っててくれよな。

jpnChrName: （『ハイブラッズ』か……）
jpnSearchText: （『ハイブラッズ』か……）

engChrName: (I don't wanna sit back and let a bunch of rich assholes wreak havoc in Edith.)
engSearchText:
(I don't wanna sit back and let a bunch of rich
assholes wreak havoc in Edith.)
jpnChrName: （タチのわりい車乗りが首都にいるってんなら   俺としても見過ごせねえな。）
jpnSearchText:
（タチのわりい車乗りが首都にいるってんなら
俺としても見過ごせねえな。）

engChrName: (Maybe I could lend 'em a hand here.)
engSearchText: (Maybe I could lend 'em a hand here.)
jpnChrName: （そのレース、俺も参加してみるか……？）
jpnSearchText: （そのレース、俺も参加してみるか……？）

engChrName: Better to lose outright than to flake out on them and just lose by default.
engSearchText:
Better to lose outright than to flake out on
them and just lose by default.
jpnChrName: ここで引き下がっちまったら 連中に降伏したも同然だろ。
jpnSearchText:
ここで引き下がっちまったら
連中に降伏したも同然だろ。

engChrName: Not like we're hoping to lose, though! We're not backing down until they're in the ground!
engSearchText:
Not like we're hoping to lose, though! We're not
backing down until they're in the ground!
jpnChrName: だからこそ絶対に引けねえ── 負ける訳には行かねえんだ。
jpnSearchText:
だからこそ絶対に引けねえ──
負ける訳には行かねえんだ。

engChrName: Wish us luck.
engSearchText: Wish us luck.
jpnChrName: 俺達の勝利を女神に祈っててくれよな。
jpnSearchText: 俺達の勝利を女神に祈っててくれよな。

engChrName: (I don't wanna sit back and let a bunch of rich assholes wreak havoc in Edith.)
engSearchText:
(I don't wanna sit back and let a bunch of rich
assholes wreak havoc in Edith.)
jpnChrName: （タチのわりい車乗りが首都にいるってんなら   俺としても見過ごせねえな。）
jpnSearchText:
（タチのわりい車乗りが首都にいるってんなら
俺としても見過ごせねえな。）

engChrName: (Maybe I could lend 'em a hand here.)
engSearchText: (Maybe I could lend 'em a hand here.)
jpnChrName: （そのレース、俺も参加してみるか……？）
jpnSearchText: （そのレース、俺も参加してみるか……？）

engChrName: (Right now's not really the time. Maybe if my schedule clears up a bit later.)
engSearchText:
(Right now's not really the time. Maybe if my
schedule clears up a bit later.)
jpnChrName: （つっても、今は間が悪いな……   また出直して来るか。）
jpnSearchText:
（つっても、今は間が悪いな……
また出直して来るか。）

engChrName: You mind if I join?
engSearchText: You mind if I join?
jpnChrName: その勝負、俺も参加させてもらってもいいか？
jpnSearchText: その勝負、俺も参加させてもらってもいいか？

engChrName: I appreciate the sentiment, but this is our problem to deal with. Wouldn't be right to drag you into it.
engSearchText:
I appreciate the sentiment, but this is our problem to
deal with. Wouldn't be right to drag you into it.
jpnChrName: あはは、気持ちは嬉しいけど…… あたしらの問題だもん、迷惑はかけらんないよ。
jpnSearchText:
あはは、気持ちは嬉しいけど……
あたしらの問題だもん、迷惑はかけらんないよ。

engChrName: Hard disagree. This goes beyond just you. It involves all car lovers now.
engSearchText:
Hard disagree. This goes beyond just you. It involves
all car lovers now.
jpnChrName: いいや、こいつは車乗り全員の問題だぜ。
jpnSearchText: いいや、こいつは車乗り全員の問題だぜ。

engChrName: As a fellow driver myself, I can't just stand back and let a bunch of punks with no sense for safe drivin' screw my home up.
engSearchText:
As a fellow driver myself, I can't just stand back and
let a bunch of punks with no sense for safe drivin'
screw my home up.
jpnChrName: なにより、マナーのなってねえ連中が 首都で好き勝手してるなんて我慢ならねえ。
jpnSearchText:
なにより、マナーのなってねえ連中が
首都で好き勝手してるなんて我慢ならねえ。

engChrName: I wanna teach 'em a lesson.
engSearchText: I wanna teach 'em a lesson.
jpnChrName: 徹底的に灸を据えてやらねえとな。
jpnSearchText: 徹底的に灸を据えてやらねえとな。

engChrName: Van...
engSearchText: Van...
jpnChrName: ヴァン…………
jpnSearchText: ヴァン…………

engChrName: Haha! Now that's what we like to hear!
engSearchText: Haha! Now that's what we like to hear!
jpnChrName: ハッ、頼もしい事言ってくれるじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、頼もしい事言ってくれるじゃねえか。

engChrName: Don't see why he can't join. Why not let him?
engSearchText: Don't see why he can't join. Why not let him?
jpnChrName: グレアムさん、お願いしてみたらどうッスか？
jpnSearchText: グレアムさん、お願いしてみたらどうッスか？

engChrName: All right. Thanks, Van. You're really saving our asses here.
engSearchText:
All right. Thanks, Van. You're really saving our
asses here.
jpnChrName: ああ……ありがとうヴァンさん。 正直に言って、かなり助かるよ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ……ありがとうヴァンさん。
正直に言って、かなり助かるよ。

engChrName: You might honestly be the best help we could've got. I respect you a lot, man.
engSearchText:
You might honestly be the best help we could've got.
I respect you a lot, man.
jpnChrName: 尊敬してるアンタの力を借りれるなら百人力だ。
jpnSearchText: 尊敬してるアンタの力を借りれるなら百人力だ。

engChrName: Thanks for sayin' so.
engSearchText: Thanks for sayin' so.
jpnChrName: ああ、任せとけ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、任せとけ。

engChrName: That still leaves the problem of dealin' with Damian, though.
engSearchText:
That still leaves the problem of dealin' with
Damian, though.
jpnChrName: しかし、問題なのはダミアンとか言うバイク乗りだな。
jpnSearchText: しかし、問題なのはダミアンとか言うバイク乗りだな。

engChrName: I'm no biker, so I'm not gonna be able to help there.
engSearchText: I'm no biker, so I'm not gonna be able to help there.
jpnChrName: バイクに関しちゃ俺も専門外…… まずもって土俵がちげえからな。
jpnSearchText:
バイクに関しちゃ俺も専門外……
まずもって土俵がちげえからな。

engChrName: Not so sure how we're gonna deal with that niggling little detail.
engSearchText:
Not so sure how we're gonna deal with that niggling
little detail.
jpnChrName: そうだよね～、だからこそ対策を 考えてから挑みたい所なんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
そうだよね～、だからこそ対策を
考えてから挑みたい所なんだけど……

engChrName: Whew. That's all for today, then. Now, back to my bike...
engSearchText:
Whew. That's all for today, then. Now, back to
my bike...
jpnChrName: ふぅ、これで今日の仕事は終了ね。 後は愛車の所に戻ってと……
jpnSearchText:
ふぅ、これで今日の仕事は終了ね。
後は愛車の所に戻ってと……

engChrName: ...Hmm?
engSearchText: ...Hmm?
jpnChrName: あら……？
jpnSearchText: あら……？

engChrName: Why are all of you gathered here?
engSearchText: Why are all of you gathered here?
jpnChrName: 走り屋の子たちにアークライドまで…… 揃いもそろってどうしたの？
jpnSearchText:
走り屋の子たちにアークライドまで……
揃いもそろってどうしたの？

engChrName: Hermès!
engSearchText: Hermès!
jpnChrName: おっ、エルメスじゃねえか──！
jpnSearchText: おっ、エルメスじゃねえか──！

engChrName: Your timin' couldn't be any better. Got some free time on your hands?
engSearchText:
Your timin' couldn't be any better. Got some free
time on your hands?
jpnChrName: 丁度いい所に来てくれたな。 このあと少し時間はあるか？
jpnSearchText:
丁度いい所に来てくれたな。
このあと少し時間はあるか？

engChrName: Huh? I mean, I'm done for the day, so I guess I do.
engSearchText: Huh? I mean, I'm done for the day, so I guess I do.
jpnChrName: ……？　ええ、今日の仕事は これで終わりだから構わないけど。
jpnSearchText:
……？　ええ、今日の仕事は
これで終わりだから構わないけど。

engChrName: I see. So you're going to be racing them to teach them a lesson?
engSearchText:
I see. So you're going to be racing them to teach them
a lesson?
jpnChrName: へぇ……なるほどね。 それで皆でレース勝負する事になったと。
jpnSearchText:
へぇ……なるほどね。
それで皆でレース勝負する事になったと。

engChrName: Yeah. Would really help if we had a biker of your skill level on our team.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Would really help if we had a biker of your skill
level on our team.
jpnChrName: そこで、お前ほどのバイク乗りが いれば心強いんだが……
jpnSearchText:
そこで、お前ほどのバイク乗りが
いれば心強いんだが……

engChrName: What do you say? You up for it?
engSearchText: What do you say? You up for it?
jpnChrName: どうだ、参加してみる気はあるか？
jpnSearchText: どうだ、参加してみる気はあるか？

engChrName: Haha. Sure, I'll join your team.
engSearchText: Haha. Sure, I'll join your team.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、いいわよ。 私もエントリーさせてもらうわ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、いいわよ。
私もエントリーさせてもらうわ。

engChrName: Teaching a naughty rider how to behave sounds like fun.
engSearchText:
Teaching a naughty rider how to behave sounds
like fun.
jpnChrName: 危険走行を省みない悪い子の相手なんて 面白そうじゃないの。
jpnSearchText:
危険走行を省みない悪い子の相手なんて
面白そうじゃないの。

engChrName: I'll make sure they think twice before causing trouble in the capital again!
engSearchText:
I'll make sure they think twice before causing trouble
in the capital again!
jpnChrName: 正しいバイクの乗り方っていうのを きっちり教えてあげないとね♪
jpnSearchText:
正しいバイクの乗り方っていうのを
きっちり教えてあげないとね♪

engChrName: Glad to see you so fired up for this.
engSearchText: Glad to see you so fired up for this.
jpnChrName: ハッ、アンタのノリがよくて助かった。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、アンタのノリがよくて助かった。

engChrName: I really appreciate you agreeing, too. Now it feels like we have a fighting chance.
engSearchText:
I really appreciate you agreeing, too. Now it feels like
we have a fighting chance.
jpnChrName: 俺からも礼を言わせてくれ。 おかげで勝機がみえて来た気がするよ。
jpnSearchText:
俺からも礼を言わせてくれ。
おかげで勝機がみえて来た気がするよ。

engChrName: Yep! It's gonna be a proper four vs. four race! Now all that's left is leavin' them in the dust!
engSearchText:
Yep! It's gonna be a proper four vs. four race! Now all
that's left is leavin' them in the dust!
jpnChrName: うん、これで４対４── 後はレースで全力を尽くすだけでしょ！
jpnSearchText:
うん、これで４対４──
後はレースで全力を尽くすだけでしょ！

engChrName: Anyway! Clock's tickin'! Let's get goin' to the meeting spot!
engSearchText:
Anyway! Clock's tickin'! Let's get goin' to the
meeting spot!
jpnChrName: さてと……時間もそろそろって感じになって来たし。 集合場所に移動しちゃおうか。
jpnSearchText:
さてと……時間もそろそろって感じになって来たし。
集合場所に移動しちゃおうか。

engChrName: You ready to go?
engSearchText: You ready to go?
jpnChrName: ヴァン達の方は用意は出来てる？
jpnSearchText: ヴァン達の方は用意は出来てる？

engChrName: Ready whenever you are.
engSearchText: Ready whenever you are.
jpnChrName: 私の方はいつでも行けるわよ。
jpnSearchText: 私の方はいつでも行けるわよ。

engChrName: Same here.
engSearchText: Same here.
jpnChrName: ああ、準備は出来てるぜ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、準備は出来てるぜ。

engChrName: Then let's roll!
engSearchText: Then let's roll!
jpnChrName: よし、それじゃあ早速向かうとするか！
jpnSearchText: よし、それじゃあ早速向かうとするか！

engChrName: Quest Race in the Capital started!
engSearchText: Quest Race in the Capital started!
jpnChrName: クエスト【対決・首都高レース】を開始した！
jpnSearchText: <C1>クエスト【<C2>対決・首都高レース<C1>】を開始した！

engChrName: 'On the gateway to our fair capital lies a merchant whose store carries varieties for every man.'
engSearchText:
'On the gateway to our fair capital lies a merchant
whose store carries varieties for every man.'
jpnChrName: 『首都の玄関口に拠点を構え、   百の交易品を抱える商人』。
jpnSearchText:
『首都の玄関口に拠点を構え、
百の交易品を抱える商人』。

engChrName: That's gotta be the department store, yeah? But what am I supposed to do here?
engSearchText:
That's gotta be the department store, yeah? But what
am I supposed to do here?
jpnChrName: つうと、中央駅前にある百貨店の事とはいえ ここで何をどうしろって言うんだか……
jpnSearchText:
つうと、中央駅前にある百貨店の事とはいえ
ここで何をどうしろって言うんだか……

engChrName: Might you happen to be Mr. Van Arkride, sir?
engSearchText: Might you happen to be Mr. Van Arkride, sir?
jpnChrName: おや、その髪色とその服装は── ヴァン・アークライド様では？
jpnSearchText:
おや、その髪色とその服装は──
ヴァン・アークライド様では？

engChrName: Huh? Yeah, that's me.
engSearchText: Huh? Yeah, that's me.
jpnChrName: ん？　そうだが。
jpnSearchText: ん？　そうだが。

engChrName: I see, I see! ...Ahem!
engSearchText: I see, I see! ...Ahem!
jpnChrName: やはり！　それでは早速──コホン。
jpnSearchText: やはり！　それでは早速──コホン。

engChrName: Congratulations, sir! You are precisely the 333rd customer to visit our store today!
engSearchText:
Congratulations, sir! You are precisely the 333rd
customer to visit our store today!
jpnChrName: おめでとうございます、ヴァン様！ 貴方は本日３３３人目の記念すべき来店者です！
jpnSearchText:
おめでとうございます、ヴァン様！
貴方は本日３３３人目の記念すべき来店者です！

engChrName: Allow me to present you with a gift in honor of this moment!
engSearchText:
Allow me to present you with a gift in honor of
this moment!
jpnChrName: 当店から景品を贈呈させて頂きたいと思います！
jpnSearchText: 当店から景品を贈呈させて頂きたいと思います！

engChrName: S-Sure...?
engSearchText: S-Sure...?
jpnChrName: お、おう……？
jpnSearchText: お、おう……？

engChrName: It's an all-expenses-paid invitation to a bathing facility in Trion Tower.
engSearchText:
It's an all-expenses-paid invitation to a bathing
facility in Trion Tower.
jpnChrName: トリオンタワーに併設されている 温浴施設への招待券でございます。
jpnSearchText:
トリオンタワーに併設されている
温浴施設への招待券でございます。

engChrName: Massage included, too, so I believe it would be a fine way to rest away your weariness.
engSearchText:
Massage included, too, so I believe it would be a fine
way to rest away your weariness.
jpnChrName: マッサージコースもセットになっていますので、 疲れを癒してみてはいかがでしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
マッサージコースもセットになっていますので、
疲れを癒してみてはいかがでしょうか。

engChrName: Wait, what?! Since when was it a thing to give out stuff this fancy just for wanderin' in at the right time?!
engSearchText:
Wait, what?! Since when was it a thing to give out
stuff this fancy just for wanderin' in at the right time?!
jpnChrName: はあっ！？　いやおかしいだろ…… こんなに豪華な来店者特典があるか！
jpnSearchText:
はあっ！？　いやおかしいだろ……
こんなに豪華な来店者特典があるか！

engChrName: Is it not to your liking, sir?
engSearchText: Is it not to your liking, sir?
jpnChrName: もしや、あまりお気に召さないのでしょうか？
jpnSearchText: もしや、あまりお気に召さないのでしょうか？

engChrName: No, it ain't that. It sounds amazing, trust me.
engSearchText: No, it ain't that. It sounds amazing, trust me.
jpnChrName: ……いやまあ、正直に言えば嬉しいけどよ。
jpnSearchText: ……いやまあ、正直に言えば嬉しいけどよ。

engChrName: Haha. Then please accept it with our blessing.
engSearchText: Haha. Then please accept it with our blessing.
jpnChrName: はは、でしたらどうぞ 遠慮せずにお持ちになって下さい。
jpnSearchText:
はは、でしたらどうぞ
遠慮せずにお持ちになって下さい。

engChrName: Allow me to give you this, too.
engSearchText: Allow me to give you this, too.
jpnChrName: それと、これも渡しておかねばなりませんね。
jpnSearchText: それと、これも渡しておかねばなりませんね。

engChrName: Another riddle, huh?
engSearchText: Another riddle, huh?
jpnChrName: お次はまた暗号ってか……？
jpnSearchText: お次はまた暗号ってか……？

engChrName: 'Last task: Reach the place in the business district where three pillars stand and you can hear the rushing water. I'll await you there.'
engSearchText:
'Last task: Reach the place in the business district
where three pillars stand and you can hear the
rushing water. I'll await you there.'
jpnChrName: 『最終問題　ビル街にそびえ立つ巨大な三本柱。   水のせせらぎが聞こえる場所でお待ちしています。』
jpnSearchText:
『最終問題　ビル街にそびえ立つ巨大な三本柱。
水のせせらぎが聞こえる場所でお待ちしています。』

engChrName: This is the last one, huh? Hmm...
engSearchText: This is the last one, huh? Hmm...
jpnChrName: ほう……最終問題と来たか。
jpnSearchText: ほう……最終問題と来たか。

engChrName: Well, I will leave you to enjoy the rest of your evening.
engSearchText:
Well, I will leave you to enjoy the rest of
your evening.
jpnChrName: それでは、私の役目はここまでですね。 どうか最後までお楽しみくださいませ。
jpnSearchText:
それでは、私の役目はここまでですね。
どうか最後までお楽しみくださいませ。

engChrName: (That's two unexpected but awesome gifts I've got now.)
engSearchText:
(That's two unexpected but awesome gifts I've
got now.)
jpnChrName: （今回もまた妙なサプライズを貰っちまったな。）
jpnSearchText: （今回もまた妙なサプライズを貰っちまったな。）

engChrName: (What's my client's aim here? To put me in their debt? To get me to let my guard down?)
engSearchText:
(What's my client's aim here? To put me in
their debt? To get me to let my guard down?)
jpnChrName: （依頼主の目的は俺に恩を売る事なのか？   それとも油断させる為の罠……？）
jpnSearchText:
（依頼主の目的は俺に恩を売る事なのか？
それとも油断させる為の罠……？）

engChrName: (Man, I still got no clue. But I guess I might as well see this through to the end.)
engSearchText:
(Man, I still got no clue. But I guess I might as well
see this through to the end.)
jpnChrName: （どういうつもりか知らねえが   ここまで来たら最後まで付き合うか。）
jpnSearchText:
（どういうつもりか知らねえが
ここまで来たら最後まで付き合うか。）

engChrName: Are you Jess' manager?
engSearchText: Are you Jess' manager?
jpnChrName: アンタがジェスのマネージャーか？
jpnSearchText: アンタがジェスのマネージャーか？

engChrName: That's right.
engSearchText: That's right.
jpnChrName: いかにも私がそうよ。
jpnSearchText: いかにも私がそうよ。

engChrName: Never thought he'd up and disappear like that. And without saying anything to his housemates!
engSearchText:
Never thought he'd up and disappear like that.
And without saying anything to his housemates!
jpnChrName: まさかジェスが、同居人に 何も告げずに家を出ていたとはね。
jpnSearchText:
まさかジェスが、同居人に
何も告げずに家を出ていたとはね。

engChrName: What have you heard?
engSearchText: What have you heard?
jpnChrName: アンタは何か聞いてたのか？
jpnSearchText: アンタは何か聞いてたのか？

engChrName: We were recently talking about his future. As an artist, I mean.
engSearchText:
We were recently talking about his future. As an
artist, I mean.
jpnChrName: ジェスの──アーティストとしての 今後については話をしていたわ。
jpnSearchText:
ジェスの──アーティストとしての
今後については話をしていたわ。

engChrName: I'm sure you heard about it already, but he missed his concert three days ago.
engSearchText:
I'm sure you heard about it already, but he missed his
concert three days ago.
jpnChrName: 貴方たちも聞いていると思うけど、 ジェスは３日前、ライブに来なかった。
jpnSearchText:
貴方たちも聞いていると思うけど、
ジェスは３日前、ライブに来なかった。

engChrName: Got an earful from me, of course.
engSearchText: Got an earful from me, of course.
jpnChrName: 私はマネージャーとして そのことを当然咎めたわ。
jpnSearchText:
私はマネージャーとして
そのことを当然咎めたわ。

engChrName: All he said to me was that, 'things can't keep going like this.'
engSearchText:
All he said to me was that, 'things can't keep going
like this.'
jpnChrName: すると彼は、今のままでは やっていけない……そう言ったわ。
jpnSearchText:
すると彼は、今のままでは
やっていけない……そう言ったわ。

engChrName: Hmm...
engSearchText: Hmm...
jpnChrName: 今のままでは、か。
jpnSearchText: 今のままでは、か。

engChrName: He said he wanted to get away from his current environment and work someplace else.
engSearchText:
He said he wanted to get away from his current
environment and work someplace else.
jpnChrName: ええ、それでとにかく 環境を変えたいという話でね。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、それでとにかく
環境を変えたいという話でね。

engChrName: Even mentioned trying to perform abroad.
engSearchText: Even mentioned trying to perform abroad.
jpnChrName: しばらく別の場所で、できれば 国外で活動したいとの提案を受けたの。
jpnSearchText:
しばらく別の場所で、できれば
国外で活動したいとの提案を受けたの。

engChrName: It could be a very rewarding challenge as a performer, yes...
engSearchText:
It could be a very rewarding challenge as a
performer, yes...
jpnChrName: 国外……挑戦すること自体は 悪いことではないと思いますが……
jpnSearchText:
国外……挑戦すること自体は
悪いことではないと思いますが……

engChrName: I can't blame him for wanting to try...
engSearchText: I can't blame him for wanting to try...
jpnChrName: 国外ですか。 夢のある話にも思えますが……
jpnSearchText:
国外ですか。
夢のある話にも思えますが……

engChrName: Talk about wanting it tough.
engSearchText: Talk about wanting it tough.
jpnChrName: ハッ、そりゃあなかなかの挑戦だな。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、そりゃあなかなかの挑戦だな。

engChrName: That's quite a courageous idea.
engSearchText: That's quite a courageous idea.
jpnChrName: 国外とは…… なかなか思い切られましたね。
jpnSearchText:
国外とは……
なかなか思い切られましたね。

engChrName: I admire his courage on the matter, at least...
engSearchText: I admire his courage on the matter, at least...
jpnChrName: 国外、か。 ロマンはあると思うけど……
jpnSearchText:
国外、か。
ロマンはあると思うけど……

engChrName: Not every artist has the guts to do that, I guess.
engSearchText: Not every artist has the guts to do that, I guess.
jpnChrName: 国外ねえ。 チャレンジ精神は買うけど……
jpnSearchText:
国外ねえ。
チャレンジ精神は買うけど……

engChrName: That's quite a courageous idea.
engSearchText: That's quite a courageous idea.
jpnChrName: 国外、か。 なかなか思い切った判断だな。
jpnSearchText:
国外、か。
なかなか思い切った判断だな。

engChrName: Well, I said to forget about it for now. He's at a critical point in his career. Too critical to be going anywhere!
engSearchText:
Well, I said to forget about it for now. He's at a
critical point in his career. Too critical to be
going anywhere!
jpnChrName: とりあえず一度は止めたわ。 彼にとっては今が大事な時期だからね。
jpnSearchText:
とりあえず一度は止めたわ。
彼にとっては今が大事な時期だからね。

engChrName: I told him straight up that he has no hope of succeeding if he just leaves the country now.
engSearchText:
I told him straight up that he has no hope of
succeeding if he just leaves the country now.
jpnChrName: 逃げるように国外へ出ても貴方は成功できない、 はっきりそうも言わせてもらった。
jpnSearchText:
逃げるように国外へ出ても貴方は成功できない、
はっきりそうも言わせてもらった。

engChrName: His response? 'So be it. An early retirement might suit me, if it comes to it.'
engSearchText:
His response? 'So be it. An early retirement might
suit me, if it comes to it.'
jpnChrName: すると彼は『それならそれで構わない、 何なら引退してもいい』とまで言ってきてね。
jpnSearchText:
すると彼は『それならそれで構わない、
何なら引退してもいい』とまで言ってきてね。

engChrName: He's awfully willing to throw everything away.
