engSearchText:
Supposed to be a bit of a headache to deal with, so
I've tried to keep it that way, too.
jpnChrName: 結構なクセ者みたいだったから あえて距離を取ってたんだが……
jpnSearchText:
結構なクセ者みたいだったから
あえて距離を取ってたんだが……

engChrName: But it looks like my luck just ran out.
engSearchText: But it looks like my luck just ran out.
jpnChrName: どうやら会わないわけには 行かなさそうだな。
jpnSearchText:
どうやら会わないわけには
行かなさそうだな。

engChrName: I really think we should meet him...
engSearchText: I really think we should meet him...
jpnChrName: はい……！ それがいいと思います！
jpnSearchText:
はい……！
それがいいと思います！

engChrName: I wonder if he's there already? The orbal café's just over there.
engSearchText:
I wonder if he's there already? The orbal café's just
over there.
jpnChrName: オーバルカフェはすぐそこだし もう待ってたりするのかな？
jpnSearchText:
オーバルカフェはすぐそこだし
もう待ってたりするのかな？

engChrName: Perhaps he might be waiting for us already? Walking to the orbal café shouldn't take us so long.
engSearchText:
Perhaps he might be waiting for us already?
Walking to the orbal café shouldn't take us so long.
jpnChrName: オーバルカフェはすぐそこですし もうお待ちなのでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
オーバルカフェはすぐそこですし
もうお待ちなのでしょうか？

engChrName: I wonder if he's there already? It's not that long a walk from here to the orbal café.
engSearchText:
I wonder if he's there already? It's not that long a
walk from here to the orbal café.
jpnChrName: オーバルカフェはすぐそこだし もう待ってるのかしら？
jpnSearchText:
オーバルカフェはすぐそこだし
もう待ってるのかしら？

engChrName: We should go and visit him when we get a chance, then.
engSearchText:
We should go and visit him when we get a
chance, then.
jpnChrName: では、折を見て訪ねるとしよう。
jpnSearchText: では、折を見て訪ねるとしよう。

engChrName: Let's go meet with the guy once we have the chance.
engSearchText: Let's go meet with the guy once we have the chance.
jpnChrName: それじゃあ 頃合いを見て訪ねないとね。
jpnSearchText:
それじゃあ
頃合いを見て訪ねないとね。

engChrName: We will have to go and pay him a visit as soon as we have an opportunity.
engSearchText:
We will have to go and pay him a visit as soon as we
have an opportunity.
jpnChrName: それでは頃合いを見て訪ねてみましょう。
jpnSearchText: それでは頃合いを見て訪ねてみましょう。

engChrName: You really did come. Not that I didn't trust Dingo at all.
engSearchText:
You really did come. Not that I didn't trust Dingo
at all.
jpnChrName: おう、来やがったか。 ディンゴから聞いてた通りだったな。
jpnSearchText:
おう、来やがったか。
ディンゴから聞いてた通りだったな。

engChrName: The name's Van Arkride. I take it you're Meld's editor-in-chief?
engSearchText:
The name's Van Arkride. I take it you're
Meld's editor-in-chief?
jpnChrName: ヴァン・アークライドだ。 アンタが『メルド』の編集長か。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン・アークライドだ。
アンタが『メルド』の編集長か。

engChrName: Yep, that's me. Me and Dingo go back about seven years.
engSearchText:
Yep, that's me. Me and Dingo go back about
seven years.
jpnChrName: ああ、カニングだ。 ディンゴとは７年くらいの付き合いでな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、カニングだ。
ディンゴとは７年くらいの付き合いでな。

engChrName: He told me a lot about you. Sounds like you were real busy over in Oración, too.
engSearchText:
He told me a lot about you. Sounds like you were real
busy over in Oración, too.
jpnChrName: お前のことは色々聞いてたが…… 古都じゃ随分ご活躍だったそうじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
お前のことは色々聞いてたが……
古都じゃ随分ご活躍だったそうじゃねえか？

engChrName: Heh. No clue what you're on about.
engSearchText: Heh. No clue what you're on about.
jpnChrName: ハン……何のことかな。
jpnSearchText: ハン……何のことかな。

engChrName: (I thought there would be no reports about us being involved with it?)
engSearchText:
(I thought there would be no reports about us being
involved with it?)
jpnChrName: （……オラシオンでのわたし達の関与は   表向きにはなってないそうですが……）
jpnSearchText:
（……オラシオンでのわたし達の関与は
表向きにはなってないそうですが……）

engChrName: (There won't. The authorities are keeping it a secret.)
engSearchText: (There won't. The authorities are keeping it a secret.)
jpnChrName: （ええ、当局によって   伏せられた形にはなっていますね。）
jpnSearchText:
（ええ、当局によって
伏せられた形にはなっていますね。）

engChrName: (Dude's probably just saying that to get under our skin.)
engSearchText:
(Dude's probably just saying that to get under
our skin.)
jpnChrName: （カマかけだか何だか知らねえが   一筋縄じゃいかねえのは確かそうだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（カマかけだか何だか知らねえが
一筋縄じゃいかねえのは確かそうだな。）

engChrName: Heh. Well, whatever. It's not getting an article, so I'm not interested.
engSearchText:
Heh. Well, whatever. It's not getting an article,
so I'm not interested.
jpnChrName: クク、まあソイツはどうでもいい。 どうせ“飛ばし”としても使えねえしな。
jpnSearchText:
クク、まあソイツはどうでもいい。
どうせ“飛ばし”としても使えねえしな。

engChrName: I called you here for one of those 4SPGs of yours. Nothing more, nothing less.
engSearchText:
I called you here for one of those 4SPGs of yours.
Nothing more, nothing less.
jpnChrName: 掲示板に書いたようにあくまで ４ｓｐｇとやらの範疇での“依頼”だ。
jpnSearchText:
掲示板に書いたようにあくまで
４ｓｐｇとやらの範疇での“依頼”だ。

engChrName: The gist of it is that I want you to help me look for Dingo's notebook.
engSearchText:
The gist of it is that I want you to help me look
for Dingo's notebook.
jpnChrName: お前ら──ディンゴの野郎の “ネタ帳”を捜してみる気はねぇか？
jpnSearchText:
お前ら──ディンゴの野郎の
“ネタ帳”を捜してみる気はねぇか？

jpnChrName: そいつは……
jpnSearchText: そいつは……

engChrName: What's this about?
engSearchText: What's this about?
jpnChrName: ネタ帳、だと？
jpnSearchText: ネタ帳、だと？

engChrName: You suspect he had a notebook containing information he'd gathered as a reporter—or more like as an information dealer?
engSearchText:
You suspect he had a notebook containing
information he'd gathered as a reporter—or more like
as an information dealer?
jpnChrName: ルポライター……いえ情報屋としての 特別な情報をメモした手帳でしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
ルポライター……いえ情報屋としての
特別な情報をメモした手帳でしょうか？

engChrName: Both, actually.
engSearchText: Both, actually.
jpnChrName: その両方だと俺は踏んでるがな。
jpnSearchText: その両方だと俺は踏んでるがな。

engChrName: I first heard about it a few weeks ago, just before he headed off to Creil.
engSearchText:
I first heard about it a few weeks ago, just before he
headed off to Creil.
jpnChrName: ──半月以上前、ディンゴが クレイユ村に向かう直前だったか……
jpnSearchText:
──半月以上前、ディンゴが
クレイユ村に向かう直前だったか……

engChrName: I could tell he was chasing a dangerous scoop of some kind.
engSearchText:
I could tell he was chasing a dangerous scoop of
some kind.
jpnChrName: 露骨にキナ臭いヤマを追ってそうだったんで 冗談めかしてアイツにこう言ったんだ。
jpnSearchText:
露骨にキナ臭いヤマを追ってそうだったんで
冗談めかしてアイツにこう言ったんだ。

engChrName: So I jokingly asked if he had a will ready yet.
engSearchText: So I jokingly asked if he had a will ready yet.
jpnChrName: 『遺書の準備はしてんのか？』ってな。
jpnSearchText: 『遺書の準備はしてんのか？』ってな。

engChrName: Oh...
engSearchText: Oh...

engChrName: And look at us now. It didn't really occur to me, not even for a second, that this would happen to him just four days later.
engSearchText:
And look at us now. It didn't really occur to me, not
even for a second, that this would happen to him just
four days later.
jpnChrName: ハン……まさかその４日後に、 あんな事になるとは思わなかったが。
jpnSearchText:
ハン……まさかその４日後に、
あんな事になるとは思わなかったが。

engChrName: He laughed at it at the time, and said one thing to me.
engSearchText:
He laughed at it at the time, and said one thing
to me.
jpnChrName: ──ただ、その時ディンゴが 苦笑しつつこんな風に返しやがってな。
jpnSearchText:
──ただ、その時ディンゴが
苦笑しつつこんな風に返しやがってな。

engChrName: 'The closest thing I have to a will is my notebook.'
engSearchText: 'The closest thing I have to a will is my notebook.'
jpnChrName: 『遺書になりそうなのはネタ帳くらいだな』
jpnSearchText: 『遺書になりそうなのはネタ帳くらいだな』

engChrName: 'I've left it with a trusted source, so if anything happens to me, send out a 4SPG about it.'
engSearchText:
'I've left it with a trusted source, so if anything
happens to me, send out a 4SPG about it.'
jpnChrName: 『とある筋に預けてるから、俺に何かあったら   例の“４ｓｐｇ”あたりに出すといい』
jpnSearchText:
『とある筋に預けてるから、俺に何かあったら
例の“４ｓｐｇ”あたりに出すといい』

engChrName: Wait a second...
engSearchText: Wait a second...
jpnChrName: オイオイ、そいつは──
jpnSearchText: オイオイ、そいつは──

engChrName: So this is a third memento of his, on top of the video and camera...
engSearchText:
So this is a third memento of his, on top of the video
and camera...
jpnChrName: ……クレイユの映像やカメラに続く、 ディンゴの“第三の遺品”ってわけか。
jpnSearchText:
……クレイユの映像やカメラに続く、
ディンゴの“第三の遺品”ってわけか。

engChrName: We don't have that notebook ourselves, though.
engSearchText: We don't have that notebook ourselves, though.
jpnChrName: だが生憎だが、そのネタ帳を 俺が預かってるってことはねえぞ？
jpnSearchText:
だが生憎だが、そのネタ帳を
俺が預かってるってことはねえぞ？

engChrName: Sorry if that's what you were hopin' for.
engSearchText: Sorry if that's what you were hopin' for.
jpnChrName: 期待して呼んだのなら残念だったな。
jpnSearchText: 期待して呼んだのなら残念だったな。

engChrName: Oh, I never thought you did. But I suspect you're the only one who can track it down.
engSearchText:
Oh, I never thought you did. But I suspect you're the
only one who can track it down.
jpnChrName: ハッ、んな事は分かってんだよ。 だがそのネタ帳は多分４ｓｐｇでしか──
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、んな事は分かってんだよ。
だがそのネタ帳は多分４ｓｐｇでしか──

engChrName: Dingo seemed to trust you more than anyone, so I suspect that's the way he wanted it to play out, too.
engSearchText:
Dingo seemed to trust you more than anyone, so I
suspect that's the way he wanted it to play out, too.
jpnChrName: ディンゴが恐らく、一番信頼していた お前にしか辿り着けないブツなんだろう。
jpnSearchText:
ディンゴが恐らく、一番信頼していた
お前にしか辿り着けないブツなんだろう。

engChrName: The authorities have got everything that happened in Creil down on lock, and Almata are dead and gone.
engSearchText:
The authorities have got everything that happened in
Creil down on lock, and Almata are dead and gone.
jpnChrName: 当局に規制されてるネタっぽいし、 アルマータも壊滅しちまったからな。
jpnSearchText:
当局に規制されてるネタっぽいし、
アルマータも壊滅しちまったからな。

engChrName: So I can't imagine it'd have anything worth writing an article about in it to begin with, which means it's not worth my while hunting down.
engSearchText:
So I can't imagine it'd have anything worth writing an
article about in it to begin with, which means it's not
worth my while hunting down.
jpnChrName: 今さら記事にする旨みも無さそうだから わざわざ俺自身が確かめるつもりもねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
今さら記事にする旨みも無さそうだから
わざわざ俺自身が確かめるつもりもねぇ。

engChrName: But I can't just go and ignore his words about it.
engSearchText: But I can't just go and ignore his words about it.
jpnChrName: ──だがヤツから話を聞いてた以上、 スルーしちまうのもどうかと思ってな。
jpnSearchText:
──だがヤツから話を聞いてた以上、
スルーしちまうのもどうかと思ってな。

engChrName: So here we are. I'll put up the money for you to find this thing. My last gift to him.
engSearchText:
So here we are. I'll put up the money for you to find
this thing. My last gift to him.
jpnChrName: 香典代わりに依頼料を用意して こうして４ｓｐｇを出したってわけだ。
jpnSearchText:
香典代わりに依頼料を用意して
こうして４ｓｐｇを出したってわけだ。

engChrName: So, what's it gonna be, spriggan?
engSearchText: So, what's it gonna be, spriggan?
jpnChrName: で、どうする裏解決屋（スプリガン）。
jpnSearchText: で、どうする裏解決屋（スプリガン）。

engChrName: You gonna go find Dingo's notebook, or not?
engSearchText: You gonna go find Dingo's notebook, or not?
jpnChrName: ディンゴが遺したネタ帳の捜索── 引き受けるのか、それとも断んのか。
jpnSearchText:
ディンゴが遺したネタ帳の捜索──
引き受けるのか、それとも断んのか。

engChrName: So, what's it gonna be, spriggan?
engSearchText: So, what's it gonna be, spriggan?
jpnChrName: どうする裏解決屋（スプリガン）。
jpnSearchText: どうする裏解決屋（スプリガン）。

engChrName: You gonna go find Dingo's notebook, or not?
engSearchText: You gonna go find Dingo's notebook, or not?
jpnChrName: ディンゴが遺したネタ帳の捜索── 引き受けるのか、それとも断んのか。
jpnSearchText:
ディンゴが遺したネタ帳の捜索──
引き受けるのか、それとも断んのか。

engChrName: Sorry, but we've got a lot on our plate right now. I can't give you an answer right away.
engSearchText:
Sorry, but we've got a lot on our plate right now.
I can't give you an answer right away.
jpnChrName: ……悪いが、他にも片付けることが あるから即答はできねぇな。
jpnSearchText:
……悪いが、他にも片付けることが
あるから即答はできねぇな。

engChrName: Heh. Fair enough. Let me know if you do take the job on, though.
engSearchText:
Heh. Fair enough. Let me know if you do take the
job on, though.
jpnChrName: ハン、まあいいだろう。 その気になったら声をかけな。
jpnSearchText:
ハン、まあいいだろう。
その気になったら声をかけな。

engChrName: You don't have to if you don't want to, y'know. Hell, it'd be cheaper for me if you didn't.
engSearchText:
You don't have to if you don't want to, y'know.
Hell, it'd be cheaper for me if you didn't.
jpnChrName: ま、俺としては懐も痛まねえし、 断ってくれても一向に構わないぜ？
jpnSearchText:
ま、俺としては懐も痛まねえし、
断ってくれても一向に構わないぜ？

engChrName: We'll take the job. You got anything else you want to share?
engSearchText:
We'll take the job. You got anything else you want
to share?
jpnChrName: 引き受けた──もう少し突っ込んだ 話を聞かせてもらおうか。
jpnSearchText:
引き受けた──もう少し突っ込んだ
話を聞かせてもらおうか。

engChrName: Maybe he said something more about this trusted source of his, for example?
engSearchText:
Maybe he said something more about this trusted
source of his, for example?
jpnChrName: “とある筋”っていうのについて 他に何かディンゴは言ってなかったか？
jpnSearchText:
“とある筋”っていうのについて
他に何かディンゴは言ってなかったか？

engChrName: Heh. Yeah, I remember telling him that was nowhere near enough info to find the thing myself.
engSearchText:
Heh. Yeah, I remember telling him that was nowhere
near enough info to find the thing myself.
jpnChrName: ああ、それだけじゃ分からんだろうと 俺もアイツに突っ込んだんだが……
jpnSearchText:
ああ、それだけじゃ分からんだろうと
俺もアイツに突っ込んだんだが……

engChrName: Only hint he gave me was that it's with 'people who know about as much about my past as you do.'
engSearchText:
Only hint he gave me was that it's with 'people who
know about as much about my past as you do.'
jpnChrName: 『あんたと同じくらい俺の過去を知ってる   連中ってのがヒントだ』とか言ってたぜ？
jpnSearchText:
『あんたと同じくらい俺の過去を知ってる
連中ってのがヒントだ』とか言ってたぜ？

engChrName: Hmm...
engSearchText: Hmm...
jpnChrName: そいつは……
jpnSearchText: そいつは……

engChrName: Heh. Way to pique my interest.
engSearchText: Heh. Way to pique my interest.
jpnChrName: ハン…… なかなか気を持たせるじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
ハン……
なかなか気を持たせるじゃねえか。

engChrName: I wonder what Dingo's past was like...
engSearchText: I wonder what Dingo's past was like...
jpnChrName: ディンゴさんの過去、というと……
jpnSearchText: ディンゴさんの過去、というと……

engChrName: I've only heard bits of it myself.
engSearchText: I've only heard bits of it myself.
jpnChrName: ……俺はあいつの過去について 幾つか断片的にしか聞いてねぇが……
jpnSearchText:
……俺はあいつの過去について
幾つか断片的にしか聞いてねぇが……

engChrName: How much do you know?
engSearchText: How much do you know?
jpnChrName: アンタはどれだけ知っているんだ？
jpnSearchText: アンタはどれだけ知っているんだ？

engChrName: Even less than you do, I suspect.
engSearchText: Even less than you do, I suspect.
jpnChrName: それこそ、お前ほどじゃねえだろう。
jpnSearchText: それこそ、お前ほどじゃねえだろう。

engChrName: I know he used to live in Messeldam before ending up in the capital seven years ago. That's about it.
engSearchText:
I know he used to live in Messeldam before ending
up in the capital seven years ago. That's about it.
jpnChrName: あいつが７年前に首都に流れ着いて── その前はメッセルダムにいた事くらいだ。
jpnSearchText:
あいつが７年前に首都に流れ着いて──
その前はメッセルダムにいた事くらいだ。

engChrName: (Wait, didn't Dantès act like he knew him?)
engSearchText: (Wait, didn't Dantès act like he knew him?)
jpnChrName: （それって確か……）
jpnSearchText: （それって確か……）

engChrName: It's been some time since we last met, Dingo Brad. Though we did cross paths in Tharbad— albeit briefly.
engSearchText:
It's been some time since we last met, Dingo Brad.
Though we did cross paths in Tharbad—
albeit briefly.
jpnChrName: 久しぶりだな、ディンゴ・ブラッド。 ──サルバッドでのあ（・）れ（・）はさておき。
jpnSearchText:
久しぶりだな、ディンゴ・ブラッド。
──サルバッドでのあ（・）れ（・）はさておき。

engChrName: If we exclude that little encounter, I haven't seen you since your days as a mere informant in Messeldam.
engSearchText:
If we exclude that little encounter, I haven't seen you
since your days as a mere informant in Messeldam.
jpnChrName: お前がメッセルダム界隈で ケチな情報屋をやってた時以来か？
jpnSearchText:
お前がメッセルダム界隈で
ケチな情報屋をやってた時以来か？

engChrName: Yeah, and you were still Enrique's second-in-command back then.
engSearchText:
Yeah, and you were still Enrique's
second-in-command back then.
jpnChrName: ……アンタがエンリケの下で 若頭をやってた時以来だ。
jpnSearchText:
……アンタがエンリケの下で
若頭をやってた時以来だ。

engChrName: (Saying the two of them knew each other at length beforehand would be a fair assumption.)
engSearchText:
(Saying the two of them knew each other at length
beforehand would be a fair assumption.)
jpnChrName: （……あのクレイユ村の映像で   そのような話が出ていましたね。）
jpnSearchText:
（……あのクレイユ村の映像で
そのような話が出ていましたね。）

engChrName: (He said something along those lines when they were talking in that video, too.)
engSearchText:
(He said something along those lines when they were
talking in that video, too.)
jpnChrName: （あのクレイユ村の映像で   そんな話が出ていたね……）
jpnSearchText:
（あのクレイユ村の映像で
そんな話が出ていたね……）

engChrName: (They did touch on it during the Creil video.)
engSearchText: (They did touch on it during the Creil video.)
jpnChrName: （あのクレイユ村の映像で   そんな話が出ていたわね……）
jpnSearchText:
（あのクレイユ村の映像で
そんな話が出ていたわね……）

engChrName: All right. We'll see what we can dig up with that info, then.
engSearchText:
All right. We'll see what we can dig up with that
info, then.
jpnChrName: ……なるほど。 精々ヒントにさせてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
……なるほど。
精々ヒントにさせてもらうぜ。

engChrName: Good luck.
engSearchText: Good luck.
jpnChrName: クク、まあ適当に頑張れや。
jpnSearchText: クク、まあ適当に頑張れや。

engChrName: Anyway, my break's over. I've gotta get back to work on finding scoops for the festival.
engSearchText:
Anyway, my break's over. I've gotta get back to work
on finding scoops for the festival.
jpnChrName: 休憩も終わりだ──革命記念祭に向けた スクープの仕込みもあるんでな。
jpnSearchText:
休憩も終わりだ──革命記念祭に向けた
スクープの仕込みもあるんでな。

engChrName: I'll give you my number. Just give me a call if you do find it.
engSearchText:
I'll give you my number. Just give me a call if you do
find it.
jpnChrName: 連絡先を教えておくから、ネタ帳を 見つけたら報告だけしてくれりゃあいい。
jpnSearchText:
連絡先を教えておくから、ネタ帳を
見つけたら報告だけしてくれりゃあいい。

engChrName: I'll wire you the money if you do. It can be my way of honoring Dingo's death.
engSearchText:
I'll wire you the money if you do. It can be my way of
honoring Dingo's death.
jpnChrName: さっきも言ったように香典代わりだ、 指定口座にミラを振り込んでやるよ。
jpnSearchText:
さっきも言ったように香典代わりだ、
指定口座にミラを振り込んでやるよ。

engChrName: Got it. We'll take it from here.
engSearchText: Got it. We'll take it from here.
jpnChrName: ああ── それじゃあ後は引き受けた。
jpnSearchText:
ああ──
それじゃあ後は引き受けた。

engChrName: So, what's the plan here? We don't exactly have a load of info to go off of.
engSearchText:
So, what's the plan here? We don't exactly have a load
of info to go off of.
jpnChrName: で、どうすんだ？ 正直手がかりが少なすぎる気もするが。
jpnSearchText:
で、どうすんだ？
正直手がかりが少なすぎる気もするが。

engChrName: Only clue we have is that it's someone that knows as much about Dingo as that guy does...
engSearchText:
Only clue we have is that it's someone that knows as
much about Dingo as that guy does...
jpnChrName: えと、今の人と同じくらいディンゴさんの 過去を知ってる人たち……でしたっけ？
jpnSearchText:
えと、今の人と同じくらいディンゴさんの
過去を知ってる人たち……でしたっけ？

engChrName: That rules out Jack and Bermotti—and Van, obviously.
engSearchText:
That rules out Jack and Bermotti—and
Van, obviously.
jpnChrName: するとヴァンさんは勿論、ジャックさんや ベルモッティさんも条件から外れそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
するとヴァンさんは勿論、ジャックさんや
ベルモッティさんも条件から外れそうですね。

engChrName: Oh, and Renne, too.
engSearchText: Oh, and Renne, too.
jpnChrName: あと……レン先輩もですか。
jpnSearchText: あと……レン先輩もですか。

engChrName: Yeah. Any information dealer's probably out of question here, and so is anyone with as many connections as Renne has.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Any information dealer's probably out of
question here, and so is anyone with as many
connections as Renne has.
jpnChrName: ああ、その意味で情報屋や それに匹敵する事情通は外せるだろう。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、その意味で情報屋や
それに匹敵する事情通は外せるだろう。

engChrName: And people like Nina and I know even less than that editor-in-chief does.
engSearchText:
And people like Nina and I know even less than that
editor-in-chief does.
jpnChrName: ……あたしやニナみたいな芸能人は 逆に殆どプロフィールは知らなそうね。
jpnSearchText:
……あたしやニナみたいな芸能人は
逆に殆どプロフィールは知らなそうね。

engChrName: Dingo was a very private person, and it went both ways. It honestly surprised me to see a gossip magazine reporter being so considerate.
engSearchText:
Dingo was a very private person, and it went
both ways. It honestly surprised me to see a gossip
magazine reporter being so considerate.
jpnChrName: ゴシップ誌の記者にしては弁えていたけど ミステリアスな人って印象だったし。
jpnSearchText:
ゴシップ誌の記者にしては弁えていたけど
ミステリアスな人って印象だったし。

engChrName: That's just how Dingo was.
engSearchText: That's just how Dingo was.
jpnChrName: ま、そこらへんは 一線を引いてたみたいだからな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、そこらへんは
一線を引いてたみたいだからな。

engChrName: Jack, Bermotti, and I tried not to pry into his past either, mind you.
engSearchText:
Jack, Bermotti, and I tried not to pry into his past
either, mind you.
jpnChrName: ……俺やジャック、ベルモッティも あまり突っ込まないようにはしていたが。
jpnSearchText:
……俺やジャック、ベルモッティも
あまり突っ込まないようにはしていたが。

engChrName: But somethin' must've happened between Dingo and Dantès while he was still in Messeldam.
engSearchText:
But somethin' must've happened between Dingo and
Dantès while he was still in Messeldam.
jpnChrName: やはりディンゴはメッセルダム時代、 ジェラールと何らかの接点があったんだろう。
jpnSearchText:
やはりディンゴはメッセルダム時代、
ジェラールと何らかの接点があったんだろう。

engChrName: He left the city after whatever that was, ending up in the capital and becomin' a reporter right after.
engSearchText:
He left the city after whatever that was, ending up in
the capital and becomin' a reporter right after.
jpnChrName: そして何かの事情でメッセルダムを離れ、 首都に流れてルポライターもやり始めた……
jpnSearchText:
そして何かの事情でメッセルダムを離れ、
首都に流れてルポライターもやり始めた……

engChrName: Dunno any details, but I imagine we'll get out of this knowin' a whole lot more than we came in with.
engSearchText:
Dunno any details, but I imagine we'll get out of this
knowin' a whole lot more than we came in with.
jpnChrName: 多分、今回の依頼はそのあたりの事情に 光を当てることになりそうな気がするぜ。
jpnSearchText:
多分、今回の依頼はそのあたりの事情に
光を当てることになりそうな気がするぜ。

engChrName: We're gonna be unearthing what he tried to bury this whole time. All the burdens he carried by himself.
engSearchText:
We're gonna be unearthing what he tried to bury this
whole time. All the burdens he carried by himself.
jpnChrName: ディンゴが隠してきた、背負ってきたものを 暴いちまうという意味でな。
jpnSearchText:
ディンゴが隠してきた、背負ってきたものを
暴いちまうという意味でな。

engChrName: Van...
engSearchText: Van...
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん……
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん……

engChrName: You don't look like you're about to back down, though.
engSearchText:
You don't look like you're about to back
down, though.
jpnChrName: だが、やるって決めたんだな？
jpnSearchText: だが、やるって決めたんだな？

engChrName: Hah, no way. A job's a job, and I'm nothin' if I can't see this kinda shit through.
engSearchText:
Hah, no way. A job's a job, and I'm nothin' if I can't
see this kinda shit through.
jpnChrName: ああ、４ｓｐｇとして受けた以上、 躊躇するつもりはねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、４ｓｐｇとして受けた以上、
躊躇するつもりはねぇ。

engChrName: But anyway. I can think of at least one person who'd fit the bill for this job that won't be a pain in the ass to meet up with.
engSearchText:
But anyway. I can think of at least one person who'd
fit the bill for this job that won't be a pain in the ass
to meet up with.
jpnChrName: まずは手頃な“筋”から当たってみるぞ。
jpnSearchText: まずは手頃な“筋”から当たってみるぞ。

engChrName: Oh?
engSearchText: Oh?
jpnChrName: 手頃な“筋”……ですか？
jpnSearchText: 手頃な“筋”……ですか？

engChrName: It's not an information dealer, mind you, but she was close to Dingo.
engSearchText:
It's not an information dealer, mind you, but she was
close to Dingo.
jpnChrName: あいつとそ（・）れ（・）な（・）り（・）以（・）上（・）に親しくしながら “情報通”とまでは言えない人物──
jpnSearchText:
あいつとそ（・）れ（・）な（・）り（・）以（・）上（・）に親しくしながら
“情報通”とまでは言えない人物──

engChrName: I can't be the only one who immediately thought of her.
engSearchText:
I can't be the only one who immediately thought
of her.
jpnChrName: 真っ先に思いつきそうなのがいるだろうが？
jpnSearchText: 真っ先に思いつきそうなのがいるだろうが？

engChrName: Oh!
engSearchText: Oh!

engChrName: I suspect I see who you mean now.
engSearchText: I suspect I see who you mean now.
jpnChrName: なるほど、彼女か。
jpnSearchText: なるほど、彼女か。

engChrName: A rookie reporter who's still unwise to the ways of the underworld.
engSearchText:
A rookie reporter who's still unwise to the ways of
the underworld.
jpnChrName: 記者だけどまだ一年目で、 裏の事情までは詳しくない……
jpnSearchText:
記者だけどまだ一年目で、
裏の事情までは詳しくない……

engChrName: It does seem plausible that she might know something.
engSearchText:
It does seem plausible that she might
know something.
jpnChrName: 確かに、何らかの断片情報を ご存じの可能性はありそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
確かに、何らかの断片情報を
ご存じの可能性はありそうですね。

engChrName: Are we going to meet her, then?
engSearchText: Are we going to meet her, then?
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん、それじゃあ……？
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん、それじゃあ……？

engChrName: Yeah, let's head on over to the Tyrell Times.
engSearchText: Yeah, let's head on over to the Tyrell Times.
jpnChrName: ああ、タイレル地区の 通信社に顔を出してみるぞ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、タイレル地区の
通信社に顔を出してみるぞ。

engChrName: Don't think a meetin' with her will be all that hard to get as long as she's not out of the office.
engSearchText:
Don't think a meetin' with her will be all that hard to
get as long as she's not out of the office.
jpnChrName: 取材に出てなけりゃあ会える筈だ。
jpnSearchText: 取材に出てなけりゃあ会える筈だ。

engChrName: Right!
engSearchText: Right!
jpnChrName: はいっ！
jpnSearchText: はいっ！

engChrName: Oh, damn it! That bastard up and left us with the bill.
engSearchText: Oh, damn it! That bastard up and left us with the bill.
jpnChrName: ってあのオッサン、しれっと 伝票を残していきやがった……
jpnSearchText:
ってあのオッサン、しれっと
伝票を残していきやがった……

engChrName: Gotta be pretty sly if you're gonna be running the biggest gossip rag in the country.
engSearchText:
Gotta be pretty sly if you're gonna be running the
biggest gossip rag in the country.
jpnChrName: クク、さすが業界一の ゴシップ誌の親玉ってとこか。
jpnSearchText:
クク、さすが業界一の
ゴシップ誌の親玉ってとこか。

engChrName: W-Well, it's the least we could do for him since he brought this to our attention.
engSearchText:
W-Well, it's the least we could do for him since he
brought this to our attention.
jpnChrName: ま、まあ耳寄りな話を持ってきてくれた お礼代わりに立て替えましょうか……
jpnSearchText:
ま、まあ耳寄りな話を持ってきてくれた
お礼代わりに立て替えましょうか……

engChrName: (Whoops. Can't forget to bring Agnès before I hit this place up.)
engSearchText:
(Whoops. Can't forget to bring Agnès before I hit
this place up.)
jpnChrName: （おっと、店を当たるなら 　アニエスを連れて来ないとな。）
jpnSearchText:
（おっと、店を当たるなら
　アニエスを連れて来ないとな。）

engChrName: Oh! You couldn't have come at a better time!
engSearchText: Oh! You couldn't have come at a better time!
jpnChrName: ──あら、良いタイミングね。
jpnSearchText: ──あら、良いタイミングね。

engChrName: I have a particular snack I stocked a surplus of in preparation for the festival.
engSearchText:
I have a particular snack I stocked a surplus of in
preparation for the festival.
jpnChrName: ちょうど記念祭に向けて、 あるお菓子を多めに仕入れておいたの。
jpnSearchText:
ちょうど記念祭に向けて、
あるお菓子を多めに仕入れておいたの。

engChrName: They're called honey glazed pretzels, and they're very popular over in Crossbell. Have you heard of them?
engSearchText:
They're called honey glazed pretzels, and they're very
popular over in Crossbell. Have you heard of them?
jpnChrName: クロスベル自治州で人気のハニープレッツェル。 知ってるかしら？
jpnSearchText:
クロスベル自治州で人気のハニープレッツェル。
知ってるかしら？

engChrName: I have! They're a kind of bread shaped like a knot, right?
engSearchText:
I have! They're a kind of bread shaped like a
knot, right?
jpnChrName: あ、知ってます！ 結び目の形の菓子パンですよね。
jpnSearchText:
あ、知ってます！
結び目の形の菓子パンですよね。

engChrName: But I've never had the chance to try one.
engSearchText: But I've never had the chance to try one.
jpnChrName: でも、食べたことは無くて。
jpnSearchText: でも、食べたことは無くて。

engChrName: I believe they're originally Erebonian, actually.
engSearchText: I believe they're originally Erebonian, actually.
jpnChrName: たしか発祥はエレボニア帝国だったな。
jpnSearchText: たしか発祥はエレボニア帝国だったな。

engChrName: They wound up in Crossbell, where honey and Eastern spices were added to the mix and bam. Somethin' totally unique.
engSearchText:
They wound up in Crossbell, where honey and
Eastern spices were added to the mix and bam.
Somethin' totally unique.
jpnChrName: それがクロスベルに伝わって、蜂蜜や 東方のスパイスを使った独自の進化を遂げたらしい。
jpnSearchText:
それがクロスベルに伝わって、蜂蜜や
東方のスパイスを使った独自の進化を遂げたらしい。

engChrName: Could we take a few of them off your hands to go as a sampler?
engSearchText:
Could we take a few of them off your hands to go as
a sampler?
jpnChrName: 試食用にテイクアウトするので、いくつか頂けますか？
jpnSearchText: 試食用にテイクアウトするので、いくつか頂けますか？

engChrName: Okay, we've visited all the stores we planned on.
engSearchText: Okay, we've visited all the stores we planned on.
jpnChrName: これで目当ての店は一通り回ったな。
jpnSearchText: これで目当ての店は一通り回ったな。

engChrName: We've also got plenty of things to try! Shall we head back to Odette?
engSearchText:
We've also got plenty of things to try! Shall we head
back to Odette?
jpnChrName: 試食も揃いましたし充分ですね！ オデットたちのところへ戻りましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
試食も揃いましたし充分ですね！
オデットたちのところへ戻りましょうか。

engChrName: This is the area in front of the station, the Seventh District. Of course, I'm sure this ain't your first time coming here.
engSearchText:
This is the area in front of the station, the
Seventh District. Of course, I'm sure this ain't your
first time coming here.
jpnChrName: 七区イーディス駅前通り── ここの紹介はいらないな？
jpnSearchText:
七区イーディス駅前通り──
ここの紹介はいらないな？

engChrName: It isn't. It'd be hard to live in Edith and not come here from time to time.
engSearchText:
It isn't. It'd be hard to live in Edith and not come
here from time to time.
jpnChrName: はい、さすがに何回も来ていますから。
jpnSearchText: はい、さすがに何回も来ていますから。

engChrName: My work brings me here plenty, too, so that's not gonna be changin'.
engSearchText:
My work brings me here plenty, too, so that's not
gonna be changin'.
jpnChrName: 裏解決屋としても けっこう立ち寄る場所ではあるな。
jpnSearchText:
裏解決屋としても
けっこう立ち寄る場所ではあるな。

engChrName: Aside from the station itself, there's also the department store where you can stock up on items and equipment.
engSearchText:
Aside from the station itself, there's also the
department store where you can stock up on items
and equipment.
jpnChrName: 百貨店で装備やら薬やら、 大抵のものは買い揃えられる。
jpnSearchText:
百貨店で装備やら薬やら、
大抵のものは買い揃えられる。

engChrName: Then there's the orbal café over there. If you need anything Xipha-related, that's where you'll wanna go.
engSearchText:
Then there's the orbal café over there. If you need
anything Xipha-related, that's where you'll wanna go.
jpnChrName: んで向こうの《オーバルカフェ》で ザイファの整備と調整が出来る。
jpnSearchText:
んで向こうの《オーバルカフェ》で
ザイファの整備と調整が出来る。

engChrName: As long as you know where those two places are, you're golden. You can get most stuff you need between 'em.
engSearchText:
As long as you know where those two places are,
you're golden. You can get most stuff you need
between 'em.
jpnChrName: 必要な準備はこの２箇所で大体まかなえるから そこさえ押さえておけば問題ないだろ。
jpnSearchText:
必要な準備はこの２箇所で大体まかなえるから
そこさえ押さえておけば問題ないだろ。

engChrName: The head branch of the Bracer Guild in Calvard is also here, isn't it?
engSearchText:
The head branch of the Bracer Guild in Calvard is
also here, isn't it?
jpnChrName: それと、遊撃士協会── 共和国の総支部もありますね。
jpnSearchText:
それと、遊撃士協会──
共和国の総支部もありますね。

engChrName: Urk... Yeah, but I'd rather not go anywhere near there unless we got a good reason to.
engSearchText:
Urk... Yeah, but I'd rather not go anywhere near there
unless we got a good reason to.
jpnChrName: あー、あっちは用がない限り なるべく近づきたくねぇが。
jpnSearchText:
あー、あっちは用がない限り
なるべく近づきたくねぇが。

engChrName: Oh? How come?
engSearchText: Oh? How come?
jpnChrName: ？　どうしてですか？
jpnSearchText: ？　どうしてですか？

engChrName: Call it a business rivalry. Not to mention we can brush up against the line of what's considered strictly legal here and there.
engSearchText:
Call it a business rivalry. Not to mention we can
brush up against the line of what's considered strictly
legal here and there.
jpnChrName: ある意味うちと競合してるし こっちは色々とグレーな商売なんでな。
jpnSearchText:
ある意味うちと競合してるし
こっちは色々とグレーな商売なんでな。

engChrName: The less they notice us, the better. You can go and visit them if you want, but I'd rather not go with you.
engSearchText:
The less they notice us, the better. You can go and
visit them if you want, but I'd rather not go with you.
jpnChrName: 目を付けられると面倒だ── お前が行くってんなら別に止めねぇが。
jpnSearchText:
目を付けられると面倒だ──
お前が行くってんなら別に止めねぇが。

engChrName: I-I see...
engSearchText: I-I see...
jpnChrName: そ、そうですか……
jpnSearchText: そ、そうですか……

engChrName: (For someone who wants nothing to do with the guild, he seemed to know that bracer we encountered in the Riverside District very well.)
engSearchText:
(For someone who wants nothing to do with the
guild, he seemed to know that bracer we encountered
in the Riverside District very well.)
jpnChrName: （あれ、でも前にリバーサイドで会った   あの方とはお知り合いみたいでしたけど……）
jpnSearchText:
（あれ、でも前にリバーサイドで会った
あの方とはお知り合いみたいでしたけど……）

engChrName: Anyway, now that we're here, let's just look around for a bit until our client calls.
engSearchText:
Anyway, now that we're here, let's just look around
for a bit until our client calls.
jpnChrName: さて、依頼主（ロット）から連絡が来るまでの間 適当に見て回るとするか。
jpnSearchText:
さて、依頼主（ロット）から連絡が来るまでの間
適当に見て回るとするか。

engChrName: Right!
engSearchText: Right!
jpnChrName: はい……！
jpnSearchText: はい……！

engChrName: Two of your limited edition lattes, to go.
engSearchText: Two of your limited edition lattes, to go.
jpnChrName: イオタ限定ラテ２つ、テイクアウトで。
jpnSearchText: イオタ限定ラテ２つ、テイクアウトで。

engChrName: Coming right up! I thought you'd be pleased to see them in the menu again.
engSearchText:
Coming right up! I thought you'd be pleased to see
them in the menu again.
jpnChrName: 限定ラテだね、販売再開してるよ。 ちょっと待っていてくれ。
jpnSearchText:
限定ラテだね、販売再開してるよ。
ちょっと待っていてくれ。

engChrName: Ah, shit. You mind havin' the same as me? Sorry, I probably should've asked.
engSearchText:
Ah, shit. You mind havin' the same as me? Sorry, I
probably should've asked.
jpnChrName: ああ……さっきも聞き忘れたが、 俺と同じものでいいのか？
jpnSearchText:
ああ……さっきも聞き忘れたが、
俺と同じものでいいのか？

engChrName: Oh, it's fine.
engSearchText: Oh, it's fine.
jpnChrName: はい、大丈夫ですよ。
jpnSearchText: はい、大丈夫ですよ。

engChrName: I feel like I can trust your taste when it comes to sweet things.
engSearchText:
I feel like I can trust your taste when it comes to
sweet things.
jpnChrName: 甘い物に関しては、 ヴァンさんに任せたほうがよさそうですし。
jpnSearchText:
甘い物に関しては、
ヴァンさんに任せたほうがよさそうですし。

engChrName: Heh. Damn right you can.
engSearchText: Heh. Damn right you can.
jpnChrName: ハッ、分かってるじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、分かってるじゃねえか。

engChrName: (They're not gonna follow us up to the second floor, huh?)
engSearchText:
(They're not gonna follow us up to the second
floor, huh?)
jpnChrName: （……２Ｆには上がってこねえ、か。）
jpnSearchText: （……２Ｆには上がってこねえ、か。）

engChrName: Sorry for the wait. Here's your lattes. Be careful, 'cause they're hot!
engSearchText:
Sorry for the wait. Here's your lattes. Be careful,
'cause they're hot!
jpnChrName: イオタ限定ラテ、お待たせしたね。 熱いから気を付けてくれ。
jpnSearchText:
イオタ限定ラテ、お待たせしたね。
熱いから気を付けてくれ。

engChrName: Van received his order.
engSearchText: Van received his order.
jpnChrName: 商品を受け取った。
jpnSearchText: <C1>商品を受け取った。

engChrName: All right. Last stop's the flower seller in Old Town.
engSearchText: All right. Last stop's the flower seller in Old Town.
jpnChrName: そんじゃ最後は旧市街に戻って、 花屋にでも寄ってくか。
jpnSearchText:
そんじゃ最後は旧市街に戻って、
花屋にでも寄ってくか。

engChrName: To collect the muffins you asked for earlier?
engSearchText: To collect the muffins you asked for earlier?
jpnChrName: あ、取り置きを頼んでいた…… スイートマフィンでしたか。
jpnSearchText:
あ、取り置きを頼んでいた……
スイートマフィンでしたか。

engChrName: Yup. Dying to give 'em a try. Let's get goin'.
engSearchText: Yup. Dying to give 'em a try. Let's get goin'.
jpnChrName: ああ、今回の新作がどんなもんか楽しみだ。 とっとと行くとしようぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、今回の新作がどんなもんか楽しみだ。
とっとと行くとしようぜ。

engChrName: I thought we were purchasing sweets? What does a flower seller have to do with that?
engSearchText:
I thought we were purchasing sweets? What does a
flower seller have to do with that?
jpnChrName: 花屋、ですか？ 甘い物を買うんじゃ……
jpnSearchText:
花屋、ですか？
甘い物を買うんじゃ……

engChrName: The guy uses flower nectar to make baked goods on the side.
engSearchText:
The guy uses flower nectar to make baked goods on
the side.
jpnChrName: 花の蜜を使った焼き菓子を 手すさびに作ってる店でな。
jpnSearchText:
花の蜜を使った焼き菓子を
手すさびに作ってる店でな。

engChrName: Didn't get a chance to see him earlier on today, but I heard through the grapevine he's been workin' on somethin' new. Let's give it a look.
engSearchText:
Didn't get a chance to see him earlier on today, but I
heard through the grapevine he's been workin' on
somethin' new. Let's give it a look.
jpnChrName: 昼は回り忘れてたが新作を作ってるって噂だ。 せっかくだし覗いてみるぞ。
jpnSearchText:
昼は回り忘れてたが新作を作ってるって噂だ。
せっかくだし覗いてみるぞ。

engChrName: Tch.
engSearchText: Tch.

engChrName: You stay right there.
engSearchText: You stay right there.
jpnChrName: 待ちなさい、ヴァン。
jpnSearchText: 待ちなさい、ヴァン。

engChrName: It's very rude to try and slink off the second you see someone, you know.
engSearchText:
It's very rude to try and slink off the second you see
someone, you know.
jpnChrName: 人の顔を見てすぐ逃げようと しないでくれるかしら。
jpnSearchText:
人の顔を見てすぐ逃げようと
しないでくれるかしら。

engChrName: Was just bein' mindful. Didn't wanna bother you two.
engSearchText:
Was just bein' mindful. Didn't wanna bother
you two.
jpnChrName: いやほら、タイミングが悪いようで。
jpnSearchText: いやほら、タイミングが悪いようで。

engChrName: Your timing's actually perfect.
engSearchText: Your timing's actually perfect.
jpnChrName: そんなことはない、 むしろタイミングがいい。
jpnSearchText:
そんなことはない、
むしろタイミングがいい。

engChrName: I was just telling her about how I ran into you guys earlier today.
engSearchText:
I was just telling her about how I ran into you guys
earlier today.
jpnChrName: ちょうど昼間貴方たちに 会ったことを話している所でね。
jpnSearchText:
ちょうど昼間貴方たちに
会ったことを話している所でね。

engChrName: We can get through the story faster with you here.
engSearchText: We can get through the story faster with you here.
jpnChrName: 一緒に話してくれると手っ取り早いかな。
jpnSearchText: 一緒に話してくれると手っ取り早いかな。

engChrName: That's not...
engSearchText: That's not...
jpnChrName: いや、それは……
jpnSearchText: いや、それは……

engChrName: Fine. I guess I can chat you guys up for a sec.
engSearchText: Fine. I guess I can chat you guys up for a sec.
jpnChrName: ……仕方ねえな。 一杯だけなら付き合わせてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
……仕方ねえな。
一杯だけなら付き合わせてもらうぜ。

engChrName: Trust you to sit next to Fie instead of me. Is she more your type?
engSearchText:
Trust you to sit next to Fie instead of me. Is she more
your type?
jpnChrName: そっちに座るのね。 フィーは美人だからそれも当然ね。
jpnSearchText:
そっちに座るのね。
フィーは美人だからそれも当然ね。

engChrName: It's 'cause she's the one who invited me over. Don't look too hard into things.
engSearchText:
It's 'cause she's the one who invited me over.
Don't look too hard into things.
jpnChrName: いや彼女が話を聞きたいって言うから、 別に他意はねえよ。
jpnSearchText:
いや彼女が話を聞きたいって言うから、
別に他意はねえよ。

engChrName: I'm just kidding. ...Though you'll forgive me for being suspicious when you seemingly only employ young women now.
engSearchText:
I'm just kidding. ...Though you'll forgive me for being
suspicious when you seemingly only employ young
women now.
jpnChrName: 冗談よ……そもそもアニエスさんたちを 助手にした時点で色々と疑わしいけど。
jpnSearchText:
冗談よ……そもそもアニエスさんたちを
助手にした時点で色々と疑わしいけど。

engChrName: I didn't hire any of 'em willingly! I told you that already. You know I'd much rather work alone if I can help it.
engSearchText:
I didn't hire any of 'em willingly! I told you
that already. You know I'd much rather work alone if
I can help it.
jpnChrName: それも不本意だって言ったろ。 俺としてはむしろ一人の方が動きやすい。
jpnSearchText:
それも不本意だって言ったろ。
俺としてはむしろ一人の方が動きやすい。

engChrName: I know. Easier for your shady work to happen when there's no witnesses at all, right?
engSearchText:
I know. Easier for your shady work to happen when
there's no witnesses at all, right?
jpnChrName: やましい所を人に見られずに済むからね。
jpnSearchText: やましい所を人に見られずに済むからね。

engChrName: There's nothing shady about my work! I got standards and I ain't about to forgo 'em.
engSearchText:
There's nothing shady about my work! I got standards
and I ain't about to forgo 'em.
jpnChrName: 一応俺なりの流儀でやってるから、 そこまでやましいことはねえよ……
jpnSearchText:
一応俺なりの流儀でやってるから、
そこまでやましいことはねえよ……

engChrName: Then why are you always trying to avoid me?
engSearchText: Then why are you always trying to avoid me?
jpnChrName: だったらどうして 私を避けているのかしら？
jpnSearchText:
だったらどうして
私を避けているのかしら？

engChrName: Now, that's a whole different issue.
engSearchText: Now, that's a whole different issue.
jpnChrName: いやそれはまた別の話っつーか……
jpnSearchText: いやそれはまた別の話っつーか……

engChrName: Third-wheeling's no fun.
engSearchText: Third-wheeling's no fun.
jpnChrName: 痴話げんかに挟まれちゃったか。
jpnSearchText: 痴話げんかに挟まれちゃったか。

engChrName: That wasn't... *sigh* Sorry, I didn't want you to see me like that.
engSearchText:
That wasn't... *sigh* Sorry, I didn't want you to see
me like that.
jpnChrName: そういうつもりじゃ…… ふう、みっともない所を見せたわね。
jpnSearchText:
そういうつもりじゃ……
ふう、みっともない所を見せたわね。

engChrName: Oh, I could listen to this all night. Not everyone gets to see the Beauty's Blade like this.
engSearchText:
Oh, I could listen to this all night. Not everyone gets
to see the Beauty's Blade like this.
jpnChrName: むしろもっとやっていいよ、 剣の乙女のオフショットは新鮮だし。
jpnSearchText:
むしろもっとやっていいよ、
剣の乙女のオフショットは新鮮だし。

engChrName: We're done now!
engSearchText: We're done now!
jpnChrName: しねえよ！／しないわよっ！
jpnSearchText: <S5>しねえよ！／しないわよっ！

engChrName: Heehee. Zin wasn't kidding about the two of you getting along.
engSearchText:
Heehee. Zin wasn't kidding about the two of you
getting along.
jpnChrName: ふふ、ジンから聞いたけど、 二人は本当に仲がいいんだね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、ジンから聞いたけど、
二人は本当に仲がいいんだね。

engChrName: I'm not sure that's how I'd put it...
engSearchText: I'm not sure that's how I'd put it...
jpnChrName: 別にそんなことは……
jpnSearchText: 別にそんなことは……

engChrName: We've just known each other for a long time. That's all there is to it.
engSearchText:
We've just known each other for a long time.
That's all there is to it.
jpnChrName: 単なる昔馴染みってだけだ。 それ以上でも以下でもないさ。
jpnSearchText:
単なる昔馴染みってだけだ。
それ以上でも以下でもないさ。

engChrName: ...Yes, that's right.
engSearchText: ...Yes, that's right.
jpnChrName: ………ええ、そうね。
jpnSearchText: ………ええ、そうね。

engChrName: I won't pry, but you two avoiding it so much only makes me more curious. Guess I'll figure out the rest on my own.
engSearchText:
I won't pry, but you two avoiding it so much only
makes me more curious. Guess I'll figure out the rest
on my own.
jpnChrName: 二人の関係がますます気になってきたけど あとは自分で観察させてもらおうかな。
jpnSearchText:
二人の関係がますます気になってきたけど
あとは自分で観察させてもらおうかな。

engChrName: Thanks for giving me something else to enjoy while I'm in Calvard.
engSearchText:
Thanks for giving me something else to enjoy while
I'm in Calvard.
jpnChrName: こっちでの愉しみがまた一つ増えた。
jpnSearchText: こっちでの愉しみがまた一つ増えた。

engChrName: The guild needs to stop lookin' toward smartasses for help, I swear.
engSearchText:
The guild needs to stop lookin' toward smartasses for
help, I swear.
jpnChrName: ったく、また一人食えねえ奴が 増えちまったか。
jpnSearchText:
ったく、また一人食えねえ奴が
増えちまったか。

engChrName: First it's Kitty and now you.
engSearchText: First it's Kitty and now you.
jpnChrName: ……“元仔猫”といい、 どんだけ混沌になるんだっつの。
jpnSearchText:
……“元仔猫”といい、
どんだけ混沌になるんだっつの。

engChrName: You know her, too?
engSearchText: You know her, too?
jpnChrName: へえ、あの子とも知り合いなんだ？
jpnSearchText: へえ、あの子とも知り合いなんだ？

engChrName: I take it the guild's had an eye on her for a while now?
engSearchText: I take it the guild's had an eye on her for a while now?
jpnChrName: その口ぶりじゃ、ギルドは以前から 把握してやがったんだな？
jpnSearchText:
その口ぶりじゃ、ギルドは以前から
把握してやがったんだな？

engChrName: Of course. Especially considering who her current family is.
engSearchText:
Of course. Especially considering who her
current family is.
jpnChrName: まあ、彼女の“今のご実家”を考えれば 当然でしょう。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、彼女の“今のご実家”を考えれば
当然でしょう。

engChrName: But she's only here in Calvard as a student right now. We have no intention of interfering in her affairs.
engSearchText:
But she's only here in Calvard as a student right now.
We have no intention of interfering in her affairs.
jpnChrName: とはいえ今の彼女はあくまで学生、 こちらから干渉するつもりはないけれど……
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ今の彼女はあくまで学生、
こちらから干渉するつもりはないけれど……

engChrName: Yeaaah... I'm takin' that one with a big grain of salt. Especially when Zin's involved.
engSearchText:
Yeaaah... I'm takin' that one with a big grain of salt.
Especially when Zin's involved.
jpnChrName: どうだかな…… 不動あたりはとっくに動いてそうだが。
jpnSearchText:
どうだかな……
不動あたりはとっくに動いてそうだが。

engChrName: Still dunno why you're pawnin' jobs off on me when y'all have so many resources on hand already.
engSearchText:
Still dunno why you're pawnin' jobs off on me when
y'all have so many resources on hand already.
jpnChrName: マジでもう俺を下請けに使う 必要なんてねえんじゃねえのか？
jpnSearchText:
マジでもう俺を下請けに使う
必要なんてねえんじゃねえのか？

engChrName: You can never have too many. We'll still be short in the long term.
engSearchText:
You can never have too many. We'll still be short in
the long term.
jpnChrName: 長期的に人手不足なのは変わらないしね。 優秀な協力者はいくらでも歓迎。
jpnSearchText:
長期的に人手不足なのは変わらないしね。
優秀な協力者はいくらでも歓迎。

engChrName: I hate to agree, but she's right.
engSearchText: I hate to agree, but she's right.
jpnChrName: 悔しいけどその通りね。
jpnSearchText: 悔しいけどその通りね。

engChrName: Man...
engSearchText: Man...
jpnChrName: ったく……
jpnSearchText: ったく……

engChrName: Well, thanks for the invite. I'll get out of your hair now.
engSearchText:
Well, thanks for the invite. I'll get out of your
hair now.
jpnChrName: ごちそうさんだ。 今日はこのくらいで失礼するぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ごちそうさんだ。
今日はこのくらいで失礼するぜ。

engChrName: Sure thing. I learned a lot from talking with you. We'll have to sit down again together sometime.
engSearchText:
Sure thing. I learned a lot from talking with you.
We'll have to sit down again together sometime.
jpnChrName: 色々と興味深い話を聞かせてもらった。 またそのうちよろしくね。
jpnSearchText:
色々と興味深い話を聞かせてもらった。
またそのうちよろしくね。

engChrName: No promises.
engSearchText: No promises.
jpnChrName: 気が向いたらな。
jpnSearchText: 気が向いたらな。

engChrName: Would you rather I not third wheel next time and leave you two alone?
engSearchText:
Would you rather I not third wheel next time and
leave you two alone?
jpnChrName: それともエレインと二人の方がよかった？
jpnSearchText: それともエレインと二人の方がよかった？

engChrName: Not what I meant!
engSearchText: Not what I meant!
jpnChrName: ちげえよ……！
jpnSearchText: ちげえよ……！

engChrName: Fie...
engSearchText: Fie...
jpnChrName: フィー……
jpnSearchText: フィー……

engChrName: I'll stop teasing her now before she gets angrier.
engSearchText: I'll stop teasing her now before she gets angrier.
jpnChrName: これ以上からかったら怒られそう。
jpnSearchText: これ以上からかったら怒られそう。

engChrName: Bye, Van. I'm sure we'll see each other again soon.
engSearchText: Bye, Van. I'm sure we'll see each other again soon.
jpnChrName: とにかくバイバイ、 またそのうちに会えると思うけど。
jpnSearchText:
とにかくバイバイ、
またそのうちに会えると思うけど。

engChrName: Wouldn't surprise me if we did.
engSearchText: Wouldn't surprise me if we did.
jpnChrName: ……ああ、そうかもな。
jpnSearchText: ……ああ、そうかもな。

engChrName: You came just at the right time!
engSearchText: You came just at the right time!
jpnChrName: おお、君たちか。 ちょうどよかった。
jpnSearchText:
おお、君たちか。
ちょうどよかった。

engChrName: Oh, no. Lookin' to shove more work onto us?
engSearchText: Oh, no. Lookin' to shove more work onto us?
jpnChrName: なんだ、また下請けか？
jpnSearchText: なんだ、また下請けか？

engChrName: No, we just wanted to ask you about something.
engSearchText: No, we just wanted to ask you about something.
jpnChrName: いえ、ちょっと話を聞きたくてね。
jpnSearchText: いえ、ちょっと話を聞きたくてね。

engChrName: Your ranks continue to swell, I see...
engSearchText: Your ranks continue to swell, I see...
jpnChrName: ……また人が増えたみたいね……
jpnSearchText: ……また人が増えたみたいね……

engChrName: My name is Risette Twinings, and I'm a concierge for the Marduk Company.
engSearchText:
My name is Risette Twinings, and I'm a concierge for
the Marduk Company.
jpnChrName: 初めまして、《マルドゥック社》の現地ＳＣ リゼット・トワイニングと申します。
jpnSearchText:
初めまして、《マルドゥック社》の現地ＳＣ
リゼット・トワイニングと申します。

engChrName: I'm currently on long-term loan to Arkride Solutions, and hope to support Mr. Arkride to the best of my abilities for the remainder of my contract.
engSearchText:
I'm currently on long-term loan to Arkride Solutions,
and hope to support Mr. Arkride to the best of my
abilities for the remainder of my contract.
jpnChrName: ヴァン様のサポート業務のため、長期出向の形で アークライド解決事務所の所属になりました。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン様のサポート業務のため、長期出向の形で
アークライド解決事務所の所属になりました。

engChrName: It's a pleasure to meet you.
engSearchText: It's a pleasure to meet you.
jpnChrName: 今後ともお見知りおきを。
jpnSearchText: 今後ともお見知りおきを。

engChrName: Long-term loan?! And from THE Marduk?!
engSearchText: Long-term loan?! And from THE Marduk?!
jpnChrName: あのマルドゥックの……！？ しかも長期出向でヴァンのサポート……
jpnSearchText:
あのマルドゥックの……！？
しかも長期出向でヴァンのサポート……

engChrName: Well, aren't you fortunate to have such a capable and beautiful maid working for you?
engSearchText:
Well, aren't you fortunate to have such a capable and
beautiful maid working for you?
jpnChrName: 良かったわね、美人で有能そうな メイドさんにお世話してもらえて。
jpnSearchText:
良かったわね、美人で有能そうな
メイドさんにお世話してもらえて。

engChrName: That's not why she's here! She's backin' me up 'cause I'm a Marduk tester, and that's all!
engSearchText:
That's not why she's here! She's backin' me up 'cause
I'm a Marduk tester, and that's all!
jpnChrName: いや、あくまでマルドゥックの テスターとしてのサポートだっての……
jpnSearchText:
いや、あくまでマルドゥックの
テスターとしてのサポートだっての……

engChrName: As a valued client, I aim to support and assist you in any way I am able.
engSearchText:
As a valued client, I aim to support and assist you in
any way I am able.
jpnChrName: 契約者であるヴァン様には最大限 便宜を計らわせていただきますので──
jpnSearchText:
契約者であるヴァン様には最大限
便宜を計らわせていただきますので──

engChrName: That includes your daily life, so please feel free to assign me any task you see fit.
engSearchText:
That includes your daily life, so please feel free to
assign me any task you see fit.
jpnChrName: 日常生活面などのサポートも承ります。 何なりとお申し付けください。
jpnSearchText:
日常生活面などのサポートも承ります。
何なりとお申し付けください。

engChrName: Can you not?!
engSearchText: Can you not?!
jpnChrName: っておい……！？
jpnSearchText: っておい……！？

engChrName: (Risette looks the part, but I'm sure she'd be a splendid maid, too.)
engSearchText:
(Risette looks the part, but I'm sure she'd be a
splendid maid, too.)
jpnChrName: （うーん、リゼットさんなら   本当にやってのけそうですね……）
jpnSearchText:
（うーん、リゼットさんなら
本当にやってのけそうですね……）

engChrName: Anyway, let's get back on topic. We wanted to ask you about what happened in Tharbad.
engSearchText:
Anyway, let's get back on topic. We wanted to ask
you about what happened in Tharbad.
jpnChrName: ……ともかく、話を戻させてもらうわ。 サルバッドでの一件についてなのだけど。
jpnSearchText:
……ともかく、話を戻させてもらうわ。
サルバッドでの一件についてなのだけど。

engChrName: I figured Sylphid would've told you all the details already.
engSearchText:
I figured Sylphid would've told you all the
details already.
jpnChrName: 《妖精》からは聞いてないのかよ？
jpnSearchText: 《妖精》からは聞いてないのかよ？

engChrName: She's given us her report, yes. But it left a lot of unanswered questions.
engSearchText:
She's given us her report, yes. But it left a lot of
unanswered questions.
jpnChrName: もちろん彼女からの報告は受けている。 それでも不明な点が多くてね。
jpnSearchText:
もちろん彼女からの報告は受けている。
それでも不明な点が多くてね。

engChrName: We were hoping you could help to fill in the gaps.
engSearchText: We were hoping you could help to fill in the gaps.
jpnChrName: それで君たちにも聞いておきたいんだ。
jpnSearchText: それで君たちにも聞いておきたいんだ。

engChrName: Exactly—like what happened when you fought Almata's leader and how you managed to get him to retreat.
engSearchText:
Exactly—like what happened when you fought
Almata's leader and how you managed to get him
to retreat.
jpnChrName: アルマータのボスと対峙して 撤退させた流れも含めてね。
jpnSearchText:
アルマータのボスと対峙して
撤退させた流れも含めてね。

engChrName: *sigh* All right, shoot. I'll answer what I can.
engSearchText: *sigh* All right, shoot. I'll answer what I can.
jpnChrName: ふう…… まあ、答えられる範囲でならいいぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ふう……
まあ、答えられる範囲でならいいぜ。

engChrName: First question, then. Are you certain that puppeteer is connected to Almata?
engSearchText:
First question, then. Are you certain that puppeteer is
connected to Almata?
jpnChrName: まず例の“人形使い”について、 アルマータと通じているのは確かね？
jpnSearchText:
まず例の“人形使い”について、
アルマータと通じているのは確かね？

engChrName: ...Yeah. She was one of the people who attacked Aida's corps.
engSearchText:
...Yeah. She was one of the people who attacked
Aida's corps.
jpnChrName: ……はい、アイーダさんたちを襲った 一人だそうです。
jpnSearchText:
……はい、アイーダさんたちを襲った
一人だそうです。

engChrName: She was one of the people who took out that Eisenschild company, wasn't she?
engSearchText:
She was one of the people who took out that
Eisenschild company, wasn't she?
jpnChrName: ああ、確かアイゼンシルトの中隊を やった一人だったな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、確かアイゼンシルトの中隊を
やった一人だったな。

engChrName: Yeah, but she did say she was only contracted by 'em and isn't really a part of Almata.
engSearchText:
Yeah, but she did say she was only contracted by 'em
and isn't really a part of Almata.
jpnChrName: アルマータの所属じゃなく、 “契約”関係だそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
アルマータの所属じゃなく、
“契約”関係だそうだ。

engChrName: She's supposedly part of the organization that Melchior was originally affiliated with.
engSearchText:
She's supposedly part of the organization that
Melchior was originally affiliated with.
jpnChrName: あのメルキオルという人の“古巣”……
jpnSearchText: あのメルキオルという人の“古巣”……

engChrName: The two of them were just...terrifying. Much different from the mafia.
engSearchText:
The two of them were just...terrifying.
Much different from the mafia.
jpnChrName: あの人もそうですが、何と言いますか…… マフィアとは違う不気味さを感じます。
jpnSearchText:
あの人もそうですが、何と言いますか……
マフィアとは違う不気味さを感じます。

engChrName: They got the eyes of a stone-cold killer, the both of 'em. Real pros, I'd bet.
engSearchText:
They got the eyes of a stone-cold killer, the both
of 'em. Real pros, I'd bet.
jpnChrName: ああ、あれは人を殺し慣れているヤツの目だ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、あれは人を殺し慣れているヤツの目だ。

engChrName: Not that the mafia doesn't stoop that low, but it ain't really their style. They're more the kind to beat the shit outta you and then blackmail you.
engSearchText:
Not that the mafia doesn't stoop that low, but it ain't
really their style. They're more the kind to beat the
shit outta you and then blackmail you.
jpnChrName: マフィアも殺しはするが、多くの場合 生かして脅しつける方が多いだろう。
jpnSearchText:
マフィアも殺しはするが、多くの場合
生かして脅しつける方が多いだろう。

engChrName: Those two? Nah, they wouldn't do that.
engSearchText: Those two? Nah, they wouldn't do that.
jpnChrName: だがあの二人は違う。 最初からそんな選択肢は考慮に入れてねえ。
jpnSearchText:
だがあの二人は違う。
最初からそんな選択肢は考慮に入れてねえ。

engChrName: If the victim's not dead, then it ain't good enough. Death is their endgame.
engSearchText:
If the victim's not dead, then it ain't good enough.
Death is their endgame.
jpnChrName: 殺すことを前提に、 目的を遂行しようとするヤツの目だ。
jpnSearchText:
殺すことを前提に、
目的を遂行しようとするヤツの目だ。

engChrName: The girl's bad, but Melchior's in a class of his own. He enjoys the kill about as much as toyin' with his prey beforehand.
engSearchText:
The girl's bad, but Melchior's in a class of his own.
He enjoys the kill about as much as toyin' with his
prey beforehand.
jpnChrName: ま、あのメルキオルって野郎は“弄ぶ”ことも 目的みたいだからさらにタチが悪いがな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、あのメルキオルって野郎は“弄ぶ”ことも
目的みたいだからさらにタチが悪いがな。

engChrName: Perhaps the organization she and Melchior originate from is focused on assassination.
engSearchText:
Perhaps the organization she and Melchior originate
from is focused on assassination.
jpnChrName: 暗殺などを専門とする戦闘集団 ってところかしら。
jpnSearchText:
暗殺などを専門とする戦闘集団
ってところかしら。

engChrName: I suspect I know which one, too.
engSearchText: I suspect I know which one, too.
jpnChrName: 恐らくは例の………
jpnSearchText: 恐らくは例の………

engChrName: ...And I suspect you're right about it.
engSearchText: ...And I suspect you're right about it.
jpnChrName: ……ああ、多分そんなところだろ。
jpnSearchText: ……ああ、多分そんなところだろ。

engChrName: It clearly is an organization separate from Almata altogether, even if it's evident that the connections between the two run deep.
engSearchText:
It clearly is an organization separate from Almata
altogether, even if it's evident that the connections
between the two run deep.
jpnChrName: アルマータとは別組織のようですが、 かなり深い繋がりがありそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
アルマータとは別組織のようですが、
かなり深い繋がりがありそうですね。

engChrName: That's ominous.
engSearchText: That's ominous.
jpnChrName: 厄介なものだね。
jpnSearchText: 厄介なものだね。

engChrName: We'd have options available if it was just your run-of-the-mill mafia.
engSearchText:
We'd have options available if it was just your
run-of-the-mill mafia.
jpnChrName: ただのマフィアなら、 それなりの対策もありそうだが……
jpnSearchText:
ただのマフィアなら、
それなりの対策もありそうだが……

engChrName: We'll have our work cut out for us, that's for sure.
engSearchText: We'll have our work cut out for us, that's for sure.
jpnChrName: いずれにしても、 一筋縄ではいかないでしょうね。
jpnSearchText:
いずれにしても、
一筋縄ではいかないでしょうね。

engChrName: Though there's something else that bothers me regarding Almata...
engSearchText:
Though there's something else that bothers me
regarding Almata...
jpnChrName: それともう一つ……アルマータに関して 気になっていることがあるけど……
jpnSearchText:
それともう一つ……アルマータに関して
気になっていることがあるけど……

engChrName: Where they're gettin' their mira from, I take it?
engSearchText: Where they're gettin' their mira from, I take it?
jpnChrName: もしかして、資金源の話か？
jpnSearchText: もしかして、資金源の話か？

engChrName: ...Exactly.
engSearchText: ...Exactly.
jpnChrName: ……ええ。
jpnSearchText: ……ええ。

engChrName: We already established that Almata used Vegas Films to spread those illegal drugs among the people in Tharbad.
engSearchText:
We already established that Almata used Vegas Films
to spread those illegal drugs among the people
in Tharbad.
jpnChrName: アルマータがベガスフィルムを利用して 違法薬物を流通させたのは確かだけど……
jpnSearchText:
アルマータがベガスフィルムを利用して
違法薬物を流通させたのは確かだけど……

engChrName: But acquiring so many and sneaking them into the orbal hookahs must have cost an eye-watering amount of money—and for no profit, either.
engSearchText:
But acquiring so many and sneaking them into the
orbal hookahs must have cost an eye-watering
amount of money—and for no profit, either.
jpnChrName: あれだけの量、しかもこっそり導力シーシャに 仕込んだ以上は利益度外視ということになる。
jpnSearchText:
あれだけの量、しかもこっそり導力シーシャに
仕込んだ以上は利益度外視ということになる。

engChrName: That's true... It's not something you can do without having a lot of mira to spare.
engSearchText:
That's true... It's not something you can do without
having a lot of mira to spare.
jpnChrName: 相当なミラがないと出来ない荒業……
jpnSearchText: 相当なミラがないと出来ない荒業……

engChrName: You're not doing that at all unless you got the mira to burn.
engSearchText:
You're not doing that at all unless you got the mira
to burn.
jpnChrName: 相当なミラがないと出来ない荒業だろうな。
jpnSearchText: 相当なミラがないと出来ない荒業だろうな。

engChrName: Could've always raised it over time via illegal means, but I don't think that's it.
engSearchText:
Could've always raised it over time via illegal means,
but I don't think that's it.
jpnChrName: 連中なら以前から違法な手段で 稼いでもいそうだが……
jpnSearchText:
連中なら以前から違法な手段で
稼いでもいそうだが……

engChrName: I ain't got a clue what the source really is, though.
engSearchText: I ain't got a clue what the source really is, though.
jpnChrName: 他にも何かありそうだな。 生憎見当もつかねえが。
jpnSearchText:
他にも何かありそうだな。
生憎見当もつかねえが。

engChrName: ...I see.
engSearchText: ...I see.

engChrName: Either way, talking with you was definitely illuminating. Thank you for your time.
engSearchText:
Either way, talking with you was definitely
illuminating. Thank you for your time.
jpnChrName: なんであれ、話を聞かせてくれて 助かったよ。
jpnSearchText:
なんであれ、話を聞かせてくれて
助かったよ。

engChrName: If you learn anything else, please let the guild know.
engSearchText: If you learn anything else, please let the guild know.
jpnChrName: なにか分かったら またギルドに知らせてくれ。
jpnSearchText:
なにか分かったら
またギルドに知らせてくれ。

engChrName: We will. The guild's cooperation is going to be vital in taking down Almata.
engSearchText:
We will. The guild's cooperation is going to be vital
in taking down Almata.
jpnChrName: アルマータ対策に関しては ギルドとの連携は不可欠でしょうね。
jpnSearchText:
アルマータ対策に関しては
ギルドとの連携は不可欠でしょうね。

engChrName: Not that it makes sense for a little solutions agency like us to be handlin' somethin' this big to begin with.
engSearchText:
Not that it makes sense for a little solutions agency
like us to be handlin' somethin' this big to begin with.
jpnChrName: つーか本来一解決屋が 抱え込むようなモンでもないがな。
jpnSearchText:
つーか本来一解決屋が
抱え込むようなモンでもないがな。

engChrName: So if you guys learn anything, don't be stingy and let us know, too.
engSearchText:
So if you guys learn anything, don't be stingy and let
us know, too.
jpnChrName: そっちもなんか掴んだ時は ケチらずに頼むぜ。
jpnSearchText:
そっちもなんか掴んだ時は
ケチらずに頼むぜ。

engChrName: ...As long as our interests align, we will.
engSearchText: ...As long as our interests align, we will.
jpnChrName: ……ええ、利害が一致する以上は。
jpnSearchText: ……ええ、利害が一致する以上は。

engChrName: Much as I'd rather you not be involved with them in the first place.
engSearchText:
Much as I'd rather you not be involved with them in
the first place.
jpnChrName: そもそも貴方たちにあまりアルマータと 関わらせたくはないというのが本音だけど……
jpnSearchText:
そもそも貴方たちにあまりアルマータと
関わらせたくはないというのが本音だけど……

engChrName: I don't wanna be involved with 'em, either!
engSearchText: I don't wanna be involved with 'em, either!
jpnChrName: それは先方に言ってくれ。
jpnSearchText: それは先方に言ってくれ。

engChrName: But it ain't that easy when they already got their eye on you and won't take no for an answer.
engSearchText:
But it ain't that easy when they already got their eye
on you and won't take no for an answer.
jpnChrName: 俺だって好き好んで巻き込まれた わけじゃねぇしな。
jpnSearchText:
俺だって好き好んで巻き込まれた
わけじゃねぇしな。

engChrName: I feel like there's more to it than that...
engSearchText: I feel like there's more to it than that...
jpnChrName: そうでもないような……
jpnSearchText: そうでもないような……

engChrName: You gotta be kidding me.
engSearchText: You gotta be kidding me.
jpnChrName: どの口が言うか。
jpnSearchText: どの口が言うか。

engChrName: I suspect your nature wouldn't let you avert your eyes from them, even if you could.
engSearchText:
I suspect your nature wouldn't let you avert your eyes
from them, even if you could.
jpnChrName: ヴァン様はああいう連中を 放っては置けない性分なんでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン様はああいう連中を
放っては置けない性分なんでしょう。

engChrName: The more things change, the more they stay the same...
engSearchText:
The more things change, the more they stay
the same...
jpnChrName: ……分かってはいたけどね。
jpnSearchText: ……分かってはいたけどね。

engChrName: I swear...
engSearchText: I swear...
jpnChrName: なんだよどいつもこいつも……
jpnSearchText: なんだよどいつもこいつも……

engChrName: Ahaha...
engSearchText: Ahaha...
jpnChrName: あはは……
jpnSearchText: あはは……

engChrName: Well, look who it is! I haven't seen you all since you were in Tharbad!
engSearchText:
Well, look who it is! I haven't seen you all since you
were in Tharbad!
jpnChrName: 君たちか！　ガッハッハッ！ サルバッド以来じゃな。
jpnSearchText:
君たちか！　ガッハッハッ！
サルバッド以来じゃな。

engChrName: We weren't expecting to run into you here either, Director.
engSearchText:
We weren't expecting to run into you here
either, Director.
jpnChrName: ゴッチ監督、こんなところで会うとはね。
jpnSearchText: ゴッチ監督、こんなところで会うとはね。

engChrName: I see Judith is with you, too!
engSearchText: I see Judith is with you, too!
jpnChrName: ほう？　しかもジュディス君も一緒か。
jpnSearchText: ほう？　しかもジュディス君も一緒か。

engChrName: Things just kinda worked out like that.
engSearchText: Things just kinda worked out like that.
jpnChrName: ええまあ、成り行きというか何というか……
jpnSearchText: ええまあ、成り行きというか何というか……

engChrName: How come you're with Lieutenant Kaela?
engSearchText: How come you're with Lieutenant Kaela?
jpnChrName: しかし、なんでまた 少尉と一緒なんです？
jpnSearchText:
しかし、なんでまた
少尉と一緒なんです？

engChrName: Government asked yours truly to help with the ceremony's production!
engSearchText:
Government asked yours truly to help with the
ceremony's production!
jpnChrName: うむ、実は政府の依頼で 記念式典の各種演出を手掛けていてな。
jpnSearchText:
うむ、実は政府の依頼で
記念式典の各種演出を手掛けていてな。

engChrName: Makes sense. You did do a good job with the film festival planning, catastrophes notwithstanding.
engSearchText:
Makes sense. You did do a good job with the film
festival planning, catastrophes notwithstanding.
jpnChrName: なるほど……事件があったとはいえ 映画祭の演出は見事なモンでしたしね。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど……事件があったとはいえ
映画祭の演出は見事なモンでしたしね。

engChrName: Haha! Don't act like you didn't help at all there!
engSearchText: Haha! Don't act like you didn't help at all there!
jpnChrName: ガハハ、まぁそれも 君たちの活躍があればこそじゃが。
jpnSearchText:
ガハハ、まぁそれも
君たちの活躍があればこそじゃが。

engChrName: I could do without a do-over from the last festival.
engSearchText: I could do without a do-over from the last festival.
jpnChrName: クク、またあん時みてぇな騒ぎに ならなきゃいいんだがなァ。
jpnSearchText:
クク、またあん時みてぇな騒ぎに
ならなきゃいいんだがなァ。

engChrName: Please don't jinx it...
engSearchText: Please don't jinx it...
jpnChrName: もう、縁起でもないですよ……
jpnSearchText: もう、縁起でもないですよ……

engChrName: I wouldn't worry so much. You're more than aware of the fact that we're finally rid of A. The odds of anything major happening are low at best.
engSearchText:
I wouldn't worry so much. You're more than aware of
the fact that we're finally rid of A. The odds of
anything major happening are low at best.
jpnChrName: 知っての通り、《Ａ》の壊滅は既に確認した。 よほどの事がない限りトラブルの心配はないでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
知っての通り、《Ａ》の壊滅は既に確認した。
よほどの事がない限りトラブルの心配はないでしょう。

engChrName: It's not improbable that there are remnants still out there, so security is still just as tight. As a precaution.
engSearchText:
It's not improbable that there are remnants still out
there, so security is still just as tight. As a precaution.
jpnChrName: 一部残党が残っている可能性もあるけど…… 警備も万全にするつもりよ。
jpnSearchText:
一部残党が残っている可能性もあるけど……
警備も万全にするつもりよ。

engChrName: You here to discuss unit placement, then?
engSearchText: You here to discuss unit placement, then?
jpnChrName: なるほど、ここにいるのも 警備の配置についての打ち合わせってわけか。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど、ここにいるのも
警備の配置についての打ち合わせってわけか。

engChrName: That's right.
engSearchText: That's right.
jpnChrName: そういうことね。
jpnSearchText: そういうことね。

engChrName: The meeting's with us more than anything.
engSearchText: The meeting's with us more than anything.
jpnChrName: どっちかっつーと俺らとの打ち合わせだがな。
jpnSearchText: どっちかっつーと俺らとの打ち合わせだがな。

engChrName: Supervisor Giscard! And Essy, too! I heard you'd help with the festival, but I didn't realize you'd be coming all the way here.
engSearchText:
Supervisor Giscard! And Essy, too! I heard you'd
help with the festival, but I didn't realize you'd be
coming all the way here.
jpnChrName: ジスカール技術長にエレ姉！？ 記念祭を手伝うのは聞いてたけど……
jpnSearchText:
ジスカール技術長にエレ姉！？
記念祭を手伝うのは聞いてたけど……

engChrName: Heehee. It's been a while.
engSearchText: Heehee. It's been a while.
jpnChrName: えへへ、直接会うのは久しぶりだねー。
jpnSearchText: えへへ、直接会うのは久しぶりだねー。

engChrName: We met you guys at Basel!
engSearchText: We met you guys at Basel!
jpnChrName: バーゼルの技術長さんに 准教授さん……！
jpnSearchText:
バーゼルの技術長さんに
准教授さん……！

engChrName: It's good to see you again, too.
engSearchText: It's good to see you again, too.
jpnChrName: えへへ、フェリちゃん久しぶりだねー。
jpnSearchText: えへへ、フェリちゃん久しぶりだねー。

engChrName: We're helping set up all the equipment for the ceremony.
engSearchText:
We're helping set up all the equipment for
the ceremony.
jpnChrName: 式典用の機材の調整とかで、 大学から駆り出されちゃったんだ～。
jpnSearchText:
式典用の機材の調整とかで、
大学から駆り出されちゃったんだ～。

engChrName: Oh, yeah. Y'all are showin' off some new stuff, right. Must be pretty busy, then.
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah. Y'all are showin' off some new stuff, right.
Must be pretty busy, then.
jpnChrName: そういや“お披露目”とかもあるんだっけか。 大変そうだな。
jpnSearchText:
そういや“お披露目”とかもあるんだっけか。
大変そうだな。

engChrName: Drowning in work, more like! This isn't even my specialty, but here I am, slaving away. Though your sympathy does soothe the pain, Van.
engSearchText:
Drowning in work, more like! This isn't even my
specialty, but here I am, slaving away. Though your
sympathy does soothe the pain, Van.
jpnChrName: うんうん、ヴァン君もそう思うでしょう？ わたし、専門じゃないのに～。
jpnSearchText:
うんうん、ヴァン君もそう思うでしょう？
わたし、専門じゃないのに～。

engChrName: ...You don't mind if I call you Van, right?
engSearchText: ...You don't mind if I call you Van, right?
jpnChrName: あ、ヴァン君って呼んでいいかな～？
jpnSearchText: あ、ヴァン君って呼んでいいかな～？

engChrName: Course not.
engSearchText: Course not.
jpnChrName: 別に構わねぇが……
jpnSearchText: 別に構わねぇが……

engChrName: Heehee. Good!
engSearchText: Heehee. Good!
jpnChrName: ふふ、ありがとう～。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、ありがとう～。

engChrName: You can call me Essy just like Quatre does, if you want!
engSearchText:
You can call me Essy just like Quatre does, if
you want!
jpnChrName: わたしのことはカトル君と同じ エレ姉って呼んでいいからね～？
jpnSearchText:
わたしのことはカトル君と同じ
エレ姉って呼んでいいからね～？

engChrName: That, I'm gonna pass on.
engSearchText: That, I'm gonna pass on.
jpnChrName: いや、それはさすがにやめておくぜ。
jpnSearchText: いや、それはさすがにやめておくぜ。

engChrName: (She gets real casual real quick.)
engSearchText: (She gets real casual real quick.)
jpnChrName: （距離感が掴みづれぇなこの人……）
jpnSearchText: （距離感が掴みづれぇなこの人……）

engChrName: (That's just how Essy is. She's really friendly to everyone.)
engSearchText:
(That's just how Essy is. She's really friendly
to everyone.)
jpnChrName: （まあエレ姉は誰とでも   すぐに親しくなるから。）
jpnSearchText:
（まあエレ姉は誰とでも
すぐに親しくなるから。）

engChrName: Will Professor Cronkite be in attendance at the unveiling?
engSearchText:
Will Professor Cronkite be in attendance at
the unveiling?
jpnChrName: 例のお披露目でしたら、 クロンカイト教授も来られていますか？
jpnSearchText:
例のお披露目でしたら、
クロンカイト教授も来られていますか？

engChrName: Is that smartass professor gonna be at the unveiling?
engSearchText: Is that smartass professor gonna be at the unveiling?
jpnChrName: お披露目ってんなら あの天才教授も来てるか？
jpnSearchText:
お披露目ってんなら
あの天才教授も来てるか？

engChrName: He'll be at the ceremony, but not much else. He's got his hands more than full with another project right now.
engSearchText:
He'll be at the ceremony, but not much else. He's got
his hands more than full with another project
right now.
jpnChrName: うーん、ヤン兄さんは 他のプロジェクトですごく忙しいみたいで。
jpnSearchText:
うーん、ヤン兄さんは
他のプロジェクトですごく忙しいみたいで。

engChrName: Professor Hamilton will be here, too.
engSearchText: Professor Hamilton will be here, too.
jpnChrName: でも式典には出席するよ～、 それとハミルトン博士も。
jpnSearchText:
でも式典には出席するよ～、
それとハミルトン博士も。

engChrName: Really?!
engSearchText: Really?!
jpnChrName: ホントに……！？
jpnSearchText: ホントに……！？

engChrName: The four of us might finally be able to get together. It's been such a long time...
engSearchText:
The four of us might finally be able to get together.
It's been such a long time...
jpnChrName: 当日時間があったら久しぶりに ４人で集まれるかもしれないのか。
jpnSearchText:
当日時間があったら久しぶりに
４人で集まれるかもしれないのか。

engChrName: Heehee. I certainly hope so.
engSearchText: Heehee. I certainly hope so.
jpnChrName: ふふ、楽しみだね～。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、楽しみだね～。

engChrName: Esmeray, Kaela! Mind hearing me out here?
engSearchText: Esmeray, Kaela! Mind hearing me out here?
jpnChrName: そういえば、エスメレー君にカエラ君じゃったか。
jpnSearchText: そういえば、エスメレー君にカエラ君じゃったか。

engChrName: Oh?
engSearchText: Oh?
jpnChrName: はい？
jpnSearchText: はい？

engChrName: What about?
engSearchText: What about?
jpnChrName: なんでしょう？
jpnSearchText: なんでしょう？

engChrName: You two are bursting at the seams with sex appeal! There's this pizzazz to ya! It's everything I could've hoped for, and more!
engSearchText:
You two are bursting at the seams with sex appeal!
There's this pizzazz to ya! It's everything I could've
hoped for, and more!
jpnChrName: ウム！　やはりワシの目に間違いはない、 二人とも個性的な魅力と色気を備えておるッ！
jpnSearchText:
ウム！　やはりワシの目に間違いはない、
二人とも個性的な魅力と色気を備えておるッ！

engChrName: What do you say we chase new heights of sexiness toge—
engSearchText:
What do you say we chase new heights
of sexiness toge—
jpnChrName: どうじゃ、ワシと一緒に至上の セクシー＆スペクタクルを追求する気は──
jpnSearchText:
どうじゃ、ワシと一緒に至上の
セクシー＆スペクタクルを追求する気は──

engChrName: I am far too busy to even consider the proposition.
engSearchText: I am far too busy to even consider the proposition.
jpnChrName: 任務があるので遠慮しておきます。
jpnSearchText: 任務があるので遠慮しておきます。

engChrName: That's not a field I have much interest in, I'm afraid.
engSearchText: That's not a field I have much interest in, I'm afraid.
jpnChrName: あまり興味がないテーマですね～。
jpnSearchText: あまり興味がないテーマですね～。

engChrName: What?!
engSearchText: What?!
jpnChrName: なんとぉッ！？
jpnSearchText: なんとぉッ！？

engChrName: Is Judith all I have left?!
engSearchText: Is Judith all I have left?!
jpnChrName: ワシにはジュディス君しか 残っていないというのか！？
jpnSearchText:
ワシにはジュディス君しか
残っていないというのか！？

engChrName: Hey, hey. I don't remember agreeing to your nonsense.
engSearchText:
Hey, hey. I don't remember agreeing to
your nonsense.
jpnChrName: いやあたしもそんな予定はないですよ？
jpnSearchText: いやあたしもそんな予定はないですよ？

engChrName: Ahaha... Same as always.
engSearchText: Ahaha... Same as always.
jpnChrName: あはは、相変わらずですね……
jpnSearchText: あはは、相変わらずですね……

engChrName: Now here's a group you don't see every day.
engSearchText: Now here's a group you don't see every day.
jpnChrName: これまた珍しい面子だな……
jpnSearchText: これまた珍しい面子だな……

engChrName: Well, if it isn't Arkride.
engSearchText: Well, if it isn't Arkride.
jpnChrName: おや、アークライド君じゃないか。
jpnSearchText: おや、アークライド君じゃないか。

engChrName: I didn't expect to encounter you here, sir.
engSearchText: I didn't expect to encounter you here, sir.
jpnChrName: ソーンダイクＧＭ、 こちらにいらしたのですね。
jpnSearchText:
ソーンダイクＧＭ、
こちらにいらしたのですね。

engChrName: I found an opening in my schedule, so I'm here to take advantage of it.
engSearchText:
I found an opening in my schedule, so I'm here to
take advantage of it.
jpnChrName: ああ、スケジュールに少しの空きがでてね。
jpnSearchText: ああ、スケジュールに少しの空きがでてね。

engChrName: Hey, Cao. Aren't you supposed to be babysitting Ashen?
engSearchText:
Hey, Cao. Aren't you supposed to be
babysitting Ashen?
jpnChrName: ツァオもいるのか、アシェンの お守りをしなくていいのかよ？
jpnSearchText:
ツァオもいるのか、アシェンの
お守りをしなくていいのかよ？

engChrName: I believe she'd be rather cross with you if she heard you say that.
engSearchText:
I believe she'd be rather cross with you if she heard
you say that.
jpnChrName: 彼女に聞かれると確実にお冠ですね。
jpnSearchText: 彼女に聞かれると確実にお冠ですね。

engChrName: I didn't know you were here, Yang.
engSearchText: I didn't know you were here, Yang.
jpnChrName: ヤン兄もこっちに来ていたんだ。
jpnSearchText: ヤン兄もこっちに来ていたんだ。

engChrName: That I am. I intend to meet with Professor Hamilton later.
engSearchText:
That I am. I intend to meet with Professor
Hamilton later.
jpnChrName: ああ、一応後で博士たちと 合流する予定だがな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、一応後で博士たちと
合流する予定だがな。

engChrName: While I have you here, I'd like to express just how impressed I was that you were able to defeat our unit in Oración.
engSearchText:
While I have you here, I'd like to express just how
impressed I was that you were able to defeat our unit
in Oración.
jpnChrName: そういえばオラシオンでは我が社の部隊を 出し抜いたようだが、いやはや驚いたものだ。
jpnSearchText:
そういえばオラシオンでは我が社の部隊を
出し抜いたようだが、いやはや驚いたものだ。

engChrName: Sorry 'bout that one. Didn't really have a choice at the time.
engSearchText:
Sorry 'bout that one. Didn't really have a choice at
the time.
jpnChrName: 悪いな、こっちも譲れねえ状況だったんでね。
jpnSearchText: 悪いな、こっちも譲れねえ状況だったんでね。

engChrName: Oh, don't feel the need to apologize. If anything, you allowed us to obtain some very interesting data from the encounter.
engSearchText:
Oh, don't feel the need to apologize. If anything, you
allowed us to obtain some very interesting data from
the encounter.
jpnChrName: 謝ることはないさ、それはそれで 興味深いデータを取らせてもらったよ。
jpnSearchText:
謝ることはないさ、それはそれで
興味深いデータを取らせてもらったよ。

engChrName: And I imagine that you made quite the contribution yourself, Risette.
engSearchText:
And I imagine that you made quite the contribution
yourself, Risette.
jpnChrName: リゼット君もご苦労だったね。
jpnSearchText: リゼット君もご苦労だったね。

engChrName: I certainly hope I was able to make myself useful.
engSearchText: I certainly hope I was able to make myself useful.
jpnChrName: 恐縮です。
jpnSearchText: 恐縮です。

engChrName: Take it you're in town because of the unveilin' ceremony, Professor?
engSearchText:
Take it you're in town because of the unveilin'
ceremony, Professor?
jpnChrName: 教授がこっち来たのは やっぱさっきの“お披露目”関係で？
jpnSearchText:
教授がこっち来たのは
やっぱさっきの“お披露目”関係で？

engChrName: I was invited here and attended as the lead developer on the project, on that you are correct.
engSearchText:
I was invited here and attended as the lead developer
on the project, on that you are correct.
jpnChrName: まあ開発責任者として招待されたから 出席はしたが──
jpnSearchText:
まあ開発責任者として招待されたから
出席はしたが──

engChrName: However, I lost interest in the project itself as soon as the development work was complete.
engSearchText:
However, I lost interest in the project itself as soon as
the development work was complete.
jpnChrName: 私にとっては既に終わったプロジェクトだ、 もはや興味はない。
jpnSearchText:
私にとっては既に終わったプロジェクトだ、
もはや興味はない。

engChrName: I thought I'd finally be free once the ceremony concluded, but these two weren't having any of it.
engSearchText:
I thought I'd finally be free once the ceremony
concluded, but these two weren't having any of it.
jpnChrName: せっかく式典が終わって解放されたと 思ったら、そこの二人に捕まってな。
jpnSearchText:
せっかく式典が終わって解放されたと
思ったら、そこの二人に捕まってな。

engChrName: I wasn't about to pass up the opportunity to have a talk with the famous Professor Cronkite, after all.
engSearchText:
I wasn't about to pass up the opportunity to have a
talk with the famous Professor Cronkite, after all.
jpnChrName: 教授とお話する貴重な機会ですからね。
jpnSearchText: 教授とお話する貴重な機会ですからね。

engChrName: If only you two could talk about anything not shady as all hell.
engSearchText:
If only you two could talk about anything not shady
as all hell.
jpnChrName: アンタの話なんざ、どうせまた 何か怪しいことでも企んでるだろ。
jpnSearchText:
アンタの話なんざ、どうせまた
何か怪しいことでも企んでるだろ。

engChrName: Not at all! I simply wanted to make casual conversation.
engSearchText:
Not at all! I simply wanted to make
casual conversation.
jpnChrName: いえいえ、ほんの世間話ですよ。
jpnSearchText: いえいえ、ほんの世間話ですよ。

engChrName: If you're looking for someone plotting shady schemes, you should speak with my friend here.
engSearchText:
If you're looking for someone plotting shady schemes,
you should speak with my friend here.
jpnChrName: 怪しい企みというのでしたら、 むしろあちらの方……
jpnSearchText:
怪しい企みというのでしたら、
むしろあちらの方……

engChrName: Heh. Very amusing.
engSearchText: Heh. Very amusing.
jpnChrName: フフ、ツァオ社長も冗談がお好きのようだ。
jpnSearchText: フフ、ツァオ社長も冗談がお好きのようだ。

engChrName: I simply came over to invite the good professor to join our company. We would very much appreciate his talent.
engSearchText:
I simply came over to invite the good professor to join
our company. We would very much appreciate
his talent.
jpnChrName: 私は単に教授のような優秀な人材を ぜひ我が社にと誘ってみただけさ。
jpnSearchText:
私は単に教授のような優秀な人材を
ぜひ我が社にと誘ってみただけさ。

engChrName: Alas, he rejected my advances.
engSearchText: Alas, he rejected my advances.
jpnChrName: 残念ながら断られたけどね。
jpnSearchText: 残念ながら断られたけどね。

engChrName: My current contract won't be expiring any time soon, I'm afraid.
engSearchText:
My current contract won't be expiring any time soon,
I'm afraid.
jpnChrName: 生憎すでに長期契約中なもので。
jpnSearchText: 生憎すでに長期契約中なもので。

engChrName: Maybe if I'd been quicker about my approach... No, I suspect this contract of yours has been in place for quite a while now...
engSearchText:
Maybe if I'd been quicker about my approach... No, I
suspect this contract of yours has been in place for
quite a while now...
jpnChrName: 一歩遅かったというわけか。 ……いいや、もしかしたらずっと前──
jpnSearchText:
一歩遅かったというわけか。
……いいや、もしかしたらずっと前──

engChrName: Perhaps even before talks of reinventing Calvard's military even began?
engSearchText:
Perhaps even before talks of reinventing Calvard's
military even began?
jpnChrName: それこそ兵器刷新の研究より前から 決まっていたことかな？
jpnSearchText:
それこそ兵器刷新の研究より前から
決まっていたことかな？

engChrName: I haven't the faintest idea what you are implying.
engSearchText: I haven't the faintest idea what you are implying.
jpnChrName: さて、何のことやら分かりかねますな。
jpnSearchText: さて、何のことやら分かりかねますな。

engChrName: But I will have to admit I am curious about what research goes on behind closed doors at Marduk.
engSearchText:
But I will have to admit I am curious about what
research goes on behind closed doors at Marduk.
jpnChrName: マルドゥックこそ、どういう研究が 進められてるか興味が尽きない所だ。
jpnSearchText:
マルドゥックこそ、どういう研究が
進められてるか興味が尽きない所だ。

engChrName: I suspect you have access to a lot of technology that even Verne does not.
engSearchText:
I suspect you have access to a lot of technology that
even Verne does not.
jpnChrName: ヴェルヌにもないような技術を 色々と持っていそうでもある。
jpnSearchText:
ヴェルヌにもないような技術を
色々と持っていそうでもある。

engChrName: For our part, Heiyue is greatly interested in the research of both.
engSearchText:
For our part, Heiyue is greatly interested in the
research of both.
jpnChrName: 我々黒月としては、どちらの研究にも 大変な興味を抱いていると申し上げましょう。
jpnSearchText:
我々黒月としては、どちらの研究にも
大変な興味を抱いていると申し上げましょう。

engChrName: Hahaha.
engSearchText: Hahaha.
jpnChrName: ハハハ。
jpnSearchText: ハハハ。

engChrName: Heh.
engSearchText: Heh.
jpnChrName: フフ……
jpnSearchText: フフ……

engChrName: (Shady to their core, all three of them.)
engSearchText: (Shady to their core, all three of them.)
jpnChrName: （どっちも怪し過ぎだろ……）
jpnSearchText: （どっちも怪し過ぎだろ……）

engChrName: Oh, speak of the devil.
engSearchText: Oh, speak of the devil.
jpnChrName: あら、噂をすれば。
jpnSearchText: あら、噂をすれば。

engChrName: Good day to you all.
engSearchText: Good day to you all.
jpnChrName: ふふ…… お二人とも、お疲れ様です。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ……
お二人とも、お疲れ様です。

engChrName: Oh, look who it is! I hope you're all having a great festival!
engSearchText:
Oh, look who it is! I hope you're all having a
great festival!
jpnChrName: あ～、ヴァン君たちだぁ！ 革命記念祭おめでとー！
jpnSearchText:
あ～、ヴァン君たちだぁ！
革命記念祭おめでとー！

engChrName: Oh, look who it is! I hope you're all having a great festival!
engSearchText:
Oh, look who it is! I hope you're all having a
great festival!
jpnChrName: あ～、ヴァンさんたち！ 革命記念祭おめでとーございます！
jpnSearchText:
あ～、ヴァンさんたち！
革命記念祭おめでとーございます！

engChrName: Indeed. I can see you're all hard at work patrolling.
engSearchText: Indeed. I can see you're all hard at work patrolling.
jpnChrName: おめでとうございます。 それと見回り、ご苦労様です。
jpnSearchText:
おめでとうございます。
それと見回り、ご苦労様です。

engChrName: Associate Professor Esmeray. Lieutenant Kaela.
engSearchText: Associate Professor Esmeray. Lieutenant Kaela.
jpnChrName: エスメレー様にカエラ少佐……
jpnSearchText: エスメレー様にカエラ少佐……

engChrName: And the crown prince's bodyguard here with ya, too?
engSearchText: And the crown prince's bodyguard here with ya, too?
jpnChrName: はは、それとまさか 護衛官さんまで一緒とはな。
jpnSearchText:
はは、それとまさか
護衛官さんまで一緒とはな。

engChrName: Essy! I see you've got company, too.
engSearchText: Essy! I see you've got company, too.
jpnChrName: エレ姉にＣＩＤの…… リゼットさんと一緒にいたんだ。
jpnSearchText:
エレ姉にＣＩＤの……
リゼットさんと一緒にいたんだ。

engChrName: And the crown prince's bodyguard here with ya, too?
engSearchText: And the crown prince's bodyguard here with ya, too?
jpnChrName: はは、それとまさか 護衛官さんまで一緒とはな。
jpnSearchText:
はは、それとまさか
護衛官さんまで一緒とはな。

engChrName: Associate Professor Esmeray and the woman from the CID, huh?
engSearchText:
Associate Professor Esmeray and the woman from
the CID, huh?
jpnChrName: アーチェット准教授にＣＩＤの……
jpnSearchText: アーチェット准教授にＣＩＤの……

engChrName: And the crown prince's bodyguard here with ya, too?
engSearchText: And the crown prince's bodyguard here with ya, too?
jpnChrName: はは、それとまさか 護衛官さんまで一緒とはな。
jpnSearchText:
はは、それとまさか
護衛官さんまで一緒とはな。

engChrName: Heard the prince told you to patrol just so you'd finally take a bit of a break?
engSearchText:
Heard the prince told you to patrol just so you'd
finally take a bit of a break?
jpnChrName: どうやらそっちも見回りの名目で 休憩するよう言い渡されたようだが。
jpnSearchText:
どうやらそっちも見回りの名目で
休憩するよう言い渡されたようだが。

engChrName: Correct. I was highly reluctant to leave his side, regardless of the rest of his security personnel being there with him, but orders are orders.
engSearchText:
Correct. I was highly reluctant to leave his side,
regardless of the rest of his security personnel being
there with him, but orders are orders.
