jpnChrName: ええ……他のＳＳを付けているとはいえ、 正直、不本意ではありますが。
jpnSearchText:
ええ……他のＳＳを付けているとはいえ、
正直、不本意ではありますが。

engChrName: Guessin' you were also told to patrol so you'd take a bit of time for yourself.
engSearchText:
Guessin' you were also told to patrol so you'd take a
bit of time for yourself.
jpnChrName: 公太子殿下がいない所を見ると…… 半ば無理矢理、休憩でも言い渡されたかい？
jpnSearchText:
公太子殿下がいない所を見ると……
半ば無理矢理、休憩でも言い渡されたかい？

engChrName: *sigh* You truly are sharp.
engSearchText: *sigh* You truly are sharp.
jpnChrName: ……ふう、相変わらず鋭い方ですね。
jpnSearchText: ……ふう、相変わらず鋭い方ですね。

engChrName: I was highly reluctant to leave his side, regardless of the rest of his security personnel being there with him, but orders are orders.
engSearchText:
I was highly reluctant to leave his side, regardless of
the rest of his security personnel being there with
him, but orders are orders.
jpnChrName: ええ──見回りの名目で他のＳＳと交替を。 正直、不本意ではありますが。
jpnSearchText:
ええ──見回りの名目で他のＳＳと交替を。
正直、不本意ではありますが。

engChrName: Still, I intend to return to him fairly soon. After I'm satisfied with my observation.
engSearchText:
Still, I intend to return to him fairly soon. After I'm
satisfied with my observation.
jpnChrName: とはいえ主命は主命、少し状況を伺った後、 殿下のもとへ戻る所存です。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ主命は主命、少し状況を伺った後、
殿下のもとへ戻る所存です。

engChrName: Oh?
engSearchText: Oh?
jpnChrName: あん……？
jpnSearchText: あん……？

engChrName: Oh?
engSearchText: Oh?

engChrName: Oh?
engSearchText: Oh?
jpnChrName: アン……？
jpnSearchText: アン……？

engChrName: Oh?
engSearchText: Oh?
jpnChrName: ふむ……？
jpnSearchText: ふむ……？

engChrName: Look over there. Discreetly, mind you.
engSearchText: Look over there. Discreetly, mind you.
jpnChrName: ……あちらよ、あちら。 あまり露骨に見ないでちょうだい。
jpnSearchText:
……あちらよ、あちら。
あまり露骨に見ないでちょうだい。

engChrName: Isn't that...?
engSearchText: Isn't that...?
jpnChrName: あれって……
jpnSearchText: あれって……

engChrName: Heh. I see now.
engSearchText: Heh. I see now.
jpnChrName: あれは…… なるほど、そういう事かよ。
jpnSearchText:
あれは……
なるほど、そういう事かよ。

engChrName: Hmm... I understand now.
engSearchText: Hmm... I understand now.
jpnChrName: あれは…… ふむ、そういう事か。
jpnSearchText:
あれは……
ふむ、そういう事か。

engChrName: Yeah. Not surprised you've got your eyes on 'em. Talk about a triple threat.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Not surprised you've got your eyes on 'em.
Talk about a triple threat.
jpnChrName: 胡散臭さの３乗だからな。 そりゃ、気になるのも当然か。
jpnSearchText:
胡散臭さの３乗だからな。
そりゃ、気になるのも当然か。

engChrName: Talk about a triple threat. Not surprised you've got your eyes on 'em.
engSearchText:
Talk about a triple threat. Not surprised you've got
your eyes on 'em.
jpnChrName: おいおい、胡散臭さ３乗かよ。 確かに気になっても仕方ねえか。
jpnSearchText:
おいおい、胡散臭さ３乗かよ。
確かに気になっても仕方ねえか。

engChrName: I'm not familiar with the purple-haired man, but I can see why you'd be concerned with having Yang and that Marduk manager both there.
engSearchText:
I'm not familiar with the purple-haired man, but I
can see why you'd be concerned with having Yang
and that Marduk manager both there.
jpnChrName: 眼鏡の人はあんまり知らないけど ヤン兄さんにあのＧＭさんだもんねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
眼鏡の人はあんまり知らないけど
ヤン兄さんにあのＧＭさんだもんねぇ。

engChrName: Wonder if this meeting has anything to do with the president? ...No, it feels like it's more than just that.
engSearchText:
Wonder if this meeting has anything to do with
the president? ...No, it feels like it's more than
just that.
jpnChrName: 大統領府絡み？ うーん、それだけでも無いような。
jpnSearchText:
大統領府絡み？
うーん、それだけでも無いような。

engChrName: I haven't heard anything about that meeting myself.
engSearchText: I haven't heard anything about that meeting myself.
jpnChrName: ……自分の方にもあの会合の情報は 回ってきていませんね。
jpnSearchText:
……自分の方にもあの会合の情報は
回ってきていませんね。

engChrName: I was aware that our general manager was coming to Edith for the unveiling of the new weapons.
engSearchText:
I was aware that our general manager was coming to
Edith for the unveiling of the new weapons.
jpnChrName: 新兵装のお披露目のためＧＭが 首都（イーディス）に来ているのは存じていましたが……
jpnSearchText:
新兵装のお披露目のためＧＭが
首都（イーディス）に来ているのは存じていましたが……

engChrName: But I've heard nothing regarding the White Orchid Dragon. Admittedly, even if I had, I doubt I would have been at liberty to discuss it...
engSearchText:
But I've heard nothing regarding the White
Orchid Dragon. Admittedly, even if I had, I doubt I
would have been at liberty to discuss it...
jpnChrName: ──白蘭竜様については想定外です。 ただ、存じていてもお教えできたかどうかは……
jpnSearchText:
──白蘭竜様については想定外です。
ただ、存じていてもお教えできたかどうかは……

engChrName: Risette...
engSearchText: Risette...
jpnChrName: リゼットさん……
jpnSearchText: リゼットさん……

engChrName: Hmph.
engSearchText: Hmph.
jpnChrName: ハン……
jpnSearchText: ハン……

engChrName: Hmm...
engSearchText: Hmm...
jpnChrName: ふむ……
jpnSearchText: ふむ……

engChrName: You need not feel guilty. We understand that your job comes with its own restrictions, much like ours do.
engSearchText:
You need not feel guilty. We understand that your
job comes with its own restrictions, much like
ours do.
jpnChrName: 気にされる必要はありません。 貴女にも立場はおありでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
気にされる必要はありません。
貴女にも立場はおありでしょう。

engChrName: That's why it's much more appreciated to have you join us for tea and a chat.
engSearchText:
That's why it's much more appreciated to have you
join us for tea and a chat.
jpnChrName: むしろそんな立場にいながらこうして ぎりぎりの茶飲み話に付き合って頂ける──
jpnSearchText:
むしろそんな立場にいながらこうして
ぎりぎりの茶飲み話に付き合って頂ける──

engChrName: That's why we appreciate it all the more just how much you always do to help us.
engSearchText:
That's why we appreciate it all the more just how
much you always do to help us.
jpnChrName: むしろそんな立場にいながらそうして 最大限の配慮をしてして頂ける──
jpnSearchText:
むしろそんな立場にいながらそうして
最大限の配慮をしてして頂ける──

engChrName: You're always so good to us, and we're truly grateful.
engSearchText: You're always so good to us, and we're truly grateful.
jpnChrName: そのことが有り難く、 何よりも好ましく感じられます。
jpnSearchText:
そのことが有り難く、
何よりも好ましく感じられます。

engChrName: I am humbled by your kind words, Ms. Berka.
engSearchText: I am humbled by your kind words, Ms. Berka.
jpnChrName: ナージェ様…… そう言っていただけると恐縮です。
jpnSearchText:
ナージェ様……
そう言っていただけると恐縮です。

engChrName: Aww! Isn't this nice? We've got a little friends circle of competent women starting up here!
engSearchText:
Aww! Isn't this nice? We've got a little friends circle
of competent women starting up here!
jpnChrName: ああ、いいなぁいいなぁ！ できるオンナ同士の友情みたいで！
jpnSearchText:
ああ、いいなぁいいなぁ！
できるオンナ同士の友情みたいで！

engChrName: Can I join? I get the impression we're all about the same age! Let Kaela in, too!
engSearchText:
Can I join? I get the impression we're all about the
same age! Let Kaela in, too!
jpnChrName: わたしも仲間に入れてくださいよ～！ 歳も近そうだしカエラさんも含めてっ！
jpnSearchText:
わたしも仲間に入れてくださいよ～！
歳も近そうだしカエラさんも含めてっ！

engChrName: ...What are you talking about, Essy?
engSearchText: ...What are you talking about, Essy?
jpnChrName: エレ姉……何を言ってるのさ。
jpnSearchText: エレ姉……何を言ってるのさ。

engChrName: Wh-Why am I being included in this? Much as this does feel like a group worth being part of...
engSearchText:
Wh-Why am I being included in this? Much as this
does feel like a group worth being part of...
jpnChrName: ど、どうして私まで…… まあ、有意義な集いだとは思いますが。
jpnSearchText:
ど、どうして私まで……
まあ、有意義な集いだとは思いますが。

engChrName: Still, I'm twenty-one, and I believe Ms. Twinings is twenty?
engSearchText:
Still, I'm twenty-one, and I believe Ms. Twinings
is twenty?
jpnChrName: ……ちなみに私はまだ２１歳で トワイニングさんは確か二十歳では？
jpnSearchText:
……ちなみに私はまだ２１歳で
トワイニングさんは確か二十歳では？

engChrName: ...What?
engSearchText: ...What?

engChrName: My circumstances are a little peculiar, but I am indeed twenty years old.
engSearchText:
My circumstances are a little peculiar, but I am
indeed twenty years old.
jpnChrName: ええ、諸々の事情はあるものの 実年齢が二十歳なのは確かですね。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、諸々の事情はあるものの
実年齢が二十歳なのは確かですね。

engChrName: B-But you're both so cool and composed! Wh-What about you, Naje?
engSearchText:
B-But you're both so cool and composed!
Wh-What about you, Naje?
jpnChrName: だ、だって２人ともそんな落ち着いて…… ………そ、それじゃあナージェさんは………？
jpnSearchText:
だ、だって２人ともそんな落ち着いて……
………そ、それじゃあナージェさんは………？

engChrName: Hmm? I'm twenty-five. What of it?
engSearchText: Hmm? I'm twenty-five. What of it?
jpnChrName: ？　わたくしは ２５になりますが……？
jpnSearchText:
？　わたくしは
２５になりますが……？

engChrName: Nuh uh! I was so absolutely SURE you were older than me!
engSearchText:
Nuh uh!
I was so absolutely SURE you were older than me!
jpnChrName: ガーン！！！ 絶対に年上だと思ったのにぃ～！！！
jpnSearchText:
ガーン！！！
絶対に年上だと思ったのにぃ～！！！

engChrName: I'm almost twenty-eight... Why am I the only one nearing her third decade?
engSearchText:
I'm almost twenty-eight... Why am I the only one
nearing her third decade?
jpnChrName: わたしなんてもうすぐ２８だし…… ひ、一人だけアラサーだったんだぁ……
jpnSearchText:
わたしなんてもうすぐ２８だし……
ひ、一人だけアラサーだったんだぁ……

engChrName: N-No, it's okay... I'm still younger than Yang, and as long as I keep producing results as a researcher... *sniffle*
engSearchText:
N-No, it's okay... I'm still younger than Yang, and as
long as I keep producing results as a researcher...
*sniffle*
jpnChrName: ……いいもんいいもん、ヤン兄さんよりは若いし、 研究者としてバリバリやれれば……えぐえぐ……
jpnSearchText:
……いいもんいいもん、ヤン兄さんよりは若いし、
研究者としてバリバリやれれば……えぐえぐ……

engChrName: *sigh* You're way too young to be stressin' about your age.
engSearchText:
*sigh* You're way too young to be stressin' about
your age.
jpnChrName: やれやれ…… まだ十分若いと思うがねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ……
まだ十分若いと思うがねぇ。

engChrName: Heehee, I agree. (She's still young at heart, at least.)
engSearchText:
Heehee, I agree.
(She's still young at heart, at least.)
jpnChrName: ふふ、そうですね。 （むしろ一番若いまであるような……）
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、そうですね。
（むしろ一番若いまであるような……）

engChrName: Don't worry! It barely shows that you're the oldest! You're still the most childish—er, I mean... You don't act your age! Wait...
engSearchText:
Don't worry! It barely shows that you're the oldest!
You're still the most childish—er, I mean... You don't
act your age! Wait...
jpnChrName: うーん、むしろこの中では一番、 子供っぽ──えと、若いような気も。
jpnSearchText:
うーん、むしろこの中では一番、
子供っぽ──えと、若いような気も。

engChrName: For being so close to thirty, you act more like you're thirteen.
engSearchText:
For being so close to thirty, you act more like
you're thirteen.
jpnChrName: ハッ、むしろこの中では 一番ガキっぽいまではあんな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、むしろこの中では
一番ガキっぽいまではあんな。

engChrName: You certainly act like the biggest child of the group...
engSearchText: You certainly act like the biggest child of the group...
jpnChrName: むしろこの中では一番、 子供っぽいまであるよね……
jpnSearchText:
むしろこの中では一番、
子供っぽいまであるよね……

engChrName: I never would've become an actress in the first place if I let something like my age bother me.
engSearchText:
I never would've become an actress in the first place if
I let something like my age bother me.
jpnChrName: ま、年齢を気にしてちゃ 女優なんてやって行けないからね～。
jpnSearchText:
ま、年齢を気にしてちゃ
女優なんてやって行けないからね～。

engChrName: Heh. This is a cute conversation from where I stand.
engSearchText: Heh. This is a cute conversation from where I stand.
jpnChrName: フフ、微笑ましいものだな。
jpnSearchText: フフ、微笑ましいものだな。

engChrName: Regardless, I will stay here for the present to liaise and gather information. Particularly on the group there.
engSearchText:
Regardless, I will stay here for the present to liaise
and gather information. Particularly on the
group there.
jpnChrName: ともあれ──あの方々の動向も含め しばし皆様と交流・情報収集に努めます。
jpnSearchText:
ともあれ──あの方々の動向も含め
しばし皆様と交流・情報収集に努めます。

engChrName: But if you require my aid, please let me know. I will hurry to your side.
engSearchText:
But if you require my aid, please let me know. I will
hurry to your side.
jpnChrName: 必要であればいつでもお呼びください。 すぐにでも駆け付けますので。
jpnSearchText:
必要であればいつでもお呼びください。
すぐにでも駆け付けますので。

engChrName: Will do. Thanks.
engSearchText: Will do. Thanks.
jpnChrName: ああ、よろしく頼むぜ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、よろしく頼むぜ。

engChrName: Still, I suspect there is worth in someone keeping an eye on them and what they are doing.
engSearchText:
Still, I suspect there is worth in someone keeping an
eye on them and what they are doing.
jpnChrName: ともあれ──あの方々の動向も含めて、 カバーする価値はありそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
ともあれ──あの方々の動向も含めて、
カバーする価値はありそうですね。

engChrName: Perhaps I should handle it in case someone else takes over my current position in accompanying you?
engSearchText:
Perhaps I should handle it in case someone else takes
over my current position in accompanying you?
jpnChrName: この後、他の方に交替したらわたくしに こちらは任せていただいても？
jpnSearchText:
この後、他の方に交替したらわたくしに
こちらは任せていただいても？

engChrName: Yeah, sounds good to me. Thanks.
engSearchText: Yeah, sounds good to me. Thanks.
jpnChrName: ああ、よろしく頼むぜ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、よろしく頼むぜ。

engChrName: (Oh, boy... Good thing I got a warnin', but this is still sendin' chills down my spine.)
engSearchText:
(Oh, boy... Good thing I got a warnin', but this is still
sendin' chills down my spine.)
jpnChrName: （ったく……   前もって知ってたとはいえ。）
jpnSearchText:
（ったく……
前もって知ってたとはいえ。）

engChrName: Oh, boy...
engSearchText: Oh, boy...
jpnChrName: オイオイ……
jpnSearchText: オイオイ……

engChrName: My! If it isn't Van and one of his dear friends.
engSearchText: My! If it isn't Van and one of his dear friends.
jpnChrName: おや、これはヴァンさんたち。
jpnSearchText: おや、これはヴァンさんたち。

engChrName: So it is.
engSearchText: So it is.
jpnChrName: ふむ、君たちか。
jpnSearchText: ふむ、君たちか。

engChrName: A very happy festival to you all. Would you care to join us for a while?
engSearchText:
A very happy festival to you all. Would you care to
join us for a while?
jpnChrName: 革命記念祭、おめでとう。 フフ、君たちも一杯やっていくかね？
jpnSearchText:
革命記念祭、おめでとう。
フフ、君たちも一杯やっていくかね？

engChrName: *sigh* What the hell are you doing here, Cao?
engSearchText: *sigh* What the hell are you doing here, Cao?
jpnChrName: ったく…… なにやってんだアンタは。
jpnSearchText:
ったく……
なにやってんだアンタは。

engChrName: I had heard you were in Edith, but I was not expecting to encounter you here, sir.
engSearchText:
I had heard you were in Edith, but I was not
expecting to encounter you here, sir.
jpnChrName: ソーンダイクＧＭ……首都（イーディス）に来て いらっしゃる事は聞いていましたが。
jpnSearchText:
ソーンダイクＧＭ……首都（イーディス）に来て
いらっしゃる事は聞いていましたが。

engChrName: What are you up to here, Yang? This is such a strange place to find you.
engSearchText:
What are you up to here, Yang? This is such a strange
place to find you.
jpnChrName: ちょっとちょっと…… ヤン兄、何やってるのさ？
jpnSearchText:
ちょっとちょっと……
ヤン兄、何やってるのさ？

engChrName: I knew you and the professor were invited for the ceremony, but I'm guessin' you're not here to talk about the new weapons?
engSearchText:
I knew you and the professor were invited for the
ceremony, but I'm guessin' you're not here to talk
about the new weapons?
jpnChrName: アンタ（ソーンダイク）と教授が、記念式典の ゲストに呼ばれてたのは気付いたが……
jpnSearchText:
アンタ（ソーンダイク）と教授が、記念式典の
ゲストに呼ばれてたのは気付いたが……

engChrName: Not with Cao here, anyway.
engSearchText: Not with Cao here, anyway.
jpnChrName: 新兵装について話しているにしちゃあ アンタ（ツァオ）が同席しているのは不思議だな？
jpnSearchText:
新兵装について話しているにしちゃあ
アンタ（ツァオ）が同席しているのは不思議だな？

engChrName: Unless Heiyue's thinking of introducin' Assault Frames to their arsenal now?
engSearchText:
Unless Heiyue's thinking of introducin' Assault
Frames to their arsenal now?
jpnChrName: まさかあのＡＦあたりを黒月でも 導入しようとか言わねえだろうな？
jpnSearchText:
まさかあのＡＦあたりを黒月でも
導入しようとか言わねえだろうな？

engChrName: Naturally, we have no such intention.
engSearchText: Naturally, we have no such intention.
jpnChrName: いえいえ、それこそまさか。
jpnSearchText: いえいえ、それこそまさか。

engChrName: Appealing as they are, they do not fit Heiyue any more than the Empire's Panzer Soldats did.
engSearchText:
Appealing as they are, they do not fit Heiyue any
more than the Empire's Panzer Soldats did.
jpnChrName: 帝国の機甲兵といい魅力的な兵装ですが 黒月（我ら）の在り方とは噛み合っておりません。
jpnSearchText:
帝国の機甲兵といい魅力的な兵装ですが
黒月（我ら）の在り方とは噛み合っておりません。

engChrName: Though I am rather curious to know how well they'd work with regards to martial arts.
engSearchText:
Though I am rather curious to know how well they'd
work with regards to martial arts.
jpnChrName: ああ──武術（ウーシュウ）との相性については 個人的には少々気になる所ですが。
jpnSearchText:
ああ──武術（ウーシュウ）との相性については
個人的には少々気になる所ですが。

engChrName: Hmm... I am at least aware of Taito techniques being used in a Panzer Soldat before.
engSearchText:
Hmm... I am at least aware of Taito techniques being
used in a Panzer Soldat before.
jpnChrName: ふむ、かつて帝国の機甲兵で 泰斗の技を振るった例もあるようだが。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、かつて帝国の機甲兵で
泰斗の技を振るった例もあるようだが。

engChrName: And I have no doubt that whatever a Panzer Soldat can do, an Assault Frame will perform better. Have you tested them with hollow style already?
engSearchText:
And I have no doubt that whatever a Panzer Soldat
can do, an Assault Frame will perform better.
Have you tested them with hollow style already?
jpnChrName: それ以上のポテンシャルはある筈だ。 そちらの“零式”でのテストはどうだったかね？
jpnSearchText:
それ以上のポテンシャルはある筈だ。
そちらの“零式”でのテストはどうだったかね？

engChrName: We certainly did, and saw some success. How viable it is depends heavily on the pilot's own skills, however.
engSearchText:
We certainly did, and saw some success. How viable
it is depends heavily on the pilot's own
skills, however.
jpnChrName: ええ、ある程度は成功しましたよ。 もっとも操縦士次第ではありますが。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、ある程度は成功しましたよ。
もっとも操縦士次第ではありますが。

engChrName: Once we have established the hollow style's use in Assault Frames, it may be worth trying Gekka school techniques as well.
engSearchText:
Once we have established the hollow style's use in
Assault Frames, it may be worth trying Gekka school
techniques as well.
jpnChrName: 《零式》でもう少し実績を積んだ暁には いずれ月華も試してもいいかもしれません。
jpnSearchText:
《零式》でもう少し実績を積んだ暁には
いずれ月華も試してもいいかもしれません。

engChrName: Heh. I would be happy to lend you some of our men for that trial, if you wish.
engSearchText:
Heh. I would be happy to lend you some of our men
for that trial, if you wish.
jpnChrName: フフ、その時はよろしかったら わたくし共の家人をお貸しいたしますよ？
jpnSearchText:
フフ、その時はよろしかったら
わたくし共の家人をお貸しいたしますよ？

engChrName: Naturally, this is all in jest.
engSearchText: Naturally, this is all in jest.
jpnChrName: まあ、無論冗談だ。
jpnSearchText: まあ、無論冗談だ。

engChrName: I originally planned this meeting upon hearing that Marduk and Heiyue had dealings with one another during the crisis in Oración.
engSearchText:
I originally planned this meeting upon hearing that
Marduk and Heiyue had dealings with one another
during the crisis in Oración.
jpnChrName: 聞けば先日のオラシオンの件で ＭＫ社と黒月の交流があったとのこと。
jpnSearchText:
聞けば先日のオラシオンの件で
ＭＫ社と黒月の交流があったとのこと。

engChrName: As such, I asked their general manager to arrange for this meeting, thinking this an opportunity that does not present itself often.
engSearchText:
As such, I asked their general manager to arrange for
this meeting, thinking this an opportunity that does
not present itself often.
jpnChrName: 滅多にない機会、ＧＭ殿に仲介を頼んで 改めて挨拶させてもらっただけだ。
jpnSearchText:
滅多にない機会、ＧＭ殿に仲介を頼んで
改めて挨拶させてもらっただけだ。

engChrName: I'm truly honored to be able to meet you. And am quite elated to hear you wanted to meet with me so much.
engSearchText:
I'm truly honored to be able to meet you. And am
quite elated to hear you wanted to meet with me
so much.
jpnChrName: こちらこそ、クロンカイト教授に この機会にご挨拶できて恐悦至極です。
jpnSearchText:
こちらこそ、クロンカイト教授に
この機会にご挨拶できて恐悦至極です。

engChrName: Actually, I heard your father was born in Langport. Is that right?
engSearchText:
Actually, I heard your father was born in Langport.
Is that right?
jpnChrName: 何でも教授のお父上は ラングポートのご出身でもあるとか？
jpnSearchText:
何でも教授のお父上は
ラングポートのご出身でもあるとか？

engChrName: He was, though he left while young and made Basel his home for the rest of his years.
engSearchText:
He was, though he left while young and made Basel
his home for the rest of his years.
jpnChrName: 若い頃に煌都を離れ、バーゼルに 骨を埋めることにしたそうだがね。
jpnSearchText:
若い頃に煌都を離れ、バーゼルに
骨を埋めることにしたそうだがね。

engChrName: I do hear he agonized long and hard on whether to become a merchant in Langport or a researcher.
engSearchText:
I do hear he agonized long and hard on whether to
become a merchant in Langport or a researcher.
jpnChrName: 煌都商人になるか研究者になるか、 最後まで悩んだ末の選択だったそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
煌都商人になるか研究者になるか、
最後まで悩んだ末の選択だったそうだ。

engChrName: Fascinating.
engSearchText: Fascinating.
jpnChrName: ハハ、そうでしたか。
jpnSearchText: ハハ、そうでしたか。

engChrName: Langport's people do seem particularly inclined to becoming merchants. Happens often to Easterners from there.
engSearchText:
Langport's people do seem particularly inclined to
becoming merchants. Happens often to Easterners
from there.
jpnChrName: 同じ東方人でも煌都系の気質はどうも 商売の方に向きがちと言われますが……
jpnSearchText:
同じ東方人でも煌都系の気質はどうも
商売の方に向きがちと言われますが……

engChrName: But if a genius researcher like you came from the same bloodline, clearly that rule is not absolute.
engSearchText:
But if a genius researcher like you came from the
same bloodline, clearly that rule is not absolute.
jpnChrName: こうして不世出の才が出ているならば あながちそうでもなさそうですねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
こうして不世出の才が出ているならば
あながちそうでもなさそうですねぇ。

engChrName: Bloodline matters little to me to begin with. A person's inclination is decided more by their individual personality and life experiences.
engSearchText:
Bloodline matters little to me to begin with.
A person's inclination is decided more by their
individual personality and life experiences.
jpnChrName: 私は血筋に幻想は持っていないがね。 結局は気質と縁に依るものが大きいだろう。
jpnSearchText:
私は血筋に幻想は持っていないがね。
結局は気質と縁に依るものが大きいだろう。

engChrName: Heh. I am inclined to agree. When evaluating potential new hires at Marduk...
engSearchText:
Heh. I am inclined to agree. When evaluating
potential new hires at Marduk...
jpnChrName: フフ、それは私も同意見ですな。 ＭＫ社においても採用基準については──
jpnSearchText:
フフ、それは私も同意見ですな。
ＭＫ社においても採用基準については──

engChrName: I don't trust a lick of what they say, but there's nothing to really go off of here. Got no clue what they're up to.
engSearchText:
I don't trust a lick of what they say, but there's
nothing to really go off of here. Got no clue what
they're up to.
jpnChrName: ……露骨に胡散臭ぇが、揃いも揃って こっちに掴ませるような連中じゃねえな。
jpnSearchText:
……露骨に胡散臭ぇが、揃いも揃って
こっちに掴ませるような連中じゃねえな。

engChrName: I agree... (I wonder if Dad is connected to this somehow?)
engSearchText:
I agree...
(I wonder if Dad is connected to this somehow?)
jpnChrName: ……はい。 （お父さんも何か関係してるのかな……？）
jpnSearchText:
……はい。
（お父さんも何か関係してるのかな……？）

engChrName: Yeah. (I wonder if Kasim has anything to do with this.)
engSearchText:
Yeah.
(I wonder if Kasim has anything to do with this.)
jpnChrName: ……ですね。 （お兄ちゃんも関係してるのかな……？）
jpnSearchText:
……ですね。
（お兄ちゃんも関係してるのかな……？）

engChrName: Better to just leave them be.
engSearchText: Better to just leave them be.
jpnChrName: ……だな。 ま、気にするだけムダだろ。
jpnSearchText:
……だな。
ま、気にするだけムダだろ。

engChrName: Speaking from experience, I agree. (Though I do wonder why Mr. Thorndyke is speaking with a member of Heiyue...)
engSearchText:
Speaking from experience, I agree.
(Though I do wonder why Mr. Thorndyke is
speaking with a member of Heiyue...)
jpnChrName: ……ええ、我が上司ながら。 （しかしどうして黒月の方まで……）
jpnSearchText:
……ええ、我が上司ながら。
（しかしどうして黒月の方まで……）

engChrName: Agreed... (I wonder if Gran knows?)
engSearchText:
Agreed...
(I wonder if Gran knows?)
jpnChrName: ……だね。 （博士（グランマ）は知っているのかな……？）
jpnSearchText:
……だね。
（博士（グランマ）は知っているのかな……？）

engChrName: Yeah. Thinking so much about them's just gonna waste our time.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Thinking so much about them's just gonna
waste our time.
jpnChrName: ……そうね。 ま、気にするだけムダじゃない？
jpnSearchText:
……そうね。
ま、気にするだけムダじゃない？

engChrName: We should keep their meeting in mind, but I suggest thinking no more on it.
engSearchText:
We should keep their meeting in mind, but I suggest
thinking no more on it.
jpnChrName: ふむ…… まあ留意する程度が関の山だろう。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ……
まあ留意する程度が関の山だろう。

engChrName: Shoot! They called in demons!
engSearchText: Shoot! They called in demons!
jpnChrName: っ！　悪魔どもを呼んだか！
jpnSearchText: っ！　悪魔どもを呼んだか！

engChrName: They must be trying to protect it!
engSearchText: They must be trying to protect it!
jpnChrName: なるほど、これを守ろうと してるみたいだね！
jpnSearchText:
なるほど、これを守ろうと
してるみたいだね！

engChrName: Break the Demon Stone?
engSearchText: Break the Demon Stone?
jpnChrName: 魔石を破壊しますか？
jpnSearchText: <C1>魔石を破壊しますか？

engChrName: Break the Demon Stone?
engSearchText: Break the Demon Stone?
jpnChrName: 魔石を破壊しますか？
jpnSearchText: <C1>魔石を破壊しますか？

engChrName: Break the Demon Stone?
engSearchText: Break the Demon Stone?
jpnChrName: 魔石を破壊しますか？
jpnSearchText: <C1>魔石を破壊しますか？

engChrName: I imagine this is it?
engSearchText: I imagine this is it?
jpnChrName: ──はい、多分それじゃないでしょうか？
jpnSearchText: ──はい、多分それじゃないでしょうか？

engChrName: Th-Thank you! I'll check right away!
engSearchText: Th-Thank you! I'll check right away!
jpnChrName: あ、ありがとうございます！ さっそく確認してみますね。
jpnSearchText:
あ、ありがとうございます！
さっそく確認してみますね。

engChrName: Yes! This stain on the front cover is from when I spilled tea on it!
engSearchText:
Yes! This stain on the front cover is from when I
spilled tea on it!
jpnChrName: あっ、この表紙に付いてるシミ…… 紅茶がはねてしまった時の……！
jpnSearchText:
あっ、この表紙に付いてるシミ……
紅茶がはねてしまった時の……！

engChrName: So it's definitely your copy, then?
engSearchText: So it's definitely your copy, then?
jpnChrName: つう事は、お前の物で間違いなさそうだな。
jpnSearchText: つう事は、お前の物で間違いなさそうだな。

engChrName: It has to be! I'm so relieved to finally have it back...
engSearchText: It has to be! I'm so relieved to finally have it back...
jpnChrName: はい、手元に戻ってくれて 本当に良かったです……！
jpnSearchText:
はい、手元に戻ってくれて
本当に良かったです……！

engChrName: I'd honestly given up on ever finding it. Umm... Just who are you?
engSearchText:
I'd honestly given up on ever finding it. Umm...
Just who are you?
jpnChrName: で、でもまさか本当に見つかるなんて…… その、貴女は……
jpnSearchText:
で、でもまさか本当に見つかるなんて……
その、貴女は……

engChrName: Let's just say I run a bookstore on the other side of town.
engSearchText:
Let's just say I run a bookstore on the other side
of town.
jpnChrName: とある場所で本屋みたいなことをしてまして。
jpnSearchText: とある場所で本屋みたいなことをしてまして。

engChrName: Oh, how unexpected it was to have you call out for me, the answer to your troubles being right in my store's lineup!
engSearchText:
Oh, how unexpected it was to have you call out for
me, the answer to your troubles being right in my
store's lineup!
jpnChrName: それにしても巡り巡って私の手元に来た品物が ヴァンさん繋がりだったなんて。
jpnSearchText:
それにしても巡り巡って私の手元に来た品物が
ヴァンさん繋がりだったなんて。

engChrName: May this be fate, bringing us together?
engSearchText: May this be fate, bringing us together?
jpnChrName: やっぱりこれって、運命なのかしら……？
jpnSearchText: やっぱりこれって、運命なのかしら……？

engChrName: Hell no. Just hearin' you say that's already givin' me goosebumps.
engSearchText:
Hell no. Just hearin' you say that's already givin'
me goosebumps.
jpnChrName: あー、断じて違う。 お前さんが言うと恐ろしいからやめてくれ。
jpnSearchText:
あー、断じて違う。
お前さんが言うと恐ろしいからやめてくれ。

engChrName: But thanks anyway. I'll wire you some mira later for your trouble.
engSearchText:
But thanks anyway. I'll wire you some mira later for
your trouble.
jpnChrName: とにかく礼を言うぜ。 手間賃は例の口座に振り込んでおく。
jpnSearchText:
とにかく礼を言うぜ。
手間賃は例の口座に振り込んでおく。

engChrName: Heehee, don't worry so much about it! I owed you one, so let's call ourselves even.
engSearchText:
Heehee, don't worry so much about it! I owed you
one, so let's call ourselves even.
jpnChrName: うふふ、以前のお礼もありますし 少しはキャッシュバックさせてもらいますね。
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、以前のお礼もありますし
少しはキャッシュバックさせてもらいますね。

engChrName: Well, I'll leave the two of you be!
engSearchText: Well, I'll leave the two of you be!
jpnChrName: それじゃあ私はこれで。
jpnSearchText: それじゃあ私はこれで。

engChrName: Thank you again!
engSearchText: Thank you again!
jpnChrName: あ、ありがとうございました……！
jpnSearchText: あ、ありがとうございました……！

engChrName: (What kind of relationship do the two of them have? I wonder...)
engSearchText:
(What kind of relationship do the two of them have?
I wonder...)
jpnChrName: （うーん、ちょっと関係が気になるような……   ってそれよりも。）
jpnSearchText:
（うーん、ちょっと関係が気になるような……
ってそれよりも。）

engChrName: I'm really sorry for all the trouble helping me turned out to be, Van.
engSearchText:
I'm really sorry for all the trouble helping me turned
out to be, Van.
jpnChrName: ……ヴァンさん、すみません。 何から何まで面倒を見てもらって。
jpnSearchText:
……ヴァンさん、すみません。
何から何まで面倒を見てもらって。

engChrName: Hey. Like I said, I didn't do it for free. I'll cash in the favor when you're rich and powerful.
engSearchText:
Hey. Like I said, I didn't do it for free. I'll cash in the
favor when you're rich and powerful.
jpnChrName: あー、言った通りタダじゃねえぞ？ あくまでも出世払いだ。
jpnSearchText:
あー、言った通りタダじゃねえぞ？
あくまでも出世払いだ。

engChrName: Call it an investment in the future of one of my employees. Can't have you too bummed out about it.
engSearchText:
Call it an investment in the future of one of
my employees. Can't have you too bummed out
about it.
jpnChrName: 今後も助手として役立ってもらうための 先行投資でもあるな。
jpnSearchText:
今後も助手として役立ってもらうための
先行投資でもあるな。

engChrName: (*sigh* If you say so.)
engSearchText: (*sigh* If you say so.)
jpnChrName: （……もう、本当にこの人は……）
jpnSearchText: （……もう、本当にこの人は……）

engChrName: I'll do all I can to deliver on your expectations, then!
engSearchText: I'll do all I can to deliver on your expectations, then!
jpnChrName: ……はい、今後とも力になれるよう 頑張りますので……！
jpnSearchText:
……はい、今後とも力になれるよう
頑張りますので……！

engChrName: I'm so glad to finally have my book back.
engSearchText: I'm so glad to finally have my book back.
jpnChrName: それに…… 取り戻せて本当によかったです。
jpnSearchText:
それに……
取り戻せて本当によかったです。

engChrName: What a coincidence that one of your favorite book protagonists has the same name you do.
engSearchText:
What a coincidence that one of your favorite book
protagonists has the same name you do.
jpnChrName: 陽溜りのアニエス、か。 お前と同じ名前のヒロインの小説……
jpnSearchText:
陽溜りのアニエス、か。
お前と同じ名前のヒロインの小説……

engChrName: Or is that why you like it so much?
engSearchText: Or is that why you like it so much?
jpnChrName: その本を大事にしてる理由と 何か関係があったりすんのか？
jpnSearchText:
その本を大事にしてる理由と
何か関係があったりすんのか？

engChrName: It's a little embarrassing to admit it, but that's right.
engSearchText: It's a little embarrassing to admit it, but that's right.
jpnChrName: ふふ、そうですね。 自分で言うのも恥ずかしいですけど……
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、そうですね。
自分で言うのも恥ずかしいですけど……

engChrName: The reason why I asked my parents for it in the first place was because of the title.
engSearchText:
The reason why I asked my parents for it in the first
place was because of the title.
jpnChrName: 両親に買ってもらったきっかけは、 本のタイトルに興味を惹かれたからでした。
jpnSearchText:
両親に買ってもらったきっかけは、
本のタイトルに興味を惹かれたからでした。

engChrName: But that's just the start of it. The real reason why I treasure it so much is because I admire Agnès' character so much.
engSearchText:
But that's just the start of it. The real reason why I
treasure it so much is because I admire Agnès'
character so much.
jpnChrName: でも、この本を大切にしていたのは 私が“アニエス”に憧れていたからなんです。
jpnSearchText:
でも、この本を大切にしていたのは
私が“アニエス”に憧れていたからなんです。

engChrName: Really? Isn't she like a magician tryin' to blend in with society?
engSearchText:
Really? Isn't she like a magician tryin' to blend in
with society?
jpnChrName: へえ……？　たしか世を忍ぶ “魔法使い”って話だったか。
jpnSearchText:
へえ……？　たしか世を忍ぶ
“魔法使い”って話だったか。

engChrName: Yes, but what I admire is her determination. She won't stop at anything to protect what she cares about, even if it's a danger to herself.
engSearchText:
Yes, but what I admire is her determination.
She won't stop at anything to protect what she
cares about, even if it's a danger to herself.
jpnChrName: 自分の危険も省みず、守りたいものに対して 真っすぐな彼女の姿が格好良くって。
jpnSearchText:
自分の危険も省みず、守りたいものに対して
真っすぐな彼女の姿が格好良くって。

engChrName: It's my comfort book. I'd always go back and read it whenever I felt like giving up...
engSearchText:
It's my comfort book. I'd always go back and read it
whenever I felt like giving up...
jpnChrName: だから、挫けそうになった時は 小説を読み返して……
jpnSearchText:
だから、挫けそうになった時は
小説を読み返して……

engChrName: Then I'd convince myself I was a magician just like Agnès and push on.
engSearchText:
Then I'd convince myself I was a magician just like
Agnès and push on.
jpnChrName: 私もアニエスのような魔法使いに なったつもりで頑張っていたんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
私もアニエスのような魔法使いに
なったつもりで頑張っていたんですよ。

engChrName: Heh. Guess we all were children once.
engSearchText: Heh. Guess we all were children once.
jpnChrName: ハッ、お前さんにもそんな いかにもな子供時代もあったんだな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、お前さんにもそんな
いかにもな子供時代もあったんだな。

engChrName: (Though it might've rubbed off on her. She's very strong-willed herself, for someone her age.)
engSearchText:
(Though it might've rubbed off on her. She's very
strong-willed herself, for someone her age.)
jpnChrName: （案外、小娘らしからぬ芯の強さの   一因だったりするのかもしれねえな。）
jpnSearchText:
（案外、小娘らしからぬ芯の強さの
一因だったりするのかもしれねえな。）

engChrName: Huh?
engSearchText: Huh?
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん？
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん？

engChrName: D-Don't get the wrong idea! I don't pretend to be her anymore!
engSearchText:
D-Don't get the wrong idea! I don't pretend to be
her anymore!
jpnChrName: あ、念の為言っておきますけど 今はそういうなりきりとかはしてませんから！
jpnSearchText:
あ、念の為言っておきますけど
今はそういうなりきりとかはしてませんから！

engChrName: Not what I was thinkin'. But 'anymore' does mean you used to, yeah?
engSearchText:
Not what I was thinkin'. But 'anymore' does mean you
used to, yeah?
jpnChrName: あー、そんなこと想像してねぇって。 つうか昔はなりきったりしてたのかよ？
jpnSearchText:
あー、そんなこと想像してねぇって。
つうか昔はなりきったりしてたのかよ？

jpnChrName: ハッ……
jpnSearchText: ハッ……

engChrName: Heh. Anyway, we've still got a bit of free time left.
engSearchText: Heh. Anyway, we've still got a bit of free time left.
jpnChrName: クク……さて、ちょいと休憩時間が余ってるな。
jpnSearchText: クク……さて、ちょいと休憩時間が余ってるな。

engChrName: I think I got an idea about what you could pay me with. Why not show me what kinda sweets you students buy at the department store nowadays?
engSearchText:
I think I got an idea about what you could pay
me with. Why not show me what kinda sweets you
students buy at the department store nowadays?
jpnChrName: せっかくだ、報酬代わりに百貨店で今時の女学生の お勧めスイーツなんかを紹介してもらうとするか。
jpnSearchText:
せっかくだ、報酬代わりに百貨店で今時の女学生の
お勧めスイーツなんかを紹介してもらうとするか。

engChrName: Ahaha. I wouldn't count that as payment. But let's see...
engSearchText:
Ahaha. I wouldn't count that as payment. But
let's see...
jpnChrName: あはは、そのくらいでしたらいくらでも。 そうですね、この辺りだと……
jpnSearchText:
あはは、そのくらいでしたらいくらでも。
そうですね、この辺りだと……

engChrName: The two of them began a quick tour of the area in front of the station before their free time came to an end.
engSearchText:
The two of them began a quick tour of the area in
front of the station before their free time came to
an end.
jpnChrName: その後、ヴァンとアニエスは駅前を 軽く回りつつ自由時間を終えて……
jpnSearchText:
その後、ヴァンとアニエスは駅前を
軽く回りつつ自由時間を終えて……

engChrName: After that, they returned to work.
engSearchText: After that, they returned to work.
jpnChrName: 再び解決業務へと戻ったのだった。
jpnSearchText: <C1>再び解決業務へと戻ったのだった。

engChrName: Van's group decided to take a short break.
engSearchText: Van's group decided to take a short break.
jpnChrName: ヴァンたちは街の巡回の合間に、 しばしの休憩をとることになり──
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンたちは街の巡回の合間に、
しばしの休憩をとることになり──

engChrName: Everyone split up so they could spend their free time as they pleased.
engSearchText:
Everyone split up so they could spend their free time
as they pleased.
jpnChrName: 一時的に解散して、 それぞれ自由に過ごすのだった。
jpnSearchText:
一時的に解散して、
それぞれ自由に過ごすのだった。

engChrName: Thank you again for agreeing to come out shopping with me, Van.
engSearchText:
Thank you again for agreeing to come out shopping
with me, Van.
jpnChrName: その、改めて買い物についてきて 頂いてありがとうございます。
jpnSearchText:
その、改めて買い物についてきて
頂いてありがとうございます。

engChrName: I'm only going to buy some personal items, though. You really didn't have to accompany me.
engSearchText:
I'm only going to buy some personal items, though.
You really didn't have to accompany me.
jpnChrName: でもいいんですか？　あくまで 個人的な買い物なんですけど……
jpnSearchText:
でもいいんですか？　あくまで
個人的な買い物なんですけど……

engChrName: You got a lengthy shopping list, right? Figured you'd need some help carryin' it all.
engSearchText:
You got a lengthy shopping list, right? Figured you'd
need some help carryin' it all.
jpnChrName: 色々買う予定なんだろ？ 一人じゃ持ちきれねえかと思ってな。
jpnSearchText:
色々買う予定なんだろ？
一人じゃ持ちきれねえかと思ってな。

engChrName: Somethin' about a bunch of art class supplies, yeah?
engSearchText: Somethin' about a bunch of art class supplies, yeah?
jpnChrName: それにしても、 アラミスの授業で使う画材か。
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、
アラミスの授業で使う画材か。

engChrName: That's right. We're about to start lessons on oil painting soon.
engSearchText:
That's right. We're about to start lessons on oil
painting soon.
jpnChrName: 今度、絵画の授業で油絵を描くんです。
jpnSearchText: 今度、絵画の授業で油絵を描くんです。

engChrName: And I don't suspect I'll be able to produce something I'll be proud of with my current supplies.
engSearchText:
And I don't suspect I'll be able to produce something
I'll be proud of with my current supplies.
jpnChrName: ちょっと手持ちの画材だと 表現しきれなさそうな課題で……
jpnSearchText:
ちょっと手持ちの画材だと
表現しきれなさそうな課題で……

engChrName: It's also a good chance to replace some of my older equipment with better materials, too.
engSearchText:
It's also a good chance to replace some of my older
equipment with better materials, too.
jpnChrName: この機会にちょっといい画材を 揃えたいなと思いまして。
jpnSearchText:
この機会にちょっといい画材を
揃えたいなと思いまして。

engChrName: Being a student is really rough on the wallet, huh? Well, let's see what we can find.
engSearchText:
Being a student is really rough on the wallet, huh?
Well, let's see what we can find.
jpnChrName: ハッ、学生ってのも大変だな。 それじゃサクッと回るとするか。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、学生ってのも大変だな。
それじゃサクッと回るとするか。

engChrName: Thank you!
engSearchText: Thank you!
jpnChrName: はい、よろしくお願いします！
jpnSearchText: はい、よろしくお願いします！

engChrName: It's surprising just how much of a difference in price there can be between paints that are basically the same color.
engSearchText:
It's surprising just how much of a difference in price
there can be between paints that are basically the
same color.
jpnChrName: 同じような色の絵具でも、 値段が結構違っていますよね。
jpnSearchText:
同じような色の絵具でも、
値段が結構違っていますよね。

engChrName: And then I have to choose between a 12-color set and a 24-color set... There's an almost overwhelming amount of options.
engSearchText:
And then I have to choose between a 12-color set and
a 24-color set... There's an almost overwhelming
amount of options.
jpnChrName: １２色セットや２４色セットもあって…… どれを選んだらいいか悩んでしまいます。
jpnSearchText:
１２色セットや２４色セットもあって……
どれを選んだらいいか悩んでしまいます。

engChrName: For sure. The pricier ones are supposed to have more vibrant colors that fade less and have better coverage.
engSearchText:
For sure. The pricier ones are supposed to have more
vibrant colors that fade less and have better coverage.
jpnChrName: 確か、値段によって発色や 絵具の伸びの良さが違うらしいな。
jpnSearchText:
確か、値段によって発色や
絵具の伸びの良さが違うらしいな。

engChrName: Not gonna tell you how to spend your money, but do keep in mind that you're at Aramis of all places.
engSearchText:
Not gonna tell you how to spend your money, but do
keep in mind that you're at Aramis of all places.
jpnChrName: 好きなモンを選べばいいと思うが── お前の学校はあの“アラミス”だからな。
jpnSearchText:
好きなモンを選べばいいと思うが──
お前の学校はあの“アラミス”だからな。

engChrName: Tryin' to make do with stuff more suited to your stage of learning instead of just shooting for top range goods could be educational in itself.
engSearchText:
Tryin' to make do with stuff more suited to your stage
of learning instead of just shooting for top range
goods could be educational in itself.
jpnChrName: 身の丈にあった画材と工夫で 何とかする方が勉強になるんじゃないか？
jpnSearchText:
身の丈にあった画材と工夫で
何とかする方が勉強になるんじゃないか？

engChrName: Heehee. Perhaps you're right. Maybe I should go for something more basic and affordable, then.
engSearchText:
Heehee. Perhaps you're right. Maybe I should go for
something more basic and affordable, then.
jpnChrName: ふふ、確かにそうかもしれません。 そうなると、もう少しベーシックな物を……
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、確かにそうかもしれません。
そうなると、もう少しベーシックな物を……

engChrName: I'd also like to buy a wide variety of brushes.
engSearchText: I'd also like to buy a wide variety of brushes.
jpnChrName: できれば絵筆も色々な種類を 揃えておきたいんですよね。
jpnSearchText:
できれば絵筆も色々な種類を
揃えておきたいんですよね。

engChrName: I have some already, but it's just the beginner set I bought when I enrolled.
engSearchText:
I have some already, but it's just the beginner set I
bought when I enrolled.
jpnChrName: 入学時に揃えたものは あくまで初心者向けのセットでしたし。
jpnSearchText:
入学時に揃えたものは
あくまで初心者向けのセットでしたし。

engChrName: Maybe it'd be worth buying somethin' expensive like this fan brush, then?
engSearchText:
Maybe it'd be worth buying somethin' expensive like
this fan brush, then?
jpnChrName: だったら、こっちの扇型筆とか 思い切って高級筆ってのもアリじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
だったら、こっちの扇型筆とか
思い切って高級筆ってのもアリじゃねえか？

engChrName: I know I just said not to shoot for top range goods, but with brushes, a difference in materials really does open up a lot of options.
engSearchText:
I know I just said not to shoot for top range goods,
but with brushes, a difference in materials really does
open up a lot of options.
jpnChrName: 身の丈って話をしたばかりだが 筆も素材の違いでかなり表現が変わるからな。
jpnSearchText:
身の丈って話をしたばかりだが
筆も素材の違いでかなり表現が変わるからな。

engChrName: You know a lot more about this than I expected.
engSearchText: You know a lot more about this than I expected.
jpnChrName: へえ、お詳しいんですね？
jpnSearchText: へえ、お詳しいんですね？

engChrName: Heehee. You do seem to have a lot of hobbies, though. Is painting one of them?
engSearchText:
Heehee. You do seem to have a lot of
hobbies, though. Is painting one of them?
jpnChrName: ふふ、多趣味みたいですし もしかして絵も描かれるとか？
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、多趣味みたいですし
もしかして絵も描かれるとか？

engChrName: Uh, no. Not really. Gave it a shot, but I learned real quick it wasn't for me.
engSearchText:
Uh, no. Not really. Gave it a shot, but I learned real
quick it wasn't for me.
jpnChrName: ……あー、どっちかっていうと苦手なほうだ。 ちょっと齧ったことくらいはあるけどな。
jpnSearchText:
……あー、どっちかっていうと苦手なほうだ。
ちょっと齧ったことくらいはあるけどな。

engChrName: How about this set? Looks like it'd be a perfect match for you.
engSearchText:
How about this set? Looks like it'd be a perfect match
for you.
jpnChrName: おっ、こっちのセットなんかどうだ？ まさにお前さんにピッタリっぽいが。
jpnSearchText:
おっ、こっちのセットなんかどうだ？
まさにお前さんにピッタリっぽいが。

engChrName: Oh? The luxury Aramis the Artist model brush... Goodness gracious, this is expensive!
engSearchText:
Oh? The luxury Aramis the Artist model brush...
Goodness gracious, this is expensive!
jpnChrName: ええと、高級絵筆『芸術家アラミス』モデル── ってとんでもなく高いじゃないですか～！？
jpnSearchText:
ええと、高級絵筆『芸術家アラミス』モデル──
ってとんでもなく高いじゃないですか～！？

engChrName: That will be 2,000 mira in total.
engSearchText: That will be 2,000 mira in total.
jpnChrName: お会計は２０００ミラ丁度になります。
jpnSearchText: お会計は２０００ミラ丁度になります。

engChrName: I'll pay with this, then.
engSearchText: I'll pay with this, then.
jpnChrName: ではこちらで……
jpnSearchText: ではこちらで……

engChrName: I'm quite happy with how that went! It fit perfectly within my budget, too.
engSearchText:
I'm quite happy with how that went! It fit perfectly
within my budget, too.
jpnChrName: ふふ、満足いくものが買えて良かったです。 予算ピッタリに収まりましたし。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、満足いくものが買えて良かったです。
予算ピッタリに収まりましたし。

engChrName: Yeah. Figured you'd end up overspendin', what with everything you got.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Figured you'd end up overspendin', what with
everything you got.
jpnChrName: へえ、色々買ったから けっこう行くと思ってたが。
jpnSearchText:
へえ、色々買ったから
けっこう行くと思ってたが。

engChrName: You're good at keepin' to a budget for a rich girl.
engSearchText: You're good at keepin' to a budget for a rich girl.
jpnChrName: お嬢様な割に買い物上手なこった。
jpnSearchText: お嬢様な割に買い物上手なこった。

engChrName: Heehee. I wouldn't quite describe myself that way, but I suppose school has forced good habits on me.
engSearchText:
Heehee. I wouldn't quite describe myself that way,
but I suppose school has forced good habits on me.
jpnChrName: あはは、別にお嬢様というわけでは…… 半分クセみたいなものですね。
jpnSearchText:
あはは、別にお嬢様というわけでは……
半分クセみたいなものですね。

engChrName: I perform a lot of different jobs as part of the Student Council.
engSearchText:
I perform a lot of different jobs as part of the
Student Council.
jpnChrName: 学校でも色々押し付けられてるうちに 身についてしまったといいますか。
jpnSearchText:
学校でも色々押し付けられてるうちに
身についてしまったといいますか。

engChrName: Heh. Maybe I could use some of those skills back at the office.
engSearchText:
Heh. Maybe I could use some of those skills back at
the office.
jpnChrName: ハッ、だったら事務所の事務仕事も この際押し付けちまおうかねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、だったら事務所の事務仕事も
この際押し付けちまおうかねぇ。

engChrName: Ahaha... I wouldn't mind helping with all there is to do at the office.
engSearchText:
Ahaha... I wouldn't mind helping with all there is to
do at the office.
jpnChrName: あはは……ヴァンさん、結構色々と 溜め込んじゃっていますよね。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……ヴァンさん、結構色々と
溜め込んじゃっていますよね。

engChrName: Van's group decided to take a short break.
engSearchText: Van's group decided to take a short break.
jpnChrName: ヴァンたちは街の巡回の合間に、 しばしの休憩をとることになり──
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンたちは街の巡回の合間に、
しばしの休憩をとることになり──

engChrName: Everyone split up so they could spend their free time as they pleased.
engSearchText:
Everyone split up so they could spend their free time
as they pleased.
jpnChrName: 一時的に解散して、 それぞれ自由に過ごすのだった。
jpnSearchText:
一時的に解散して、
それぞれ自由に過ごすのだった。

engChrName: I think this is where we're supposed to meet with them.
engSearchText:
I think this is where we're supposed to meet
with them.
jpnChrName: ええと、集合場所は この辺りだと思うんですけど……
jpnSearchText:
ええと、集合場所は
この辺りだと思うんですけど……

engChrName: Oh, look who else is here.
engSearchText: Oh, look who else is here.
jpnChrName: おっ、ユメ坊達もいるじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText: おっ、ユメ坊達もいるじゃねえか。

engChrName: Van! Agnès!
engSearchText: Van! Agnès!
jpnChrName: あっ、ヴァンにアニエスちゃんだ～！
jpnSearchText: あっ、ヴァンにアニエスちゃんだ～！

engChrName: I had the impression this event was just for children. Are you going to be taking part, too?
engSearchText:
I had the impression this event was just for children.
Are you going to be taking part, too?
jpnChrName: あら、子供限定と聞いてたけど もしかして２人も……？
jpnSearchText:
あら、子供限定と聞いてたけど
もしかして２人も……？

engChrName: That's right. I helped them out before when they were holding the event elsewhere.
engSearchText:
That's right. I helped them out before when they
were holding the event elsewhere.
jpnChrName: はい、実は以前“とある一件”で、 イベントに協力させていただきまして。
jpnSearchText:
はい、実は以前“とある一件”で、
イベントに協力させていただきまして。

engChrName: They invited me to come to this event as thanks for that.
engSearchText:
They invited me to come to this event as thanks
for that.
jpnChrName: そのご縁で首都での遊覧飛行にも 招待していただいたんです。
jpnSearchText:
そのご縁で首都での遊覧飛行にも
招待していただいたんです。

engChrName: And she had an extra spot, so that's why I'm here. Not that I'm complainin'. I wanted to check the whole thing out myself.
engSearchText:
And she had an extra spot, so that's why I'm here.
Not that I'm complainin'. I wanted to check the
whole thing out myself.
jpnChrName: ついでに俺も誘ってもらっちまってな。 元々ちょいと興味がありはしたんだが。
jpnSearchText:
ついでに俺も誘ってもらっちまってな。
元々ちょいと興味がありはしたんだが。

engChrName: Heehee. I'm a little jealous you get to join in, to be honest.
engSearchText:
Heehee. I'm a little jealous you get to join in, to
be honest.
jpnChrName: ふふ、よく分からないけどいいわね、 少し羨ましくなっちゃうわ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、よく分からないけどいいわね、
少し羨ましくなっちゃうわ。

engChrName: Would you mind keeping an eye on Yumé?
engSearchText: Would you mind keeping an eye on Yumé?
jpnChrName: せっかくだからユメのこと、 お願いしちゃおうかしら？
jpnSearchText:
せっかくだからユメのこと、
お願いしちゃおうかしら？

engChrName: Yeah, I guess I can keep an eye on her.
engSearchText: Yeah, I guess I can keep an eye on her.
jpnChrName: やれやれ、仕方ねえな。
jpnSearchText: やれやれ、仕方ねえな。

engChrName: We'll have a lot of fun, Yumé!
engSearchText: We'll have a lot of fun, Yumé!
jpnChrName: 一緒に楽しみましょう、ユメちゃん！
jpnSearchText: 一緒に楽しみましょう、ユメちゃん！

engChrName: Yaaay!
engSearchText: Yaaay!
jpnChrName: えへへ、やったー！
jpnSearchText: えへへ、やったー！

engChrName: Excellent. I see you've arrived with your guest, Ms. Claudel.
engSearchText:
Excellent. I see you've arrived with your guest,
Ms. Claudel.
jpnChrName: ふふ、アニエス・クローデル様と お連れのお客様も到着されたようですね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、アニエス・クローデル様と
お連れのお客様も到着されたようですね。

engChrName: We're going to make our way to the airport now, everyone. Stay close behind, and make sure not to get lost!
engSearchText:
We're going to make our way to the airport
now, everyone. Stay close behind, and make sure not
to get lost!
jpnChrName: これから空港に移動します。 はぐれないように注意してくださいね～。
jpnSearchText:
これから空港に移動します。
はぐれないように注意してくださいね～。

engChrName: Okay!
engSearchText: Okay!
jpnChrName: はーい！
jpnSearchText: はーい！

engChrName: Van and Agnès accompanied the children to the airport.
engSearchText:
Van and Agnès accompanied the children to
the airport.
jpnChrName: ヴァン達は子供たちと共に 首都の空港に移動し……
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン達は子供たちと共に
首都の空港に移動し……

engChrName: There, the children were seen off by their parents and guardians as the whole group climbed on board the airship.
engSearchText:
There, the children were seen off by their parents and
guardians as the whole group climbed on board
the airship.
jpnChrName: ポーレットら保護者たちに見送られつつ、 子供たちと共に飛行船に乗り込んだのだった。
jpnSearchText:
ポーレットら保護者たちに見送られつつ、
子供たちと共に飛行船に乗り込んだのだった。

engChrName: Van's group decided to take a short break.
engSearchText: Van's group decided to take a short break.
jpnChrName: ヴァンたちは街の巡回の合間に、 しばしの休憩をとることになり──
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンたちは街の巡回の合間に、
しばしの休憩をとることになり──

engChrName: Everyone split up so they could spend their free time as they pleased.
engSearchText:
Everyone split up so they could spend their free time
as they pleased.
jpnChrName: 一時的に解散して、 それぞれ自由に過ごすのだった。
jpnSearchText:
一時的に解散して、
それぞれ自由に過ごすのだった。

engChrName: I feel kinda small when I'm in this part of Edith. It's sooo big!
engSearchText:
I feel kinda small when I'm in this part of Edith.
It's sooo big!
jpnChrName: うーん、ここに来るとホント、 都会に来たんだな～って感じがします。
jpnSearchText:
うーん、ここに来るとホント、
都会に来たんだな～って感じがします。

engChrName: But why are we here?
engSearchText: But why are we here?
jpnChrName: でもどうしてわたしをここに？
jpnSearchText: でもどうしてわたしをここに？

engChrName: You've been livin' here for a while, but you still don't have everything you need to make yourself comfy here, right?
engSearchText:
You've been livin' here for a while, but you still don't
have everything you need to make yourself comfy
here, right?
jpnChrName: お前、こっちに来てから暫く経つが まだ生活用品とかも揃ってねえだろう？
jpnSearchText:
お前、こっちに来てから暫く経つが
まだ生活用品とかも揃ってねえだろう？

engChrName: I'm your boss, so I figured I should pitch in and help with that.
engSearchText:
I'm your boss, so I figured I should pitch in and help
with that.
jpnChrName: バイトとして預かった以上、 少しはフォローしてやるべきかと思ってな。
jpnSearchText:
バイトとして預かった以上、
少しはフォローしてやるべきかと思ってな。

engChrName: Heehee. Thank you for being so kind!
engSearchText: Heehee. Thank you for being so kind!
jpnChrName: えへへ、心配してくれて ありがとうございます。
jpnSearchText:
えへへ、心配してくれて
ありがとうございます。

engChrName: Agnès helped me buy some bare minimum necessities for my room, but you're right. I'm still missing a lot of stuff.
engSearchText:
Agnès helped me buy some bare minimum necessities
for my room, but you're right. I'm still missing a lot
of stuff.
jpnChrName: アニエスさんに相談に乗ってもらって、 部屋だけは必要最低限整えたんですけど……
jpnSearchText:
アニエスさんに相談に乗ってもらって、
部屋だけは必要最低限整えたんですけど……

engChrName: I still have some mira left for my move, so I'd like to buy some more things.
engSearchText:
I still have some mira left for my move, so I'd like to
buy some more things.
jpnChrName: 一応、準備資金は持ってきてますし、 もう少し設備を充実させたいなと思っていました。
jpnSearchText:
一応、準備資金は持ってきてますし、
もう少し設備を充実させたいなと思っていました。

engChrName: Should do that, then. Last thing I want is your dad yellin' at me for not takin' good care of you.
engSearchText:
Should do that, then. Last thing I want is your dad
yellin' at me for not takin' good care of you.
jpnChrName: ま、少しは面倒見ておかねえと お前の親父さんにどやされちまうからな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、少しは面倒見ておかねえと
お前の親父さんにどやされちまうからな。

engChrName: You should be able to buy just about everything you could want in this part of the city. Let's start with the orbal store first.
engSearchText:
You should be able to buy just about everything you
could want in this part of the city. Let's start with the
orbal store first.
jpnChrName: 大体のモンはこの辺りで揃うはずだ、 まずはオーバルストアを覗いてみるか。
jpnSearchText:
大体のモンはこの辺りで揃うはずだ、
まずはオーバルストアを覗いてみるか。

engChrName: Got it!
engSearchText: Got it!
jpnChrName: 了解（ウーラ）っ。
jpnSearchText: 了解（ウーラ）っ。

engChrName: I've been here before, but it's always overwhelming how many orbments they have!
engSearchText:
I've been here before, but it's always overwhelming
how many orbments they have!
jpnChrName: わぁ～、導力器が沢山ですね……！ いつ来ても圧倒されちゃいますっ。
jpnSearchText:
わぁ～、導力器が沢山ですね……！
いつ来ても圧倒されちゃいますっ。

engChrName: Right about what you'd expect, to be honest, since this is one of the biggest orbal stores in the whole country.
engSearchText:
Right about what you'd expect, to be honest, since
this is one of the biggest orbal stores in the
whole country.
jpnChrName: ま、共和国でもそこそこデカい オーバルストアだからな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、共和国でもそこそこデカい
オーバルストアだからな。

engChrName: You wanna look at household orbments first? You can even try hagglin' the price down a little on the expensive stuff so it's more reasonable.
engSearchText:
You wanna look at household orbments first? You can
even try hagglin' the price down a little on the
expensive stuff so it's more reasonable.
jpnChrName: 最新の家庭用導力器でも見ていくか。 多少高くても上手く値切れれば……
jpnSearchText:
最新の家庭用導力器でも見ていくか。
多少高くても上手く値切れれば……

engChrName: I was actually hoping to look at night-vision goggles for combat in the dark and security cameras.
engSearchText:
I was actually hoping to look at night-vision goggles
for combat in the dark and security cameras.
jpnChrName: いえ、それより監視カメラや 夜戦用の暗視ゴーグルが欲しいです。
jpnSearchText:
いえ、それより監視カメラや
夜戦用の暗視ゴーグルが欲しいです。

engChrName: We need to make upgrading our office's defensive capabilities a top priority so I can keep you and Agnès safe!
engSearchText:
We need to make upgrading our office's defensive
capabilities a top priority so I can keep you and
Agnès safe!
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんやアニエスさんを護るためにも 事務所の防衛設備強化は最優先かとっ。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさんやアニエスさんを護るためにも
事務所の防衛設備強化は最優先かとっ。

engChrName: No, we don't!
engSearchText: No, we don't!
jpnChrName: 要らねえっつうの。
jpnSearchText: 要らねえっつうの。

engChrName: Maybe let's just start easy and look at the Xipha maintenance kits...
engSearchText:
Maybe let's just start easy and look at the Xipha
maintenance kits...
jpnChrName: まあまずはザイファの 整備キットあたりを見てみるか。
jpnSearchText:
まあまずはザイファの
整備キットあたりを見てみるか。

engChrName: That's a lotta stuff you got there.
engSearchText: That's a lotta stuff you got there.
jpnChrName: 随分食材を買いこんでんな？
jpnSearchText: 随分食材を買いこんでんな？

engChrName: Heehee, I guess! I was planning on making some field rations for everyone.
engSearchText:
Heehee, I guess! I was planning on making some field
rations for everyone.
jpnChrName: えへへ、いくつか食材を買って、 携帯糧食（レーション）を作ろうと思ってまして。
jpnSearchText:
えへへ、いくつか食材を買って、
携帯糧食（レーション）を作ろうと思ってまして。

engChrName: Mine are quite popular back home, so I thought they might be useful!
engSearchText:
Mine are quite popular back home, so I thought they
might be useful!
jpnChrName: わたしの作る携帯糧食は美味しいと クルガでは評判だったんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
わたしの作る携帯糧食は美味しいと
クルガでは評判だったんですよ。

engChrName: I mean, I'm not really plannin' to take on any jobs that'll have us livin' out in the jungle for weeks...
engSearchText:
I mean, I'm not really plannin' to take on any jobs
that'll have us livin' out in the jungle for weeks...
jpnChrName: 食事に困るような サバイバルな出張は想定してねぇんだが……
jpnSearchText:
食事に困るような
サバイバルな出張は想定してねぇんだが……

engChrName: ...but I'd be lying if I said I wasn't curious about 'em. What ingredients do you use?
engSearchText:
...but I'd be lying if I said I wasn't curious about 'em.
What ingredients do you use?
jpnChrName: だがちょいと興味はあるな。 ちなみにどんな材料を使うんだ？
jpnSearchText:
だがちょいと興味はあるな。
ちなみにどんな材料を使うんだ？

engChrName: A little bit of everything! Assorted grains, dried fruits, chocolate...
engSearchText:
A little bit of everything! Assorted grains, dried
fruits, chocolate...
jpnChrName: そうですね、雑穀類をはじめ、 ドライフルーツやチョコレートなどを。
jpnSearchText:
そうですね、雑穀類をはじめ、
ドライフルーツやチョコレートなどを。

engChrName: As well as, umm, a few other things you'll enjoy more if you don't know what they are.
engSearchText:
As well as, umm, a few other things you'll enjoy more
if you don't know what they are.
jpnChrName: 後は、うーん……聞かない方が 美味しく食べれそうな物とか、ですかね？
jpnSearchText:
後は、うーん……聞かない方が
美味しく食べれそうな物とか、ですかね？

engChrName: That is NOT reassurin' me in the way you think it does.
engSearchText:
That is NOT reassurin' me in the way you think
it does.
jpnChrName: オイ、何を入れるつもりだ。
jpnSearchText: オイ、何を入れるつもりだ。

engChrName: Heehee. I'll let you try some of the rations when they're done. You can give me your feedback then!
engSearchText:
Heehee. I'll let you try some of the rations when
they're done. You can give me your feedback then!
jpnChrName: えへへ、完成したら 是非食べてみてくださいね！
jpnSearchText:
えへへ、完成したら
是非食べてみてくださいね！

engChrName: I'm not putting anything in my mouth until I know what it is!
engSearchText:
I'm not putting anything in my mouth until I know
what it is!
jpnChrName: 言えっつうの！
jpnSearchText: 言えっつうの！

engChrName: This is the gun shop? I've heard good things about the woman that runs it!
engSearchText:
This is the gun shop? I've heard good things about
the woman that runs it!
jpnChrName: ガンショップ…… 腕利きのガンスミスの方がいる店ですね。
jpnSearchText:
ガンショップ……
腕利きのガンスミスの方がいる店ですね。

engChrName: Yeah. Probably gonna be your favorite spot, considering your rifleblade.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Probably gonna be your favorite spot,
considering your rifleblade.
jpnChrName: お前の得物は突撃銃剣（アサルトソード）だからな。 今後も何かと世話になんだろ。
jpnSearchText:
お前の得物は突撃銃剣（アサルトソード）だからな。
今後も何かと世話になんだろ。

engChrName: (I wonder if the gunsmith here could take a look at it...)
engSearchText:
(I wonder if the gunsmith here could take a look
at it...)
jpnChrName: （ここだったらもしかして……）
jpnSearchText: （ここだったらもしかして……）

engChrName: Thanks for waitin'! There's the set of rifleblade maintenance tools and two cases of ammo you asked for.
engSearchText:
Thanks for waitin'! There's the set of rifleblade
maintenance tools and two cases of ammo you
asked for.
jpnChrName: まいどあり、アサルトライフル用の メンテナンス道具に弾薬を２ケースだよ。
jpnSearchText:
まいどあり、アサルトライフル用の
メンテナンス道具に弾薬を２ケースだよ。

engChrName: Thank you!
engSearchText: Thank you!
jpnChrName: ありがとうございましたっ。
jpnSearchText: ありがとうございましたっ。

engChrName: Yup. Knew you'd go more for combat stuff today.
engSearchText: Yup. Knew you'd go more for combat stuff today.
jpnChrName: やれやれ、結局戦闘関係の 買い物がほとんどだったな。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ、結局戦闘関係の
買い物がほとんどだったな。

engChrName: Of course! It should always be top priority to be stocked up on combat supplies!
engSearchText:
Of course! It should always be top priority to be
stocked up on combat supplies!
jpnChrName: ？　一番大切な買い物ですしっ。
jpnSearchText: ？　一番大切な買い物ですしっ。

engChrName: I... I do have something else I want to ask about.
engSearchText: I... I do have something else I want to ask about.
jpnChrName: ……それとシルヴィさんに 一つ相談があるんですが……
jpnSearchText:
……それとシルヴィさんに
一つ相談があるんですが……

engChrName: Do you repair rifles here?
engSearchText: Do you repair rifles here?
jpnChrName: こちらのお店でライフルの修理などは 請け負ってますか？
jpnSearchText:
こちらのお店でライフルの修理などは
請け負ってますか？

engChrName: Oh...
engSearchText: Oh...
jpnChrName: ……そいつは……
jpnSearchText: ……そいつは……

engChrName: Of course. Why don't you let me have a look at it if you got it with you?
engSearchText:
Of course. Why don't you let me have a look at it if
you got it with you?
jpnChrName: ああ、もちろん請け負ってるぜ。 持ってきてるなら見せてみな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、もちろん請け負ってるぜ。
持ってきてるなら見せてみな。

engChrName: It's this one here.
engSearchText: It's this one here.
jpnChrName: こちらなんですが──
jpnSearchText: こちらなんですが──

engChrName: I had a feelin' that's what this was about.
engSearchText: I had a feelin' that's what this was about.
jpnChrName: もしやと思ったがこいつは……
jpnSearchText: もしやと思ったがこいつは……

engChrName: It's Aida's rifle.
engSearchText: It's Aida's rifle.
jpnChrName: はい── アイーダさんが使っていたライフルです。
jpnSearchText:
はい──
アイーダさんが使っていたライフルです。

engChrName: The Eisenschild ended up entrusting it to me after what happened.
engSearchText:
The Eisenschild ended up entrusting it to me after
what happened.
jpnChrName: あの後、アイゼンシルトの方と話して わたしが預かる事になって……
jpnSearchText:
あの後、アイゼンシルトの方と話して
わたしが預かる事になって……

engChrName: But it's damaged, and pretty badly. She must've pushed it too much.
engSearchText:
But it's damaged, and pretty badly. She must've
pushed it too much.
jpnChrName: でもあの戦いで限界を超えたせいで 壊れてしまったみたいなんです。
jpnSearchText:
でもあの戦いで限界を超えたせいで
壊れてしまったみたいなんです。

engChrName: I'd really like to have it repaired, though.
engSearchText: I'd really like to have it repaired, though.
jpnChrName: なんとか修理をしたいなって 思っていたんですけど……
jpnSearchText:
なんとか修理をしたいなって
思っていたんですけど……

engChrName: I can tell just by lookin' at it that it's owner really knew what they were doin'.
engSearchText:
I can tell just by lookin' at it that it's owner really
knew what they were doin'.
jpnChrName: ……銃を見るだけで分かる。 相当な腕の使い手だったみたいだな。
jpnSearchText:
……銃を見るだけで分かる。
相当な腕の使い手だったみたいだな。

engChrName: It's got some heavy customization. Basically squeezin' it dry of all the power it had, usability be damned.
engSearchText:
It's got some heavy customization. Basically squeezin'
it dry of all the power it had, usability be damned.
jpnChrName: 限りなく実戦向けに調整された、 超玄人向けのカスタマイズ……
jpnSearchText:
限りなく実戦向けに調整された、
超玄人向けのカスタマイズ……

engChrName: But that also means a bunch'a parts here aren't available on the mass market.
engSearchText:
But that also means a bunch'a parts here aren't
available on the mass market.
jpnChrName: ただ──特殊な構造な上に、 市場に出回ってない部品が結構使われているな。
jpnSearchText:
ただ──特殊な構造な上に、
市場に出回ってない部品が結構使われているな。

engChrName: Yeah. Aida mentioned it was a special model she had since before joining the Eisenschild.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Aida mentioned it was a special model she had
since before joining the Eisenschild.
jpnChrName: ……はい、“古巣”時代から 使い込んで来た特別製みたいです。
jpnSearchText:
……はい、“古巣”時代から
使い込んで来た特別製みたいです。

engChrName: I take it that's a nice way of tellin' us it's too much for you to handle?
engSearchText:
I take it that's a nice way of tellin' us it's too much for
you to handle?
jpnChrName: つうことは、 アンタでも難しいのか。
jpnSearchText:
つうことは、
アンタでも難しいのか。

engChrName: Unfortunately, you're right on the money. I hate to disappoint, but I'd rather be upfront about it.
engSearchText:
Unfortunately, you're right on the money. I hate to
disappoint, but I'd rather be upfront about it.
jpnChrName: 悔しい限りだが…… 力不足で済まねえな。
jpnSearchText:
悔しい限りだが……
力不足で済まねえな。

engChrName: Please don't apologize. I'm happy that I got an expert's opinion.
engSearchText:
Please don't apologize. I'm happy that I got an
expert's opinion.
jpnChrName: いえ、専門家の方に 見て頂けただけでも収穫でした。
jpnSearchText:
いえ、専門家の方に
見て頂けただけでも収穫でした。

engChrName: Thank you very much! I'm sure I'll be back again soon!
engSearchText:
Thank you very much! I'm sure I'll be back
again soon!
jpnChrName: 改めて、ありがとうございました。 これからも宜しくお願いしますね！
jpnSearchText:
改めて、ありがとうございました。
これからも宜しくお願いしますね！

engChrName: It's a shame she couldn't do anything to fix it.
engSearchText: It's a shame she couldn't do anything to fix it.
jpnChrName: ライフルの件は残念だったな。
jpnSearchText: ライフルの件は残念だったな。

engChrName: It's okay! I had a feeling this would happen. A jaeger's weapon is their battle partner. It makes sense no one would know it as well as she did.
engSearchText:
It's okay! I had a feeling this would happen. A jaeger's
weapon is their battle partner. It makes sense no one
would know it as well as she did.
jpnChrName: いえ、銃は猟兵が命を賭ける相棒…… 本人でないと修理が難しいのは分かってましたから。
jpnSearchText:
いえ、銃は猟兵が命を賭ける相棒……
本人でないと修理が難しいのは分かってましたから。

engChrName: But I'll keep it in mind anyway. Maybe we can find some other way to fix it.
engSearchText:
But I'll keep it in mind anyway. Maybe we can find
some other way to fix it.
jpnChrName: ……ま、俺の方も方法がないか 頭の片隅で考えとくか。
jpnSearchText:
……ま、俺の方も方法がないか
頭の片隅で考えとくか。

engChrName: I take it you don't know of any other places you could try? Like the corps you're from—oh. Shit.
engSearchText:
I take it you don't know of any other places you
could try? Like the corps you're from—oh. Shit.
jpnChrName: ちなみに、お前の方で頼れそうなツテはねえのか？ 例えば戦士団──は難しいか。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに、お前の方で頼れそうなツテはねえのか？
例えば戦士団──は難しいか。

engChrName: Ahaha... Yeah, I can't go and ask them now that they've disowned me.
engSearchText:
Ahaha... Yeah, I can't go and ask them now that
they've disowned me.
jpnChrName: あはは、知っての通り 勘当中の身の上ですし……
jpnSearchText:
あはは、知っての通り
勘当中の身の上ですし……

engChrName: Besides, Aida was like a big sister to me. I wouldn't like to just pass this duty on to just anyone.
engSearchText:
Besides, Aida was like a big sister to me. I wouldn't
like to just pass this duty on to just anyone.
jpnChrName: なにより“妹分”として、 自分の手でなんとかできたらなって。
jpnSearchText:
なにより“妹分”として、
自分の手でなんとかできたらなって。

engChrName: Makes sense.
engSearchText: Makes sense.
jpnChrName: “妹分”、か。
jpnSearchText: “妹分”、か。

engChrName: (Heard Feri's not the only little sister she left behind. She had someone else back in her old haunt Zephyr, too.)
engSearchText:
(Heard Feri's not the only little sister she left behind.
She had someone else back in her old haunt
Zephyr, too.)
jpnChrName: （火喰鳥の古巣──   《西風》にも妹分がいたそうだが……）
jpnSearchText:
（火喰鳥の古巣──
《西風》にも妹分がいたそうだが……）

engChrName: Well, thanks for coming around with me today!
engSearchText: Well, thanks for coming around with me today!
jpnChrName: えへへ、とにかくヴァンさん、 色々ありがとうございました。
jpnSearchText:
えへへ、とにかくヴァンさん、
色々ありがとうございました。

engChrName: I'll do my best to pull my weight around now that I'm working for you!
engSearchText:
I'll do my best to pull my weight around now that I'm
working for you!
jpnChrName: 改めてお世話になりますっ……！ 戦士の力、存分に振るわせてくださいね！
jpnSearchText:
改めてお世話になりますっ……！
戦士の力、存分に振るわせてくださいね！

engChrName: Haha, just don't work yourself too hard, kiddo.
engSearchText: Haha, just don't work yourself too hard, kiddo.
jpnChrName: ああ、こっちこそよろしく頼むぜ。 戦士の力のほうはほどほどにな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、こっちこそよろしく頼むぜ。
戦士の力のほうはほどほどにな。

engChrName: With their shopping (and their break time) over, the two of them returned to work.
engSearchText:
With their shopping (and their break time) over,
the two of them returned to work.
jpnChrName: こうしてヴァンとフェリは買い物を終え、 休憩時間を終えて、解決業務に戻ったのだった。
jpnSearchText:
こうしてヴァンとフェリは買い物を終え、
休憩時間を終えて、解決業務に戻ったのだった。

engChrName: Thanks for all your hard work, Risette.
engSearchText: Thanks for all your hard work, Risette.
jpnChrName: お疲れさんだったな、リゼット。
jpnSearchText: お疲れさんだったな、リゼット。

engChrName: You got through all that desk work that was piling up like it was nothin'.
engSearchText:
You got through all that desk work that was piling up
like it was nothin'.
jpnChrName: お前のおかげで、溜め込んでた事務作業が 一気に片付いちまったぜ。
jpnSearchText:
お前のおかげで、溜め込んでた事務作業が
一気に片付いちまったぜ。

engChrName: I feel kinda bad for forcin' you to do all the tedious jobs, though.
engSearchText:
I feel kinda bad for forcin' you to do all the tedious
jobs, though.
jpnChrName: 面倒事をまとめて押し付けちまって悪いな。
jpnSearchText: 面倒事をまとめて押し付けちまって悪いな。

engChrName: Please think nothing of it. I'm always happy to be of service.
engSearchText:
Please think nothing of it. I'm always happy to be
of service.
jpnChrName: いえ、出向ＳＣとして お役に立てているなら光栄です。
jpnSearchText:
いえ、出向ＳＣとして
お役に立てているなら光栄です。

engChrName: I'm nothing if not pleased to have been able to be of assistance in your office.
engSearchText:
I'm nothing if not pleased to have been able to be of
assistance in your office.
jpnChrName: それに──ヴァン様の事務所に 出向できたことは好ましいことです。
jpnSearchText:
それに──ヴァン様の事務所に
出向できたことは好ましいことです。

engChrName: We'd never been able to interact through anything other than a screen beforehand...
engSearchText:
We'd never been able to interact through anything
other than a screen beforehand...
jpnChrName: モニター越しでしか 接する機会のなかったヴァン様と……
jpnSearchText:
モニター越しでしか
接する機会のなかったヴァン様と……

engChrName: ...but now I get to go out shopping and have a nice chat with you physically here.
engSearchText:
...but now I get to go out shopping and have a nice
chat with you physically here.
jpnChrName: こうしてお買い物をして、 お話しすることができた事も。
jpnSearchText:
こうしてお買い物をして、
お話しすることができた事も。

engChrName: Weird way of puttin' it, but I see where you're comin' from.
engSearchText:
Weird way of puttin' it, but I see where you're
comin' from.
jpnChrName: ハッ、そいつは相当な物好きなこった。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、そいつは相当な物好きなこった。

engChrName: Here is the coffee that you ordered.
engSearchText: Here is the coffee that you ordered.
jpnChrName: お待たせしました、 ブレンドコーヒーになります。
jpnSearchText:
お待たせしました、
ブレンドコーヒーになります。

engChrName: Oh, speaking of orders...
engSearchText: Oh, speaking of orders...
jpnChrName: ふふ、そういえば……
jpnSearchText: ふふ、そういえば……

engChrName: I wasn't aware prior to me coming here and accompanying you on your travels just how bad your sweet tooth is.
engSearchText:
I wasn't aware prior to me coming here and
accompanying you on your travels just how bad your
sweet tooth is.
jpnChrName: ヴァン様がスイーツ好きで大の甘党という事も 出向して初めて知りましたね。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン様がスイーツ好きで大の甘党という事も
出向して初めて知りましたね。

engChrName: Just wanna make it clear that sweets aren't the ONLY reason we've been goin' on so many business trips lately.
engSearchText:
Just wanna make it clear that sweets aren't the ONLY
reason we've been goin' on so many business
trips lately.
jpnChrName: 言っとくが別にスイーツのために あちこち出張してるワケじゃねえからな？
jpnSearchText:
言っとくが別にスイーツのために
あちこち出張してるワケじゃねえからな？

engChrName: More of a bonus, yeah? It'd be rude goin' somewhere and not sampling the local confectionery.
engSearchText:
More of a bonus, yeah? It'd be rude goin' somewhere
and not sampling the local confectionery.
jpnChrName: だがせっかくの旅だ、地元の名菓を 味わうのはむしろ礼儀でだな……
jpnSearchText:
だがせっかくの旅だ、地元の名菓を
味わうのはむしろ礼儀でだな……

engChrName: Heehee, if you say so.
engSearchText: Heehee, if you say so.
jpnChrName: ふふ、かしこまりました。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、かしこまりました。

engChrName: Aaand you totally didn't buy that. *sigh* Whatever. Let's drink.
engSearchText:
Aaand you totally didn't buy that. *sigh* Whatever.
Let's drink.
jpnChrName: 軽くあしらわれている気がすんだが…… まあいい、早速頂くとするかね。
jpnSearchText:
軽くあしらわれている気がすんだが……
まあいい、早速頂くとするかね。

engChrName: ...Hmm?
engSearchText: ...Hmm?
jpnChrName: あら……？
jpnSearchText: あら……？

engChrName: This is rather hotter than I was expecting.
engSearchText: This is rather hotter than I was expecting.
jpnChrName: 思っていたよりも熱いですね。
jpnSearchText: 思っていたよりも熱いですね。

engChrName: Holy shit!
engSearchText: Holy shit!
jpnChrName: 熱ッ！？

engChrName: This is WAY too hot! Did a rookie screw up or somethin'?
engSearchText:
This is WAY too hot! Did a rookie screw up
or somethin'?
jpnChrName: オイオイ、少しってレベルじゃねえぞ…… 新人あたりがやらかしたのか？
jpnSearchText:
オイオイ、少しってレベルじゃねえぞ……
新人あたりがやらかしたのか？

engChrName: Though yours doesn't look as hot as mine...
engSearchText: Though yours doesn't look as hot as mine...
jpnChrName: お前の方は俺ほど 熱い訳じゃねえみたいだが……
jpnSearchText:
お前の方は俺ほど
熱い訳じゃねえみたいだが……

engChrName: We can't be so sure of that. Our difference in reaction should not be how you gauge it. I handle hot things better than most do.
engSearchText:
We can't be so sure of that. Our difference in reaction
should not be how you gauge it. I handle hot things
better than most do.
jpnChrName: ……どうでしょう、 わたくしは熱いものは得意な方ですから。
jpnSearchText:
……どうでしょう、
わたくしは熱いものは得意な方ですから。

engChrName: I still think it would be wise to get some milk to cool it down, though.
engSearchText:
I still think it would be wise to get some milk to cool
it down, though.
jpnChrName: とはいえ、ミルクなどを頂いて 少し冷ました方がいいかもしれませんね。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ、ミルクなどを頂いて
少し冷ました方がいいかもしれませんね。

engChrName: Excuse me!
engSearchText: Excuse me!
jpnChrName: ……すみません、注文よろしいですか？
jpnSearchText: ……すみません、注文よろしいですか？

engChrName: They called a member of staff over and explained the situation.
engSearchText:
They called a member of staff over and explained
the situation.
jpnChrName: その後、店員を呼んだヴァン達は──
jpnSearchText: <C1>その後、店員を呼んだヴァン達は──

engChrName: The staff member apologized profusely for the issue and added some milk as requested to cool the drinks down.
engSearchText:
The staff member apologized profusely for the issue
and added some milk as requested to cool the
drinks down.
jpnChrName: 店員に謝罪をされつつ、ミルクを足して 飲みやすい温度に調整してもらったのだった。
jpnSearchText:
店員に謝罪をされつつ、ミルクを足して
飲みやすい温度に調整してもらったのだった。

engChrName: We truly are sorry for the issue with your coffee!
engSearchText: We truly are sorry for the issue with your coffee!
jpnChrName: コーヒーの件は誠に申し訳ありませんでした……！
jpnSearchText: コーヒーの件は誠に申し訳ありませんでした……！

engChrName: Here are the pancakes you ordered as well.
engSearchText: Here are the pancakes you ordered as well.
jpnChrName: 加えて、こちらがご注文の パンケーキになります。
jpnSearchText:
加えて、こちらがご注文の
パンケーキになります。

engChrName: Oh? I don't recall ordering any pancakes.
engSearchText: Oh? I don't recall ordering any pancakes.
jpnChrName: あら……？ わたくしは注文をしていませんが。
jpnSearchText:
あら……？
わたくしは注文をしていませんが。

engChrName: Was it you who ordered them, Mr. Arkride? If so, let me hand you the plate.
engSearchText:
Was it you who ordered them, Mr. Arkride? If so, let
me hand you the plate.
jpnChrName: ヴァン様が注文されたのでしょうか。 でしたら、お皿をそちらに……
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン様が注文されたのでしょうか。
でしたら、お皿をそちらに……

engChrName: Nope. It's right where it needs to be.
engSearchText: Nope. It's right where it needs to be.
jpnChrName: いや、そっちで合ってるぜ。
jpnSearchText: いや、そっちで合ってるぜ。

engChrName: Just think of 'em as a little bonus.
engSearchText: Just think of 'em as a little bonus.
jpnChrName: ソイツはまあ…… お前さんへのちょっとしたボーナスみてえなもんだ。
jpnSearchText:
ソイツはまあ……
お前さんへのちょっとしたボーナスみてえなもんだ。

engChrName: A small thanks for all you've done for us, even in such a short time.
engSearchText:
A small thanks for all you've done for us, even in such
a short time.
jpnChrName: 事務所に来て間もないってのに 色々と世話になっちまってるからな。
jpnSearchText:
事務所に来て間もないってのに
色々と世話になっちまってるからな。

engChrName: There's more to life than just work. You should at least find the time to enjoy somethin' sweet once in a while.
engSearchText:
There's more to life than just work. You should at
least find the time to enjoy somethin' sweet once in
a while.
jpnChrName: だがお前さんも年頃の娘だ、休憩時間に スイーツを楽しむくらいいいんじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
だがお前さんも年頃の娘だ、休憩時間に
スイーツを楽しむくらいいいんじゃねえか？

engChrName: Heehee. Thank you very much.
engSearchText: Heehee. Thank you very much.
jpnChrName: ふふっ……ありがとうございます。
jpnSearchText: ふふっ……ありがとうございます。

engChrName: I wasn't expecting to get such a pleasant bonus so soon after starting work. I can see this is a workplace that values its employees after all.
engSearchText:
I wasn't expecting to get such a pleasant bonus so
soon after starting work. I can see this is a workplace
that values its employees after all.
jpnChrName: 早々にこんなボーナスを頂けるだなんて、 ホワイトな職場ですね。
jpnSearchText:
早々にこんなボーナスを頂けるだなんて、
ホワイトな職場ですね。

engChrName: Doubt we can compare to whatever crazy welfare program Marduk has, but we try.
engSearchText:
Doubt we can compare to whatever crazy welfare
program Marduk has, but we try.
jpnChrName: ま、福利厚生がしっかりしてそうな マルドゥックとは比べ物にならないだろうが。
jpnSearchText:
ま、福利厚生がしっかりしてそうな
マルドゥックとは比べ物にならないだろうが。

engChrName: It's good to have you on the team, Risette.
engSearchText: It's good to have you on the team, Risette.
jpnChrName: 改めて今後とも よろしく頼むぜ、担当ＳＣさんよ。
jpnSearchText:
改めて今後とも
よろしく頼むぜ、担当ＳＣさんよ。

engChrName: And it is likewise my pleasure being part of the team, Mr. Arkride.
engSearchText:
And it is likewise my pleasure being part of the team,
Mr. Arkride.
jpnChrName: ええ、わたくしの方こそ よろしくお願い致します、ヴァン様。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、わたくしの方こそ
よろしくお願い致します、ヴァン様。

engChrName: Though it'd feel awfully rude to sit and enjoy this plate of pancakes while you just sit and watch. You're the one with the sweet tooth, after all.
engSearchText:
Though it'd feel awfully rude to sit and enjoy this
plate of pancakes while you just sit and watch.
You're the one with the sweet tooth, after all.
jpnChrName: ……ですが、甘味好きのヴァン様の前で わたくし一人頂くのも恐縮ですし。
jpnSearchText:
……ですが、甘味好きのヴァン様の前で
わたくし一人頂くのも恐縮ですし。

engChrName: Why don't you have some, too?
engSearchText: Why don't you have some, too?
jpnChrName: ヴァン様も召し上がってはいかがですか？
jpnSearchText: ヴァン様も召し上がってはいかがですか？

engChrName: I...am kinda regretting not orderin' any for myself, yeah.
engSearchText:
I...am kinda regretting not orderin' any for
myself, yeah.
jpnChrName: ……そうなんだよなぁ、いざ目の前で 楽しんでるのを見せられると思うと。
jpnSearchText:
……そうなんだよなぁ、いざ目の前で
楽しんでるのを見せられると思うと。

engChrName: All right. If you're sure, I wouldn't mind a few.
engSearchText: All right. If you're sure, I wouldn't mind a few.
jpnChrName: ──悪い、俺にも パンケーキを貰えるか？
jpnSearchText:
──悪い、俺にも
パンケーキを貰えるか？

engChrName: Van and Risette enjoyed the remainder of their time together before resuming their patrol.
engSearchText:
Van and Risette enjoyed the remainder of their time
together before resuming their patrol.
jpnChrName: こうしてヴァンとリゼットは束の間の休息を 楽しんでから解決業務に戻ったのだった。
jpnSearchText:
こうしてヴァンとリゼットは束の間の休息を
楽しんでから解決業務に戻ったのだった。

engChrName: Van's group decided to take a short break.
engSearchText: Van's group decided to take a short break.
jpnChrName: ヴァンたちは街の巡回の合間に、 しばしの休憩をとることになり──
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンたちは街の巡回の合間に、
しばしの休憩をとることになり──

engChrName: Everyone split up so they could spend their free time as they pleased.
engSearchText:
Everyone split up so they could spend their free time
as they pleased.
jpnChrName: 一時的に解散して、 それぞれ自由に過ごすのだった。
jpnSearchText:
一時的に解散して、
それぞれ自由に過ごすのだった。

engChrName: Report: Your purchases fit perfectly within your budget.
engSearchText:
Report: Your purchases fit perfectly within
your budget.
jpnChrName: 報告──無事予算内ニ収マッタ。
jpnSearchText: 報告──無事予算内ニ収マッタ。

engChrName: Perfect.
engSearchText: Perfect.
jpnChrName: そりゃ重畳だ。
jpnSearchText: そりゃ重畳だ。

engChrName: Man, havin' an expert on board really comes in handy when you're out shopping. Thanks, man. We got some nice deals on high quality equipment there.
engSearchText:
Man, havin' an expert on board really comes in handy
when you're out shopping. Thanks, man. We got
some nice deals on high quality equipment there.
jpnChrName: やっぱ専門家の意見があると違うねぇ。 お安く良いパーツを揃えられたし。
jpnSearchText:
やっぱ専門家の意見があると違うねぇ。
お安く良いパーツを揃えられたし。

engChrName: Don't mention it. As long as I'm working out of your office, the stability of its orbal network access is really important to me. I was happy to help.
engSearchText:
Don't mention it. As long as I'm working out of your
office, the stability of its orbal network access is really
important to me. I was happy to help.
jpnChrName: 導力ネット環境は 事務所に来た以上他人事じゃないからね。
jpnSearchText:
導力ネット環境は
事務所に来た以上他人事じゃないからね。

engChrName: If anything, I was surprised by how accommodating you were to everything I asked for.
engSearchText:
If anything, I was surprised by how accommodating
you were to everything I asked for.
jpnChrName: むしろ、結構僕の要望に合わせちゃった所も 多いけど、そこは大丈夫だったのかな？
jpnSearchText:
むしろ、結構僕の要望に合わせちゃった所も
多いけど、そこは大丈夫だったのかな？

engChrName: Well, Risette's the software specialist, you're the hardware specialist.
engSearchText:
Well, Risette's the software specialist, you're the
hardware specialist.
jpnChrName: ソフト的な部分はリゼットに任せてるからな。 ハード的な部分はお前ってわけだ。
jpnSearchText:
ソフト的な部分はリゼットに任せてるからな。
ハード的な部分はお前ってわけだ。

engChrName: I obviously don't have bottomless pockets so I can't accommodate for everything, but I trust your judgment on this.
engSearchText:
I obviously don't have bottomless pockets so I can't
accommodate for everything, but I trust your
judgment on this.
jpnChrName: ミラ事情もあるから 何でもかんでも買えるわけじゃないがな。
jpnSearchText:
ミラ事情もあるから
何でもかんでも買えるわけじゃないがな。

engChrName: What's up?
engSearchText: What's up?
jpnChrName: どうした？
jpnSearchText: どうした？

engChrName: It's just...you're much different than would be expected from someone running a shady business like yours.
engSearchText:
It's just...you're much different than would be
expected from someone running a shady business
like yours.
jpnChrName: いや……裏稼業なのに つくづく変わってると思ってさ。
jpnSearchText:
いや……裏稼業なのに
つくづく変わってると思ってさ。

engChrName: You barely know me. Taking that into account, I wouldn't expect you to extend such freedom and trust to me.
engSearchText:
You barely know me. Taking that into account, I
wouldn't expect you to extend such freedom and trust
to me.
jpnChrName: まだまだ付き合いの浅い僕に、 普通そこまで委ねないんじゃない？
jpnSearchText:
まだまだ付き合いの浅い僕に、
普通そこまで委ねないんじゃない？

engChrName: Hey, you're the expert here. I'm not gonna butt in when I'm aware you know better than I do.
engSearchText:
Hey, you're the expert here. I'm not gonna butt in
when I'm aware you know better than I do.
jpnChrName: せっかく使える手があるんだ、 使わない手はないだろ？
jpnSearchText:
せっかく使える手があるんだ、
使わない手はないだろ？

engChrName: Arkride Solutions keeps growin' and growin'. Y'all have your unique skills, and I'm not about to go wastin' them.
engSearchText:
Arkride Solutions keeps growin' and growin'.
Y'all have your unique skills, and I'm not about to go
wastin' them.
jpnChrName: お前も含めて、解決事務所も それなりに大所帯になってきたしな。
jpnSearchText:
お前も含めて、解決事務所も
それなりに大所帯になってきたしな。

engChrName: So why not take advantage of my employees' knowledge, then?
engSearchText:
So why not take advantage of my employees'
knowledge, then?
jpnChrName: 各々の個性やら特技やらは惜しみなく 活かすのが合理的ってモンだろうさ。
jpnSearchText:
各々の個性やら特技やらは惜しみなく
活かすのが合理的ってモンだろうさ。

engChrName: I'm...inclined to agree, when you put it that way.
engSearchText: I'm...inclined to agree, when you put it that way.
jpnChrName: なるほど…… 個性も合理的に活かす、か。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど……
個性も合理的に活かす、か。

engChrName: 'Kay, then. Let's haul this stuff back to the office. Trust you can handle the installation?
engSearchText:
'Kay, then. Let's haul this stuff back to the office.
Trust you can handle the installation?
jpnChrName: さ、そろそろ帰るか。 この調子で工事も任せたぜ。
jpnSearchText:
さ、そろそろ帰るか。
この調子で工事も任せたぜ。

engChrName: Of course—
engSearchText: Of course—
jpnChrName: うん、それは勿論──
jpnSearchText: うん、それは勿論──

engChrName: Orbal abnormality detected in the vicinity.
engSearchText: Orbal abnormality detected in the vicinity.
jpnChrName: 近辺デ導力反応ノ異常ヲ感知。
jpnSearchText: 近辺デ導力反応ノ異常ヲ感知。

engChrName: Uhh...
engSearchText: Uhh...
jpnChrName: あん……？
jpnSearchText: あん……？

engChrName: I wonder if something happened?
engSearchText: I wonder if something happened?
jpnChrName: 何かあったのかな？
jpnSearchText: 何かあったのかな？

engChrName: The big screen's gone off.
engSearchText: The big screen's gone off.
jpnChrName: 街頭ビジョンが止まってやがるな。
jpnSearchText: 街頭ビジョンが止まってやがるな。

engChrName: I wonder if it's lost power? ...No, there's some digital noise still present, so it can't be that. It must be a hardware failure.
engSearchText:
I wonder if it's lost power? ...No, there's some digital
noise still present, so it can't be that. It must be a
hardware failure.
jpnChrName: 導力切れ──いや、変なノイズが出てる。 ハード関係のトラブルみたいだな。
jpnSearchText:
導力切れ──いや、変なノイズが出てる。
ハード関係のトラブルみたいだな。

engChrName: I'm going to go and speak to the person in charge.
engSearchText: I'm going to go and speak to the person in charge.
jpnChrName: 担当者に話を聞いてみよう。
jpnSearchText: 担当者に話を聞いてみよう。

engChrName: Understood.
engSearchText: Understood.
jpnChrName: リョウカイ。
jpnSearchText: リョウカイ。

engChrName: Hold up!
engSearchText: Hold up!
jpnChrName: あ、おい……！
jpnSearchText: あ、おい……！

engChrName: Quatre went to speak to the store's owner—who was just as perplexed and agreed to let him handle repairing the screen.
engSearchText:
Quatre went to speak to the store's owner—who was
just as perplexed and agreed to let him handle
repairing the screen.
