jpnChrName: カトルは困っている様子のオーナーに声をかけ…… モニターの修理を引き受ける事にした。
jpnSearchText:
カトルは困っている様子のオーナーに声をかけ……
モニターの修理を引き受ける事にした。

engChrName: FIO, I need a full scan of the building's structure and wiring.
engSearchText:
FIO, I need a full scan of the building's structure
and wiring.
jpnChrName: ＦＩＯ、施設内の構造と配線のサーチを。
jpnSearchText: ＦＩＯ、施設内の構造と配線のサーチを。

engChrName: XEROS, I need you to sniff out any signs of orbal leaks and burn-in.
engSearchText:
XEROS, I need you to sniff out any signs of orbal
leaks and burn-in.
jpnChrName: ＸＥＲＯＳは導力漏れや焼き付きが無いかを “嗅ぎ分けて”調べるんだ。
jpnSearchText:
ＸＥＲＯＳは導力漏れや焼き付きが無いかを
“嗅ぎ分けて”調べるんだ。

engChrName: Understood. Commencing scan.
engSearchText: Understood. Commencing scan.
jpnChrName: リョウカイ、スキャン開始。
jpnSearchText: リョウカイ、スキャン開始。

engChrName: RUFF!
engSearchText: RUFF!
jpnChrName: ＢＯＷ！
jpnSearchText: ＢＯＷ！

engChrName: Wh-What are those things?!
engSearchText: Wh-What are those things?!
jpnChrName: おお……この機械たちは一体……！？
jpnSearchText: おお……この機械たちは一体……！？

engChrName: *sigh* You really couldn't stop yourself from buttin' in on this one, could you?
engSearchText:
*sigh* You really couldn't stop yourself from buttin' in
on this one, could you?
jpnChrName: ……ったく、 面倒事に首突っ込んでんじゃねえよ。
jpnSearchText:
……ったく、
面倒事に首突っ込んでんじゃねえよ。

engChrName: Excuse me? 'Butting in'? This is about someone who clearly needs assistance. Someone I can help.
engSearchText:
Excuse me? 'Butting in'? This is about someone who
clearly needs assistance. Someone I can help.
jpnChrName: 面倒事……？ 困っている人がいるんだよ？
jpnSearchText:
面倒事……？
困っている人がいるんだよ？

engChrName: Gran's always said that the ultimate goal of technology and science should be helping people.
engSearchText:
Gran's always said that the ultimate goal of
technology and science should be helping people.
jpnChrName: 博士（グランマ）はよく言っていた…… 科学や技術は人のために使うものだって。
jpnSearchText:
博士（グランマ）はよく言っていた……
科学や技術は人のために使うものだって。

engChrName: So if I have the ability to be of assistance, then I will do everything in my power to help them.
engSearchText:
So if I have the ability to be of assistance, then I will
do everything in my power to help them.
jpnChrName: 役立てるにしても、力は出し惜しまないで できる時にできる事をやらないと。
jpnSearchText:
役立てるにしても、力は出し惜しまないで
できる時にできる事をやらないと。

engChrName: Guess no one's gonna fault Professor Hamilton for dreamin' big.
engSearchText:
Guess no one's gonna fault Professor Hamilton for
dreamin' big.
jpnChrName: ハミルトン博士の教えか…… 大層なお人なのは認めるが。
jpnSearchText:
ハミルトン博士の教えか……
大層なお人なのは認めるが。

engChrName: But you gotta cool it. You ain't one of the three disciples. Those're some big, BIG shoes you're not gonna be able to fill.
engSearchText:
But you gotta cool it. You ain't one of the
three disciples. Those're some big, BIG shoes you're
not gonna be able to fill.
jpnChrName: 三高弟ならまだしも 人一人にできることなんざ高が知れてる。
jpnSearchText:
三高弟ならまだしも
人一人にできることなんざ高が知れてる。

engChrName: There ain't enough hours in the day to solve every problem you come across.
engSearchText:
There ain't enough hours in the day to solve every
problem you come across.
jpnChrName: 全部掬い上げてたらキリがねえぞ？
jpnSearchText: 全部掬い上げてたらキリがねえぞ？

engChrName: ...So that's one of your principles as a spriggan, is it?
engSearchText: ...So that's one of your principles as a spriggan, is it?
jpnChrName: ……それが裏解決屋の流儀ってわけ？
jpnSearchText: ……それが裏解決屋の流儀ってわけ？

engChrName: Not a principle. Call it life experience.
engSearchText: Not a principle. Call it life experience.
jpnChrName: 流儀とまでは言わないが教訓ではあるな。
jpnSearchText: 流儀とまでは言わないが教訓ではあるな。

engChrName: Analysis complete, Quatre. Sending data.
engSearchText: Analysis complete, Quatre. Sending data.
jpnChrName: カトル、ポイントノ解析終ワッタ。 データ送信スル。
jpnSearchText:
カトル、ポイントノ解析終ワッタ。
データ送信スル。

engChrName: GRR... RUFF!
engSearchText: GRR... RUFF!
jpnChrName: ＧＲＲＲＲ……ＢＯＷ！
jpnSearchText: ＧＲＲＲＲ……ＢＯＷ！

engChrName: Thanks, you two.
engSearchText: Thanks, you two.
jpnChrName: ありがとう、ＦＩＯにＸＥＲＯＳ。
jpnSearchText: ありがとう、ＦＩＯにＸＥＲＯＳ。

engChrName: If you're so pressed for time, Van, then you're more than free to leave. I can handle the rest myself.
engSearchText:
If you're so pressed for time, Van, then you're more
than free to leave. I can handle the rest myself.
jpnChrName: ……ヴァンさんは先に帰っていいよ。 あとはこっちで何とかするから。
jpnSearchText:
……ヴァンさんは先に帰っていいよ。
あとはこっちで何とかするから。

engChrName: *sigh* Teenagers...
engSearchText: *sigh* Teenagers...
jpnChrName: 年頃ってのは難しいねぇ。
jpnSearchText: 年頃ってのは難しいねぇ。

engChrName: Quatre, FIO, and XEROS set about investigating the cause of the malfunction.
engSearchText:
Quatre, FIO, and XEROS set about investigating the
cause of the malfunction.
jpnChrName: カトルはＦＩＯとＸＥＲＯＳと共に モニターの不調の原因を調査し……
jpnSearchText:
カトルはＦＩＯとＸＥＲＯＳと共に
モニターの不調の原因を調査し……

engChrName: They searched top to bottom and floor to wall to find the supposed faulty wiring.
engSearchText:
They searched top to bottom and floor to wall to find
the supposed faulty wiring.
jpnChrName: 壁の中や床下の配線なども含めて 入念にサーチしていった。
jpnSearchText:
壁の中や床下の配線なども含めて
入念にサーチしていった。

engChrName: Welp, I'm at a loss.
engSearchText: Welp, I'm at a loss.
jpnChrName: ど、どうでしょうか……
jpnSearchText: ど、どうでしょうか……

engChrName: This is more difficult than I anticipated...
engSearchText: This is more difficult than I anticipated...
jpnChrName: これは……思った以上に 難しい問題かもしれません。
jpnSearchText:
これは……思った以上に
難しい問題かもしれません。

engChrName: I was so certain this was a case of cable thermal degradation.
engSearchText:
I was so certain this was a case of cable
thermal degradation.
jpnChrName: 導力ケーブルの劣化と熱変形が原因だろうけど、 肝心の原因箇所が何故かサーチできない……
jpnSearchText:
導力ケーブルの劣化と熱変形が原因だろうけど、
肝心の原因箇所が何故かサーチできない……

engChrName: Was I wrong? Is the cause something else...?
engSearchText: Was I wrong? Is the cause something else...?
jpnChrName: やっぱり他の原因が？　でも……
jpnSearchText: やっぱり他の原因が？　でも……

engChrName: You're overthinkin' this, bud.
engSearchText: You're overthinkin' this, bud.
jpnChrName: ──いや、難しく考えすぎじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText: ──いや、難しく考えすぎじゃねえか？

engChrName: ...If you don't intend to offer any actionable solutions, then kindly shut it.
engSearchText:
...If you don't intend to offer any actionable solutions,
then kindly shut it.
jpnChrName: ……何か用？
jpnSearchText: ……何か用？

engChrName: Damn. Aren't we snippy?
engSearchText: Damn. Aren't we snippy?
jpnChrName: そうツンケンするなって。
jpnSearchText: そうツンケンするなって。

engChrName: Fine, I'll help. FIO's scanner is shard-based, yeah?
engSearchText: Fine, I'll help. FIO's scanner is shard-based, yeah?
jpnChrName: ＦＩＯのサーチ機能なんだが、 最新のシャードサーチを使ってるよな。
jpnSearchText:
ＦＩＯのサーチ機能なんだが、
最新のシャードサーチを使ってるよな。

engChrName: Tell 'em to do an ultrasound and infrared scan of the area.
engSearchText:
Tell 'em to do an ultrasound and infrared scan of
the area.
jpnChrName: 旧式の音波と熱源の探知も併用してみねえか？
jpnSearchText: 旧式の音波と熱源の探知も併用してみねえか？

engChrName: What? Why?
engSearchText: What? Why?
jpnChrName: へ？　で、でもどうして……
jpnSearchText: へ？　で、でもどうして……

engChrName: Just give it a try. If I'm right, problem solved. If I'm wrong, you get to launch a snark attack. It's a win-win.
engSearchText:
Just give it a try. If I'm right, problem solved. If I'm
wrong, you get to launch a snark attack. It's
a win-win.
jpnChrName: いいからいいから、 騙されたと思ってやってみな。
jpnSearchText:
いいからいいから、
騙されたと思ってやってみな。

engChrName: The source of the problem has been identified.
engSearchText: The source of the problem has been identified.
jpnChrName: 原因箇所ヲハッケン。
jpnSearchText: 原因箇所ヲハッケン。

engChrName: A-Are you for real?!
engSearchText: A-Are you for real?!
jpnChrName: ほ、本当！？
jpnSearchText: ほ、本当！？

engChrName: Shard search function comin' in clutch.
engSearchText: Shard search function comin' in clutch.
jpnChrName: シャードでのサーチは高性能だが まだまだ開発中の機能でもある。
jpnSearchText:
シャードでのサーチは高性能だが
まだまだ開発中の機能でもある。

engChrName: Tech's still in its infancy, though. There've been a few cases where it couldn't detect a degraded circuit.
engSearchText:
Tech's still in its infancy, though. There've been a few
cases where it couldn't detect a degraded circuit.
jpnChrName: 極まれに一部の劣化した結晶回路なんかに 反応しないことがあるらしくてな。
jpnSearchText:
極まれに一部の劣化した結晶回路なんかに
反応しないことがあるらしくてな。

engChrName: That came up during one of Marduk's tests a while back, but it looks like luck's on our side today.
engSearchText:
That came up during one of Marduk's tests a while
back, but it looks like luck's on our side today.
jpnChrName: 昔マルドゥックのテストに参加した時に、 似たような話を聞いたのが役に立ったか。
jpnSearchText:
昔マルドゥックのテストに参加した時に、
似たような話を聞いたのが役に立ったか。

engChrName: You got any replacement parts for 'em?
engSearchText: You got any replacement parts for 'em?
jpnChrName: ほれ、あとは互換性のあるパーツを 見繕ってくれや。
jpnSearchText:
ほれ、あとは互換性のあるパーツを
見繕ってくれや。

engChrName: ...FIO.
engSearchText: ...FIO.
jpnChrName: ……ＦＩＯ。
jpnSearchText: ……ＦＩＯ。

engChrName: Commencing search for compatible components.
engSearchText: Commencing search for compatible components.
jpnChrName: 互換パーツノ検索ヲ開始──
jpnSearchText: 互換パーツノ検索ヲ開始──

engChrName: The screen was successfully repaired, and Station Street was restored to its usual lively form.
engSearchText:
The screen was successfully repaired, and Station
Street was restored to its usual lively form.
jpnChrName: こうして、無事に街頭ビジョンは復旧し、 駅前通りは普段通りの姿を取り戻したのだった。
jpnSearchText:
こうして、無事に街頭ビジョンは復旧し、
駅前通りは普段通りの姿を取り戻したのだった。

engChrName: *sigh* We literally can't catch a break. Finally get some free time—and then work gobbles it up.
engSearchText:
*sigh* We literally can't catch a break. Finally get
some free time—and then work gobbles it up.
jpnChrName: やれやれ、せっかくの休憩時間に 余計な仕事をしちまったぜ。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ、せっかくの休憩時間に
余計な仕事をしちまったぜ。

engChrName: My prior assessment was on point, it seems. You really are a strange person.
engSearchText:
My prior assessment was on point, it seems.
You really are a strange person.
jpnChrName: ……ヴァンさん、やっぱり変わってるよね。
jpnSearchText: ……ヴァンさん、やっぱり変わってるよね。

engChrName: One second you're heckling from the sidelines, the next you're giving me a hand.
engSearchText:
One second you're heckling from the sidelines, the
next you're giving me a hand.
jpnChrName: あんなことを言っていたのに 結局最後は手伝ってくれるなんて。
jpnSearchText:
あんなことを言っていたのに
結局最後は手伝ってくれるなんて。

engChrName: Any boss worth their salt helps their employees when they're in a bind. What I did wasn't out of the ordinary.
engSearchText:
Any boss worth their salt helps their employees when
they're in a bind. What I did wasn't out of
the ordinary.
jpnChrName: あくまでも裏解決屋の助手を サポートする範疇だ。
jpnSearchText:
あくまでも裏解決屋の助手を
サポートする範疇だ。

engChrName: Plus we gotta set up the stuff we bought, so the sooner I can get you back, the better.
engSearchText:
Plus we gotta set up the stuff we bought, so the
sooner I can get you back, the better.
jpnChrName: 買い出ししたパーツの設置工事も残ってるし とっととお前さんを連れて帰りたかったしな。
jpnSearchText:
買い出ししたパーツの設置工事も残ってるし
とっととお前さんを連れて帰りたかったしな。

engChrName: C'mon, let's go. We don't got all day.
engSearchText: C'mon, let's go. We don't got all day.
jpnChrName: ほれ、事務所に戻るとしようぜ。
jpnSearchText: ほれ、事務所に戻るとしようぜ。

engChrName: I still have much to learn.
engSearchText: I still have much to learn.
jpnChrName: ……やっぱり、まだまだ未熟だな。
jpnSearchText: ……やっぱり、まだまだ未熟だな。

engChrName: And there's more knowledge to be gained under his tutelage than I expected.
engSearchText:
And there's more knowledge to be gained under his
tutelage than I expected.
jpnChrName: 裏解決屋の流儀……か。 思ったより、学ぶ事は多いのかもしれない。
jpnSearchText:
裏解決屋の流儀……か。
思ったより、学ぶ事は多いのかもしれない。

engChrName: I need to make the most of this opportunity. I want to have grown by leaps and bounds by the time I see Gran again.
engSearchText:
I need to make the most of this opportunity. I want
to have grown by leaps and bounds by the time I see
Gran again.
jpnChrName: せっかく首都まで来たんだし、頑張らないと。 いつか博士に成長を見てもらうためにも……！
jpnSearchText:
せっかく首都まで来たんだし、頑張らないと。
いつか博士に成長を見てもらうためにも……！

engChrName: Van and Quatre returned to the office and installed the parts they purchased.
engSearchText:
Van and Quatre returned to the office and installed
the parts they purchased.
jpnChrName: その後、事務所に戻って 買い出ししたパーツの設置工事を行い……
jpnSearchText:
その後、事務所に戻って
買い出ししたパーツの設置工事を行い……

engChrName: Afterwards, they reunited with the others and got back to work.
engSearchText:
Afterwards, they reunited with the others and got
back to work.
jpnChrName: 改めて仲間と合流して 裏解決業務を再開したのだった。
jpnSearchText:
改めて仲間と合流して
裏解決業務を再開したのだった。

engChrName: The footmarks are faint, but they're visible.
engSearchText: The footmarks are faint, but they're visible.
jpnChrName: うっすら足跡があるわね……
jpnSearchText: うっすら足跡があるわね……

engChrName: It's pretty clear our perp's runnin' on the rooftops.
engSearchText: It's pretty clear our perp's runnin' on the rooftops.
jpnChrName: やっぱり建物の上を伝って あちこち移動してるみたいだな。
jpnSearchText:
やっぱり建物の上を伝って
あちこち移動してるみたいだな。

engChrName: They have the gall to steal my name, but not my methods?! I run on walls, damn it! Not rooftops!
engSearchText:
They have the gall to steal my name, but not
my methods?! I run on walls, damn it! Not rooftops!
jpnChrName: チッ、グリムキャッツを名乗るなら 壁走りの一つくらいやってみせなさいっての！
jpnSearchText:
チッ、グリムキャッツを名乗るなら
壁走りの一つくらいやってみせなさいっての！

engChrName: Guess they're a lousy Grimcat copycat, huh?
engSearchText: Guess they're a lousy Grimcat copycat, huh?
jpnChrName: まあ、そこは偽者ってことなんだろう。
jpnSearchText: まあ、そこは偽者ってことなんだろう。

engChrName: They aren't just targeting the rich and corrupt, either. They've widened the scope to ordinary citizens.
engSearchText:
They aren't just targeting the rich and corrupt, either.
They've widened the scope to ordinary citizens.
jpnChrName: 調べた限りほとんどの犯行内容は 一般市民を狙った金品の強奪……
jpnSearchText:
調べた限りほとんどの犯行内容は
一般市民を狙った金品の強奪……

engChrName: And that just makes them a common thug.
engSearchText: And that just makes them a common thug.
jpnChrName: ちょいと腕のいいコソドロって感じか。
jpnSearchText: ちょいと腕のいいコソドロって感じか。

engChrName: No, they're worse than that. They're pure and utter scum.
engSearchText:
No, they're worse than that. They're pure and
utter scum.
jpnChrName: 怪盗グリムキャッツは“義賊”── 悪を暴き、懲らしめる盗みしかしないわ。
jpnSearchText:
怪盗グリムキャッツは“義賊”──
悪を暴き、懲らしめる盗みしかしないわ。

engChrName: Grimcat is a virtuous thief who only steals to punish the wicked—and this dirtbag's only interested in lining their own pockets!
engSearchText:
Grimcat is a virtuous thief who only steals to punish
the wicked—and this dirtbag's only interested in
lining their own pockets!
jpnChrName: その名を騙って私利私欲を満たすための チンケな盗みを働くなんて……！
jpnSearchText:
その名を騙って私利私欲を満たすための
チンケな盗みを働くなんて……！

engChrName: Damn. You sure are pissed about this.
engSearchText: Damn. You sure are pissed about this.
jpnChrName: ……メチャクチャ怒ってんな。 オラシオンの時とは別の意味で。
jpnSearchText:
……メチャクチャ怒ってんな。
オラシオンの時とは別の意味で。

engChrName: And how could I not be?!
engSearchText: And how could I not be?!
jpnChrName: これが怒らずにいられますかっての！
jpnSearchText: これが怒らずにいられますかっての！

engChrName: I inherited the mantle from Mom and Grammy. That role means the world to me!
engSearchText:
I inherited the mantle from Mom and Grammy.
That role means the world to me!
jpnChrName: グリムキャッツは祖母と母から 受け継いできた大事な役目……！
jpnSearchText:
グリムキャッツは祖母と母から
受け継いできた大事な役目……！

engChrName: No, it's not just that. This is the way of life I've believed in since I was a little girl.
engSearchText:
No, it's not just that. This is the way of life I've
believed in since I was a little girl.
jpnChrName: ううん、それだけじゃない。 これはもうあたし自身の生き方そのもので──
jpnSearchText:
ううん、それだけじゃない。
これはもうあたし自身の生き方そのもので──

engChrName: And I happen to be very proud of it!
engSearchText: And I happen to be very proud of it!
jpnChrName: ずっと信じて頑張ってきた あたしの誇りなんだから！
jpnSearchText:
ずっと信じて頑張ってきた
あたしの誇りなんだから！

engChrName: So of course I'm angry. The name is being dragged through the mud by a money-grubbing asshole!
engSearchText:
So of course I'm angry. The name is being dragged
through the mud by a money-grubbing asshole!
jpnChrName: その誇りと名前が貶められている── 平気なわけがないでしょう！
jpnSearchText:
その誇りと名前が貶められている──
平気なわけがないでしょう！

engChrName: All right. Time to rein it in.
engSearchText: All right. Time to rein it in.
jpnChrName: なるほど……女優業と同じくらい 怪盗にも誇りがあるってワケか。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど……女優業と同じくらい
怪盗にも誇りがあるってワケか。

engChrName: I get why you're mad as hell, but I'm gonna need you to cool your jets before we go after the impostor.
engSearchText:
I get why you're mad as hell, but I'm gonna need you
to cool your jets before we go after the impostor.
jpnChrName: だったら尚更クールにいこうぜ。 痕跡を辿っていけば必ず辿りつける──
jpnSearchText:
だったら尚更クールにいこうぜ。
痕跡を辿っていけば必ず辿りつける──

engChrName: You might be a superpowered, badass thief lady, but you're still human. One careless move, and it could be curtains for us.
engSearchText:
You might be a superpowered, badass thief lady, but
you're still human. One careless move, and it could be
curtains for us.
jpnChrName: せっかくの超絶身体能力でも 最後にズッコけちゃ恰好つかねぇぜ？
jpnSearchText:
せっかくの超絶身体能力でも
最後にズッコけちゃ恰好つかねぇぜ？

engChrName: Ugh... Fine, I get the picture. I guess I am a little heated right now.
engSearchText:
Ugh... Fine, I get the picture. I guess I am a little
heated right now.
jpnChrName: ぐっ……わ、分かってるわよ。 たしかにちょっと熱くなりすぎてたわね。
jpnSearchText:
ぐっ……わ、分かってるわよ。
たしかにちょっと熱くなりすぎてたわね。

engChrName: I've gotta ask, though, since it's on my mind. Why are you going this far to help me out? I thought you didn't work for free.
engSearchText:
I've gotta ask, though, since it's on my mind. Why are
you going this far to help me out? I thought you
didn't work for free.
jpnChrName: でもどうしてそこまでやってくれるわけ？ 裏解決屋はタダ働きはしないんでしょ？
jpnSearchText:
でもどうしてそこまでやってくれるわけ？
裏解決屋はタダ働きはしないんでしょ？

engChrName: The copycat only started prowlin' the streets this past week, yeah?
engSearchText:
The copycat only started prowlin' the streets this past
week, yeah?
jpnChrName: あの偽者が出るようになったのは ここ一週間くらいの話だ。
jpnSearchText:
あの偽者が出るようになったのは
ここ一週間くらいの話だ。

engChrName: If you weren't so busy helpin' us clean up the mafia, you'd've mopped the floor with this two-bit crook by now.
engSearchText:
If you weren't so busy helpin' us clean up the mafia,
you'd've mopped the floor with this two-bit crook
by now.
jpnChrName: お前さんがマフィアの後始末まで手伝って “副業”を休んでたことも関係してんだろう。
jpnSearchText:
お前さんがマフィアの後始末まで手伝って
“副業”を休んでたことも関係してんだろう。

engChrName: You're kinda in this mess 'cause of me, so I figured I should pay back the debt I owe.
engSearchText:
You're kinda in this mess 'cause of me, so I figured I
should pay back the debt I owe.
jpnChrName: その意味じゃ他人事じゃねえ── お前さんへの借りはキッチリ返さねぇとな。
jpnSearchText:
その意味じゃ他人事じゃねえ──
お前さんへの借りはキッチリ返さねぇとな。

engChrName: Hey, why're you givin' me that look?
engSearchText: Hey, why're you givin' me that look?
jpnChrName: ？　どうした？
jpnSearchText: ？　どうした？

engChrName: Oh, nothing. It's just that—while I do appreciate the help and everything—something you said rubbed me the wrong way.
engSearchText:
Oh, nothing. It's just that—while I do appreciate the
help and everything—something you said rubbed me
the wrong way.
jpnChrName: 別に──ありがたいけど、 ちょっとだけムカつくって思っただけ。
jpnSearchText:
別に──ありがたいけど、
ちょっとだけムカつくって思っただけ。

engChrName: It's always 'pay off my debt' this or 'settle my debt' that with you. Doing favors isn't like paying off a bar tab, you know.
engSearchText:
It's always 'pay off my debt' this or 'settle my debt'
that with you. Doing favors isn't like paying off a bar
tab, you know.
jpnChrName: 今日の昼の事も含めて、あたしたちとの 貸し借りをそんな簡単に清算しようってのはね。
jpnSearchText:
今日の昼の事も含めて、あたしたちとの
貸し借りをそんな簡単に清算しようってのはね。

engChrName: Heh. You aren't one to pull your punches, are you?
engSearchText: Heh. You aren't one to pull your punches, are you?
jpnChrName: ハハ、ズバっと言うねぇ。 お前さんらしいっちゃらしいが。
jpnSearchText:
ハハ、ズバっと言うねぇ。
お前さんらしいっちゃらしいが。

engChrName: You've got that right. I like to be frank with people— whether they're a close friend or a complete stranger.
engSearchText:
You've got that right. I like to be frank with people—
whether they're a close friend or a complete stranger.
jpnChrName: ま、親しい相手だろうが思ったことは ハッキリ言うのがポリシーだから。
jpnSearchText:
ま、親しい相手だろうが思ったことは
ハッキリ言うのがポリシーだから。

engChrName: And while I'm on a roll, I might as well tell you you're not off the hook for that little incident in Longlai.
engSearchText:
And while I'm on a roll, I might as well tell you you're
not off the hook for that little incident in Longlai.
jpnChrName: 言っとくけど、龍來での“アレ”も ビンタくらいで清算できたとか思わないでよ？
jpnSearchText:
言っとくけど、龍來での“アレ”も
ビンタくらいで清算できたとか思わないでよ？

engChrName: And here I was thinkin' what happened in Longlai would stay in Longlai.
engSearchText:
And here I was thinkin' what happened in Longlai
would stay in Longlai.
jpnChrName: ハッ……了解だ。
jpnSearchText: ハッ……了解だ。

engChrName: Why don't I just turn the other cheek? Will another slap help you forgive and forget?
engSearchText:
Why don't I just turn the other cheek? Will another
slap help you forgive and forget?
jpnChrName: ガン見したわけでもなし、そろそろ チャラにしてくれって気もするが。
jpnSearchText:
ガン見したわけでもなし、そろそろ
チャラにしてくれって気もするが。

engChrName: No way! I won't let you off that easy!
engSearchText: No way! I won't let you off that easy!
jpnChrName: トップ女優の柔肌の価値を ナメてんじゃないわよっ！
jpnSearchText:
トップ女優の柔肌の価値を
ナメてんじゃないわよっ！

engChrName: Some time later...
engSearchText: Some time later...
jpnChrName: それからしばらくして……
jpnSearchText: <C1>それからしばらくして……

engChrName: Hey again.
engSearchText: Hey again.
jpnChrName: よっ、お疲れさん。
jpnSearchText: よっ、お疲れさん。

engChrName: Wow. We've met twice in one day. What are the chances?
engSearchText:
Wow. We've met twice in one day. What are
the chances?
jpnChrName: いや～、今日はよく会うねぇ。
jpnSearchText: いや～、今日はよく会うねぇ。

engChrName: You're playing it off like it's a coincidence, but I suspect this was very much deliberate.
engSearchText:
You're playing it off like it's a coincidence, but I
suspect this was very much deliberate.
jpnChrName: ふう、待ち伏せみたいな真似は やめてちょうだい。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、待ち伏せみたいな真似は
やめてちょうだい。

engChrName: I could arrest you for stalking, you know.
engSearchText: I could arrest you for stalking, you know.
jpnChrName: それともストーカーとして 逮捕されたいのかしら？
jpnSearchText:
それともストーカーとして
逮捕されたいのかしら？

engChrName: Oh, don't be like that. I just wanted to give somethin' to you.
engSearchText:
Oh, don't be like that. I just wanted to give somethin'
to you.
jpnChrName: 頼むからそれはやめてくれ。 ちょっと渡すもんがあってな。
jpnSearchText:
頼むからそれはやめてくれ。
ちょっと渡すもんがあってな。

engChrName: Here you go.
engSearchText: Here you go.
jpnChrName: ほらよ。
jpnSearchText: ほらよ。

engChrName: Is this...a Mishy plush?
engSearchText: Is this...a Mishy plush?
jpnChrName: ！　これって……
jpnSearchText: ！　これって……

engChrName: Yep. This thing's merch for the Mishy in Boots movie that's comin' next month. You can only get it in theaters for a limited time.
engSearchText:
Yep. This thing's merch for the Mishy in Boots
movie that's comin' next month. You can only get it
in theaters for a limited time.
jpnChrName: 来月上映予定、 劇場版《長靴をはいたみっしぃ》。
jpnSearchText:
来月上映予定、
劇場版《長靴をはいたみっしぃ》。

engChrName: You have no idea how long I had to wait in line for it.
engSearchText: You have no idea how long I had to wait in line for it.
jpnChrName: 劇場限定のマスコットが 先行販売されててな、すげえ並んだぜ？
jpnSearchText:
劇場限定のマスコットが
先行販売されててな、すげえ並んだぜ？

engChrName: Why did you go out of your way to do that for me?
engSearchText: Why did you go out of your way to do that for me?
jpnChrName: ……どうしてそうまでして……
jpnSearchText: ……どうしてそうまでして……

engChrName: Well, I figured you wanted one 'cause you looked like you were dyin' to see it.
engSearchText:
Well, I figured you wanted one 'cause you looked like
you were dyin' to see it.
jpnChrName: いかにも観たそうにしてたからな。
jpnSearchText: いかにも観たそうにしてたからな。

engChrName: I-I don't want to see it THAT much.
engSearchText: I-I don't want to see it THAT much.
jpnChrName: べ、別に……
jpnSearchText: べ、別に……

engChrName: ...But even if I did, that doesn't mean you had to get this for me.
engSearchText:
...But even if I did, that doesn't mean you had to get
this for me.
jpnChrName: 仮にそうだとしても、 貴方に何かしてもらう義理はないわ。
jpnSearchText:
仮にそうだとしても、
貴方に何かしてもらう義理はないわ。

engChrName: Well, that wasn't the only reason.
engSearchText: Well, that wasn't the only reason.
jpnChrName: ……まあ、なんだ。
jpnSearchText: ……まあ、なんだ。

engChrName: I, uh, just happened to remember about that promise I broke all those years ago.
engSearchText:
I, uh, just happened to remember about that promise
I broke all those years ago.
jpnChrName: あの頃の約束、 結局破っちまったのを思い出してな。
jpnSearchText:
あの頃の約束、
結局破っちまったのを思い出してな。

engChrName: I know giving you this thing won't fully make up for it...
engSearchText:
I know giving you this thing won't fully make up
for it...
jpnChrName: ま、そんなモンで チャラにしようってワケじゃないが。
jpnSearchText:
ま、そんなモンで
チャラにしようってワケじゃないが。

engChrName: ...You aren't wrong.
engSearchText: ...You aren't wrong.
jpnChrName: ………当然でしょう。
jpnSearchText: ………当然でしょう。

engChrName: Also, did you just refer to Mishy as 'this thing'? Rude.
engSearchText: Also, did you just refer to Mishy as 'this thing'? Rude.
jpnChrName: それと、そんなモンなんて言い方はやめて。 みっしぃに失礼でしょう。
jpnSearchText:
それと、そんなモンなんて言い方はやめて。
みっしぃに失礼でしょう。

engChrName: Oh, umm... Sorry 'bout that. Anyway, catch ya later.
engSearchText: Oh, umm... Sorry 'bout that. Anyway, catch ya later.
jpnChrName: あー、そいつは悪かったな。 ……そんじゃな。
jpnSearchText:
あー、そいつは悪かったな。
……そんじゃな。

engChrName: So there's a theme park in Crossbell called Mishelam Wonderland? Well, that's new.
engSearchText:
So there's a theme park in Crossbell called
Mishelam Wonderland? Well, that's new.
jpnChrName: ＭＷＬ（ミシュラムワンダーランド）…… クロスベルにそんなものが出来るのね。
jpnSearchText:
ＭＷＬ（ミシュラムワンダーランド）……
クロスベルにそんなものが出来るのね。

engChrName: And this is its mascot...
engSearchText: And this is its mascot...
jpnChrName: これがマスコットの……
jpnSearchText: <C8>これがマスコットの……

engChrName: We're back. ...Hmm? What are you reading there?
engSearchText: We're back. ...Hmm? What are you reading there?
jpnChrName: 戻ったぞ、エレイン── 何を読んでいるんだ？
jpnSearchText:
戻ったぞ、エレイン──
何を読んでいるんだ？

engChrName: Looks like it's some news from Crossbell. Anyway, what's this cat-lookin' thing? 'Mishy'?
engSearchText:
Looks like it's some news from Crossbell.
Anyway, what's this cat-lookin' thing? 'Mishy'?
jpnChrName: クロスベル方面のニュースか。 なになに、《みっしぃ》……？
jpnSearchText:
クロスベル方面のニュースか。
なになに、《みっしぃ》……？

engChrName: It looks ugly as hell. Don't tell me you like that thing?
engSearchText: It looks ugly as hell. Don't tell me you like that thing?
jpnChrName: ……なんともいえねぇ顔してんな。 こんなもんに興味あるのかよ？
jpnSearchText:
……なんともいえねぇ顔してんな。
こんなもんに興味あるのかよ？

engChrName: I-I'm allowed to like whatever I want! I'm sorry my tastes aren't up to your standards!
engSearchText:
I-I'm allowed to like whatever I want! I'm sorry my
tastes aren't up to your standards!
jpnChrName: い、いいでしょ別に！ 悪かったわね、見かけによらなくて！
jpnSearchText:
い、いいでしょ別に！
悪かったわね、見かけによらなくて！

engChrName: Heh. It's always good to see you two getting along so well.
engSearchText:
Heh. It's always good to see you two getting along
so well.
jpnChrName: フッ、相変わらず仲がよくて何よりだ。 しかしクロスベルか。
jpnSearchText:
フッ、相変わらず仲がよくて何よりだ。
しかしクロスベルか。

engChrName: Crossbell is only one station away on the Transcontinental Railroad. Why don't you take a part-time job so you can take her next year?
engSearchText:
Crossbell is only one station away on the
Transcontinental Railroad. Why don't you take a
part-time job so you can take her next year?
jpnChrName: 大陸横断鉄道で一本──今からバイトすれば 来年あたりには二人で行けそうだな？
jpnSearchText:
大陸横断鉄道で一本──今からバイトすれば
来年あたりには二人で行けそうだな？

engChrName: Don't push me into it.
engSearchText: Don't push me into it.
jpnChrName: 露骨に焚きつけてんじゃねえよ。
jpnSearchText: <C8>露骨に焚きつけてんじゃねえよ。

engChrName: ...So, umm, what're you thinkin'? If you really wanna go, I, uh...
engSearchText:
...So, umm, what're you thinkin'? If you really wanna
go, I, uh...
jpnChrName: ……あー、どうする？ お前がそんなに行きたいなら……
jpnSearchText:
……あー、どうする？
お前がそんなに行きたいなら……

engChrName: Really? You'd take me?
engSearchText: Really? You'd take me?
jpnChrName: ほんとっ？
jpnSearchText: <C8>ほんとっ？

engChrName: ...Ahem. I mean, if you'd really like to take me that badly, I suppose I can come along.
engSearchText:
...Ahem. I mean, if you'd really like to take me that
badly, I suppose I can come along.
jpnChrName: ……コホン、いいわよ、 私をそんなに連れて行きたいなら。
jpnSearchText:
……コホン、いいわよ、
私をそんなに連れて行きたいなら。

engChrName: You just can't be cute, can you?
engSearchText: You just can't be cute, can you?
jpnChrName: ほんっと可愛くねえな……ったく。
jpnSearchText: <C8>ほんっと可愛くねえな……ったく。

engChrName: You're one to talk, Mister Dark and Brooding. Heehee. Thank you, Van. I can hardly wait to go.
engSearchText:
You're one to talk, Mister Dark and Brooding.
Heehee. Thank you, Van. I can hardly wait to go.
jpnChrName: お互い様でしょう？ ふふっ、楽しみにしてるわね──
jpnSearchText:
お互い様でしょう？
ふふっ、楽しみにしてるわね──

engChrName: Does he have any idea how many years it's been since then?
engSearchText:
Does he have any idea how many years it's been
since then?
jpnChrName: 何年経ったと思ってるんだか。
jpnSearchText: 何年経ったと思ってるんだか。

engChrName: Still, I'm...happy he remembered.
engSearchText: Still, I'm...happy he remembered.
jpnChrName: ……でも、覚えていてくれたんだ………
jpnSearchText: ……でも、覚えていてくれたんだ………

engChrName: Afterwards, Van reunited the others and got back to work.
engSearchText:
Afterwards, Van reunited the others and got back
to work.
jpnChrName: その後、ヴァンは仲間たちと合流し 裏解決業務を再開したのだった。
jpnSearchText:
その後、ヴァンは仲間たちと合流し
裏解決業務を再開したのだった。

engChrName: Van's group decided to take a short break.
engSearchText: Van's group decided to take a short break.
jpnChrName: ヴァンたちは街の巡回の合間に、 しばしの休憩をとることになり──
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンたちは街の巡回の合間に、
しばしの休憩をとることになり──

engChrName: Everyone split up so they could spend their free time as they pleased.
engSearchText:
Everyone split up so they could spend their free time
as they pleased.
jpnChrName: 一時的に解散して、 それぞれ自由に過ごすのだった。
jpnSearchText:
一時的に解散して、
それぞれ自由に過ごすのだった。

engChrName: There you are!
engSearchText: There you are!
jpnChrName: あ、お姉さん！
jpnSearchText: あ、お姉さん！

engChrName: You're both awfully early.
engSearchText: You're both awfully early.
jpnChrName: あら、あなたたち、もう来たのね。 約束の時間はまだ先のはずだけど。
jpnSearchText:
あら、あなたたち、もう来たのね。
約束の時間はまだ先のはずだけど。

engChrName: Heehee. We hopped on an early train 'cause we reaaaally wanted to see you!
engSearchText:
Heehee. We hopped on an early train 'cause we
reaaaally wanted to see you!
jpnChrName: えへへ、早くお姉さんに会いたくて、 早い列車に乗っちゃったんだ。
jpnSearchText:
えへへ、早くお姉さんに会いたくて、
早い列車に乗っちゃったんだ。

engChrName: (These are the siblings you met, right?)
engSearchText: (These are the siblings you met, right?)
jpnChrName: （……この子たちが例の兄妹か。）
jpnSearchText: （……この子たちが例の兄妹か。）

engChrName: (Yes. They're the ones who were abducted in that case last year.)
engSearchText:
(Yes. They're the ones who were abducted in that
case last year.)
jpnChrName: （ええ──去年の事件で出会った。）
jpnSearchText: （ええ──去年の事件で出会った。）

engChrName: September of last year?
engSearchText: September of last year?
jpnChrName: 去年の９月っつうと……
jpnSearchText: <C8>去年の９月っつうと……

engChrName: That was when you took down a criminal group that was workin' for Almata, yeah?
engSearchText:
That was when you took down a criminal group that
was workin' for Almata, yeah?
jpnChrName: お前が例のアルマータの 下部組織を潰した事件の話か。
jpnSearchText:
お前が例のアルマータの
下部組織を潰した事件の話か。

engChrName: That's right. It was the case that led to me accepting my promotion to A-rank.
engSearchText:
That's right. It was the case that led to me accepting
my promotion to A-rank.
jpnChrName: ええ、私がＡ級を引き受ける きっかけにもなった事件の関係者──
jpnSearchText:
ええ、私がＡ級を引き受ける
きっかけにもなった事件の関係者──

engChrName: I didn't realize you knew about the incident.
engSearchText: I didn't realize you knew about the incident.
jpnChrName: よく知ってるわね？
jpnSearchText: <C8>よく知ってるわね？

engChrName: Bermotti told me all about it. Sounded like it was a rough ordeal.
engSearchText:
Bermotti told me all about it. Sounded like it was a
rough ordeal.
jpnChrName: まあ情報屋（ベルモッティ）から概要だけな。 ……随分酷い事件だったらしいが。
jpnSearchText:
まあ情報屋（ベルモッティ）から概要だけな。
……随分酷い事件だったらしいが。

engChrName: You can say that again. The two children survived, but they were left traumatized by what happened.
engSearchText:
You can say that again. The two children survived,
but they were left traumatized by what happened.
jpnChrName: ……ええ、その兄妹も事件で 心的外傷（トラウマ）を負った被害者……
jpnSearchText:
……ええ、その兄妹も事件で
心的外傷（トラウマ）を負った被害者……

engChrName: They've been receiving care in a facility outside the city ever since, but they're coming to the capital for the Revolution Festival.
engSearchText:
They've been receiving care in a facility outside the
city ever since, but they're coming to the capital for
the Revolution Festival.
jpnChrName: あの後ずっと地方で療養を受けていたけど、 記念祭に合わせて、首都に来ることになってね。
jpnSearchText:
あの後ずっと地方で療養を受けていたけど、
記念祭に合わせて、首都に来ることになってね。

engChrName: I was told they really want to see me, so I agreed to look after them for half a day.
engSearchText:
I was told they really want to see me, so I agreed to
look after them for half a day.
jpnChrName: どうしても私に会いたいとかで、 それで半日ほど親から預かることになったわ。
jpnSearchText:
どうしても私に会いたいとかで、
それで半日ほど親から預かることになったわ。

engChrName: No wonder you came runnin' to me for advice.
engSearchText: No wonder you came runnin' to me for advice.
jpnChrName: なるほど、子供の相手か。 どうりでアドバイスが欲しいわけだ。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど、子供の相手か。
どうりでアドバイスが欲しいわけだ。

engChrName: Hey, it's not as though I'm bad at dealing with children. I just don't know how to keep them entertained.
engSearchText:
Hey, it's not as though I'm bad at dealing
with children. I just don't know how to keep
them entertained.
jpnChrName: ……別に子供が苦手なわけじゃないわよ？ ただ、どうやって楽しませればいいか……
jpnSearchText:
……別に子供が苦手なわけじゃないわよ？
ただ、どうやって楽しませればいいか……

engChrName: Yeah, you don't exactly strike me as the fun-loving babysitter type.
engSearchText:
Yeah, you don't exactly strike me as the fun-loving
babysitter type.
jpnChrName: お堅い生徒会長どのだからなあ。
jpnSearchText: <C8>お堅い生徒会長どのだからなあ。

engChrName: I thought your bracer work would've forced you to learn all the good spots in town, but I guess not.
engSearchText:
I thought your bracer work would've forced you to
learn all the good spots in town, but I guess not.
jpnChrName: イーディスの遊び場とかも詳しくねえのは 遊撃士になってからも変わんねぇわけか。
jpnSearchText:
イーディスの遊び場とかも詳しくねえのは
遊撃士になってからも変わんねぇわけか。

engChrName: Yes, yes. Rub it in.
engSearchText: Yes, yes. Rub it in.
jpnChrName: ええそうよ、だから貴方を呼んだのよ。
jpnSearchText: <C8>ええそうよ、だから貴方を呼んだのよ。

engChrName: Do you know any places they might enjoy? You're the expert in slacking off, so I thought you would know.
engSearchText:
Do you know any places they might enjoy? You're the
expert in slacking off, so I thought you would know.
jpnChrName: ヴァン、貴方の不真面目さを見込んでお願いするわ、 何かいいアドバイスをちょうだい。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン、貴方の不真面目さを見込んでお願いするわ、
何かいいアドバイスをちょうだい。

engChrName: Only you would ask for help and toss an insult my way in the same breath.
engSearchText:
Only you would ask for help and toss an insult my
way in the same breath.
jpnChrName: なんだそのマイナス方向の信頼は……
jpnSearchText: <C8>なんだそのマイナス方向の信頼は……

engChrName: Just so we're clear, I might know a few good places— but they won't necessarily be fun for kids. That okay with you?
engSearchText:
Just so we're clear, I might know a few good places—
but they won't necessarily be fun for kids. That okay
with you?
jpnChrName: 言っとくが俺の知ってる遊び場だのじゃ 子供が喜ぶかどうかは保証できねぇぞ。
jpnSearchText:
言っとくが俺の知ってる遊び場だのじゃ
子供が喜ぶかどうかは保証できねぇぞ。

engChrName: Yes, that's perfectly fine. Thank you.
engSearchText: Yes, that's perfectly fine. Thank you.
jpnChrName: それでも十分助かるわ。
jpnSearchText: <C8>それでも十分助かるわ。

engChrName: I also need to know where to find some good quality sweets.
engSearchText:
I also need to know where to find some good
quality sweets.
jpnChrName: それと、そうね……美味しいスイーツの 店とかも教えてほしいわ。
jpnSearchText:
それと、そうね……美味しいスイーツの
店とかも教えてほしいわ。

engChrName: Heh. Well, you've come to the right person, then.
engSearchText: Heh. Well, you've come to the right person, then.
jpnChrName: ……ほう？

engChrName: I'll map out a route that'll take you to every underrated sweets shop in the capital.
engSearchText:
I'll map out a route that'll take you to every
underrated sweets shop in the capital.
jpnChrName: つまり首都の穴場スイーツ店 巡回ツアーを企画してほしいってわけか。
jpnSearchText:
つまり首都の穴場スイーツ店
巡回ツアーを企画してほしいってわけか。

engChrName: I...don't think that's necessar—
engSearchText: I...don't think that's necessar—
jpnChrName: いや、そこまで言ってないんだけど……
jpnSearchText: <C8>いや、そこまで言ってないんだけど……

engChrName: Would you like the cost-effective tour or the no-expenses-spared premium route?
engSearchText:
Would you like the cost-effective tour or the
no-expenses-spared premium route?
jpnChrName: コスパ重視の庶民派コースから ゴージャスなプレミアムコース──
jpnSearchText:
コスパ重視の庶民派コースから
ゴージャスなプレミアムコース──

engChrName: Actually, I have just the thing for you: a special seasonal route that'll take you to all the best sweet shops and tourist spots in the city.
engSearchText:
Actually, I have just the thing for you: a special
seasonal route that'll take you to all the best sweet
shops and tourist spots in the city.
jpnChrName: 季節限定コースや観光名所も網羅する 欲張りコースも含めて何でもござれだ。
jpnSearchText:
季節限定コースや観光名所も網羅する
欲張りコースも含めて何でもござれだ。

engChrName: You can leave all your gourmet needs to me!
engSearchText: You can leave all your gourmet needs to me!
jpnChrName: ま、大船に乗ったつもりで任せときな！
jpnSearchText: <C8>ま、大船に乗ったつもりで任せときな！

engChrName: (Okay, I think she can take this from here.)
engSearchText: (Okay, I think she can take this from here.)
jpnChrName: （一応迎えまでは付き合ったが、   後は任せてもよさそうだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（一応迎えまでは付き合ったが、
後は任せてもよさそうだな。）

engChrName: We aren't interrupting your date, are we?
engSearchText: We aren't interrupting your date, are we?
jpnChrName: もしかして…… デートの邪魔だった？
jpnSearchText:
もしかして……
デートの邪魔だった？

engChrName: You don't need to worry about that, kiddo. I just came with her to make sure she got here okay.
engSearchText:
You don't need to worry about that, kiddo. I just
came with her to make sure she got here okay.
jpnChrName: ガキがませたこと言ってんな。 タダの付き添いさ。
jpnSearchText:
ガキがませたこと言ってんな。
タダの付き添いさ。

engChrName: That's good. I did think you looked a little old for her, but I was worried we spoiled your fun by coming early.
engSearchText:
That's good. I did think you looked a little old for
her, but I was worried we spoiled your fun by
coming early.
jpnChrName: 良かった……早めに来たせいで おじさんとお姉さんの邪魔をしたのかと。
jpnSearchText:
良かった……早めに来たせいで
おじさんとお姉さんの邪魔をしたのかと。

engChrName: Hang on a sec.
engSearchText: Hang on a sec.
jpnChrName: ……ちょっと待て。
jpnSearchText: ……ちょっと待て。

engChrName: You got it all wrong. The two of us are the same age.
engSearchText: You got it all wrong. The two of us are the same age.
jpnChrName: 俺とこのお姉さんは同い年なんだが？
jpnSearchText: 俺とこのお姉さんは同い年なんだが？

engChrName: What? Really? I never would've guessed.
engSearchText: What? Really? I never would've guessed.
jpnChrName: あ、そうだったんだ……
jpnSearchText: あ、そうだったんだ……

engChrName: Heehee. I can hardly blame you. He could easily pass as a 30-something-year-old.
engSearchText:
Heehee. I can hardly blame you. He could easily pass
as a 30-something-year-old.
jpnChrName: クスクス…… 全体的に趣味が老けてるものね。
jpnSearchText:
クスクス……
全体的に趣味が老けてるものね。

engChrName: Oh, so this is the thanks I get. I see how it is.
engSearchText: Oh, so this is the thanks I get. I see how it is.
jpnChrName: うるせえっ。
jpnSearchText: うるせえっ。

engChrName: Come on. Say hello.
engSearchText: Come on. Say hello.
jpnChrName: ほら、挨拶して。
jpnSearchText: ほら、挨拶して。

engChrName: (Is she...mute?)
engSearchText: (Is she...mute?)
jpnChrName: （……エレイン、この子は……）
jpnSearchText: （……エレイン、この子は……）

engChrName: (Unfortunately, yes. She lost the ability to speak after what she went through.)
engSearchText:
(Unfortunately, yes. She lost the ability to speak after
what she went through.)
jpnChrName: （ええ、心因性失声症……あの事件の後、   上手く喋れなくなってしまったの。）
jpnSearchText:
（ええ、心因性失声症……あの事件の後、
上手く喋れなくなってしまったの。）

engChrName: (It doesn't look like she's recovered. Try not to excite or upset her too much.)
engSearchText:
(It doesn't look like she's recovered. Try not to excite
or upset her too much.)
jpnChrName: （まだ治ってないみたいね……   あまり刺激しないであげて。）
jpnSearchText:
（まだ治ってないみたいね……
あまり刺激しないであげて。）

engChrName: Van gave the girl some candy.
engSearchText: Van gave the girl some candy.
jpnChrName: ヴァンは少女に飴玉をあげた。
jpnSearchText: <C1>ヴァンは少女に飴玉をあげた。

engChrName: This is my way of sayin' hi. I'm a big fan of that brand.
engSearchText:
This is my way of sayin' hi. I'm a big fan of
that brand.
jpnChrName: お兄さんのお気に入りの銘柄でな。 出会った記念と言っちゃあなんだが。
jpnSearchText:
お兄さんのお気に入りの銘柄でな。
出会った記念と言っちゃあなんだが。

engChrName: I know you'll be headin' back home tonight, but I hope you have loads of fun till then. Festivals are a blast, so enjoy it.
engSearchText:
I know you'll be headin' back home tonight, but I
hope you have loads of fun till then. Festivals are a
blast, so enjoy it.
jpnChrName: 夕方には帰るらしいがせっかくの記念祭だ、 お姉ちゃんにたっぷり遊んでもらいな。
jpnSearchText:
夕方には帰るらしいがせっかくの記念祭だ、
お姉ちゃんにたっぷり遊んでもらいな。

engChrName: Huh?
engSearchText: Huh?
jpnChrName: ん？　どうした？
jpnSearchText: ん？　どうした？

engChrName: Do you want him to join us?
engSearchText: Do you want him to join us?
jpnChrName: もしかして、お兄さんとも 一緒に遊びたいの？
jpnSearchText:
もしかして、お兄さんとも
一緒に遊びたいの？

engChrName: Would you be okay with that, Van?
engSearchText: Would you be okay with that, Van?
jpnChrName: ……ヴァン。
jpnSearchText: ……ヴァン。

engChrName: All right. It's not like I have any urgent business to take care of.
engSearchText:
All right. It's not like I have any urgent business to
take care of.
jpnChrName: ま、乗り掛かった舟だ。 時間もあるしいいだろ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、乗り掛かった舟だ。
時間もあるしいいだろ。

engChrName: Helpin' you plan the route got me in the mood to stuff my face with sweets anyway.
engSearchText:
Helpin' you plan the route got me in the mood to
stuff my face with sweets anyway.
jpnChrName: さっきお前とプランを話してたら、俺も スイーツ巡回ツアーをやりたくなってきたしな！
jpnSearchText:
さっきお前とプランを話してたら、俺も
スイーツ巡回ツアーをやりたくなってきたしな！

engChrName: Just don't go spoiling them, okay?
engSearchText: Just don't go spoiling them, okay?
jpnChrName: あまり子供たちに 食べさせすぎちゃダメよ？
jpnSearchText:
あまり子供たちに
食べさせすぎちゃダメよ？

engChrName: I know, I know. Well, you kiddos ready to get going?
engSearchText: I know, I know. Well, you kiddos ready to get going?
jpnChrName: 分かった分かった。 そんじゃあ出発するか！
jpnSearchText:
分かった分かった。
そんじゃあ出発するか！

engChrName: Yep!
engSearchText: Yep!
jpnChrName: うん！
jpnSearchText: うん！

engChrName: Van and Elaine led the two children on a tour of the festival.
engSearchText:
Van and Elaine led the two children on a tour of
the festival.
jpnChrName: こうしてヴァンとエレインは兄妹を連れて、 記念祭中の首都巡りを開始した。
jpnSearchText:
こうしてヴァンとエレインは兄妹を連れて、
記念祭中の首都巡りを開始した。

engChrName: They brought them to many of Edith's best sweets stores and tourist spots.
engSearchText:
They brought them to many of Edith's best sweets
stores and tourist spots.
jpnChrName: 首都内の観光名所やヴァンおすすめの スイーツのある店を中心に回っていき……
jpnSearchText:
首都内の観光名所やヴァンおすすめの
スイーツのある店を中心に回っていき……

engChrName: To Van and Elaine's delight, the children were enjoying themselves immensely, and they could feel the two of them opening up little by little.
engSearchText:
To Van and Elaine's delight, the children were
enjoying themselves immensely, and they could feel
the two of them opening up little by little.
jpnChrName: エレインと共に兄妹２人を楽しませながら 少しずつ打ち解けていった。
jpnSearchText:
エレインと共に兄妹２人を楽しませながら
少しずつ打ち解けていった。

engChrName: Eventually, they set off for Old Town—their final stop on the tour.
engSearchText:
Eventually, they set off for Old Town—their final
stop on the tour.
jpnChrName: そして最後に旧市街へと向かい……
jpnSearchText: <C1>そして最後に旧市街へと向かい……

engChrName: Afterwards, they capped off their day with a light lunch and dessert at Montmart.
engSearchText:
Afterwards, they capped off their day with a light
lunch and dessert at Montmart.
jpnChrName: その後、最後にモンマルトで 軽い食事とデザートを楽しみ……
jpnSearchText:
その後、最後にモンマルトで
軽い食事とデザートを楽しみ……

engChrName: Once they finished eating, they all made their way back to Central Station—as it was time for the kids' mother to pick them up.
engSearchText:
Once they finished eating, they all made their way
back to Central Station—as it was time for the kids'
mother to pick them up.
jpnChrName: やがて親が迎えに来る時間が来たため、 駅前通りに戻ったのだった。
jpnSearchText:
やがて親が迎えに来る時間が来たため、
駅前通りに戻ったのだった。

engChrName: Thank you both so much!
engSearchText: Thank you both so much!
jpnChrName: 今日は本当にありがとうございました。
jpnSearchText: 今日は本当にありがとうございました。

engChrName: We had a ton of fun. I hope we'll see you both again someday!
engSearchText:
We had a ton of fun. I hope we'll see you both
again someday!
jpnChrName: 楽しかったよ、お兄さん、お姉さん。 ──また会おうね！
jpnSearchText:
楽しかったよ、お兄さん、お姉さん。
──また会おうね！

engChrName: As do I. Take care of yourselves, you two.
engSearchText: As do I. Take care of yourselves, you two.
jpnChrName: ええ、元気でね。
jpnSearchText: ええ、元気でね。

engChrName: You're both welcome here anytime.
engSearchText: You're both welcome here anytime.
jpnChrName: ま、いつでも遊びに来な。
jpnSearchText: ま、いつでも遊びに来な。

engChrName: What's up? You forget somethin'?
engSearchText: What's up? You forget somethin'?
jpnChrName: どうした、忘れモンか？
jpnSearchText: どうした、忘れモンか？

engChrName: Thank...you.
engSearchText: Thank...you.
jpnChrName: ……あ りが と。 お ねえ ちゃん、おにぃ ちゃん。
jpnSearchText:
……あ りが と。
お ねえ ちゃん、おにぃ ちゃん。

engChrName: Bye bye!
engSearchText: Bye bye!
jpnChrName: ……バイ バイ……！
jpnSearchText: ……バイ バイ……！

engChrName: Van...
engSearchText: Van...

engChrName: Yeah, I know.
engSearchText: Yeah, I know.

engChrName: Hey, why're you turnin' on the waterworks?
engSearchText: Hey, why're you turnin' on the waterworks?
jpnChrName: って、泣いてんのかよ……
jpnSearchText: って、泣いてんのかよ……

engChrName: I'm just...so happy.
engSearchText: I'm just...so happy.
jpnChrName: ……本当に……良かった………
jpnSearchText: ……本当に……良かった………

engChrName: Got'cha. Well, I think this is proof that everyone's efforts weren't for nothing. They recovered 'cause of the rehab, their family's love and care...
engSearchText:
Got'cha. Well, I think this is proof that everyone's
efforts weren't for nothing. They recovered 'cause of
the rehab, their family's love and care...
jpnChrName: ……全ては無駄じゃなかったってことだろ。 あの子のリハビリも、家族の支えも。
jpnSearchText:
……全ては無駄じゃなかったってことだろ。
あの子のリハビリも、家族の支えも。

engChrName: ...and what you just did for them.
engSearchText: ...and what you just did for them.
jpnChrName: 勿論、お前が今までしてきたこともな。
jpnSearchText: 勿論、お前が今までしてきたこともな。

engChrName: What 'we' just did for them, you mean.
engSearchText: What 'we' just did for them, you mean.
jpnChrName: ……そして、間違いなく 貴方のおかげでもあるでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
……そして、間違いなく
貴方のおかげでもあるでしょう。

engChrName: Thank you for everything today, Van.
engSearchText: Thank you for everything today, Van.
jpnChrName: 今日はありがとう──ヴァン。
jpnSearchText: 今日はありがとう──ヴァン。

engChrName: Nah, I don't deserve it. You did all the heavy lifting.
engSearchText: Nah, I don't deserve it. You did all the heavy lifting.
jpnChrName: 大したことはしてねえっての。
jpnSearchText: 大したことはしてねえっての。

engChrName: But if you insist on letting me share the credit, we'll just say you owe me one now. Always happy to put an A-rank bracer in my debt.
engSearchText:
But if you insist on letting me share the credit, we'll
just say you owe me one now. Always happy to put an
A-rank bracer in my debt.
jpnChrName: ま、Ａ級遊撃士に恩を売れて 俺としても万々歳ってところかね。
jpnSearchText:
ま、Ａ級遊撃士に恩を売れて
俺としても万々歳ってところかね。

engChrName: *sniffle* You really are unbelievable, you know that?
engSearchText: *sniffle* You really are unbelievable, you know that?
jpnChrName: グス……まったくもう。
jpnSearchText: グス……まったくもう。

engChrName: But while you can be frustrating sometimes, I'm glad you're a part of my life.
engSearchText:
But while you can be frustrating sometimes, I'm glad
you're a part of my life.
jpnChrName: ──これからもよろしくね、ヴァン。
jpnSearchText: ──これからもよろしくね、ヴァン。

engChrName: We both have our flaws, but I think we compensate for each other's quite nicely.
engSearchText:
We both have our flaws, but I think we compensate
for each other's quite nicely.
jpnChrName: お互い足りないところはあるだろうけど、 きっと何があっても大丈夫。
jpnSearchText:
お互い足りないところはあるだろうけど、
きっと何があっても大丈夫。

engChrName: There's nothing we can't handle when we're together, and that's especially true when René's with us. We also have your assistants at our side, too.
engSearchText:
There's nothing we can't handle when we're together,
and that's especially true when René's with us.
We also have your assistants at our side, too.
jpnChrName: 学生時代みたいにルネと……ううん、 アニエスさんたちとも支え合っていければ。
jpnSearchText:
学生時代みたいにルネと……ううん、
アニエスさんたちとも支え合っていければ。

engChrName: ...Yeah. You're right.
engSearchText: ...Yeah. You're right.
jpnChrName: ………ああ、そうだな。
jpnSearchText: ………ああ、そうだな。

engChrName: Van bid Elaine farewell, and he returned to his work.
engSearchText: Van bid Elaine farewell, and he returned to his work.
jpnChrName: その後、エレインと別れてから 記念祭の巡回に戻るのだった。
jpnSearchText:
その後、エレインと別れてから
記念祭の巡回に戻るのだった。

engChrName: A pleasure doing business with you as always!
engSearchText: A pleasure doing business with you as always!
jpnChrName: お買い上げありがとう、ポーレット。
jpnSearchText: お買い上げありがとう、ポーレット。

engChrName: I'll throw in some seasonal fruits from Ored on the house. Hope you enjoy them!
engSearchText:
I'll throw in some seasonal fruits from Ored on
the house. Hope you enjoy them!
jpnChrName: ……これ、オレド産の旬のフルーツよ。 良かったらご家族で食べて。
jpnSearchText:
……これ、オレド産の旬のフルーツよ。
良かったらご家族で食べて。

engChrName: Ooh! These look really tasty!
engSearchText: Ooh! These look really tasty!
jpnChrName: わぁ、おいしそー！
jpnSearchText: わぁ、おいしそー！

engChrName: I appreciate the offer, but I couldn't possibly take these without paying for them.
engSearchText:
I appreciate the offer, but I couldn't possibly take
these without paying for them.
jpnChrName: ありがとうございます。 でも、ミラは払わせてください。
jpnSearchText:
ありがとうございます。
でも、ミラは払わせてください。

engChrName: Of course you can! Think of it as a loyalty bonus.
engSearchText: Of course you can! Think of it as a loyalty bonus.
jpnChrName: いいのよ、おすそ分けだから。
jpnSearchText: いいのよ、おすそ分けだから。

engChrName: I'd also like to spoil my favorite little Yumé.
engSearchText: I'd also like to spoil my favorite little Yumé.
jpnChrName: ユメちゃんも変わらず元気そうね。
jpnSearchText: ユメちゃんも変わらず元気そうね。

engChrName: Yay! I'm her favorite!
engSearchText: Yay! I'm her favorite!
jpnChrName: うん、元気ー！
jpnSearchText: <S5>うん、元気ー！

engChrName: Oww... Pipe down. You're killin' my eardrums here.
engSearchText: Oww... Pipe down. You're killin' my eardrums here.
jpnChrName: ユメ、もうちっと声小さくな？ 元気が有り余ってるのは分かるが。
jpnSearchText:
ユメ、もうちっと声小さくな？
元気が有り余ってるのは分かるが。

engChrName: Haha. Children are just so full of energy, aren't they?
engSearchText: Haha. Children are just so full of energy, aren't they?
jpnChrName: ふふ、子供はそうでなくちゃ。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、子供はそうでなくちゃ。

engChrName: I remember when you returned with her in your arms all those years ago. I was quite worried back then.
engSearchText:
I remember when you returned with her in your arms
all those years ago. I was quite worried back then.
jpnChrName: あなたがこの子を抱いて帰ってきた時は 心配ばかりしたものだけど……
jpnSearchText:
あなたがこの子を抱いて帰ってきた時は
心配ばかりしたものだけど……

engChrName: Huh?
engSearchText: Huh?
jpnChrName: んー？
jpnSearchText: んー？

engChrName: But I see now there was no cause for concern. You've got a good head on your shoulders, and you're strong of spirit as well.
engSearchText:
But I see now there was no cause for concern.
You've got a good head on your shoulders, and you're
strong of spirit as well.
jpnChrName: 杞憂だったわね。 ポーレットはしっかり者だし、意外と気も強いし。
jpnSearchText:
杞憂だったわね。
ポーレットはしっかり者だし、意外と気も強いし。

engChrName: Heehee. I imagine I got the former from my mom and the latter from my dad.
engSearchText:
Heehee. I imagine I got the former from my mom
and the latter from my dad.
jpnChrName: しっかり者は母の、気の強さは父親譲りですね。
jpnSearchText: しっかり者は母の、気の強さは父親譲りですね。

engChrName: They continued their shopping spree for a while longer before making their way back to Old Town.
engSearchText:
They continued their shopping spree for a while
longer before making their way back to Old Town.
jpnChrName: ──それからヴァンたちは他にも何軒かで 買い出しをして、旧市街へ帰ってきたのだった。
jpnSearchText:
──それからヴァンたちは他にも何軒かで
買い出しをして、旧市街へ帰ってきたのだった。

engChrName: Van made his way over to the station to see a street musician performance.
engSearchText:
Van made his way over to the station to see a street
musician performance.
jpnChrName: ヴァンは話題のストリートミュージシャンが 来ているという駅前に向かった。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンは話題のストリートミュージシャンが
来ているという駅前に向かった。

engChrName: (I can see why people've been ravin' about her. She's pretty damn good.)
engSearchText:
(I can see why people've been ravin' about her.
She's pretty damn good.)
jpnChrName: （へえ、噂になるだけあるな。）
jpnSearchText: （へえ、噂になるだけあるな。）

engChrName: (Wait. She looks kinda familiar...)
engSearchText: (Wait. She looks kinda familiar...)
jpnChrName: （だが、あの娘は……）
jpnSearchText: （だが、あの娘は……）

engChrName: Thank you, everyone! I love you! I hope we meet again!
engSearchText:
Thank you, everyone! I love you! I hope we
meet again!
engHtmlText: ストリートミュージシャン
jpnChrName: サンキューみんな、愛してるよ！ またどこかで会おうね～！
jpnSearchText:
サンキューみんな、愛してるよ！
またどこかで会おうね～！

engChrName: You were great today!
engSearchText: You were great today!
jpnChrName: 今日も良かったぜ！
jpnSearchText: 今日も良かったぜ！

engChrName: I can't wait to hear your next song!
engSearchText: I can't wait to hear your next song!
jpnChrName: 新曲も早く聞きた～い！
jpnSearchText: 新曲も早く聞きた～い！

engChrName: I'll be back again for sure!
engSearchText: I'll be back again for sure!
jpnChrName: 次も楽しみにしてるよ～！
jpnSearchText: 次も楽しみにしてるよ～！

engChrName: Hmm? Sorry, but I'm done for today.
engSearchText: Hmm? Sorry, but I'm done for today.
engHtmlText: ストリートミュージシャン
jpnChrName: ？　今日はもう終わりだよ。
jpnSearchText: ？　今日はもう終わりだよ。

engChrName: Just here to say I liked your performance. Ever thought of putting a single out? It'd sell like hotcakes for sure.
engSearchText:
Just here to say I liked your performance.
Ever thought of putting a single out? It'd sell like
hotcakes for sure.
jpnChrName: なかなかいい歌だったぜ、 シングル出したら結構売れるんじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
なかなかいい歌だったぜ、
シングル出したら結構売れるんじゃねえか？

engChrName: Haha. Thanks for the vote of confidence.
engSearchText: Haha. Thanks for the vote of confidence.
engHtmlText: ストリートミュージシャン
jpnChrName: ハハ、ありがとうお兄さん。 でも音楽の世界はそんなに甘くはないよ。
jpnSearchText:
ハハ、ありがとうお兄さん。
でも音楽の世界はそんなに甘くはないよ。

engChrName: However, there's no shortage of capable artists out there who can write and perform at my level. The music industry is hard to break into.
engSearchText:
However, there's no shortage of capable artists out
there who can write and perform at my level.
The music industry is hard to break into.
engHtmlText: ストリートミュージシャン
jpnChrName: この程度の曲なんていくらでもあるからね。 そう簡単に売れるモンじゃないのさ。
jpnSearchText:
この程度の曲なんていくらでもあるからね。
そう簡単に売れるモンじゃないのさ。

engChrName: That's definitely true for no-name artists.
engSearchText: That's definitely true for no-name artists.
jpnChrName: ま、曲だけだったらそうかもな。
jpnSearchText: ま、曲だけだったらそうかもな。

engChrName: But you and I both know your songs would take the world by storm if you used your real name.
engSearchText:
But you and I both know your songs would take the
world by storm if you used your real name.
jpnChrName: どうして本当の名前で売り出さないんだ？ お前さんならいい線行きそうだが。
jpnSearchText:
どうして本当の名前で売り出さないんだ？
お前さんならいい線行きそうだが。

engChrName: ...Let's continue this conversation elsewhere, shall we?
engSearchText: ...Let's continue this conversation elsewhere, shall we?
engHtmlText: ストリートミュージシャン？
jpnChrName: ………ふふ、場所を変えましょうか。
jpnSearchText: ………ふふ、場所を変えましょうか。

engChrName: I'm surprised you saw through my disguise.
engSearchText: I'm surprised you saw through my disguise.
engHtmlText: ストリートミュージシャン？
jpnChrName: どうして分かったんですか、アークライドさん？
jpnSearchText: どうして分かったんですか、アークライドさん？

engChrName: I even changed the tone of my voice. How'd you know it was me?
engSearchText:
I even changed the tone of my voice. How'd you
know it was me?
jpnChrName: 変装だけじゃなくて、 声色も変えたつもりですけど……
jpnSearchText:
変装だけじゃなくて、
声色も変えたつもりですけど……

engChrName: It mostly came down to luck. I wasn't one hundred percent sure, myself.
engSearchText:
It mostly came down to luck. I wasn't one hundred
percent sure, myself.
jpnChrName: まあぶっちゃけもしかしたらと思って カマをかけただけだが……
jpnSearchText:
まあぶっちゃけもしかしたらと思って
カマをかけただけだが……

engChrName: If I only knew you from your movies, you'd've had me fooled for sure.
engSearchText:
If I only knew you from your movies, you'd've had me
fooled for sure.
jpnChrName: 俺もスクリーンのお前さんしか知らなかったら 完全に気づかなかっただろうな。
jpnSearchText:
俺もスクリーンのお前さんしか知らなかったら
完全に気づかなかっただろうな。

engChrName: But I've seen you up close and personal several times at this point.
engSearchText:
But I've seen you up close and personal several times
at this point.
jpnChrName: サルバッドで何回も近くで話していたから、 そのアドバンテージってヤツだ。
jpnSearchText:
サルバッドで何回も近くで話していたから、
そのアドバンテージってヤツだ。

engChrName: *sigh* I need to get my act together.
engSearchText: *sigh* I need to get my act together.
jpnChrName: ふう……私もまだまだですね。
jpnSearchText: ふう……私もまだまだですね。

engChrName: I've never been found out before now, so maybe I was getting a little careless.
engSearchText:
I've never been found out before now, so maybe I was
getting a little careless.
jpnChrName: こういった活動で今まで誰にも気づかれたことは なかったから、油断もあったかもしれません。
jpnSearchText:
こういった活動で今まで誰にも気づかれたことは
なかったから、油断もあったかもしれません。

engChrName: This isn't the first time I've seen you in a disguise, by the way. I saw you in an Aramis outfit once.
engSearchText:
This isn't the first time I've seen you in a disguise, by
the way. I saw you in an Aramis outfit once.
jpnChrName: 前に映画館で会ったアラミスの学生も お前さんだな？
jpnSearchText:
前に映画館で会ったアラミスの学生も
お前さんだな？

engChrName: Oh, you remember that?
engSearchText: Oh, you remember that?
jpnChrName: あはは……覚えていましたか。
jpnSearchText: あはは……覚えていましたか。

engChrName: Yeah, it left an impression on me. You were actin' different from usual back then, too.
engSearchText:
Yeah, it left an impression on me. You were actin'
different from usual back then, too.
jpnChrName: 妙に印象残ってたんでな。 思えばあの時も全然キャラが違ってたが。
jpnSearchText:
妙に印象残ってたんでな。
思えばあの時も全然キャラが違ってたが。

engChrName: So, you like doin' stuff like this?
engSearchText: So, you like doin' stuff like this?
jpnChrName: 以前からよくこんな事をしていたのか？
jpnSearchText: 以前からよくこんな事をしていたのか？

engChrName: I do. I enjoy going out in disguise from time to time. It makes for good practice as well.
engSearchText:
I do. I enjoy going out in disguise from time to time.
It makes for good practice as well.
jpnChrName: 趣味半分、実益半分と言った所ですね。
jpnSearchText: 趣味半分、実益半分と言った所ですね。

engChrName: When I'm on a set, everyone knows I'm playing a part.
engSearchText:
When I'm on a set, everyone knows I'm playing
a part.
jpnChrName: 撮影の時は周りの皆がちゃんと演技だと 分かっていて私のことを見ていますが……
jpnSearchText:
撮影の時は周りの皆がちゃんと演技だと
分かっていて私のことを見ていますが……

engChrName: But when I'm out in the wild, I can take on any role I want, and no one would know I'm acting.
engSearchText:
But when I'm out in the wild, I can take on any role I
want, and no one would know I'm acting.
jpnChrName: さっきのような場合だと、誰も本当の自分を 知らない環境の中で、まったく別の自分になれる……
jpnSearchText:
さっきのような場合だと、誰も本当の自分を
知らない環境の中で、まったく別の自分になれる……

engChrName: It's made for a fun little hobby.
engSearchText: It's made for a fun little hobby.
jpnChrName: なかなか面白いものですよ？ もちろん演技の練習にもなりますし。
jpnSearchText:
なかなか面白いものですよ？
もちろん演技の練習にもなりますし。

engChrName: So you're acting on the clock and in your downtime?
engSearchText: So you're acting on the clock and in your downtime?
jpnChrName: なるほど、確かにちょうどいいかもな。
jpnSearchText: なるほど、確かにちょうどいいかもな。

engChrName: Damn. Talk about being dedicated to your craft.
engSearchText: Damn. Talk about being dedicated to your craft.
jpnChrName: しかし演じるのが趣味とはねぇ…… さすがトップ映画女優ってところか。
jpnSearchText:
しかし演じるのが趣味とはねぇ……
さすがトップ映画女優ってところか。

engChrName: Haha. I suppose I just can't get enough of it.
engSearchText: Haha. I suppose I just can't get enough of it.
jpnChrName: あはは、そんな大層なものじゃありませんよ。
jpnSearchText: あはは、そんな大層なものじゃありませんよ。

engChrName: Although, it mostly stems from a complex I've had since I was a child. I don't exactly have a distinct self.
engSearchText:
Although, it mostly stems from a complex I've had
since I was a child. I don't exactly have a distinct self.
jpnChrName: 私、小さい頃から、自分というものがないのが コンプレックスでした。
jpnSearchText:
私、小さい頃から、自分というものがないのが
コンプレックスでした。

engChrName: Perhaps that's why I've always wanted to act like someone else—and why I ultimately gravitated to acting.
engSearchText:
Perhaps that's why I've always wanted to act like
someone else—and why I ultimately gravitated
to acting.
jpnChrName: だからかもしれません、“何かを演じる” ことに夢中になって、やりがいを感じるのは。
jpnSearchText:
だからかもしれません、“何かを演じる”
ことに夢中になって、やりがいを感じるのは。

engChrName: Or maybe I just wanted something that'd help me avert my eyes from that uncomfortable truth.
engSearchText:
Or maybe I just wanted something that'd help me
avert my eyes from that uncomfortable truth.
jpnChrName: 女優になったのもそんな なにもない自分を誤魔化すためで──
jpnSearchText:
女優になったのもそんな
なにもない自分を誤魔化すためで──

engChrName: My motivation for choosing this career path is purely selfish. I'm sure my fans would be let down if they knew.
engSearchText:
My motivation for choosing this career path is
purely selfish. I'm sure my fans would be let down if
they knew.
jpnChrName: ファンの皆さんが想像するような 前向きな理由ではないんです。
jpnSearchText:
ファンの皆さんが想像するような
前向きな理由ではないんです。

engChrName: Eh. I wouldn't call that selfish.
engSearchText: Eh. I wouldn't call that selfish.
jpnChrName: 何もない自分を変えたい、か。
jpnSearchText: 何もない自分を変えたい、か。

engChrName: It's normal to want to change somethin' you don't like about yourself.
engSearchText:
It's normal to want to change somethin' you don't like
about yourself.
jpnChrName: そいつは十分、 前向きな理由だと思うけどな。
jpnSearchText:
そいつは十分、
前向きな理由だと思うけどな。

engChrName: You think so?
engSearchText: You think so?
jpnChrName: そういうものですか……？
jpnSearchText: そういうものですか……？

engChrName: I know so.
engSearchText: I know so.
jpnChrName: そういうものだ。
jpnSearchText: そういうものだ。

engChrName: That said, your hobby's only gonna get harder the higher up you get on the ladder of fame.
engSearchText:
That said, your hobby's only gonna get harder the
higher up you get on the ladder of fame.
jpnChrName: まあともあれ、お前さんの その趣味兼実益──
jpnSearchText:
まあともあれ、お前さんの
その趣味兼実益──

engChrName: But I doubt you need me to tell you that.
engSearchText: But I doubt you need me to tell you that.
jpnChrName: 名前が売れるようになってからは ますます難易度が上がってるんじゃねえのか？
jpnSearchText:
名前が売れるようになってからは
ますます難易度が上がってるんじゃねえのか？

engChrName: Yes, I know that all too well.
engSearchText: Yes, I know that all too well.
jpnChrName: はい、実はそうなんです。
jpnSearchText: はい、実はそうなんです。

engChrName: The risk of me getting recognized will only grow as I get more famous...
engSearchText:
The risk of me getting recognized will only grow as I
get more famous...
jpnChrName: ますます難しくなってしまって──
jpnSearchText: ますます難しくなってしまって──

engChrName: ...but the mounting challenge will only serve to make success all the more sweet.
engSearchText:
...but the mounting challenge will only serve to make
success all the more sweet.
jpnChrName: すごく、挑戦のし甲斐があるといいますかっ。
jpnSearchText: すごく、挑戦のし甲斐があるといいますかっ。

engChrName: All that talk about you not havin' a distinct self was a big, fat lie.
engSearchText:
All that talk about you not havin' a distinct self was a
big, fat lie.
jpnChrName: ったく…… ちゃんと持ってるじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
ったく……
ちゃんと持ってるじゃねえか。

engChrName: What do you...?
engSearchText: What do you...?
jpnChrName: え？
jpnSearchText: え？

engChrName: You said it yourself. 'The challenge makes success all the more sweet.'
engSearchText:
You said it yourself. 'The challenge makes success all
the more sweet.'
jpnChrName: “自分がない”なんてとんでもねえって話さ。
jpnSearchText: “自分がない”なんてとんでもねえって話さ。

engChrName: Those are the words of someone who gets fired up when the odds are stacked against them.
engSearchText:
Those are the words of someone who gets fired up
when the odds are stacked against them.
jpnChrName: ハードルが上がって、むしろ “演じること”への欲望が湧き上がる……
jpnSearchText:
ハードルが上がって、むしろ
“演じること”への欲望が湧き上がる……

engChrName: That's a pretty unique quality—and it's one that no one I know has.
engSearchText:
That's a pretty unique quality—and it's one that no
one I know has.
jpnChrName: そんな奴が何人もいるかっての。
jpnSearchText: そんな奴が何人もいるかっての。

engChrName: Heehee. It's not half as unique as your willingness to turn people's words against them.
engSearchText:
Heehee. It's not half as unique as your willingness to
turn people's words against them.
jpnChrName: ふふっ……アークライドさんって、 結構屁理屈が得意なんですね？
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ……アークライドさんって、
結構屁理屈が得意なんですね？

engChrName: Hey, I'm just tryin' to help a friend believe in themselves a little.
engSearchText:
Hey, I'm just tryin' to help a friend believe in
themselves a little.
jpnChrName: 屁理屈でもなんでもいいのさ。 自分（てめぇ）自身の納得がいけばそれでな。
jpnSearchText:
屁理屈でもなんでもいいのさ。
自分（てめぇ）自身の納得がいけばそれでな。

engChrName: Oh, I know. I'm only teasing you a little.
engSearchText: Oh, I know. I'm only teasing you a little.
jpnChrName: ふふ、そうかもしれません。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、そうかもしれません。

engChrName: Really, though, thank you. I feel better about this now.
engSearchText:
Really, though, thank you. I feel better about
this now.
jpnChrName: おかげで、ちょっとだけ スッキリできた気分です。
jpnSearchText:
おかげで、ちょっとだけ
スッキリできた気分です。

engChrName: Glad to help.
engSearchText: Glad to help.
jpnChrName: それなら俺も声を掛けた 甲斐があったってもんだ。
jpnSearchText:
それなら俺も声を掛けた
甲斐があったってもんだ。

engChrName: Anyway, please don't tell anyone about this hobby of mine.
engSearchText:
Anyway, please don't tell anyone about this hobby
of mine.
jpnChrName: あっ、でも私の変装のことは 誰にも言わないでくださいね。
jpnSearchText:
あっ、でも私の変装のことは
誰にも言わないでくださいね。

engChrName: I'd like it to be our special little secret. ♪
engSearchText: I'd like it to be our special little secret. ♪
jpnChrName: ２人だけの秘密ですから♪
jpnSearchText: ２人だけの秘密ですから♪

engChrName: Uhh... Sure thing.
engSearchText: Uhh... Sure thing.
jpnChrName: っ……ああ、分かったぜ。
jpnSearchText: っ……ああ、分かったぜ。

engChrName: (She really knows how to knock you off your feet. Guess she ain't an award-winning actress for nothin'.)
engSearchText:
(She really knows how to knock you off your feet.
Guess she ain't an award-winning actress for nothin'.)
jpnChrName: （この破壊力……   やっぱすげえな、女優ってのは。）
jpnSearchText:
（この破壊力……
やっぱすげえな、女優ってのは。）

engChrName: After Nina departed, Van resumed his patrol once more.
engSearchText:
After Nina departed, Van resumed his patrol
once more.
jpnChrName: その後、変装し直したニナが去ってから、 改めて巡回を再開したのだった。
jpnSearchText:
その後、変装し直したニナが去ってから、
改めて巡回を再開したのだった。

engChrName: Sylvie, who had been previously consulted about the rifle's damages, agreed to assist with its repairs.
engSearchText:
Sylvie, who had been previously consulted about the
rifle's damages, agreed to assist with its repairs.
jpnChrName: かねてより相談していたシルヴィも 修理を手伝ってくれることになり……
jpnSearchText:
かねてより相談していたシルヴィも
修理を手伝ってくれることになり……

engChrName: Van watched over the whole process and helped with basic tasks like polishing as needed.
engSearchText:
Van watched over the whole process and helped with
basic tasks like polishing as needed.
jpnChrName: ヴァンも磨きなどの単純な作業を手伝いつつ ライフルの修理を見守るのだった。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンも磨きなどの単純な作業を手伝いつつ
ライフルの修理を見守るのだった。

engChrName: Eventually...
engSearchText: Eventually...
jpnChrName: そして──
jpnSearchText: <C1>そして──

engChrName: Well, would you look at that?
engSearchText: Well, would you look at that?
jpnChrName: 出来た……
jpnSearchText: 出来た……

engChrName: It's right back to the way it was. Ain't that somethin'?
engSearchText: It's right back to the way it was. Ain't that somethin'?
jpnChrName: ほう、コイツはすげえな…… すっかり元通りじゃねぇか。
jpnSearchText:
ほう、コイツはすげえな……
すっかり元通りじゃねぇか。

engChrName: It even has the same custom rifle muzzle she used back in her Zephyr days.
engSearchText:
It even has the same custom rifle muzzle she used
back in her Zephyr days.
jpnChrName: 銃口側のカスタムの選び方は 《西風の旅団》の頃と同じだったみたいだね。
jpnSearchText:
銃口側のカスタムの選び方は
《西風の旅団》の頃と同じだったみたいだね。

engChrName: It maximized its firepower and improved its accuracy.
engSearchText: It maximized its firepower and improved its accuracy.
jpnChrName: こうすることで最大限の威力を出しつつ 照準がブレにくくなる──
jpnSearchText:
こうすることで最大限の威力を出しつつ
照準がブレにくくなる──

engChrName: She really liked talking about that thing.
engSearchText: She really liked talking about that thing.
jpnChrName: 昔、そう言って皆にも カスタムの選び方を伝授してたな。
jpnSearchText:
昔、そう言って皆にも
カスタムの選び方を伝授してたな。

engChrName: I can see why.
engSearchText: I can see why.
jpnChrName: そうだったんですね…… 確かに勉強になる組み合わせです。
jpnSearchText:
そうだったんですね……
確かに勉強になる組み合わせです。

engChrName: It's been customized in other ways, too. The weight distribution probably makes it unwieldy to anyone who isn't a rifle pro.
engSearchText:
It's been customized in other ways, too. The weight
distribution probably makes it unwieldy to anyone
who isn't a rifle pro.
jpnChrName: その他の部分も、バランスのとり方が独特で…… 相当な銃使いじゃないと使いこなせなさそうです。
jpnSearchText:
その他の部分も、バランスのとり方が独特で……
相当な銃使いじゃないと使いこなせなさそうです。

engChrName: But Aida had no problem handling it. She and this rifle were a match made in heaven.
engSearchText:
But Aida had no problem handling it. She and this
rifle were a match made in heaven.
jpnChrName: まさにアイーダさんが愛用していたライフル、 という感じがしますね。
jpnSearchText:
まさにアイーダさんが愛用していたライフル、
という感じがしますね。

engChrName: No doubt about that. I'm glad we were able to get it fixed up for her.
engSearchText:
No doubt about that. I'm glad we were able to get it
fixed up for her.
jpnChrName: そだね……だからこそ 無事に直せてよかった。
jpnSearchText:
そだね……だからこそ
無事に直せてよかった。

engChrName: Heh. The Flameeater couldn't have asked for a better pair of sisters.
engSearchText:
Heh. The Flameeater couldn't have asked for a better
pair of sisters.
jpnChrName: ハッ、火喰鳥も 出来た妹分どもを持ったもんだ。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、火喰鳥も
出来た妹分どもを持ったもんだ。

engChrName: So, what're you plannin' to do with it now?
engSearchText: So, what're you plannin' to do with it now?
jpnChrName: それで、この後コイツはどうするつもりだ？
jpnSearchText: それで、この後コイツはどうするつもりだ？

engChrName: That's a good question.
engSearchText: That's a good question.
jpnChrName: そだね……
jpnSearchText: そだね……

engChrName: How would you feel about using it, Feri?
engSearchText: How would you feel about using it, Feri?
jpnChrName: フェリ、一応聞くけど使ってみたい？
jpnSearchText: フェリ、一応聞くけど使ってみたい？

engChrName: I don't think a rifle of this size would suit me, to be honest.
engSearchText:
I don't think a rifle of this size would suit me, to
be honest.
jpnChrName: いえ……ここまでの大型ライフルは わたしの戦闘スタイルには合わないかと。
jpnSearchText:
いえ……ここまでの大型ライフルは
わたしの戦闘スタイルには合わないかと。

engChrName: Aida once told me to remain true to my own style. I don't think I'd be honoring her if I changed mine to adapt to her weapon.
engSearchText:
Aida once told me to remain true to my own style.
I don't think I'd be honoring her if I changed mine to
adapt to her weapon.
jpnChrName: アイーダさんにもいつか言われたんです。 自分自身のスタイルを忘れるなって。
jpnSearchText:
アイーダさんにもいつか言われたんです。
自分自身のスタイルを忘れるなって。

engChrName: Figured you'd say something like that. It doesn't fit mine, either.
engSearchText:
Figured you'd say something like that. It doesn't fit
mine, either.
jpnChrName: ん、わたしも同じかな。
jpnSearchText: ん、わたしも同じかな。

engChrName: I have a better idea. How about we deliver it to the current members of Zephyr?
engSearchText:
I have a better idea. How about we deliver it to the
current members of Zephyr?
jpnChrName: だから──このライフルは今の《西風》の 皆さんの元に届けてもらえませんか？
jpnSearchText:
だから──このライフルは今の《西風》の
皆さんの元に届けてもらえませんか？

engChrName: Ah, yeah. I heard they reformed after the war.
engSearchText: Ah, yeah. I heard they reformed after the war.
jpnChrName: 今の……そういえばあの大戦の後に 再編しているって話だったか。
jpnSearchText:
今の……そういえばあの大戦の後に
再編しているって話だったか。

engChrName: Yep. It's changed hands since then. Now it's being led by two of its former regimental commanders, Xeno and Leo.
engSearchText:
Yep. It's changed hands since then. Now it's being led
by two of its former regimental commanders, Xeno
and Leo.
jpnChrName: ん、ゼノとレオっていう 元連隊長たちを中心にね。
jpnSearchText:
ん、ゼノとレオっていう
元連隊長たちを中心にね。

engChrName: I'm fine with giving it over to them, but are you sure that's what you want?
engSearchText:
I'm fine with giving it over to them, but are you sure
that's what you want?
jpnChrName: 構わないけど……いいの？
jpnSearchText: 構わないけど……いいの？

engChrName: Yes. I've thought long and hard about it.
engSearchText: Yes. I've thought long and hard about it.
jpnChrName: はいっ、わたしも色々考えましたけど……
jpnSearchText: はいっ、わたしも色々考えましたけど……

engChrName: In her final moments, Aida said the names of her Zephyr comrades—including you.
engSearchText:
In her final moments, Aida said the names of her
Zephyr comrades—including you.
jpnChrName: アイーダさんは最期にフィーさんも含めた、 《西風》の方々の名前を口にしていました。
jpnSearchText:
アイーダさんは最期にフィーさんも含めた、
《西風》の方々の名前を口にしていました。

engChrName: I can tell she treasured her family there.
engSearchText: I can tell she treasured her family there.
jpnChrName: きっと本当に大切な場所で、 家族だったんだと思います。
jpnSearchText:
きっと本当に大切な場所で、
家族だったんだと思います。

engChrName: That's why I want to return it to them.
engSearchText: That's why I want to return it to them.
jpnChrName: だから、ちゃんと帰してあげたいんです。
jpnSearchText: だから、ちゃんと帰してあげたいんです。

engChrName: Okay. That works for me.
engSearchText: Okay. That works for me.
jpnChrName: そっか……分かった。
jpnSearchText: そっか……分かった。

engChrName: I'll go ahead and arrange for it to be delivered, then.
engSearchText: I'll go ahead and arrange for it to be delivered, then.
jpnChrName: それなら早速 配達の依頼をしようかな。
jpnSearchText:
それなら早速
配達の依頼をしようかな。

engChrName: Oh? How're you gonna do that?
engSearchText: Oh? How're you gonna do that?
jpnChrName: 配達って、どうすんだ？
jpnSearchText: 配達って、どうすんだ？

engChrName: You do realize a civilian courier can't just waltz into Zephyr turf with a rifle in hand, right?
engSearchText:
You do realize a civilian courier can't just waltz into
Zephyr turf with a rifle in hand, right?
jpnChrName: 送るブツも宛先も、カタギの配達業者の 手に負えるモンじゃなさそうだが。
jpnSearchText:
送るブツも宛先も、カタギの配達業者の
手に負えるモンじゃなさそうだが。

engChrName: Well aware. That's not what I had in mind.
engSearchText: Well aware. That's not what I had in mind.
jpnChrName: そう、だからこそっていう 感じのツテがあってね。
jpnSearchText:
そう、だからこそっていう
感じのツテがあってね。

engChrName: I know someone named Josette who owns a delivery company. Her people should be able to get it over to them without much trouble.
engSearchText:
I know someone named Josette who owns a
delivery company. Her people should be able to get it
over to them without much trouble.
jpnChrName: 彼女（ジョゼット）たちに任せれば 間違いなく届けてくれるはず。
jpnSearchText:
彼女（ジョゼット）たちに任せれば
間違いなく届けてくれるはず。

engChrName: Ah, I've heard of them. They're based in Liberl, yeah?
engSearchText: Ah, I've heard of them. They're based in Liberl, yeah?
jpnChrName: ハッ……なるほどな。 リベールに居を構えてるっつう。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……なるほどな。
リベールに居を構えてるっつう。

engChrName: You sure know a lotta people, don'tcha?
engSearchText: You sure know a lotta people, don'tcha?
jpnChrName: お前さんも凄まじい顔の広さだな？
jpnSearchText: お前さんも凄まじい顔の広さだな？

engChrName: I could say the same about you.
engSearchText: I could say the same about you.
jpnChrName: お互い様。
jpnSearchText: お互い様。

engChrName: Fie got in contact with the courier, who happily accepted the task and got straight to work.
engSearchText:
Fie got in contact with the courier, who happily
accepted the task and got straight to work.
jpnChrName: その後、フィーが連絡した“配達業者”は すぐにでも手配すると快諾してくれ……
jpnSearchText:
その後、フィーが連絡した“配達業者”は
すぐにでも手配すると快諾してくれ……

engChrName: Afterwards, she reached out to Zephyr—who were in a remote region of the continent—to give them a heads up.
engSearchText:
Afterwards, she reached out to Zephyr—who were in
a remote region of the continent—to give them a
heads up.
jpnChrName: 現在、大陸の辺境にいるという 《西風》にも連絡を入れておく事となった。
jpnSearchText:
現在、大陸の辺境にいるという
《西風》にも連絡を入れておく事となった。

engChrName: It won't be long before it's delivered, so can you stick around your base camp for a while longer?
engSearchText:
It won't be long before it's delivered, so can you stick
around your base camp for a while longer?
jpnChrName: というわけで、すぐ届くと思うから もう少し拠点に残って貰えると助かる。
jpnSearchText:
というわけで、すぐ届くと思うから
もう少し拠点に残って貰えると助かる。

engChrName: Sure thing. We had to kill some time before our next job anyway.
engSearchText:
Sure thing. We had to kill some time before our next
job anyway.
jpnChrName: ……はは、了解や。 次の仕事まで時間もあるしええで。
jpnSearchText:
……はは、了解や。
次の仕事まで時間もあるしええで。

engChrName: A jaeger's weapon is their very soul. We will take good care of it.
engSearchText:
A jaeger's weapon is their very soul. We will take
good care of it.
jpnChrName: 得物は猟兵にとっての魂…… しかと受け取らせてもらうとしよう。
jpnSearchText:
得物は猟兵にとっての魂……
しかと受け取らせてもらうとしよう。

engChrName: The three of us fought side by side many times as regimental commanders. She is dearly missed.
engSearchText:
The three of us fought side by side many times as
regimental commanders. She is dearly missed.
jpnChrName: 同じ連隊長として何度も背中を預けた仲だ。 改めて弔いもさせてもらおう。
jpnSearchText:
同じ連隊長として何度も背中を預けた仲だ。
改めて弔いもさせてもらおう。

engChrName: The Eisenschild told us about what happened to her. It's strange to think a part of her will be comin' back to us.
engSearchText:
The Eisenschild told us about what happened to her.
It's strange to think a part of her will be comin' back
to us.
jpnChrName: アイーダの顛末はアイゼンシルト方面から 聞いとったが……そうか、帰ってくるんやな。
jpnSearchText:
アイーダの顛末はアイゼンシルト方面から
聞いとったが……そうか、帰ってくるんやな。

engChrName: I'd like to think she's sharin' a laugh and a drink with the boss on the other side right about now.
engSearchText:
I'd like to think she's sharin' a laugh and a drink with
the boss on the other side right about now.
jpnChrName: 今頃、あの世で団長と酒でも飲み交わして 積もる話でもしとるかもしれんな。
jpnSearchText:
今頃、あの世で団長と酒でも飲み交わして
積もる話でもしとるかもしれんな。

engChrName: Probably stressing all about her little sisters, too. The worrywart.
engSearchText:
Probably stressing all about her little sisters, too.
The worrywart.
jpnChrName: それこそ、まだまだ放って置けん 二人の“妹分”の話とか。
jpnSearchText:
それこそ、まだまだ放って置けん
二人の“妹分”の話とか。

engChrName: Heh. Wouldn't shock me.
engSearchText: Heh. Wouldn't shock me.
jpnChrName: ふふ……だといいけど。
jpnSearchText: ふふ……だといいけど。

engChrName: It was good talking to you both again. See you around.
engSearchText:
It was good talking to you both again. See
you around.
jpnChrName: それじゃ、二人ともまたね。
jpnSearchText: それじゃ、二人ともまたね。

engChrName: Likewise. Give our regards to Aida's other little sister.
engSearchText: Likewise. Give our regards to Aida's other little sister.
jpnChrName: ああ、もう１人の“妹分”にも よろしく伝えておいてくれ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、もう１人の“妹分”にも
よろしく伝えておいてくれ。

engChrName: Sounds like she's gotten herself caught up in somethin' fishy. Tell her to take care of herself.
engSearchText:
Sounds like she's gotten herself caught up in
somethin' fishy. Tell her to take care of herself.
jpnChrName: なんや“きな臭い案件”で大変だったらしいな。 身体に気ぃつけや～。
jpnSearchText:
なんや“きな臭い案件”で大変だったらしいな。
身体に気ぃつけや～。

engChrName: Well, that settles that.
engSearchText: Well, that settles that.
jpnChrName: ハッ、話はついたみたいだな。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、話はついたみたいだな。

engChrName: You must be one of the only bracers in the guild who keeps in touch with jaegers.
engSearchText:
You must be one of the only bracers in the guild who
keeps in touch with jaegers.
jpnChrName: 遊撃士と猟兵なのに 今でも付き合いがあるんですね。
jpnSearchText:
遊撃士と猟兵なのに
今でも付き合いがあるんですね。

engChrName: We don't talk that often, but they reach out to me every now and then.
engSearchText:
We don't talk that often, but they reach out to me
every now and then.
jpnChrName: ん、たまに向こうから 連絡が来たりする程度だけどね。
jpnSearchText:
ん、たまに向こうから
連絡が来たりする程度だけどね。

engChrName: Now that we've got that squared away, I think I'm gonna drop by a café.
engSearchText:
Now that we've got that squared away, I think I'm
gonna drop by a café.
jpnChrName: ……良かったらこの後、 もう少しだけ付き合わない？
jpnSearchText:
……良かったらこの後、
もう少しだけ付き合わない？

engChrName: Wanna come with? I can share some stories about Aida and Zephyr, if you're interested.
engSearchText:
Wanna come with? I can share some stories about
Aida and Zephyr, if you're interested.
jpnChrName: 《西風》やアイーダのこと…… 改めてちゃんと話したい気分。
jpnSearchText:
《西風》やアイーダのこと……
改めてちゃんと話したい気分。

engChrName: Really?! Oh, I'd love that!
engSearchText: Really?! Oh, I'd love that!
jpnChrName: ……！　えへへ、勿論ですっ！
jpnSearchText: ……！　えへへ、勿論ですっ！

engChrName: And I can tell you some about my people and our village.
engSearchText:
And I can tell you some about my people and
our village.
jpnChrName: わたしの方こそ里やクルガの事を 色々話させてくださいっ。
jpnSearchText:
わたしの方こそ里やクルガの事を
色々話させてくださいっ。

engChrName: Cool. I'd like to hear all about them.
engSearchText: Cool. I'd like to hear all about them.
jpnChrName: ん、楽しみにさせてもらう。
jpnSearchText: ん、楽しみにさせてもらう。

engChrName: Fie and Feri went off to enjoy some tea and conversation.
engSearchText:
Fie and Feri went off to enjoy some tea
and conversation.
jpnChrName: その後、二人でお茶をしに行った フィーたちを見送り……
jpnSearchText:
その後、二人でお茶をしに行った
フィーたちを見送り……

engChrName: Once Feri returned, the group got back to work.
engSearchText: Once Feri returned, the group got back to work.
jpnChrName: フェリが戻った頃に 改めて解決業務を再開するのだった。
jpnSearchText:
フェリが戻った頃に
改めて解決業務を再開するのだった。

engChrName: Looks like my guess was right on the mark.
engSearchText: Looks like my guess was right on the mark.
jpnChrName: やれやれ、予想通りか……
jpnSearchText: やれやれ、予想通りか……

engChrName: Somethin' on your mind, Inspector?
engSearchText: Somethin' on your mind, Inspector?
jpnChrName: よっ、やけに 神妙な顔してるじゃないか。
jpnSearchText:
よっ、やけに
神妙な顔してるじゃないか。

engChrName: ...What do you want?
engSearchText: ...What do you want?
jpnChrName: ……お前か、何の用だ。
jpnSearchText: ……お前か、何の用だ。

engChrName: Just been looking into a spicy rumor that's been floatin' around.
engSearchText:
Just been looking into a spicy rumor that's been
floatin' around.
jpnChrName: いや、最近妙な噂を耳にしてね。
jpnSearchText: いや、最近妙な噂を耳にしてね。

engChrName: Something about a scary-looking man who's prowling the night searching for little girl toys.
engSearchText:
Something about a scary-looking man who's prowling
the night searching for little girl toys.
jpnChrName: 夜中に女児向けの玩具を探し回ってる 強面の男が出没するっていう。
jpnSearchText:
夜中に女児向けの玩具を探し回ってる
強面の男が出没するっていう。

engChrName: Hey, don't worry. I don't judge. Everyone's got at least one weird hobby or two.
engSearchText:
Hey, don't worry. I don't judge. Everyone's got at
least one weird hobby or two.
jpnChrName: 一応気になって調べてたんだが いや～、アンタにそんな趣味がねえ。
jpnSearchText:
一応気になって調べてたんだが
いや～、アンタにそんな趣味がねえ。

engChrName: I-It's not a hobby, damn it. I ought to find the lowlife scumbag who spread that rumor and cuff them!
engSearchText:
I-It's not a hobby, damn it. I ought to find the lowlife
scumbag who spread that rumor and cuff them!
jpnChrName: な、なんだその噂は…… 誤解を誘う言い方をするんじゃない！
jpnSearchText:
な、なんだその噂は……
誤解を誘う言い方をするんじゃない！

engChrName: All right, I've had my fun. There's more to the story, right?
engSearchText:
All right, I've had my fun. There's more to the
story, right?
jpnChrName: 冗談だ冗談。 アンタのことだ、何か理由があんだろ？
jpnSearchText:
冗談だ冗談。
アンタのことだ、何か理由があんだろ？

engChrName: What, you tryin' to placate your adolescent daughter after upsetting her?
engSearchText:
What, you tryin' to placate your adolescent daughter
