after upsetting her?
jpnChrName: そうだな、思春期の娘の機嫌でも損ねて その埋め合わせってところか？
jpnSearchText:
そうだな、思春期の娘の機嫌でも損ねて
その埋め合わせってところか？

engChrName: ...Don't tell me I just hit the jackpot.
engSearchText: ...Don't tell me I just hit the jackpot.
jpnChrName: あれ……まさかズバリ当てちまったか？
jpnSearchText: あれ……まさかズバリ当てちまったか？

engChrName: Not quite. My daughter's still Sunday School age.
engSearchText: Not quite. My daughter's still Sunday School age.
jpnChrName: ……“思春期”はハズレだ。 まだ日曜学校の年少組だからな。
jpnSearchText:
……“思春期”はハズレだ。
まだ日曜学校の年少組だからな。

engChrName: So you couldn't be there for her birthday, huh?
engSearchText: So you couldn't be there for her birthday, huh?
jpnChrName: ──娘の誕生日をすっぽかしちまった、か。
jpnSearchText: ──娘の誕生日をすっぽかしちまった、か。

engChrName: Yeah, just about any little kid's gonna be upset about that. You're lucky she's mature enough to not throw a tantrum over it.
engSearchText:
Yeah, just about any little kid's gonna be upset
about that. You're lucky she's mature enough to not
throw a tantrum over it.
jpnChrName: そりゃ傷つくわなぁ。 わんわん泣かないだけ大人だぜ？
jpnSearchText:
そりゃ傷つくわなぁ。
わんわん泣かないだけ大人だぜ？

engChrName: I don't need you to tell me that.
engSearchText: I don't need you to tell me that.
jpnChrName: 言われなくても分かってる。
jpnSearchText: 言われなくても分かってる。

engChrName: I don't get to spend much time with her, so I promised I'd absolutely be there for her birthday.
engSearchText:
I don't get to spend much time with her, so I
promised I'd absolutely be there for her birthday.
jpnChrName: ……普段なかなか構ってやれない分、 誕生日は絶対に空ける約束をしてたんだがな。
jpnSearchText:
……普段なかなか構ってやれない分、
誕生日は絶対に空ける約束をしてたんだがな。

engChrName: You should know better than to make promises you might not be able to keep.
engSearchText:
You should know better than to make promises you
might not be able to keep.
jpnChrName: ハッ、そんな約束は安易にしないこった。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、そんな約束は安易にしないこった。

engChrName: The only absolute in this world is that there are no absolutes.
engSearchText:
The only absolute in this world is that there are
no absolutes.
jpnChrName: 絶対は絶対じゃないのが、絶対ってな。
jpnSearchText: 絶対は絶対じゃないのが、絶対ってな。

engChrName: All right. I've just about had enough of you.
engSearchText: All right. I've just about had enough of you.
jpnChrName: ええい、お前と言葉遊びをしてる暇は無い。
jpnSearchText: ええい、お前と言葉遊びをしてる暇は無い。

engChrName: I'm going to head to another shop. This one didn't have what I wanted.
engSearchText:
I'm going to head to another shop. This one didn't
have what I wanted.
jpnChrName: 今から別の店を探しに行く。 ここでは手に入らなかったからな。
jpnSearchText:
今から別の店を探しに行く。
ここでは手に入らなかったからな。

engChrName: What're you tryin' to find, anyway?
engSearchText: What're you tryin' to find, anyway?
jpnChrName: 何がお目当てなんだ？
jpnSearchText: 何がお目当てなんだ？

engChrName: ...Why do you want to know? So you can fling more insults my way?
engSearchText:
...Why do you want to know? So you can fling more
insults my way?
jpnChrName: ……なぜお前に言わなきゃならん。
jpnSearchText: ……なぜお前に言わなきゃならん。

engChrName: 'Cause I wanted to help you find it.
engSearchText: 'Cause I wanted to help you find it.
jpnChrName: 残念だなぁ、プレゼント探しを 手伝えるかもしれねぇのに。
jpnSearchText:
残念だなぁ、プレゼント探しを
手伝えるかもしれねぇのに。

engChrName: Figured this was a perfect opportunity to put a cop in my debt.
engSearchText:
Figured this was a perfect opportunity to put a cop in
my debt.
jpnChrName: 警察にまた恩を売る、良い機会だったんだが。
jpnSearchText: 警察にまた恩を売る、良い機会だったんだが。

engChrName: That tone of yours is exactly what I despi—
engSearchText: That tone of yours is exactly what I despi—
jpnChrName: 俺はお前のそういう態度がだな──
jpnSearchText: 俺はお前のそういう態度がだな──

engChrName: You must really wanna put a smile back on your daughter's face—or you wouldn't be roamin' the streets like a bloodhound on the hunt.
engSearchText:
You must really wanna put a smile back on your
daughter's face—or you wouldn't be roamin' the
streets like a bloodhound on the hunt.
jpnChrName: 一刻も早く娘さんの笑顔を取り戻したいんだろ？ 仕事終わりに血眼になって街を回るくらいには。
jpnSearchText:
一刻も早く娘さんの笑顔を取り戻したいんだろ？
仕事終わりに血眼になって街を回るくらいには。

engChrName: And I'm guessin' you don't wanna ask the guild or your subordinates for help when they're so busy. But I got all the time in the world.
engSearchText:
And I'm guessin' you don't wanna ask the guild or
your subordinates for help when they're so busy. But I
got all the time in the world.
jpnChrName: 多忙な警察やギルドの手を煩わす仕事じゃない── そして受けるに足る“筋”は充分だ。
jpnSearchText:
多忙な警察やギルドの手を煩わす仕事じゃない──
そして受けるに足る“筋”は充分だ。

engChrName: I'll help you out of this jam for dirt cheap—just this once. Whaddaya say?
engSearchText:
I'll help you out of this jam for dirt cheap—just
this once. Whaddaya say?
jpnChrName: 今なら格安で引き受けてやってもいいんだぜ？
jpnSearchText: 今なら格安で引き受けてやってもいいんだぜ？

engChrName: Bah. You're as unpredictable as ever.
engSearchText: Bah. You're as unpredictable as ever.
jpnChrName: チッ……調子の狂うヤツだ。
jpnSearchText: チッ……調子の狂うヤツだ。

engChrName: I'm looking for a limited edition dressup doll. It has a special outfit.
engSearchText:
I'm looking for a limited edition dressup doll. It has a
special outfit.
jpnChrName: ……探しているのは、女の子の着せ替え人形だ。 ドレスを着た限定品のな。
jpnSearchText:
……探しているのは、女の子の着せ替え人形だ。
ドレスを着た限定品のな。

engChrName: My daughter wants it badly, but unfortunately, so does everyone else. They're out of stock all over the city. Trust me, I checked.
engSearchText:
My daughter wants it badly, but unfortunately, so
does everyone else. They're out of stock all over
the city. Trust me, I checked.
jpnChrName: 娘が欲しがっていたんだが人気商品らしくてな。 どこも売り切れが相次いでいるようだ。
jpnSearchText:
娘が欲しがっていたんだが人気商品らしくてな。
どこも売り切れが相次いでいるようだ。

engChrName: So even an inspector like you is willin' to cast aside his pride for his beloved daughter.
engSearchText:
So even an inspector like you is willin' to cast
aside his pride for his beloved daughter.
jpnChrName: クク、首都警察の頑固な警部殿も、 愛娘の為にプライドを曲げたか。
jpnSearchText:
クク、首都警察の頑固な警部殿も、
愛娘の為にプライドを曲げたか。

engChrName: I think I might know just the place.
engSearchText: I think I might know just the place.
jpnChrName: となると、あの場所なら 手に入るかもしれねぇな。
jpnSearchText:
となると、あの場所なら
手に入るかもしれねぇな。

engChrName: You do?! Tell me where it is, now!
engSearchText: You do?! Tell me where it is, now!
jpnChrName: アテがあるのか……！？ だったら場所だけ教えろ、すぐに──
jpnSearchText:
アテがあるのか……！？
だったら場所だけ教えろ、すぐに──

engChrName: Easy. You can't go there alone. If you do, you won't be able to get your hands on it, and you'll probably land yourself in a real mess.
engSearchText:
Easy. You can't go there alone. If you do, you won't
be able to get your hands on it, and you'll probably
land yourself in a real mess.
jpnChrName: まあ待て、アンタ１人じゃ無理だ。 手に入らない挙句トラブるのがオチだろう。
jpnSearchText:
まあ待て、アンタ１人じゃ無理だ。
手に入らない挙句トラブるのがオチだろう。

engChrName: If people there find out who you are, you'll be gettin' sandbagged in no time.
engSearchText:
If people there find out who you are, you'll be gettin'
sandbagged in no time.
jpnChrName: うっかりアンタの素性がバレでもしたら ならず者どもに袋叩きに遭う可能性だってある。
jpnSearchText:
うっかりアンタの素性がバレでもしたら
ならず者どもに袋叩きに遭う可能性だってある。

engChrName: You don't mean...
engSearchText: You don't mean...
jpnChrName: っ……まさか……
jpnSearchText: っ……まさか……

engChrName: I'll be having dinner with my family today for the first time in a while.
engSearchText:
I'll be having dinner with my family today for the first
time in a while.
jpnChrName: ……この後、久しぶりに 家族でディナーの約束でな。
jpnSearchText:
……この後、久しぶりに
家族でディナーの約束でな。

engChrName: I really want to hand my daughter the doll then and there.
engSearchText:
I really want to hand my daughter the doll then
and there.
jpnChrName: 娘には何が何でも その場で人形を渡してやりたい。
jpnSearchText:
娘には何が何でも
その場で人形を渡してやりたい。

engChrName: You may lead the way. I can protect myself, though.
engSearchText: You may lead the way. I can protect myself, though.
jpnChrName: 案内しろ── ただし自分の身は自分で守る。
jpnSearchText:
案内しろ──
ただし自分の身は自分で守る。

engChrName: Got'cha.
engSearchText: Got'cha.
jpnChrName: 決まりだな。
jpnSearchText: 決まりだな。

engChrName: Van led Daswani to the location he had in mind.
engSearchText: Van led Daswani to the location he had in mind.
jpnChrName: その後、ヴァンはダスワニを連れて 目的の場所へと向かった。
jpnSearchText:
その後、ヴァンはダスワニを連れて
目的の場所へと向かった。

engChrName: Well, we got it in the end.
engSearchText: Well, we got it in the end.
jpnChrName: どうにか無事に手に入ったな。
jpnSearchText: どうにか無事に手に入ったな。

engChrName: Shame it ended up costing more than the retail price, but it beats not gettin' it at all.
engSearchText:
Shame it ended up costing more than the retail price,
but it beats not gettin' it at all.
jpnChrName: 余計なミラはちょいとかかっちまったが、 まあそこは割り切ってくれ。
jpnSearchText:
余計なミラはちょいとかかっちまったが、
まあそこは割り切ってくれ。

engChrName: True. It'd have costed me an arm and a leg were it not for your quick wit.
engSearchText:
True. It'd have costed me an arm and a leg were it not
for your quick wit.
jpnChrName: 今さらゴチャゴチャ言わん。 ……お前の悪ノリが効いたおかげだな。
jpnSearchText:
今さらゴチャゴチャ言わん。
……お前の悪ノリが効いたおかげだな。

engChrName: I think we owe it to that terrifying scowl on your face. He'd've never bought my story otherwise.
engSearchText:
I think we owe it to that terrifying scowl on your face.
He'd've never bought my story otherwise.
jpnChrName: いやいや、アンタの 凄みのあるツラの賜物だぜ？
jpnSearchText:
いやいや、アンタの
凄みのあるツラの賜物だぜ？

engChrName: You seriously need to work on your compliments.
engSearchText: You seriously need to work on your compliments.
jpnChrName: ふん、やかましい。
jpnSearchText: ふん、やかましい。

engChrName: Anyway, you really are a strange one. I doubt anyone in the history of the Blacklight District has asked a question like that one.
engSearchText:
Anyway, you really are a strange one. I doubt anyone
in the history of the Blacklight District has asked a
question like that one.
jpnChrName: ……しかし、アンタも変わったお人だな。 黒芒街の人間にあんなことを聞くなんざ。
jpnSearchText:
……しかし、アンタも変わったお人だな。
黒芒街の人間にあんなことを聞くなんざ。

engChrName: I was quite surprised at the answer I received.
engSearchText: I was quite surprised at the answer I received.
jpnChrName: 『陽の光の下で生きる術を   そもそも知らない』……か。
jpnSearchText:
『陽の光の下で生きる術を
そもそも知らない』……か。

engChrName: 'I don't even know how to live in the sun's light.'
engSearchText: 'I don't even know how to live in the sun's light.'
jpnChrName: あんな答えが返ってくるとは 正直、思いもしなかったな。
jpnSearchText:
あんな答えが返ってくるとは
正直、思いもしなかったな。

engChrName: When I first visited that district, I quickly realized the outside world's logic doesn't apply there.
engSearchText:
When I first visited that district, I quickly realized the
outside world's logic doesn't apply there.
jpnChrName: 以前潜り込んだ時も感じたが……
jpnSearchText: 以前潜り込んだ時も感じたが……

engChrName: And I had that same feeling all over again.
engSearchText: And I had that same feeling all over again.
jpnChrName: 黒芒街（彼ら）の営みを、 １つの常識で計るのは無理がある。
jpnSearchText:
黒芒街（彼ら）の営みを、
１つの常識で計るのは無理がある。

engChrName: Although, I understand now that thrusting our logic on its people isn't the way forward.
engSearchText:
Although, I understand now that thrusting our logic
on its people isn't the way forward.
jpnChrName: だが、こちらの常識を押しつけるのも それはそれで違う──今はそう思う。
jpnSearchText:
だが、こちらの常識を押しつけるのも
それはそれで違う──今はそう思う。

engChrName: I probably shouldn't be saying this as an enforcer of the law...
engSearchText:
I probably shouldn't be saying this as an enforcer of
the law...
jpnChrName: たとえそれが正義を執行する 警察の立場だとしてもだ。
jpnSearchText:
たとえそれが正義を執行する
警察の立場だとしてもだ。

engChrName: ...but while I can't say I understand their way of thinking—nor can I accept it as right...
engSearchText:
...but while I can't say I understand their way of
thinking—nor can I accept it as right...
jpnChrName: 認めることも共感もできないが、 ……俺も大人になった、ということらしい。
jpnSearchText:
認めることも共感もできないが、
……俺も大人になった、ということらしい。

engChrName: ...I can acknowledge that there may be things in this world that are neither black nor white.
engSearchText:
...I can acknowledge that there may be things in this
world that are neither black nor white.
jpnChrName: “白か黒で割り切れないグレー”…… 前よりも理解はできてしまうくらいには。
jpnSearchText:
“白か黒で割り切れないグレー”……
前よりも理解はできてしまうくらいには。

engChrName: That so?
engSearchText: That so?
jpnChrName: ハッ……そうかい。
jpnSearchText: ハッ……そうかい。

engChrName: Well, it's time for this lawless ruffian to get out of your hair.
engSearchText:
Well, it's time for this lawless ruffian to get out of
your hair.
jpnChrName: ……さて、そんじゃあ 外れ者（アウトロー）は退散するかね。
jpnSearchText:
……さて、そんじゃあ
外れ者（アウトロー）は退散するかね。

engChrName: I hope she likes her present.
engSearchText: I hope she likes her present.
jpnChrName: 娘さん、喜ぶといいな。
jpnSearchText: 娘さん、喜ぶといいな。

engChrName: As do I. Although, the relief it provides will no doubt be momentary.
engSearchText:
As do I. Although, the relief it provides will no doubt
be momentary.
jpnChrName: ……気休めだろうがな。
jpnSearchText: ……気休めだろうがな。

engChrName: This isn't the first time I've made her sad—and it won't be the last time, either.
engSearchText:
This isn't the first time I've made her sad—and it
won't be the last time, either.
jpnChrName: あの子にはこれからも何度も 寂しい想いをさせることになる。
jpnSearchText:
あの子にはこれからも何度も
寂しい想いをさせることになる。

engChrName: Damn. The pessimism is real. Did the depressing air in the Blacklight District get to you or somethin'?
engSearchText:
Damn. The pessimism is real. Did the depressing air
in the Blacklight District get to you or somethin'?
jpnChrName: らしくねぇな。 黒芒街の空気にアテられたか？
jpnSearchText:
らしくねぇな。
黒芒街の空気にアテられたか？

engChrName: Quiet, you.
engSearchText: Quiet, you.
jpnChrName: やかましいと言っている。
jpnSearchText: やかましいと言っている。

engChrName: Let me leave you with this: you can think the world of someone, but if you don't put your feelings into action or words, they'll never know.
engSearchText:
Let me leave you with this: you can think the world
of someone, but if you don't put your feelings into
action or words, they'll never know.
jpnChrName: まあ、どれだけ想っていようが それだけじゃ相手には一生伝わらねぇからな。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、どれだけ想っていようが
それだけじゃ相手には一生伝わらねぇからな。

engChrName: Deep down, though, I'm sure she already knows you really care about her.
engSearchText:
Deep down, though, I'm sure she already knows you
really care about her.
jpnChrName: 父親が自分を大切にしてくれてることは 娘さんも分かってんだろ。
jpnSearchText:
父親が自分を大切にしてくれてることは
娘さんも分かってんだろ。

engChrName: You've just gotta keep tryin' to show it.
engSearchText: You've just gotta keep tryin' to show it.
jpnChrName: 後は言葉と行動で示すのみ、ってな。
jpnSearchText: 後は言葉と行動で示すのみ、ってな。

engChrName: Well, I'm out.
engSearchText: Well, I'm out.
jpnChrName: じゃ、そういうことで。
jpnSearchText: じゃ、そういうことで。

engChrName: Just treat me to a canned coffee sometime, and we're square.
engSearchText:
Just treat me to a canned coffee sometime, and
we're square.
jpnChrName: 今回の報酬だが……まあ、そのうち 缶コーヒーでも奢ってくれや。
jpnSearchText:
今回の報酬だが……まあ、そのうち
缶コーヒーでも奢ってくれや。

engChrName: *sigh* I just can't get a read on that guy...
engSearchText: *sigh* I just can't get a read on that guy...
jpnChrName: ……まったく、若造が。
jpnSearchText: ……まったく、若造が。

engChrName: Daddy!
engSearchText: Daddy!
jpnChrName: パパ……！
jpnSearchText: パパ……！

engChrName: Gigi...
engSearchText: Gigi...
jpnChrName: ジジ……
jpnSearchText: ジジ……

engChrName: I'm really sorry, Daddy.
engSearchText: I'm really sorry, Daddy.
jpnChrName: ごめんね、パパ……
jpnSearchText: ごめんね、パパ……

engChrName: I know how busy you are, and I shouldn't have been so mean to you...
engSearchText:
I know how busy you are, and I shouldn't have been
so mean to you...
jpnChrName: わたし、パパがいそがしいの、 分かってたのに……
jpnSearchText:
わたし、パパがいそがしいの、
分かってたのに……

engChrName: I'm sorry, too—and to show I mean it, I got you a little special something.
engSearchText:
I'm sorry, too—and to show I mean it, I got you a
little special something.
jpnChrName: ……パパこそすまなかった。 実は、渡したいものがあるんだ──
jpnSearchText:
……パパこそすまなかった。
実は、渡したいものがあるんだ──

engChrName: Van quietly left the scene as if he had never been there at all.
engSearchText:
Van quietly left the scene as if he had never been
there at all.
jpnChrName: こうしてヴァンは静かにその場を去り……
jpnSearchText: <C1>こうしてヴァンは静かにその場を去り……

engChrName: And, with his work done, he returned to his patrol.
engSearchText: And, with his work done, he returned to his patrol.
jpnChrName: 何事もなかったかのように いつもの夜の巡回に戻っていったのだった。
jpnSearchText:
何事もなかったかのように
いつもの夜の巡回に戻っていったのだった。

engChrName: Hmm... I wonder what kind of gift he'd like?
engSearchText: Hmm... I wonder what kind of gift he'd like?
jpnChrName: うーん、あの子への仕送りは何が良いかなぁ。
jpnSearchText: うーん、あの子への仕送りは何が良いかなぁ。

engChrName: Remiferia is cold around this time of year, so maybe I should get him a pair of gloves. Or perhaps a scarf?
engSearchText:
Remiferia is cold around this time of year, so maybe I
should get him a pair of gloves. Or perhaps a scarf?
jpnChrName: レミフェリアはこれから寒くなりそうだし…… やっぱり手袋とかマフラーかな～。
jpnSearchText:
レミフェリアはこれから寒くなりそうだし……
やっぱり手袋とかマフラーかな～。

engChrName: Is this for your little brother?
engSearchText: Is this for your little brother?
jpnChrName: お前さんに弟がいるのは 情報くらいには知ってたが……
jpnSearchText:
お前さんに弟がいるのは
情報くらいには知ってたが……

engChrName: He's studying in Remiferia right now, ain't he?
engSearchText: He's studying in Remiferia right now, ain't he?
jpnChrName: 今はレミフェリアに留学してるんだって？
jpnSearchText: 今はレミフェリアに留学してるんだって？

engChrName: That's right. After all the trouble in Crossbell a year and a half ago, he decided to study abroad.
engSearchText:
That's right. After all the trouble in Crossbell a year
and a half ago, he decided to study abroad.
jpnChrName: そうなの、１年半前の“再事変”の後あたりに、 『知見を広めてまいります』なんて言い出してね。
jpnSearchText:
そうなの、１年半前の“再事変”の後あたりに、
『知見を広めてまいります』なんて言い出してね。

engChrName: 'I'm going to broaden my horizons,' were his words, as I recall. His experience over there must've been eye-opening.
engSearchText:
'I'm going to broaden my horizons,' were his words,
as I recall. His experience over there must've
been eye-opening.
jpnChrName: 滞在していたクロスベルで色々あって、 あの子なりに思うところがあったのかもね。
jpnSearchText:
滞在していたクロスベルで色々あって、
あの子なりに思うところがあったのかもね。

engChrName: Heh. Seems like you're proud of the kid.
engSearchText: Heh. Seems like you're proud of the kid.
jpnChrName: ハン……自慢の弟みたいだな？
jpnSearchText: ハン……自慢の弟みたいだな？

engChrName: I am...but he could stand to be less cheeky. And I wish he wouldn't fall head over heels for girls who are way out of his age range.
engSearchText:
I am...but he could stand to be less cheeky. And I
wish he wouldn't fall head over heels for girls who
are way out of his age range.
jpnChrName: フフ、ちょっと生意気で 綺麗なお姉さんに弱いのが玉に瑕だけどね。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、ちょっと生意気で
綺麗なお姉さんに弱いのが玉に瑕だけどね。

engChrName: Lookin' to buy that for Gien?
engSearchText: Lookin' to buy that for Gien?
jpnChrName: そいつをギエン老への土産にすんのか。
jpnSearchText: そいつをギエン老への土産にすんのか。

engChrName: Yeah. He's a bit of a soba addict. According to him, nothing beats it when you're tuckered out.
engSearchText:
Yeah. He's a bit of a soba addict. According to him,
nothing beats it when you're tuckered out.
jpnChrName: うん、爷爷（イェイェ）、お蕎麦が大好きなの。 疲労回復にいいんだってさ。
jpnSearchText:
うん、爷爷（イェイェ）、お蕎麦が大好きなの。
疲労回復にいいんだってさ。

engChrName: Sounds like he's been busy as a bee. He does a lot of advising these days.
engSearchText:
Sounds like he's been busy as a bee. He does a lot of
advising these days.
jpnChrName: 未だに何かと忙しそうなのよねー。 相談役としても頼られてるみたいで。
jpnSearchText:
未だに何かと忙しそうなのよねー。
相談役としても頼られてるみたいで。

engChrName: Guess that screw up of his didn't shake his standing in Heiyue all that much.
engSearchText:
Guess that screw up of his didn't shake his standing
in Heiyue all that much.
jpnChrName: 先の一件の不始末は問われたとはいえ、 影響力は健在ってことか。
jpnSearchText:
先の一件の不始末は問われたとはいえ、
影響力は健在ってことか。

engChrName: I'd suggest buyin' the flour from Creil. Soba fans love that stuff, so if you give him that, he'll be in seventh heaven.
engSearchText:
I'd suggest buyin' the flour from Creil. Soba fans love
that stuff, so if you give him that, he'll be in
seventh heaven.
jpnChrName: 蕎麦なら、クレイユ村産の蕎麦粉がオススメだ。 ここで扱ってるはずだが。
jpnSearchText:
蕎麦なら、クレイユ村産の蕎麦粉がオススメだ。
ここで扱ってるはずだが。

engChrName: Oh, really now? Well, I think I'll trust your advice and go with that, then!
engSearchText:
Oh, really now? Well, I think I'll trust your advice
and go with that, then!
jpnChrName: へぇ！　じゃあそれにしようかな。
jpnSearchText: へぇ！　じゃあそれにしようかな。

engChrName: Van's group decided to take a short break.
engSearchText: Van's group decided to take a short break.
jpnChrName: ヴァンたちは街の巡回の合間に、 しばしの休憩をとることになり──
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンたちは街の巡回の合間に、
しばしの休憩をとることになり──

engChrName: Everyone split up so they could spend their free time as they pleased.
engSearchText:
Everyone split up so they could spend their free time
as they pleased.
jpnChrName: 一時的に解散して、 それぞれ自由に過ごすのだった。
jpnSearchText:
一時的に解散して、
それぞれ自由に過ごすのだった。

engChrName: Van! Over here!
engSearchText: Van! Over here!
jpnChrName: あ、お兄さーん！　こっちこっち！
jpnSearchText: あ、お兄さーん！　こっちこっち！

engChrName: Hey there. You're both lookin' well.
engSearchText: Hey there. You're both lookin' well.
jpnChrName: よう、サルバッド以来だな。 姉妹揃って元気そうで何よりだ。
jpnSearchText:
よう、サルバッド以来だな。
姉妹揃って元気そうで何よりだ。

engChrName: Heehee. Same to you.
engSearchText: Heehee. Same to you.
jpnChrName: ふふ、ヴァンさんの方こそ。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、ヴァンさんの方こそ。

engChrName: It's good to see you again.
engSearchText: It's good to see you again.
jpnChrName: こうしてまた会える機会が できてよかったです。
jpnSearchText:
こうしてまた会える機会が
できてよかったです。

engChrName: She means that, by the way. She's been REALLY desperate to meet up with you.
engSearchText:
She means that, by the way. She's been REALLY
desperate to meet up with you.
jpnChrName: にしし、お姉はず～っと 会いたがってたもんねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
にしし、お姉はず～っと
会いたがってたもんねぇ。

engChrName: Sh-Shaheena!
engSearchText: Sh-Shaheena!
jpnChrName: シャ、シャヒーナっ……
jpnSearchText: シャ、シャヒーナっ……

engChrName: Hmm? Oh, yeah, I hear you've been asked to perform in Trion Tower.
engSearchText:
Hmm? Oh, yeah, I hear you've been asked to perform
in Trion Tower.
jpnChrName: ？　トリオンタワーの特設会場で 興行があるんだってな。
jpnSearchText:
？　トリオンタワーの特設会場で
興行があるんだってな。

engChrName: You two are really movin' up in the world, ain'tcha?
engSearchText: You two are really movin' up in the world, ain'tcha?
jpnChrName: あんなところに呼ばれるとは お前さんたちも出世したもんだ。
jpnSearchText:
あんなところに呼ばれるとは
お前さんたちも出世したもんだ。

engChrName: I suppose. The tourism association here in Edith contacted our agency and requested we put on a show there.
engSearchText:
I suppose. The tourism association here in Edith
contacted our agency and requested we put on a
show there.
jpnChrName: その、私たちを預かってくれている事務所に 首都の観光協会の方から依頼を頂きまして。
jpnSearchText:
その、私たちを預かってくれている事務所に
首都の観光協会の方から依頼を頂きまして。

engChrName: It sounds like our performance in the Carnal Cavalcade made an impression on them.
engSearchText:
It sounds like our performance in the Carnal
Cavalcade made an impression on them.
jpnChrName: フォクシーパレードの評判を聞いて オファーしてくれたんだってさ。
jpnSearchText:
フォクシーパレードの評判を聞いて
オファーしてくれたんだってさ。

engChrName: And I bet they were also blown away by the show we did with Arc en Ciel in Crossbell!
engSearchText:
And I bet they were also blown away by the show we
did with Arc en Ciel in Crossbell!
jpnChrName: あとはこの前のクロスベル自治州での 《アルカンシェル》での公演もね！
jpnSearchText:
あとはこの前のクロスベル自治州での
《アルカンシェル》での公演もね！

engChrName: Speaking of which, I wanna hear about how that went, but first we gotta wait for the others to show—
engSearchText:
Speaking of which, I wanna hear about how that
went, but first we gotta wait for the others to show—
jpnChrName: ああ、その話も聞きてぇな。 そろそろあいつらも──
jpnSearchText:
ああ、その話も聞きてぇな。
そろそろあいつらも──

engChrName: Saara! Shaheena!
engSearchText: Saara! Shaheena!
jpnChrName: サァラさんっ、シャヒーナさんも！
jpnSearchText: サァラさんっ、シャヒーナさんも！

engChrName: Welcome to Edith!
engSearchText: Welcome to Edith!
jpnChrName: ふふ、首都イーディスにようこそ。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、首都イーディスにようこそ。

engChrName: What's up, you two?
engSearchText: What's up, you two?
jpnChrName: よう、踊り子姉妹。
jpnSearchText: よう、踊り子姉妹。

engChrName: It's difficult to believe only a month has passed since we last met.
engSearchText:
It's difficult to believe only a month has passed since
we last met.
jpnChrName: といっても１ヶ月ぶりくらいですが。
jpnSearchText: といっても１ヶ月ぶりくらいですが。

engChrName: Whoa! Hey, everyone!
engSearchText: Whoa! Hey, everyone!
jpnChrName: フェリ、アニエスさんっ……！ わああ、みんな来てくれたんだ～！！
jpnSearchText:
フェリ、アニエスさんっ……！
わああ、みんな来てくれたんだ～！！

engChrName: You all came to see us? Well, this is a pleasant surprise.
engSearchText:
You all came to see us? Well, this is a
pleasant surprise.
jpnChrName: アーロンさんにリゼットさんも お変わりないみたいで。
jpnSearchText:
アーロンさんにリゼットさんも
お変わりないみたいで。

engChrName: Oh? I don't believe we've met.
engSearchText: Oh? I don't believe we've met.
jpnChrName: 初めての方もいらっしゃるみたいですが……
jpnSearchText: 初めての方もいらっしゃるみたいですが……

engChrName: We haven't. Though everyone's told me quite a bit about you both. My name is—
engSearchText:
We haven't. Though everyone's told me quite a bit
about you both. My name is—
jpnChrName: どうも、初めまして。 話には聞いています、僕は──
jpnSearchText:
どうも、初めまして。
話には聞いています、僕は──

engChrName: Quatre introduced himself to them, and the whole group celebrated their reunion.
engSearchText:
Quatre introduced himself to them, and the whole
group celebrated their reunion.
jpnChrName: その後、初対面のカトルの紹介も済ませて ヴァンたちは１ヶ月ぶりの再会を喜んだ。
jpnSearchText:
その後、初対面のカトルの紹介も済ませて
ヴァンたちは１ヶ月ぶりの再会を喜んだ。

engChrName: After that, they all made their way to Old Town.
engSearchText: After that, they all made their way to Old Town.
jpnChrName: そして、解決事務所のホームである 旧市街に案内することになった。
jpnSearchText:
そして、解決事務所のホームである
旧市街に案内することになった。

engChrName: Okay, time for some shopping.
engSearchText: Okay, time for some shopping.
jpnChrName: ウェストン百貨店──
jpnSearchText: ウェストン百貨店──

engChrName: This place sells just about everything you can think of—from luxury goods to daily necessities.
engSearchText:
This place sells just about everything you can think
of—from luxury goods to daily necessities.
jpnChrName: 様々な日用品から高級な品まで 取り揃えた老舗のお店ですよね。
jpnSearchText:
様々な日用品から高級な品まで
取り揃えた老舗のお店ですよね。

engChrName: I believe there's a shop that sells guns on the second floor, too, but I've never visited it.
engSearchText:
I believe there's a shop that sells guns on the second
floor, too, but I've never visited it.
jpnChrName: そういえば、ここの２階に 導力銃を扱うお店があったような……
jpnSearchText:
そういえば、ここの２階に
導力銃を扱うお店があったような……

engChrName: No surprise there. You can't even go inside without a permit.
engSearchText:
No surprise there. You can't even go inside without
a permit.
jpnChrName: ああ、許可証を持つ人間しか入れない ガンショップがあってな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、許可証を持つ人間しか入れない
ガンショップがあってな。

engChrName: That shop's called Thunders, by the way. That's where we're goin' next.
engSearchText:
That shop's called Thunders, by the way.
That's where we're goin' next.
jpnChrName: 《サンダース》っつう店で、 用事があるのはそこだ。
jpnSearchText:
《サンダース》っつう店で、
用事があるのはそこだ。

engChrName: Feel free to wander around the other shops, though. We can pick up some medicine while we're here.
engSearchText:
Feel free to wander around the other shops, though.
We can pick up some medicine while we're here.
jpnChrName: 薬屋なんかもあるし、他の店も 一通り立ち寄ってみてもいいかもな。
jpnSearchText:
薬屋なんかもあるし、他の店も
一通り立ち寄ってみてもいいかもな。

engChrName: This is the orbal café. I've never seen a store like this anywhere else but here.
engSearchText:
This is the orbal café. I've never seen a store like this
anywhere else but here.
jpnChrName: オーバルカフェ《イオタ》。 ここって珍しいお店ですよね。
jpnSearchText:
オーバルカフェ《イオタ》。
ここって珍しいお店ですよね。

engChrName: Me neither. It's a pretty novel concept. Come in, buy some orbments, and kick back and relax with some coffee or tea.
engSearchText:
Me neither. It's a pretty novel concept. Come in, buy
some orbments, and kick back and relax with some
coffee or tea.
jpnChrName: オーブメント製品を買いに来た客を こじゃれたカフェで寛がせる──
jpnSearchText:
オーブメント製品を買いに来た客を
こじゃれたカフェで寛がせる──

engChrName: The owner's wise beyond his years.
engSearchText: The owner's wise beyond his years.
jpnChrName: ここのオーナーは マジで先見の明があると思うぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ここのオーナーは
マジで先見の明があると思うぜ。

engChrName: He's a barista, too, isn't he?
engSearchText: He's a barista, too, isn't he?
jpnChrName: ふふ、確かオーナーさんは バリスタでもあるんですよね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、確かオーナーさんは
バリスタでもあるんですよね。

engChrName: Yeah. The guy's pretty quirky.
engSearchText: Yeah. The guy's pretty quirky.
jpnChrName: ああ、なかなかの 変わりモンみたいだな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、なかなかの
変わりモンみたいだな。

engChrName: Anyway, we're only here to make use of the orbal factory.
engSearchText:
Anyway, we're only here to make use of the
orbal factory.
jpnChrName: とりあえず、用があるのは １Ｆの工房カウンターだ。
jpnSearchText:
とりあえず、用があるのは
１Ｆの工房カウンターだ。

engChrName: Let's make our way over to the counter.
engSearchText: Let's make our way over to the counter.
jpnChrName: さっそく覗いていくぞ。
jpnSearchText: さっそく覗いていくぞ。

engChrName: All right.
engSearchText: All right.
jpnChrName: 分かりました。
jpnSearchText: 分かりました。

engChrName: The door is locked.
engSearchText: The door is locked.
jpnChrName: 扉には鍵が掛けられているようだ。
jpnSearchText: 扉には鍵が掛けられているようだ。

engChrName: Oh, yeah. This area isn't finished yet. We'll have to come back when it is.
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah. This area isn't finished yet. We'll have to
come back when it is.
jpnChrName: っと、確か改装中だったな。 また折を見て見に来るか。
jpnSearchText:
っと、確か改装中だったな。
また折を見て見に来るか。

engChrName: Probably not a good idea to go wanderin' off while lugging this case around.
engSearchText:
Probably not a good idea to go wanderin' off while
lugging this case around.
jpnChrName: 荷物を運んでる最中だってのに 寄り道はしてられねぇな。
jpnSearchText:
荷物を運んでる最中だってのに
寄り道はしてられねぇな。

engChrName: Before we do anything else, we need to drop it off at Riverside.
engSearchText:
Before we do anything else, we need to drop it off
at Riverside.
jpnChrName: まずはコイツをリバーサイドまで 運んじまうぞ。
jpnSearchText:
まずはコイツをリバーサイドまで
運んじまうぞ。

engChrName: Enter the underground ruins?
engSearchText: Enter the underground ruins?
jpnChrName: 地下遺跡に入りますか？
jpnSearchText: <C1>地下遺跡に入りますか？

engChrName: Plugins can be set by selecting Set Plugin.
engSearchText: Plugins can be set by selecting Set Plugin.
jpnChrName: 「プラグインセット」からプラグインをセットしてください。
jpnSearchText: <C1>「プラグインセット」からプラグインをセットしてください。
